themata alla os pros tis baseisentos ton arkhikon ektimeseon pou eikhe pro menon thesei e dioikese tes epikheireses elmec sport diamorphonontai ta oikonomika megethe tes perusines khreseosetaireia anakoinonei oti protithetai sumphona me tis diataxeis tou kanonismou tou khrematisteriou athenon na upobalei amesa aitese gia ten exodo ton metokhon tes apo ten kategoria epiteresessunantese egine me nomoskhedio peri phorologias oinopneumatodon kazanaredes tou nomou masste sunekheia me tis odegies tou demarkhou k anakoma kai khthes pou ekatommuria estekan gia logariasmo tou ston o upertukheros tou tzoker epairne daneika gia na agorasei phagetode nomizete pos einai proklese gia tous sunadelphous o kosanaduetai apo autes ena suntaraktiko aisthema apoxenoses apo ten pragmatikoteta kai tautokhrona ameses piestikes parousias testa elleimmata tes tou den prepei na epanalephthounantisustemikoi omos prepei pase thusia na ginoumeasphalos to pos ena paketo pkh dissto einai to sunoliko pososto ton anexarteton upopsephion ola ta upoloipa kommata sugkentrosan ligotera apo kai menoun ektos boulestora pleon sterizei kai eniskhuei auto ton tomea tes anadeixes tes politistikes istorikes kai arkhaiologikes kleronomiasparastase tha dothei stis to bradi sto kepotheatrosumphona me plerophories katagraphekan parabaseis ton kanonon enaerias kuklophorias sto athenon pou exelikhthekan se parabiaseis tou ethnikou enaeriou khorou sten periokhe tou kentrikou aigaiouto pio krisimo mats tes agonistikes kai o agonas pou tha krinei ten paramone e tenstis kai septembriou tha khorepsoun e alina somoba me partener ton nteibint makhatelitoso kairo tous sugkratousan oi ellenes sumpaiktes tous pou aphougkrazontan ten katastase kai to klima pou epikratouse sto erakleiokai ekhoume merika apo ta kalutera games autes tes genias sustematon pou pere to baphtisma tou puros sten upsele eukrineia kai pagiose tis online uperesies os autonoetes pia prin teepisemos khoregos tes ekdeloses to kentro epaggelmatikou prosanatolismou pou tha prospherei stous pareuriskomenous dorean diagnostiko test gia mathetes alukeiouauto pou endiapherei ton kosmo einai na xekinesei amesos to ergo kai na men kathusteresei etsi pio kourastike episkepse sten athena etan aute elege khthes o nomarkhes giannes garephalakes epistrephontas apo ten proteuousasta nesia tou aigaiou e katastase einai akoma kheirotere kathos e egkataleipse tes agrotikes ges sematodotei kai mia ektetamene eremopoiese tes upaithrou ton nesionkai kondulia apo to kinduneuoun na khathoun kai to ergo kathe phorea paei straphi kai den phainetai pos tha anastraphei tora aute e katastasetheorousate oti salata semainei ntomata lathos protonaute einai e tukhe oson uperaspizontai to periballon tes polesto sukhoremeno ton aristopoulo ton eikha gnorisei apo ta epaneilemmena pare dose ton gion tou me ta dikasteriasunolika daneisteka ekatommuriamakampi apotelei ena polu kalo sunolo pou phetos kataphere na epanakampsei epistrephontas se phainalphor meta apo deka khroniagia poio logo phthasame se auto to semeio tha mporouse na ekhei teleiosei to ergo kai na men ektithetai toso e rodos to ergo tes ethnikes odou rodou lindou eprepe me ton kalutero tropo na eikhe ede oloklerotheiepibradunei te diadikasia tes geranses kai prostateuei apo tis kardiakes patheseis eno antikathista me eukolia polla proteinika trophima opos to kreas ta auga to turi kai ta poulerikase mia ektase tm philoxenountai pano apo polukhromes petaloudes apo diaphoretika eide kathos kai phidia batrakhia skorpioi kai polla alla erpeta tes tropikes panidaskhoregeitai treis tesseris phores to se dose pou upologizetai analoga me to baros tou paidiouse stadiake exomalunse odegountai oi skheseis tes enoses ergazomenon sta tsimenta khalkidos kai tes dioikeses tes eraklesdiadikasia tes katagraphes tou ampelourgikou kai elaiourgikou metroou sto demo nikos kazantzakes brisketai se exelixe ekhontas oloklerothei e katagraphe epi khartou ton tmematon ges opos mas exegei e topographos ka pena seleniotakephusika e anabathmise den perioristeke mono ste emphanise alla epektatheke kai sta mekhanika merephilozoikos sullogos uparkhoun kai alloi uparkhoun kai alles analoges sumperiphores mekhri kai akroteriasmos ouras gatas se prionokordela apokalupse e antiproedros tou sullogou k pepe mpouse otan kletheke na skholiasei to skhetiko binteoki auto giati para to oti opos ola deikhnoun e nea dioiketike metarruthmise tes khoras tha prokhoresei to topio pou ten periballei einai akoma polu tholoeuro me to programma anaptuxes ton enomenon ethnon prokeimenou na oloklerothei e aponarkothetese tes zones asphaleias sten kuproostoso opos uposterixe e kubernese tou einai kata tou na dothei leuke karta sto tameio diasoses tes eurozones gia ten agora omologon ste deuterogene agora prosthetontas oti mia sunodos den eparkei gia ten epiluse tes krises khreousan eiste enas apo autous sigoura to ekhete dokimaseirolos tou daskalou anabathmizetai kai ginetai pio apaitetikos pio ousiastikosprutaneuse mia katakermatismene eikona sten askese koinonikes politikes os sunolou opou e proseggise sta koinonika problemata eikhe ton kharaktera katastaltikon draseon gia ten exomalunse ton kata kairous problematonarkhizei na tremouliazei na sakouliazei kai na kommatiazetai ek ton eso apo skiodeis bandalous aphenontas piso ena aluto problema den eisai o poimenas mouupenthumizetai oti sto proto pentameno tou o tziros ton ellenikon exagogon diamorphotheke sta disoi mpantari mpainoun liknizomenoi ste skene phorontas aspra me polukhromes karo podies tuligmenes apo tous merous eos ta podiato elleniko kentro asphalous diadiktuou ekphrazei ten anesukhia tou gia tous phoretous upologistes pou dothekan stous mathetes tes gumnasiouto trito paketo perioristikon metron anamenetai na apodeikhtei pharmakero gia ten ellenike oikonomia toulakhiston phetosoi prasinoi epikratesan telika me aphou o sito riera meiose sto o panionios ephtiaxe eukairies alla den mporese na isophariseisten kaisariane ste rebans tes rodou den ekhei oristei akoma emeromenia tha krithei to eisiterio gia tous tou kupellou anamesa sto zeugari ethnikos asterasdiagoras meta to sto gepedo tes kaisarianesemeis den anapheromaste mono sta idiotika klamp pou pistopoioun tous neognomones alla sto thesmiko organo tes europaikes epitropes pou tous elegkhei kai tous nomimopoiei ston europaiko khorotha thelame na doume perissotera gkolph sten elladame panionio semera o pagkhiakos polu dunato tournoua metekhei semera kai aurio o pagkhiakos sto plaisio tes proetoimasias touoi thievery ekhoun eiselthei pro pollou ste sunomotaxia ton onomaton ekeinon pou sten ellada gnorizoun analogika polu megalutere epitukhia se skhese me ton plethusmo apo opoiadepote alle khora ston mataio touto kosmoustera me ena psalidi aphaireite te membrane pou brisketai sto kentro tes ouras anamesa sta podarakiadidaskei demiourgike graphe sto panepistemio tou ntenber koloranto kai zei sto mpooulnter me ton suzugo tes gnosto amerikano muthistoriographo lairnt khant kai ten kore tous euampei eikhe xekhorisei ste ethnike os ena apo ta kalutera amuntika khaphena megalo parathuro anoigei apo tis oktobriou sto mouseio kukladikes tekhnes gia na photisei tis agnostes ptukhes apo to xekhasmeno parelthon tes europeskai an polloi dikaiologountai pos auto pou tous krataei sten athena einai e douleia tous ekeine pou einai ethopoios delonei pos den ekhei metaniosei oute lepto pou aphese ta theatra tes athenasden xereis an to xemeroma sou se brei to bradiasma giati oi dromoi pou perpatas ta anuparkta pezodromia den einai ki auta dika sousemeionetai oti o oristikos pinakas bathmologias tha prokupsei meta ten ekdikase tukhon enstaseon pou arkhizei semera martiou kai legei stis apriliouarese ston kosmo giati mas thumizei ti semainei erotikos ponosgia na apodothei omos dikaiosune enas tropos uparkhei na axiopoiethoun ta thesmika ergaleia pou e idia e metapoliteuse demiourgese kai na men paradothei e khora me sekomena kheria sten ephodo tou laikismou kai tes isopedosesekprosopos apantontas se erotese gia to an o prothupourgos tha episkephthei kai ten kupro anephere oti einai stis protheseis tou k semite alla o khronos tha kathoristei dia tes diplomatikes odouse megalo mpol anakateuoume ta upoloipa ulika kai phtiakhnoume ten exotike aute saltsa pou proerkhetai apo tis gallikes antillesmonadikos khoros zumoses emeine etsi pros to paron e upo ekponese panamerikanike sumphonia eleutherou emporioumporei to xekinema tou sten prote tou sezon sten agglia na etan akros entharruntiko omos e sunekheia den einai e analoge gia ton samak kathos pleon de brisketai sta basika plana tou bengker kai e skhese tou me ta antipala dikhtua den einai e kalutereas men dinoume loipon to dikaioma se osous prospathoun na demiourgesoun auto to klimatelos enokhe gia agora katokhe kai polese narkotikon ousion kritheke khthes apo to trimeles epheteio epi kakourgematon dodekanesou sunepeia ten auxese tes times tes kilobatoras sto diplasiostis poleis oi anthropoi katantesan na xekhorizoun tis epokhes analoga me ta roukha pou phoroun makrumanika e kontomanikarikhnoun stakhte sta matia tou kosmou metathetontas tis euthunes apo te mia kubernese sten alle kai kruboun ten exathliose sten opoia odegoun emas kai tis oikogeneies mas alla kai to stokho tous na mas pheroun se akoma kheirotere katastase eipe metaxu allonoi nomarkhiakes autodioikeseis pairnoun phetos tetraplasious porous se skhese me toeinai polu megalo problema gia mia omada na xeniteuetai kai einai adiko kai gia ton philathlo kosmo testo gegonos omos oti o napolitanos einai upokhreomenos na zei phrouroumenos apo somatophulakes se base katadeiknuei oti ouk oligoi sumpatriotes tou biazontai na ton xeprobodisoun pros tous epouranious leimonesespasan eklogiko kentro ekanan askhemies me zoa kheirodikesan loidoresan mekhri kaiiapegagan ten papadiaoi poleseis ton zemiogonon etan upsous ekatta thumountai kala auta kai oi dikoi mas alla kai oi allothreskoi tes elikias mouidruthekan kai leitourgoun nees monades aggeiokheirourgikesston skeniko skhediasmo eimai enthousiasmenos pou sunergasteka me to demetre enthousiasmos pou ekphrazoun einai protophaneskuklophorei to muthistorema to taxidi me ton esperoeinai mia omada pou ta perasmena khronia den ten eblepa me eukharistesekosmos pou parabretheke parakolouthese ena xekhoristo programma epideixes tou athlematos tou apo athletes tou sullogou alla kai koruphaious ellenes athletes oi opoioi entuposiasan me ten parousia kai ten apsoge ektelese tousarkhise ste leukosia e pagkosmia genike suneleuse tou diethnous sumbouliou stratiotikou athletismouste these tou aristerou matiou ekhaske tora mia trupa pou xernouse mikra kommatia aphrolexprosthetoume to ruzi aphou to ekhoume psesei se nero kai teleionoume prosthetontas te saltsa sogiaskai omos etan mia apo tis monadikes eukairies pou mas dinontai na kharoume tetoiou eidous resitalmegale proklese einai na stamatesei e spatale poron kai energeion ekei opou gennietaisuntaxe eideseon panos kapogiannes pempte iouliou pempte iouliou aithrios kairos semera sta dutikaautes tis euthunes poios tha tis zetesei sto reportaz sunergastekan o nikolas zerganos kai o nikolas leontopoulosten trite e kentrike proeklogike ekdelose tes kai tes aristeres parembases ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous ten trite e kentrike proeklogike ekdelose tes kai tes aristeres parembases me omilies zekou kai stto idio alieutiko eikhe metapherei boetheia stous antikathestotikous ste misrata ste diarkeia ton sugkrouseon me tis libukes kubernetikes dunameissumphona me te skhetike diataxe oloi oi enelikoi ellenes polites theorountai dunamei doretes organon ephoson den ekhoun delosei to antitheto kata te diarkeia tes zoes tousoi ellenes apodeiknuontai drasterioi sto erotiko pedio khanontas me brakheia kephale ten pagkosmia protokathedria mono apo tous katoikous tes uperdunames apophainetai abasanista e kathemerineme auto pou eimaste me osa perame apo ta paidika mas khroniatis prooptikes pou dianoigontai me te metatrope tou omilou phourle se holding parousiase o proedros kai dieuthunon sumboulos k basiles phourles sto plaisio ton ekdeloseon tes enoses thesmikon ependutonstis to proi peripou sumphona me ten purosbestike e photia eikhe tethei upo meriko elegkho ostoso oi prospatheies ton purosbeston gia plere elegkho tes photias sunekhizontan mekhri arga to mesemerialla blepete e parembase ton agglonlura tou psarantone ektithetai semera sto the worlds first global musical instrument museum sto phoinix tes arizona ton enomenon politeion tes amerikes opou kai proballetai video me ton idio ton kallitekhne na paizei te lura touoso aphora tis upoloipes theseis e tetrada tes amunas den allazei smikhart pou etan eskimoa mpeke sten toualeta tou xenodokheiou opou diemene me to dano philo tes kleidose duo phores kai apagkhonistekeparallela to epimeleterio theorei skopime ten proothese dunamikoteres isorropias kai sunergasias anamesa sta mikra kai mesaia epikheirematika megethe kai tis megales epikheireseisto katebazoume apo te photia kai to rikhnoume pano sten koubertoura ten opoia ekhoume kopsei proegoumenos se polu mikra kommatia mesa se ena mpolmekhri pote kai poies ores tes emeras mporei kapoios na dei ten ekthese tou asemantou ekthese tha diarkesei mekhri tis augoustoutelos o kletheis o akhilleas tsartsaras na skholiasei ta teleutaia demosieumata gia sugkubernese pasokneas demokratias to apekleise kategorematikaalexandros karabas opos semeionei e etaireia gia to philoxenoumeno kallitekhne ekhei gennethei sten athena topolos tes eleutheriass tou megistana ton meson enemeroses mperlouskoni kerdise oles tis dioiketikes periphereies tou plousiou italikou borra opos kai te sumbolikes semasias periphereia tou latiou kai toulakhiston mia periphereia tes notias italiasepomenos to aitema tha diabibastei apo ton ston proegoumeno phorea me tis perissoteres emeres asphalises pou einai to tspeathepisemane pos o arithmos ton okhematon stis mesogeiakes khores diplasiastheke mesa se mia dekaetia kai tha uperdiplasiasthei xana mekhri tis arkhes touprosthese oti den pisteuei pos o europaikos mekhanismos apokatastases tes khrematooikonomikes statherotetas mporei na labei meros se opoiodepote peraitero programma daneismou tes elladas kai os ek toutou e bretania den mporei na anameikhthei s autoelegktike uperesia loipon tes epexergasteke ta skhetika stoikheia kai katelexe se protaseis pros ten armodia epitropethetiko to prosemo ton ekptoseon sten krete trite augoustou trite augoustou meiomene kata se skhese me to einai e kinese ton therinon ekptoseonanalutikotera me apophase tou dioiketikou sumbouliou tou eniaiou sullogou phoiteton tou idrumatos to polutekhneio tha parameinei semera emera psephises tou nomou ste boule kleistoproblemata demiourgethekan ste metakinese ton politon logo stases ergasias ton odegon taxi kai ton ergazomenon sta astika leophoreia apo tis to proi os te mia to mesemeripleon o megaluteros kindunos gia tis trapezes einai o sustemikos kai etsi exegeitai to gegonos oti akoma kai trapezes me ikanopoietike kephalaiake eparkeia kai reustoteta antimetopizoun iskhures pieseis sto tamplognosta erga sto nomo hrakleiou einai ta antiplemmurika ston potamo giophuro o dromos apo te marturon mekhri ten odo makhes kretesmarselinio trophodotese me oraia pasa ton mpougka o opoios plasare alla o makho edioxe me to podiektos kanaliou tha meinei e sissu pheida me to spiti ap ten arkhe o nikos samoiles kai to gia logariasmo sas pou den tha xanadoume stous dektes masostoso kai opos delose ste o demarkhos alexandroupoles euaggelos lampakes sten periokhe pneoun iskhuroi anemoi oi opoioi kathistoun exairetika duskolo to ergo tes katasbesesdedeletakes anoixe to skor sto gia na isopharisei o xatzenikolaou sto eno to teliko diamorphose o poubalesmainomenou anekei se ekeinous pou oi demosiographoi apokaloume dream team thodores atherides giannes bogiatzes giorgos gallos stephania gouliote karuophullia karampete theodora tzemou menas khatzesabbas einai plasmata anesukha oloi tousta ennea tou khronia giortase o kiss sto marushten epomene omos dekaetia tha khreiastoume eknea aphisa pou emphanistheke sten athena apo ten kai apeikonizei ton pagkalo se pleretzoulia kristeba den egine gnoste apo tous samourai ki as prokalesan thoruboeuro gia ten kalupse diademotikon drasterioteton apo to esodo touupourgos paradekhtheke oti uperxan kai astokhies metra pou den apedosan oso tha ethele e kubernese kai metra pou elpize na mporesei na khresimopoiesei gia te meiose tou elleimmatos alla den tes to epetrepsan telika oi kanones tes eurostatperimenoume oti mekhri tis ianouariou tha mas ekhoun dosei ta kentra apo to upourgeio paideias episemainoun sto dieukrinizontas oti tha iskhusei to kathe klados kai exetastiko kentroden proegetheke dialogos den akoustekan oi apopseis ton armodion phoreon tes akademaikes koinotetas kai agnoetheke pleros to iskhuon nomiko plaisio pou parekhei alles dunatotetes basei sugkekrimenon epistemonikon kriteriontha prepei na phrontisete na sunekhisei na uparkhei autos o uperokhos politismos saslabame sobara upopse mas tis deloseis tou katelexegiati an oi germanoi ektelousan kai tous stous tosous pou eikhan mazepsei sto gumnasio biannou tote alloimonopapadopoulosse kentriko semeio enas protzektoras metatrepei se terastia othone ton ololeuko toikho proballontas plerophories gia ten romaike oikia sten patrato diastema ulopoieses den mporei na uperbainei tous menes sten periptose kataskeues kteriakon egkatastaseon e tous ennea menes sten periptose prometheias apokleistika mekhanologikou exoplismouanotero agora tha dienergethei kata to khroniko diastema apo maiou mekhri maiou me anotate time eurothumamai oti toulakhiston mia phora to mena oi arkhegoi ton sugkubernonton kommaton metebainan sto proedriko gia na sumphonesoun kai na suntonistoun se skhese me to kubernetiko ergoamphisbeteitai e amese epidrase pou tha ekhei e sumphonia stis agores anaballetai e apophase gia ten uiothetese euroomologou den apophasisteke e eniskhuse tou tameiou boetheiasparadeigmata to skhetiko lemma tes megales ellenikes egkuklopaideias sto opoio o kathegetes adgrammateas tes nomarkhiakes tou prophanos perimenei episema ten paraitese tou gia na apophanthei skhetika me ten apodokhe e okhi auteskharakteristiko paradeigma apotelei e periptose ton demgia paradeigma mia tha mporouse na analabei ta peri ton peripatetiko tourismo pdieuthuntes tou skholeiou mageias khogkgouarts opou phoita o khari poter uperxe os ephebos dieukrinise e suggrapheas bathia eroteumenos me ton metepeita antagoniste tou gkelert gkrintebalttrite augoustou methuste me to athanato krasi tou meres pou einai as grapso kati patriotiko gia ten epanastase tou na poumeligo exo apo to souphli brisketai kai to monadiko semeio apo opou o potamos ebros einai oratos apo ten ethnike ododaskalos mas sto skholeio theos skhoreston mas elege en gar nomois estin e soteria tes poleos leei o aristotelesan einai kubernese e e prosopikoteton e oikoumenikeos anaphora ten apokhorese tou aggelou bertsou kai ten metagraphe tou sten doxa dramas auto den mporei na ginei aphou o paiktes desmeuetai me sumbolaio pou ekhei me ten beroiame neo proponete to demetre dotsio kai arketous neous paiktes tha prospathesei to deilino na epanalabei ten thaumasia perusine tou poreiagia na apoktethei o ibits e kapoios allos xenos prepei na adeiasei mia these kai o paiktes pou tha phugei einai opos grapsame kai khthes o gkontbalnttelos me kataplessei e kubernese eno kaneis den suzetouse e den ethele proores ekloges ekeine tis ephere sto proskenio pros doxan mias kapheneiakes politikes pou den prokeitai na mas egkataleipsei eukolato ependutiko endiapheron epikentrotheke se metokhes tes biomekhanias kai ton etairion ependuseon eno tis megaluteres apoleies kategrapsan oi kataskeues kai oi etairies lezingkkai ta paratese ola gia na einai edo mazi mas prosthese kapoios alloski omos katoikoi tetoias khoras niosame stis kai martiouorismenes gunaikes pou kakopoiountai tha peistoun na apeuthunthoun se kapoio eidiko kai alles mporei na phobethoun kai na men kanoun tipotata protakias khoris na gnorizoun ti th antimetopisoun sto skholeio den oneireuontai akoma na kataktesoun ton kosmo tes gnoses alla na mathoun graphe ki anagnose kanontas parallela philies me tous summathetes toussten epistole tou mas plerophorouse pos katanoei to problema kai tha dosei proteraioteta se auto otan kai ephoson sustathei dioiketiko sumbouliou gia na mporesei na suzetethei kai na brethei luseauten te phora oi spuros gianniotes kai marianna lumperta den katapheran na brethoun sto bathro ton niketon ston agona ton khlmtopos kai e koinonia kaigontai kai ta aidoia khtenizontai ena ekatommurio oi anergoi oi upoapaskholoumenoi ergasiakos mesaionas epikheireseis kleinoun kata dekades khiliadesto gnorizoume oti kerdisan oi trapezites kai oi aeritzedes apo aute te sumphonia opos epises gnorizoume polu kala oti apo auten ekhase tautokhrona o ellenikos laospantos gia mia akome khronia giname kai thema sta athenaika kanalia me to rouketopolemo sto brontadoauta skephtetai o grapheiokrates kentrikos eroas tou gkranin pou prokeimenou na diateresei to posto tou kanei ta straba matia stis sostes kataggelies enos uphistamenou tou gia kapoia antioikonomika mekhanemataekeinos tha sou suntripsei to kephali ki esu tha tou plegoseis te phternaoi sunolikes prosphores pou upoblethekan anelthan se diseniskhuei to upourgeio ton paragkonismo kai to rouspheti aphou se pollous kleinei to mati epekteinontas khoris periorismous ta upagomena ependutika skhedia alla ta posa pou diathetei gia ole ten ellada kai gia oles tis ependuseis einai molis ekkatapatountai me auto ton tropo ta dikaiomata tou kai demiourgeitai klima tromokratias katalegeito laurio etan onomasto sten arkhaioteta gia ton orukto tou plouto kai etan phusiko to endiapheron gia tous polutimous lithous pou briskontan krummenoi ste ge tou na anazopurothei sta tele tou aionadeuteros agonas tha diexakhthei stis tou mena ste thessalonike me ten alexia kammenou na epanerkhetai sten tekhnike egesia aphou timoretheke me apokleismo duo agonistikon gia ten kokkine karta pou antikrise ston agona me ton olumpiakogiati e dike mas teleorase plen elakhiston exaireseon den paragei pleon kati epitukhemena laikooso e politeia aphenei athorakista ta nesia tou aigaiou toso oi idioi oi nesiotes pairnoun ten katastase sta kheria tousto mono sigouro einai oti e me auta ta problemata den ekhei tis dunatotetes na kanei phetos kati polu spoudaiokhare sten philosophia iblue oi beltioseis ekhoun enan koino stokho te meiose tes aerodunamikes antistases ten auxese tou bathmou apodoses kai phusika te meiose ton rupon kati pou epiteukhtheke kai sto bluekai ekhei grapsei pente biblia eos tora ta duo ekhoun os thema tous to kastellorizo kai dekades epistemonika arthra gia nomika zetemata alla kai gia ta rempetika tragoudiaoi kalesmenoi tes kas zagora pou timesan me ten parousia tous te bradia etan polloi kai eponumoi ma ten parastase eklepse o alen ntelon pou episkephteke te khora mas eidika gia te khthesine ekdeloseogdoe kata seira kinematographike metaphora tou klasikou apoikiakou muthistorematos gia ten kataktese tou soudan me upainigmous pou toulakhiston thumizoun ton prosphato polemo sto aphganistanstokhos poios allos apo ten polupothete isorropiaoi giatroi diekdikoun neo misthologio kai amoibes isotimes me tous europaious sunadelphous tous ensomatose olon ton epidomaton sto basiko mistho kai upokhreotiko upologismo ton ephemerion stis suntaximes apodokhesekhoun ginei pisteuoume ede saphe ta enokhletika semeia tes ektheses ekeina pou tha odegousan kai sten katapsephise tes apo ten omada tou europaikou laikou kommatosego sas akousa khoris na sas diakopsomporei na me phaneke kata te diarkeia tes ekpompes omos oi plerophories mas lene oti ousiastika to ekhei gousto tes mpelios tsoukala opou probletheke e khios kai e mastikha mas sterikhtheke ston khristo mpelleekeine ten epokhe oloi sugkinethekan otan brethekan ta kheirographase elegkho pou dienergetheke sto okhema brethekan ston khoro aposkeuon kai kampinas epibaton tesseris sakoi pou perieikhan akatergaste kannabe sunolikou barous kilon peripouto mesoprothesmo e oikonomike khounta kai e khreokopia ton ergatikon noikokurion prepei kai tha perasoun me kathe mesoostoso philandoi ollandoi slobenoi kai slobakoi pheretai na epimenoun kai stis suzeteseis pou eginan sten teleutaia sunodo koruphesk ioannou upogrammise oti ta ophele pou ekhoun ede prokupsei apo ten epharmoge ton programmaton psephiakes sugklises einai pollapla kai idiaiteres semasias gia tous polites tou nomousunekhizete ten poreia sas pros ton phourphouraoi kataulismoi einai anamphibola anapopheuktoi alla monon an leitourgoun os metabatiko stadio gia ten ek neou ensomatose sten energe zoe me eukairies kai douleiakathe meirakion me kallitekhnikes anesukhies briskei eukole philoxenia ste thessalonikesta plaisia tes ekstrateias to katastema the body shop kerkuras diorganonei upaithria ekdelose ston pezodromo tou liston ten kuriake oktobriou apoprin apo to epeisodio tes trites e ntengk amerikanida kinezikes katagoges eikhe ginei gnoste gia ton rolo tes stous kolpous mias apo tis iskhuroteres oikogeneies tou planetekai tora kati ideologiko kai philosophiko mazito skaphos pou skhediasan ena katamaran me ten eponumia marvin the martian ekhei mekos metra kai diathetei duo kineteres enan elektriko kai ena ntizelsumphona panta me ta episema stoikheia tes periphereias ta opoia parethese sten e armodia dieuthuntria kuria tsagkarake to sunoliko upsos tes demosias dapanes gia idiotikes ependuseis agrotikou tomea to sten krete einaiperimenei pos kai pos ten enarxe tes proetoimasias me ton olumpiako prokeimenou na gurisei gia ta kala selida sten kariera tou kai na koitaxei mprostaneos khrestes eggraphesundese akros entuposiako etan to anoigma tes agonistikes tou skotsezikou protathlematos me ten enarkteria anametrese na prospherei stous philathlous gkol okhi omos kai niketeaphou xeperasei to sok prepei na prosexoume ta parakato ta perissotera phuta esoterikou khorou me exairese kaktous kai pakhuphuta logo tes tropikes kai upotropikes proeleuses tous agapoun ten ugrasiaamesos meta egine e eparse tes semaias tou notiou soudanse rizike anakainise tou kinematotheatrou maroula prokhora e demotike arkhe lemnou katathetontas gia entaxe sto mia olokleromene protase gia ten episkeue tou kteriou kai ton eksugkhronismo toualla kai tou k androulake to biblio anapheretai se phantasioseis kai paraleremata ton eroon toueinai opadoi tes tuphles bias kai tes koinonikes proklesesekei pou sumphonoume tha sumporeutoume kai ekei pou diaphonoume tha delosoume ten diaphonia masdedomene theoreitai e anodos gia arketa stratiotika tmemata kai astunomikes skholes kathos odegoun se amese epaggelmatike apokatastase sto demosio tomeaprepei na energesoume oste na apokatastesoume ten empistosune ste suriake oikonomia giati uparkhei kindunos katarreuses tonisereustoteta ton trapezon kai e kephalaiake eniskhuse pou khreiazetai antimetopizontai proleptika kai apoluta me egguese toukouinsi kai episema ston panathenaiko tetarte iouliou tetarte iouliou panathenaikos anakoinose kai episema ten apoktese tou kouinsi obousou ampegie gia ena khrono me te morphe daneismou apo ten al saantskholia telos ora gia photographiaaphou omos parei ten adeia tes exodou tha arkhisei to pazari gia ten ora tes epistrophes sto spiti ennea leo ego deka zeta ekeinos stis kleinei e sumphoniadexiose kommatikon stelekhon sto xenodokheio ruthimnasgiatros elabe ede prothesmia na apologethei te deutera eno to idio anamenetai na praxoun semera oi duo alloi giatroiemeis tora pheugoume kai mporoume na poume omologoumenos oti o esoterikos mas kosmos ekhei gemisei apo sunaisthemata ikanopoieses kharas kai aisiodoxiasphetos sunekhizei na entuposiazei me to prosegmeno menou kai ten kataplektike tou thea apotelontas mia idanike luse gia mesemeriano e deipnooi kaluteroi khronoi apo to sunolo ton kolumbeton panelladika tha summetekhoun sto panellenio protathlema pisinasste notioanatolike khio kai se apostase khiliometron apo te khora einai e epises organomene paralia tes komes me poikiles touristikes egkatastaseisetaireia koumpas asphalistikes kai sumbouleutikes uperesies sugkalei ektakte genike suneleuse pros egkrise auxeses metokhikou kephalaiou enopsei neon ependutikon sunedriotetontoso to upourgeio tourismou oso omos kai topikoi paragontes proetoimazontai puretodos prokeimenou na ekhoume ten kalutere dunate parousia se mia touristike ekthese pou apotelei barometro gia ten poreia tes sezon ste rodometa apo polu kai orime skepse en plere eremia kai epeide den mas endiapherei to podosphairo pou eidame semera ten kuriake apophasisame mazi me ton tsino me ton opoio kaname oti etan dunaton na upoballoume ten paraitese masmekhri stigme den mas ephere stoikheio den pianontai oi poneres xiotikesepeide thelo na perniemai gia sobaros den tha epikheireso naetan apisteuta xino gia te geuse mou pou ekhei mathei sta biomekhanika giaourtiato teleutaio tha eikhe endiapheron an to ekanan oi arkhiereisakome ki an medenizame to khreos tha eikhame elleimma ston proupologismo okhi san auto tou alla elleimmakatagetai apo ton agio murona kai etan egkatestemenos gia polla khronia ste mutilene me te suzugo tou kai ta tria paidia tousnea airete periphereiake dioikese tha mporesei mesa apo dialogo na exetasei toso to thema tes khorotheteses tou ergou oso kai na protostatesei sten ulopoiese tounomismatike politike ton einai apokleistike armodioteta tes omospondiakes trapezas delade idioton kai okhi tes kubernesessunepos khreiazetai kai megalutere diarkeiato mega loipon zetoumeno einai soste kai pleres ekmathese tes glossas mas e opoia prepei epitelous na epitugkhanetai sto demosio skholeioe opoia tha parekhei epises ste serbias prosbase se auxemene proentaxiake boetheia upegraphe ton aprilio tou ostoso e diadikasia epikuroses tes xekinese ton iounio tou proegoumenou etouspempte noembriou an me peiraxoun tha milesoparallela tha ekhoun ten uposterixe tou kentrou elektronikou emporiou pou ulopoieitai apo to emporiko epimeleterio hrakleiou se sunergasia me ta alla epimeleteria tes kreteskataphere na ton perasei se pososta alla ekhase ten makhe apo ten prote kuriakeamerikanike trapeza ektima oti oi ellenikes trapezes tha emphanisoun zemies gia to ba trimeno touetsi e omada tou basile karaiskou den kataphere na phanei idiaitera epithetikaanatrope tes katastases den prokeitai na ginei amesa kai antilambaneste giatintunete ena tapsi tou phournou me antikolletike ladokolla kai aplonete pano to migmaproen eruthroleukos phernanto mpeloutsi apotheotheke ten ora pou egine allage lepto sto teliko kupellou portogalias gkimaraesporto kai eno to skor etan ede gia tous drakousduo biblia gia kalosorisma stous kolpous touekrektike prosopikoteta tou polutalantou kuriou doherty alla kai ta khronia problemata tou apo te khrese narkotikon ousion ton ekhoun pherei polles phores antimetopo me to nomoan den to kanoume auto kinduneuoume na suntriboume mesa se sunthekes idiaiteres poloses kai oxunses pou o kathenas mas problepei na epikratesoun se eperkhomenes ekloges opote autes ginounmakhe sten oura kritheke kai e khersonesos einai e monadike omada pou upobibasteke me agonistika kriteria kathos agia paraskeue kai keraunos kerateas apoblethekan apo to protathlemaarage uparkhei luse agrotes kai politikoi ekhoun te dunatoteta na apegklobistoun apo ton phaulo kuklo asphalos e exeurese luses einai douleia ton eidikon eph oson bebaia zetethei e apopse tousagonistika tha einai ta teleutaia test gia emas theloume na ruthmisoume kapoia pragmata kai an baloume tis teleutaies pineliesmana pou ginetai aspida gia na antimetopisei kathe kinduno kai na ginei thusia gia ten eutukhia ton paidion tesantistoikha e mese emeresia axia sunallagon tou phebrouariou etan ekatekane mia dikastike kinese na mplokarei egguetikes emeis thelame na diorthosoume kakotekhniessugkrotetheke se soma to neo tes me ton k benere opos anamenotan na paramenei sten proedriaelpizo na to petukhaapax kai ginei praxe e epilektike khreokopia meso diaphoron enallaktikon odon mia ek ton opoion einai to roll over metakulise khronika tes lexes kratikon titlon to epomeno bema eithistai na einai en eutheto khrono miaeutukhos ligo kalo prostukho mpineliki taktopoiese to problemato arkhipelagos anapherotan ex oloklerou sto khoro tes geras kai eikhame kanei gurismata ston elaionakserei ti prepei na kanei ten ora tou seismou omos den einai sigoure an tha katapherei na ta epharmosei sten praxeennoeitai oti oi suntages ektelountai upo tous ekhous tou pou sunodeuei to ergoerkhomos tou einai bebaio oti tha xesekosei ton kosmotha elega oti einai ste deutere gramme meta ten protoporia orismenon khoron tou kosmouasphalos mporo na katanoeso ten amuntike psukhologia pou demiourgeitai en meso kriseon prokeimenou na perisothei oti einai dunaton apo autous pou ekhoun ten ikanoteta na to kanounkai oi duo omos etan anendotoipikhnoume elakhisto nero anakateuoume kai aphenoume na brasoun se metria photia oi phakes mekhri na aporrophesoun ola ta ugra kai na meinoun me to ladi tousto proto pragma pou ton anesukhese kai eprepe na antimetopisei etan o ephialtes tes tote alla kai tes semerines epokhes oi purkagies sta daseeimi gouainkhaouz platinenia autokatastrophe eimi gouainkhaouz to phainomenoena video game pou axiopoiei plethora kinematographikon stoikheion khoris na philodoxei na einai tainiaden diaphono mazi sou kostesumphonia aute ektimatai oti tha odegesei se peraitero iskhuropoiese tes theses tes archirodon group inc stis agores pou drasteriopoieitai kai sten anaptuxe ton ergasion tes sten ellada kai stis khores ton balkanionstokhos tes praksis einai na sundesoume ta prostateuomena diamerismata me ta kentra upodokhespaiktes ekhei perasei apo tis gkremio portoostoso e zetese mekhri stigmes einai arketa periorismene kathos polloi ekhoun apothemata petrelaiou aphou to kausimo otan eikhe aposurthei apo ten agora kata ton persino maio aggize molis ta lepta to litrogiati na men ekhoun oi leproi duo mono spithames ge na kalliergoun oson ta daktula mporoun na sphixoun akome ten tsapa ena khoraphaki ena mpostani ena perbolieinai kharakteristiko oti an kai den ekhoun monime stege gia tis sunanteseis kai tis drasteriotetes tous briskontai metaxu tous se diaphora semeia tou hrakleiou se kaphe estiatoria e kai sta grapheia orismenon melonupothese pairnei mpala pollous galazious dioiketes uperano upopsiasnomothesia ekhei megala kena kai strebloseis kai den uparkhei ena axiopisto sustema elegkhoumporei na to skephtontai kapoioi gia te genike dieuthunse antagonismoueliopita tairiazei polu me ouzo e rake kai sunodeuetai me ena phresko turi opos to katiki e ta malaka phreska kukladitika turiaupegrapse ste nioukastl o ntempa mpa gouest kham epese omos o ntempa mpa den ten akolouthesealexiou ostis mellon na egkatastathe os elegktes tou phorologikou grapheiou uperxen autoptes martus ton apaision ekeinon skenonkathemerina epibebaionei o sumbouleutikos stathmos tou kethea ten polu semantike parousia tou sto nesi me entone drasterioteta konta stous neous me ekdeloseis kai enemerotikes ekstrateiesdustukhos mas leipei to poiotiko tragoudi apo to radiophono to opoio amphoteroi xeroun na uperetoun sostapara tis kata kairous desmeuseis tou upourgeiou den oloklerotheke e katargese tou periphemou tou paralogou periorismou delade pou epebale e proegoumene kubernese gia te dunatoteta apaskholeses tou prosopikou se sugkhrematodotoumena ergaeinai idioktetes ton pio diasemon ellenikon estiatorion metaxu ton opoion e sponde kai e khutraupourgos ugeias andreas loberdos kai o demarkhos athenaion giorgos kamines parakhoroun sunenteuxe tupou gia to programma prosumptomatikoi elegkhoi gia ton karkino trakhelou tes metrasapo auto to dedomeno exartatai alloste mia seira allon pragmaton pou ekhoun na kanoun me te metepeita poreia tou sto khoroex oson gnorizo o gkontas basizetai stis diabebaioseis tou khristophorou papadopoulou anadokho tou ergou oti tha ta kataphereipera apo ta opoia aitemata ton taxitzedon to megalo aitema erkhetai apo to koino kai tous touristes pou episkeptontai te khora kathe khronoto upsos tou neou paketou sterixes endekhetai na anelthei sta diskubernese koniortopoiei akoma kai desmeuseis pou aporreoun apo tous nomous pou aute psephise gia aporrophese ton dioristeon ekpaideutikon apo kai prouperesiamalista epeide einai polu parexegemene e neolaia theloume na exaroume ten parousia pollon neon daskalon kathegeton dikegoron allon epistemonon ergazomenon kthelukos kephalos o oxurrugkhos tes elladassten anakoinose tous oi philoi tou aiolikou upogrammizoun oti e omada sterizetai phetos se anthropous apo to nesi kai axizoun ten uposterixe se aute ten krisime kampe tou protathlematosanthropoi pou etrexan stous dromous gia na panegurisoun gia auto to katorthoma adola khoris na upopteuontai to pou tha phthaseioi titloi programmatizontai kai oi diakriseis prokathorizontai basei paraskeniakou khronodiagrammatos kai epikuronontai me tis eulogies kai tis kathoristikes parembaseis mias diaitesias anikanes kai upotagmenes sto bathurizo athletiko parakratosto epikheirema uper autes tes apopses khronos den eparkei gia prokrimatikesaxiosemeioto oti to programma ulopoietheke khoris khrematodotese me idious porous tougi autous bebaia oi opoioi ede ekhoun paei stous topous katoikias tous tha uparxei merimna oste na paralaboun ekei osa eikhan aphesei mesa sto ploioolumpiakos pere to ekto sunekhomeno kupello tou kai opos eipe kai o photes mplanes ste sunenteuxe tou ston gia ton olumpiako den metraei e nike para mono e isopaliagia nea paidia einai polu oraio alla den ekho dei kupseliotes na einai etsi pos na to kanoume niketas kaklamanes meta tis antidraseis gia to parko tes odou kuprou pou pege na to kanei gkarazomos o elegkhos pote den epitugkhanetai apolutaprokeitai gia ton idio mekhanismo pou eikhe thesei palaiotera se epharmoge kai e irlandiato sto epikentro suskepseon zakhare ta amugdala kai to upoloipo xusmaprospatho eipe na mazepso ten yperesia energontas mesa sta plaisia tou nomou kai olos autos o thorubos ekhei skopo na demiourgesei entuposeis sten koinoniaten alla phainetai oti epektatheke e emeis eimaste oi protoporoi ten epekteiname kai sto khoro tes politikesapo to douleuei san kathegetria phonetikes kai orthophonias ste rosike akademia theatrikes pleiopsephia omos tes epitropes theoretheke anagkaia e katargese tou elegkhou ton mikron ae ekeinon delta deltia tha dianemethoun apo ta tmemata parokhon tes kurias asphalises pou anekei o kathe einai grapte kai dienergeitai opos kai ekeine sten upokhreotike xene glossaproetoimasia tes omadas tha xekinesei stis gia tous nearoterous paiktes eno stis tha entakhthoun kai oi empeiroteres pou eprepe na kanoun ta megala kanalia to ekane eme to porisma tes exetastikes gia ten upothese siemens na brisketai sto epikentro tes epikairotetas o basiles lebentes den tha mporouse na men anapherthei kai se autosunodos tha askholethei me zetemata akademaikes politikes alla kai themata thesmikes oikonomikes kai dioiketikes phuseos pou aphoroun sta ellenika panepistemia sten trekhousa sugkuriakai sumpleronei exallou ston asomato epilexame na phtiaxoume kai na leitourgoume kai to proskopiko ekpaideutiko periballontiko kentro mas to monadiko se olo to aigaiomenuma sumparastases stous aganaktismenous menuma sumparastases stous aganaktismenous stelnei me delose tou o teos basilias konstantinos semeionontas oti e ekphrase diamarturias prepei na parameinei eirenikeampelona gia ores prokatalepsesdiabaste opos akribos tuponontai agape einai to kalutero to pio upoulo to pio apotelesmatiko ergaleio koinonikes katapiesesapo te janet davis didakhtheke gia polla khronia ten epharmoge khlamudia kai trikhomonadesstokhos tes omadas tou mikhale kaparounake einai na kleisei me nike te sezonsumphona me ton idio e emphanise paizei rolo sten epiloge suntrophou alla okhi ton kuriarkhoto apespase posostoekplexeden kanei lathe opoios den prospherei tipote eipe o kubernetikos ekprosoposphusika o paragon doxa paizei terastio rolo se kathe spoudaia anthropine drasteriotetaopos prokuptei metron to einai mprosta me pano apo monades stis demoskopeseisproedros garouphalos katsones emphanos ikanopoiemenos kai perissotero dikaiomenos kalese olous tous protagonistes se trapezi opou to kephi etan megalosto basiko titlo spoudon prepei na anapheretai epakribos e eidikoteta e opoia kai tha prepei na einai sumphone me te skhetike prokeruxeekho omos tha elega mia perephaneia giati auto to talento to diakheiristeka upeuthuna kai me sobarotetaden xero gia paradeigma an uparkhei problema ugeias me ton ntiarapera omos apo to poiniko meros tes upotheses o astunomikos me apophaseis tou protobathmiou kai deuterobathmiou peitharkhikou sumbouliou tes astunomias apotakhtheke oristika apo ten ellenike astunomia molis prin meres stis ioulioumutilenaios anakoinose oti den tha dosei merisma se antithese me te thugatrike pou tha dianeimei ekatna thumisoume oti e psephophoria tha arkhisei stis to proi kai tha lexei ores meta delade stis to apogeumato upourgeio oikonomikon ekhei entopisei mekhri stigmes peripou phorologoumenous me tetoies ekkremotetes oi opoioi kai eidopoiethekan na ruthmisoun tis upokhreoseis tousbreke egkhromous pou aneluan ten epikratousa oikonomike katastase ste khora maselioupole kai olumpiakos tha sunantethoun sto gepedo tou aigaleo sto ex anaboles paikhnidi tes d phases tes diorganosesapo ta mekhri tora stoikheia phainetai oti e nosos einai epiastous emitelikous o ophh eikhe apokleisei ton kudona me kai o ergoteles to hrakleio megiati na ekheis ena thesmo otan autos den mporei na paragei na parembei ousiastika den xero omos kata poso oi anthropoi akome te thuellode antidrase tous gia ten upographe autes tes sumbasesisopalo to mprestlion video se akoma ena paikhnidi den ta kataphere e lion pou emeine sto sten edra tes mprest khanontas eukairia na kanei apophasistiko bema gia ten trite these pou odegei sten exodo sto champions leaguegnorizo polla gia ten istoria tou alla kai tous philathlous tou ki auto to leo giati etan tromere e empeiria pou eikha apo ten proegoumene mou phora sten ellada otan epaixa antipalos tou me ton panioniokalupse theseon se aute ten eidikoteta epidiokei to upourgeiona parameinoun apo to diko sas kheirokrotemaparaskeue maiou pm khrustalla khatzedemetriou pos eipate to onomataki sas allaxte to onoma sas oso einai kairoskai ta tria gkol semeiothekan sto bu emikhrono me tous bakouphtse salpiggide kai amanatideterma pia sta duo metra kai duo stathmaakoma omos ki auta ta posa ta opoia den kaluptoun para mikro meros tes zemias tou tameiou ta kataballei to elleniko upourgeio oikonomikonarketes apo tis palaioteres ekdoseis ekhoun exantlethei omos etoimazontai sunekhos kainourgiesoi geoponoi ton pistopoietikon organismon einai makria kai den mporoume na ekhoume toso amese epaphe mazi tous sumpleronei o kuriakos adamesauto einai gegonos alla tautokhrona einai kai e genesiourgos aitia oson aute te stigme sas katamarturouneuropaike enose proteine khthes ten auxese sto tou posostou summetokhes tes sta sugkhrematodotoumena erga gia exi khores tes sumperilambanomenes tes elladas prokeimenou na tonosei ten oikonomike tous anaptuxemetallaxe tou demokratikou kommatos meta ton thanato tou rouzbelt o emphulios sten ellada e apogoeteuse apo te dialuse tou kai e kataggelia tou os kommouniste ton odegesan sten apophase na egkataleipsei ton ethniko keruka toan kai edo iskhuei gia tous muemenous to ti kanei niaou niaou sta keramidiaoi prosdokies ton ependuton kateuthunthekan se metokhes upseles kephalaiopoieses tou deikte oi opoies tha ophelethoun apo tis eisroes xenon kephalaion enopsei tes anabathmisesereuna me euthune olon ton nomarkhon kai ton demarkhon gia purenika apobleta sto thalassio khoro guro apo ten kreteta duskola phusika den teleiosan aphou e inter epistrephei arketes phores to bretaniko mouseio otan ekana metaptukhiaka sten agglia kai etan odunero na blepeis se askheto meros ta glupta tou parthenona ta opoia onomazan e mallon blasphumousanpantoula exetazetai e turia gia ten topothetese asthenophorou oikismos tes turias exetazetai apo to upourgeio os katallele these gia ten topothetese asthenophorou tou gia ten kalutere exuperetese ton katoikon tes periokhesopos anephere o k samaras to komma tou tha psephisei kapoia arthra tou polunomoskhediou giati auto epiballei e koine logike leei omos okhi ston ergasiako mesaionatrite augoustou emboliasmos kata tou katarroikou ton emboliasmo ton probaton gia ten antimetopise tou katarroikou puretou zeta o bouleutes spuros galenos me erotese pou katethese ston upourgo agrotikes anaptuxes kosta skandalidebeltiose dromou stauroumessarias katergou tmema khora skhoinousasliolou koinotetas skhoinousas sunolikou proupologismou euromaria maite peroni e maritsou opos prosphoneitai sten prototupe ekdose tes seiras pantreuetai ton antra tes kardias tes khouanme ten entole aute epibebaionetai e apodokhe ton protaseon kai ton desmeuseon mas gia ten exodo tes kalumnou apo ten kriseamesos ekhete prosbase me ta podia se penteexi ammouderes paralies oles organomenes me xaplostres kai ompreles gia bouties me thea sten aiginata teleutaia pente khronia te dieuthunse tou oikismou ekhei analabei e murtotha ten phtiaxoun kai apo ta duose mia epokhe pou e periokhe o topos ekhei anagke apo orama kai okhi apo aple diakheirisetaktike epeide akribos e prokatarktike pistopoiese ta gegonota plen omos apo tote den ekhei kinethei apolutos tipotepos mas eikhe diaphugei apo ton tzogo threphetai o sugkhronos politismosupobole dikaiologetikon mekhri semera deutera septembriou ste grammateia tou nosokomeiou telgallos epithetikos upegrapse sumbolaio sunergasias eos to telos tes sezon me ten mpani gias apo to ampou ntampi opos anakoinose o sullogoskhtismene amphitheatrika me dioropha kai trioropha spitia me romantika dromakia kato apo ta ereipia tou benetsianikou kastroutraumatisteke sobara se trokhaio ten proegoumene paraskeues sto khiliometro tes eparkhiakes odou metamorphoses aspraggelon ioanninon ikh autokineto exetrape tes poreias tou me apotelesma na traumatistei sobara o odegos touoi nees etaireies tha leitourgesoun os kentrikoi phoreis gia ten anaptuxe ton emporikon drasterioteton tes solenourgeia korinthou sto diethne khoroepanalambanete te diadikasia se akoma mia strose ton idion ulikontetarte augoustou klope semeiotheke ten perasmene pempte se spiti antra sten periokhe tou kato khalika ste mutileneproedros tes omospondias tzounto tes austrias khans pol koutsera eikhe mono kala logia na pei gia ten kheil klaountia etan enas anthropos khamogelastos kharoumenosproseleuse ostoso tou kosmou to proi tou sabbatou etan apogoeteutikeoi polites tes thessalonikes exetasan ten kholesterine kai ten arteriake tous piese kai parakolouthesan omilies gia ten ugeia tes kardias me emphase sten upertase ten paidike kholesterine kai te kholesterine kata ten emmenopausegi auto kai ephthasan mekhri tis emeres mas sothekan perissoteres tragodies tou euripide apo tous allous tragikous aiskhulou sophokle euripidesumphona me to konsept eidikoi analambanoun na allaxoun to laiphstail ton summetekhontonproedros tou orizetai o metropolites rodouae basiles paizei mpalitsa kaioi koinonikes politismikes alla kai oikonomikes sunthekes ekhoun allaxei kai to elleniko panepistemio den mporei na parameinei os ekheitupika ste khora mas uparkhoun sunetairismoiantitheta to piso meros diathetei asunethisto skhema me makrious probolous prophanos gia kalutere aerodunamikeeukhomai to kalutero ston kosmo ton ioanninon kai stous sumpaiktes mou kai phusika ston giannina apo ton opoio pheugo diaphoretika apo oti ertha katelexeklaire bogiatze to oti einai ligos o stolismosektimo omos oti e upothese tha mpei sto arkheiookhi den tha tis kruboume emeis tis opoies me thliberes eideseis tis eideseis pou kruboun mia aisiodoxia ena kapoio khamogeloepises ensomatonei puxida kai anagnoste karton mnemes stis opoies apothekeuetai to binteostis noembriou tes idias khronias kai o teleutaios tourkos stratiotes egkateleipe oristika ten kretetis protes duo dekaeties tes metapoliteuses ta epitoikhia sunthemata ton antiexousiaston etan mia nota sarkasmou mesa ste genike demokratike kai sosialistike euphoria ekeinon ton khrononkouniados mou etan mazi me aute sto idio skholeio kai apo tote kaname pareaoi egesies ton khoronmelon tou einai apithano na sumphonesoun ste meiose tou megethous tou purenikou oplostasiou tes summakhias ste sunodo koruphes pou prokeitai na diexakhthei to diemero kai noembriou delosan axiomatoukhoi touoi ekprosopoi tes tou kai tes tha axiologesoun ean e khora ekhei petukhei tous stokhous kai ean semeionei arkete proodo gia na labei ten epomene dose upsous disse oti aphora ton adelpho kai autos sumphona me plerophories arneitai ta osa tou katalogizontai ostoso analutika exegeseis tha dosei ten tetarte kai gia tis duo upotheseisphotographia pou demosieuome ekhei lephthei ten epomene tes apopeiras tes iounioumia ependuse pou anagnoristeke apo to elleniko koino to opoio kharise sto nesi megales teletheaseis pou ephtasan to kai eno tautokhrona xeperase ta ellenika sunora aphou arkhise e polese tes sto exoterikoto septembrio tha ekhoume te diakeruxe kai tous orous tou diagonismou kai isos kai ten egkrise tes meletes apokatastases apo to kentriko sumboulio neoteron mnemeion tonise o proedros tesoson aphora to protupo tes kretikes diatrophes episemainoun polla lakhanika kai phrouta demetriaka psomi kai ospria ladi ligotero kreas kai perissotero psari galaktokomika kai oti apo ten phuse kata paradose proerkhetai krasi kai raki me metrosto metagraphiko stokhastro ton biola brisketai o epithetikos trietes sumbolaio upegrapse o tekhnikos me ten istorike omadamegalonontas ena akoma paidi sten trite gumnasiou ekhei eikona ti sunepagetai e phoitese enos paidiou sto demosio gumnasiotetarte augoustou gia te balkanike olumpiada plerophorikes pou tha diexakhthei apo eos iouliou ste roumania etoimazei tis balitses tou o mathetes kostas pipinesprosopika pisteuo pos to semerino einai ena apo ta kheirotera kouponia tou kalokairiousunaulia me te diethnous phemes gallida soprano emma shapplin kuriolektika kathelose tous khiliades ton theaton pou edosan to paron sten telete enarxes kai malista suneideta giati uperkhe kai eisiterioto upsos tou tha anerkhetai eos tou posou ton ekatden thelo na ekho topoauto apo mono tou deikhnei oti eimaste mesa sten kateuthunse kai sto pneuma pou ekhoume perigrapsei ston elleniko laotrite augoustou ksekinesan khthes oi asphaltostroseis sta tsamakia alla kai sten odo naumakhias elles sten epano skala opou to odostroma etan se athlia katastase meta tis entones brokhoptoseis tou kheimonaetsi pkh oi suntagographeseis gia psukhopharmaka opos to prozac auxethekan te teleutaia tetraetiaaphentika pou mas kratoun pisthagkonabrakhuprothesmos omos einai polu bebaion oti sumballei me astokhes parembaseis tou se semantikotato bathmo sten katastrophike ekdelose tes manias tes phuseospantos ste gallia den xekhnoun to perasma tou apo sampiona kai malista krazoun kiolas ten sent etien gia ten apoleia touste diorganose summeteikhan exenta somateia apo ole ten ellada me athletespantos oi eurobouleutes emphanistekan dikhasmenoi gia te boetheia pou prospherei e sta adunama krate opos e khora mas me tous misous na ekphrazoun ten alleleggue tous kai tous allous misous na anapheroun oti einai axia tes tukhes tesprokatarktike protase anaplases tes palias poles khorizei to erakleio se dekaennea zones gia kathe mia apo tis opoies orizontai sugkekrimenoi oroi domesesto pathos ten tekhnike tous te duname tousta aeroplana me ta opoia tha petame einai ta pleon asphale sten kategoria tousdi o kai katanoo ta elateria tes siopes ton pathontonkpitsidianos elpizei se anakampse tes agoras kati pou eukhontai oloi osoi askholountai me to proionksetuligo koubari miamia tis praxeis souekhei ginei suneidese oti e touristike anaptuxe kai o dunamismos tou kladou exartatai apo tis epidoseis se olous tous allous tomeis apo ten paideia kai ten ekpaideuse os ten oikonomike ten phorologike kai ten khorotaxike politiketa idanika antidoto sta narkotika gia tesseris dekaeties uperetei ten ellenike dikaiosune ekhei dikasei emporous kai khrestes narkotikonoi epikhoregeseis ton asphalistikon tameion tha einai auxemenes kata me idiaitera eunoemeno ton logo tes auxeses ton agrotikon suntaxeon kata drkhoi demarkhoi erkhontai kai parerkhontai omos o sumboulos tous apodeiknuetai diakhronike axiatourismos tha pollaplasiastei otan epitrapoun ta coffee shopskhairomaste epises pou tha probeite se agoges dioti semainei oti tha apophugete apo toude kai sto exes tis grothiesostoso analutes anapheroun oti den etan epitukhemeneautonomia tou phtanei stis ores omilias kai ores anamones kai sunolika apotelei polu kalogouste kai mikre se diastaseis protasese deka khronia prepei na ginei e antikatastase ton mekhanematonskopimoteta einai prophanesepanastase tou eliou xekinese apo ta kato kathos tes nomothetikes ruthmises eikhan proegethei apo to analoga metra ste barkelone me axiologa apotelesmata eno akolouthesan alles proteuouses demon se ole ten ispaniapurkagies photiestrite augoustou sumbole sten istoria tou politismou tes elias parousiasteke sten aithousa teleton tou peiramatikou lukeiou mutilenes to biblio ton alexandrou kai strate kiourelle elaiomuloi ste lesboprepei na doume te basike idea pou kateuthunei ena prosopo pou kateuthunei tis praxeis touapo to theatro koliantaos tote as proseukhomaste kai as proskuname agoggusta tous agades tes athenas oi opoioi philoxenoun monimos sto retire tes eunoias tis omades tes poles touskoitida tou politismou kai tes paideias sten pagkosmia axiologese katalambanei tis teleutaies theseispane oi meres ton endoxon parelaseonden einai anagke na diathetei kaneis gnoseis politikes theorias gia na katalabei oti auto to tekhnasma odegei kateutheian ston laikismo kai ten akrodexiaoloi oi upoloipoi nearoi apo ten pole tes aulonas pou eikhan sullephthei gia ten upothese gkouma ekhoun aphethei eleutheroidiexodos prepei na anazetethei ston allo dromo anaptuxes me kriterio ten ikanopoiese ton sugkhronon laikon apokleistika demosia kai dorean eniaia anotate ekpaideuse demiourgia demosion dorean epaggelmatikon skholonoi prasinoi ekananprepei na sugkentrothoume gia na kanoume tostatistika einai e prote phora apo to pou enas pilotos blepei protos ten karo semaia sten premiera tou me te pherarieno o panagiotes samilides plasaristeke stadiakaes pothos o eleutheros kloze ti ki an odeuei olotakhos gia ta miroslab kloze apotelei ena apo ta pleon kauta onomata gia ten kalokairine metagraphike periodo mias kai to sumbolaio tou germanou epithetikou olokleronetai ton prosekhe iounio kaisten agora sunallagmatos e endeiktike isotimia euro dolariou pou anakoinose e europaike kentrike trapeza diamorphotheke sto dolariagiati auta den einai phusike alla metaphusikepastitsio mousaka rebithia phournou plousia gemista phasolakia ladera alla kai kakabiana doun ten epeiro na anebaineikanenas dialogos me tous dolophonous phonazan diadelotes sto proastio irmpin tes damaskou delose telephonikos autoptes marturas sto roiterparallela o panathenaikos nikese gia prote phora ephetos ton aionio antipalo tou pou mekhri semera metrouse nikes se isarithmous agonesaiteseis eos kai semera deutera telaxizei na tonistei oti o protos kuklos dialexeon epidiokei na sundesei genikes ennoies me topikes semasies na phanerosei te khresimoteta ton epistemonikon proseggiseon sten kathemerine zoe kai ste leitourgia tes demokratiasomos e muthoplasia peri ekhei ede rizosei bathiaapaitoume na timorethoun autoi pou sakatepsan ten konstantina kouneba kai ten amese sunekhise tes phroureses tesegkritheke e proslepse atomon me skhese ergasias idiotikou dikaiou orismenou khronou sto geniko nosokomeio serronanaloga de me tis apaiteseis tes bradias allazei to uphos kai o ruthmos gia na anebasei te diathese kai na odegesei se aprosmenes khoreutikes parembaseisse oti aphora te dome tes kuberneses ephoson prokupsei apo tis ekloges delose oti to upourgiko sumboulio tha einai pio euelikto kai sullogiko kapoia upourgeia tha sugkhoneutoun khoris ostoso na apokalupsei poia tha einai autakallitekhnes pou ste mutilene ergazetai os upallelos sto upourgeio upodomon metaphoron kai diktuon exegei oti katelexe ste sunduasmene tekhnike kolaz kai zographikes ekhontas erthei se epaphe meso tes skholes tou me diaphores morphes tekhnesgi autes pou tha aphoroun stis politikes autes tis mesoprothesmes politikes demosionomikes strategikes kai tha ekhoun orizonta toulakhiston tok khatzakes ekphrazei sobares entstaseis gia ton tropo pou e dieuthunse tourismou ermeneuei te skhetike egkuklio gia ten ananeose ton sematonkai os tetoios den ekhei to perithorio pote na epanapauteiotan omos anoixan ta prota kapheneia kai arkhisan na leitourgoun xenones oi opoioi gemizan ta sabbatokuriaka tou kheimona polloi epestrepsan sto bounoostoso ekhoume ede orismenes gunaikes se demotika kai periphereiaka sumboulia kai apoteloun mia semantike phone gia ten topike dioikeseentos tes ano prothesmias oi endiapheromenoi opheiloun na upoballoun ta dikaiologetika gia ten ananeose ton adeion tous sta tmemata asphaleias e opou den uparkhoun sta astunomika tmemata tou topou katoikias tousalla mekhri ekeiena mono domatio gemato polukhroma kentemata kai zographismena diakosmetika piata oi noikokuraioi boleuan ten oikogeneiake kai koinonike zoe tousto philosopho kai stokhaste pou prospathese na nikesei ta limnazonta udata sten paideia masaute e prosphora egine me to proskhema na peisoume tous kaluterous athletes na erthoun sten ellada kai na paroun meros stous agonesarkhika den skopeue na metapherei ten istoria pou egraphe ta bradia sto grapheio tes kathos aphougkrazontan ten kerkuraike nukhta se kapoio khoreutikokhtupame elaphros ta aspradia me surma kai ta rikhnoume sto mpolkai ta gnosta gkroupouskoula de tha ekhoun pleon oute benzine na baloun stis molotoph tousto sumperasma auto einai uperbolika aploiko eipe o tousitseinai to kai o k papandreou autoi oi opoioi ekhoun anagke anthropon axioprepon kai akeraion gia na perisosoun lige apo ten politike ton axiopistia e opoia katrakulaei ston katephoro me sunekhos epitakhunomeno ruthmooles oi ekdeloseis kai oi parastaseis tha ekhoun kai phetos eleuthere eisodo gia tous ekatontades khiliades episkeptes toudiaseme einai e beranta me to botsaloto mprosta apo to kathistiko pou ekhei onomastei e beranta tes mesogeioumonos pou mporei na sugkrithei me ton tzorntan sumphona me ton sumpaikte tou lamar ontomnomizo omos oti edo pou phtasame sunekhise den uparkhoun pisogurismataan kai episema stoikheia den uparkhoun oi ektimeseis anapheroun oti ten periodo o arithmos ton ergazomenon sto meiotheke kata peripou atomaoi minoikes grammes ekhoun kataballei terastia prospatheia gia ten asphale metaphora tou epibategou koinouekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous sunekhizontai se ole ten epeiro oi klopes kai oi diarrexeis me tous katoikous na noiothoun pleon aprostateutoi aphou blepoun mera me ten emera na apeilountai olo kai perissoteroskhediastika oi kinezoi estiasan ten prosokhe tous ste maska e opoia egine pio sugkhrone eno epanaskhediasmena einai kai ta photistika somatastokhos mou einai na katadeixo tis koinonikes sunepeies tes uponomeuses ton diataxeon tou suntagmatosmolis dosame ta prota philikaden mporoun na ekhoun ten idia duname kai phreskada otan se liges meres kalountai na dosoun krisimous agonesparamenei agnosto aute te stigme an e nea kubernese aspastei tis apophaseis tou proen upourgeiou paideias upo ten egesia speliotopoulou e an uparkhei kapoio diaphoretiko skhedioedo kai tora dromologese sugkhronon kai asphalon ploion me phthena eisiterianea klinike demiourgeitai gia na parekhei stous astheneis pou anazetoun therapeia se krisimes astheneies prosbase sta pio kainotoma pharmaka ta opoia briskontai se phase klinikes ereunasta decks peran photia me to resident tou marush space na xesekonei toso ten omada oso kai to koino me polu kales xenes kurios rnb epiloges diaterontas te diathese sta upse mekhri to kleisimo tou magaziouskhese tou anthropou me ten katsarola einai mia skhese me parelthonta keimena auta khoris na diathetoun phainomenika toulakhiston mia thematike enoteta apokaluptoun me ten aletheia to khioumor to pathos te skleroteta tis emmones tous ton poiete kai stokhaste karouzooi omerikoi athletes einai oi aristoi pou epideiknuoun ten arete tous opos akribos tha ekanan kai ston polemo opou tha paleuan mekhris eskhaton gia ten epikratese epi tou antipalou touskata sunepeia oi apodekhomenoi te demosia protase metokhoi tha laboun to sunoliko poso tou prospheromenou antallagmatos dikhos ten epibarunse apo ta dikaiomata ekkatharises upsous alla meiomeno kata to poso tou proanapheromenou phorou upsousmporoume na khresimopoioume tis asurmates suskeues arkei na akolouthoume kanonestha epanelthoume aphou to meletesoumesto semeio pou ekhei phthasei e omada tes poles mas den ekhei to perithorio apoleias bathmon sunepos tha ta dosei ola gia te nike pou tha anoixei to dromo gia te deutere pronomioukho thesean bgoun ta protathlemata einai allo kapeloruthmos auxeses tou dioxeidiou tou anthraka sten atmosphaira tou pio epikindunou aeriou tou thermokepiou etan persi takhuteros apo ton propersino kai e auxese aute etan megalutere apo te mese etesia auxese pou parateretheke ten periodo osenas nukterinos kalokairinos boreiodutikos anemos tous parasurei anatolikotera ap oti skhediazan na apobibastounkale prospatheia alla den tes bgekeer kubernese leei oti den mporei na dosei luse sto thema tou ladioukai ta duo montela parekhoun dunatoteta khreses se mikres omades eos khrestes meso ensomatomenes diktuoses ethernet eno e ensomatomene asurmate diktuoses einai diathesime ston officejet aio wirelesseinai mia semantike protoboulia kai tha prepei osoi ekhoun ten dunatoteta na ginoun ethelontestraulos o antriou xotzes philotekhnei mia leptomere kai piste prosopographia enos poluskhidous anthropou kai koruphaiou mathematikou tou perasmenou aionaexentakhronos k theodoros mprant apo ton germaniko eruthro stauro einai ekpaideutes ekpaideuton ethelonton ta teleutaia trianta khroniakairos athena pem aug eleutherotupia paraskeue iouliou berolino kai parisi sprokhnoun ten ellada se khreokopia merkel kai sarkozi odegoun ten ellada ste khreokopia apophainetai se kurio arthro tes e ephemerida niou giork taimsto basiko elattoma sas polemo ten anabletikotetakhresimopoietheke apo ton arthur koestler se mia prospatheia na deixei pos droun ta sustemata os sunolo eno einai ta idia mere enos megaluterou oloukairos athena tet aug apotelesmata eos apo stigmes tou teleutaiou augoustou apolithomata pou apodeiknuoun pos uperkhe zoe ste ge prin ten emphanise tou oxugonou entopisan epistemones sten australiakharin tes mikres istorias upenthumizoume oti aute e giorte sto parelthon etan tripleoikonomou na epilephthei tou thematos se sunergasia me tous phoreis me stokho na epiluthei to zetemasemeionetai de oti ede to upourgeio oikonomikon ekhei anapsei to prasino phos gia ten proslepse noseleuton en toutois omos arketa nosokomeia tes khoras ekhoun aitethei ten proslepse monimou noseleutikou prosopikouta sustemata enallaktikes diakheirises leitourgoun gia kapoia ulika okhi omos sto bathmo pou tha eprepe popos prokuptei apo ten iskhuousa nomothesia oi armodiotetes ton perissoteron organon laikes summetokhesan xereis apo londino ki an genikotera sukhnazeis sten periokhe knightsbridge tote sigoura gnorizeis to onoma aphou prokeitai gia to adelphaki tou omonumou giaponezikou estiatoriou tes bretanikes proteuousaskameron dekhetai pieseis gia to thema auto kai apo tous etairous tou sten kubernese tous phileleutherous demokratesaxizei na semeiothei oti to taxidi auto eprokeito na pragmatopoiethei prin merikous menes alla anabletheke kathos logo tes barukheimonias eikhe pagosei o potamos dounabes kai to potamoploio den mporouse na diaskhisei to potamimporei bebaia na eperease mekhri ena semeio e poreia kai ton europaikon khrematisterion pou eidika pros to mesemeri oi apoleies etan megales ton deikte xerta tou khrematisteriou tes phragkphourtes na katagraphei apoleies skhedon trion posostiaion monadonantilogos apo ten pleura ton legomenon eksugkhroniston anapherei oti o k semites dikaioutai perissotero apo para pollous na omilei gia ten istoria tou kai ton idrute touetan to polu emeron epibiosan omos kai na taekobe boltes ston ethniko kepo se askheme katastase kai sotheke sto para trikha apo philozoopleon monadike ekkremoteta einai e sugkatathese tes e opoia ostoso den anamenetai na emphanistei antithetediaphora ton bourbon kai ton tennessee ouiski einai oti ta tennessee prin apo ten emphialose philtrarontai mesa apo metra karbouno sphendamou pou apomakrunei oles tis tukhon akatharsies kai dinei sto ouiski mia pio malake kai kathare geuseta pneumatika dikaiomata anekoun stok magkriotes anephere akome oti oute oi parakhoresioukhoi teresan te skhetike sumphonia me ten kuberneseekhoume diapistosei ta pantato epomeno bema loipon gia mena einai e apokruptographese tou diskou tes phaistouapo ten alle e katanalose ekhei pesei semantika kai genika o klados ton praterioukhon opos lene polloi epaggelmaties paei apo to kako sto kheiroteropolu phobouuai dustukhos oti diapseudontas ton gallo dianoete e khora uas talaiporeitai seuera apo anthropous khoris pepoitheseis pou denekhoun kauia skhese ue tis peristaseisomos boethaei o theos ton klephte boethaei kai ton noikokure otan erthe e ora na kanei tameio diapistose oti o demos etan to koroido tes pareasse time de semantika khamelotere tou antagonistikou euro vs euro se times agoras den tha duskoleutei na kentrisei to endiapheron tou koinou sto opoio apeuthunetaisumphona me ton ekprosopo tou panepeirotikou ktenotrophikou sunetairismou mikhales tzima e agonistike diathese tou ktenotrophikou kosmou brisketaista upse me stokho te me idiotikopoiese tes galaktobiomekhaniasauto to perasma me ta khiliades parakladia tou kai tis kruphes omorphies tou tha exereunesoume stis epomenes diadromeskai me meion okto eikhe tetoia paragogikoteta gia na apodeikhthei isos oti to kurio thema se mia omada kai de san ton phetino olumpiako den einai poioi paizoun kai se poies theseis paizoun alla o tropos tou paikhnidiouta thumata tes apates diamarturethekan sten aeroporike etaireia kai aute me te seira tes enemerose te dioxe hlektronikou egklematosauxese parousiasan kai ta kerde pro phoron tes etaireias kai anelthan gia to se khilanametrese diexekhthe se enan baru kai laspomeno agonistiko khoro o opoios duskheraine polu tis prospatheies ton duo antipalon oi opoioi kollesan sto medenprokeimenou ta kratemele na xeperasoun tis duskolies tous tha prepei na mporoun na khrematodotethoun me logiko kostos kai ta euroomologa einai to kalutero meso gia na epiteukhthei kati tetoiose kathe taxidi uparkhei ena kainourgio mouseio akome enas dromos me kharitomena kaphe akome mia geitonia pou den ekhoume gnoriseibriskomaste stis arkhes tes dekaetias tou se ena akritiko khorio tes makedoniastsagkare pou briskotan ste mikre kampina tou alieutikou den prolabe na bgei kai parasurtheke sto buthoden anakoinotheke neo hardware e meiose times kai ta semantikotera stoikheia tes etan ede gnosta omos auta parousiastekan analutika kai ousiastikakrata autous pou agapas konta sou pes tous psithurista poso polu tous khreiazesai agapa tous kai phersou tous kala bres khrono gia na tous peis sugnome sugkhorese me se parakalo se eukharisto kai ola ta logia agapes pou xereisostoso tis epomenes meres anamenetai na paradothoun sto skholeio mousika organa ta opoia eikhe desmeuthei na khoregesei o demos hrakleiousumphona me ton k tsiakiroglou se auta pou leei os thesmiko organo ton epaggelmation einai auta pou apotuponoun ten sklere pragmatikoteta stous kolpous tes agoras tes ksantheskai phusika mpoliasmene apo ton thrulo na uposkhethei kai ekeine ti allo titlous gia ton megalutero elleniko sullogodouleuei se orukheia anazetei ikhne deinosauron paraterei kai katagraphei kineseis asteron kunega agria zoa kanei kathe eidous douleiauposterizei ten proothese tes ekpaideutikes metarruthmises ten auxese ton ependuseon sten ereuna ten eisagoge kai te diadose ton neon tekhnologionaphegese nike kapare mousike tragoudi ekhetika topia giannes pseimadasme khasete to istoriko khorio ena terastio aristourgematiko sumplegma pou prospherei mia sunolike empeiria tekhnes gastronomias kai pholklorodegontas alla metra mpainete ston asphaltodromo pros komnena kai stauroupole e diadrome apo ta komnena os to paratereterio tou nestou asphaltostronetai opote an thelete na prolabete ta agria aloga na kuklophoroun eleuthera stous dromous speusateporto den thelei diaphemiseeinai kinese enotetas tou skhematos peran autes emeis den tha kanoume piso as paroun alloi ten euthune tes diaspases tou uposterizoun stelekhe tou sunaspismou rikhnontas to mpalaki stous etairouste khora mas phusika kai te galliasto metaxu eikhan kinetopoiethei kai polla peripolika kai motosikletes tes astunomias ioanninon mplokarontas olous tous dromous kai se kapoio semeio oi albanoi egkateleipsan to autokineto kai prospathesan na diaphugoun trekhontasthese tekhnikou dieuthunte anelabe o mpella ston ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous these tekhnikou dieuthunte anelabe o mpella ston tekhnikou dieuthunte anelabe apo khthes o giannes mpellaetsi ta nesia me oikonomike drasterioteta opos kai oi epeirotikes periokhes na ekhoun dikaiomadineis to diko sou stigma paleueis gia auta pou pisteueis ki an uparkhoun agephurotes diaphonies tote phusika kaneis tis epiloges souapotelousan kai ta duo semantikotato stathmo okhi mono sten istoria tou ellenikou skholikou bibliou alla kai genikotera sten exelixe ton ellenikon ekpaideutikon pragmaton tonizei o demarasadunamia lepses apophaseon sten pio krisime sugkuria gia ten apo ten gennese tes apotuponei to megethos tou problematos pou opos oloi oi psukhraimoi analutes episemainoun einai katarkhen politikolatreuei na mperedeuetai sta podia sou gia paikhnidi kai na sou kanei kantades prin kai meta to phagetosto metaxu to oxutato problema pou ekhei anakupsei me te meiose tou nerou sto phragma ton mpramianon ekhei prokalesei anastatose sten topike koinonia tes ierapetras pou parakolouthei me kommene ten anasa oles tis exelixeistelos o kostas kiassos ekane logo gia tis allages pou eginan phetos ston ophe alla kai gia ten paramone touakoma kai gi autous pou den xeroun te drapetsona to khalbadopoieio ton kh kosmide kai gabrile sten idia these apo to einai sema katatethenego to kano kathe mera kathe ora kathe stigme pou tha antikriso ligo pio pano apo ta bouna ton ouranoekhoun apoprosanatolisei olo ton kosmo akome kai tous podosphairistes giati oso kai na prospathoume na kratesoume to thema auto exo apo ta apoduteria oi podosphairistes epereazontaimimes moutsatsos proedros tou ekpolitistikou sullogou pharkainas me aphorme te time tou oikopedou pou apallotriose e me euro to tm thumetheke xana ola auta ta prosopa kai ta gegonotakaluteros topos diamones ta khoria tou mainalou demetsana lagkadia stemnitsamazi tou briskontan epises to melos tes dioikeses tes panagiotes poikilides kai o tekhnikos dieuthuntes tes omadas panteles konstantinidesskholike ergasia einai ena krama autenergeias kai kathodegesesspanos tzanabaras semeiosate pempte martiou mporei na proebe se deutere allage proponete ostoso e diaphora tou demetre spanou kai tou panagiote tzanabara apodeikhteke apeiroelakhisteektimontas oti meta ton polemo o kosmos tha khorizotan se duo stratopeda eikhe ede apophasisei na proseggisei tous amerikanous prosspherontas tous se antallagma ten polutime peira tou kata ton sobietikonmone elpida einai e sunenose na dialusoun oles oi omades kai na ginei mia iskhure pou tha ekphrazei olo to demonea nea phebrouarios nea nea nea nea tora mporeite kai eseis na summetekhete kathe mera ole meraexallou apo tis drasteriotetes tou spinoffs sto demiourgetheke e etaireia forthnetste naousa tis apokries protagonistoun oi mpoulesden etan anagke na to pei kai o kainourios proponetesupogrammise te semasia tes epharmoges kai epitukhias tou oikonomikou programmatos tes khoras semeionontas oti den tha uparkhei kalo an den paei kala to to kai toalloste kathe morphe ekphrases einai therapeutiketa oikonomika apotelesmata tou protou trimenou anamenetai na einai kerdophora opos kai touparkhei epises megalos khoros apothekeuses me ensomatomene mneme kai uposterixe gia karta microsd eno to euelikto logismiko uposterizei megale poikilia epharmogon kai sunekhe ananeosekalupse ton megalon elleipseon se tomeis koinonikon uperesion kurios sten ugeia prosopiko nosokomeiou sto sten ekpaideuse stis uperesies pronoiasoi ereunes xekinesan stis to proi otan kai bretheke to phouskoto me tous okto paranomous metanastespragmatopoietheke ten kuriake sto demotiko theatro argostoliou kephalos e prote sunedriase tou demotikou sumbouliou kephaloniasmolis e soupa brasei khamelonoume te photia gia lepta mekhri na ginoun trupheres oi patatesdiamorphonetai nomothetiko plaisio gia ten eisodo kai allon idiotikon trenon stis epibatikes kai emporeumatikes metaphoresoi sustaseis ton topikon arkhon einai dedomenes gia na men khathei gia ten periokhe oti me kopo ta teleutaia khronia khtisteke ston tomea tou tourismouekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous auto pou epi tes ousias theloun oloi oi phoreis gia prote phora apotelei kai protase kubernetikou phoreaektos autou kaneis ek ton paragonton ton dikon opou diermeneuse e kategoroumene enantiothe toson kata tes diadikasias e tes diermeneuseos kai touto de epi seiran etonkairos einai na xesekothoume kai na diamarturethoume mpas kai petukhoume katikai oi kaloi gerontes den epheran kamia antirreseto proi tes tetartes malista pragmatopoietheke suskepse ston khoro tou gepedou metaxu ekprosopon tes astunomias tes omospondias kai ton duo omadon oste na dieuthetethoun oi teleutaies leptomereies oson aphora ta metra asphaleiasmporei na men ekane eukairies alla etan ena peitharkhemeno sunolo me kale anaptuxe kai uparkhoun perithoria beltioses mekhri na arkhisei to protathlemaoi luseis pantos den einai pollesekhei zetesei na sunantethei me ton petalote apo ten prote emera pou anelabe kathekonta alla statheke adunatonan thelesoume na analusoume kapoia apo ta semeia tes aurianes sunanteses tha prepei na stathoume toso se exoagonistika kriteria oso kai se agonistikes parametrousnea teleoptike sezon anoigei siga siga stous diadromous ton kanalion kosmos paei ki erkhetai ta prota phreska treiler pernoun ede apo tis othones mas to grapheio mou ekhei gemisei apo deltia tupou kai photographiessta neanika tou khronia egrapse to biblio argeses auge eno mazi me ton giorgo khagio idrusan to ergasteri epaggelmatikes demosiographias opou didaxe gia polla khroniamikres alla semantikesauto den semainei oti oi prostateuomenes periokhes eikhan megalutere e mikrotere semasiaoi diaphoretikes epitheseis pou ekhei ste diathese tou o paiktes einai arketes opote uparkhei kai semantiko perithorio sunduasmou tous combossto antixoo auto oikonomiko periballon katapherame na petukhoume tous stokhous mas prosarmozontas egkaira kai ousiastika ten kostologike mas base me apotelesma na emphanisoume thetikes tameiakes roes kai ugie isologismodanelles papastamkos nikkletheke na metaskhei se dekapente eruthroleukes dioikeseis ploutizontas tes me te morphose ten eurumatheia tous titlous ten euprepeia kai to ethos toukatastrophike photia ste nuphida kai sten periokhe gournelle bateron ekapse mono ektaseis me prinous belanidies kai xera khorta kai opos lene oi katoikoi se ligo kairo sten kamene ektase th arkhisei xana na phutronei prasinoksenakes etan prosektika aikhmeros sunolika se ole te diarkeia tes sunenteuxes polu de perissotero otan anapherotan ston antipalo tou kai ste dikaiosunemeiose tou antitimou ton diodion tha einai idiaitera semantike mporei na plesiasei kai to kai tha epiteukhthei me ten aphairese ton eispraxeon uper tou demosiou pou ekhoun ensomatothei sten telike time ton diodionkinese etan auxemene toso sten ethnike odo sten koilada ton tempon oso kai sto dromo apo ta paralia tes larisasmen protos ekhei ten etaireia pou diathetei tis solenes me tis prodiagraphes pou mpekan sten prokeruxe tou ergou kai oi gioi tou deuterou ten etaireia pou tha analabei to ergooso ligoteros einai o khronos pou kuophoreitai to embruo toso megaluteres tha einai oi duskolies pou prepei na xeperasei ste sunekheia gia na phtasei se autarkeiato neo koinoboulio eikhe ten prote tou sunedriase upo te nea kubernese ten trite ioulioukubernetikos ekprosopos exephrase ten apolute ikanopoiese tes kuberneses gia to periekhomeno tes omilias tou proedrou tes demokratias konstantinou stephanopoulouoloi oi alloi me exairoumenon ton perissoteron eblepan mono ten mia sakoula tou auten pou ephere sta opisthia tou dioti aute ethelan mono na blepouneukhomai na ekhoume mia kale therine periodo kai na diateresoume upsele ten ektimese tes topikes koinoniassunantese tes maiou dustukhos den ekhei xekatharisei to topio anaphorika me ten parousa diadikasia sto kupriako problema delose o proedros tes boules marios karogian sten omilia tou sto ethniko mnemosuno ton eroon tes koinotetas panagiasdikaioma na katathesoun protaseis ekhoun oles oi epikheireseis xenodokheion camping kai enoikiazomenon domation kai diamerismaton tes khoras pou leitourgoun prin apo ten ianouariouprosthetoun de oti oi exelixeis odegoun te metatrope tou panepistemiou se etaireia metakulontas to kostos leitourgias sten ellenike oikogeneiata duo trita ton demotikon telephonon einai kommena giati uparkhoun logariasmoi aplerotoi epi seira etonmoiraia aute e agnoia sunepagetai ten adunamia gia axiologese atomon kai katastaseon pou aphoroun te mousikekoita to diabaterio pou ekho pera duo adeies ten idia mera kai e mia eikhe ede lexei menes prin ten paro sta kheria mousumphona me tis protes plerophories o nearos ergazontan se erga odopoiias sten periokhe kai o thanatos tou apo to tsimpema tou entomou epelthe akariaiato dramatikotero etan te deutera ste to mesemeri peripou sten periokhe platanakia otan o odegos enos ikh perase sto antitheto reuma me apotelesma na sugkroustei plagiometopika me dierkhomeno okhemanutriart dioikese ektima oti entos tes trekhousas khreses tha ekhei oloklerothei e anadiarthrose ton daneiakon upokhreoseon e opoia tha epitrepsei aphenos men te beltiose tes leitourgikes kerdophorias apheterou ten eniskhuse tes kathares theses tes etairiassemera apo albanikes anakoinoseis o plethusmos tes albanias anerkhetai se trisemise ekatommuriaupo tis proupotheseis autes prosopika ekphrazoume ten apopse oti oi teleutaioi duskola tha anasteiloun tous antiparathetikous diaxiphismous kai touto phusika se baros ton thematon pou apaitoun ameses luseis sta proanapherthenta paramethoria nesiato menuma tou to esteileeinai adunaton na parastathei mia toso gkrante prosopikoteta opos autosan kai to koupi duo etan autoi pou to trabexan sten ousiase ola ta parapanokataluse tou asulou apo mone tes einai adiketo khamogelasto koritsi me ten kataplektike phone gregora kerdise te sumpatheia koinou kai kriton me tis ermeneies tes se opoio tragoudi eikhe klethei na tragoudeseipetropoulos epikheirontas na beltioseis tis oikonomies klimakas tes etaireiassto nesi mas egine gnostos gia te khrese tou ikh limenikoukhthes e anakoinose metaxu allon kai ta onomata ton paratereton diaitesias tes periodou sta opoia phusika prostithentai oi treis proanapherthentesstis selides tou ekdose reklam o prasinos errikos anaptussetai sena periballon morphomeno kai exeligmenote dianome merismatos gia te khrese upsous
