suneleuse tou kladou ten tetarte noembriou sto pneumatiko kentro tes panagias tou mastampa me arketa megale summetokheme tis drasteriotetes autes dinontai eukairies stous mathetes na oikodomoun tis gnoseis tous mesa apo dramatopoiese paikhnidia rolon omadosunergatike didaskalia sunthetikes ergasies kai authentike axiologeseapo ten pleura tous oi idioktetes ton duo mpar ekhoun peismosei giati opos uposterizoun e stase tes demotikes arkhes apenanti tous etan meroleptike kai methodeumenedianome trophimon se apores oikogeneies pempte augoustou pempte augoustou dianome trophimon pragmatopoiei e periphereia kretes meso tou koinonikou pantopoleiou semera kai auriostis apothekes tou mouseiou mas uperkhan khiliades antikeimena apo auten ten periodopoios ierarkhei tis proteraiotetes ti na pernaei ap to mualo ton ithunonton sto nosokomeio kai te aporo ekpolitike pou akolouthoume einai prosarmosmene sto klima ton emeron pou dianuoumeikanopoiemenos apo ten prospatheia tes omadas tou emeine o sakes tsiolesgenika pos leitourgeite kata te diarkeia tes emeras k giannakake an ekho deka problemata phrontizo na men pelagoso prospathontas na luso kai ta deka mazi giati tote den tha luso kanenaentos ton epomenon emeron anamenetai na anakoinothei to skhedio axiopoieses tes periousias ton asphalistikon tameion delose khthes o k koutroumanes episemainontas pos ekhei oloklerothei e pleres katagraphe ton periousiakon stoikheion ton tameiongephura tes glukesupopsephioi pou delosan summetokhe gia to einai molis ara tha eklegoun oloikairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia paraskeue augoustou upeuthunos elias drumonas matheuteke akoma oute to pos oute to giati oute kan ti basana pernouse o anthropos ki apophasise na balei telos ste zoe touto port antonio sten anatolike pleura tes tzamaika einai idaniko gia opoious theloun kati pio eremo apo tous xephrenous ruthmous tou montego baydioti emas sto elakhistoeidika se tetoious panduskolous kairous mas aphorakai telos to megalutero isos kerdismeno stoikhema pou aphenei ki ena stigma ste phetine omada einai e axiopoiese ton nearon paiktondemarkhos epemeine oti den tha kanei piso sten apophase gia kleisto agogo mekhri na dei na sundeontai oi peripou megales epikheireseisepises zetese apo tous upeuthunous orismenon gepedon na kanoun orismenes parembaseis giati diaphoretika den tha tous khoregeitai adeia gia ten telese agononauto etan to kalutero pharmako gia ten kourase kai ten talaiporia maspou stegazetai sto dioropho lithoktisto ktirio tou palaiou dioiketeriou sten kentrike plateiasten prote kategoria anekoun gia paradeigma poikilies akhladias kai melias to stamnagkathi o diktamos kai orismena eide saligkarionsunekhes auxese ton aiteseon sten epitrope einai xekathare kai den mporei na amphisbetethei apo kanenakatopin autou den partheke apophase kati pou tha ginei ten prosekhe ebdomadato skeniko me to potami na katephorizei sto kataphuto pharaggi einai sigoura eidulliako kathos omos ta loutra diakheirizetai e demotike epikheirese ta mpania einai eutukhos phtena kai oi episkeptes polloioi demiourgies tes gkioumous ekhoun megale epitukhia alla prin kalakala teleiosei e epideixe ena telephonema erkhetai na te dialuseieugenios tribizas ekhei ede treis protaseis kai mporei na epilexei ekdotiko oikoapo ekei to kephi metapheretai stis geitonies tes poles opou kathe mera anaboun diaphoretikoi phanoi kratontas to ethimo zontano kai to endiapheron ton episkepton ameiototha iskhusei gia olous tous asphalismenous ton tameion kaiapo ta tele iouliou pou anakoinotheke e kathierose ton exetaseon tou septembriou gia te taxe eniaiou lukeiou oi mathetes oi opoioi eikhan aporriphthei ton iounio mpekan s enan agona dromou oste na mporesoun na kalupsoun ten ule ton mathematonan eprepe na dothei perissoteros khronos gia na proetoimastoun oi demotikes arkhes se ole te khora einai ena gegonos to opoio uposterizoepises tis dusmeneis oikonomikes epiptoseis tou nomou gia to asphalistiko prodromouionios nike sta giannena kuriake martios megale nike semeiose o ionios sta giannena kontra ston topiko spartako meoi prasinoi exedosan kaustike anakoinose me ten opoia koinopoioun ten paraitese tou antiproedrou tes tzoni bekre apo te these tou ekprosopou tes souper ligkas sto sumboulio tes podosphairikes omospondiasoi pleromenoi dolophonoi den petukhan to skopo tous epeide parenebe enas perastikos oi phones tou opoiou tous anagkasan na trapoun se phuge gia na men anagnoristounkhilies kai mia nukhtes epeis kai oi pantremenoi ekhoun psukhe epeisto skhema tou kokorotouphekou me kurte base kai photies back action den etan pronomio ton megalon kataskeuastonlogistes tha analabei kathekonta sto anabussouotan telika to ekanan dialexan ton alimo giati gnorizan pos uperkhe sten periokhe paroikia biokatanaloton kai den uperkhe allo magazi biologikon proiontonsullepse egine sta plaisia tou autophorou pou elege to bradu tou sabbatouden kanei bemata kai paratolma pragmata giati antilambanetai ton kindunoanalambanei o kabazin te sampntoria allage proponete eikhame semera ste sampntoria me ton ntomeniko nti karlo na apotelei parelthon kai na analambanei o almperto kabazinki omos autoi khanounphetos o alpharo eikhe summetokhes gkol kai asist pososta arketa ikanopoietikabebaia se kapoia papagalakia opos auta pou emphanizei to gnosto spotaki tes upotithetai oti apokalupse tis peges apo tis opoies tha exasphalisei ten upoloipe pistosekathara kai xastera opos pantamethodoi opos autes sten praxe apodeiknuetai oti okhi mono den ekhoun apotelesma alla atsalonoun te demosiographike pena kai diasuroun ten uperesialarisa den apeilese skhedon katholou ton kasle pou ekane ntempouto kato apo ta dokaria ton gepedoukhonanti gia plere magioneza khresimopoiese light e straggisto giaourti eno gia ta santouits protimese te moustarda kai anti gia ladolemono sta psaria pes nai ste moustarda me lemonimpakhar etoime na parei mia megale apophase pegainei sten epaule kai auto demiourgei megalutere anastatoseuparkhoun epises duo smenites pou miloun kinezika kai to pantheon ton xenon glosson sumpleronoun e arabike e ollandike e ouggrike e polonike e portogalike e roumanike e rosike e serbokroatike e souedike kai telos e tsekhikean mia kubernese einai ikane na epharmosei tis politikes pou odegoun se meiose tes analogias khreous pros tote aute e kubernese einai axiokhreesunepos tha elega oti einai thema na ginei kai autes oi entaseis tha xekhastoungia ton penia sas eikhame enemerosei apo to sabbato eno oi idies plerophories anepheran oti sto stokhastro tou ophh etan kai o epithetikos paoul palasioiouliou xekinese e sumbase eidikes diapragmateuses epi ton metokhon tes eisegmenes etairias apo ten etairia melos tou kha eurobank efg equitiesseptembre kai miso epheteiotis ores autes to nosokomeio tha leitourgesei me prosopiko asphaleiasteleionontas sou grapho ena problema pou ekhei arkhisei na m apaskholei sobaraeikha akousei polla gi auto to estiatorio me ta tria nai sto onoma tou to italiko si to rosiko da kai to aggliko yes ki apophasisa auto to kalokairi na to episkephthoepomenos sten kina to meso eisodema einai sta ten emera kai sten india molis stokhoris epitukhia elexe gia te nautiliake etaireia lesbou e ekdose tou metatrepsimou omologiakou tes daneiou upsous disen to metaxu to komma ton ergatikon anakoinose oti tha zetesei na diexakhthei psephophoria prokeimenou na empodistei e exagora tou teleoptikou kolossou bskyb apo te news corpuparkhei kale organose uliko me dunatotetes ki eukharistes sunthekes ergasias katelexe o tekhnikos tou asterame proskhema ton koinoniko dialogo epi ekato meres meta ten analepse tes diakuberneses tes khoras to sunekhizei ta eukhologia kai tis ektheseis ideon upanakhorontas akoma kai apo tis genikes kai aoristes programmatikes tou theseisepheran nomoskhedio ste boule me metra prosarmoges kai sto prooimio tou uperkhe ole e kommatike propaganda tou pou eperripte oles tis euthunes stis proegoumenes kuberneseis tes neas demokratiasmilao kairo tora me ten kerkurato taxidi tou nearou amerikanou suggraphea tzonathan saphran phoer stis gkrizes poleis tes oukranias meta te dialuse tes sobietikes enoses gia na xanabrei tis rizes tou ginetai e aphorme gia te suggraphe tou protou tou bibliou pou ton kathierosearomata kokkinou phroutou me elaphra anthode aistheseparallela ektima oti e pagkosmia oikonomia brisketai epikinduna konta sten upheseegesia tou eikhe phoularei tis mekhanes oste ta kommatika mele na organonoun kinetopoieseis akome kai gia to pio mikro zetemaerotetheis ean ta theoroun oti aute e prote phase den katalegei pouthena o proedros tes boules eipe emeis to khoneuoume emeis to upoballoume oti den katalegei ean sunekhistei aute e katastase me auto ton tropoposo sou leipei aletheia enas anthropos mas leipei otan ton xekhname kai ego den ekho xekhasei pote ten alikemia ektrope sten aphegese e opoia menei ekkremes para tauta atmosphairike me ten upobletike eikonopoiiasumbouliou kilkis photiades oi antidemarkhoi ph romanides mousides anastasiades iosemera o phap pou antikatestese apo ten to eniaio telos akineton epiballetai me klimakoumenous suntelestes se akinete periousia antikeimenikes axias ano ton eurotrite augoustou giortes trophe psukhes kai anasa pronomioukha e anthropine uparxe pou rizose sto parelthon zei to paron kai programmatizei to mellonthelete oriental party sto bodroom me kaite garmpe kai tourkous mousikoustzima na parei apophase eniskhuses tou paidiou kathe oikogeneias demote tou me ekatommuria drakhmesprospathei na ekhoume mia olike thea tes zoesaisthese tes kathe oras tes kathe meras tou kathe mena e aisthese oti den tha mporeseis pote na glitoseis einai kati adunato na perigrapheieinai eunoeto oti osoi diekdikoun rolo timete tha prepei prota na elegkhoun ten axiopistia kai te statheroteta ton apopseon tou khorou tousse epitimo demote tou demou ieras poleos mesologgiou anakerukhtheke o megalos ellenas mousikosunthetes mikes theodorakestheloume kai epidiokoume ten energo summetokhe olon ton sundemoton mas stis apophaseis tes demotikes arkhes ten kalopiste kritike tous alla kai ten analepse protoboulion tous se topika zetemataproteraioteta ton germanon phinlandon kai ollandon politikon etan e meiose tou kostous tou programmatosden apoteloume meros tes logikes pou katabarathrose kai katestese anaxiopisto to elleniko podosphairo gi auto kai delonoume xekathara oti emeis pisteuoume se ena allo montelo organoses tes omadasean loipon o panathenaikos einai o kaluteros as mas nikesei prota phetos dioti mekhri stigmes metraei duo phapes se isarithma paikhnidiaan prokupsei kati allo kalo gia ton ophe tha doumeepikindune apostole ekhei semera o dokimazontas sten edra tes isobathmes tou kalamariastis teleutaies deka meres zoun mesa sto kruo kai te brokhe kathos ekhoun breikathe melos tha dosei apo deka euro gia ten ananeose tes sundromes tou eno tha diatethoun kai kouponia pano sta opoia tha graphetai to onoma autou pou ta agorazeina pame sto turiepisemainei oti e krisimoteta tes gripes egkeitai sten tase kathe pandemias na kanei duo kai treis phores ton guro tou kosmoumpaseskou kalese gia oloskhere metarruthmise tou upourgeiou basei axiologeseon se prosopiko epipedo oste na parameinoun monoi oi ikanoi kai oi katharoidemotike arkhe apodidei to upobolimaio erotema tes antipoliteuses pou pegan ta lephta sten prospatheia demiourgias entuposeon kai ten exuperetese allon skopimotetonidiaitere semasia gia to aigaio ekhei e problepse tes sumbkairos athena tet aug apotelesmata eos apo stigmes tou teleutaiou augoustou apolithomata pou apodeiknuoun pos uperkhe zoe ste ge prin ten emphanise tou oxugonou entopisan epistemones sten australiaekhei dikio o k kanellesto aitema gia ten onomatodosia upebale e panellenia omospondia astunomikon upallelon sto demo erakleiou o opoios apodekhtheke na labei e odos to onoma tou kretikou upaspiste tou upourgou mikhale khrusokhoidegiankedes kai autoi to sitigia prote phora o ellenas presbes konstantinoupoles photes ksudas kai o proxenos basiles mpornobas episkephthekan ten imbro kai sunantethekan me upergerous omogeneisparousia tou ekprosopou tes ierarkhias demiourgei euloga erotematikasunenteuxe eph oles tes ules parakhorese me ten eukairia tes sumpleroses pente menon apo ten analepse ton kathekonton tou kai tes diakuberneses tes khoras apo te o bouleutes tou kommatos sto nomo k giannes pittasta dentra pou kuriarkhoun sten periokhe einai e aria eidos belanidias kai e drus e phellophoros to upsos tes opoias mporei na phtasei ta metraoi thessalonikeis piezan diarkos psela me protagoniste ton khabito eno oi philoxenoumenoi prospathesan na demiourgesoun proupotheseis gia gkol me xaphnikes antepitheseissto trapezi ton suzeteseon brethekan epises oi exelixeis ste mese anatole kai te boreia aphrike e lathrometanasteuse kai oi exelixeis ston agrotiko tomeatetarte augoustou se taktike genike suneleuse kalei ta mele tes e enose mekhanikon demosion upallelon diplomatoukhon anotaton skholon lesbou ten pempte martiou stis to mesemeri sta grapheia tou ste mutileneoi kata ta loipa lalistatoi ekprosopoi touristikon phoreon emphanizontai mono otan einai na zetesoun kai oudepote gia na analaboun euthunes opote apomenoun oi polites kai e autenergeia tousstoikheio to opoio sten poreia tou khronou ginetai olo kai pio pithano realistiko senario oso pote allote sto parelthon e pithanoteta na parakhorethei stous idiotes o phantazei realistiketen properasmene ebdomada e google lansare to google voice gia telephonikes kleseis me khameles khreoseis se stul skypenikos perakes apedeixe kai pali oti mes apo mia photeine phantaristike komodia mporei na satirizei analaphra tis ethnikes skies mas kerdizontasoi kairikes sunthekes den etan oi kaluteres dunates kathos o dunatos aeras den epetrepse stis duo omades na paixoun podosphairo axioseonmakedonias gia to apo disopoios thelei na meinei sto oros tha apodekhthei to orthodoxo dogma ten upagoge tou sto patriarkheio kai ten iere koinoteta basei tou suntagmatos kai tou katastatikou kharte tou agiou oroustora o logariasmos erthe barus gia olousexisou semantiko ostoso einai na uparkhei kai suntonismos o opoios proupothetei peitharkhia stis armodiotetes tou kathenosos apantese oi anthropoi tes parapempoun se topotheteseis tou idiou tou podosphairiste ekeine ten epokhe toso sto prosopiko tou mplogk se athletiko sait oso kai sto mats progkram tou paikhnidiou me ten khaintoukeditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia ante na teleionei o mesaionaste dekaetia tou o adikokhamenos giannes khrestou apophasise na kanei sto nesi ena megalo doro na semeiosoume edo oti ta mona pragmata pou sunedean ton megalo sunthete me to nesi mas etan e agape tou gi auto kai e katagoge tes gunaikas touapo ta khthesina mats opos anamenotan xekhorise to ntermpi tou mantsester opou e giounaitent me ena gkol sto tou rounei pere ten prokrise se ena mats pou ta eikhe gkol entase eukairies kai apotelese diaphemise tou podosphairouoi skies einai perizetetes apo olous opote den tis kratame gia to metaphoriko mas mesoruthmise pou psephisteke to einai gnoste os nomos ton trion khtupematon three strikes logo ton trion proeidopoietikon stadion pou eisageiste lakhania kai sten ialusoede politikoi tou summakhoi sten kubernese opos e legka tou borra ton theoroun baros pou isos prepei na apomakrunthei khoris omos na diarragei e politike summakhia me to komma touto konteiner me to moiraio phortio bretheke sto ktirio grapheion drinagh park sta perikhora tes poles ouexphorntproponetes tes mpermigkham einai apo ten tetarte o kris khioutonkai sunethos ek ton pragmaton kathe arkhe brisketai ste these ekeinou pou apanta epeita apo ten askese sostes e okhi kritikesoi protes kales stigmes gia tous gepedoukhous erthan me te sumplerose ton lepton me ton sephake na antidra polu kala se apeutheias ektelese phaoul tou salikhobits eno o tzeko den kataphere na skorarei apo pleonektike theseperiorizontai oi meletes periballontikon epiptoseon nea ruthmise pou proothei to upourgeio periballontos apallassei se siniko ssto meiname apo dunameis kai o epaixe polu dunata sto diastema autona mpoune sten euroboule kai os edoste deutere kategoria anekoun patheseis meibomianon adenon khrese phakon klp poia einai ta sumptomata tes patheses se orismenes periptoseis o keratoeides endekhetai na emphanizei stikte epitheliopatheia delalloste e analepse ton sugkekrimenon kathekonton an kai oligomene ekhei ede egnatias mekhri ton kombo tesme ten megale diakrise pou exasphalisan bazoun mia gere upotheke gia to mellon kai mporoun basima na pontaroun se summetokhe tous kai stous olumpiakous agones toukai pali omos enas mesos erasitekhnes photographos den tha entopisei problemata e duskolies se auto to epipedoaxiologes phaseis sto diastema auto etan molis duoomos poia einai e pio eirenike khora se touto ton planetege pou te khorizoume kai mas khorizei e idia pali ge mporei kai mas monoiazeimono to tetarto auto pou entelei den petukhe to stokho tou katelephthe apo tesserista sunaisthemata pou tha zesoume thema tes ugeiasston diagonismo tou e maro douka eikhe steilei diegema tes pou omos aporriphtheke dikaios opos e idia anapherei sto aphegema ta maura loustrinia patakestelos anapheromene sten egnatia smurnes tha katalexei sto alsos morellaomos poses uperokhes periokhes tou nesiou mas den ekhoume gnorisei akomatautokhrona skotonoun me deleteriasmena karota ta zoa ton opoion to spiti apopsilosan oste na men epistrepsoun stis kalliergoumenes pleon ektaseisapo pleuras ellenikes epitropes atomikes energeias dia stomatos tou proedrou tes kh khousiada episemainetai oti tetoia radienerga kataloipa proerkhontai apo ergasteria purenikes iatrikes kai einai brakhubia delade ekhoun suntomo khrono zoestha akolouthesei dexiose sto khoro tou stratopedoukharakteristike stigme apotelei e psephise to tou oikogeneiakou kodika pou ekkremouse apo ten epomene tes anexartesiasgia auto epelexa na theso merika erotemata ston proponete masme ten anakoinose ton apotelesmaton e khara khtupese ten porta kai tes topikes autodioikesesoi duo pleures phainetai oti ekhoun brei tropous sunergasias kathos tonisteke oti tha prepei na proballetai to nesi alla kurios e pole tes rodou e opoia einai e atmomekhane tou rodiakou tourismou opos eipotheke kharakteristikamen to aphenete na khtupietai deikhnontas adiaphoriaakolouthese e duskole epikratese epi tou akrita nkrounes oi ettes apo te mikropole to maurobato kai to bolaka eno nikese te phtelia kai ton kseropotauosigoura th aphesei ektos arketous paiktes gia na paroun kapoies anases o stephan ntemolste suskepse o prothupourgos tha enemerosei gia tis suzeteseis enopsei ton apophaseon sten kai ten poreia tes khorasphtanei ta ekatekhoume mia khemeia me mesoepithetikous arketous alla amuntika blepoume oti uparkhoun problematase epomeno stadio thaostoso e enose sto ekane to me ton kaphe na petukhainei ena polu tukhero gkol eno sten epanalepse o mplanko sto kephalia diamorphose totes ethikes taxeseikhe perasei e ora kai uperkhe khaodes diaphora anamesa sten time pou edinan oi poletes kai sten time pou zetousan oitelos kaleitai se apologia o paragontas tou ephebou pantelos me mia proine proponese sto sunekhisteke khthes e proetoimasia tou giannina me to programma na perilambanei askeseis dunames kai phusikes katastasesto phileleuthero komma tou aperkhomenou prothupourgou anters phogk rasmousen kai oi sosialdemokrates tes antipoliteuses diekdikoun te diakubernese tes khoras me tis demoskopeseis na deikhnoun polu konta ta duo kommata stis protimeseis tou eklogikou somatosto pio semantiko einai na ekhoume mia stathere poreia ole te sezon gia na petukhoume to stokho masto agonistiko meros pernaei automata se deutere moira apo te stigme pou sunebesan ola auta eis baros tes omadas tes pou na semeiothei pos de sunodeuteke apo kanena melos tes dioikeses ste zakunthopantos o kphragkakes leei oti mono ta paidia apo te xersoneso phoitoun phetos sto neo lukeio aphou ta paidia apo tis goubes sumphona panta me ton idio strephontai se skholeia tes poles tou hrakleiousto metaxu gia erga anaptuxes kai exoplismou sto limani tou hrakleiou kai se akoma limania tes khoras tha diatethoun sunolika diskinese akolouthei soreia epikriseon se baros tes oikeias arkhiepiskopes gia ta straba matia pou ekane se proegoumenes paromoies upotheseiskalo einai na pairnete mazi sas mia zaketa e epipleon mplouza gia ten periptose pou drosiseioi phules tou podosphairou sto khrematisterio tou theamatos iakhes entona sunaisthemata upertheama mia pandaisia khromatikon suntheseon kai mia diakhute entase metousiomenes epithetikotetas kharakterizei to podosphairotrite augoustou prokeruxeis gia ten plerose theseon ta parakato tmemata tou aristoteleiou panepistemiou thessalonikes apophasisan ten prokeruxe ton exes theseon tmema khemikon mekhanikon teloi idioi baphtizoun ton euato tous upozugia dioti nomizoun oti etsi tha apeilesoun tous politikous me maurisma kai palii tha broun lephta gia ten kaloperase ton psephophoron kai tis mizes tis dikes alapis pharmakeutike me apartia tes taxes toudustukhos ste mutilene auto den mporei na ginei kai khreiazontai epises polloi agones prin apo ta krisima paikhnidiameta ton agona me ton giannina tha maintanoupoios einai o musteriodes monakhos pou sunanta ekei kai pou ton boethaei mesa apo ten proseukhe na brei te galene kai te duname na sugkhoresei te biku kai ton gregore ston opoio malista dinei kai te these tou sten etaireiaauto semainei oti tha mporouse kai apo ten epomene touristike periodo na dromologethoun draseis pou tha antimetopizoun amesa ta parapona e tis epithumies ton episkepton mas stokheuontas akribos sta semeia pou ponanesunekheia sto naftemporikigr deutera augoustou dothekan ste demosioteta apo to upourgeio paideias ta apotelesmata eisagoges sten tritobathmia ekpaideusekampana gia to epeisodio me mare poine emeron epebale e kentrike epitrope diaitesias ston athenaio diaitete phlampoure gia to epeisodio pou eikhe me ton proedro tou lampro maredeutere apo ton proedro tes demokratias kai ten kubernesese poia lathe deikhnete te megalutere epieikeia sta adiorthotasunantese sto asphales situation room sto leuko oiko semeionetai meta te sullepse apo andres ton uperesion plerophorion ton kai tou pakistan enos anthropou pou theoreitai koruphaio stelekhos ton talimpansten atzenta ton gkourme dieuthunseon semeioste to exclusive amadeus se enan polutele khoro me goeteia epokhes kai to miod malina me pio monterna diatheseme kathe sobaroteta o arkhimandrites basilopoulos mas diabebaionei ste dike tou ekdose ton protokollon oti oi sionistai ebraioi edemiourgesan ena akome antikhristianiko teras ton adolphon khitlerparallela prokhoroun oi diadikasies pou apaitountai apo to protodikeio tes rodou gia te diexagoge ton eklogonden mou ekhei tukhei pote na phugo ektosdelade an aposuroun ten aitese kai pairnontas to bathmo tou apontos meden bgainei proagogiko apotelesma de dinoun kanena mathemaxanthos eipe oti e epitukhia erthe mesa apo douleia sunepeia kai khamelous tonous eno o k samaras semeiose oti ta koritsia auten te duskole gia ten ellada ora sekosan pio psela te maramene psukhe tou ellenaapeuthunomai kai stous anthupopsephious mou kai tous kalo sto onoma tes omopsukhias kai tes alleleggues na diexagoume auton ton agona me gnomona ton politiko politismo kai ten euprepeia arkhes tautosemes me to axiako sustema tes parataxes masentherme kai aneu oron sterixe tes suzugou tou e opoia tou pareskhe demosio sugkhorokharti gia ten atasthalia mias bradias opos ten kharakterise tote ton diesose apo ten politike katephoragia mas omos tous biannites etan o kurgiannes kai o theios gia ta pampolla anipsia toukapoia stigme emphanizetai ena prosopo kleidi auto tou epitheorete epitheoretes apokaluptei tous kharakteres sten pragmatikoteta tous pherontas tous se mia stigme krisesto spoudaiotero omos einai oti to linux mas edose mia anoikhte eleuthere kai apoluta parametropoiesime platphormampatsoi me e khoris koukoules kai parakratikoi xelonan ta marmara sto suntagma me bariopoules kai lostariaekklese ste na analabei tis euthunes tes sebomene tous polites kai katanalotes oste na apokatastathei e iskhus tou sustematos sta epipeda pou prepei apeuthune to upourgeio periballontos kai energeiasmakhlas kai anastopoulos dinoun polu megalo baros se aute te theseepaixan kai oi duo alloste me megale epitukhia kai exetazoun prosektika tis periptoseis pou uparkhoungiannes me plesiase aphou exere gia ten koubenta pou eikhe gineide ginetai na eimaste etoimoi alla auto pou apaitei ena tetoio mats tha mporesoume na to dosoumeeidikotera se sphugmometrese pou pragmatopoiese to reuters se analutesekprosopous khrematisteriakon etairion o enopoiemenos kuklos ergasion tes etairias gia to a exameno tou etous anamenetai na anelthei se ekatdustukhos omos den ekhei allaxei tipota kai oson aphora tous neous agrotes eno ekhoun labei kharti pleromes apo den ekhei plerothei kaneisoso gia ten amekhania tou arkhariou tha sas phugei eukola me to proto glistrema tes barkas me ten kataktese mias koruphes me ten aisthese tes eleutherias pou einai diakhute pantou ste phuseedo kai liges emeres to ploio mporei na men ephuge akome apo ten prokumaia omos toulakhiston metaphertheke ligo parakato gia na me demiourgei problema stous khorous estiaseskai phetos o kosmos to skephteke kai to xanaskephteke poses kai poies parastaseis tha parakoloutheseiden eikhe grapheia den eikhe upalleloustora an tsimpese kati kai o maximos pou tote etan aplos bouleutes den to gnorizoumeskotonei ton luko omos mania stalmene apo ten hra ton strephei enantia sten oikogeneia touthese m omadike agoria me tous rempape niko aleprasite giorgo gousios giorgos psarianos apostolosepistrophe gia larisa tha ginei ste to mesemeri apo to kokkino nero kai diaskhizontas antistropha ten diadrome ton paraliakon demonme ten epikeimene apoktese tou lithouanou souter o ibkobits arkhizei na gemizei kai ten periphereia ton eruthroleukon sten opoia ede uparkhei o basiles spanoules o opoios tha einai o egetes tes omadas kai o kalin loukasmpela sto roster tes epiloge kai protimese tou mantzo ena bema makrua apo ton titlo o spers epiloge tou ntoumitreskou o allote limpero tes alkes agathokleous diekdikei ta dedouleumena tou parles vous francaisden eimai edo gia na epiballo ten parousia mou alla eimai edo gia na epiballete eseis ten parousia sas me te energo summetokhe sas sto dialogo kai tis dikes sas protaseis giati eseis gnorizete ta problemata tou topou sas kalutera apo ton kathenato sustema paraponon den mporei na khresimopoiethei gia alla proionta e uperesies masoi ruthmiseis tou nomoskhediou gia oria elikias kai suntaxeon paramenoun ksemplokarontai oi diadikasies se kalo dromo brisketai pleon to ergo tes anasteloses tou agiou petrouetsi o zozeph giatreuetai apo te boulimia tou gia to lipos kai mathainei na axiologei leptotera tis geuseis kai tis geuseis tes zoes episesarkei na semeiothei oti to miso kai pleon ton sunoron tou neou demou ephaptetai me ten geitonike khora kati pou dinei semantikes eukairies diasunoriakes sunergasiaskai pempton tha prepei na uparxei xekatharisma metaxu ton toxikon kai ton me toxikon daneion enos omilouegkrise dapanes agoras egkekrimenou entomoktonou gia ten antimetopise akridonprin apo duo akribos dekaeties enas polu nearos demosiographos erthe na mou parei kallitheasluse gia ten odo berginas duskola tha brethei kai mallon osoi khresimopoioun auto to dromo tha prepei na dianuoun peripou metra epipleon gia na perasoun me asphaleia ten leophoro kenan messareakouste merika apo ta ophele tes kolumbeses iskhuropoieitai to anosopoietiko sustema se periptoseis asthmatos e kinetikon problematon e epaphe me to nero boethaan einai megaluteros tote epitrepetai na stalei se allo omospondiako kratidio e na parameinei sto ambourgo alla se kentro upodokhes enelikonsumphona me ton proedro tou sullogou idiokteton grapheion enoikiazomenon autokineton diaphorous tomeisto erkhomeno sabbato stisaurio sto plaisio tes agonistikes e omada tou agplunte polu kala kai apheste se ena souroteri na straggixountonize epises oti einai dunato na proklethei kai anodos ton epitokion kai sten europe kai ten ellada os apotoko tes elleipses reustotetas pou prokalei e pistotike krisegiati na ten xerei exallou alla anti na siopa na bgazei glossa kai na na mas kategorei kai os pherephona tes dioikeses tou nosokomeiou na mas egkalei oti dethen o dioiketes mas edose to opoio dikastiko ntokoumento e auto paei poluemena e these mou magkes einai xekathareprokeitai gia ten kataskeue emporeumatikou kentrou sto thriasio pedio sunolike epiphaneia ges stremmata sunolike domesime epiphaneia tetragonika metradekaexi suggrapheis ek ton idrutikon protathlema tes ethnikes kai anamenetai na analabei amesa ta kathekonta toukhthes pragmatopoietheke kai sta giannina apergia daskalon kai kathegeton omos e summetokhe sto programmatismeno sullaleterio tha phoraei te phanela tes mpartselona o tiagko alkantara kathos oi protathletes europes anakoinosan semera ten epektase tes sunergasias tous me ton meso gi akome duo khroniasten parapano anakoinose akoute parapona apo kinematographistes omos emeis dekhomaste diamarturies apo anthropous pou niothoun prosbeblemenoiontas tote pano apo khrono makria to natal saphestata eikhe dikaioma steoloi mazi
