eikhame o pheromenos os upopsephios bouleutes tou mikes giannaraseisaggelia sunekhizei ten ereuna tes gia allous pou elegkhontai gia adikemata tes kakourgematikes apates kai tes nomimopoieses esodon apo paranome drasteriotetaomophone apophase khthes apo to demotiko sumboulio to prasino phos gia te khoregese tou posou ton drkhepipleon einai ste mese kai o olumpiakos o opoios ton kratese sto roster tou me to upselotero sumbolaio sten europe ekatprepei na suneidetopoiesete oti oi seuerinoi epheboi zoun se enan polu diaphoretiko kosuo kai uiloun uia polu diaphoretike glossa apo aute pou thuuaste eseisekhoun na kanoun me noumera kai eudaimoniagia ten idruse neon epikheireseon anergon atoma gunaikes kai andres me to poso tonna khtupethei mia monada pou periekhei ploutonio to opoio apotelei te prote ule gia ten kataskeue purenikes bombasistoria ekhei mono mia elpida na xanakerdethei ste suneidese otan ta gegonota proskrousoun sta brakhia otan mas summazeuei gia na mas aphegethei ton eauto teskapoioi einai kratos en krateiperipou khlmeikhan loipon e den eikhan upokhreose na pane oloi sto aerodromio ena meta to allo ginontai t atukhemata kai thanatephora dipla sten ston ai gianne alla kaneis den endiapheretai na phtiakhtei to stethaio pou epesemeiose tou tzirou tous kurios tes epham einai sobare endeixe gia kampse tes metaphoras emporeumaton apo kai pros te lesboopos malista mas anaphertheke apo melos tes antiprosopeias tes periphereias to parapono ton tourkon den aphora ste diadikasia pou apaiteitai gia ten ekdose bizas alla sto kostos tes pou theoreitai idiaitera upselota opoia tha ekhoun apoleiessumbatikos khronos paradoses tha einai meneskat arkhen thetikos emphanizetai o pharmakeutikos sullogos khiou sten idruse pharmakeion se oinousses kai psara kai ste stelekhose tous me stratiotes pharmakopoiouskh mia aenaos pleusis ste skepse sten praxe kai sto khrono apo enan pragmatiko kapetanioamesos meta kai aphou oloklerose te sunallage tou ephuge apo to spititen xere kai ten ugre morpheparoti arkhika eikhe skhediastei na anakoinothoun oles oi leptomereies telika kai me epikoinoniakous orous apophasisteke na men uparxei tora sugkekrimenopoiese ton metron alla auto na ginei ton maio otan kai tha elthei to paketo ste boule pros psephiseeinai enas rolos pou sas barainei eroas epistrephei apo ton kato kosmo opou ekhei kanei ta pantasto lopho brisketai to kasteli ena apo ta pente pou ephtiaxan oi enetoi sto nesi ton aionakuria ousoultzoglou emphanos enokhlemene e mallon exorgismene espeuse na apantesei authemeronpezoporia pros ta metra opou brisketai e mone einai apolaustike logo tou phusikou kallous tes periokhesstatheros me elakhistes exaireseis kratese ten these toume tis sumpuknomenes phraseis e mana en panagiaprepei na ginei ena epikheiresiako skhedio basei tou opoiou tha kinethoume skholiase o k ksenakeskataskeue tou boreiou odikou axona sto tmema tauronites kolumpari kai o kombos tes soudas tha khrematodotethoun apo to sumphona me apophase tes epitropes parakoloutheses tou epikheiresiakou programmatos prosbases kai odikoi axoneskalos tes eprepe na dialexei to makronesi e to bounoekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous pleiopsephia sumphona me te psephizei proores eklogesoneiro tou mekhri na pethano auto tha einai na kanei me to theatro tekhnes tous akharneis anabiose tes parastases tou karolou koun sten opoia summeteikhe os mathetes tes dramatikes skholes tou tekhnes ermeneuontas ton dikaiopolipollaple theatrikoteta ton paramuthion tou khophman diamorphonei ten entupose tes sunthetes kai sunama exairetika diakritikes methodou sten parousiase ton desmon pou sugkratoun tis ennoies tou pragmatikou kai tou phantastikou tes zoes me ten tekhneton ianouario tou kaiste to mesemeri tes trites ste moria apo astunomikous tou tmematos dioxes narkotikon sunelephtheten idruse tes iatrikes skholes se egkatastaseis tes ekei ellenikes paroikias anelabe na dromologesei o kathegetes tes iatrikes skholes thessalonikes stauros mpalogiannes o opoios tha egkatastathei sten periokhebazete ena tegani se khamele photia kai prosthetete te zakhare kai ta amugdalaathootheke o proistamenos tes upeuthunos gia ten leitourgia ton diktuon aphou terethekan oi kanonismoi kai o thanatos pou proelthe etan apo ameleia tou pathontossa na men uperkhakhoris amphibolia e sumbase tes erthe me biaio tropo serbirizomene os khrusomeno khapi na sphragisei to mellon tes khalkidikesteleutaios epithumei na eniskhusei te these tou sten agorazontas ton metokhon apo ton proedro tou olumpiakou o opoios katekhei to alla kai sten karaiskakes ekhei tophorame plastika gantia tis straggizoume kai tis psilokoboume sto mixersemantikotatoi paiktes mas apousiazoun papademetriou torosides makhratze kai teleutaia stigme toulakhiston sto sugkekrimeno paikhnidi parousiasteke to problema tou pabiodiadrome mas perielambane pollous oreinous dromous kai to pleroma tou autokinetou perielambane tesseris enelikous epibatesapo kei kai pera oi kuanoleukoi tha sunekhisoun ten proetoimasia tous to apogeuma tes pemptespolu kale e diaitesia tou bomba lesbouna ten bgaloume apo to telma sto opoio ten erixan me dioiketikes apophaseis osoi monimos ten teleutaia dietia leitourgoun sa na ekhoun apokleistiko gnomona ten exathliose maseuro meiomena kata se skhese me ten antistoikhe periodo tougia te mouphteia komotenes ste dieuthunse ermou komotene telgia to outlander iskhuei atoko programma pou problepei prokatabole kai atokes doseistonizei ten anagke na exophlethoun oi opheiles stous giatrous apo ton eno anapheretai kai sta problemata anergias pou antimetopizoun kurios oi neoi giatroiekhete ten katholike sterixe toulakhiston auto bgainei apo tis genikes suneleuseis tou eklektorikou somatos ton sunetairistonna omos pou esu briskeis ton tropo na ton pherneis piso se krustallomenes eikones pou san pagomenes psikhales aiorountai mprosta sou kai mesa tous blepeis te zoe sou se epanalepseapophase sterizetai sta eidika metra gia ten eniskhuse tes agrotikes paragoges sta mikra nesia tou aigaiou sta opoia perilambanetai kai e sugkekrimene epidotesekerde tou demosiou apo te sumbase etesio enoikio gia ten probleta ekatoi diorganotes pantos epimenoun oti oi kinetopoieseis tha sunekhistoun kai malista me megalutere entase kathos de phainetai na lunontai ta problemata tou agrotikou khoroumazi tous agapesa oti eugenestero egennese e khora aute ston aiona mouparaskeue maiou prepei na katalaboume oti kai to nai kai to okhi semainoun akribos to idio pragmatelos sugkhairo kai eukharisto olous tous sumpolites kai tis sumpolitisses pou sterixan tis ekdeloseis tes polesklasiko paradeigma adiaphorias tes politeias kataggelloun oi idioi einai e elleipse ekthesiakou kai sunedriakou kentrou sten athena para tis sunekheis deloseis peri anaptuxes eidikon morphon tourismouepises egine parapoiese ton legomenon mouprote phora pou eida theatro ste zoe mou endekhomenos na etan ena mpoulouki tomesa sten idia prothesmia prepei na katatethoun sten etaireia kai ta eggrapha nomimopoieses ton tukhon antiprosopon tousprotodika aporriphtheke omos uparkhoun basimes elpides oti ste deuterobathmia epitrope tha ginei dektesumbole tes sten anagnorise ton organoleptikon kharakteron tou asurtikou theoreitai kathoristike kai ten kathista mia apo tis koruphaies monades tou nesiouokhi sobara omosempneetai ki antlei duname ap autenton podosphairiste tes totenam thelei na apoktesei e anzito nagkasaki ekhei xekhoriste these sto pagkosmio kinema kai tis kampanies kata ton purenikon oplonauta ta stoikheia leipoun ap tous allous paiktesagonas pou khreiazetai gia na palepseis to ampeli ton antrose kai tou edose duname kai skopo ste zoe toueinai anthropos pou ekphrazei eleuthera kai khoris peristrophes ten apopse tou kai epilegei na ten uperaspisthei mekhri telous esto kai me sugkrouseendiapheromaste gia ten energe summetokhe ton politon sta koina kai ten anaptuxe tou topou mas tonise metaxu allonoi upourgoi khoronmelon tes europaikes enoses psephisan ten proothese enos aplousterou kai phthenoterou sustematos dikaiomaton euresitekhnias sten europaike enose aphenontas dusarestemenes italia kai ispaniatha ta breite apokleistika sto notos galleries lampropoulos aiolou athenaden einai omos etsi apla ta pragmatateleutaia enemerose sabbato iouliou mousike pou paizoun oi idioktetes taxi einai san to bioli tou khotzaakome tonise oti o periphereiakos skhediasmos aporrimmaton einai sten euthune tes periphereiasto sustema episemanses tou boeiou kreatos kai tou kima apo boeio kreas epitrepei na entopizoume kathe stigme ten proeleuse tou kreatos pou agorazei o katanalotesempeiria einai aperigrapte leei e k ban atikoum kai otan ten kaloume na skiagraphesei ten ole prospatheia mas apanta me noemaeimaste enas stratos eirenes enas stratos khoris polemo pou agapa ten istoria kai douleuei gi autenupourgos ugeias apo ten pleura tou desmeuteke na terethei to khronodiagramma kai na ekhoun prokhoresei oi diadikasies oste na ekhoun ulopoiethei oi desmeuseis kai stous treis autous tomeisanti na laikizoun kai na demagogoun ek tou asphalous semera khoris na proteinoun luseis to elakhisto pou opheiloun na kanoun einai na zetesoun sugnome apo tous agrotes giati den ekanan tipota ta teleutaia khronia tes diakuberneses touoi megaluteres katastrophes entopizontai sten trite megalutere politeia mato gkroso proteuousa tes sogiasta parathura gia paradeigma einai xeperasmena kai e aisthetike tous ekhei sphragistei apo tis kheiroteres stigmes tes teleorases ton pseudoentuposeonto idio kai prin prin kok anapherei o proedros tou sullogou kai upeuthunos gia to periodiko giannes manoukasste slobenia tha brisketai apo aurio to neo metagraphiko apoktema tes eintour gkountgionsen prokeimenou na ensomatothei me ten upoloipe apostole ton kitrinomauron kai na piasei amesos douleiati gnorizes gia ton olumpiako prin ertheis exera oti ekhei parei ta protathlemata sta teleutaia khronia kai gnoriza oti erkhomai sten koruphaia omada tes elladasmonoi tous epises kratesan upodeigmatike taxe stous dromous kai tis plateies kai telos monoi tous sunadelphothekan me to strato exoudeteronontas kapoies apopeires apo merous orismenon axiomatikon na pheroun ton strato antimetopo me ton laoden mou bgainei apo to mualophetos to kalokairi o ekhei te magike suntage gia na se kanei na men xekollas apo ten othone tou kathe mesemeri kai apogeumapurenelaio to opoio proerkhetai apo anamixe exeugenismenou purenelaiou me partheno elaiolado kai e oxuteta tou den xeperna touseimai bebaios oti tha kanoume oti apaiteitai prokeimenou ta limania mas na ikanopoioun tis apaiteseis ton philon mas pou epilegoun ta nesia mas okhi aplos os topous episkepses alla os mere enarxes kai lexes tes krouazieras tousapo ta idia programmata kaluptontai kai oi periokhes pou den einai sta olokleromena alla leitourgei se autes tosten ellada alla kai diethnos prota ten pathainoume kai meta psakhnoume na broume pos ten pathame kai ti prepei na gineiste souper ligka uparkhoun polu kales stoikhematikes eukairies eidika sta under kai ta overapo uperboles phan pou xenukhtousan gia na einai oi protoi pou tha apolausoun ta prota plana tou agapemenou tous eroa mekhri diexodikes philosophikes analuseis opos aute pou epikheirese o zan klont milnerme ten entaxe mas sten enomene europe ensternisthekame to europaiko orama apo to opoio tosa prosdokoun oi laoi masgia ten epiteuxe tou stokhou autou ginetai eustokhe epiloge oikopedou me ten epiotere dunate epembase ston demosio kai idiotiko khoro katallelos prosanatolismos tou ktiriou kai epiloge anakuklosimon domikon ulikonena apo auta sten bergina me apophase pou ekhoume parei gia demiourgias mias xekhoriste skene pou tha ten parakolouthoun khiliades episkeptes tha sunekhisei na paleuei gia ten sterixe tou thesmousunedrio me thema paidi kai optikoakoustika mesa epikoinonias tha pragmatopoiethei to sabbatokuriako kai noembriou sto amphitheatro tou tellogleiou me sundiorganotes to tellogleio idruma tekhnon apth kai to morphotiko idruma tes eseemthenarmonizetai me tis sugkhrones antilepseis kai ta osa iskhuoun stis perissoteres khoresmele tes europaikes enosesstadium sto palio ktirio tou me ton peripoiemeno kepo tha dokimasete katsikaki nisuriko me meli kai thumari psaronephri me petimezi kai salata me lakhanika atmou phrouta thalassas kai sos binegkret ouzoustadiaka o kosmos tha enemerothei an kai pisteuo oti gia prote khronia pegame arketa kalaeimaste kathola nomimoi mas tonise khthes o proedros tou sundesmou kai katelexe an theloun na suroun tous diaitetes sta dikasteria as to kanoungia ton idio logo den kanoume dika mas phrontisteria dioti to zetema einai na ginei apodekte e glossa apo to sunolo tes ellenikes koinoniasalla okhi apla mono autoellenike kubernese ekhei na kanei polle douleia akoma delonoun me noema axiomatoukhoi tes komision kai ton koinotikon uperesion an thelei na exasphalisei ten epitukhia tou programmatos kai te biosimoteta tou demosiou khreousginetai mia megale prospatheia n apopheukhthei to megalo pososto apokhes pou anamenetai s autes tis euroeklogeskai o kheiuonas pou tha erthei tha einai polu duskolos e de koinonike anatarakhe tha einai akoue uegalutere ean oloi den antilephthoun to uegethos tes zeuias pou ginetai tora ue ola auta ta peristatika pou kanoun katheuerina ton guro tou kosuouden ginontai menuseis gia eulogous logous giati den uparkhoun kai skhetika stoikheiakai giati den ekane ton anaskhematismo prin liges meres na eremesoume giname gia alle mia phora rezili diethnosena apo ta prota themata ta opoia kata ten tapeine mou apopse prepei na tethoun to suntomotero dunaton sto trapezi einai e oikonomike exasphalise ton naulotondeuteros khoros tha einai kainourgios kai diaphoretikos gia to kathe zeugari opos se ola ta liveoti e dolophonia etan adike kai se kathe periptose prosballei to elleniko phronema ton khimariotonalla phetos autoi oi agrotes bgainoun asumbibastoito pkh phonaxan den einai sten apomonose e oulrike mainkhoph ekhei teleorase sto keli tesotan o metropolites epikheirese na bgei apo to papapheio kai prospathese na milesei me to sugkentromeno plethos apodokimasteke me phrastikes epitheseis kai apokhoreseduskolies stis anaptuxe ton exagogon megalo problema gia ten enose paramenei e diasphalise ton eispraxeon apo tis exagogeseleos klassiko amerikaniko telos tes eutukhismenes oikogeneiaspar ola auta e katastase ektimatai pos einai upo elegkhona semeiosoume oti semera to limani tou hrakleiou ekhei ena tziro tes taxeos tou disoi triphullophoroi protathlemata kai kupellaantaios khrusostomides kastaniotes euro aute einai e trite anthologia pou ekdidei o antaios khrusostomides me astunomika diegemata ellenon suggrapheoneinai kharakteristike e teleoptike ekrexe enos proen upourgou kai bouleute akritikes periphereias o opoios edelose oti tha egkataleipsei ten politike dioti den einai dunaton na zei me ton tromo ton apodokimasion tou laoudiaitetes k kokkinakes petukhe to ergo tou se ena eukolo paikhnidialla toulakhiston pleon kaneis den thetei se amphisbetese to sustema to euro tha zesei graphei e suddeutsche zeitungmeta ti ginetai pos tha epibiosoun ta magazia sto diastema mekhri to paskha auto einai to megalo agkhos ton emporon sarotikes allages erkhontai mesa ste nea khronia kai gia ten ekpaideuseean e nea upertrapeza gia ta ellenika dedomena isos brei suntoma prosbaseis gia daneismo stis diethnes agores tote e sunenose tha ekhei thetiko antiktupo kai sten ethnike oikonomiapithanon giati to soma elabe upopse tou ta kamomata tou apo to parelthondexia me maura e suzugos tou ersiliaautos ekane kai te dianome gia ton rikhardoana treis menes apo ten emeromenia tes prokeruxes tes drases tha skhematizontai omades pros axiologese protaseon kai me ten oloklerose tes diadikasias axiologeses tha orizontai oi dikaioukhoi khrematodoteses sto plaisio tes drasesotan kanei kaneis kariera sto exoteriko ki ekhei oikogeneia einai duskolo na xerrizotheioi periokhes oi opoies ekhoun plegei einai to malebuzi to temenos e pediada kai megalo exallou sumphona me epises tis protes ektimeseis tes e anamenomene paragoge exagogimes staphidas na men ekhei brakhei periorizetai stous tonouszeta enan seph me meletemenes mageirikes apopseis pou tha gnorizei tous sunduasmous ton ulikon kai tha ekhei te sophia na apophugei ten uperbole pou pithana tha odegouse sten exaphanise ton arkhikon geuseonsas parakalo men anagkastheite na to antilephtheite otan oi khrusotheres plegosoun ta sothika tes ges masmono pou dustukhos ola auta ta khronia para to oti oi sumboules einai autonoetes emeis den tis akolouthoumekrise den einai semerine opheiletai se megalo bathmo sten pathogeneia ton domon tou sugkhronou ellenikou kratous kai ligotero sten oikonomike krisekai se autous kai se olousoi gepedoukhoi etan anoteroi kai ephtasan se uia pera gia pera dikaie nikeapo ten alle sten kantza suzetountai kapoies peraitero allages kurios ston eideseographiko tomea mia kai oses eginan ton teleutaio mena den phainetai na apodidounmeta apo pente agonistikes e katastase ekhei diamorphothei os exes rodousakes akadena antikolletiko teganaki me ligo elielaio sotaroume ola ta lakhanika alatopiperonontas elaphra kai prosthetontas lige rigane kai maintanoto khoreuei kala to zeimpekiko o giorgos papandreou opos to khorepse prin apo arketa khronia ste thrake me ton tourko politiko tzemsophia kakokairia e sunedriase tha pragmatopoiethei sto grapheio agrotikes anaptuxes psakhnoneuro alla parapempetai se exousiodotike diataxeekhei apoktesei ena diaphanes stegastro kai ekhei ginei polukhoros me kaphe mezedopoleio mparaki makran to pio endiapheron kainourgio steki tes polesme ten apoktese tou rimolnti pleronetai to keno ste these tou amuntikou khaph kai sumphona me tous skhediasmous tes anazetountai enas akome kophtes kai enas epitelikos mesos me ephese sto skorarismaagkura espeuse na ekphrasei ten ikanopoiese tes gia te gallike protobouliaplethorika aromata sukou se proto plano banilias sokolatas kai xulou siropia karamelomenou maurou phroutou bussino damaskeno kai kedros se ena eugenes sunolokai oso pernoun ta khronia toso perissoteroi protimoun na kataskeuazoun ekei tis monimes katoikies touskai einai epises anamenomeno ste skhetike thematologia na proballontai gia na epibebaiothoun ta ideologika ermeneutika skhemata delade ta stereotupa pou egemoneuoun kai okhi ta legomena pragmatika peristatikaeinai kharakteristiko to gegonos leei e ka liodake oti ta ekthemata eikhan polethei tis protes duo ores aphou stethekan oi pagkoioi uposkheseis gia perissotero periekhomeno pio endiapherouses topothesies apostoles neous kharakteres klparkhika e keisi delose oti e dikhrone kore tes apekhthe apo mia mpeimpi siter ste sunekheia kata te diarkeia tes dikes delose oti pnigeke se pisinametaxas telika oudepote kategoretheke gia ten apopeira alla akome ki ekeinoi pou kategorethekan den katadikastekanopos anapheroun kharakteristika to pagoma olon ton suntaxeon apotelei eutheia epithese se suntaxioukhous touoi protoi menes ton apeutheias diapragmateuseon den dikaionoun mekhri tora tis dikes mas toulakhiston prosdokies delose o proedros tes demokratias demetres khristophias kata te diarkeia koines ekdeloses pou diorganosan to kai toepiseme anakoinose gia sunergasia tes cocacola me ten tria epsilon den eikhe semantiko apotelesma sten time tes metokhes tes e opoia ekleise stiss drkh me mikre anodo drkhmazi tou dekhteke to khristianismo meta ten omilia tou paulou ston areio pagote sunekhe apaxiose tou kurous tou autoelegkhou ste demosia sphaira kai tou aisthematos euthunes pou prokalei o antagonistikos atomismostora poioi apo tous duo lene anakribeies pantos duskolo to kobo na lene oi ergolaboito basiko kharakteristiko kai e philosophia tes proseggises autes einai oti uiothetei strategike oso to dunaton perissotero apokentromene eunoei te summetokhe ton topikon paragonton kai akolouthei proseggise apo ta kato pros ta ano opos legetaitrite augoustou ginetai mia phora ste zoe mas ten augoustou lepta meta ta mesanukhta o planetes ares tha einai toso lamperos kai toso megalos san pheggarioi exetaseis olon ton mathematon einai mono grapteskhruse olumpionikes tou pekinou ollandia antepitetheke meiose se allaapo ten omada tha phugoun duo paiktesta polla problemata pou antimetopizoun oi khaniotes emphanistekan khthes me ton pleon tragiko tropo gia ten omada tous kai o ergoteles den aphese ten eukairia na paei khamenesugkentrose sto aithrio stis iouniou sten antepithese o apostoles karaphotias sunduasmos mas tha einai sunduasmos nikesepanelthe dunata sto proskenio to onoma tou apostolou katsphara kai epaize mekhri to proi opote kai epestrepse sto trapezi ton diabouleuseon to onoma tou thumiou sokouan doume ta pragmata sten alethine tous diastase tha katalaboume oti oloi ekhoume to meridio tes gastronomikes mas euthunes gia osa diadramatizontai sto trapezi ton diakopon massumphona me ten idia oi philes tes ekhoun xekinesei na askholountai kai autes me to sugkekrimeno athlema meta apo protrope tes idias einai oraio na blepeis ena kalogumnasmeno somato phestibal telei upo ten aigida tou tmematos ekhou kai eikonas tou ioniou panepistemiou kai tou demou kerkuraionekdelose etan aphieromene sten osteoporose me omilete ton orthopediko ziant mpakhas o opoios anephere ta sumptomata tes nosou kathos kai tous tropous antimetopisesto philiko tes tetartes me ten lkomotib plobntib anablethekesto phos ta mustika tes pambotidas ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous sto phos ta mustika tes pambotidas ta prota sumperasmata tes geophusikes meletes pou ekponese to panepistemio patron parousiase khthes o nomarkheskai oi opoioi para tis epi deka khronia ekkleseis tes ekklesias den phrontizoun na ton diateroun katharo kai eleuthero apo antikeimena pou den tairiazoun ekeista psonia mas sto souper market khresimopoioume panta dikes mas tsantes gi auto kai merikes phores orismenoi mas koitazoun les kai eimaste exogeinoiellada brisketai semera upo te diktatoria tou khrematistikou kephalaiouopote adika to kaneis to ergo autopiso paei e diadikasia oson aphora ton upopsephio gia to neo demo souliou sto aphou opos katapherame na plerophorethoume tha stethei telika kalpe stis augoustou emera kuriakeopos semeiose pos to sugkekrimeno ktirio to opoio parakhoretheke apo to demo ksanthes prokeitai gia ena ktirio monadikes biomekhanikes arkhitektonikes tou aiona pou exuperetouse tes anagkes tou othomanikou monopoliou kapnouperiorizontai aplos ste diapistose oti osoi sumplerosan ta erotematologia tou den etan apokleistika proletariakes katagoges alla antiprosopeutiko deigma tes euruteres taxikes domes tes tote ellenikes koinoniasphtanei omos me ta prosopika kai tis eukhes to mono pou thelo einai na sas metedosa lige apo ten aisiodoxia moukati pou tha epereasei auxetika kai tis times ton georgikon proiontonbadizontas kai paizontas pano s autous kalountai na anakalupsoun pou odegei o kathe dromosereunes gia ten upothese diexagei e antitromokratike uperesiame tis omoiotetes kai tis diaphores tousto eukharisto pou eisepraxa etan na bgoun se khthesine tous ekpompe treis ekprosopoi tes autonomes thuras kai na krazoun emenahde o nomos brisketai ekei me oles tou tis ekphraseis ten apagoreuse ten parabase tis sunepeies tesanergia e elleipse asphaleias e apousia upodomon oi elleipseis sten ugeia demiourgoun entone anasphaleiaan o ependutes epilexei te sugkekrimene ruthmise den tha pleronei phoro mekhri e sugkekrimene ependuse na phtasei na apodosei kerde ekatgiu auto tou esteilanemastan ole ten proegoumene ebdomada proselomenoi ston stokho mas kai gi auto apomonothekame apo to upoloipo periballon gia treis emeresekane to proto bema prokrises gia to phainal phor tou europaikou kupellou notiou periphereias sten kalathosphaira nikontas me to epibletiko te bosniake mprotniokhthes oi paiktes tou ophe exophlethekan se misthous kai prim oktobrioutrite augoustou leipoun ta extra parthena ladia oi times tou ladiou sunekhizoun na kinountai sta gnosta khamela epipeda pou ekhoun diamorphothei apo ta tele tou proegoumenou khronoukhorizei tous ellenes mathetes se duo kategories kai apagoreuei se boreiepeirotes pontious kai omogeneis tou exoterikou na kratoun ten ellenike semaia graphei e ethnika euaisthete ephemeridabenizelos omologei to baterlo tou na arnethei o laos peraitero thusies lathos epikindune kai kathara taxike e politike tes kubernesesedeixe kitrine stous gkalits kai atsimobitsto club sto opoio lambanei khora e ekdelose gia to protathlema tou thrulou einai pragmatika dipla ste thalassakai an pragmati ta elleimmata kai ta khree ton kratonmelon tes etan to problema tes europaikes enoses phoboumene apostatheropoiese to logiko tha etan na arkhisei me ten ispania tes opoias to terastio meridio perissotero apo trisaute ten ora kaine lastikha sto dromo exo apo te genike grammateia aigaiouagonistike olokleronetai aurio me to adiaphoro paikhnidi anamesa ston almuro kai ton asteraapo ta palia text adventures alla kai ta paikhnidia tes sierra pou basizontan se megalo bathmo sten plektrologese perasame sto epomeno stadiooson aphora sto sullogo tou demou gaziou opou ta authaireta xepernoun tis tesseris khiliades o proedros tou k mikhales kabbalos milontas sten eipe oti e sugkentrose anamenetai na ekhei megale summetokhe kosmoumoiraze se khameles times stous khorikous ladi kai palaiotera daneize s autous khrematika posase oti aphora ten anakuklose sten opoia o nomos ioanninon einai ouragos sten epeiro aphou se kanenan den epharmozetai pleres programma para mono se pilotiko stadio e epiloge einai na anatethei me diagonismo se etaireia e apokomide kai diakheirisegermanida eikhe sullephthei prokhthes to bradu sten periokhe martinegko eno epididotan mesa se autokineto se erotikes praxeis me antra enanti amoibes drakhmonphemes lene oti to palati to stoikheionoun nekroi basileis opos e progiagia tou william basilissa maryplore pantos gia ten arktike phainetai pos ekhoun balei ede kai ellenes ephoplistesauto to spiti tes to kabouki protos to khresimopoiese o ermes theos epises sundeomenos me ton gamo os uios tes maias gia na tentosei khordes phtiakhnontas ten prote luraberoia euekhe pole gia ena triemero apo tis iouniou e beroia tha euekhesei me mousikes pou tha zontanepsoun ten pole ap akro se akro gia deutere khronia sto plaisio ton ekdeloseon gia ten pagkosmia emera mousikessas zetame na mas peite to montelo to opoio epaggelleste epeide den uparkhei pouthena ston kosmoeikha enan kratoumeno pou mou elege sunekhos ti perimeneis giatre apo menapersine proetoimasia tou olumpiakou sto mpant beriskhophen eikhe polle douleiamikhales sphakianakes etan apo ta gnosta stelekhe tou sto hrakleio kai eikhe drasteriopoiethei se oles tis ekdeloseis tou kommatospantos prin alektor phonesai epibebaiothekan oi enstaseis pou eikhe ekphrasei kai telika e sunantese sto opos apodeikhteke etan mia trupa sto neroksanthe touristikos proorismos olo to khrono gia ellenes kai xenous demiourgei eisodema gia to nomo kai apaskholese gia tous katoikouskonta sta epipeda tes trapezikes agoras einai kai ta epitokia pou prospherei se phusika prosopa kai nomika prosopa idiotikou dikaiou amigos me kerdoskopikou kharaktera to tameio parakatathekon kai daneionyparkhoun eutukhos arketa teleoptika kanaliadiaitetes tou agona etan o giorgos tsoumanes me ton thanase paraskhoeutukhos e phoroapallage gia ten egkatastase eliakou thermosiphona pou eikhe katargethei epaneltheekhontas dei ta gran turismo kai killzone se sto los angeles prosphata sto plaisio tes mporoume na bebaiosoume oti ta games mporoun na einai akros peistika os epikheiremata gia ten stereoskopike eikonaten epitrope ton sophon pou sustatheke sto topiko gia ton elegkho tes eklogikes diadikasias apousiaze khthes to onoma tou nikou tsampourake epises apo ta istorika stelekhe tou kommatosme te dunatoteta metabibases pou dotheke apo ten periodo karamanle oi adeies apoktoun xaphnika empragmato dikaiomamegale auxese ton epitokion ton teleutaio khrono ekhei amese kai sobare epiptose sto kostos exupereteses tou daneiou tes boetheias ton disden apanto se phemes kai sta osa graphontaieukolo einai bre elpida pantos pros to paron den ekhoun emphanistei tetoia phainomenato ergo anatithetai apo te strategina se enan stratiote kai autodidakto zographo pou apokaleitai apo te gunaika rosos exaitias tes phusiognomias touan e mpagern termatisei tha khreiastei prokrimatiko gia prokrise stous omilous tou tsampions ligk eno an meinei tha arkestei sto giouropa ligkposo mallon an paroume ton proto bathmoapo kei pou den to perimene ten patese enas maphiozos sten italiaekklesia brisketai se apostase khiliometron apo to xenodokheiokathodike diaspase tes demiourgese euloga erotemata gia ten sunekheia kathos entathekan kai oi reustopoieseis metokhon piezontas ten time pros ta eurothumamai pantote ekeine ten prote phora pou epia to krasi kai mou ekane klikblepeis emeis ste rodo den eikhame atukhesei pote na mas episkephtoun kai na kollesounki auto para to gegonos oti oloi gnorizoun pos e diadikasia den prokhora exaitias ton tourkikon theseonakolouthei to aerodromio sarl nte gkol tou parisiou trito to aerodromio tes phrankphourtes tetarto to aerodromio skipkhol tou pmsterntam kai pempto to aerodromio mparakhas tes madritesta paradosiaka tragoudia einai auta pou dinoun perissotere trophe me auta bionan oi anthropoi ta sunaisthemata kai auta ekhoun kai perissotere theatrikoteta apo allakrise einai dedomene gia oloklero ton kosmo kai ekhei epereasei ola ta epipeda tes zoes mas ton teleutaio khronomegaleiodes e sugkentrose tou kosta soutou sto odeio menuma enotetas kai allagesuphupourgos oikonomikon xristodoulakes kata te khthesine tou sunantese me ten uposkhetheke auxeseis apo os pou mesostathmika dinounanazeta mia zeste agkalia gia tis krues meres tou kheimona kai okhi monoto skhedio brisketai upo epexergasia kai tha oloklerothei kai tha parousiastei tis epomenes ebdomadeseos ten ora pou ekleise e ule tes ephemeridas mas den eikhe oloklerothei e sunedriase ostoso koine ektimese olon ton melon tou etan pos prepei na katatethei enstase kathos theoroun oti o diagonismos ekhei polla skoteina semeia pou ton kathistoun adiaphaneedo prepei na upenthumisoume oti gramme gia akuro kai leuko edose to ten idia epiloge ekane kai e dinontas omos os epiloge kai ten apokhe aphou e these etan den epilegoume kanenan apo tous diakheiristes tes antilaikes politikesopos anapherei se anakoinose tou anagke na diadelosoume te deutera me to einai semera dipla epibeblemene apo tis exelixeisto oi poleseis tou omilou ephthasan ta dissarantakhrone omos philia tou me to suggraphea tou bibliou dilmpoe phainetai pos apotelese ton sundetiko krikooi demiourgikoteroi ellenes seph sunthetoun gia prote phora mazi tediarkeia eos tis apriliouekei omos ta paidia tes entases na epimenoun ston agona tous na paizoun ta tragoudia tous kai na metadidoun ta epanastatika menumata tousantistoikha oi ellenes sten pleionoteta tous emphanizontai apogoeteumenoi apo ten parousa katastase tes apaskholeses ste khora tous kathos theoroun oti brisketai se duskhere thesebenizelo oi siderodromoi ellenikou kratous os demosia etaireiaomos diabazontas tis protes anaphores gia problemata epilexame na kratesoume stase anamonesksekokaliste to kai kopste to kreas se louridesta kathara kerde meta apo phorous kai dikaiomata meiopsephias tou omilou ephtasan ta ekataphou malakosoun oi phakes tis souronoume kai tis pername apo to mplenter mazi me to melani kai sumpleronoume oso zomo khreiastei mekhri na ginei enas elaphrus pourespio sugkekrimena stis khthes ta xemeromata apo agnoste mekhri stigmes aitia skaphos to opoio eikhe anelkustei ste khersaia zone tou limaniou tes akantias tulikhtheke stis phlogessurriknonontai siopera oi exonosokomeiakes domes katargese egkekrimenou oikotropheiou upobathmise epaggelmatikon domon ton asthenon metaphora exoterikon iatreion apo to kentro tes athenas odos kolette mesa sto psukhiatreioasulooi pomakoi tes oreines rodopes den einai tourkoi alla boulgaroi exislamisthentes einai e episeme tourkike ekdokhe pou anapheretai sten geographia b taxes lukeiou pou didaskontai ta paidia sten tourkiaakome kai stis argies einai e germania koruphaia graphei e belt kai analuei oi ergazomenoi edo mazi me deka argies ekhoun pleromenes eleutheres emeres eno sten emeresmalista kapoioi lene oti e google ekhei ede arkhisei na to dokimazei se pragmatikes sunthekespempte iouliou pempte iouliou aurio anamenetai na katatethei apo tous bouleutes tou aitema gia amese sustase proanakritikes epitropes gia to skandalo tes siemensphilandia deikhnei pos mporoun oi anthropoi na erthoun pio konta se katallela diamorphomenous demosious khorous apo pagomena parka mekhri akhnistes saounesemeis koitame ten douleia mas etan to sunthema pou dotheke apo tondiabaste opos akribos tuponontai cybershot apotelei mia mikre se diastaseis alla exeligmene compact psephiake mekhane pou ensomatonei aisthetera analuses megapixels gia photographies me leptomereia kai eukrineiasumplerose de oti apo tous phoreis oikonomika tis boethese epises e anaptuxiake erakleioumporoume akoma na paizoume oloi mazi se tetoious kairous otan o atomikos dromos moiazei na einai o monos dunatos uparkhoun phones pou mas thumizoun oti oi anthropoi mporoun na sunantiountai kai na kanoun thaumataserbia einai e khora me ton megalutero sunoliko plethusmo pou endiapherei to soma tou okhi mono metaxu ton proen giougkoslabikon demokration alla kai sten eurutere periokhe tes notioanatolikes europes me skhedon atomasukhna erkhetai kai xanarkhetai sto nou e euloge aporia tou makarite tou patera mou gnostou epaggelmatia gianniote khondremporou pou anarotiotan empodizei mepos kaneis ton opoiondepote na anoixei dipla apo to diko mou magazi ena idio asphalos okhise kathe periptose oi oikonomikes diaphores an uparkhoun autes en prokeimeno lunontai apo ta armodia dikasteria kai tis arkhes tou kratous kai okhi meso laikon dikasterion sukophantikon menumaton kai apeilontitlos einai daneismenos apo to latiniko keimenosto idio mekos kumatos etan kai oi deloseis tou kosta kaimakoglou oloi mas eimaste dipsasmenoi gia diakriseto proto ploio apo auta tha einai etoimo se menestous menes tes apraxias opos to kalokairi kai tis giortes paizoun sunekheia epanalepseisgia tis khreseis kai oikto basileio tes pop koultouras alle mia ekrektike sunantese ekatontadon khiliadon sinephil kai phan ton komiks oloklerotheke to proegoumeno sabbatokuriako sto san ntiegko tes kaliphorniastrite augoustou oi demosiographoi tou nautiliakou reportaz elegan khthes oti to neo aphentiko agorase polu akriba te apo ton apostolo bentoureste sunantese metaxu ton allon parousiastekan oi tropoi antimetopises ton kindunon pou demiourgountai apo tis purkagies sumphona me ten empeiria kai ta tekhnika mesa pou khresimopoiountai se tetoiou eidous peristaseis kai ta opoia diarkos exelissontaimarx sto sokho pou tha ermeneusei o antonopoulos semeiose polu megale epitukhia sten athena kai etan apo ta erga pou emeinan anexitela sto mualo oson to eidan gi auto kai den prepei na to khasoumegia na doume an o upourgos metaphoron pou tha enemerosei semera ten epitrope oikonomikon tes boules gia ta taxi tha pei kati perissoteroden mporoume na kathusteresoume peraiteroligo noritera eikhe akoustei kai to sumboliko ellas ellenon khristianondiadikasia pantos tha ekhei oloklerothei sumphona me ton kgabala mekhri ta xristougennaden uparkhei omos to plesiasma meso ton phoreon tou laouetsi opos episemainoun oi trapezites dinetai e dunatoteta sten trapeza na prosdiorizei tis anagkes tou pelate kai na prokhorei sten prosphora katallelon proionton sten soste timologesekleinei apo gklantmpakh megale prospatheia pou ginetai ta teleutaia khronia ston gia ten aneurese neon talenton kala krateito stubete kala me ta kheria sas rikhnete to lemoni kai to kumino kai ta aphenete na marinaristoun mise oraan ten ekane o mikes diabolismenos phantazeste ti tha ginotan kalutera as men to skeptontai oi prasinoista duo teleutaia suntoma mere tou muthistorematos pairnoun ton logo duo alla prosopa pou sumpleronoun ten istoria tou kostante apo diaphoretike optike gonia anatrepontas basikes parametrous tes dikes tou aphegesesekei ekhoume polu thetikes exelixeisphetos apophasisame na apokentrosoume to programma kai e prospatheia mas aute phainetai na dikaionetai apoluta mekhri torakhalkida ekhei khalasei edo kai mia dekaetiabromikes paralies kako serbis kai akribogenika opou ekhei polu kosmo den uparkhei poioteta se tipotame alla logia na xeperasei ton eauto tou kathos kai o idios einai gennema enos kommatikou sustematos pou mekhri tora oudolos noiasteke sobara gia tis anagkes periphereiassukhna sumbainei na aphanizetai apo kuna skulopsaro peri ten emeragiati den allazoun ten kanonistike apophase gia na einai sumphonoi me tis epitages tou nomou paizete kati lene osoi theloun na skephthoun poneraoles oi mazoxeis pragmatopoiountai sta kentrika grapheia kai einai anoiktes akoma kai autes tou sto khoro ton matheton opou etan e poluplethestere organose semera ekhoun meinei guro sta mele me upeuthunous ton mena khatzeandreou kai manole adamopoulotrite augoustou tesseris meres meta to thanato tou kosta mouka kai mia mera meta to thanato tou apo ton polikhnito ten teleutaia tou pnoe aphese sten asphalto kai enas stratiotes apo ten agiasooso gia to an o mporei na diekdikesei ten anodo o k kalogerou einai saphes den ekhoume tetoies blepseis kathos kai o kolossos ekhei xephugei kaposkati pou ekanan kata te diarkeia tes sunedriases tou sumbouliou to bradu tes deuterasme plethora ekdeloseon oles dorean gia to koino pou tha pragmatopoiethoun stis kai iouliou e periphereia thessalias pragmatopoiei kai phetos sta paralia tou nomou to phestibal me thea sto aigaiogia tous dokimazomenous prote phora upopsephious iskhuei to dikaioma tes mias kai monadikes emphanisesmikro etan omos kai to endiapheron tou kosmou pou me exairese ton termatismo pantos to theama den elleipse idiaitera stis exi eidikes diadromes tou mokhou tou brakhasiou kai tou drasisumphona me plerophories oi arkhes ekhoun sugkentrosei stoikheia apo ta opoia prokuptei oti ton prikake traumatise suggeniko tou prosopo gia agnostous logous ste these purgos tou beneratouola gia tous kephenes gia tous ekmetalleutes gia to kratos tousopos delose e kore tou theodora o gnostos ethopoios tha noseleutei sten klinike mekhri na statheropoiethei e arteriake tou piesekhouliaras genkairos athena pem aug enetgr trite augoustou tragike katalexe eikhe to mpanio gia ena agori se paralia sten katerine to opoio xephuge apo ten prosokhe ton gonion tou gia na brethei ligo argotera nekrotria lepta argotera o mpoa morte apenanti apo ton kepouro soutare kai e mpala exostrakisteke apo to orizontio dokarina ekdothei kapoia prokeruxe pou na sas endiapherei mporeite na axiopoiesete auto to khroniko diastema parakolouthontas kapoio programma e seminario epaggelmatikes katartises tououranos tou autokinetou bretheke se taratsa metra makria apo to semeio tes ekrexes e porta tou taksi sten aule tou demotikou skholeiou eno kato apo to autokineto anoixe krateras bathous misou metrouto lompi dra me mustikoteta kai e dow den einai o pio katallelos demosios propagandistes tes asphaleias ton khemikonkai telos panton as ginei mia sobare ereuna kai an theorethei aparaiteto kai sumpherei toso polu as kanoun to parko oi treis omoroi demoi giati na to kanei mia etaireia kai na meinoun ta ophele stous demouseuoiones einai oi prooptikes gia ten touristike kinese ste khora mas phetos to kalokairi meta tis ektimeseis tou diethnous aerolimena athenon gia auxese kata ston arithmo ton pteseon exoterikou apo kai pros ten athenaprepei na broume ton bematismo mas to programma tou tha prepei na apeuthunetai s ola ta stromata kai na aphora ole ten koinonialitra endeka ekatommuria litra petrelaiou ntizel kai peripou tonoi epipleon kausaeriakale epiloge einai kai e oreine arkadia koukla olo to khronodioti oloi oi europaioi khreiazetai kapoia stigme na thumethoume ton megalo saixper otan elege ston phalstaph an den apatomaieinai eliou phaeinoteron oti e eisodos tes ntoras mpakogianne sten politike arena moiazei moiraia epibeblemeneeikha kanei tromere proponese kai emoun panetoimos gia na paro to khruso metalliognorizoume oti arketoi demotikoi sumbouloi kai demarkhoi ana ten epikrateia ekhoun protodikos katadikastei den ekhoun omos tethei se argia kai askoun kanonika ta kathekonta tousme poious porous tha tis leitourgesoun tha eprepe na dothoun kinetra e kai protoboulies stous demous kai stis periphereies na kharaxoun te dike tous oikonomike politike pou tha antistoikhei kai sto biotiko epipedo ton katoikon kathe periokhestheoreitai de asteio logistika na ginetai logos oti e etaireia etan sto parelthon epikerdes otan sten ousia oi zemies diokheteuontan ston logariasmo exodon egkatastases e anaposbeste axia tou opoiou anerkheto peripou se disgia poio pragma metanionete perissotero gia ten elleipse thrasousde semainei oti de tha ekhoume tou khronouomorphia tou topiou proselkuei skaphe kai istioploika pou prosdenoun gia na to apolausoun kai na kharoun tis aneseis tou xenkheiouto kratos pronoias pou einai entuposiaka mikroteros etan o arithmos ton gunaikon pou einai odegoi kai emplekontai se trokhaia atukhemata se skhese me tous andresse emeresies ekdromes me kaiki tha proseggisete ta brakhonesia pou briskontai ologurame to pou kathesai sou phernoun ton katalogo exi epiloges gia proto piato pente gia kurio kai tesseris gia epidorpiooute to ena egine oute to allokhthes exallou egine gnosto oti uparkhei endiapheron gia ton marko maragkoudake tou ophesumphona me anakoinothen tou omilou basikoi stokhoi tes anadiorganoses autes einai na meiothounoi idies plerophories prosthetoun epises oti to neo apoktema tou omilou prokeitai na einai etaireia tou kladou genikon asphaleion mikromesaiou megethous kai me ugies xartophulakioostoso den mporese na kratesei anepaphe ten estia tou aphou to asphuktiko presingk tes kabalas apedose sto me ton nikoulaesumphona me ten antipoliteuse sto poso auto tha prepei na prostethoun oi opheiles tou demou kai ton demotikon epikheireseon pros tous asphalistikous organismous pros kataskeuastes kai trita prosopaepeide o organismos khreiazetai kai to gluko protimeste epidorpio giaourtiou me khamela lipara meli e gluko tou koutaliou komposta e zele phrouton loukoumi e lige sokolata ugeias pou periekhei magnesio kai dra enantia sten katathlipseto eidan san mia eukairia gia autosarkasmotha eniskhusei ton periphereiako skhediasmo kai tis nees thesmikes allages opou auto tha apaitetheialla ginontai giati sunistoun mia pragmatikotetaprin teleioso tha ethela na toniso noiotho touto to khreos oti e kataxiose tes paradosiakes ellenidas gunaikas einai sto rolo tes manas pou dikaiologemena ginontai tosoi eortasmoi pros time tesupourgos metebe sto nesi proskeklemenos tes ellenikes omospondias kriket prokeimenou na parakolouthesei ton philiko agona anamesa se omada bouleuton apo ten australia kai beteranon tou athlematosepi tes ousias phusika gia ta osa eipothoun ten kritike kai to skholiasmo ton aphenoun se mas tous psephophorousekphrazontas telos ten anesukhia tou gia to mellon tes khoras o proedros tes apeuthune se oloklere ten kubernese to erotema ti tha ginei ean sunekhistei e apotukhia olokleres autes tes politikesekho na kano ten exes protase ston agapeto upourgobebaia kai auta ta khremata pisteuo oti gia na beltiothei e poioteta ste zoe mas tha prepei na mas dothei e dunatoteta gia ergasiapempte martios eagle bulkauxese sta leitourgika kerde auxese esodon kai alla kampse sta kerde semeiose to e eagle bulk pou ekhei epikephales ton k sophokle zoulaapokleistekan o timoremenos kolitsidakes kai o metsopoulos pou den mporese na nikesei ton io tes grippesan se autous prostethoun o lazaros semos o panagiotes ziakas o germanos oto kai oi boulgaroi tsbetanoph topouzoph kai zaphiroph diapistonetai oti o akratetos diathetei ena ikano sunolome ta pano tou kai me ta kato tou eidika otan de sugkratei ta neura touauto phaneke me ten enarxe tes sezon kai aisiodoxoume na sunekhisteiphetos dustukhos den pame kala kai s auto meridio euthunes ekhoun oloimparmpara kai o sasa apeuthunoun ekklese se olous autous tous phoreis na euaisthetopoiethoun prokeimenou na sothei e zoe tou athoou koritsiou to opoio ekhei anagke iatrikes phrontidasalloste uparkhoun oi nomimoi tropoi gia ten ethike mou apokatastasepisteuo oti e sugkekrimene prospatheia tha apodosei lian suntomosapheste pou blepo oti to problema legetai ntektas me oti auto sunepagetaileitourgia pezon gia na to khresimopoieite entos kai ektos tou autokinetou saseinai e lexe pou eleipe sunethos apo to lexilogio tou giorgou papakonstantinou kai einai e lexe pou tha akoume sto exes olo kai sukhnotera apo ton euaggelo benizelota udatina auta monopatia emphanizontai anamesa se brakhodeis plagies kai kuloun epi ekatontades metra sto notio emisphairio tou areeinai loipon idiaitera semantiko auto giati deikhnei te statheroteta kai te dunamike pou ekhei e oikonomia mas kai pou to me ten politike pou akolouthei ten krata se polu kala epipedaktismeno sten agkalia enos prostateuomenou kolpou ta kaphenedakia oi phournoi ta pantopoleia oi tabernes sas upodekhontai konta sten prokumaiaetsi opos ola deikhnoun oi monadikoi apontes tha einai oi timoremenoi kolitsidakes kiassosoi ergazomenoi stous demous apekleisan apo noris to proi to khoro tou khuta os endeixe diamarturias sta sklera oikonomika nea diekdikontas epipleon neo kai dikaio misthologio plere monime kai eniaia ergasia kathos kai dikaio phorologiko sustemaleme nai sten ananeose tes sumbases alla theloume ta idia khremata me perusime karol epibletheke e liberpoul tes siti kaout panegurizei meta to pokerkai okhi na leme oti mas phtaine autoi pou tha tou kanoun kritike aurio methauriophusika oloi oi sumpaiktes tou stathekan dipla tou anebazontas tou ten psukhologia gia autes tis duskoles stigmes pou pernaeikata ta alla e brokhe etan toso polle sto gklastonmperi pou e diorganotes epistrateusan phortega pou erikhnan akhuro se semeia opou e laspe ginotan aprospelastesunduasmos tou koukiadake eikhe ten prote kuriake megalutere duname apo tous duo monomakhous ton epanaleptikonproton to megalo melo ekhei korestei apo tis duotreis kouzines pou ekhoun monopolesei ten estiatorike skene gallike italike kinezikeparallela e epises allodape phile tes pou eikhe uposterixei proanakritika aute ten kataggelia katethese sumphona me plerophories oti den eide e idia na tes dinoun khapia alla oti akouse te balaban na to leeipoios tha parei to ena e to allo upourgeioeidika oi metokhes piestekan gia arketes ebdomades kai mia anamenomene antidrase erthe e opoia malista etan arketa iskhurekoboume kathe proi kai se periptose pou einai para polla kai den mporoume na ta diathesoume amesos ste laike ta bazoume sto psugeioto biblio tou take theodoropoulou ekdoalla den ekopsa pote to nema giati sunekhos mou to metakinounesiopela kai diakritika ekteloun entoles kai ekpleronoun epithumies me ton pleon asphale kai aneto tropooi sullephthentes tha odegethoun ston eisaggelea eno oi narkotikes ousies to oplo me tous duo gemisteres kai ta phusiggia kathos kai ikh autokineta kataskhethekanoi tourkikes philodoxies den stamatoun oste na metatrapei e khora se mia megale oikonomike duname me periphereiake iskhuarkhaiologikos khoros dodones theatrike parastase me paramuthi tou lorka se sunergasia me depethe ioanninonekane to ntempouto tou to me to be here soon pou eikhe perasei skhedon aparateretoektimo epises ten aploteta pou uparkhei ste douleia mikroteron paragogonauto apaitei upogrammise proothese neon proionton kai tropon diatheses sto koino egkatastase sugkhronon plerophoriakon sustematon sosta ekpaideumeno prosopiko kai orthologike diarthrose diktuousuggrapheas upodeiknuei kai ten pithane luse sto problema proteinontas na anazetethei gia tous polites tes dutikes europes mia nea tautoteta e opoia tha lambanei upopse tis nees demographikes pragmatikotetes pou ekhoun demiourgetheiproedroi topikon opos diabazoume sta kanoun oi idioi apokomide skoupidion prokeimenou na glutosoun apo ta parapona ton sundemoton tousste sunekheia an theloun tous parakhoro to demo ten edra ta pantaton perasmeno iounio ligo prin lexei e proegoumene periodo den eikhe apokleisei me sapheneia to endekhomeno na uparxei kai tritos gurospleon ginetai diakhorismos gia to kata poson ekhei khtistei mekhri to e perissoteraakoma kai meta ten episkepse ste khio tou upourgou ethnikes amunas k meimarake epanelthame me neo eggrapho stous protobathmious pou zetousame ten topothetese tous sto themablepete oi suneideseis xupnoun kapoteola ta aloga ekhoun endoparasita skoulekia kai ta perissotera boskotopia einai se kapoio bathmo molusmenaetan e prote periptose makhimes amerikanidas pou sullambanetai os aikhmalote polemougia to palio phrourio e phortetsa me ten ekklesia tou agiou georgiou khreiazetai na diaboume te gephura pano apo ten tekhnete taphro ten kontra phosa pou ekhei metatrepsei to palaio phrourio tes kerkuras se nesimolis sta disapla kanoun upomone mepos ka doun mia kharamada photos sto skoteino tounel tes oikonomias masmeta te theia leitourgia sto xoklesi tou agiou georgiou oi kabalaredes idioktetes ton alogon pou summeteikhan sten ippodromia proskunesan enas enas ten eikona tou agiou kai aphou sugkentrothekan xekinesan ton agonaauta omos ta deutereuonta merikes phores kathistantai kuriarkhaproteinoume teganeto abgo opou o krokos einai krema lemoniou to aspradi giaourti to alati luophilismenos ananas kai to piperi kommatakia apo karpo kakaoan omos uperkhe o katallelos antras gia na phtiaxo oikogeneia tha to ekana khoris na me noiazei an tha alloiothei to soma mouapo ten epokhe pou epaize me ton miles davis ki enteuthen o jack dejohnette exelissotan se metr tes world ruthmologias auxanontas kai aplonontas tous orizontes tou pros pollaples kateuthunseisste sunantese tha laboun meros epises oi demarkhoi athenon k abramopoulos thessalonikes k papageorgopoulos peiraia k xrsemeiotheke delade mia auxese tes taxes toukai nai men den to blepo na kathieronetai tora pia sta megala souper market alla sta geitonika magazakia ede einai sten emeresia diataxemeta apo exi khronia sten megale kategoria tou germanikou podosphairou e aintrakhtmesa sto epomeno diastema anamenetai na uparxoun exelixeis kai gia ta mele tes topikes organoses tes ko pou kinethekan proeklogika ektos kommatikes grammestha te thumaste prophanos ten tete georgantopoulou pou einai ek ton diorganonton tes ektheses ton eikonon apo ta monasteria tou kosobouapo ten alle bebaia uparkhoun kai oi epitedeioi pou ekmetalleuontai ten apousia ton elegktikon mekhanismon kai polu perissotero de te nootropia tou kratous pou tosa khronia de ekhei epibalei pote sobara prostima stous parabatespsukhe mas einai e koinonia o laos apo ten koinonia proerkhomaste kai sten koinonia logodotoumeden krubo oti me enanduo anthropous prokhoresame arketa alla sto telos apodeikhthekan oti etan na khame na legamemen pareis elikoptero san ton palaiokostapanafon vodafone parekhei ede pilotika uperesies opos internet feed mvpn uperesies diasundeses me te khrese tes tekhnologias local multipoint distribution system se megalous etairikous pelatessten agonistike ton ekplexeon ekhasan sto gepedo tous panellenios kai kai ton ektos edras epitukhion o ophh den kataphere na prosthesei kai te dikia tou ki etsi e apostase apo tis pronomioukhes theseis auxetheke stous duo pontousemeis theloume psepho empistosunes sto kai okhi psephos diamarturias pros ten kake diakubernese tes khoras apo tekubernese diethese mia stratiotike duname andron gia na sundramei tis prospatheies ton diasostonekhei diatelesei dieuthuntes tou kentrou ereunes tes istorias tou ellenikou dikaiou tes akademias athenon kai eidikos sumboulos gia ekklesiastika zetemata tou upourgou exoterikon kai apo to phebrouario tou mekhri semeramekhri semera ekhei parei meros se parastaseis semantikon ellenon skenotheton opos o thodoros terzopoulos o giorgos lazanes o bikos nakhmias o thomas moskhopoulos e marianna kalmpare eno sunergasteke kai me ten ethnike lurike skenesta tou khronia o khose louis silabert den to bazei akoma kato kai elpizei na dosei to paron kai to ste germania kai na petukhei auto pou kunegaei na ginei o protos termatophulakas pou tha skorarei se telike phase pagkosmiou kupellouapotelesma auto to phainomeno tes exagoras na kleinei matia kai stomata ton upeuthunonlaimargos omos o anthropos ta pereetoi meta to ek tou panagiou taphou sabanon mou na peribletho en aploun zostikon kai mian dermatinen zonen os kalumma de tes kephales ena skouphonden stamatese na trekhei gia leptakai problepoun ta exes perissoteroi apo demosioi upalleloi tha dinoun kathemerineselladas pempte iouliou pempte iouliou ste messenia tha sunedriasei e sunodos tou dioiketikou sumbouliou tes omospondias emporikon sullogon peloponnesou kai notiodutikes elladasto teleutaio tha apaskholesei semera te stele mas mia kai tha anapherthoume se mia apo tis palaioteres tabernes pou brisketai ste skala eresou to aigaio tes oikogeneias giannakelouto zesame ki autome ten entone epithumia gia nike na diakatekhei ola ta mele tes apostoles to erakleio antimetopizei semeramerikoi omos kunegoi ton paikhnidion tou eliou kai tes selenes opos o tzim mpraitgouel ekhoun enan epipleon logo na theoroun ten augoustou mia mera xekhoristeton ioulio e komision upebale protase odegias oson aphora sten prosbasimoteta toso sto khoro tes koinonikes prostasias tes ugeionomikes perithalpses kai tes ekpaideuses oso kai se agatha kai uperesies diathesimon sto koinoapophasise pos e papa kouremene etan aparadekte kai mou esteile mia philike sumboule gia na men katastrapho na men guriso ten tainiaostoso auto pou kanei ta poiemata tes na xekhorizoun einai pos oti kai an pragmateuontai kratoun ten poietike praxe diarkos sto proskenio oti legetai einai oti mporese na diasothei mesa ste glossaeikhe seira epaphon kai akouse ta problemata ton katoikon kai ton katastematarkhon tes periokheskedeia tou tha ginei aurio pempte stis to proi ston iero metropolitiko nao agiou akhilliousto siderodromiko stathmo tou puthiou egkataleiphthekan bagonia anepapha me epipla trophima kai allo ulikoexontotikes poines katargese tou tekmeriou athootetas ton upodikon thesmothetese tou karphomatos astunomike bia liges bdomades mas khorizoun apo te nukhta ekeine pou tesseris neoi anthropoi kaekan zontanoi sto keli tou korudalloudelade phtaime ki emeisentheta proslepseis anergon me epitage epanentaxes ta kriteria gia tis epikheireseis ten epitage epanentaxes rikhnei o ste makhe kata tes anergias e opoia phainetai na proslambanei anesukhetikes diastaseisetsi e krete apo ten teleutaia these me te mikrotere anergia to perase sten proteleutaia mazi me to notio aigaio to kai ten teleutaia katelaban ta ionia nesiaparakratese e opoia dienergeitai me base tis diataxeis tes pardipla me ton proen prothupourgo kosta karamanle kathotan ten prote mera suzeteses ste boule tou asphalistikou nomoskhediou o stauros kalogiannessta megala astika kentra khanesai mesa sten anonumia kai mporeis pio eukola na epistrepseis ste zoe se antithese me ten eparkhiapolla ta epainetika skholia polla ta peristatika kai ta paradeigmata pou apodeiknuoun tou logou to alethes kai pleon perissoteres kai oi kleseis sto kentro tes astunomiaskaneis den dikaioutai na paizei me tis anthropines zoesepomene sunedria tou ethnikou topotheteitai peri to telos augoustou arkhes septembriouatalanta pasko orthodoxe albanida megalose ekhontas philes mousoulmaneskhara zetaei te sumparastase tes lolas pou omos den mporei na phugei apo ta opoia omos e suskeue ekhei uperbolikeseuphanizetai sugkrateuena aisiodoxe skhetika ue ten prospatheia tes na sphragisei to regua ue tonous laspes kai skurodeuatosgermanida touristria emphanise akolouthesei ten apokatastaseepiklese tou antagonismou pou tha rixei upotithetai tis times einai enas muthosduo sboures taxideuoun kai zontas kathemerines katastaseis pernoun sta paidia tis aparaitetes plerophories gia to thema toussemera tha oloklerothei to tournoua ste mneme tou giorgou metsimponatis upokhreoseis tou apo antasphaliseis egguatai to elleniko demosiotreis meres argotera timomene khora tes deth serbia e opoia ekhei dromologesei ena euru programma ekdeloseon me epikheirematiko anaptuxiako oikonomiko alla kai politistiko kharakteragia polu ski alla kai glukia zoe logo tes apotukhias tou beligradiou na ekdosei tous katazetoumenous kategoroumenous gia egklemata polemou ratko mlantits kai gkoran khatzitseinai peripou menon mikrosome san gatoula panta khamogelaste touotan einai anoikhto einai ena polu kompso axiopisto kai aneto pontikitarkini me to kalostemeno seat leon kai telika na kerdisei ten trite these tou bathroueinai aletheia oti sto sunolo tous skhedon oi apostoles einai tupikou kharakteraden arkei na einai kalo to proion sou prepei na mporeis kai na epikoinoneseis auten ten poioteta na eisai se these na te deixeis pros ta exoeroas kai pali o kratos o spartiates polemistes pou sto telos tou protou paikhnidiou kataphere na parei te these tou are kai na ginei o idios theos tou polemouoi protes prospatheies gia diaphora pantremata tekhnike sur iies opsimos trugos deuterogene aromata etan kourastikeskora tous xekhorize saphos apo ten psikha kai tis perissoteres phores thrummatizotanoi diagonizomenoi tha axiologethoun sten katanoese tou kodika odikes kuklophorias kai ten ikanoteta tous na pragmatopoiesoun mia podelatike diadrome sten pole kai sten upaithrose bazaki balte to lemoni me to ladi piperi kanela kai alatikarkhimakes me anakoinose pou anephere oi ekprosopoi tes troikas xeperasan ta oriates katalepses tou skaphous eikhan proegethei pollaples skhetikes proeidopoieseis tou israelinou polemikou nautikou to opoio kalouse ton summetekhoun kai idiaitera tha ethela na statho sten ebina maltse pou erthe apo ten tsekhia gia na dosei to paron ston agonaoi idioi dromoi me tis ekatontades epikindunes mikres e megaluteres ton katapiosto oi gepedoukhoi ekhasan megale eukairia na proegethoun otan o karon ekane te sentra apo aristera kai o phranzoni epiase to sout sten kinese apo to upsos tes mikres periokhes alla e mpala ephuge psela aoutepises e periphereia dutikes elladas tha parekhei tekhnike kai oikonomike uposterixe gia olous tous ergazomenous pou tha summetekhoun sto programmaoi skepseis anoigmatos tou tameiou tes peraioses gia to epanelthan kai pali gia tis mme epikheireseis kai gia osous exairethekan apo ten persine ruthmise peraioses me stokho na antlethoun dis euroomorpha grammika peitharkhemena tes pemptes sten periokhe tes nuphidasden xero ti tha prokupsei telika alla m aresei pou den antimetopizei ten tragodia graphika san na brisketai se guala san na einai mia buzantine eikona pou te philas ten proskunas kai to polu polu te bgazeis se litaneiaousiastike protase gia kalpes pantouapo aute ten pandemia poio embolio tha mas glutosei pale tes mnemes kata tes lethes ekthese zographikes tou giorgou sitara sto plomari entaxei to empedosameto problema den einai an kapoioi gigantes tes metapoliteutikes bebaios demokratias amphisbetoun tis antistasiakes daphnes agonistonta loipon tonizan pos logo tou timour ketspagia e georgia mporei na kanei to thauma kai na parei te nike aphou opos egraphe e istoselida hochgepokertdiakinetes kai o lathrometanastes o opoios epises sunelephthe tha odegethoun telos ekaton okto sunolika lathrometanastes sunelephthesan apo eos se ole ten epeiro kai epanaproothethekan ste khora tousbasei autes tes diaphoropoieses oi sullephthentes tha antimetopizoun pithanoteta phulakises eos kai trion etonakribos epeide xerei oti an ebaze pkh kapoion argure metsou e libatheno e kati tetoio tha xesekonontan kumata aganakteses pou den tha mporouse meta na ta mazepsei me tipotaakoma kalutera na askholethoun me ta sobarotata problemata pou ekhei to diko tous magazi kai na aphesoun ta upoloipa magazia pou to kathena dinei ton agona tou gia na meinei zontanoekhei pano apo eide phrouton kai lakhanikon biologikes georgias eno ta proionta pou ekhei sta raphia tou einai eite biologika eite philika pros to periballonkata ta loipa to keimeno apotelei akompse kai kakotekhne surraphe protaseon apo diakeruxeis tou prosphatou kai apoterou parelthontoslogos gia ton makre pou kletheke na uperetesei ten stratiotike tou theteia kai ton kosmide o opoios epathe upotrope sto palio tou trauma kai tha meinei ektos drases giu arketo diastemaidios upogrammise oti tha uparxei dialogos gia to thema ton sugkhoneuseon kai kai oi apophaseis tha lephthoun otan eimaste bebaioi oti to apotelesma tha einai kalutero apo auto pou einai semeralogos gia ta aderphia spuro kai antone grulle ton giorgo barnaba kai ton gianne phliatekai se megalo bathmo paternalistikeprotos skorer gia ten ellenike omada o mpourouses pou me tous pontous pou semeiose ekane kai prosopiko rekor me ten ethnike omadaanalogisteite poia tha einai ta prosopa pou tha stelekhosoun to topiko sumboulio sto melanios gia paradeigma autous tous problematismous eisprattei kaneis kathe phora pou e suzetese peristrephetai guro apo ten epharmoge tou skhediou kallikratesan tou bgei e ole istoria tote oi metokhes tou tha aneboun kai o rolos tou dipla ston prothupourgo tha anabathmisteitheleis na phoreseis kapoia stigme te phanela ten andrikes omadas tes autos einai o stokhos mou kai douleuo kathemerina gia na ton pragmatopoieso einai to oneiro mousemera tha ginei alle mia proponese sto gepedo tou khoriou kathos dokimazontai kai kapoioi paiktes pou an ikanopoiesoun tha apoktethounantithetos sto kath emas epikheireitai kathe phora semera me to akatanoeto metro tes sulloges pases phuseos apodeixeon e peraitero periploke tou ede grapheiokratikou kai daidalodous phorologikou meto ergo ekhei proupologismo euro kai sten teleutaia tes sunedriase e nomarkhiake epitrope anedeixe ton anadokho tousten epomene klerose tes pemptes e kategoria tha plerosei eurome to phobo omos ton kairikon sunthekon kurio kharakteristiko ton opoion einai oi iskhuroi anemoi kai oi entones brokhoptoseis zoun apo kai arketoi esperidoparagogoi euelpistontas se allage ton kairikon phainomenon ekphrazontas phobous gia te phetine paragogeupnos se aute te phase onomazetai paradoxos epeide eno o egkephalos mas brisketai se skhedon plere egregorse to soma mas paramenei se bathia khalarose phasesto metaxu se exelixe einai kai ependutika skhedia gia ton eksugkhronismo tou mekhanologikou exoplismou tes uphistamenes monadas tes etairias upsous ekatommurion drakhmonsenario skenothesia mousikeanapheroume me ekplexe giati stis proeklogikes sas upokhreoseis milousate gia auxese tou arithmou ton phulakonson mpatier apo tous khiouston rokets stous memphis gkrizlis oi rokets peran os antallagma ton khasim thampit kai ena mellontiko ntraphtpik protou guroualla tha kuklophoresoun tote epeide kathusterese e anaptuxe tous alla epeide oi ekdotes tous ta kratoun gia argoteraidios sumplerose pantos apo monos tou te gnoste paroimia peri metaxoton esoroukhon eno ekleise ton problematismo gia te diereunese upopsephion me te diapistose pos ennoeitai oti proupothese einai na se thelei opoios tou khtupeseis ten portaoi men lene oti ta sumbolaia tous se periptose lok aout ginontai anenerga kai aplos prepei na epistrepsoun molis lexei to lok aout oi de pos mono oi free agents ekhoun to dikaioma na metakomisoun se protathlema alles epeirougi auto diakerussoume oti eimaste apophasismenoi na sunekhisoume ton agona enantia sten israeline katokheto nomiko kathestos tou pio istorikou phorea tes poles tha prostateutei diabebaiose o epikephales tes demotikes parataxes larisaion polis pou bretheke khthes sta grapheia tes sunodeuomenos apo upopsephious tou sunduasmou tousoste khrese ten katallele stigme den eblapse kanenanpsukhraimia ton ergazomenon sten kataskenose kai e egkaire epembase tes purosbestikes uperesias apesobesan ta kheiroterabasiles tsartas sebileb kategoria takes gkonias sportigk xikhonb kategoria baggeles kruos theoutag kategoriaden einai tukhaio oti to teleutaio diastema paizoun arketa sto metagraphiko pazari ta onomata ton melmpergk kai montestode lesmonoun akome tis ekatontades anatheseis tis rousphetologikes epidoseis kai ten upobathmise tou kurous tou demou alla kai ten anuparxia ousiastikou ergouta apodeiktika katatheseos ton pio pano metokhon opos kai ta tukhon eggrapha plerexousiotetas tha prepei na katatethoun sta grapheia tes etairias pente plereis toulakhiston emeres prin apo ten emeromenia sunedriases tes genikes suneleusesuparkhoun kai demoi oi opoioi entassontai me duo domes sto neo programma e sunergazomenoi idios oi koinotetes metaxu tous e demoi me koinotetesste sunekheia to logo pere o giorgos paraskhos pou tonise tipota den pege kala aphou para ton eunoiko anemo pou eikhame sto proto meros brethekame na khanoume meenopoiemenos kuklos ergasion anelthe se disapogoeteutekame khasame to stokho mas te diathese maskai poio einai to gnorisma ton phronimon oti me te sophrosune enosan ten eleemosune kosmesan ten parthenia me ten eupoiiaeutukhos sto paixame kala kai to mono pou m eukharistei einai oti katapherame na gurisoume mia diaphora pontonopos diapistonoun kharakteristika oi phetines ekptoseis einai san na men xekinesan potegiati exousia khoris bia ego den eida kai isos kai den uparkheiokhi uperbainei to tou na to katebazei peripou kata dispros to paron tha meinoume edo alla tha skephtoume kai ta philika proponetes epanelabe khthes oti e nike mas epi tes daphnes etan spoudaia eno tora spesial menou ekplexeti sumbainei omos sten pragmatikoteta anaboun polu prin ten ora tous kai sbenoun polu argamoirasteke to entupo gia ten prostasia ton khion katanaloton prokeimenou na prostateuontai apo authairesies kai paraloges timesoi protes plerophories anapheroun oti endekhomenos na ekhei skhese me problema ugeiaskoulmase mas taxideuei makria apo ton psukhanagkasmo mias stroggules kibdeles oraiopoiesesoi proslephthentes tha upograpsoun sumbaseis ergasias idiotikou dikaiou orismenou khronou diarkeias eos menon gia ten kalupse ton epokhikon anagkon tou organismouton prothupourgo upodekhtekan peripou atoma me therma kheirokrotemata eno o demarkhos nikephoros lamprinos ekane mia suntome parousiase tes anaptuxiakes prospatheias sten periokhe kai sten anagke kurios sten panida olon ton eidon psariaalbertes omos den phainontan eukharistemenos me mia toso mikrese meiose kata sent tou phorou katanaloses sto petrelaio thermanses apophasise na prokhoresei to upourgeio oikonomikon logo tes sunekhizomenes anodou pou parousiazei e time tou petrelaiou stis diethneis agoresanapheromenos ston kosmo tou are eipe mou ekhoun pei oti oi philathloi tou are agapoun garides ste saltsa anakatoste kai apheste tes na kruosounto tha epilexei to neo arkhego anamesa se antipterarkhous kai upopterarkhous aphou o semerinos arkhegos antipterarkhos demetres lintzerakos
