apoteloun mia apo tis pio akribes poleis tes elladassumbolaia mellontikes ekpleroses epi metokhon diakinethekan sumbolaia axias ekatena sugkhrono paramuthi me philosophike diastase mia panemorphe istoria agapesathoonei ton eauto tou anadromikapos mporei kapoios pou douleuei gia na epibiosei khoris idiaiteres dexiotetes na khrematodotei tautokhrona spoudes upselou epipedou ara e eleutheria tes bouleses einai e eleutheria pou ekhei kai o phulakismenos mesa sto proaulio mias phulakesares eikhe exarkhes prosdiorisei os basiko metagraphiko stokho ten apoktese epithetikou periokhes me ephese sto skorarisma ostoso e dustokia pou paratereitai ston entopismo enos paikte pou tha mporouse na kanei te diaphora odegei ton sake tsiole seki auto gia emas einai to diabaterio oste kai se ethniko kai se europaiko epipedo na diasphalisoume ta dikaiomata masdemos amariou me edra ton phourphoura apoteloumenos apo tous demous a subritou kai b koureton oi opoioi katargountaito programma ton ekdeloseon perilambanei to ergasteri theatrou tou demou erakleiou tha parousiasei to dromeno giortine mera basismeno stis bakkhes tou euripide stis to bradu sten plateia meintani ton anogeionekhoun exaphanistei oi xenoi agorastes kai den einai kai ligoi ekeinoi pou eite ekhoun poulesei eite anazetoun agoraste stis agores ton periokhon tes khalkidikes kai ton khanionanaptukhtheke tekhnologia skhediases ploion meso elektronikon upologistondemotike arkhe kataggellei eutheos ten antipoliteuse pos me tis gnostes laspologies tes epikheirei na apokomisei mikropolitika ophele me kurio stokho ten apoluse ergazomenon gia tous opoious dethen endiapherontaieinai arketoi autoi pou erkhontai exo apo ten porta tou kunokomeiou gia na aphesoun ena adespoto zoo pou brekan sto dromo kai ethelan na to prostatepsounten ikanopoiese basikon koinonikon dikaiomaton diadekhtekan ta allepallela khtupemata tes laikes bases me te litoteta ten anergia kai te phtokheia ton pollon pou sumporeuontai me ten pronomiake metakheirise ton oligonsuria toulakhiston nekroi kata te diarkeia diadeloseon pente atoma anamesa tous duo paidia elikias kai eton ekhasan ten zoe tous kai alloi treis traumatistekan sten gampagempeinai kharakteristiko oti o agios nikolaos diathetei sunolika deka okto galazies semaies pososto rekor aphou kanenas allos demos s oloklere te khora den diathetei antistoikho arithmosta eisodemata perikoptontai me ten elastikopoiese ton ergasiakon skheseon ten katargese epidomaton sto demosio kai ten auxese tes parakrateses phorou apo ton ioulioten perasmene periodo prote omada anadeikhtheke e anagennese geras me deutere aute ton basilikon kai trite ton odussea elutenomizo oti einai kairos na uposteiloume ten authadeia ten idioteleia an stoikheiodos sunergastoume kai prosanatolisoume epimona to koino pros ta ideodeta leitourgika exoda tou epimorphotikou ergasteriou kaluptontai apo to somateio oi philoi tou khiotikou khoriou kai anerkhontai peripou stis euro etesiospio sugkekrimena kai sumphona me tis logistikes katastaseis o kuklos ergasion diamorphotheke stis disdedomenou oti oi proboles ginontai ektos oikias kalo tha einai na epilexete ena asurmato sustema oste na apophugete ta polla kalodiapheme tou khoriou ekane ton guro tou kosmou kai arketoi eponumoi ephoplistes skenothetes logotekhnes mousikoi khoreutes arkhisan na ten episkeptontai sustematikaperiphereia omos anagnorizontas ten anagkaioteta tou anazetese luse kai proothese ten entaxe tou gia khremadotese apo tis orizonties draseis tou theseakaterina ksekalou epistrephontas sta patria epistrateuse to demiourgiko meraki tes kai to kalo tes goustoalloste to petit palais pou mas daneizei tous thesaurous tou khtisteke gia te diethne ekthese tou parisiou tou e opoia eikhe os epikentro ten ar noubo te nea tekhne tes kalaisthesiasthese tes amerikanikes pleuras einai oti e airbus europaike koinopraxia sten opoia summetekhoun e bretania e gallia e germania kai e ispania eunoetheke apo ten eniskhuse upsous dismazi mas kai e marisumphona me auta exi stous deka neous tes khoras mas pou zoun akome me tous goneis tous epikalountai os kuria aitia ten oikonomike krisestis nomarkhies stis opoies delosate oti thelete na exetasteite me ten aitese summetokhe sas ston diagonismo se autes tha proselthete kata ten emera tou diagonismoualetheia poso duskolo einai na eisai proen podsphairistes tes ountineze tes latsio tes gioubentous kai tes ethnikes italias kai oloi na se ekhoun xekhasei kai na askholountai me ten arraboniastikia sou to sugkekrimeno marturio pernaeianaphertheke ste sunekheia sten epistole pou katethese e kinese koinon dodekanesion pou proteinei na metapherthoun sto palio nosokomeio tmemata tou panepistemiou aigaioudiethneis agores kai khrematisteria epistemonikes ereunes kai meletes teleutaies eideseis sten kategoria epistemetekhnologia tourkia tha exoplisei ta skholeia tes me tampletes ekatommuria diamantia krubontai ste phloga tou keriou eketsi tha skhematisoun kapoia apopse gia to bathmo tes etoimotetas tou paidiou tous na apodekhtei aute ten empeiriaanastopoulos anazeta ena paikte gia te these aute kai o piousel tha perasei apo to mikroskopio touarkhaioelleniko onoma ethele gia te mellousa baphtistera tou o elias psinakes kai oi koumparoi den tou khalasan khaterioi giorgos barkares giorgos mammas kai ntinos triantaphullos kai phusika den apephugan kai ton peirasmo na kanoun kai tis dikes tous problepseis gia tis ekloges tes kuriakesmegalutere auxese se proslepseis parousiazetai stis touristikes periokhes opos oi kuklades ta dodekanesa ta ionia nesia e krete e khalkidike kai genikotera oi poleis pou ekhoun touristike anaptuxemalista anephere ena prosphato paradeigma oti aphese tou opadous tou erakle na diamarturethoun khoris problema ekhontas malista ena pano metron pou egraphebazete te gemise kai aradiazete apo pano ta karamelomena khrusomelaalla to psema ekhei konta podiamikrotere apo oles etan e apergiake sugkentrose pou diorganose to nomarkhiako tmema tes mprosta apo to demotiko theatro tes mutilenessunolika gia to trekhon etos prosdokontai enopoiemena kerde ekapantes delonoun oti tha palepsoun mekhri telous gia ta plei oph arkhes genomenes apo to paikhnidi tes kuriakes me ton panserraikoparallela ta proionta tha proballontai se eidikes ektheseis kai ekdeloseis entos kai ektos elladas pou epises tha diorganosei e epitropediethnes mesos kharakterise megalo stokho ten prokrise stous omilous omos paradekhtheke oti to ergo tou panathenaikou tha einai polu duskolo kathos oi antipaloi proerkhontai apo megala protathlemataanalutika e delose tou giorgou malle gia logous epaggelmatikous alla kai ethikous den mporo pleon na prosphero tis uperesies mou sten omada pou toso polu agapesa apo to posto tou genikou arkhegouparousia aute tou kosmou edose ten aphorme ston upopsephio nomarkhe dodekanesou basile upselante na kanei logo gia bebaie nike tes dodekanesiakes enotikes kineses sto nomo anatrepontas katestemenes domes kai polukhresimopoiemena prosopasterizoume emprakta ton ethelontismo to nosokomeio tes beroias episkephteke to proi tes tetartes oktobriou e upopsephia demarkhos beroias kharoula ousoultzoglougeorgiade sunodeia dekadon upopsephion tes sumpoliteiasektos pia ki an o idios anexartetos apotelesmatos tes bases arkhisei tis karatomeseisto gegonos oti parola auta diabazontai stathera apo polu kosmo eikosi khronia tora den semainei mono kataxiose tou suggraphea tous alla einai ki ena paregoro semadi gia osous agapoun ten kale logotekhniaden etan pantos ligoi oi episkeptes pou ethelan na enemerothoun skhetika me tis epiptoseis pou endekhomena mporei na uparxoun sten touristike kinese exaitias tou paralogou polemou pou sunekhizetai ste giougkoslabiadustukhos den dunametha emeis oi ekhontes ten euthune gia to istoriko touto idruma pou uparkhei pro ex aionon na kanomen kati perissotero gia te phulaxe touto ideologiko tes stigma oi protropes tes o logos pou tha arthrosei oi endokoinoniakes prostribes kai e elektrismene atmosphaira pou tha prokalesei os melos tes meionotetas tha me enokhlesoun polusphodre sugkrouse eikhe san apotelesma ton traumatismo ton duo piloton tous opoious entopisan andres tes purosbestikes uperesias kai ste sunekheia metapherthekan me souper pouma se nosokomeioousiastika xekiname apo to martio aprilio kai stamatame sta tele noembriouston khairetismo tou o proedros tou k soteres stamos eukharistese kai sunekhare therma tous athletes gia tis epidoseis pou petukhan ten agonistike khronia pou peraseme entelos kourasmeno uphos pairnei paramaskhala ton agio petro kai tou exegei ela pio konta na me mas akounto eipe alloste xekathara o k khiones exetazei to endekhomenokathorismos tes seiras ekloges egine me mustike psephophoria arga khthes to bradu upo ten proedria tou neou proedrou k patrik kox kai ta apotelesmata anakoinothekan semera to proiperusi to periptero tou panepistemiou episkephthekan peripou atoma phoitetes kai goneis alla kai ekprosopoi etaireion aphou polla apo ta ekthemata einai proionta biotekhnologias kai prepei na proothethounsuzeteseis egkardies epaphes mazi tous alla kai idees pou sas dinoun sas xemplokarounphainetai eualote kai neotere apo ten elikia teseite braduazei eite pheggei ta trokhaia sumptoma tes koinonikes arrostias mas diabasame kai akousame polla autes tis meres gia ta trokhaia atukhemata tis aities pou ta prokaloun kai ta metra gia ten antimetopise tousgnome tha kuklophoresei ten alle pemptekategorei to gia laspologia kai tautise me ergolabika sumpheronta ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous kategorei to gia laspologia kai tautise me ergolabika sumpheronta alla kamia apantese gia to ethiko merosna me khasoun te douleia tous oi anthropoi alla na allaxoun these douleuontas ekei pou khreiazontai kai leipoun upalleloi kai opoios de thelei exo apo ten paragka kai khoris apozemioseparaphonia sto europaiko metopo kata tes endekhomenes anadiathroses e slobaka prothupourgos ibaka rantikoba e opoia delose ten deutera oti khoris ten anadiarthrose kamia boetheia pros ten ellada den tha einai eparkesmalista o teleutaios tha askei kathekonta dieuthunonta sumboulou os melos tou kai tha ekhei kai dikaioma psephouexoterika o den diapherei idiaitera apo ton prokatokho tou ton perusino polu kalo uiothetontas tis adres spartiatikes grammes tou deuterou to mauro mat khroma kai tonenas atophios sumpages realismos diapotizei kathe selida mazi me enan xekhoristo glukopikro lurismo pou aiphnidiazei eukharistaneos khrestes eggraphesundese me ta phetina oskar n apekhoun ligotero apo duo ebdomades etoimasame ena aphieroma stis tainies pou ekhoun phugei me ta perissotera khrusa agalmatidia apo to kodak theater sto parelthonlampros liabas upographei ten istorike mousike ereuna kathos kai te diaskeue ton keimenonapophaseis tha parthoun pithanotata ten epomene ebdomada an kai kapoioi uposterizoun oti mekhri ten kuriake tha ekhei xekatharisei to themasunthete kai eugenike mute me orima aromata phragkostaphulou kai ntomatas se sunduasmo me marmelada damaskenou kanela zampon kai prasino piperidemarkhos theorei oti den mporei na ekhei ten idia baruteta e apopse tou demou e tes nomarkhias me te these enos sullogou e enos politeekhontas ena megalo pleonektema se skhese me tous arkhaious ten tekhnologia pou antikathista tous doulousena tetoio programma tha mporouse na ulopoiethei apo to tameio parakatathekon kai daneion me eidike ruthmise dedomenou ton periorismon lambanontas upopse oti to trapezitiko sustema ekhei skhedon kleisei te roe parokhes daneionoson aphora te dakhtulia tou mourinio sto mati tou bilanoba o ispanikos tupos problepei baria kampana gia ton portogalo tekhniko apo eos kai agonistikes sten exedraproblepseis gia to semerino apotelesma tha prepei na theorountai parakinduneumenes kai pio polu kinountai sto epipedo ton prosdokionduskola tha xanaepanalephthei kati analogokheirourgos manoles mpantoubas upogrammizei protisto idaniko einai o sugkretismos e arrages psukhike pneumatike kai ethnike enotes ton kretonto kastro tes lerou onomazetai kai kastro tes panagias e kastro tou panteliouopos dieukrinise o k kappherer ste germania uparkhoun dunatotetes gia na eniskhuthei e reustoteta ton epikheireseon kathos eidikes ependutikes trapezes sta diaphora kratidia khoregoun reustotha aphene rodies pano mounomarkhes athoose liape kai souphlia enokhoi gia to aerodromio oi uperesies kai to ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous nomarkhes athoose liape kai souphliaste sunekheia ta mele tes apostoles metebesan sto agrotiko iatreio tou nesiou opou paredosan pharmakeutiko uliko prosphora tou pharmakeutikou sullogou kilkis kai tes etaireias menidi medicaaitese anagnorises plasmatikou khronou mporei na upoblethei opotedepote ostoso gnostes tou sustematos episemainoun oti den uparkhei logos na ginei mesa sto ean den katokhuronetai dikaioma suntaxes sto trekhon etosomoiostase einai e armonike isorropia somatike kai psukhike pou ekhei ena anthropino onstekei semera timetika kai sumbolika ston peribolo tou ellenikou koinobouliouto endiapheron me ten politike aute exelixe einai oti sundeetai me ten anadeixe ton skandalon se ena apo ta pio kairia zetemata tes politikes skenes kai se koruphaio stoikheio politikes diakheirisesta oikonomika tes omadas einai se adiexodo kai mono mia gennaia auxese metokhikou kephalaiou mporei na sosei kapos ten katastase gia ton skhediasmo tes epomenes sezondustukhos tha paralaboume kai metaphorika kai kuriolektika kamene ge upogrammise o k khatzes kai katelexe legontas oti apo tis septembriou to pianei douleia gia ten anagennese tes khorasgiannes kontelles graphei gia to khthes o teles asproloupos gia to semera kai e eustratia asomatianou gia to khthes kai to semerato anoixiatiko touto manitari se ola ta bouna to gnorizoun ton tumphresto ten kalliakouda te khelidona kai sta oreina tes eurutanias opou to lene arnaki e kokoretsismari khrestos papagiannakes genkai etan anamenomeno na pei auto aphou oi epembaseis den proanaggellontai kai epises gia pollous allous logous den endeiknuntaizestainoume se katsarola to elaiolado sotaroume to kremmudi gia leptooi magkrempinoi katephthasan sta khronia tou eno to tous diadekhthekan oi asiates kai oi aphrikanoikai edo omos iskhuoun oi idies epiphulaxeis kai ta idia enallaktika senaria pou ekphrasame gia ton geniko deikteos suntaktes tou pheretai mia musteriodes akrostoikhida e opoia sten pragmatikoteta einai ena apo ta uperesiaka pseudonuma testora poso aiphnidiastike etan e sugkekrimene episkepse apo ten stigme pou eikhe enemerothei o dieuthuntes tou topikou upographei to khthesino deltio pros ta kalontas ta se mesemeriane sunenteuxe tupou duskolo na to krinei kaneisdeutere nike tou sto protathlema thelei na petukhei o ergoteles kai na dosei eggueseis stous philathlous tou oti ekhei upselous stokhous phetosepharmostikos nomos arthra tou opoiou psephistekan kai apo te pege telikastis pao gia psonialogoi loipon demosiou sumpherontos kai diaphaneias epebalan te lepse skhetikes apophasesennoei eimaste kaluteroi apo auto kai mas axizei kati kaluteroemeis uposterizoume te sunuparxe demosionomikes dikaiosunes kai ten euaisthesia sten antimetopise ton problematon tes upaithrou prosthese o k semitesopos eipe o k zoides exakolouthei kai diaterei mia epiphulaxe akoma dikhos na einai bebaios kai khoris na mporei na ekhei saphe apopse gia to an kai kata poson mporei akoma na sothei e katastaseeite braduazei eite pheggei demarkhe xiou euergeteste ten pole to arthro auto demosieutheke prin enan akribos khronosugkekrimena oi katatheseis noikokurion kai etaireion sta tele tes proegoumenes khronias anerkhontan se disste sunenteuxe tupou pou parakhorese mazi me ton ouggro prothupourgo biktor ormpan o kinezos prothupourgos apephuge na dieukrinisei to upsos ton kratikon omologon pou protithetai na agorasei to pekinooi tzoureph xrusaphes kai kekits sunduazontai apsoga kai o teleutaios me sout petukhainei tophainetai oti o k almpanopoulos breke ena euphoro edaphos gia na kalliergesei ten oikologike diakheirise ton aporrimmatonphotographos alexandros grupares ekthetei seira photographion pano se xulo sten aithousa ekdeloseon tou bibliopoleiou papurospolloi tous kategoresan gi auto para polloiapopse pos oi goneis anatrephoun ta paidia tous khresimopoiontas banauses methodous khoris na to antilambanontai dunamitizei merikes apo tis bebaiotetes tou dutikou kosmou pou theorei ton eauto tou os prostate tes paidikes elikiasme ten sumplerose ton khronon tous tha upographoun pentaetes sumbolaio stis omades pou tous anedeixan kai den tha mporoun na phugoun anenokhletoi sto exoterikoas aphesoume omos t asteia pou einai exokhos tragikase idiaitero uphos zeta apo ten poleodomia na dienergesei amesa autopsia pros diapistose tes orthotetas e me ton kataggellomenon kai tha probei se loipes energeies sumphona me tis armodiotetes tes kai ten poleodomike nomothesiaoute edosan plerophories gia osous exanagkastoun se paraiteseispetros sterizetai kurios stis prosopikes tou empeiries antlei omos kai apo ta arkheia ton diplomatikon uperesion tou kratous mia tetoia uperesia etan to scrinium barbarorumekei kathe idea peri apolutou kalou dialuetai ta philarakia khanoun semantiko meros apo ten uperphusike tous akhlu kai metatrepontai upainiktika se sugkhronous kamikazito luriko theatro litheou politistiko sumbolo tes barkelones antiprosopeutike ekphrase tes philodoxes kai anesukhes epikheirematikes tes taxes egkainiasteke to ston axona ton ramplas sto istoriko kentro tes poles phot lagoilloapo to proto misaoro katektese o pianistas demetres sgouros tous philomousous sten premiera tou mousikou phestibal tou niouport stis iouliouden xero ti gnome ekhoun gi auto oi glossologoidike mas pantos e idiotike khreokopia ekhei arkhisei edo kai menesopos einai gnosto e egesia tou upourgeiou ergasias tha oloklerosei ton proto kuklo epaphon gia ten apaskholese me te sunantese me tous emporous methaurio deuterastis khores tous epiballoun kai autoi sklera metra erkhomenoi antimetopoi me ten orge tou kosmou omos sten khora mas ta oria ekhoun xeperasteista nea tou grapheia sten odo lebenou ste theriso metaphertheke to upokatastema tousten europaike enose petame olo kai perissotera aporrimmata kathe khronoena phlitzani ospria dinei peripou grkai mia nea kainourgia epokhetha einai e tonose tes agoras gia na mporesoume pia na pame se mia anaptuxe mia anaptuxe me tomes mia prasine anaptuxe gia na ekhoume plouto perissotero ste khoraopos eikhe grapsei to to komma tes axiomatikes antipoliteuses etan ekeino pou xekinese proto tis demoskopeseis prokeimenou na aphougkrastei tis diatheseis tes koines gnomes sto boreio aigaio prin apophasisei gia upopsephiotetestrite augoustou parateinetai mekhri iouliou e dunatoteta entaxes ton ktenotrophikon monadon ste diadikasia exaireses apo katedaphiseto gkol tou de kataphere na sunekhisei ta thetika apotelesuata e doxa ueta to polu spoudaio diplo uesa sta leukogeiamono to proegoumeno etos oi suriakes dunameis asphaleias sunelaban upopta mele touapantese diadromos autos den mporei na khresimopoiethei gia megala aeroplanatelos me to ensomatomeno logismiko intellistudio mporeite na sundetheite me opoiondepote upologiste meso gia na probalete na epexergasteite kai na moirasteite tis anamneseis saskata kairous e estiase tis kampanies tes sta ekastote zetemata aikhmesauxese kata parousiase o enopoiemenos kuklos ergasion tes etaireias upseles tekhnologias plerophorike sto enneameno tou se sugkrise me to antistoikho diastema touto katastema eikhe kataskeuastei me elenit kai eikhe xuline ependuse stous toikhousmoby prospathese kai mallon ta kataphere kala kaluptontas kata kapoio tropo to keno ena megalo meros tou koinou omos prosephuge sten arkhe prostasias tou katanalote zetontas ta khremata tou pisotetoiou eidous antidraseis sto telos atonoun kai den endunamonoun to demokratiko kinema eipe o k koubeleskathoristiko stoikheio gia ton agona etan kai e diaphora sta rimpaount kathos eikhame perissoteraagora endiapheretai gia poikilies pou ekhoun sugkekrimena kharakteristika megale paragoge omorpho karpo me antokhe stis kakoukhies ton metakineseoneinai plousia se bitamine pou boetha ste diaterese tes sphrigelotetas kai tes elastikotetas tes epidermidasagonia mou gia ten anaptuxe me poioteta periballontike euaisthesia kai eukairies gia tous neousste diadikasia aute e prosphuge sta sumbola tou nazistikou parelthontos sunista ten anamenomene diekdikese mias istorikes sunekheias kai einai lathos na ermeneuetai os kinese upagoreumene apo tis paranoikes emmones kapoion ametanoeton stagonidionopos anapheretai se semerino demosieuma tes isotimias stelekhe tou upourgeiou uposterizoun oti to thesmiko plaisio anatheses ton demosion ergon tha allaxei kathos demiourgei problemata sten poioteta kai ton khrono paradoses touskai ola auta eno e khara koutrolou den einai agnoste se mas dedomenou oti edo kai merika khronia sunergazetai me ten ephemerida empros taktika me arthra skhetika me te diatropheomos sumphona me ton idio e eikona tes dioikesesdiakheirises ton koinon sto demo lesbou emphanizetai pragmati anesukhetikese ntermpi me tragike diaitesia kalopoulos o olumpiakos proegetheke me gkol ophsaint tou metroglouten perimena kalutere gia na eimai eilikrineston sto pekino tzeims saser ephuge khthes to proi apo ten presbeia opou eikhe parameinei epi tesseris emeres egklobismenos apo kinezous diadelotes pou diamarturontan gia ton bombardismo tes kinezikes presbeias sto beligradisunduasmos tou ensomatomenou kalummatos organon kai tes kentrikes sustoikhias me tous trisdiastatous upseles poiotetas metallikous tonous prosdidei ten eikona piloterioutha prepei na semeiothei oti e ergatike estia tous diemenuse apo ten arkhe oti den uparkhoun khremata gia nees proslepseis ostoso tous uposkhetheke oti tha kaluphthoun ta kena me apospaseissten partizan o nikola pekobits tetarte augoustou epestrepse sten partizan o nikola pekobitsoi ekdoseis sto ameso mellon tha ekdosoun to ergo tou brabeuthentos suggraphea analambanontas ten oikonomike epikhoregese tou ergou ex olokleroukai pantos etsi den mporei na apokaluphthei e aletheia pou oloi gnorizounsto metaxu tis tesseris teleutaies emeres perissoteres apo mikrou megethous seismikes doneseis ekhoun katagraphei me epikentro ton upothalassio khoro tou riou opos delose sto o seismologos ereunetes tou geodunamikou institoutou mikhales gkanasdeutera noembriou me apophaseis tou anotatou dikastikou sumbouliou politikes kai poinikes dikaiosunes metatethekan sta giannina e k panagiota gkogkou proedros protodikon kai o eustme leptoteta kai prosekhontas kathe lexe tou o tekhnikos tou ophh eipe ten apopse tou prepei na prosekho ti leopantos perasan kati parapano apo kala aphou oi kinezoi tous eikhan me brexei kai me staxeiepomenos stathmos ta roustika to khorio ton grammaton me ten opse mikres politeias opou uparkhei kai to mouseio roustikon melathron me ten plousia sulloge apo paradosiakes endumasiesapo ena skirtema tes logikesme to periekhomeno na einai de akome periorismeno alloi kataskeuastes prolaban na ensomatosoun se montela tous mekhanismo metatropes eikonas se alloi okhinostima kreatika se plousies merides serbirei e pitta tou pappou sto makru gialokholesterine einai lipidioenopoiemenos kuklos ergasion anelthe sta ekatkinetopoieseis xekinoun kai oi giatroi tou se panelladikes epanalambanomenes kinetopoieseis pou tha xekinesoun apo aurio trite kai tha diarkesoun eos kai ten paraskeue phebrouariou prokhoroun kai oi giatroi toualloste to kostos tes eptaemeres ekdromes apo lemno gia ispania einai molis euro perissotera ana mathete ap oti to antistoikho tes penthemeres gia krete pou etan e deutere epiloge ton mathetonto periekhomeno kai oi protaseis tes meletes parousiastekan khthes sto hrakleio sta plaisia ekdeloses me titlo kritikes proseggiseis sten ekpaideutike metarruthmise pou organose e hrakleiouomorphia tou okeanou to megaleio tes phuses e idiaiteroteta enos topiou pou diamorphotheke apo ten proaionia duname ton kumaton sas apokaluptetai mesa apo ena odoiporiko khiliometronkata ten exetase tou tritou ek ton menuton o sunegoros uperaspises baggeles gkigkilines katethese aitese exaireses kata tes proedrou tou dikasteriousunaulia tha kleisei opos arkhise me motsart to kontserto gia phlaouto kai arpa se apodose gia mikro sunolo tha kleisei to kukloprepei na lekhthei oti os to to odiko diktuo tes khoras perielambane dromous sunolikes ektaseos khilstoma gennaiodoro me oxuteta pou to isorropei kai tou dinei skeleto dikhos na kuriarkhei exasphalizontas tou drosere epigeuseethnikos poietes tes agglias kai o megaluteros dramatourgos meta ten arkhaioteta theoreitai mia apo tis koruphaies morphes tes pagkosmias logotekhniasapo te mia erkhetai e empeiria kai e ikanoteta kai apo ten alle e phreskada kai e dipsaston elladokupriako khoro to kalutero ergo parousiase e khrusa gkanoude mathetria tes taxes tou gumnasiou komotenesan erthei protase tha phugei ston olumpiako theoroun polu khresimo ton melmpergk alla sigoura o markano allazei ta dedomena se auto to themamesa stous epomenous duo menes anamenetai na kaluphthoun oles oi periokhes tes larisas me ten topothetese kadoneidika sto nomo ioanninon semeionetai pos e eikona para to genikotero arnetiko klima tes agoras paramenei me thetiko prosemo kai auto exaitias duo basikon parametronoi apories tou ta metaphusika tou endiapheronta etan tetoia pou polles phores me problematizanparallela xekatharisteke oti den tithetai thema nomimotetas tes parembases tes demotikes uperesias aphou e skhetike euthune anekei sto demoki auto giati e pleres proetoimasia mias prosphoras apaitouse perissotero khrono apo auton pou eikhe ste diathese tesluseis se tetoiou eidous themata dinoun oi epistemones stous opoious e demotike arkhe ekhei apolute empistosuneste biologike georgia antitheta sunekhizoun na khresimopoiountai kai idiaitera stis europaikes khores me paradose ste biokalliergeiata seminaria auta aphoroun kai ton epaggelmatia kai to biotekhne alla kai olous tous kretikous kathos tha prepei na uparxei enemerose gia to themapempte noembriou perissotera apo dis euro tha diatethoun mekhri telos tou gia ekatontades erga sten upaithro sto plaisio tou epikheiresiakou programmatos alexandros mpaltatzes sumphona me ton upourgo agrotikes anaptuxes skandalidealla den stekei os politike protase meta tis iouliouapophugete skholia eis baros triton kai krateste khamelous tonousbeltiose ekhei parousiasei kai e anakuklose ton elastikon apo khilste metamonterna istorike aphegese e aristera sunista ena adiaireto kai diakhroniko sunomotiko morphoma me elakhistes aneu semasias posotikes diaphoropoieseis stis egklematikes praktikes touperissotero apo ola to endekhomeno na men paixei e omada tes magnesias sto europa league kathos to endekhomeno auto einai oratosunergasia metaxu ton enomenon politeion kai tes europaikes enoses kathos epises kai e dimeres sunergasia me tis khores sten periokhe tha apoteloun basiko paragonta gia ten exaleipse tou periballontos pou uposterizei toena allo stoikheio pou khreiazetai prosokhe einai to an tha uparkhei diplos correcting code gia asphale metaphora dedomenonto gegonos auto se sunduasmo me ten auxese tes paragoges opsimon staphulion einai dunato na odegesei se meiose tes paragoges tou mesoproimou staphuliou pou antimetopizei megale emporike krise ta teleutaia khroniasten krete to sta dodekanesa to ste khiomutilene skhedon tosumphona me ton idio ekhei ede oloklerothei o proupologismos tous kai kaluptontai me ton kalutero dunato tropo oi anagkes ton paidion pou philoxenountai stous stathmous kai o autoskopos einai na parekhetai oso to dunato pio poiotiko epipedo uperesionotan ta pera sta kheria mou kai eida kai auta pou eikhe kanei m emas phaneke oti den uperkhe kamia proodosse metrio tapsaki stronoume ton kima se lepte strose kai apo pano aplonoume ton poure patatasas kanoume ta paralia tes epeirou paradeigmasuntaktes khrusoula samouridou paraskeue augoustou paraskeue augoustou me laiko glenti ntopious paradosiakous mezedes tsipouro kai krasi sunekhizontai apopse stis ta gnaphala sto souphliekdelose gia ten ethnike giorte tes gallias teleutaia enemerose tetarte iouliou me kathe episemoteta tha eortastei aurio iouliou ste leskhe axiomatikon thessalonikes e ethnike giorte tes galliasekpaideuse ton katanaloton me epikoinoniaka menumata ta opoia na sundeoun ta philika pros to periballon kharakteristika tou proiontos me ten axia kai ta ophele pou anazetoun oi katanalotes pkallikrates einai ena oraio alla duskolo egkheiremametaxu auton pou aphethesan eleutheroi einai tailandoi sumphona me ten idia pegemuthos se mesomakroprothesmo epipedo ekhei proupologisei ependuseis upsous ekatneos khrestes eggraphesundese stis ekloges tes martiou gia ten anadeixe ton organon dioikeses tes enoses upallelon tou kratikou therapeuteriou kentrou ugeias lerou psephisan ergazomenoimas perisseuoun tora khremata gia proeklogikes aphises eklogika kentra kai psephodeltiakai poia einai semera e sugkhrone einai akribos e aristera ton kinematonopos leei e kalliergeia tou kathe dentrou tou stoikhise oute ligo oute polu me base ten time pou ekhei to ladi o idios leei to kerdos apo to ladi den uparkhei piaekatontades mplouzakia kai alla eide enduses gnoston etaireion ta opoia omos etan apomimeseis entopistekan apo klimakio tes eidikes uperesias elegkhon proen se apotheke kai se spiti rodite epikheirematia o opoios anazeteitaikapoioi kurios elikiomenoi logo ton puknon kapnon monasteraki apo ten arkhe akolouthouse ste uakhe tes anodou etan skhetika konta kai ten katallele stigue petukhe to na parei ton titloto paketo tou real time strategy paikhnidiou xekina me to campaign perikoptontai oi kategories ton misthomaton me base tis elikies ton ploionto idio dikasterio epeballe se akome enan tourko diakinete poine phulakises eton kai exi menon kai khrematiko prostimo briskei tis noties sporades se polu kalutere moira apo ta perasmename molis ekattrite augoustou suskepse gia to thema tes sarakenas pragmatopoietheke meta apo prosklese ton sullogon mantamadioton kleioton kai kapioton athenas se sunergasia me tous topikous phoreis kai te demotike arkhe mantamadoumono sten exokhe murizeapo ta stoikheia tou upourgeiou oikonomikon prokuptei oti apo tis arkhes tou ta programmata spoudon perissoteron apo ta misa tmemata kai orismena malista ephamilla tes aristeias opos anapheretai kharakteristika sten ektheseto programma me tis ores tou kathe epimorphote koinobouliou akoma kai kapoioi khiliades upselomisthoi pou pairnete misthous pou bgazoun matito duo khronia meta te lexe tou emphuliou e apographe apeikonizei arketa kathara te metapolemike antiparathese agorastou gerakoudeidios malista prin phugei zetese na prospheroun osoi to epithumoun anti gia stephani oikonomike eniskhuse sto sullogo me to nou panta sto egkheirema pou eikhe xupnese meta apo khronia kai apeilei na tinaxei ston aera tis enaeries sugkoinonies sten europeemeis os epaggelmatike taxe me terasties leitourgikes upokhreoseis den mporoume na akolouthesoume aute ten khamele timologiake politike pou thigei tis epikheireseis masmporei kai nea anethikakai den phtanei pou erkhontai khoria alla den mpainoun kan ston kopo na gnoristoun gia paikhnidi kai phlert panegurika ten proteuousa tes agkolezikes diekdikontas daphnes gia ten katallele ekpaideuse kai plerophorese tes koines gnomes ton pou epetrepse ton anempodisto exoplismo teskathe prospatheia
