tsakiste stis esoterikes philonikies sto komma sasden einai e kupros pou krinetai stis dekembrioukathos kai tis skhetikes ektheseis tou dioiketikou sumbouliou kai tou orkotou elegkte logiste gia te sugkekrimene khresekategoria arthrou khrematisterio me apoleies anoixe ten prote ebdomada tou augoustou e khrematisteriake agora para to thetiko anoigma os apotelesma tou anodikou klimatos stis diethneis agores pou prokalese e sumphonia gia to khreos stisapo pantou o phainetai pos pere psephoussto metaxu o ernesto balberde eipe pos den thelei oi peiraiotes na dosoun philika mats me adunames omades opos eikhan kanei prin apo duo khronia eikhame kanei duo philika paikhnidia sto zeephelnteimai opos kai polloi alloi anesukhos gia ten exelixe sten europe kai to euro tonizei se delose tou sten bild kanontas logo gia phantasioseiskathe mera sullambanontai ellenes kai xenoi me posotetes narkotikonsunekhizetai aptoeto to trafficing para ta osa legontai se athena kai bruxelleserotatai e epitrope uporei na dieukrinisei ti seuainei ue kriterio ta elakhista apaitouuena uesa diabioses poia akribos uetra tha parthoun gia na exoikonouethoun ekauto tha ekane tis apostaseis megaluteres gia tous polites pou tha khreiastei na khanoun perissotero khronoippon apaiteitai gia te these kheiriste mekhanematondiabaste opos akribos tuponontai tha te doume pithanotata ton ianouario epeita apo arketes anaboles sto lansarisma tesarkouse graphei o philip mure na topothetesei o anthropos tous apodiopompaious tragous tou ton khitler kai ton stalin sto parelthon aphairontas etsi apo to paron tou kathe esoterike apeile kathe dike tou kai mono dike tou zone skiasede apo ten prote stigme ekhoume enemerosei to upourgeio agrotikes anaptuxes gia ta problemata diexagoges tou programmatos tes dakoktonias tonizontas ten anagke idiaiteres antimetopises tou dakou sten krete logo ton idiaiteron klimatologikon sunthekongenikos deiktes timon ekleise stis monades semeionontas anodo se posostoauto iskhuei stis perissoteres khoresas kanoume kati epitelousolumpionikes kai pagkosmia protathletria tes kopelasias amesos meta te nea tes epitukhia milese ston kai ten ekpompe sportathletes gia tis duskolies pou antimetopise kai tous epomenous stokhous tesakome kai an den mas endiapherei prosopika an noiothoume oti to politiko sustema einai agkulomeno einai xeno pros emas pros te philosophia mas te stase zoes mas ten koultoura mastha perimene malista kaneis pos e epomene mera meta ten exodo tes apo ton emeron egkleismo tes se kat oikon periorismo tha ten ebriske toulakhiston skeptomene se oti aphora ten kariera tesgi auto apophasisa na sunekhiso aphilokerdos kai na brisko luseis sta oikonomika themata pou proekuptanstis exedres tou gepedou tou toreon boreia tou mexikou otan sto tou agona santos monarkas akoustekan xaphnika purobolismoi kai o kosmos entromos kruphteke kato apo ta kathismata gia na prophulakhtheieinai oneiro na katharisei auto to pragma thumamai ena peristatiko to otan emoun proedros tes kai enas anthropos pou einai polutautokhrona ependuoun sten anaptuxe neon katastematon se periokhes pou den ekhoun parousia me emphase sten eparkhiak bounatsos anephere malista oti tha kratethoun oi duo ores apo to mistho oson adikaiologetos apousiazan apo te these touseidikotera semeionetai pos eggegrammenoi anergoi delosan oti den anazetoun ergasiaeinai problemata toulakhiston giati oudeis askholetheke sobara me auta sten periokhe masoi arithmoi ta skhemata oi idiotetes alla kai oi nees idees einai ta ulika tou oikodomematos tou eukleidese prote phase ektimetheke oti apaiteitai enemerose gia to ti einai aute e protoboulia poioi einai oi skopoi kai oi stokhoi tesneoteros ek ton sullephthenton einai enas o opoios eikhe analabei na pragmatopoiei test dieisduses na elegkhei delade tis pragmatikes pithanotetes epitukhous ekteleses ton skhediazomenon elektronikon epitheseonton brekame ekei sten plateia me tis mouries sten taberna touepipleon einai polu pithano na doume megales anatropes sto programma kathos to mpakhalo tou aphenei pollous neous agrotes khoris tis diathesimes ektaseisepistole sunekhizei os exes dioti dustukhos auto kaloumaste na uperetesoume toraolumpiakos den semainei ekhei paratesei teleios ten upothese estrada ton opoio tha ethele o balberdeste sunekheia boethame tous goneis me sumbouleutike uposteriktike akoma kai psukhotherapeia gia ole ka koilade episemainei oti to psemma to uperboliko psemma me ten pathologike ekphrase pou mporei na balei sto paidi ten tampela tou pseutesten idia seira kuklophoroun ta biblia ta zoa tou agroktematos ta ploiata zoa tou dasousta mustika tou nerouta zoa tes sabanasta dentra tou kepou zesto kruoto pos tha sugkrotethoun oi periphereiakes autodioikeseis kai na oi semerines periphereies tha meinoun os ekhoun einai epises anoikhto themaeikhame episemanei ki emeis apo polu noris alla na pou to episemainoun kai alloi gia tou logou to alethesoi podelates kai oi podelatisses ekanan to guro tes poles kai eginan aisthetoi apo tous odegous pou brethekan sto dromo tousbelgos tekhnikos paredose ston steno sunergate tou giorgou khristobasile mia lista me paiktes pou o idios ekhei entopisei apo ten agora tes patridas tou kai theorei pos mporei na antapexelthoun stis apaiteseis tou agiax tes epeiroukharakterise lathos tes tourkias na antimetopizei ten prooptike aute me phobo kai apeilesdelade opos elege o agglos istorikos alan teilor euathe apo ta lathe tou parelthontos pos na kanei nea lathemakes khabos tha dosei repo ten kuriake eno oi paiktes tha proponethoun kanonika semera emera ethnikes epeteiou kai aurio stis to proi stis athletikes egkatastaseis tou giorgou lola ste sourotesto metaxu semera ste mia to mesemeri sto sunedriako kentro tes politeias sto phrontzo tha ginei e parousiase ton upopsephion bouleuton tou kinematos sto nomo ioanninonantones triphulles apo ta nea prepei na prokhoresei se rizospastikes kineseiskhariste stous philous e se autous pou stokheuete na kanete philous ta pio aromatika ta pio prototupa ta pio ophelima dora pou peran poteaithousa sunedrion tou omereiou gemise kata te diarkeia tes sunedriases tou nomarkhiakou sumbouliou apodeiknuontas an me ti allo oti oso odeuoume pros tis ekloges uparkhei mia kalutere suspeiroseprosthese pos ta skhedia tes italias gia te phorologike metarruthmise sterountai exeidikeuses kai leptomereionagriada e cynodon dactylon mporei na pollaplasiastei me treis tropous gia na sigourepsei ten diaionise tes me sporous me rizomata me upergeious stolonessumphona me to neo nomoepomenos me tous metsobites ekho ariste skhese kai kathe phora pou episkeptomai to metsobo to phkharistiemai idiaitera esto ki an ta teleutaia duomise khronia trabexa tes psukhes mou ton tarakhoapo ekeine te stigme kaneis bebaia den emathe ti apegineparapleures apoleies pou den tha eprepe na sumbainoun kathos ta koina delphinia den apoteloun problema gia ton anthropo e ten paraktia alieia kai protimoun sunethos ta bathia nera makria apo tis aktesdikaie moirasia stis serres me ton gepedoukho panserraiko na anadeiknuetai isopalos kontra ston panionio se agona pou egine sto plaisio tes agonistikes tou protathlematos tes souper ligkasto geitoniko torno ekhoun sematodotethei epta monopatia pougia tis periokhes pou parousiazoun idiaiterotetes oson aphora sto idioktesiako kathestos tous psemera omos ta pragmata ekhoun allaxei o kosmos ekhei gurisei ten plate sto palioeinai prodelo oti o erntogan meta kai tis ekloges tes iouniou ekhei eniskhutheikai prospathousan kurios me ta kharismata ton prosopon tous na kanoun ton potho pio upokeimeniko pio prosopiko kai monimose merikes megales epikheireseis auta ta aula stoikheia kaluptoun akome kai to tes phemes tousarnetike paramenei e biomekhanike paragoge sten eurozone surriknotheke gia trito sunekhomeno mena ton iounio e biomekhanike paragoge sten eurozone ex aitias tes ormetikes koursas tou petrelaiou pou anebase tis times se nea epipedarekorastunomikoi tes proetoimazontai gia apostoleotan pega sto programma sten athena ta pio polla paidia me rotousan ti paizetai me ta tsirotato tameio tha einai koino gia ola ta proiontasten komotene o palios nomarkhes zeses mpekos kai tora makhomenos dikegoroskai bebaia einai na aporei kaneis me tis epiloges masoraia idea gia ten epomene episkepse mas ste samooi zographies eikhan ektethei sto antiratsistiko phestibalporneia einai paranome sto iran mia khora pou kubernatai me to gramma tou islamikou nomou sariatora analambanei to fkh te duskole apostole na demiourgesei ena progephuroma gia ten infiniti sten europaike agora stokheuontas kurios stous dunamei pelates ton polutelon spor opos einai e rorsche cayenne kai eekhoume omos ten upokhreose na men parablepsoume ten prokheiroteta sten opoia odegese ten kubernese to sunekhes agkhos tes na apodeixei oti den uparkhei tromokratiakinetopoieseis pragmatopoiethekan kai sta nesia tou ioniouean emastan ston omilo tes kroatias tha eikhame kalutere tukheeulogo to erotema pos kai den emeine sten amerike opou o kinematographos apotelei te baria biomekhanianeos khrestes eggraphesundese paramenei stratiotes stis taxeis tes ten apophase tou na apokhoresei apo ten energo politike zoe gnostopoiese ston prothupourgo o uphupourgos esoterikon demosias dioikeses k apokentroses apostolos andreoulakosetan ede exairetikos nomikos apo oso malista gnorizo diakritheke stis kratikes exetaseis kai tha mporouse na ginei lampros dikegorosbebaia to kata matthaion euaggelio tou pazolini den opheilei ten antokhe tou mono sten istorike politike katagoge ton problematismon toutha suzetesoume gia antallage paketou metokhon me tetoio tropo oste kai oi duo etairies na men kinduneusoun apo opoiondepote pou tha ethele na paixei se baros maskonta s autes tis omades kai o poseidonas pou phainetai na anakamptei kathos kerdise kai ton opham meproedros tou sunetairismou mantamadou kai melos tou tou panagiotes stamates mas eipe ektimo oti prothese tes kuberneses einai na prokhoresei se biaies epilogessugkhoneuse enopoiese kai anadiorganose ton phoreon organismos apaskholeses ergatikou dunamikouneos khrestes eggraphesundese istorike eukairia didetai me to nomoskhedio kallikrates gia ten egkatastase tes edras tes periphereias aigaiou ste rododemos limnes plastera me edra to morphobouni apoteloumenos apo tous demous a nebropoles agraphon kai b plastera oi opoioi katargountaiapo kei na xekinesei loipon o giorgos kai oloi tha ton akolouthesoumediapseuse ton uperpatrioton molis metanastes kai omogeneis pou zoun ki ergazontai sto nomo ioanninon tha mpoun gia prote phora sto paraban gia na psephisoun stis autodioiketikes ekloges tou noembriountounta apo to xekinema tou agona edose egetiko rolo ston milos teontositsto skhop exetase ek neou to zetema kai me apophase tou idiou os nomarkhe ioanninon egkritheke e leitourgia tou prateriou alla me tous idious orous delade me dasmous pou iskhuoun gia ola ta prateria pou leitourgoun sten ellenike epikrateiati sas ekane na ginete ethopoios te rotametha sunantethoun kai pos tha antidrasoun tha poun kalemera kai ola auta meta tis baries kategories pou ekhoun antallaxei eite oi idioi eite ta stelekhe touskategoria arthrou khrematisterio sunedriase asanser se tziro times psukhologia kai prosdokies opou oi diarroes kai ta proskhedia apo tis bruxelles pou eblepan to phos tes demosiotetas diamorphonan klima kai diatheseismas perimenei pantos ena duskolo protathlema kai ola ta paikhnidia tha einai duskola aphou polles omades ekhoun eniskhutheitrite augoustou graphei manoles lagoutares marinos orphanos kai e megalutere metagraphe olon ton epokhon gia to lesbiako mas podosphairo einai gegonosxthes o periphereiarkhes basiles balasopoulos anakoinose stous demarkhous ta okhemata pou o kathe demos tha mporei na parei kai na khresimopoieseietsi tha to eukharistethoume oloi kai tha apallagoume apo to agkhos na theloume na eimaste me tous euporouseimai kai eimai eton tha mporousa na paro meros ston diagonismo ton eidikon phrouron kai an ekho kapoio ophelos sten elikia epeide eimai ethelontes pentaetous uperesiasoi prooptikes theloun to philodoxo project na olokleronetai suntoma me te demiourgia khorou ektheseon kai sunaulion mikron emporikon katastematon ki enos epipleon estiatoriououos den te gnorisa den prolaba na te dotragoudontas sephere kai kabaphe alla kai elute poludoure anagnostake gkana oi kallitekhnes upodekhontai to koino ste sunaulia pou diorganonei o sundesmos aiguptioton elladoseinai kharakteristiko oti apo to mistho tou genikou dieuthunte tou exartatai kai to upsos tes amoibes ton upoloipon dieuthunton tou aerodromiou oi opoioi anerkhontai seten apantese sto poioi einai autoi den einai e dike mou armodioteta na to popsephous eno apeikhan metokhes psephonoi endiapheromenoi prepei na upobaloun dokimio eos lexeis epilegontas apo ta themata pou uparkhounoi kk mikhelakes kai tasoulas upobathmizan ten ole katastase epimenontas oti oi tomearkhes den askesan kritike sten egesia tesoi ekdeloseis koruphonontai anemera tes thliberes epeteiou tou olokautomatos tou marturikou khoriouuparkhoun para polla kala mouseiaamphoreis kuklophoroun apo kheri se kheri mazi me diaphora kopsidiaeinai aphonos o arkhiepiskopos sumplerosekseroun oi me proskeimenoi demarkhoi sto khoro mas kathos kai oi proskeimenoi bebaia oti to programma theseas edose diplasious porous apo to antistoikho kai eukharistoun demosios ton periphereiarkhe gia ten suneisphora touoi polites se pososto theoroun oti o prothupourgos giorgos papandreou kineitai ste soste kateuthunse gia na bgei e khora apo ten krise sumphona me te demoskopese tes gia to proto themakai osoi ek ton katekhonton theseis kai axiomata den mporoun na sugkhronistoun na parakhoresoun te these tous se neoterousmonadike odos e phuge me ten astunomia kai ton pragmatiko dolophono enan misthophoro ton eidikon dunameonsto katopi toumpeka sto amartolo kat auton diadiktuo na do ti graphei gia to prophil touta lionoume prosektika kai aphou ta perasoume apo psilo souroteri ta bazoume sto siphonitrite augoustou klephtes kai oi uperaspistes tou men ermeneuontas tous kanones tes nomo kratouses politeias o de antimetopizontas tous idious kanones apo ten pleura tes ekklesiastikes dikaiosunes se sunduasmo me tous ierous kanonesme ton tropo auto oi adistaktoi kakopoioi thelesan na ton timoresoun gia ten paranome skhese pou diaterouse me pantremene gunaikateinete to auti n akousete tous ekhous tes nukhtas tes uouruoureta kai kelarusuata te lura tou apollona kai ten kithara tou kantadorouan den eksugkhronistoun den tha ekhoume kamia allageentassetai de sten genikotere philosophia gia uperesies kai proionta epeirotika pou kharakterizontai apo upsele poioteta kai epeirotike tautotetasta skhedon khronia leitourgias tou idrumatos ekatontades koritsia pou tha eikhan katalexei logo ton kakon oikogeneiakon sunthekon tous sto dromo kai ten kathe eidous ekmetalleuse megalosan me asphaleia sten estiasemera tha xekinesoun kai oi protes ektimeseis gia tis zemies aphou ekhoun kaei khiliades elaiodentra kalliergeies me diaphora dentra poimniostasia me zoa kai melissiaparallela o mesaionas tha pherei ton sunduasmo tou komikou me to tromaktiko to gkrotesko sto kentro tes koultouras touse auto boethese to gegonos oti ekho polles summetokhes sten kerkuraphainetai pos o olumpiakos prepei na dekhthei protos gkol gia na parei mprosta e mekhane toulibertade einai e nea aphixe pou prosphata mpeke sten platphorma ton epoque eotelsdiabaste opos akribos tuponontai epanemphanise tes olivetti ston khoro ton polumekhanematon sten ellenike agora einai mia apo tis pio eukharistes exelixeis ton teleutaion etonegkataleipo to koinoboulio an kai einai baria euthune na eimai bouleutes autes tes poles kai malista protos se staurous protimeses me te akribos giati thelo na prosphero se aute ten pole me oles mou tis dunameistou phote aggoule ton opoio para ta khronia pou perasan thumomaste panta me agapeprin xekinesoume gia psonia prepei na programmatisoume tis agores mas sumphona me tis pragmatikes mas anagkesbelgos tha perasei kai nea test prokeimenou o giannes samaras na skhematisei pio olokleromene gnomesummeteikhan perissotera apo atoma me pano tumpana kai palaistiniakes semaiesden xeroume an kapote uparxei ena tetoio sustematha iskhuristo te diakhronike ekmetalleuse ton ierarkhon se baros ton aplon khristianon mesa apo tis prosphores ton opoion apoktetheke aute e periousiaprothupourgos tonise ten upsiste semasia tes epharmoges ton nomon kai okhi aplos tes psephises tous oste na apokatastathei e empistosune ton politon stous thesmousepomenos pou einai e upokhreotikoteta ton sunergasion matthaiakes upokhreotikoteta me ten ennoia an ektimethei oti enas demos den mporei monos tou na askesei kapoies apo tis armodiotetes pou problepei e nomothesiakoimountai mprosta sto magazi me ten mpoukala to poto sto kherimulonogiannes neoellenike logotekhnia sta teleutaia eikosi khronia makedonikes etkai mia kai aresoun kai se mas e mousike kai o khoros tha apantesoume sto mousikologo tes kentrikes exousias pou mas apeilei ton k laliote delade megia emas etan to proto diethnes tournoua me idiaitera megalo antagonismomosialos kai dieukrinise oti e kubernese den thelei na epibalei sugkekrimene atzenta alla ola ta zetemata einai anoikhta kai prepei na suzetethoun se anoikhtes koinobouleutikes diadikasiessigoura pantos tous krataei se mia skertsozike egregorseste mia aithousa tou anakainismenou kteriakou sugkrotematos ekhei metapherthei kai stegazetai ede to ekklesiastiko mouseio kourounion me ta erga tou megalou buzantinou agiographou giorgou panagiotakedustukhos tosa khronia meta suneidetopoio oti sten ellada den allaxe tipotabebaia ektimeseis kanane giati oute o leuteres einai se these na gnorizei to ti telika tha apophasisthei stou maximouprepei loipon na sas po oti aprilio maio gia paradeigma to ton mikron epikheireseon poulane me drakhmes te dianuktereuse oti akribos iskhuei ton septembre kai ton oktobreergoteles einai kalutere omada ki ekhei tis dunatotetes na parei ton titlotha phanei an thelete na parameinounapo ten koruphe tou tha apolausete ten ekplektike theati allo niothete oti sas eniskhuei sten prospatheia sas ma e oikogeneia mou o suzugos mou kai oi philoikhoris skhedio kai programmatismo dianoixe tes touristikes diodou apo kai pros boulgaria mono arnetika ekhei epiphereiorismos nomikou ekprosopou gia ten exetase agoges tou k athanasiou tatse kata ten proen kerkurasneonakes alla oloi sumphonesan oti apophaseis tha lephthoun meta to paskhamallon tha proegethei to kleisimo tes thessalonikesto gegonos auto prokalei megale anesukhia se ola ta tmemata tes israelines politikes taxesten paraskeue maiou meta to kleisimo ton ergasion tou kha ora tha anakoinosei e emporike trapeza ta oikonomika apotelesmata tou protou trimenoupisteuo oti an oloi anagnorizoume to rolo tou kathenos ta oria kai tis dunatotetes tou tote mporoume na sunergasthoume kai arketa pragmata na apopheukhthoun e kai na leitourgesoume kaluteratetarte augoustou suzeta to programma tou ektenes suzetese gia to programma tou kai ten eklogike tou diakeruxe en opsei ton euroeklogon egine te deutera to bradu se aithousa xenodokheiou ste mutilenetelos ekkremei o orismos sumbouliou gia te diakheirise tes marinas kathos kai gia ten astike etaireia pou tha demiourgesei o demosmesa apo aute te glaphure kai epistemonika steree melete o anagnostes anakaluptei poso sukhna e koinonia epistrateuei to parelthon kai ten istoria gia na exuperetesei to paron kai na skhediasei to mellonoso gia to panepistemio semeiose oti otan xekinese to tmema oikonomias pote den tetheke thema upodomon kai oti eno ste sunekheia zetesan tm tora arkountai staargotera ginetai anaptuxe tes krises soste aphomoiose tes ules kai gnose ton ennoion se bathosploutos kai e perephania ton ioanninon einai e diakhronike osmose anthropon kai politismonperipou eikosi ap auta ta kanonia briskontai se leitourgia kai demiourgoun thorubo proi kai bradu olo to eikositetraoromarion katalegei einai san ton mparak ompama mauros amerikanos alla me europaiko aerapisteuo omos oti sunekhizontas ston idio ruthmo tha aneboume arketa skalia kai tha kataktesoume sto telos mia upsele thesedustukhos sunekhizei ta egkainia eginan alla e marina paramenei ermetika kleiste kai mera me te mera phtheiretai kai katastrephetai meros tou exoplismou tesperissoteres plerophories sto telephono kmetokhike sunthese tou omilou einai e akolouthe anekei sto galliko demosio anekei se upallelous tou omilou kai to upoloipo pososto metokhon se idiotes meso tou khrematisterioukeita exetise ten timoria tes protes apo tis duo agonistikes pou ekhei alla tha paixei me ton ophe aphou te deutere agonistike tha ten ektisei me ton panthrakikopos ta skephtetai sten praxe ola auta se skhese me to depethe serron stokhos mou einai na epilexoume ena repertorio pou tha einai elkustiko gia to neaniko koinoapophase tes kuberneses pantos na katargesei to aphorologeto gia kerde apo ton kratiko tzogo prokalese te dusareskeia xenon kai egkhorion ependuton kai semantikes poleseis ston titloerotetheis o antiperiphereiarkhes k ph karalides gia auten ten epiloge kai ten emmese egkataleipse ton giorton tou nestou apantese oti prepei na uposterikhthoun kai oi paraliesphusiologiko kai autonoeto o tade kai o deina epikheirematias na steilei kapoio poso ste e sto alla kai sta mikrotera kommatamnemonio sunergasias metaxu kai romgaz mnemonio sunergasias me te roumanike etaireia phusikou aeriou romgaz upegrapse prosphata e sto medias tes roumaniasauto pou menei einai na to epharmoseime to khruso kai sto pagkosmio tou alla kai sten olumpiada tes atlanta ten idia khronia ginetai enas apo tous pio petukhemenous istioploous olon ton epokhongia to ophsaint gkol tou panathenaikou kai te diaitesia tonise saphos ki aisthanesai adikia ekeine te stigmeprepei na xeroun osoi epikheiroun pote me ta mustria kai ta kheria gemata laspe pote me tis maures tis mpogies na lasposoun e na maurisoun mia eikona pou den einai etsi den tha mporesoun na to kanoun autoprothupourgos parakolouthese kai ena suntomo binteo me tis epikheiresiakes draseis tou kentrou kai kurios ton tropo pou edrase kata tis purkagies pou perasmenou kalokairioukairos athena pem aug epta kuriake oktobriou zeteitai pseutes gia peraiose tou khrestou siaphkou chsiafkoseneteides khtes e ti egine mpala den ekhei tetoiasten epomene sunodo tou sto parisi se duo menes anamenetai na sugkekrimenopoiethei o katalogos ton oikonomikon deikton pou tha khresimopoiountai gia ten diadikasia auteuparkhoun omos ki alles prosphores gia perissoteres plerophories sta telepises anaphertheke ste dunatoteta prootheses tes krouazieras kai sten apeleutherose tes aktoploias me base ten europaike nomothesiasunedriase xekinese me ten agora na dekhetai neous iskhurous kradasmous kai o deiktes upokhorese eos to epipedo ton monadon katagraphontas megale ptose eos kaiuperesia onomazetai prophanos digital comics kai tha xekinesei te leitourgia tes tous epomenous menes stis kai se megales europaikes khores gia ten ellada den ekhoume akome epibebaiose alla gia ton proto kairo den einai polu pithanoystera arkhisan na kataphthanoun sto spiti enemerotika phulladia kai ephemerides gia te drasterioteta tes organosesneos khrestes eggraphesundese ereunes gia ton entopismo andra ta ikhne tou opoiou exaphanistekan apo ten paraskeue sten periokhe ton prespon sto nomo phlorinas dienergoun e astunomia kai e purosbestike uperesia tes periokhessten eisodo tes uparkhei mia gualine protheke e opoia upodeiknuei to meros opou sphenotheke e moiraia sphairaparadosiake bradia me thema te giorte tou ephtazumou diorganonei apopse o morphotikos kai exoraistikos sullogos kastamonitsas diaterontas ta ethe ethima kai tis paradoseis tou topou masto oti paizo skenotheto ki ekho oles tis euthunes tes paragoges kai tou theatrou einai agonasse olous kala xristougennaaisthese prokalese e delose tou proedrou tou takhudromikou tamieuteriou k kleona papadopoulou skhetika me to rolo ton trapezon ego semera tha xemprostiaso tis trapezesto to sunolo ton misthologikon parokhon mono gia ten kentrike kubernese delade khoris tous phoreis tou euruterou demosiou tomea kai tous etan ekatneognon ton nosokomeion tou nomou ioanninon proothei to upourgeio ugeiasmoiazei san na eulogese to nesi o dias giati ton philoxenese ap ta mikrata tou kai kerna aplokhera to ekhei tou se ntopious ki episkeptesopos mas exegei oi sullektes kataskeuazontai apo alouminio exoteriko periblema kai monose apo ualobambaka platestelekhe tes egkhorias agoras skholiazontas tis semerines exelixeis epesemanan oti kanena apo ta basika makrooikonomika dedomena tes ellenikes oikonomias den dikaiologei ten eikona pou emphanise semera e agoraoi upoloipoi neoapoktethentes kai me den ekhoun polles empeiries alla oloi euelpistoun gia ten ekplexe apo tis eukairies pou tha tous dothoun kai phusika na bgoun oi metagraphesto mono pou kataphere o etan na meiosei sto proto lepto ton kathustereseon me apeutheias korner tou kharokopouetan loipon mia anagkaia tainiame ten proseggise aute diaphonei o alekos koutsoukales uposterizontas pos o pouliopoulos den ekane kako sto komma logo tes entones prosopikotetas tou alla logo tou entonou mikroastismou tou prote dekaetia tou snekros einai enas andras peripou eton o opoios pisteuetai oti einai metanastes apo to pakistan anephereargotera de metreseis me anthraka apedeixan pos o ebans eikhe dikio kai pos ta mnemeia tes maltas khtistekan prin apo tis puramides tes aiguptou kai kata sunepeia e anegerse tous den opheiletai se epirroe e eisbole laon ex anatolesparaleipomena stis anamneseis tsatsou kai mallon atona perase phetos e martiou sto demosio kai teleoptiko mas logoan e trapeza katapherei na diplasiasei to pososto auto polla apo ta oikonomika tes problemata tha xeperastounsunolika mekhri ten martiou tha ekhoun dothei sten kuklophoria khlm tes attikes odouoi ergazomenoi prosanatolizontai se klimakose ton kinetopoieseon ean den ikanopoiethoun ta aitemata tousmia parallage suntages tes delia smith pou kanei tis uperokhes ekpompes mageirikes sto grmia pros mia oles oi proegoumenes ektimeseis apo tous phosteres ton imperialistikon organismon mazi kai tes kuberneses gia ten amblunse tes krises kai ton ekdeloseon tes diapseudontai patagodoseinai adunaton na xekhasoume ten eugeneia kai ten kalosune iaponon epistemonon pou brethekan sto aigio to liges meres meta ton diko mas katastrophiko seismo apestalmenoi tes khoras tous gia na katagrapsoun to phainomenokinematographos den emeine adiaphoros apenanti toutrite augoustou tekhnes psukhagogia ekdeloseis mathemata europaikou oriental kai latin khorou pragmatopoiei to tmema khorou tou phom kathe deutera kai tetartemolis sto o staurakakes anoixe to dromo gia ten epikratesesunolike axia ton sunallagon diamorphotheke sta ekatoi aleuromuloi akmazoun kathos to eisagomeno aleuri ekhei upselous dasmouskhthes e anakoinose epises ten sterixe tes sto georgio dalla gia to demo philiatonskholiase kai ten parousia tou montesto montesto einai paiktes pou mporei na mas boethesei poluna kanoun na dosoun suntaxeis merikous aiones kai meta blepoumekai otan einai na soseis mia katastase dikaiologeitai to psema na pou phtasame me to lephta uparkhounauto pantos den phainetai na semainei kaisten ntokoumenta tou kasel to sto binteo the arc of ascent to toxo tes anabases tes idias khronias se othone m parakolouthesame mia phigoura se exairetika arge kinese na buthizetai sto mauro nero mias photismenes pisinasksekhnaei te tsiggounia tou kai ton anelee tropo me ton opoio periphrourouse ton ereunetiko khrono touekho phtasei sto semeio na pisteuo pos e apokruptographese tou diskou den einai apiasto oneiroto sunthema pou epikratese ektote etan tes biosimes anaptuxes tha kanoume anaptuxe na me blaptei to periballontou petrou sumboulos kai me ektelestiko melosthanatos kai oi apoleies ton basanizoun alla ton stoikheionei o erotas giati to mono pou menei sto telos einai e agapepantos emeis tha tous protimousame me mia belona pleximatos sta kheria para me ntouphekiakai ekhei kai mia diaugeia pneumatostaxidi me gnostous erakleiotes lesbos einai ena uperokho nesi me ateleiote poikilia topion apo pukno peukodasos mekhri seleniakes eremiesethelontismos einai megale axia se mia koinonia pou to elleimma tou koinonikou kratous einai emphanestato eno e alleleggue kai philanthropia einai sta oria tou medenos me elakhistes mono exaireseispolloi philoi tou briskontan ekei gia na diaskedasoun mazi tou epiphulassontas tou malista kai pollesgiorgos papageorgiou silbio gios tou ntottore lomparntioson aphora te sugkrotese se soma aute tha ginei ten alle ebdomada khoris omos na ekhei oristei akoma e akribes emeromeniaoi praktikes autes einai katakritees ap olous kai de sunadoun me ten koinonike euaisthesia pou tha prepei na deikhnei o kathe demos pros tous polites touetan malista ena apo ta polla eukharisto pou eipe ston upourgo eukharistontas ton akoma kai gia osa tha k kakhrimanes upoklinetai se ekeinous pou sten ousia lene pos den prokeitai na ginei to ergo skholiase kaustika o k khatzeephraimidesden thelo na po polla tha po mono osa niothopros ten kateuthunse aute epharmosteke programma ethelousias apokhoreses prosopikou kai khoregethekan apo ten agrotike trapeza tes ellados ta anagkaia kephalaia gia te sunekhise tes leitourgias teseno den einai antithete ste demiourgia tameiou anergias nautikon de thelei bebaia na akousei tipota peri katargeses tes upokhreotikes epandroses ton ploionose ora e kritike tou dieuthunte etan genikologe kai strephotan kata olon ton dioikeseon tes etaireias e pleura tes antipoliteuses den ekane kammia parembaseskopos tou programmatos etan e aposundese tes meletes ton meionotikon e ligotero omiloumenon glosson apo to baros kai tis epiplokes pou demiourgei e politike kai mono proseggise tou thematospame loipon na doume tis protaseis masse upsela epipeda diateretheke kai semera o ogkos ton sunallagonoi suntheseis ton omadon kherta berolinou kraphtautos o mulos einai ena kosmema gia ten periokheto ergo theoreitai diakhroniko keimeno tes europaikes philosophikes ekpaideutikes ideologikes kai politikes koultourassumboules gia to spiti philenewscom luse gia esoroukha khoris mikrobia den einai alle para e soste pluseneo sullaleterio diamarturias gia to nosokomeio tes ierapetras pragmatopoioun aurio tetarte stis e ora to proi sten kentrike plateia tes ierapetras polites kai ekprosopoi phoreon prokeimenou na kateuthunthoun ste sunekheia sto erakleiostous anerkhontai ta thumata tou iou tes neas gripes ste khora mas kathos akome pente atoma ekhasan te zoe tous mesa se ena apo epiplokes tes gripesden uparkhei logos panikoukolokuthia gemista me ruzi makaronada tou psara me mudia kai garides khtapodi krasato ka epises mporeite na phate sten taberna noules telton agona auton tha ton doso mazi me tous sunadelphous bouleutes kai mazi me oles tis zontanes dunameis tou topou masdustukhos aute e eikona diadramatizetai sta perissotera magazia lianikes poleses trophimon se mia pole san to sidneu me ellenespegaino sto ntaegkou me thetike energeia kai me oplo ten epidose mou takurabasilike eto e eunoemene tou alenomarkhes omos epelexe auton ton tropo kai etsi tha brethoume antimetopoi duo phoreis oi opoioi einai thesmothetemenoi apo ten politeia kai tagmenoi na sunergazontaitherma sugkhareteria stous tesseris diakrithentes athletes tou esteile e periphereiarkhes epeirou demanakaluptei prote kai metapherei stis anagnostries auta pou tha suzetethoun kai e bathia gnose tes gia te moda eniskhuoun to monadiko tes rolo os politistikou barometrouta polla logia einai phtokheia aderphia mou alla eidika edo ston oso briskomai ego den uparkhei periptose na ginei to paramikro pou tha mporouse na demiourgesei problema sten omada masstokhos autes tes protoboulias e probole tou nesiou etsi oste na ginoun perissotero gnosta ta semantikotera axiotheata toupoliteia prepei apo ten pleura tes na diasphalizei ten euruthme leitourgia tes agoras kai ten omale roe tes epibatikes kineses apo kai pros ta semeia eisodou exodou tes khoras mas kai kata ten paramone ton touriston se aute katalegei ok kotsiphakes semeiose akome oti den prokeitai na uparxei kanena problema apo te diathese ton epexergasmenon lumaton ston potamo episemainontas tautokhrona oti kati analogo sumbainei kai sta ioanninaeto den eikhe agonisthei ston proegoumeno guro kai etan xekourastosupenthumizetai oti pleon ekhei austeropoiethei e nomothesia skhetika me tis proslepseis se nosokomeia kai oi upopsephioi prepei na einai idiaitera prosektikoi sten epiloge ton theseonetan phanero oti o proen proedros ton eruthroleukon den eikhe kamia prothese na prospherei sterixe sto nun aphentiko tes apo oti blepo o kurios marinakes einai mplegmenosnea pantos epokhe perikopon kai skleres litotetas pou lansaroun e mia meta ten alle oi europaikes kuberneseis phernei mazi tes kai ena klima anasphaleias kai phobou stous katanalotesmonadike ekklesia s ole te lesbo aphieromene sten analepse tou khristou einai ste mone leimonos san parekklesisilbio mperlouskoni eikhe zetesei apo tous italous kurios sto milano alla kai ten napole opou etan paron sten teleutaia proeklogike sugkentrose na deixoun me ten psepho tous oti e kubernese einai iskhureathenaios podosphairistes apo to perasmeno kalokairi ekhei meinei eleutheros apo te larisa alla den breke omada gia na sunekhisei ten kariera tousumphona me ten teleutaia enemerose tou oi nekroi ephtasan tous me atoma na noseleuontai se monades entatikes therapeiasas aphesoume te nootropia tes aneuthunotetassugkinemenoi oi krites khares khristopoulos biku kagia khristophoros kotentos kai tzene mpalatsinou anakoinosan ste seraina oti einai to next top model kai ten proetrepsan na anoixei ta phtera tes aphou ten perimenei mia lampre kariera sto exoterikoaoantrikala tzakhales kastorias loleskatsoulas tsakirides serron aigaleoapollon phinokaliotes athenas blakhosstaurou phlorakes phokidassto non paper pou dieneime stous bouleutes tes e axiomatike antipoliteuse episunapse apospasma ton sumperasmaton tes ektaktes sunodou koruphes tes iouliou sugkekrimena tou arthrou opos katagrapheke sta agglika kai opos metaphrasteke sta ellenikaplateia kapodistriou sta philiatra kai to phlorentianes tekhnotropias sintribani tou einai kharakteristiko oti e paralia ailagoudes sten kuparissia brabeuetai kathe khrono me te galazia semaiaapo to semerino agona tha apousiasoun kai oi traumaties sakabeles taousianes uparkhei pithanoteta na einai etoimos ten kuriake o argentes pou brisketai sten athena kai o mamatzakes o opoios omos suntoma tha epanelthei sten omadasta idia naupegeia kataskeuazontai alla uperpolutele epibatega okhematagoga adelpha ploiaanapheromenos sta problemata emporiou kai timon tes staphidas o upeuthunos agrotikou tomea tes erakleiou semeiose oti o kanonismos kathe khrono anaprosarmozetai pros to kheiroterooi ermeneutes einai enas sunduasmos tou kast apo to kai to pouthena ki ekhoun prostethei exi kainourgioi sunergatessugkekrimena o tekhnikos tes enoses timoretheke me agonistikes apokleismo kai euro khrematiko prostimo e omada gia exubrise ste diaitete kaskantere tou sundesmou athenon meta te lexe me ton atrometo stis dekembriou sto gepedo tou rentean aphenan ten ellada na khreokopesei e diakhuse ton ellenikon omologon sto europaiko trapeziko sustema tha prokalouse terastious kludonismous sten europemeta ten apokhorese tou apostolake apo to upproedros papadopoulos upebale ten paraitese tou apo ten proedria toulila ntaouns e kuria tragoudaei ta mexikanika theatro papagoudioikese tes anamenetai na ekhei nea epaphe me ten pleura tou paikte na tou katathesei prosphora kai na erthei se sumphonia kathos e epithetike tes gramme apodunamonetai aistheta meta kai te dedomene apokhorese tou ismael mplankokobontas ten pragmatikoteta se omoiomorpha metra otidepote ta uperbainei moiazei xeno anephikto kharakterizetai outopia gia na men khreiastei kaneis na to kunegesei kai na to plesiaseidimitris konstantinos agonas etan pragmatiko akropoliskurios oi kopeles alla kai t agoria pheugoun apo to khorio thelontas na zesoun diaphoretika apo tous anthropous ton palaioteron geneon thelontas na paroun sta kheria tous te zoe tous kai n akolouthesoun mia diaphoretike poreiaan ulopoiethei to skhedio uparkhei prooptike na erkhontai ekatekei skhediases kai to kainourgio sou estiatorio prota ap ola apophasisa oti thelo ena khoro gia ta gluka moume leptomereies skhetika me to periekhomeno touoi anthropoi tes ekklesias pou diatuponoun enan sugkrotemeno zoophiliko logo apoteloun ameletees exaireseis kai oi theseis tous katadikazontai os airetikesanthropos bretheke xaphnika apenanti me tous ergazomenous sto demo oi opoioi zetousan na mathoun pote tha plerothoun khoris na xerei ti na tous apanteseiki o sesk omos gia ton opoion eikazei men kaneis pos tha nai lutrose e metabase ap to tempopremiersip sto tempoprimera den pauei na koubala ap to londino ste barkelone antistoikha problemataden thelo na po pos prospathoun na mas kanoun kakotoutestin arkhisan oi katalepseis sta skholeiamia ebdomada meta otan diapistose oti den tha pleronotan kai oti den mporouse na phugei enemerose telephonika sten athena kapoio suggene tes kai ekeinos erthe sto hrakleio gia na ten parei pisopagonoun oi diadikasies gia te metastegase ton uperesion tou teloneiou kai ten katedaphise tou kteriou opou stegazetai mekhri semera me skopo ten anadeixe tou kastrousto anatrope tou brauentuzale uesa sten periokhe kai dinetai penaltima les mesa sta gerateia tous gnorizan oti se keina ta mere pou basileuei e anekheia kuriarkhei kamia phora e adike kai e asote phantasiametapoiese ste khora skototheke eipe kharakteristika o k thomaides epeide pote den prosanatolistheke sto exoterikotelos sta senaria prooron eklogon bazei o prothupourgos xekatharizontas oti oi polites theloun na doun allages kai okhi eklogeseditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia mathainoume oti tou khronou e melina kana mallon tha emphanizetai me ton demetre metropano kai e elene tsaligopoulou me ton paskhale terzeme upomone kai autosugkratesethelese na aphougkrastei auto pou aisthanetai kai pos antimetopizei ten ole katastase meta apo ten apophase tes epitropes epheseonte thelo pio autonomealla e ousia einai mia kai te diakrinoume semera katharotera ap o ti ten epokhe pou graphtekan ta duo dokimia o khitler den teleiose me ton khitleraxio prosokhes einai kai to entheto poluselido bibliaraki pou sunodeuei ten ole douleia me to plousio kai spanio photographiko ulikoparateretheke delade meiose kata ston arithmo ton oikodomikon adeion kata sten epiphaneia kai kata ston ogko se skhese me ten antistoikhe periodo iouliou iouniouta omologa auta sumphona me to demosieuma tha diokheteutoun ste sunekheia apo ten ellenike kubernese stis trapezes oi opoies tha mporoun na ta katathesoun os eggueseis gia te khrematodotese tous apo tenopos diapistotheke sto ploiario den uperkhan sostika mesa eno ta kausima tou eikhan skhedon exantletheito septebrio e psephise tou mnemoniou apo te germanike boulesten eisagoge tou o pateras ton ellenon egklematologon konstantinos gardikas krata apostaseis apo ton mathete tou kai katalegei oti prepei na apokrousomen diarreden ten eis ten emeteran nomothesian eisagogen tes poines tes mastigoseosta kommata ton mazon kai ta megala sundikata khanoun te duname tous den kataphernoun pia na kinetopoiesoun kai stoikheiode themataenas tritos egrapse oti ekanan kai oi duo apokhestous allous agones epikratesan aneta ta phabori ophe sakhsullpantos khthes den elexe e prothesmia katatheses dikaiologetikon opos eikhe anakoinosei to upourgeiokata tes arkhes psephise o eno ta duo kommata tes aristeras kai delosan aplos paronluse gia auten einai e epistrophe sto ethniko tes nomismakai sto bretheke ena tukhero deltio kerdizei euro ki etsi sten klerose tes tetartes e prote kategoria tha plerosei euroton khoro anoixe o stathes taularides eno akolouthoun kai alloi kathos apo mera se mera anamenetai na kleisoun kai oi upotheseis ton soumpinio mperns kataidodeka khronon legetai kapoios paiditetarte stis kai stis pempte stis eimai o erotas tou louka gouantanino aisthematike koinonike protagonistoun tilnta souinton phlabio parenti almpa rokhbaser ores proboles aithsemantike etta e nike tou agapheste ta sto psugeio mekhri meres apo ten agora tous khoris na ta plunetepoios pisteuei eilikrina oti tha teleiosoun oi diadikasies tou mekhri tis maiou ennoo mazi me tis diorthoseis kai oles tis aparaitetes diadikasies episemainoume oti e kathusterese sto demiourgei pleista osa problemata stous paragogoussphage anthropon sto bomo tes egklematikes aneparkeias kai tes politikes asunartesias demiourgese mia nea politike kai koinonike pragmatikoteta ten opoia e kubernese adunatei na parakolouthesei kai os ek toutou na exegeseian agapate to krasi axizei na episkephteite to ktema rockhouse vineyards mise ora notia tou asbilto papapheio perielthe se deine oikonomike these prokeimenou na anagkastei na diathesei khorous tou gia ten kataskeue tou metronekros psaras ston agio nikolao nekros anasurtheke prokhthes to proi apo te thalassia periokhe bathu agiou nikolaou o katoikos agiou nikolaou georgios pikounes o opoios eikhe paei gia psarema me to skaphos touto timetheke me to nompel logotekhnias pou episphragise ten anadeixe tou se enan apo tous megaluterous kai semantikoterous poietes tou aionakuklos ergasion tes etaireias sto anelthe se disproskleseis diatithentai apo tous grammateis ton topikon kai thematikon organoseon kai apo ten tekhnike grammateia tou grapheiou tes nomarkhiakes epitropes pou brisketai sten kentrike plateia ksanthesapo te dekaetia tou ekhei na dei e khora tetoia dramatika noumera apo te dekaetia tes mazikes metanasteuses stis phamprikes tes germanias kai tou belgiou tis stoesk kaklamanes theorese prepon na me mas apanteseiproen bosnioserbos egetes rantoban karatzits o opoios sunelephthe te deutera iouliou ste serbia etan o pio semantikos katazetoumenos ston kosmo gia egklemata polemoupara tis kibdeles exaggelies opos apodeikhteke gia mia akome phora proklethekan epeisodia pou epibarunan ten omada ston khthesino agonaeidikotera o uphupourgos politismou kai tourismou anephere ston khairetismo tou thelo na sugkharo ton egoumeno gia ten protoboulia pou anelabe na organosei aute ten omorphe ekdelosemeiotheke e axia ton omologon aisthete meiose kata disto baru amaxoma phainetai oti phimonei akome mia phora to repriz tou montelou opos gia paradeigma stis prosperaseis opou o odegos prepei na katapheugei epeigontos ste boetheia tou kibotioukai ton roso sergkei mpolzakoph trito memichel rolland tou proteinei na ten xanabrei mesa apo ten anazetese spoudaion krasion omos telika apokaluptetai oti e anazetese tou eautou tou einai to proto pragma pou prepei na kanei o charlie arturaolaalexandros oi andres upokhoresan oi gunaikes peran ta opla kai sunekhisan na polemoun kai kerdisanepikratese ektos edras epi tou ikarias me skorsto pleuro tous brethekan peripou sunadelphoi tous oi opoioi kateklusan mono to isogeio tou dikastikou megaroukai ton limanion alla kai ton pollon dromon pou khreiazontai ta nesia tes periphereias akomesten ulopoiese ton skhedion pou stokheuoun sten autoteleia tou parartematos oikou nautou khiou prokhora o neos proedros tou asphalistikou organismou thanases barinoseinai aletheia oti o k zakhopoulos me ton kairo apektese uper agan exousies ki apo kairo thumize ekeinous tous buzantinous eunoukhous pou ep onomati ton arkhonton tous elunan ki edenankata te khthesine suzetese oi sunegoroi ton uperamunthekan tes theses oti to den ekhei ennomo sumpheron prosboles tou epimakhou pou den ruthmizei epaggelmatika themataparallela o tha dosei apozemioseis gia tis dusmeneis kairikes sunthekes brokhe khalazi klppisteuo pos mporoume na kratesoume to diplo riskou gia te stourmpisteuo sten topike autodioikese alla otan e topike autodioikese apodeiknuetai oti kanei to khreos tes kai kamia phora to xeperna auto emena me ikanopoiei idiaitera dioti uperxa prin apo polla khronia ekprosopos testora e nomothesia opos plerophoroumaste apagoreuei tis mprostines idioktesies na kleinoun to topio alla auto argese na gineisakka gonia liga lepta aph orou ekleisan oi kalpesapeilese malista na exapolusei stratiotiko plegma enantion tes nkoreas ean summetaskhei sten protoboulia ton gia ten anakhaitise kai ton elegkho ploion pou uparkhoun upopsies oti metapheroun phortia gia ten kataskeue oplon mazikes katastrophesoi sumbasioukhoi theloun na monimopoiethoun kai kala kanoun omos o demarkhos einai upeuthunos gia ten megale kathusterese pou uparkhei sten organose tou demou touexereunese tou arkhise apo to alla e eisodos sto koino ekhei epitrapei apo ton iounio touan einai na ekhoume to kathe tagari pou tha kladeuei les kai kladeuei to klema tou pappou tou na mas sakateuei enan paikte kathe ebdomada den ginetai douleia gia na to doume ligo kai auto to thema kai kale sou tukhe opou ki an pas thruleepibaruntiko einai to phullo agona pou sunetaxe o diaitetes tes anametreses me ton panargeiako kostas mpalatsoukasme ethelontike ergasia melon tou sullogou ede ekhoun arkhisei na ginontai khresimes parembaseis oste o khoros na apoktesei suntoma mia alle eikonadunato mats egine sto linto opou o philathletikos epibletheke tou kudona meupselobathma kubernetika stelekhe episemainoun oti o dromos gia tis ekloges ekhei anoixei kathos e adunamia kheirismon apo ton karamanle odegei se paratetamene akubernesiaeditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia opening atlantis kathe bradu oropos me mainstream party egkainiazei stis ten kalokairine tou leitourgia to clubphrourio atlantis tou oropousumphona me delose tou uphupourgou oristikopoiethekan ta exes egkrise tes meletes me proedriko diatagmasosialismos isodunamei epises me to na dinoume sten koinonia mia makropnoe prooptikekapoios loipon apo mia parea sekotheke kai me megale uperephaneia arkhise na apaggellei kapoia satirika tetrastikha aphieromena sto bartholomaioeinai poikilia anthektike sten xerasia tautokhrona omos euaisthete stis perissoteres astheneiesparakaloume opos exetasete to olo thema eis bathos kai probeite stis opoies energeies krinete eseis skopimo oste na ruthmistei to skhetiko zetema pros ophelos olonmetaxu ton phuton tes oikogeneias ton euphorbiidon uparkhoun kai merika ta opoia kalliergountai dioti ekhoun oikonomike semasiaekthese aute tou pagkosmiou organismou ugeias pou demosieuteke kai ston elleniko tupo sterizetai se melete rosikou kentrou meleton kai einai theoretika apotelesmata mathematikon upologismon kai okhi apotelesmata ergasteriakon analuseonbarbitsiotes kai o siouphas painesan ton thanase alla kai o thanases painese to barbitsiote apokalontas ton prutane tou koinoboulioumia koinonia anokhes anthropias kai allelokatanoesesupenthumizetai oti sta kerde tou sumperilambanotan ektakto kerdos peripou ekparallela omos ekhoun sussoreutei terastia problemata ste leitourgia tes dikaiosunes kathos anabalontai oi dikesopheiloun loipon na zetesoun demosia sugnome apo tous polites ton ioanninon kai tes thesprotias kai na epibaloun ta problepomenasto khairetismo tou o periphereiarkhes kharakterise spoudaia ten protoboulia organoses tes sugkekrimenes ekdeloses upogrammizontas oti prepei na teleionei to thema tes khorotheteses ton ikhthuokalliergeionkato apo ten kartela basikes ruthmiseis metabeite sten enoteta epilexteanoigma autes tes selidas kai sto plaisio plektrologeste oriste to google os ten arkhike sas selida se tria bemata apo to menou epilexte protimeseispoia arete protimate se enan antra truphero khioumorapple e opoia legetai pos ephere sto trapezi pros suzetese to neo protupo sten prote oste na sumphonesoun os pros ton tropo ulopoiesesaute prosthetei enan mikro tonosto plaisio auto apodekhtheke protase ton bouleuton olon ton kommaton na katathesei nomothetike ruthmise sten opoia tha katagraphontai onomastika oles oi ependuseisto ekhoun pei oi trise kai giounker edo kai duo menes na me dinei e ellada te summetokhe tes sta europaika programmata oste na mporesoun auta na kulesoun kai na pheroun mia zontania sten pagomene ellenike oikonomiapara to auxemeno upsos tou apousiazoun oi kliseis tou amaxomatos kai se auto sumballoun ta phardia elastika diastaseonisraelinos edose sunenteuxe sten ephemerida israel hayom kai tonise gia ton thrulo olumpiakos einai mia terastia omada kai ekhei megale paradose kai sto mpasketstatheke de idiaitera ste semasia ton agonon auton alla pio eidika sto menuma pou stelnoun oi athletes ton special olympics se olo ton kosmoapo ten proodeutike xekhorisan oi giannopoulos apostolakes kai eliadakestha sunekhistei o agonas de tha stamatesei kai tha ginoun oles oi nomimes energeies se osous doulepsan se baros tou erakleos gnoston gia ten elektrokinese ekhoume desmeusei ekatnoritera e kubernese tha ekhei parousiasei ta prostheta metra pou edo kai liges meres zetoun epitaktika e europaike epitrope e europaike kentrike trapeza ekt kai to diethnes nomismatiko tameiotautokhrona meiotheke e mese katanalose kato apo litra ana khlmoi grammes autes tha diabazontai deutera kai o augoustos tha khei piasei platania meriabriskomaste sten diadikasia epaphes me te rosike kubernese oste na epaletheusoume tis plerophories pou metedose o tuposkhatzemikhales henschke mount edelstoneaustralia mauro me keramidies apokhroseiseuro apheterou de gia skopous stroggulopoieses me ten katabole metreton posou euro delade sunolika tha auxethei kata to poso tontheoroume oti sumballame oste ta zetemata tou periballontos na mpoun sten prote gramme tes epikairotetasapergies kai ekdeloseis diamarturias dakrugona anti sumphonias sto upourgeio metaphoron teleutaies eideseis sten kategoria ellada to thanato tou emporakou apotupose ereuna tou mekhri kai ekatmarte tou epelexe na sterixei ton titlo tes gia duo oloklera khronia timontas to koino pou ten timese kai emploutizontas to burnout paradise se bathmo pou aute te stigme na einai toeuropaike enose ekhei probei sten ulopoiese eidikon politikon gia ten prosbase sten agora ergasias me kurious axones te dia biou mathese te khrese ton neon tekhnologion kai te dunatoteta prosbases sto domemeno periballonto peristeri einai polu megalo kai oloi emeis eimaste polu kato tou kai to uperetoumeotan proanapherthenta posa tha kaluphthoun apo esoda tou demou kai ton theseaksanagurizo sten peroubiane kai diakrino to blemma tes bourkomeno san e photographia n allazei sumphonos pros ton bathmo
