kuriake pm kloi skepseis tou gia ten endekada e esto gia ton kormo tes anamenetai na apokaluphthoun se philiko pou tha dosei o ergoteles me iskhuro antipalo ophe e meta to tournoua tes biannoukai ti peirazei na statho ligo den pairno te seira kanenosepises to sabbatokuriako paidia tes paidikes helmepa tha metaboun ston tsesme gia katharismo ton akton eno ten idia stigme paidia tes turmepa tha katharizoun tis aktes tes khiouotan episkephtheka tous sarantes agelege auto pou niothei kai auto pou apotelei kai to diko tou oneiro opos kai ton ekatommuria olumpiakonenas ellenas nautikos kanei gia treis xenousoi anagkes phouskonoun akolouthontas to elleimma touensomatonei mikrophono me leitourgia meioses tou thorubou apo ton anemo kai e eggraphe tou binteo ginetai se kartes microsdetsi diaterethekan sten these se antithese me ton panionio pou paremeine arketa makria apo te diekdikese ton phetinon plei ophparkara ego exo apo tis aphixeis katebeka pezos kai pega se mia apo tis eisodouseinai aparadekto na sumbainoun auta tonise o athletes tou kastro aggelos armenatzoglouos kallitekhniko megethos ton sugkrino me ton motsartidia mas eipe oti aute ten periodo oi hrakleiotes pou taxideuoun sto exoteriko epilegoun akome ten praga bienne boudapeste italia taulande ka semera ta taxidia pros tis megales europaikes khores den einai idiaitera akribaegnatia sumballei kai se apodraseis apo te boreio ellada gia sabbatokuriaka kai okhi monoto den exephrase gnomeakoma einai antiseismika eno ekhoun kai kales monoseis gia kruo kai zesteden xerame poso tha phtasoun edo polu megaluteres mazes pou epheugan apo ton topo tous psakhnontas gia ena asphalestero topobasikoi stokhoi tou skhediasmou einai e demiourgia enos khorous oste na exuperetountai okhi mono oi louomenoi alla kai oi peripatetesagnoia delose o proedros tes siemens pleser agnoia delose o proedros tes siemens peter leser gia ta perissotera erotemata pou tou tethekan apo tous bouleutes tou klimakiou tes exetastikes epitropes pou metebe ek neou sto monakhoamesos meta speudoun na exegesoun oti to klima pou epikratei ste base tou kommatos einai teleios diaphoretiko apo to klima pou epikratei sta egetika klimakia toutha einai kai mia dokime na diapistosei anoi mousikes epirroes ton melon einai polles kai diaphoretikes kati pou exegei kai ten authentike tous mousike sten opoia briskoume stoikheia apo paradosiakes melodies hip hop electrodub kai dancehallti krima eikhame etoima na tes dosoume to meridio tes ap ta khremata pou mas edine tooi demotikes ekloges proegountai ton proedrikon kai koinobouleutikon eklogon pou tha prokeitai na diexakhthoun to noembriodike tou moumparak einai programmatismene gia tis augoustou omos sumphona me tous diadelotes o stratos ekhei deixei aprothumia na ton pherei enopion tes dikaiosunesoi opoioi kati tetoia perimenoun gia na phluaresoun akataskhetaboethesa kapoion kai mia oikogeneia me paidia pou briskontan se deine oikonomike these eipe o mperlouskoni sto diko tou periodiko panorama pou demosieuse leptomereies tes upothesesekhoun talento kai dunatotetesgiousouph statheke sten arkhe epiphulaktika ekhthrikos sten eisbole sto spitiko toupagio aitema ton oikologon prasinon einai e allage tes uphistamenes dasikes politikes kai e thorakise tou ellenikou dasikou ploutou apo kathe upobathmiseeinai o kanonasste diorganose alla kai sta dora summeteikhan e etairia me makigiaz kai to katastema me khristougenniatike prototupe diakosmese khorouola auta ta akhresta ulika tha mporoun na katalegoun sta konteinr ta opoia tha einai anoikhta kai tha einai eukole e prosbase se osous epithumoun na apallagoun apo diaphora akhresta antikeimenademos kai katoikoi antidroun sten egkatastase kai leitourgia monadas apothekeuses khemikon sten topothesia sousaki korinthias kai delonoun apophasismenoi na men epitrepsoun ten anaptuxe tes monadaseuropaikos polemos me tous oikous axiologeses den einai kainourgia upothesepolla loipon ta kardiokhtupia stis exedres omos sto telos o lamprakes san kalos arkhegos pere ten omada stis plates tou kai ten odegese sto dromo tes nikesbrisketai sto teliko stadio e entaxe enos ergou odopoiiasmikre diaphora uperxe sto thema tou diakanonismou ton opheilomenon alla kai ste meiose gia te nea khronia omos semantiko etan oti uperxe ekaterothen kale diathese gia na sunekhistei e sunergasiakai gia na ginoume pio akribeisden exera pou allou na to steiloena mena argotera katelexe stis phulakesnai eimai to leo xana uper tou na mporo na dialexo ego to diakheiriste ton dikaiomaton ton ergon moukai trite anabole gia to ruthmistiko apo anabole se anabole paei e suzetese gia to ruthmistiko aphou e prokhthesine etan e trite pou egine gia to sugkekrimeno zetema meta tis proegoumenes duo ek ton opoion e mia logo ton eklogonapopse tou brakhou apo ta dutika me to kastro sten koruphe kai to monasteri tou aigiorge den usterei katholou apo ten klasike photographia pou tha breite stis touristikes kartpostalepitrepetai epises kai e eisodos arsenikon zoon anaparagogesston demo kardzhali tes boulgarias se apostase anapnoes apo ta ellenoboulgarika sunora kai apo ton potamo arda egkritheke apo te boulgarike kubernese e egkatastase kai leitourgia ergostasiou me skopo ten exoruxe khrusou me kuanoseto eiduliako erotiko kataphugio tou poseidona skhematisteke otan o theos tes thalassasetan anebasmene ston enan apo tous duo istousellenas koouts sumplerose pos tha antimetopisoun ena duskolo kai epikinduno antipalo pou ekhei idiaitereanthropos autos douleue me sumbaseis ergou gia oloklera ete se diaphora ekpaideutika idrumataouden thaumastoteron apo ten politiken ton kreton perinoiantouristiko brabeio se kretike etairia kretike etairia brabeutheke gia ten kalutere ellenike touristike mprosoura tes to brabeio aponemetheke sten diethne touristike ekthese tes thessalonikes apo ton upourgo anaptuxes ake tsokhatzopouloepipleon orismena apo ta kommatia tou tapeta ekhoun xekollesei sta semeia pou enonontaisto a emikhrono etan isorropemeno paikhnidi opou kathe omada exoudeterose ta atou tes allesolumpiakos einai polu kale omada kai ola einai anoiktaaxia tou podosphairistegia na ta stroggulepsoume ligo ta pragmatata metallika kai phusika nera paramenoun sto sunteleste okhi omos kai ta aerioukha ta opoia metatassontai stoemeis oi ellenes eimaste philotimoi kai altrouistes arkei na peistoumeto arma tou hliou to sernoun aloga phterota aloga thusiazoun pros timen tou eno o mpagiar to magiko alogo tes epokhes tou karlomagnou erkhetai me tis photies tou agiou ioannou therino eliostasio gia na khlimintriseisumphona loipon me to demosieuma e erthe se epaphe kai zetese pano apo pente idiotikes trapezes na kanoun prosphora prokeimenou na analaboun sumbouleutiko rolo gia te diakheirise tes sugkekrimenes kriseskhanoume tous kaluterous khanoume tis elpides mas kai pameki auto giati to muthistorema einai plousiotero kai pleon poluepipedo apo ten tainiaaute te stigme brisketai ligo pio pano apo ta eksten periphereia dutikes elladas o geroulanos deutera maiosepikephales oikonomologos tes standard and poors zan misel six delonei semera oti oi agores anamenoun apo ten na epanenergopoiesei tis diadikasies agores omologon prokeimenou na epanapherei ten psukhraimia sten agoratonise pos einai duskole aute e apostole ostoso delose aisiodoxosmeso tou proponete gkregk anterson epises kategoroumenou gia ten upothese o konte proothouse ta proionta tou stous uperathletes tou mpeizmpol kai kurios ton mpari mponts tous adelphous tziampi tzeison kai tzeremi kai ton gkari sephilntsten aletheia ton arithmonen to metaxu e dioikese tou diagora uposterizei pos taktopoietheke to thema ton opheilon tes pros ton kosta kardare kai anamenetai mekhri kai semera e epistrophe tou megalou asteriou ton protathleton sten agia paraskeueanamesa tous etan o mrapostole tou ophh ston auriano agona tha einai polu duskole dedomenes tes apousias tou protou skorer tes omadasmalista gia tis anagkes tou protou diaphemistikou treiler taxidepse mekhri ten praga eno to proion sto opoio dekhteke e elene na kharisei lige apo ten lampse tes kratietai mekhri ten enarxe tes kampanias eptasphragisto mustikooi anagkes oi sunolikes tou se krebatia meth einai to ton klinonoi egetes gallias kai germanias eikhan programmatismene telediaskepse khthes gia na antimetopisoun ten katastaseentuposiasteka toso polu me tis eikones ki egina meros tou leei o idios gia te giortekathos ekhoume ede dromologesei tis energeies gia ten aplopoiese kai dieukolunse tes khoregeses bizas apo se kinezous polites aisiodoxo oti me ten parousia mas ekei tha ekhoume thesei etsi tis baseis gia ena monimo touristiko reuma apo ten kinaapo to anoigma kai kata ten prote ora tes sunedriases eikhame ptotike eikona gia ten khrematisteriake agora epereasmene kurios apo tis prokhthesines apoleies ton diethnon agoronenas ekhei ena oikopedo ste pharkaina tuphlo omos mprostatha blepame mono amphirropa mats kai okhi paikhnidia ton pontonmalista ena tetoio skopeuterio gia aerobolo oplo kai toupheki den uperkhe mekhri semera sten pole mas kai bebaia tha parameinei kai meta ten panepistemiadaten idia ora omos xekinese eisaggelike ereuna gia to gegonos oti to ergo eikhe paralephthei khoris na pleroi tous orous purasphaleiassto skhetiko nomoskhedio pou katatetheke khthes ste boule problepetai oti o upologismos tou kathe prostimou tha ginetai me sunteleste tes times zones epi to embadon tou akinetou eno mekhri semera o suntelestes etanneoeklegeis bouleutes tou perikles korobeses gnostos apo te stathere parousia tou toso ste demosiographia oso kai stous koinonikous agonesapopse kai aurio stis se mia parastase klasikou kai sugkhronou mpaletoughazni pole sto aphganistan phemismene gia to arnisio kreas tesekhei na prosthesei kati ston sunoliko problematismoola mporei kaneis na ta perimenei apo tous trelous epistemones kai apo autous pou briskontai piso apo autous kai khrematodotoun tis ereunes tousprokeitai gia ta sunedria ton organoseon me antiproedro ton k pharsedake kai proedro ton laketo ton thumaton einai kato ton eton sten pio paragogike elikiatetarte augoustou se mutilene kai polikhnito gia to altskhaimer emerida me thema exupnes idees gia exupna gerateia organonei o organismos koinonikes prostasias kai alleleggues tou demou lesbou se sunergasia me to sullogo alzheimer lesboumesa sten teleutaia okhidiaitetes kalese tis duo omades sta apoduteria aphou kato apo autes tis sunthekes den mporouse na sunekhistei o agonasede arketes omades apo te mantsester siti kai ten tselsi mekhri te real madrites ten mpartselona te gioubentous kai ten inter pherontai na ekhoun skhematisei oura gia ten apoktese tou agouero me ten retra apodesmeuses na anerkhetai sta eksemerine sunantese etan e apheteria gia tis episkepseis pou tha pragmatopoiesei tous prosekheis menes o upourgos stis periphereies gia seira suskepseon kai sunanteseon me topikous phoreis me exeidikeumenes ana periokhe suzeteseisto ep emoi sunaisthanomai ex allou batheos tas barutatas euthunas aitines epikeintai epi ton omon ton politikon andron tes khorassugkekrimena treis athletes tou sullogou klethekan na laboun meros me to ethnosemo sto stethos sto balkaniko protathlema tou septembriou sten kuproden gnorizoume omos meta bebaiotetos an prin apo ten epokhe tou ta axiomata ta kateikhan episema mono aristokratesan o einaiidea tote ekho ekatommuria omoideatesathena pulos te stigme pou xeproballei to nauarinoara e epokhikoteta einai dedomenephabali pere ten katastase sta kheria tou perase me slalom tesseris amuntikous kai me psukhraimo plase nikese ton itanzallou brekhei to xenukhti tou o ellenas den to bazei pote sten pantaena stratopedo sten tzortzia ton oktobre tou o tagmatarkhes pemterton diatazei to stratiote gouilliams na katharisei to grasidi mprosta sto spiti tou eno e gunaika tou elonora kanei ippasia me to alogo tes kai me suntrophia ton eraste tesekdelose diorganotheke sto plaisio ton eortastikon ekdeloseon tes kallitheas me aphorme te sumplerose khronon apo ten idruse tes eno egine upo ten aigida tes nomarkhiakes autodioikeses emathias kai tou demou beroiasta gkol petukhan oi mpa kai patsatzogloueite braduazei eite pheggei philes kai philoi khristos aneste kapoies stigmes olophanera e zoe tou kathenos mas semadeuetai apo gegonota alles phores pali khreiazetai na perasei kairos isos kai polus gia na katanoeseis ten axia enos sumbantosdikegoros gogo phakiridou prosthetei einai para polu omorpho os ktisma phantazomai oti tha einai kai exuperetikotelephonike gramme epikoinonias me tous ethelontes pou ergazontai gia ton ksenona einaioi paragogoi pantos katelexan sto aitema gia sunantese me to neo proedro mekhri to telos tou khronou delade ste diarkeia tes trekhousas ebdomadasgemizete ta manitaria me to migma pou etoimasate sten arkhe ta rantizete me ligo elaiolado kai bazete pano sto kathena ena trigono la vache qui rito thuma metaphertheke sto geniko nosokomeio larisas opou kai noseleuetai eno o drastes anazeteitaian tous pame sto dikaste tha tous aphesei eleutherous kai mporei na khreiastei na tous xanapiasoumemazi tis akousate sto idio grapheiose geitonikes proteuouses ekregnuntai bombes tonise kai prosethese ola omos pernane se psila grammatasto metaxu sten theloun na apoktesoun to mikhale kalaitzake pou emeine eleutheros apo tis moires anexarteta apo ten tukhe pou tha ekhei to thema sideridese ena bathmo malista kai mekhris enos orismenou khronikou orizonta e europe eikhe to dieuthunterio rolo gia tis politikes exelixeisrikhnete to migma pano sta phistikia ste phorma kai to bazete sto psugeio gia oresoi ekprosopoi ton epitropon exelexan prosorine suntonistike epitrope me skopo te suspeirose kai enemerose ton politon kai ten enemerose ana ten ellada olon ton demon kai epitropon agona pou antimetopizoun to idio problemamilame gia anthropines puramides oi opoies mporei na phtasoun touskai me ten eukairia na tsekaroun kai pou allou tha khreiazontan isos tetoioi kathrephtessumphona me skhetike anakoinose to megalutero pososto tou kuklou ergasion etoi to pragmatopoietheke sten germania apo tis germanikes etairies tou omilou eno to antistoikho pososto gia ten ellada anelthe se kai gia tis loipes khores sesto kinematographiko aphieroma tha problethoun tainies stis opoies me kapoio tropo protagonistei kai miatuligoume sphikhta to kotopoulo me selophan kai to brazoume sto zomo tou kotopoulou gia leptaapantontas se erotese tes giati den ginontai elegkhoi kai ean ginontai gia poio logo den einai apotelesmatikoi o proistamenos tes dieuthunses emporiou k mastorakes eipe oti ola auta den einai eukolo na elegkhthounkazakes pere ten kephalia mesa sten periokhe tou lebadeiakou meta apo sentra tou loutsiano apo ta dexia kai kataphere kai nikese ton polu kalo zapheiropoulomega thema apaskholei ta psara opos kateggeile radiophonika o demoi ergazomenoi ekhoun zetesei epaneilemmena apo ten ergolabike etairia na kalupsei ta ergotaxia me skepastra gia na men kathusteroun oi ergasies alla to aitema tous den ekhei ikanopoiethei me apotelesma oi ergasies na diakoptontai kathe phora pou brekheiostoso speudei na dieukrinisei oti akome einai polu noris na anoixei ola tou ta khartia kathos den ekhei apophasisthei akome e khorotaxikos skhediasmos ton neon demon opos anakoinotheke apo ten kubernesemporouses na akouseis ta panta leei o tzo klosel sten kamerasou len duo gaidoures pou phliountai pare mas tora khoris anamonesmallon ethele na pei allelegguoilebadeiakos pou eikhe gia prote phora ston pagko ton kike ernanteth proegetheke sto me ton napoleoni eno isopharise o mpastia stoki an dekhthoume oti oi demarkhoi sugkrotoun mia nea sunodo ekklesiastike aneu khartophulakiousugkekrimena prokeitai gia thessalonike kai khalkidike larisa magnesia kerkura leukada ithake alla kai kephalloniaemeis den prokeitai na dekhtoume auto to pragma dioti epese e omada okhi me agonistika alla me politika kriteriaden tha paixei polu alla ta lepta pou tha brisketai sto parke prepei na einai sobaroskoita na perissepsei kanena ouzo gregore men ta pieite olaaplos to paizei atrotosgiorgos gerolumatos photeine live proba kai oi pantremenoi ekhoun psukhe epeispleon mesa sto o nole metra nikes kai mono ettes ston teliko tou sinsinati apo ton marei kai ston emiteliko tou rolan gkaros apo ton phentererkhiliades zoa ekhoun perasei apo tis egkatastaseis tous mesa s auta ta khronia khoris omos na ekhei uparxei pote se topiko epipedo eparkos e boetheia kai e sterixe pou tha eprepe na ekhei ole aute e semantike prospatheia pou kanountsampa kopos an den mpexoun sto makhairi sto kokalogennese ton mante mopso pou ton theorousan gio tou apollona kai mazi idrusan to periphemo manteio tou apollona sten klaroeprepe na grapso khthes pos oi bouleutes xepoulesan kai tous taxitzedes gia n arkhisoun tisproedros tes omadas sunantetheke me tous paikhtes kai tous edose uposkhese pos tha plerothoun sto telos autes tes ebdomadas ostoso oi podosphairistes den peistekan apo ta legomena tou proedrou kai sunekhisan ten apokheoi kitrinomauroi xekinoun semera me liga nea prosopa giobanobits pirson katsikokere kai allages sto roster me te philodoxia na pragmatopoiesoun mia kale poreia sto neo protathlemata giannina o nomos mas epanektesan ton istoriko tous rolo ste balkanike katestesan o sundetikos krikos me tis alles khores tes europes staurodromi emporiou tourismou politismon kai ideoneis to dikaio auto aitema mas prokaleite ton kretiko lao kai genikotera tous philathlous tou opheneos khrestes eggraphesundese tou georgiou khr mpardou epitimou gumnasiarkhe ephetos sumpleronontai enenenta tessera khronia apo tous nikephorous agones tou megalou apeleutherotikou epous tou kai tes apeleutheroses tes thessalonikeseinai autoi pou kinduneuoun na meinoun khoris nero semeionetai kharakteristika kai e parataxe philiou kalei te dioikese tes epikheireses na ruthmisei amesa to khreos oste na men pherei tous gianniotes antimetopous me ena terastio problemadaskalos tou sex kai alla paramuthia ta proegoumena khronia to na brethei ena agori me mia empeire gunaika pou tha tou apokalupte ta mustika tou erota etan apo pollous okhi mono epithumeto alla skhedon anagkaioperaitero anodo tes taxeos tou sta ekboetheia gia tous serbous apo ten mastampa tou trophima alla kai alla eide protes anagkes sugkentronoun ta mele tes mastampa toupolu endiapherousa kai e suzetese me ton skenothete sten premiera tes tainiasmesa apo tis eisegeseis luthekan apories ki eginan nees protaseis beltioses ton sunthekon kai ton problematon pou sten praxe antimetopizontaito leophoreio ektelouse to dromologio orestiada thessalonike kai epebainan se auto atomame te glossoplastike tou ikanoteta anakratei kai sozei apo ton aphanismo ametretes lexeis pou truga apo tous anthropous tou emiastikou tou agrotikou kai tou poimenikou khorouoi uponoies autes eniskhuontai apo ten idia skhedon antimetopise pou ekhei e giannina me alles megales omades ton superleague pou timorethekan sto idio diastema paute te stigme diamenoun ekei eikosi epta paidia apo to aphganistan kai to pakistan kai kapoia ekhoun mathei ede ellenikadiaphono me oti o proedros tes demokratias prepei na ekhei ousiastikes armodiotetestelika monomakhei me ton akhillea kai ste phobere sugkrouse pou akolouthei e penthesileia skotonetaiarmonia ton khromatikon suntheseon kai e sobare eikastike anazetese tou kathe kallitekhne pou lambanei meros sunuphasmene me to talento prospherei to kalutero dunato apotelesma gia to theatestis apopse tha telesthei sten ekklesia tes phaneromenes ste leukosia mnemosuno pesonton kai tha anapemphthei deese gia diakribose tes tukhes ton agnooumenon kai epistrophe ton prosphugon stis patrogonikes tous estiesmia khara kathetai phetos e argia kollas mia emera adeia e kai perissoteres kai kaneis mini diakopesproekhei e nikeparallela me ten ereuna tou kai se sunergasia me ten ornithologike ginetai suntonistes europaikou programmatos lifephuse gia te diaterese kai diakheirise tes limnothalassasden etan stokhos e epitropeia kai e epiterese kai meso auton e pleres exasphalise ton katakhrestikon oso kai lestrikon dikaiomaton ton daneiston masto proto dekaemero tou septembriou de beltiose ten katastase aphou oi ellenes emporoi elthan antimetopoi me adeia tameia kai auxemena leitourgika exodaten ekplexe tes agonistikes ekane o panserraikos pou epikratese me tou panathenaikou kai edeixe pos saphestata phetos eikhe tis dunatotetes gia kati kaluteroperikhuste me te saltsa ta philetakia kai serbireteoi agapemenoi eroes tou lake lazopoulou erkhontai apo to khthes gia na milesoun sto semera pio epikairoi apo potediakritike poluteleia kai sugkhrono lito periballon me khrese phusikon ulikon pou denoun apsoga me tis ntizainates pineliesas stamatesei pia e karamela oti gia to khreos euthunetai e eipe o k mikhelakes kai zetese dieukriniseis apo ton kubernetiko ekprosopo skhetika me ten prokhthesine delose tou oti e prospatheia pou ginetai den ekhei egguemena apotelesmatati allo na zetesei kaneis leuke aphrikane e gkorntimer megalomene konta sto giokhanesmpourgk ekhei zesei ten apoxenose ton ratsismo kai ten upobathmise tes phuses kharin tes anaptuxes kai ten proodountmitri mentbienteph einai o protos rosos proedros pou episkeptetai episemos te damasko apo ten epokhe tes oktobrianes epanastasesoso gia tous upoloipous eleutherous den uparkhei pros to paron kamia exelixeapergia ekhei os aikhme tou doratos te suzetese sten boule gia ten katargese tou periorismou pou dinei te dunatoteta se epikheirematies pou den ekhoun ptukhio odontiatrikes na katekhoun ten pleiopsephia ton metokhon mias iatrikes epikheiresesapokhorese apo to sugkekrimeno axioma to dekembre tou opote kai dioristeke genikos grammateas toumonadon pou kratese ta duo proegoumena ptotika kumata tou kai tou ste semerine dome tes ptoses tou genikou deikte den semainei polla pragmatasto telos tou programmatos epibrabeuetai toso e prospatheia oso kai e summetokhe olon ton paidion kai tous prospherontai anamnestika diplomatasto paidiko tournoua tou me megalo nikete ton oloklerotheke to pagkretio paidiko tournoua anoixe pou diorganonei o sten kategoria gennethentesetaireia antapokrinomene sto endiapheron ton katanaloton gia ugeia kai euexia meiose te mese periektikoteta ton me alkooloukhon poton tes se thermides kata ta teleutaia exi khroniaopos einai ede gnosto ten perasmene ebdomada anakoinotheke oti me apophase tes diakheiristikes epitropes tes europaikes enoses oristeke to upsos tes prokataboles stis drkhexallou e k giogle gnoste kai apo tis kairies kata kairous teleoptikes tes emphaniseis ekhei stokho na pherei ton dikegoriko sullogo pio konta sten topike koinoniamas kunegaei entona kai ekhei thorubesei ta megista te skepse mas alla kai te sumperiphora masmesa s auto to bromiko periballon epaizan paidia xapostainan perastikoi kai elikiomenoi tes geitoniaskartes ekhei sumplerosei o dionusatos kai anagkastika tha apousiasei apo ton agona autoase ta kentra ugeias astikou tupou ena ek ton opoion tha idruthei sta gianninakai auto einai e latreia mas gia ton thruloapo ten prote stigme elega oti to mellon kai e praxe mporei na dosoun apantese kai okhi oi opoies na kanoume loipon tameio toraanthropous to tou plethusmou tes khoras kai metatrepoun tous agrous se aperanta nekrotapheiaproedros tou sundesmou geoponon kostas kagiales eipe sten oti mia megale merida paragogon den ekhei gnose tes khreses ton phutopharmakon kai panta khresimopoiei megaluteres posotetes apo ekeines pou sunistoun oi geoponoikhtes exallou e ntora mpakogianne parousiase ten protase ton europaion phileleutheron gia ten ellada kai ten eurozonean eisai en meso agonon kai na khaseis mia proponese den semainei katiuparkhei mou lene mia periptose na matho perissotera gia aute te makrine khora ste diarkeia ton epomenon duo menondrase aute apeuthunetai se uphistamenes e neoidruomenes mikres kai polu mikres epikheireseis pou ekhoun edra ten ellada apaskholoun eos ergazomenous kai emphanizoun etesio kuklo ergasion eos ekatden tha uparxei kanena iero abatos gia to kathestos auto katelexe o k sikai xerete osoi pegame kai tis duo bradies mas kakophaneke pou khtes to bradu den eikhame na pame pouthenaamerike summakhei me te nazistike germaniaekhei brabeuthei epaneileuuena ue ton titlo upseles didaktikes epidoses apo to tueua dioikeses episteues kai tekhnologias tou oikonouikou panepisteuiou athenonotan loipon klethekan na sterizoun mia omada etan duskolo na enothounotan apokatastatheke to politiko sustema e eremia tou upotithetai oti apokatastatheke alla brekan luse xaphnika ek neou prokuptei o ekbiasmos oti den tha dothei e pempte doseekeinos etan pou enemerose ton proistameno tou oti e gunaika aute ekhei pethanei edo kai pano apo khroniakai o astunomos tou muthistorematos o ransom einai enas mallon akhromos epaggelmatiasoi teleutaies epitukhies tou erakleiotikou sugkrotematos ekhoun eniskhusei ten aisiodoxia gia te diekdikese tes pronomioukhou theses kati asphalos pou den epitrepei strabopatemata idiaitera stous entos edras agonesden mou ekheis milesei omos katholou gia tosa alla mere pou ekheis taxidepseiparousia tou ste ethnike sematodotei mia nea arkhe me stokho tes dioikeses na mpoun epitelous ugieis baseis se auton ton istoriko sullogo pou tha epispeusoun tis diadikasies epistrophes stis epaggelmatikes kategoriesgia tis topikes koinonies alloste o makedonikos agonas tou uperxe ki autos mia katexokhen emphulia surraxeostoso perissoteroi apo enan stous duo erotethentes pisteuoun pos niketes tha einai tokai okhi mono psephizoun benizelo alla theoroun oti me ton idio arkhego proegeitai tes kata mia monadalebentia kai to philotimo einai idiotetes pou duskola mporoun na perigraphounta exoda metakineses diamones kai diatrophes ton omadon kaluptontai apo ta idia ta somateiamone tes suntrophia kai paregoria o agnostos insomniaaxia prosokhes kai meletes einai e ekdose apo ton sundesmo apophoiton zosimaias skholes ioanninon oi zosimades tou tomou gia epeirotes emporous euergetes alla kai axiepaine e prospatheia ton sunteleston tes ekdoseseurope eite tha einai demokratike koinonike kai alleleggua e den tha uparxei eipe o alexes tsipras paraphrazontas ton niko poulantza pou eikhe grapsei oti o sosialismos e tha einai demokratikos e de tha uparxeimakarisa polles phores ton idioktete tou kalodiateremenou neoklasikou me ten prasine prosopse mekhri na diapistoso paraterontas ena bradu te diakritike tou epigraphe oti tha mporousa na eimai ki ego ekei mesakalei tous sunadelphous na summetaskhoun sten apergia pou keruxe e apo tis pm tes tetartes iouniou eos tis pm tes pemptes iouniouparaskeue iouniou to tsimento mas ekhei pnixei kai to khroma tes elpidas to prasino einai to mono pou apomenei gia na me maurizei e psukhe mas apo tis kathemerines eikonestoso oi gepedoukhoi oso kai oi philoxenoumenoi eikhan parapona apo tis apophaseis tou tritsone e gia penalti ston tsinmpampa kai o bolos gia to akurothen gkol tou oumpinteskata ta loipa to kubernetiko ergo sten epeiro to blepoun mono oi tes kai khoris na thelei kaneis na medenisei den briskei kai kati to ousiastiko na pei gia ten pentaetia autetous antone koniare proen paiktes akroteriou kai apo ten epomene saizon tou kai manole ksulake kudonmepos omos ektos apo tous epaggelmaties diaphemistades tha prepei o eisaggeleas na psaxei kai to ti ginetai stous demous dioti o nomos leei pos autoi prepei na xelonoun tis tampelesisos omos kai mesa sten ebdomada na uparxoun ekplexeis kai ola auta pou leme tora gia ta plei oph na men ekhoun semasiadustukhos diapistonoume oti to thema touto an kai essonos semasias tha ekhei kai sunekheiato teleutaio krousma katagrapheke ste thessalonike prin apo liges emeres otan duo atoma enas omogenes ki enas georgianos sunelephthesan ep autophoro sten periokhe tes menemenes ten ora pou aphairousan benzine apo stathmeumena okhemataberinda pethane to sto erakleioparaskeue ioulios apantese gkerekou ston spurou gia ten prosbase sto dikastiko megaroeseis mporeite na tous gnorisete sto wine bar tou arkhontikou tou alexiou bergoula opou paizoun kai tragoudoun kathe paraskeue kai sabbato bradukathegetes apth antonios papadopoulos eno akolouthesan eisegeseis apo tous georgio mantzaride omsunekhizontas apo ten pule pros ta boreia mesa apo ena kataprasino topio monadikes omorphias briskoume ta prota khoria gia na phtasoume sta phemismena pertouliotika libadiagi auto kai ta kunegoun kai stenoun khorooson aphora stous dikaioukhous tes lemnou e idia katastase tha anartethei kai sto tmema agrotikes anaptuxes tes murinas eno iskhuoun ola ta parapano peri prosphugondromos gia ten prote periokhe ekleise sto ena reuma kai e kuklophoria diexagontan mono apo te mia kateuthunseidanikos autokheiras apodeikhtheke o ten kuriake sta leuktra khanontas mesa apo ta kheria tou te nike kontra ston epameinondaapo tote mekhri semera o mesos tou olumpiakou metra khrono summetokhes se ola ta mats tes ethnikesaphenete te sos na kruoseiprokritheke e upopsephioteta tou panagiote gargalana thumizoume edo pos mono gia ten oloklerose tes meletes gia te sundese ton tzoumerkon me ten egnatia tha khreiazotan ekupogrammise telos oti e europe einai arketa dunate oste na kuriarkhesei enanti ton parouson prokleseonomophonia gia ola ektos apo to epheteio toume endiapheron anamenetai kai e these ton ergazomenon sten epikheirese sta pleista erethismata pou edose e sunenteuxe tou proedrou tou nereaan sunekhisoun etsi tha apokhoresoume apo to protathlema delose o k papadakesorizonties idioktesies katastema kai these stathmeuses apoteloumenes apo upogeio isogeio kai patari ktiriou meiktes khreses to opoio brisketai epi tes odou durrakhiou sta sepolia tes athenastis exelixeis autes semeiose e dioikese tes lamda developments apeuthunomene pros tous metokhous kata ten etesia genike suneleuseupotrophia dotheke phetos ston mathete basile boulgaropoulo apo to diabato emathias ena apo ta thumata tes epitheses me makhairi albanon prin apo emeresste logike aute kalese sten ethnike omada kai nea prosopaego den emoun me kanenan kai aporousa se ti katastase eikha katantesei o ellenismos kai to elleniko kratosakrobasia einai epikindune oi isorropies euthraustes kai o khronos piezei asphuktikaperaia neoi epibates agia triada palioura akte retzika potamos einai orismenes mono apo tis paralies pou kai galazies semaies ekhoun kai organomenes einai kai diathetoun xaplostresk kapotes eisakouontas tis anagkes tes agoras demiourgese ena kolokuthi opos to oneireuontan oi emporoi se prasino khroma oute polu anoikhto oute polu skouro pou mporei na krata to louloudi gia polu kairoto somatiko alla kai to psukhiko tou sthenos prepei na epistrateusei toso o mikros oso kai o adelphos tou zepi kai e metera tous khelgka sto taxidi tous apo te germania tou pros te benezouelabia phernei bia semeionei o papandreou gia na prosthesei oti an nomizei kapoios oti e askese bias einai me to azemioto aurio tha brethei thuma tesentase sten katathese sanida sten exetastike gia siemens entase purodotese e katathese tou proen eisaggelea tou areiou pagou giorgou sanida sten exetastike epitrope pou diereuna ten upothese siemensden ekhei teleiomo e apaxiose tes etaireias sto tamplo kathos meta kai te nea diorthose stis e khrematisteriake axia tes surriknotheke perissotero sta molis ekatommuria eurosumperilambanetai sto upo ekdose biblio giorgou kokkinou blase agtzide elles lemonidou mneme kai to traumaotan aporripteis etsi mia klese sten omada me to ethnosemo einai ubrispolla kalokairina stekia anoigoun semera sabbato kathos to kalokairi einai edo kai e thermokrasia tes diaskedases anamenetai n anebei sta upseekeino to diastema polloi neoi tragoudopoioi tragoudistes stikhourgoi uparkhoun kai prospathoun na deixoun ton eauto tous kai na ekphrastoun mesa apo te mousikeprin merika khronia to an den apatomai eikhame erthei sto xenodokheio pou douleueis sto platu mou leei se kapoia phase pano sten koubenta o giorgosmilame gia ten plere axiopoiese tou kastrou maskaname polu kale douleia sten amuna masmalista thetontas o idios to erotema palaioterase kathe periptose tha prepei na uparxei pleres diaphaneia sto periphemo fast trackeikosi khronia argotera to kuklophorese to phlatlant tou entouin ampotproponetes tou giannina milese gia agonistika themata gia ten poreia tes omadas ton ioanninon gia epiloges pou ekane sto parelthon eno den pareleipse na dosei kai tis problepseis tou gia to phetino protathlemaoi ekroes apo ta egkhoria demotiko parkingk etan anoikhto se olous khoris epibarunsete dioikese anelabe e duse kai to prosopiko pou esteile den etan pragmatika protes poiotetasistoria tes neoteres elladas t ekdeideseographiko omada pou erthe deutere se bathmologia ephoson bebaia ta mele tes einai ntumena maskaradesgia kathe thalassia periokhe pou tha diapistonetai uperbase ton anotaton orion ton parametron pou orizontai mporo na perimenouparkhoun kathemerina epaphes me diaphorous anthropousapo khthes pharmakopoioi oles tes khoras stamatesan ten epi pistosei khoregese pharmakon se polla asphalistika tameia eno semera tetarte to bradu e genike suneleuse ton pharmakopoion tes lesbou tha parei ki aute tis apophaseis tesoligarkhiko kai despotiko kharakterizoun to proteinomeno sustema dioikeses diakekrimenoi anakoinosei ten aposurse stratioton apo to aphganistan mekhri ton noembrio toukhares einai akalliergetos agenes axestos prosbletika eilikrines kai gematos pathosena parathuro ste serbike istoria ereme atmosphaira sten topola antiparaballetai me to tarakhodes parelthon testo oikonomiko kai politiko periballon entos ton orion tes khoras alla kai sten europe khanei sunekhos tis paradosiakes souedia demiourgetheke deutera martios mia semantike epaphe ektos tou programmatos tes episkepses pragmatopoiese e epikheirematike apostole tou epimeleteriou ste souediaegine me megale kathusterese ena bema pros ten europaike oloklerose alla o dromos einai makrusdiaitetes tha einai o ksupakes me boethous tous garephalake kai gkiaourakearketa tmemata diktuon photistika somata prizes diakoptes ta opoia briskontai se khorous me uparxe udatos e kai udratmon loutra toualetes mageireia ktl den einai kataskeuasmena adiabrokha e den ekhoun sundethei me ton problepomeno tropoektene demosieumata kuriarkhoun sto diethne tupo skhetika me ten ekthese tou diethnous nomismatikou tameiou gia ten poreia tou oikonomikou programmatos tes elladas alla kai tis deloseis tou epikephales tes antiprosopeias tou tameiou sten ellada pooul tomsenste suskepse ekhoun klethei na parastoun oi ekprosopoi ton paragogikon phoreon tou nesiou kai tes topikes autodioikesessugkekrimena e time tou elaphrou argou gia sumbolaia paradoses oktobriou upokhorei kata sents sta dolaria to barelikai tora niotho polu kaluteraoi analogies autes briskontai se kataphane dusarmonia me te morphotike sustase tou koinonikou somatos tes poles kai anadeiknuoun ena apo ta semantika domika problemata tou demou mastha aphesoume to sinema na pethanei ste khio kathe phora pou xekina mia kinematographike periodos kheimerine e therine elpizoume kai eukhomaste na einai kalutere apo ten proegoumenenomou kilkis e anoikte othone tha philoxenei sto sunedriako kentro demou kilkis epilegmenes tainies apo ten prosphate sodeia tou pagkosmiou kinematographouquiet please whisky is sleeping egraphe e pinakida ston plaino toikho tes apothekes sten opoia epi e perissotera khronia orimazoun khiliades barelia gemata me to polutimo apostagma kai eniothes to angels share na planatai sten atmosphairapempte ianouariou kosmos ekhei agriepseidustukhos to problema einai eggenes stis oikonomies pou sterizontai sten apolute eleutheria ton ligon kai ten apolute adunamia ton pollonden einai epomenos naporei kaneis giati sobaroi epikheirematies tupou mutilenaiou erixan maure petra piso toustrite augoustou giati epilegoun oi ellenes sten ellada ta pragmata olo kai duskoleuoun sten agora ergasias gi auto kai polloi theloun na eniskhusoun ta epaggelmatika tous prosontadustukhos oute oi ekprosopoi enos laou oute o tupos mporoun na antistathoun prokeimenou na exuperetesoun akome kai zotikes anagkes ton politon kai tes koinonias otan ekhoun na antimetopisoun iskhura oikonomika sumpherontaena poteri apsenti einai toso poietiko oso kai ena eliobasilema egraphe to o oscar wildeetsi khthes me eidika anaperika amaxidia dieskhisan to pharaggi tes improu sta khania sunolikes apostases khiliometronse anakoinose tes e hellas kanei logo gia upopsia parousias tou bakteriou ecoli sta duo sugkekrimena katepsugmena proionta ta opoia aposurthekan amesa apo ta raphia tes alusidas gia proleptikous logouskati sumbainei sto demo geras to diabasa ston topiko tupo kai aporesa pos den to eikha parei eidesetipota omos den einai toso kako pou den mporei na ginei kheirotero kai o gianniotes to diapistose to stous olumpiakous agonesan anapheretai se deloseis tou make khatzeephraimide kai allon aireton ekhoun to dikio tous otan den ekhoun plere enemerose gia to pos phtasame na epilexoume metaphora nerou kai ten pege udrolepsiaspropersi o ernesto eikhe paei pali peripou tetoia epokhe sten toumpa kai upo paromoies bathmologikes sunthekes kai eikhe parataxei ta deuteratrite augoustou sta tele tou noembriou eikhame ena anodiko xespasma ton timon tou extra parthenou elaioladou sten italia e opoia eperease kai ten ellenike agoraotan askoume ten kritike mas khamogelasta o apodektes tes kritikes den mas epitithetaiprosopika epi ena khrono de tha mpo se germaniko katastema oute tha agoraso germanika proiontakostarikanos me ten kitrine karta pou dekhtheke sto gkol pou tou akurotheke stis kathustereseis sumplerose treis kai den upologizetai gia to sugkekrimeno paikhnidiekhei arkhisei na deikhnei orismena apo auta pou tha apolausei o kosmos tou thrulouuperkhan eikones pou sas sokaran epatha sok otan eida tis katastrophes apo ton tuphona katrina alla kai apo tis petrelaiokelidesmolonoti den perilambanetai diataxe gia apagoreuse ek tou nomou ton apoluseon kata te diarkeia iskhuos tes eidikes mporei paizoun sta dakhtula tous emeis oi pio palioi gia na xupnesoume dinoume kai pathainoumeto sabbato to orario dieurunetai kai pali me ta katastemata na anoigoun to proi me to apogeumaperiphemos ligo e polu amesos e emmesos auto stigma to na uper tou k samara kai tes neas demokratias ksegelontas etsi me auton ton tropo tous edo anagnostesto thema suzetetheke ektaktos khthes to bradu sto demotiko sumboulio tes egoumenitsas me protoboulia tou demarkhou thoma pitouleto inside tha sematodotesei mia nea gkama montelon tes gallikes phirmas pou tha arkhisoun na paragontai sto ameso mellonphteno sta podia sou to khoma gia na men ekheis pou n aploseis riza kai na trabas tou bathous oloena kai platus epanou o ouranos gia na diabazeis monos sou ten aperantosune o kosmos o mikros o megasupoklinontai m eulabeia ki ekhoun eukhariste ekphraseto gavrosgr einai sto seph kai sas metapherei takai ligo parakato sumpleronei miso opoion psephise demokratikous stis ethnikes eklogesena teikhos upsous peripou metron enekhei toulakhiston pente oikistikes periodouspantos duskola tha mporouse kapoios na prodiagrapsei te summeteokhe ton etoimopolemon mikhale mperneanou kai phote lagou opote mallon o ikanos tekhnikos tou astera tha prepei na kataphugei sekai paradipla oi pases phuseos emporoi ependuan kai kerdoskopousanblepete sten olumpo exakolouthoun na phoroun ten paradosiake tous stole kati pou apo mono tou apotelei atraxion tou khorioulesteia sten trapeza ergasias sten patesionetsi ki allios e ethikologia ten apekhthanetai ten ethike giati tes bazei duskola giati e ethike thelei douleia polleden khreiazetai kati idiaiterotrite augoustou askese kai diatrophe kata tou diabete ta entatika programmata askeses kai e ugieine diatrophe meionoun mekhri kai te sukhnoteta emphanises sakkharodous diabete sta atoma pou theorountai upselou kindunoutha sunekhisoume me ten idia epimeleia kai apophasistikoteta oste na epitugkhanoume panta ta kalutera apotelesmata pros ophelos ton politonprospheroun phresko psari astakomakaronada mageireuta alla kai piata tes orasna suneidetopoiesoume to problema na bgoume stous dromous diekdikontas na strimoxoume ten kubernese tora pou einai arkheta krasia auta parousiazoun aromatikes kai geustikes omoiotetes me ta krasia apo sangiovese khoris omos na ekhoun ten aromatike kai geustike phinetsa ton kalon chianti kai brunello di montalcinomolis mas erthan oi protes photographies apo to kai anakalupsame ti egraphe to periboeto pano gia to opoio diekopse ton agona o tritsonesgia paradeigma osoi suntaxiodotountai me ensema se elikia etoneinai ena epipleon kinetro kai gia emas na paixoume kai gi autonkharalampous zetontas na diekdikesei o demos kalo kai phteno nero gia ten kerkuraoi duo megales etaireies tou khorou kai ekhoun megale poikilia biologikon allantikongouilson mounioz agonisteke sto kentro os mpalanter kai edeixe oti einai polu kalos me te mpalasta prasa piastekan treis epidoxoi klephtes sto lukostomo ioanninon opou astunomikoi meta apo axiopoiese plerophorion tous sunelaban ten ora pou prospathousan na klepsoun apo mandra oikodomikon ulikon duo mekhanes phortegon autokineton axias eurokana monostelaki stis mesa selides kai anos oros sumphonias tithetai e kathodos ordon epitereton stis uperesies diakheirises koinotikon programmaton ana ten ellada gia na diasphalisoun oti ta lephta tha piasoun topotha aponemethoun stous epitukhontes apo to rethumno me ten kalutere seira se panepistemiakes skholes kai epikoinoniasproothese seiras programmaton gia ten koinonike entaxe kai te stegastike apokatastase ton tsigganon kai ton palinnostounton omogenon se ole te khoraoi phetines times anamenetai na einai konta sta lepta to litro eno apokliseis tha uparxoun gia tous katoikous ton apomakrusmenon periokhontha phoresei tedinoume uposkhese oti tha ta dosoume ola kai tha prospathesoume na ekplerosoume to stokho masse apolutous arithmous auto semainei oti to demosio khreos tha meiothei kata disekatommuria euro kai tha phthasei sta diseimaste kai leitourgoume mesa s ena diaphano purgosta egkainia tha milesei o thrakiotes upourgos metaphoron kai epikoinonion k euripides stulianidestheoro pos monos kerdismenos tha bgei o areskurie moraite tha thelame na mas enemerosete kai gia to sunedrio pou ginetai sten athena opou tha parete merosgia auto einai pithano na doume pano apo gkol kai tha krateso to over paramenoume sto megalo nesi alla katebainoume ligo pio kato ste league oneisos omos to kaneikupello elladas beroia sto dromo tou kerkura pempte oktobriosti tha kanei autos o teleutaios den problepoume na demiourgei problema ston malaphetheatrike omada eclats d etats idrutheke to ste gallianoiazomai polu gia ten real kai me ponaei pou pheugo alla poios xerei mporei kapoia mera na epistrepsompimpes lexesta epeisodia tes seiras o meison ekhase mia mono upothese ten opoia omos telika kerdise sten epheseto idio skeniko alla me ligoteres parousies ten epomene mera stis aprilioute delose aute ekane enopion tes boules o antiproedros tes kuberneses kai upourgos oikonomikon euaggelos benizelosmprosta o tzeke to poimeniko skuli ap ton kaukaso pou ephere ston georgoula enas monakhosna diatranosoume te laike antithese sta agria metra pou ede elaban sta kheirotera pou phernounto psesimo tou keik mporei na ginei me duo tropous an to thelete pio stegno tote to psenete gia peripou ora elegkhontas to psesimo tou mpegontas ena soublaki sto kentro tou kai elegkhete an stegnosemporousame na katharisoumes to matss delose sten o k karaiskos omos phobethekame na anoikhtoume perissoterosto alexandreio tonme alla logia aphou o ptokhos adikos elpizei dide tou elpida pou moskhobolaei osan sbigkosgnorimia me te douleia tou apotelese pege empneuses gia mena kai eimai eugnomon pou kata ten paramone mou sten ellada mporesa na te gnoriso kaluteradeutera dekembriou stis me ton khresto pherentino ton lene niko papadopoulo kai einai mageirasauto to skopo tha uperetoume oloites lupeses okhita exoda metaphoras stis nesiotikes biomekhanies epibarunoun akome perissotero to kostosproblepomenes poines gia anakribeis deloseis den ekhoun epharmostei pote akome gnorizontas tis kineseis pou ginotan bgeke kai o mparmpa giannes xaralampopoulos sten exedra me ton semite ste thessalonikemaria papane maria demetriou sta lukeia tes lesbou ephtasan pro emeron oi analutikes mekhanographikes katastaseis tou upourgeiou paideias stis opoies kai periekhontai ola ta stoikheia pou aphoroun stous summetekhontes stis eisagogikes exetaseistekhnike analuse gia ten anodo pou xekinese apo to endosunedriako khamelo ton monadon tes tetartes trephei mia sugkratemene aisiodoxiatha to ektimesoumesummetekhoun kallitekhnesdekaoktakhronos kraker apo ta tou khronia anazetountan apo tis diethneis dioktikes arkhes gia eisbole se istoselides tes interpol kai kubernetikes istoselides ton stis opoies eikhe prokalesei psephiakous bandalismousto periodiko teukhos me titlo ntrepotan na milesei gia ta metallia eskholiaze meta pollon epainon ten poluedrike prosopikoteta tou nekrou kai katelege asphalos o lukeiarkhes askoxulakes etan mia exaireseme base te semerine kephalaiopoiese tes elgeka mporoun na agorastoun mekhri kaieimaste mia oikogeneia me gunaikes kai duo andres auto phernei tis epitukhiesallios tha ton dioriza ego san sumboulo kai tote tha etan ste diakritike eukhereia tou dikasteriou na to labei e okhi upopse toukhuta kai anaptuxe ta themata pou tha suzetethoun te deutera sto demotiko sumbouliosas thumizei kati sas thumizei to arthro tes podosphairikes pou kai tote den eikhe parastei sunegoros uper tou ellenikou demosiou bre kala kanoun oi anthropoi aphou o nomos kai to kratos tous dinei to dikaiomamia ebdomada o giannes giannoures logo ioses pou eikhe den mporouse na proponesei o idios tous polistes tou kai se sunartese me te diakope logo ton eorton e omada aposuntonisteke opos uposterizeikathizese ton pososton ton megalon kommaton oriakes diaphores sta pososta kai alla kai emphane buthise tous deikhnoun demoskopeseis pou demosieuontai ston tupo tes kuriakesnomarkhes anakoinose ten prote dose tes khrematodoteses me to poso ton dis tha khrematodotethei e nomarkhiake autodioikese gia ten anegerse skholikon ktirion sto hrakleiodemarkhos o ous arkhontas mias poles pou eklegetai apo tous demotesomos oi pio semantikes istories einai ekeines pou legontai apo anthropous pou etan autoptes martures tetoion semantikon gegonotonkai den tha akolouthoun pleon xekhoristes poreiesisos na akougomaste uperbolikoi monotonoi kai graphikoidiabaste opos akribos tuponontai ekana aitese gia ton diagonismo tes agrotikes trapezes tes elladosduo nees protoboulies ston khoro ton telepikoinonion kai eidikotera tou internet anamenetai na anakoinosei akoma kai entos tes ebdomadas o omilos pouliadetonizei to epeirou eniskhuontai oso pernoun oi meres oi phemes pou kanoun logo gia exisose tou eidikou phorou katanaloses sto petrelaio nikephorou sto kai to dunato sout pou apekrouse korner o pakhatouraston dekembrio tou me ten eukairia tes suneleuses tou sumbouliou apodemou ellenismou pragmatopoietheke ste thessalonike sten aithousa omadas pou timoreitaime te rakhel tha sundethei politika alla kai erotikasto los antzeles tes kaliphornia diamenei o elikias eton alphonso nino o opoios opos kai o el nino epikritheke drimutata mele tes kai ndphk kastoriasto mustiko einai na ekhoume thelesemalista gia ten tourkia ekphrasteke me ta kalutera logia o tekhnikos tes selesao tonizontas oti ten perimene duskolo antipalo plen omos elpize se mia pio eukole epikratese gia ten omada toupolla apo ta paidia exaitias tou karnabaliou erthan sten ekdelose metamphiesmenasta oloklerotika kathestota den mporei na uparxei e demokratia o eleutheros logos auto as to labei upopsin tou o kathenasopos ekhei xanagrapsei e prosphores eikhan katathesei kai e etaireia tou omilou mutelenaiou alla kai e pou einai mia koinopraxia tes italikes kai tou omilou kopelouzoutourkos prothupourgos delose oti gia prote phora ustera apo khronia episkephtheke kubernetikos mas antiproedros ton patriarkhe athenagorabebaia uparkhoun akome arketes emeres mekhri ten kuriake martiouepipleon prospherei phoul serbis pou dinei pollaples epiloges stous episkeptes tou koruphaia olon to masaz sto domatio souepiskepse miler sten krete xekinese khthes to proi anagennese giannitson duo sullogoi pou briskontai upo dialuseto ekho anagke gia menato epathe sok otan eide na kaigontai mprosta sta matia tou oi kopoi mias zoes to estiatorio tou sten alaskaproetoimasia oloklerotheke khthes semera uparkhei repo kai aurio sto gepedo ekhoun klethei oloi oi paiktesntragkan kokotobits sugkhareteria ston ergotele gia ten kathare nike pou petukhepolla khronia sustematikon prospatheion laikismou kai apaxioses tes ennoias tou energou polite kai ton thesmon genikotera apedosan ta anamenomenagia na antimetopisoume ten epithetike tase ten opoia terei e tourkia apenanti mas eimaste anagkasmenoi na teroume ogko enoplon dunameon dusanaloga megalo se sugkrise me kathe khora sten europaike epeiro kai me to klima upheses pou uparkheiprotimese sta anoiktokhroma kai elaphra roukha me anoikto laimo kalupse kephales khresimopoiese kapelou omprelas k l pekrektike e katastase se kai kubernese ekrektike einai e katastase sto kubernetiko stratopedo opou ta teleutaia eikositetraora entone einai e phemologia oti o papandreou tha epispeusei tis exelixeis upo ten asphuktike piese tes troikaskai to leo auto okhi mono giati te sumpatho alla kai giati gnorizo kala oti sten politike zoe tes italias ta molubenia khronia theorountai oti anekoun sto parelthonse genikes grammes to prophil ton paralion einai ligopolu to idio prokeitai gia khamelon tonon paralies opou den ekhoume kamia pithanoteta na sunantesoume kosmikousexagora pragmatopoietheke meso pleiodotikou diagonismou me katathese kleiston prosphoron pou egine apo ten agrotike trapezasumphona me ten k soterkhelle malista ekhoun perasei memonomena atoma pou pairnoun parapano aiteseis prokeimenou na grapsoun ki alla melesunethos to khroma tou einai akhno kitrino ektos apo auta pou sunterountai sto elaioladoprosexte ta tragoudia pleromena philia alle mia phora augoustiatiko pheggarimeta ta prota apotelesmata o einai to phabori gia ten katalepse tes protes theses eno o diaterei elpides gia ten katalepse tes deuteres pou epises odegei sten telike phase tou protathlematos augoustouden ekmetalleutekame tis eukairiesse oti aphora sten trele koursa anodou ton diethnon timon ton kausimon o k roblias exephrase ten aisiodoxia tou oti tha uparxei apoklimakose ton timonphetos e ekthese perilambanei eidiko aphieroma ste mese anatole me titlo otan oi idees exegeirontaito kanei omos emmesa arnoumene psepho ston proedro tes demokratiaseite braduazei eite pheggei eimai o na nautes tou aigaiou krebati ekho ta bathia neraaaksekineste apo to kruoneri ena apo ta pio oraia khoria tes periokhestrite augoustou tis nikes thumetheke o orpheas kerameion epikratontas sto ex anaboles paikhnidi tou pallesbiakou me skor kai anapteronontas me auton ton tropo tis elpides tes gia paramone sten kategoriata threptika stoikheia pou uparkhoun sta phusika lipasmata delade stis kopries stis kompostes ste stakhte klp prepei na metatrapoun se khemika stoikheia omoia me auta ton tekhneton lipasmaton gia na aporrophethoun apo ta phutapolonia sto timoni tes europaikes enoses polonikosiman zeta suggnome apo ten agglia einai o titlos tes daily telegraph eno e independent tonizei egine o apodiopompaios tragos se mia sunolike apotukhiaten emera pou trabekhteke aute e photographia kai pou protodemosieuse e ephemerida nteili meil den uperkhe ikhnos kakhupopsias den pernouse apo kanenos to mualo oti o diplanos tous mporei na ekhei kakes protheseiskai sten trite o theodoses kaldes epises tou olumpiakou seepi tes timsistem mpolonia kai katapheran na diaskedasoun tis entuposeis apo ten suntribe me apo te zalgkiris kaounas ston emitelikosumphonia egine tote me ten egguese tou demosiouauto tha perasei khronos gia na epiteukhtheiauto phainetai kathara ste deutere upothese phonou te mone apo tis duo pou o mpelaskoaran saun anelabe gia logous epaggelmatikousginetai polle koubenta metaxu ton opadon tou olumpiakou gia to an o marinakes tha kanei phetos metagraphe aerodromiou opos perusi me ton rierakerdismenos tes agonistikes kai enas allos olumpiakos tou bolou pou me to diplo sten kabala apektese probadisma gia ten eisodo sta plei ophsemera ta klosteria fanco dunamikotetas adraxtion paragoun etesios kila nematon kai sugkatalegontai sta pio sugxrona tes europes axiopoiontas me ton kalutero tropo ethnikous kai koinotikous porousopheilei na kinetopoiethei amesa na akousei kai na dekhthei tis protaseis tes neas demokratias gia ten anaptuxe kai ten oikonomike anakampse na stamatesei epitelous na skotonei ten oikonomia ta oneira kai tis elpides mias olokleres genias sumpleroseemeis tha kanoume oti pernaei apo to kheri mas na exegesoume giati gia emas uparkhei prooptike uparkhei allos dromos kai kurios autos einai o dromos pou einai pros to sumpheron okhi mono ton politon tes koinonias kai tes khoras mas genikoterasuggrou sto odeon starcity kosmos megale alusida gia aples kathemerines geuseis arketa prosegmenes khalarotiko kaphe e poto se neaniko phontooktobriou sumpleronontai khronia apo te dolophonia tes pio epanastatikes morphes pou gnorise pote o planetes mas tou tse gkebarase aute ten prooptike den mas perisseuei kaneisto kuklophoriko tou sustema tou epitrepei na diaterei mekhri kai to tes thermotetas pou paragoun oi mues tou gegonos pou tou dinei megale anexartesia stis kineseis kai sto metanasteutiko taxidi touean ekhete diathese anakalupses pegainete ste lukhnaphtia konta ston triantaro ste santa margarita sta anatolika tou nesiou kai sto mali pou einai apanemos ormos me duskole prosbase kai paraxenous skhematismous brakhonsta tele maiou anamenetai na leitourgesei o xenonas pou etoimazei o thanases kostopoulos idioktetes tou comfuzioena apo ta pio palia tsipouradika sto kentro gia osous antekhoun ten tsipouroposiauper tes khoras mas mporei na leitourgesei kai e statheropoiese ton sunallagmatikon isotimion ektos tou tourismou tha ophelethoun kai oi kheimazomenes semera exagogesmia apo tis kharakteristikoteres idees tou etan oti sten exelixe den uparkhei proodos iskhuro khtupema ste skhetike ideologia pou omos den breke egkairos edaphos sten koinoniatesapo polle iose kai oi goneis uou ue steilane ston pappou uou kai ste giagia uou gia na uen kolleso ton adelpho uouta semadia koposes apo ten uperprospatheia pou katebalan oi paiktes tou mikhale petrake sta duo prota mats etan kati parapano apo emphane sto khthesino agona me sunepeia e omada tes kalamatas na kanei ousiastika peripatoena khamogelo me pampolles ermeneies kai menumata pou spanios den apotelei monimo kharakteristiko tou prosopou tousme neo tekhniko ston pagko ton gianne papakosta e omada tes larisas den kataphere na apospasei kapoio thetiko apotelesma kai pleon krinetai epitaktike e anagke gia nike sta duo sunekhomena paikhnidia pou akolouthoun sto alkazarme base ta parapano einai prophanes oti demiourgeitai ekrektiko problema pou mporei na parei anexelegktes diastaseis se baros khiliadon matheton kai ton oikogeneion tous kai malista se mia periodo pou plesiazoun oi exetaseismou ephere ki ena poteri mauro krasi pere ki o idios kai katsame antikrista se duo kharakiakhoros tes aules tou mouseiou teriant kato ap to megalo dentro kai dipla sto ekklesaki tes agias paraskeues prospheretai gia poikiles ekdeloseisto megalo paikhnidi tha dieuthunoun oi kk karouses skhoinassullepse gia narkotika sto limani tes kerkuras deutera phebrouariosmekhri to telos tes dekaetias tou autes oi oreines diadromes apotelousan ton kurio tropo epikoinonias anamesa stis periokhes tou nesiouepiloge tou onomatos antiprosopeuei te diarkeia to dienekes opos alloste kai to idio to krasito panel ton intson diathetei khrono apokrises ms gegonos pou to kathista katallelo gia paikhnidia video kai epharmoges me gregores enallages eikonastis sunnephiasmenes meres tou khronou otan o elektrikos thermosiphonas einai e mone luse ruthmiste ton thermostate tou stous bathmous oste na men spatalate askopa energeiaan peis gia komopoleis kai khoria ekei tha duskoleuteis polu perissotero na deis organo taxeosdieuthuntes tou eniaiou lukeiou agedeixan upeuthunoteta oi odegoi taxi antitheta me ten kubernese oi odegoi taxi edeixan upeuthunoteta etan to skholio tes neas demokratias gia ten prosorine anakokhe pou keruxan mekhri tis septembriou ta taxioson aphora de to zetema tes sunekheias eistoriatou demara den aphene kai polla perithoriaste diaterese ton kalon skheseon pou demiourgethekan ste diarkeia tou taxidiou tourkon sto erakleio prin apo duo peripou khronia stokheuei e nomarkhiake autodioikese erakleioueuro biomekhaniatourkai edo pou ta xanaleme amphoteroi sigoura elpizan oti kati mporei na allaxei sto mualo tou poludorouentuposiako to skeniko sto a la carte estiatorio oi aplokhoroi exoterikoi koinokhrestoi khoroi einai sigoura to proto megalo pleonektema tes monadasekho xanasunergastei se theatrikes parastaseis akome kai se theatro apeuthunomeno se paidiaoi perissoteroi ekhoun baptistei se potamous aimatosk siaphakas ekane kai pali logo gia alazonikes sumperiphores stelekhon tou khoris na anapherei stoikheia apla semeiose oti o sophos ellenikos laos den tha upokupsei stis pieseis kai milese gia politiko politismo me ten peitho na peistei o kosmosallou kati khartia petamena sto patomame mikre exairese ten prosorine anakhaitise tes tourkikes epelases sto belestino aute e poreia den emelle na anatrapei ston ena mena pou dierkesan oi polemikes epikheireseispalaiotere marturia gi autous khronologeitai to kai einai phtiagmenoi apo skhistolitho petra kai asbeste kai diakosmemenoi me diaphora skhediasemera oi protes amigos elektrikes motosukletes paragoges ede polountai eno oi megaloi kataskeuastes motosukleton epididontai meta manias sten ereuna kai exelixe neon elektrikon montelonna apagoreuoun dialexeis proskeklemenon me tous opoious diaphonounomos athoonontai oi sugkekrimenoi kategoroumenoioi xenodokhoi opos tonise eno ekhoun khremata den pleronoun to prosopiko tous alla perimenoun pote tha eispraxoun tis pleromes apo ta praktoreia kai pote tha paroun tis epidoteseis gia na to kanounto mono pou elpizo einai mepos ta biblia mas tarakounesoun ligaki se autometaxu allon omos sunetaxe to kai ena dokimio gia to tsaieikhan to pano kheri agonistika kai ekanan ntouetsi ektos sugklonistikou aprooptou o phampio koentrao anamenetai na apotelesei ten tetarte metagraphe tes basilissas meta tous sakhin altintop kai kagekhondelonoume te stathere mas pepoithese oti oi epitheseis tou sustematos axiologese asphalistiko nomoi antiekpaideutikoi apaitoun taxike enoteta pou de diasphalizetai me tis diaspaseis ton enotikon sundpateras tou mathete th aposuro te menusegumnastries proponetries maria mulona maria ilieba ero khabiaropoulou katerina mousiadouexpressgr se thetike trokhia ta apotelesmata tes proton bank ekatkh doumas oikonomologos tamias euaggelos kontomios logistes sumbouloi phaidon demopoulos dikegoros ioannes giannakenas demosiographos ekdotes aristeides kranias mekhanikos kai demetra liouliou logistriameta ap oles autes tis prospatheies o stathmos arkhise na leitourgei kanonikati tharreis mporousa na ta xekhaso bourkosan ta matia tes alla khoropedage san to mikro paidaki pou tou kharizoun to proto tou paikhnidakitote demarkhos tes egoumenitsas thomas pantos eikhe organosei se touristiko kampingk tes poles sussitio kai upnoteriooi astunomikes dunameis pou kinetopoiethekan amesa katedioxan tous lestes khoris omos kanena apotelesma mekhri stigmespatron ionikoostoso uparkhoun ta topika sumboulia pou pisteuo oti tha ekprosopesoun epaxia ta demotika diamerismata kai tha dosoume ki emeis megalo baros s autaproponetes stephan ntemol tha ekhei ten eukairia na dokimasei diaphora skhemata kai na diapistosei ek neou ten agonistike katastase ton paikton tou mia ebdomada kai kati peripou prin ten enarxe ton episemon agonistikon upokhreoseon tes omadasperipou meres tha diexaxthei e epanaleptike genike suneleuse ton metoxon tes ksiphias kathos e programmatismene gia xthes ektakte gs anabletheke logo me apartiasto programma apeuthunetai stous anergous oles tes khoras me exairese tous anergous pou prokeitai na drasteriopoiethoun stis periokhes armodiotetas tes periphereiakes dieuthunses attikes kai neson touolokleronontai deutera augoustou stis mm sto anoikhto amphitheatro tou serron oi ekdeloseis tou demou serron me ten eponumia politistiko kalokairitautokhrona tha prepei na epanethnikopoiethoun oi epikheireseis pou idiotikopoiethekan kai na ginoun nees ethnikopoieseis pkh se biomekhanies me strategike semasia tou pistotikou sustematos kathos kai tou eisagogikou emporiouoson aphora stis koinotetes oi paremeinan ametabletes kai proelthan apo sunenose allon koinotetonanamesa stis kits mpiraries kai ta mparakia apo phetos xekhorizei enas chic khoros me elleniko aeraapogoeteumenos o kosmos liges emeres prin apo tis euroekloges strephetai se allou eidous antidraseis primodotontas ten apokhe kai ten adiaphoria apenanti stis eklogeskathole ten paramone tes proedrou tou organismou tha ekhoun lephthei drakonteia metra asphaleias ta opoia suzetethekan khthes kata te diarkeia suskepses e opoia pragmatopoietheke ste genike astunomike dieuthunse xanion me te summetokhe axiomatikondiadikasia epiloges tes diadikasias anadeixes tou upopsephiou ton proodeutikon dunameon kai sto plaisio auto programmatizoun sunanteseis me kommata kai prosopaspagketi me kapnisto skoumpri kai murodika khorta grtrite augoustou party dapndphk mutilenes sto monkey me megale epitukhia pragmatopoietheke ten pempte sto monkey to party testo katestemeno pou khronia tora ekhei demiourgethei ston polikhnito agonizetai na parempodisei to ergo mas pou para tis polles antixootetes ekhei ede arkhisei dinontas kai ta prota deigmata graphessumphona me stoikheia to oson aphora stis megales oikiakes suskeues anakuklothekan psugeia klimatistika kai plunteriaanthropoi ebgainan sto dromo kai peiramatizontan se pagomata maxilaropolemo e alles draseista sunolika kerde meta apo phorous kai dikaiomata meiopsephias tou omilou anelthan tenmikhos na stamatesoume na phorologoume tous idious kai tous idious giati piso mas e koinonia phlegetaioi upologistes autoi tha mathainoun mallon apo tis empeiries tous tha suskhetizoun tha epexergazontai upotheseis kai tha thumountai kai tha mathainoun apotelesmata mimoumenoi etsi ten plastikoteta tou anthropinou egkephalou prosthetei eantitheta oi suspeiromenoi metrioi einai e kat exokhen duname tes adraneias mias koinoniasskhediasmeno me sugkhrone arkhitektonike kai aisthetike antilepse kaluptei oles tis diethneis prodiagraphesskholiazontas ten katalepse o demarkhos ioanninon philippas philios tonise pos den katanoei ten apophase tes katalepses aphou opos eipe to demotiko radiophono einai anoikto pros olouslaiko kinema anoikhto se politikous kai apolitikousopheilei semera na pei ole ten aletheia gia tous kheirismous pou ekhoun gineigi auto proedro tes omadas stauro psomiade gia te dunatoteta pou mou edose na luso to oikogeneiako problema pou eikha oste na ertho sten kabala tonise o gkolkiper kai prosthese eimai panetoimos ap oles tis pleureseinai thema khronou na prosarmostoun diaitetes kai athletes ries etsi oste na apopheugontai ta lathe me stokho ten axiopistia kai ten antikeimenikotetato axizei na to zeis tes tatianas stephanidou anebeke sto to deste tous me tous niko moutsina kai maria eliake sto kai to photes maria live stota tria limania emphanizoun megale kinese ploion kurios kata tous therinous menes den mporoun na antapexelthoun sten auxemene kinese me asphaleia an kai ta prota einai neasten poreia tes karieras tou ekhei labei plethos brabeion kai timetikon diplomaton me apokoruphoma to brabeio pulitzer mousikes gia te sumphonia louisville anapoleseis kai stokhasmoi tokhalali kai o khronos pou tha diathesoumenomos tes prosphoras kai tes zeteses skhetizetai kai me ten poiotetasumphona me plerophories mas e kentrike omilia tou sta giannina tha pragmatopoiethei eite stis septembriou eite stis septembriou me ten prote emeromenia na sugkentronei tis perissoteres pithanotetesentaxe tou sto programma pindos etan epiloge tes nomarkhiakes arkhes aphou alle pege khrematodoteses ten periodo pou ekleine to den uperkhe diathesimeoi neophotistoi ste kategoria epikratesan ektos edras tou opha me ton ekthronisan apo ten koruphe ten opoia apolambanoun pleon monoi tousse sugkrise me to proegoumeno paikhnidi emastan kaluteroi kataktesame kalutera ton agonistiko khoro alla mporoume na beltiothoume perissoterontounta episemane oti to protathlema prepei na ginei pio iskhuro gia na gemizoun kai ta gepedaoi exelixeis anamenetai na trexoun apo semera kathos o khronos piezei kai ston ophe aisiodoxoun oti tha ekhoun aisio telos me te sterixe tou barde bardinogiannesten periokhe barrio bellavista sustenontai ta estiatoria el antojo armandita kai karimkai uperkhan kai kapoioi pou etrekhan kai den ephtanan na metroun makhairopirouna se tabernes kai aphixeis skaphon sten palia epidauroden aporesate pou brethekan aphou olo kai kapoio biblio eikhate khosei se tsanta sakidio balitsagiauto leo sto demopsephisma na apophasisei o laos apla einai aparaiteto na uparkhei upeuthune enemerose tou laou gia tis luseis pou uparoun kai tis epiptoseisdiathetei akoma ephe bathous kai chorus notes megiste poluphonia kai hardware direct monitoring me medeniko latencyostoso exakolouthei na paragetai apo memonomenous paragogous kai na poleitai khuma sten ntopia agorameeting point me phobero stil polu kale kouzina kai dunate mpara einai kai tha einai to olives graf ignatievsten agrotike asphalistike kata exasphalise apo ton elleniko organismo tupopoieses e agrotike asphalistikeprokeitai gia mia tainiadramatopoiemeno ntokumanter apo te skenothete phranu armstrongk pou pragmateuetai ena upothetiko mellontiko senario xekinontas apo to otan e ge ekhei pleon katastrapheiskholiazontas ton anaskhematismo tonizei pos ilarotragodia pou zoume tis teleutaies emeres sunekhizetai me ton semerino anaskhematismouparkhei bebaia e melete tou institoutou topikes autodioikeses me base ten opoia sto nomo problepontan demoi apo tous pou einai semera kai emene adieukrinisto ti tha ginei me tis koinoteteserkhomos tou tupou dieurunei ten ennoiakhoris paterake romanake o olokleronei semera ten proetoimasia tou o en opsei tes kuriakatikes anametreses ste mutilene me ton aiolikoepises stis proteraiotetes tes kuberneses einai e anabathmise ton sunthekon kai ton meson metaphoras kai sugkoinonias e oloklerose ton khiliadon ergon pou einai se exelixe alla kai e ulopoiese neon ergon gia te biosime kai isorrope anaptuxe tes khorasoi men metanastes sunantethekan me to aphentiko tous kai apespasan te grapte desmeuse tou pos tha tous exophlesei pairnontas kapoio daneio oi de ergazomenoi ste eisepraxan kai pali uposkheseis khoris antikrisma toulakhiston mekhri stigmeskai apo ta biblia kategorias koddikia mas politeia ekhei upokhreose na tous sumparastathei kathu opoiondepote tropoparallela omos blepoun oti orismenes topikes epikheireseis kathusteroun tis pleromes ton ktenotrophon gia megalo khroniko diastemaotan sten europe oi sunetairismoi elegkhoun ten paragoge kai ten agora emeis edo adunatoume na agorasoume to gia na exasphalisoume ten pleiopsephia se mia biomekhania e opoia einai to kleidi gia ten uparxe tes ktenotrophias sten periokhe masapo ten melete ton stoikheion gia to anthropino dunamiko diapistonetai mia mikre usterese se arithmous ptukhioukhon anotates kai meses ekpaideuses se skhese me ton ethniko meso orooikonomia se sunduasmo me ten eleuse ton epikephales tes troikasse prote phase opos semeiose o prutanes problepetai na sustegastei to kai etos me to tmema dioikeses sto mikhaleio kterio mias kai me mia tropopoiese tou orologiou programmatos kati tetoio tha katastei dunatonomos e sumphonia den ulopoietheke giati anekupsan diaphora empodia kataggelies katoikon allelosugkrouomenes apophaseis upourgeioneinai anastoleis tes proteases delade mplokaroun ena enzumo ten protease ten opoia khreiazetai o ios gia na sunarmologesei ta antigrapha touanakaluphthekan ta perissotera apo tolmerous xenous kurios taxidiotes pou prospathesan na diateresoun ton partheno kharaktera tou topioumm plateia balimes akratas phtere ten etesia suneleuse tou pragmatopoiei ten kuriake stis to proi o philodasikos sullogos phteres sta grapheia tou sullogou sto khoriooi idies plerophories lene oti te proegoumene tes paraiteses ste sunedriase tou tetheke ektos ton allon kai thema tekhnikes egesiasto xenodokheiako sugkrotema einai pleros enarmonismeno kai arista topothetemeno mesa ston guro geographiko ogkoto argotero mekhri tes maiou na perimeneis exelixeisena kalokairi mou eipe pos pernouse megalo marturio den mporouse n antexei ta koutsompolia ton khorianonse oti aphora ten ereuna tekhnologia e sundese me tous kuriarkhous kladous tes topikes oikonomias paramenei akoma apospasmatikekati pou phainetai oti den mas sumpherei apo ten idia ten diadikasiaoi logoi einai polloi kai oi ergazomenoi ekhoun dikaio semeiose o proistamenos tou tmematos tekhnikes kai ugeionomikes epitheoreses nomou dramas giorgos pindonesalla o anthropos den phtiakhnetai mono me mia kommose antanakla ten prosopikoteta tou ap auto pou einai kathe meratis pername apo to gkril gia na paroun khromame polu endiapheron perimenoume kai to kainotomo programma tes elles paspalaekeino pou tous endiapherei einai e dialuse tes demosias ugeiasoikonomikon ston mikhexoplisame to me epoptika mesa oso to epetrepan sten parousa phase ta oikonomika maskai opos upogrammizei se kurio arthro tes e oikonomike ephemerida emeresia tesnotias den ekhei anoixei akoma ta khartia tou kai paramenei aphantostha to estiaso ean thelete stis aneseis pou ekhei sten diathese tou o sugkhronos anthroposproton dioti to monoomos akougame tous giatrous kai den mporouse kaneis na phantastei ti tha sumbei leei sugklonismenos o suzugossto telos telos opoios zei kato apo ton ourano mas kai ton elio ekhei to khrismaden phobamai pia to pheggari to katakhtesame amaurisame te lamperada touoi kateuthunseis autes aporreoun apo to skhedio periphereiakes anaptuxes tes periphereias kretes pou apotelei ena olokleromeno skhedio kai antimetopizei sugkrotemena kai me eniaia logike tis anagkes kai tis anaptuxiakes proteraiotetes tou nesiouepises epikheirei na deixei eikones tes kretes apo mia alle optike goniaapantese tou athenorama travel kathe gonia s auton ton xenona ekhei idiaitere prosopikoteta kai telika to ti theoreite atmosphairiko einai zetema prosopikes epilogesekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous akolouthoun kapoioi katastematarkhes demiourgethei to tameio kai mesa apo auto e stege astegon sten ksantheoi protathletes perasan sten antepithese kai katapheran na petukhoun termata me tous ouentelgkouphran kai samakkubernese prepei na dei to problema kai na thesei se leitourgia ektakta programmata khrematodoteseon uposterixe theseon ergasias me makrokhronia diarkeia pros olous tous kladouskai gia na men douleuoume ton kosmo to uliko se khrema kai se axia pou ekhei semera o olumpiakos ai basileskokkales einai to kalutero tes istorias tou kai me polu megale diaphora kalutero apo auto ton megalon ellenikon omadonarkhike selida enemerose athletika nea en parthenike tous emphanise me ta khromata tou ophh ekanan khthes oi duo neoapoktethentes paiktes giorgos georgiades kai mikael gkontbalntego mikro paidi khronon tote xephuga kapoia stigme apo te mana mou kai katebeka sto limani ten ora pou oi philikes mas oikogeneies prospathousan na mpoun se barka na pane sto karabi pou tha tous metepherne ste mutilene gia na rixoun kainourgies rizesepitheoretes tou limenarkheiou ekanan tous aparaitetous elegkhous gia na diapistothei oti to baros apo tis balitses ton ekdromeon etan megalutero apo to epitrepomeno oriostokhos einai na men epibarunontai to idio duo katokhoi autokineton gia paradeigma kubikon pou to ena taxinometheke phetos kai to allo prin apo deka khroniathelo polu na sunergasto me ten kathrin keli langk mprouk sustema teleiatrikes tes gaudou kai lene oti den ekhoun kamia euthunelouketo sta benzinadika ten pemptekuriarkhei e dike mou phigouratheatrike skene skion kai kouklotheatrou me koukles kai dakhtulokouklessto cd anamenetai na laboun meros gnostoi ellenes kallitekhnes kai ola ta esoda tha dothoun gia philanthropiko skopotzole ektelese eustokha to penalti semeionontas tosuntoma tha anakoinothei to analutiko programma ton ekdeloseontha se teleioso tha pethanete edoekhontas kai to pleonektema oti me paromoia ektase me aute tou demou grebenon diathetei ton triplasio plethusmosten argalaste arkhontiko agamemnon se paradosiako petroktisto ktiriogia analogous logous den einai pou sernetai mekhri semera sta dikasteria o proen demarkhos giorgos giannopoulos auto einai mia epiloge zontano e nekro neo diktuo udreuses gia ta grebena pempte augoustou pempte augoustou neo diktuo udreuses tha apoktesei e pole ton grebenon me apophase tou periphereiarkhe dutikes makedonias giorgou dakeagnostos seismologos pou tha balei ta gualia stous ellenes epistemonesthema prosarmoges den uparkheite sullepse tou giounes phainetai na eikhe diataxei o idios o ampntel tzaliletan mia sunergasia tsigarasemera khreiazomaste ereunetike epitrope enos atomou na mas pei gi aute ten apophase pou sigoura etan politikekubernese nomothetei kai apo aute den ekhoume labei kamia desmeuse tonise o k skentzoskseroume oloi pos edo kai duo dekaeties apo ten aplerote kai doulike ergasia metanaston kai prosphugon epophelountai megala alla kai mikra aphentika se ole te khorauparkhoun polla krisima kai ton pantele konstantinide me tous opoious erthe se sumphonia gia ten analepse tes tekhnikes egesias tou dikephalou tou borraperikopes theseon ergasias anakoinose e auxese kata semeiosan ta kerde tou trapezikou omilou tes sta disto upoloipo meros tou nauagiou phainetai pos ekhei me ten parodo ton pente aionon kaluphthei apo ammoepithumo para polu na doume ten pragmatikoteta me tharros kai khoris kamia esoterike parakhoresesas to leo sunekheia kai tha sas to po kai pali semera o proponetes mas ekhei phtiaxei mia omada pou tha trekhei lepta sunekheia se olous tous khorous tou gepedoukalos na elthei loipon kai to skhedio dioiketikes anadiarthroses tes khoras upo ten kodike onomasia kallikratestetarte augoustou sto congas sto molubo khtupese e kardia tes protomagias auto to sabbato epikratese pragmatika to adiakhoreto eno den etan ligoi ekeinoi pou ekanan kai tis protes bouties tous ste thalassaotan arkhizoun oi dikes gia to makedoniko e kommounistike diethnes ekhei ede anagnorisei to arkhiko tes lathos kai ekhei anatheoresei tis anedaphikes apophaseis peri anexartetes makedonias kai thrakesoi gonies omos pou theorountan kati to idiaitero mias kai etan mono duo skhetizontai me to phulo kataphtheirontai sto epikheirematiko kosmo tes pgdm epikheirematikoteta antimetopizei paradosiakous rolous kathos olo kai perissoteres gunaikes analambanoun ta enia egetikon mikhalakopoulou athenaatoma se skhese me ton ioulio tou eno oi nees aiteseis gia epidomata anergias emphanizontai meiomenes kata se skhese me ton proegoumeno menamas perimenoun oi nekroi masme mia tetoia aphorme protoerthe exallou kai e idia sten elladabrekame ton k oikonomou kai kathisame kai to suzetesame me te boetheia kai ten parousia kai tou k stulianideomos den prototupesanmm antapokrithoume se aute ten apostole tonise o mpegliteskhamene tsanta natasa kalogride epistrephei sto dancing with the stars photeine pipile demetres kranias to khroma tou pheggariou epeismporei mont limperasion ka gia to thanato tou mikhale kakogianne oi proetoimasies gia ten kedeia prokhorounsto epistemoniko programma tou sunedriou tha exetasthoun ola ta kardiologika zetemata ta opoia prokeitai na apotelesoun iatrokoinonika problemata ta epomena khroniamegale parembase pou tha allaxei ten eikona tes periokhes aphora ten axiopoiese ton stremmaton tou paliou ippodromou pou tha ginei khare ste megale dorea tou idrumatos stauros niarkhos e opoia tha xeperasei ta ekatekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous karamanle oi agrotes epedeixan megalutere anokhe ap oti sten kubernese papandreou ta duo prota galazia khronia oute pou anapsan ta trakter tousta seminaria tha pragmatopoiethoun to sabbato noembriou kai te kuriake noembriou apo tis eos tiseinai prophanes oti e apantese tou kharise theoreitai polu semantike gia ton kolosso giati sten agora den briskontai diathesimoi ellenes senterkhasame mia makhe alla sunekhizoume me akmaies tis dunameisapedeixe epises tis ikanotetes mazikes kinetopoieses pou diathetei kathos kai ten asummetria ton meson kathe stratopedoukai malista thumethekan oti kai oi idioi oregontan enan tetoio dromoepises e prospherei pio aneta kathismata ston stantar exoplismo tes kai me mia mikre epibarunse mporoun na paraggelthoun kai perissoteres dunatotetes ruthmises opos epises me sterixe gia te meseokhi me esokommatika gkalop alla me demosieumenak gerothanases sto khairetismo tou exephrase ten ikanopoiese tou apo ten prosphora tes zappeiou epitropes pros tous phoitetes tou panepistemiou ioanninon kai parallela semeiose ten takhuteta me ten opoia oloklerotheke to ktirioto biblio apokta phanatikous anagnostes apogeionei te phantastike logotekhnia genikotera kai odegei akoma ste demiourgia ton legomenon paikhnidion rolon opos to dungeons kentro paidiou kai ephebouste zoula loipon mesountos tou therous ste diarkeia ton diakopon prospathei e kubernese na xemperdepsei me themata semantika pou khreiazontai dialogo peitho sunaineseante exoterikoto bradu tou megalou sabbatou sten petra eidame kamia allodapous touristesos antikatastate tou nearou mesou ston giannina exetazoun ton sotere leontiou tou panathenaikou pou mporei na paixei autokineta tous kathos e amolubde tha phthasei sto euro to litrooikonomike katastase tes khoras den einai allothi gia ten apempolese zetematon pou aptontai tes exoterikes politikes semeiose o kostas kinetron tes thrakes ektos autes einai prophanos adikeap ten alle omos opos sunekhize to palio kommatiko stelekhos tes tha etan aparadekto na apophasistei gia paradeigma na parameinoun os ex officio sunedroi oi bouleutes kai oi nomarkhes na men einaimeta katalabe to lathos tou kai prospathese na to summazepsei alla e zemia eikhe gineiten anagke prootheses tou ellenikou emporiou sten periokhe tes mesogeiou episemainei e e opoia desmeutheke na summetaskhei energa sto sunedrio tes euromed to opoio programmatizetai ton ioulio e to septembrio sten italiamepos tora metaniose o panionios den xero
