asphalismenon tou apo odontiatro amese paraitese tou diorismenou dkte tou k kontou kai ton melon tou kai ekloge neas dioikeses apo tous asphalismenousmporeite na proseggisete ten periokhe kai me pheri mpoout apo ten arkitsa aidepsoden einai apithano na parameinei ste luonepises o sioutes etan melos tes ethnikes omadas paidon pou katelabe ten these sto europaiko protathlema tou ste boudapeste kai tes ethnikes ephebon e opoia katektese to asemenio ste balkaniada prousapara tauta katargeitai gia logous me eparkos peistikous kai malista se mia epokhe opou polla sobara europaika kai ethnika themata einai se exelixe prostithetainees taseis kai neesbasileiou stratonikes gkazi plerophories kai mesemetan isos to pleon panegurismeno gkol tes teleutaias dekaetias gia tondrastes epebaine sto takhuploo to opoio to apogeuma tes deuteras eikhe proseggisei ten paralia agia pelagia kerkuras kai eikhe aporripsei ste thalassa sakous pou perieikhan narkotikes ousiesap den einai katholou duskolote deutera lkh tha ginei suzetese me thema kritike kritikoi kai biblio me omiletes ton kosta boulgare ton paulo matesi ten ekdotria ioanna khatzenikole kai suntoniste ton demosiographo basile kalamaraomos erthan kai kapoioi apo ton panathenaiko epeide eprepe tote na erthoun ki alloi apo to exoteriko ki etsi den pera eukairies ostoso o kasmerides kanei upomone kai elpizei oti kapoia stigme tha tou dothei e eukairiasunekhizoun oi anoetoi ten probokatsia apo to diadiktuo mono ekei tous pairnei giati ola einai khuma ki oti thelei o kathenas graphei gia ten dethen anexartesia tes kreteskai to kako einai oti stous perissoterous sumpiptoun kai oi ores me oti auto sunepagetaiteleutaios tenedios einai enas o konstantinosopos anaphertheke eidika sto nomo hrakleiou ten proegoumene khronia semeiothekan ergatika atukhemata ap ta opoia ta etan se oikodomes kai ta se koines epikheireseisteleiosan duo apo te beroia mporei to mualo tes beroias na einai perissotero strammeno sten oristike apophase gia ten telese e me ton agonon pleioph auto omos den semainei pos den trekhei parallela o programmatismos tes neas khroniasepises problepetai pos e ektakte eisphora koinonikes euthunes sta kerde ton epikheireseon tha epiblethei ephoson uperbainoun tis euroto oikonomiko epiteleio elpizei na ekhei katalexei mekhri ton phebrouario se sugkekrimena metra phorologiko kai asphalistiko ta opoia tha stathmistoun apo ten komision kai to gia tis telikes apophaseis gia to khrono periorismou tou elleimmatossumphona me ten anakoinose ton ioulio e etaireia tha xekinesei kai te diathese exi neon akoma teleoraseonperasa duo omorpha khronia sten europe kai leo apla oti oi paiktes prepei na exetazoun ola ta dedomena delose o amerikanos phorgouorntanamesa stous katoikous tes etan o aglaos enan tapeinos georgos pou apolambane te zoe se auton ton panemorpho topo kai ton opoio to manteio ton delphon kharakterise eutukhestero tou pamploutou kroisoupros ton upotithemeno monodromo tou mnemoniou pou odegei me mathematike akribeia te khora sten katastrophe kai ton lao se bathia dustukhiaalloste opos mas exegese to theatro kai e demosiographia sundeontai amesaathenon sto hrakleio tes k andriane ypeuthunes prosopikou tou benizeleiou nosokomeiou kai tes sunodou mas tes k theodorakenikos kougias thumise entona tis klasikes epokhes ton megalon souter tou philippou kai pera apo duname didaxe tekhnike me takhutetamalista den eikhe duo menes pou eikhe exelthei apo ten phulake gia ten upothese pou proanapheramekentrikos khoros etan prosbasimos apo mia thura ston dutiko khoro pou eikhe phragei sten arkhaiotetametaxu allon paraleipomenon tes epokhes o suggrapheas anapheretai sto epeisodio koukide kai sta stoikheia pou kata te gnome tou to tekmerionountha epistrepsei metaniomene ste suzugike kline te stigme pou mia alle exegerse mousoulmanike auten te phora tha akoumpesei to idio tes to spitikohepworth aisthantheke te philoxenia kai te gennaiodoria ton katoikon tou st ives apo ten prote kiolas stigme kai emeine ekei mekhri to thanato tes togios tou k giannes agorastides milontas sto bema leei oti o pateras tou einaisunethos de zetoun khremata gia auten te metaphora aphou stokhos tous einai na exasphalisoun pelates gia ta domatia tousemerida diorganotheke epeita apo protoboulia tou genikou grammatea tes apokentromenes dioikeses thumiou sokouemeis os ellada agnooume tis basikes kateuthunseis tes exoterikes tes politikes tonise kai upogrammise oti to biblio ton giallourideaphentoule prospherei mia polu kale eukairia na gnorisoume te geitona khorato oikonomiko den mas aphora phantazomai oti tha kanei to kalutero e dioikese tes enosesakome gia prote phora ekhoume dei dieuthunte pou na ekhei ten porta tou panta anoikhte kai na dekhetai kathe asphalismeno kai suntaxioukho prothumos na dosei exegeseis kai na lusei problemataspantos o k apostolakes dieukrinise oti apo ten krete oi tha leitourgoun gia tis anagkes tou dogmatos pou tha uperetoun to idio kala kai apotelesmatikaan epibebaiothoun oi plerophories pou tous theloun na ekhoun ede doulepsei pano sten upothese ekmetalleuomenoi te demosiopoiese tou porismatos tes k papandreou tote den apokleietai ta mantata na erthoun suntomoterates mises zoes tesemeis apla tha ekhoume to problema me te rupanse kai to thorubooi endiapheromenoi kalountai na upobaloun aiteseaphou ten perasmene bdomada xesekosan ta kerde apo to khrematisterio tora epistrephounsuneleuse kai me parontes proedros tou sundesmou milontas stousepiballetai e anathese ston phorea diakheirises ektelestikes exousias kai parakhorese olon ton armodioteton tou ellenikou demosiou kathos kai exasphalise oikonomikon dunatoteton oste aproskoptos na epitelesei ten apostole tou kai na ektelesei ergasunantese tou k muriokephalitake me ton kosta staurakake tou opoiou to sumbolaio legei to dekembrio tha ginei argoterathemata demotikou sumbouliou kilkis gia ten trite sabbato phebrouarios demosia taktike sunedriase tou demotikou sumbouliou kilkis tha pragmatopoiethei ten trite phebrouariou kai orauparkhoun alloi athletes apo os etonsumbole tou kitsou makre ste gnorimia me te zoe kai to ergo tou theophilou sto pelio apo te nanou maria theologo kai istoriko tes buzantines tekhnes kai ten karathanase balia philologotetarte augoustou treis stis pente edres kerdise e stis ekloges gia ten anadeixe tes topikes dioikousas epitropes teseuro alla para tis dapanes petukhe oikonomiko pleonasma euro kai ekhei lambanein epipleon euroemperiekhei kai to tragiko kai to komiko demiourgontas mia idiotupe atmosphaira pou den ten ekhoun ta alla duo eidekanete khrese epikheirematon ta opoia endiapheroun ena mikro arithmo ekpaideutikon oi opoioi den antimetopizoun ta problemata tes ekpaideuses me thetiko tropoauto sumphona me ton k samara apotelouse protase tes apo ton dekembrio toudemopratese ton ergasion auton tha ginei to suntomotero kai parallela me ten exelixe tou allou diagonismou oste mesa sto kalokairi na uparkhoun anadokhoi gia to sunolo tou ergouarkhiepiskopos athenon ieronumos anapheretai idiaitera sta deina pou perna o topos legontas oti oses phores to genos mas ephthase sta oria tes exouthenoses e elpida tes anastaseos to anedeixe pali romaleo kai anastemenooti pragmati orismena apo auta ta sumbolaia den ta eikhe metagrapseipoiese einai diakhute sten ellada ten aisthanomai pantou enas emphutos romantismos kai e patroparadote tragikoteta mas sta laika tragoudia ste mousike sten poiese ten idia kai ston tropo antimetopises tes zoeskerukos kai epistropheme ubridiko stolo taxi tha eikhame epises polu ligotere ekhorrupanse kathos ta okhemata auta leitourgoun sto kentro me ton elektrokinetera khoris thorubothelo apla na ekmetalleuto tis eukairies mouotan eisai khoregos e ekheis exousia tote ola genikeuontaidiabaste opos akribos tuponontai to proto aeroplano me udrogono to aeroplano antares trokhodromei sto aerodromio tou ambourgou opou apotelei kai te semantikotere atraxion sugkentronontas ta phota tes demosiotetas pano toutetarte augoustou mm diamakhe regaapostolou me te metropole ksanthes gia ta koritsia me ta maura ksanthe se antiparathese briskontai e metropole ksanthes kai peritheoriou me tous theatrikous suggrapheis tou ergou ta koritsia me ta maurapaiktes ekhei aporripsei epises ten protase tou thessalonikesstase pleromon ekhei epereasei kai tis prooptikes kathos oi mises skhedon epikheireseis ektimoun oti tha meiosoun tis paraggelies pros tous prometheutes tous kata to epomeno exameno eno to ektima oti tha meinoun stathereskai alla autonoeta episemainei sten ekthese tou kai stis protaseis tou o dioiketes tes trapezas tes elladosprote etan ste melbourne to otan oi philipo manini kai mprent khanten kolumpesan se taaitia ekhei na kanei me to idio to paketo ton euroeklogon kai ton protagoniston tousepises e ergasia apotelese erethisma gia ten euaisthetopoiese ton paidion apenanti sto periballonneon metokhon me katabole metreton apophasise metaxu allon e ektakte genike suneleuse tes katseles pou pragmatopoietheke khthesokhi mono den emoun mprosta otan skototheke e lina alla den ten exothesa ego s aute ten praxe toniseauta ta paratsouklia antikatoptrizoun ten apostrophe kai ten aedia pou etrephan gia tous maurous kai tous irlandous oi anoteres leukes koinonikes taxeispragmatopoiethekan ta egkainia tou ktiriou tou armenikou demotikou skholeiou lemesouproerkhetai apo to maroko kai to onoma tou semainei to kalutero tou magazioueimaste sten arkhe mias megales ethnikes nikes e patrida mas perna apo theseis ntropes se theseis uperephaneias oson aphora sto kapnismaanekei sten idia to kai agorasteke toto teliko skhedio ton xenon trapezon gia ten elladakatagetai apo tis zestes periokhes tes indias opou kalliergeitai edo kai khroniabazoume sten katapsuxe kai anakateuoume me ena pirouni kathe ores phoreseinai endeiktika auta pou sas leoepises khresimopoieitai se trophima me khamele thermidike axia kathos epises kai os sumpuknotesaphorme e katsika ton kapouleton pou ephage ta skoinia tes barkas ton montegonmetamorphose tzitzikas ekhei parei ten telike tou morphe an kai akoma einai san phantasma oloaspros diaphanos se liges ores teleio entomo tha mporesei na petaxei na zeugarosei na gennesei abgapsemata pou ekporeuontai apo mekhanismous propagandas sto esoteriko kai sto exoteriko mekhanismoi oi opoioi me proskhema ten oikonomike krise sten patrida mas orgiazoun kathe deuteroleptoexairetika piata anamesa tous polles ntopies spesialitetrite psephophoria gia te suntheke programmatisteke gia tis ianouariou ste douma opou to komma tes enomenes rosias ekhei ten apolute pleiopsephiakhara mou den perigraphetaiden mporoume na miloume gia gkrizes zones se mia toso anoikhte diadikasiaoti ta krate nomimopoioun to diakratiko sustema kai den nomimopoiountai apo autoalatizoume kai psenoume se metrio phourno xeskepasto mekhri na rodokokkiniseiapo khthes to apogeuma e apostole brisketai sto mpormio opou arkhise ede proponeseis eno tha dosei kai pente philika paikhnidiabazoume ten krema se ena mpol diametrou eksergey einai katokhos ptukhiou me diakrise sta mathematika kai ten episteme upologiston apo to panepistemio tou merilant sto college parkdemosiographos tes aigaiou kolozes autoptes kai enas ek ton pneumatikon idiokteton tou optikou ulikou pou diakinetheke panellenios exegei oti den parenebe sebomenos te deontologiakata te diarkeia tes paramones tou tha tou dothei e eukairia na episkephthei ton gio tou manole pou kanei to metaptukhiako tou sten biokhemeia os upotrophos sto panepistemio tou arbor tou michiganopoios boleuetai apo tis exelixeis sto talaiporemeno elleniko podosphairo speudei na tis ekmetalleuteiethnike danias tha antimetopisei ten antistoikhe tes skotias kai me ten prote omada tha agonistei kai o ntenis romental tou olumpiakou o opoios omos den brisketai sta agonistika plana ton eruthroleukonkatabase diarkei ores kai perilambanei stase gia xekourase sta liberaautou ton opoio uperetei na phantasteite o kurios tsoklesekdelose oloklerotheke me ten apaggelia enos poiematos apo te dieuthuntria tou stathmou ka galuphianakeautos einai kai o logos pou diakheirizetai polu prosekhtika ta khremata tes den eimai katholou spatale alla oute kai tsigkounatelos opos eikhame grapsei kai prokhthes e beroia tha perimenei ton koutroumano mono os eleuthero apo tenanaptukhtheke to skeptiko pou tha diepei te leitourgia ton tmematon kai stis epomenes sunanteseis tha prosdioristoun oi epi merous leptomereies opou kai tha katagraphoun episema se praktiko upogegrammeno ekaterothen gia ten terese tousgenike grammateia ekpaideuses enelikon touedo tha sunantesete dekades pagkous me akhnistes katsaroles pou teganizoun phalaphel gia tous perastikousposo kostizei e anthropine zoe polu kalo to erotema apo te gnome tes khiou me aphorme ta prosphata thanatephora trokhaia atukhemataden tha to skholiasoti ekhei allaxei kai giati den ten apodekhtheke apo tote aphou uperkhe os phainetai e prothese otan tha prospherotan kai khronos gia diorthotikes kineseis to topio einai xekatharo kai me poious orous tha ginei e diethnes diaskepse kai ti tha semainei adiexodotora zo kai kinoumai metaxu ioanninon kai epeirouparaterountai monimes maranseis idiaitera se ampelia pou den potizontaime deloseis tou sto fox sports o manatzer tou gigantosomou senter mingji tonise pos ekhei programmatistei sunenteuxe tupou stis iouliou ste sangkai sten opoia tha anakoinothei ti prokeitai na ginei me to mellon tou kinezoualla den tou bgaineianaphorika me ta epiteugmata tou se paikhnidia pou agonisteke sunolika breke ton dromo gia ta dikhtua phoresna episemanoun to problema pou ekhei kai pou to sernei edo kai polu kairogia auto ntora mou me sugkhuzesai den axizei ton kopodeutere ebdomada ena poteri meigma botanon me mia koutalia meli sun ta upoloipaekhe kata nou oti e base tou makigiaz sou aute te sezon prepei na tairiazei apoluta sto phusiko tono tou dermatos soupleromaton aktoploikon epibategon ploion pou sumphonetheke metaxu kai enoses ephopliston aktoploiasproteine mia epanastase pou tha kanei ten koinonia na sunennoethei kai na demiourgesei ugieis periphereiakes omades me sumpnoiakhoris kinetro e madergouelto neo gepedo tes larisas einai kai mesogeiako ergoapergiake e semerine emera kai isos oi demosioi upalleloi einai oi monadikoi pou de phobountai na summetekhoun aphou prostateuontai apo te monimotetata kephalia ta phtiakhnoume me mini mpiskotabeltionei te phusike katastase kai ten antokhesto plaisio tes paramones ton kallonon sto candia maris diorganotheke o diagonismos omorphias opou oi upopsephies summeteikhan me enthousiasmotelika khthes to apogeuma erthe mia anakoinose pou mas enemerone oti ekhei stalei gia plerome mia lista me onomata kai okhi me pou graphame emeisto mekos tes einai sta metraepises kalountai osoi paragogoi summetekhoun sto programma tes olokleromenes diakheirises kai ekhoun kanei metabibase dikaiomaton gia ten periodo tou na to gnostopoiesoun sten enose apo te megale deutera eos kai ten paraskeue aprilioupalepse kai etan akros uakhetikosme dedomeno oti ethnikoi poroi den diatithentai eukola anarotietai kaneis pos perimenoun na sunekhistei to ergotous esteile o aperkhomenos proedros tes souper ligkanotia o aliakmonas khorizei to bermio apo ta pieria ore kharizontas mas ten monadikes omorphias koilada toume sobaroteta ki euthune proskenioparaskenioborra poios laos ekhei apo tis megaluteres periodous adeias sten europe oi germanoiaitia gia ton semerino mou mempsimoiro skholiasmo einai e prospatheia pollon kubernetikon paragonton na aitiologesoun ten athetese e sten kalutere periptose ten metathese sto apotero mellon ton proeklogikon tous uposkheseoneinai na dosoume anaptuxiake prooptike koinonike dikaiosune ki anasugkrotese tou kratousellenikos telikos opou oi upopsephioi tha parousiasoun live ta tragoudia tha ginei sto studio alpha kai tha metadothei zontana apo ten stis me parousiastries ten rika bagiane kai ten tzene mpalatsinoukaragiannide sophia stege grammaton kai kalon tekhnondike mas douleia einai paradosiakeauto etan mia orexe pou proekupse meta tis ekloges kai sunekhistheke mekhri ten khthesine anadeixe tou neou proedroualloi briskoun to bathu pio graphiko kai romantiko theretro alloi den allazoun me tipote to puthagoreio pou einai pio zontano kai touristiko alla paramenei atmosphairikoksekiname ten ergasia apo semera giati oi emeres einai duskoles delose o k tomarasbebaia paramenei agnosto poses posotetes perasan pros to esoteriko tes katagrapheke enas thanatos apo khrese narkotikon eno to oi thanatoi etan metopo tes lathrometanasteuses oi sullepseis etan apo ten albaniaoi phakes boethoun sten auxese siderou ston organismo apantese tou athenorama umami perissoteres eroteseis kai apanteseis ekheis apantese se aute ten erotese dose tedelade sto kentro tou bounouergazomenoi demotikon epikheireseon aplerotoi epi menes kataskenosan sten eisodo tou demarkheiouorthodoxos akademia kretes diathetei klines se diklina domatia apo ta opoia ekhoun mpalkoni me thea pros te thalassa souites kai domatia gia atoma me eidikes anagkesanakoinosan akome episema osa ekhei ede grapsei e peri anadiorganoses tou sundikalistikou kinematos ton agroton me ten anasustase ton agrotikon sullogonkserame oti an parameinoume proselomenoi sto stokho mas tha etan arketo gia na paroume te nikeuphese ekhei plexei kai ten agora ton tukheron paikhnidion ptose sta kathara kerde tou b trimenou trite augoustou meiose ton katharon kerdon deuterou trimenou ekatkharitatos kai karameros tha upoduthoun tous eautous tous opote phantazomaste oti de tha duskoleutoun idiaiteraoi ekdeloseis xekinoun me te theatrike parastase tes kakomoiras ten trite augoustou stis to braduanalutika gnorise ten etta sto apo ton olumpiako bolou me skor me ton diaitete tritsone arnetiko protagoniste na diamorphonei me tis apophaseis tou to paikhnidi katadikazontas ten se mia adike ettaekei loipon e anekdiegete mpagern kataphere na khasei kai pali apo ten mpornto kai e mone mas paregoria einai oti pleon me ten etta tes aute ekhase kathe elpida gia prokrise kai paei spiti tesoi ekdeloseis khthes xekinesan stis to proi me episeme doxologia sto metropolitiko nao tou agiou mena khorostatountos tou sebasmiotatou arkhiepiskopou kretes k timotheouotan prospathei na uperaspistei enan antirresia sumpolemiste tou kai to graphei ston patera tou sten epomene adeia antimetopizei ten patrike aporripsemilontas me to demarkho metsobou kosta tzaphea mas epibebaiose tis dusoiones problepseis gia ptose tes episkepsimotetas auta ta khristougenna semeionontas kharakteristika kathe perusi kai kaluteragia to zetema auto rotetheke o k bletsas kai e apantese tou etan saphes den tha anekhthoume o demos mas na ginei skoupidotopos tou nomouempeiros tekhnikos xekinese ten podosphairike tou kariera apo ton atrometo ioanninon eno to metagrapheke sta giannenasto telephonomekhri kai tis arkhes tou me ten epiklese ergasiakou phortou parapempotan gia argotera e ekdose tes apophasesapospasma tes ephemeridas salpigx tes tetartes maiouapodose ton ellenikon omologon diamorphotheke sto kai e time tous stis monadesbathmologia tes kritikes epitropes tha ekhei baruteta kai e telepsephophoria tou koinou tha ekhei barutetastremmata prosphata katakurothekan se idiote sten periokhe kataphutou proen kotori aspropotamou me ten idia logike khare se ena phirmani pou orize oti o soultanos gia ta omorpha matia mias ellenidas tes edine stremmata sten oikogeneia teskhora mas einai idanikos proorismos gia to wakeboarding pou sunduazei surf snowboard skate kai water skibionoume te nea epokhe kai eimaste upokhreomenoi na baloume to komma ste nea khilieteridakalomageiremena piata emeras tha breite sto estiatorio tsoukali sten prokumaia mesemeri braduleuko phose einai e omikhle ekei molis diakrinetai ena dendrullioaggelike einaipara tis pieseis na apokalupsei esto kai tis protolies skepseis tou to apephuge kai perioristeke na pei oti oi idioktetes ton taxi otan miloun gia plethusmiaka kriteria ennooun oti prepei na tethoun etsi oste na men dinetai e dunatoteta ekdoses neon adeiontourkika makhetika parenokhlesan aeroskaphos ton kupriakon aerogrammonoi times tha anakoinothoun se suntomo khroniko diastematautokhrona ta megala erotemata dikhazountrite triada tha einai meaphou mas mastourosan me ten pagkosmia diakubernese egkathistontas idiotupe oikonomike khounta tora apopoinikopoioun pleros te khrese narkotikon ousion gia na mastourosoun kai kata kuriolexia tous ellenesgermanos kagkelarios gkerkharnt srenter exephrase me epistole tou ta sullupeteria tou pros ton amerikano proedro tzortz mpouspio diallaktikos ostoso alla khoris na xekatharisei ti tha kanei emphanisteke o th rompopoulossto paramuthi sten odo odusseos o stelios serbirei aphthones mezedoistories kai spitika piataphiltate patrida mas bionei se oles tis diastaseis ten oikonomike krise pou omos einai prota apo ola apotelesma tes pneumatikes kai ethikes kriseos pou bionei apo dekaeties o laos masenose gunaikon elladasoi phemes pou kuklophoresan sten agora gia proore entaxe tes khoras mas ste zone tou euro anathermanan to endiapheron ton ependuton me apotelesma oi times na anakampsounogdonta treis sunolika lathrometanastes sunelephthesan ten se ole ten epeiro kai epanaproothethekan ste khora touseinai mageiremeno apla me ten authentike paradosiake suntagepara tis prospatheies pou katebale e dioikese gia to kleisimo kapoiou philikou paikhnidiou auto den kateste dunato ki etsi oi paiktes tha perioristoun sto proponetiko programmakentrikos stauros sto dapedo me molubi idiaitera photismenos prokalei deos prin akoma phtasei o episkeptesispanos tekhnikos enemerose ton proedro tou olumpiakou baggele marinake oti einai kalummenos me tous markano kai kholempas gia te these tou aristerou mpakpoia etan e stigme pou edose othese stous athletes oste na paroun tous titlous etan stigmes kai idiaitera to proto paikhnidi pou kerdisame ton mesa ste gluphadasumballoun ste diamorphose tes eklogikes boulesesean eniskhuthoun kata to pou leipei tha apotelesei ena terastio problemaostoso opos episemainei o demarkhos mesa stis epomenes emeres anamenetai na xekinesei e demopratese mias seiras ergon pou kharakterizontai idiaiteres semasias gia to demo agiou nikolaouanokhe mou stous antipalous den einai pia adiaphoria e periphronese einai e batheia epignose tou oti ekhoune ki autoi dikiogi auto molis auta auxethekan emphanistekan pieseis stis trapezikes metokhes epilektikaepesan sta dikhtua tou tetarte augoustou trite augoustou katatheseis sunolikou upsous ekekdothekan antitupa apo ta opoia uparkhoun akoma semera ste diakheirise tou demouapophasisteke na diorganothei kampania enemeroses ton paragogon pou tha perilambanei emerides se staphulokhoriatria apo ta exi mele sumplerosan ede duo khronia theteias pou apoteloun kai to anotato orio sunekhomenes paramones stis sugkekrimenes theseistheloun na ekphrasoun m auto ton tropo ten antithese tous stis perikopes kondulion kai proslepseon stoepises ekhei ede katartistei kai demosieuthei to neo diathematiko eniaio plaisio programmatos spoudontelos tes ebdomadas tha milesei me ton proedro tou sullogou k papakaliate eno ston agona me ton are ste thessalonike tha agonistei o mpanonto mono pou leipei apo to nesi mas einai to kai oi ephemerides mou leei o xanthos galanomates kurios piso apo to tameio sto souper market sto bathu kai den mporo para na sumphoneso mazi touedo mesa kapoioi einai apsogoi ki exo metatrepontai se terataglitose apo phulake glitose apo basanistikes anakriseis kai apo demosies diapompeuseiseidikotera kathe soste apantese pairnei enan bathmo kai ste sunekheia e telike bathmologia sas sto test pollaplasiazetai me ton sunteleste ekhei diarkeiaephta gious kai ephta koritsia apektese loipon e medeia kai thelontas kata ten uposkhese tes eras na ta kanei athanata ta pere sto nao opou ta upebale se orismenes dokimasiesourimpari ebgale ten kathete mpalia kai o kroates senter phor den duskoleuteke na nikesei gia deutere phora ton gkolkiper touto kathestos prepei na paradosei ten exousia gia na apopheukhthei peraitero aimatokhusia delose o mparak ompama kalontas tous antikathestotikous na sebastoun tous amakhousligo prin kai oi tesseris mazi me philous tous diaskedazan sten plateia tou prophete hlia sto paneguri pou ginotan ekeisarosan oi mathetes tes lesbou ste b phase tou panelleniou skholikou protathlematos kopelasias orpheas enantion olumpou kai akhilleas enantion ethnikou gia mia these sten topikepara ta oikonomika problemata pou kata kairous parousiazontaioi agogoi phusikou aeriou kostizoun pio phtena apo ten metaphora tou me tanker kai etsi e epektase tous anamenetai na apotelesei te monime kai stathere luseme arketa endiapheronta paikhnidia sunekhizontai semera ta topika protathlemata se oles tis kategoriesauto tha ekhei os apotelesma to diktuo ton aerodiadromon sto athenon na katarreusei kai e ellada na khasei ta ekatsostos polites einai o enemeromenos politesempeirognomonas tou nauagiou tou samina kathegetes papanikolaou mila sten ta ellenika ploia einai asphale mekhri apodeixeos tou antithetouopote auta den uparkhoun pouthena diadiktuaka den uparkhei pouthena e plerophoria mazemene sussoreumeneoraia pasa tou skoko ston tzimpour pou mpeke sten periokhe apo aristera gurise ten mpala sto upsos tou penalti alla to plase tou gkereiro ephuge pano apo ta dokaria tou sephakepolloi katoikoi tes poles antidroun kai dikaiologemena sten eikona ton paratemenon autokineton tonizontas oti empodizoun ten kuklophoria kai apoteloun estia molunses kai kindunou kurios gia ta mikra paidiadedomene theoreitai os gnosto kai e kataskeue tou sphageiou sto arkalokhoriprosarmosmene kathara ste mesogeiake nootropia kalobalmene me aphthono kai abiasto khioumorkai to aroma tous e antamoibe masme koutalaki tou glukou diamorphonoume sphikhtes koutalies soupias grekhete khresimopoiesei te zone tou karate nai to ekho kanei kai mporeite na rotesete ton suzugo moukrataei konta duo ores kai einai empeiria monadikeodikos axonas pou ekhei meletethei gia na enosei to neo limani me ten pathe einai mekous peripou metron me duo lorides kuklophorias ana kateuthunse diakhoristiko diazoma se olo to mekos tou kai pezodromia metron ana pleura tes odouoi plerophories anapheroun pos ekhoun ede pragmatopoiethei arketes epaphes me omilous pou pithanos endiapherontai na apoktesoun to pososto peri to pou katekhoun oi minoikes sten etairia telepikoinonionoson aphora to plethos ton parastaseon ekhei parelthei pia e epokhe ton paidion me tis medamines proslambanousessugkekrimena sto lepto o eleutheriades me sout apo konta ekane to kai sto lepto o bakouphares me atomike prospatheia kai plase to pou emelle na einai to telikoarthrographoi enemerose philenewscom tetarte iouliou pm aristos mikhaelides mia egesia pou xerei tis euthunes tes pou graphoume auto to keimeno den xeroume pos exelikhtheke e nukhta me tis duo ekdeloseis mesa kai exo apo to proedrikoto brabeio omos egine aphorme gia kati akome pio semantikota agiou giorgiou oi suggeneis ton phreskon apethamenon ekamnane tis pites me ladi kai zakhare isame okades kai to moiratzan stous anthropouskai pisteuo oti o antagonismos kai e amilla mporei na boethesoun pleonparti gia te nea sulloge tes neas sezon swarovski me ta phtera tes phantasias sabbato iouliou steilte apo to kineto sas to menuma sto gia na labete dorean dokimastiko kodiko diarkeias duo emeronmone elpida autes tes katastases einai na mathe o laos autos na papsei na elpizei se kommata kai na parei is euunes tou kai te zoe tou sta kheria toususkepse gia to paremporio argese na gineisumbolike katalepse sto mouseio kai ton arkhaiologiko khoro tes akropoles pragmatopoiesan to proi tes kuriakes oi idioktetes taxi oi opoioi moirasan phulladia stous touristes kai epetrepan ten eleuthere eisodoola deikhnoun oti e ekhei khasei to treno kai o khronos ergazetai se baros teseureia nike moskholiou sto neo demo agriniou deutera noembriosstoma plousio me entone aisthese bareliou glukuteta kai tonismene oxuteta pou isorropei to sunolosto hrakleio stis maiou e makhe sunekhizetai eos to braduki auto giati me ten isunepeia tou are den mporei pote na eisai sigourosopos sten prokhtesine omilia tou stous mathetesellada opos tha eprepe na te blepoun oi xenoi khoris problemata kai politika enokhletikes leptomereies se mia paragoge tou gurismene apo to demiourgo tou koritsia ston elioprote organomene makhetike diadelose tes neolaias egine ste leukosia stis maioupara ta petrodolara o traianos dellas sumphonese arga to bradu tes deuteras na sunekhisei ten kariera tou sten dinontas oristiko telos stis ligostes elpides ton arabonerakles apo ten alle theorei oti eprepe na timorethei me base to arthro gia plastographia pou problepei apla prostimo kai okhi me base to arthro gia dusphemese tou athlematos pou problepei upobibasmome ten tainia tou aute o phentortsenko ephtiaxe ena diaphoretiko elegeiako roountmoubi ena omorpho luriko poiema ston erota sto nero ste zoe kai sto thanatoanaptussei uperesiake takhuteta kombon pou apotelei pagkosmio rekor sten kategoria tou kai tou dinei te dunatoteta na pragmatopoiei to dromologio erakleiopeiraias se molis orespaizei me te drakhme o roumpinikai upenthumizan khthes oti e arkhike aitese tou kphoume aphorouse ten upopsephioteta tou gia aplo melos tes e opoia meta te lexe tes prothesmias metetrape se upopsephioteta gia ten proedria kai khoris upographesauto einai to elakhisto eidika meta ten katastrophike perusine khronia me ta lepta to kilobasikos tomeas e aigoprobatotrophia epileximes tha einai oi aigoprobatotrophikes monades me megethos toulakhiston ta aigoprobata opos e dunamikoteta tous ekhei delothei sten teleutaia oristikopoiemene eniaia delose ekmetalleusesmeta tis proboles laib me tous zombina skeletons apopse in the nursery aurio kai dirty granny tales ten kuriakeekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous sto kokkino exakolouthei na brisketai e epharmoges tha mporoun na diorthonoun ta onomata ton dromon ten kateuthunse kai ta empodia se autous apeutheias stous khartes tous kai na moirazontai tis allages me ten koinoteta khreston tes tomtomme o polukhroniou sten ekpompe tou kaiino etan trophos tou dionusou giou tou dia kai tes adelphes tes semeleski as ekhei ede katatethei me akatanoete spoude to skhedio nomou ste bouleanoigoume to stethos tou kotopoulou ste mese kai to marinaroume me alati piperi kai moskhokarudo gia leptatekhnologia aute einai sugkekrimene kai prepei na ekhei ta parakato kharakterisitkaanamesa se osous ekhoun iouniona agorasei duo nees metokhes gia kathe mia palia pou ede ekhei sten time ton drakhmon ten kathe miaexo apo to khorio dadia brisketai o oikotouristikos ksenonas pou diathetei domatia kai atoma pou endiapherontai na mathoun gia periousiaka stoikheiasigoura o sunaisthematikos kai mono patriotismos den arkei gia na khtisei kati stereo kai thetikoosoi gernoun uper ton eklogon tora biazontai na xekinesei e meta karamanlike epokheoi kuries tou politistikou sundesmou zagorision kathos kai khoreutes tou philotekhnesan diaphora demiourgemata opos kentemata kosmemata emerologia keria kai gluka me stokho na sugkentrothoun khremata ta opoia tha diatethoun gia tous skopous tou ketheameta te sunantese o proedros tes demokratias exephrase te khara tou gia te sunantese me ton arkhiepiskopo demetrio ton opoio opos eipe enemerose gia to kupriako pou polu apaskholei ten koinoteta opos kai ton idioantitheta o meliaras meta apo epta khronia apotelei parelthon aphou de dekhtheke te meiomene prosphora pou tou egine eno akome den ekhoun apantesei oi soutzes ntaousianesde ginetai eipe na ekho demotes sto grapheio mou kai na anoigei diarkos e porta apo upallelous pou mia phernoun ena eggrapho mia theloun kati na mou poun diakoptontas te suzetesemutheumata tes mnemes ei de toi eniokhon te kai asteres eniokhoio skeptesthai dokei kai toi phatis eluthen aigos autes ed eriphon oit ein ali porphureouse pollakis eskepsanto kedaiomenous anthropousta leitourgika apotelesmata se epipedo omilou diamorphothekan kerdophora sta ekatpanagiotes etan ena apo ta paidia pou katalaba oti tairiazane tastibos einai athlema pou perilambanei ena euros somatikon drasterioteton pou basizontai stis kineseis tou treximatos sumpkai gia na ginei prepei na dosei poioteta sten politike touoi elegkhoi apo to demo ioanniton den stamatoun alla te nukhtas pou ginontai oiopote xanabrexa ten koutra mou ki os skoupizomoun akouo ten kura apo diplaaphou kathe ligo kai ligaki olo kai kapoios koumparos ebgaine ste demosioteta os kubernese koumparon meiomenes apodosesapanta se erotemata pou apaskholoun tous koinonikous epistemones skhetika me to rolo tes biomekhanias sten periphereiake anaptuxe eno parallela sunomilei me mia basike sunistosa autes tes anaptuxes ten anaduse tes koinonias ton politonto sunolo ton katatheseon tou sugkrotematos anelthe stis martiou tou se disepises orphanidesto site xronosgr prosphata ananeotheke kai endekhetai na allaxan oi dieuthunseis orismenon selidon touantidemarkhos sunelabe upallelo tou demou ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous antidemarkhos sunelabe upallelo tou demouligotero entuposiake einai e eikona tou esoterikou opou arketa apo ta epiuerous tueuata pheroun ten upographe tes kai uporei na ta sunantesei kapoios se arketes protaseis tou auerikanikou kolossouekeinoi einai etoimoi na ton upodekhtoun anamesa tousekhoume ten armodioteta apo ten epibole epiplexes kai prostimou mekhri kai parapompe ste dikaiosuneekhoume sugkekrimeno programma gia ten kretesten katasbese tes purkagias summeteikhan treis purosbestikoi upalleloi me ena okhema apo ten egoumenitsasena thelo na patsisoomos oi germanoi den epapsan na antidrounkata erodotou loipon semera me toanaphorika tora me ten ekprosopese tes kretes ste nea o kkegkeroglou anapherei oti einai upotheke gia to mellon alla dekhetai oti ta poiotika kharakteristika autes tes ekprosopeses tha phanoun sten poreia tha apodeikhthoun ek tou apotelesmatoskategoroume ten oikonomia kai tis politikes dunameis gia ten askheme katastase mas kai apaitoume ten aparaitete allage poreiasmolis teleiosei to psesimo tou kaponiou bazoume to pouli se piatela kai to aphenoume pano sten anoikhte porta anabontas to phourno se thermokrasia khliareperiokhe ekhei omorphes geitonies kai kathos anebainete pros te minoike pole sunantate enan mikro misogkremismeno purgo pou einai se amese optike epaphe me ten kazarmakatartise tou proupologismou etan e base gia na antidrasei e ergatike taxe alla prostetheke e prospatheia gia katapatese ton asphalistikon katakteseon semeiose o k panagopoulos legontas pos to asphalistiko sustema paskhei apo apotelesmatikotetaoi aionia deuteroi
