arachova resort spa pou eidika gia ta khristougenna ekhei etoimasei diaphora events gia paidia kai mia kainourgia paidike khara alla kai to elatos resort health clubphilika gia treis eruthroleukes ta prota tous philika me ten ethnike omada tha dosoun oi eruthroleukes eua khantaba eue kuriakidou kai anna kabbathaargia kai e epokhe metetrepse to proskunemaliges emeres de meta tis ekloges tou oktobriou oi bouleutes tou sunagonizontan poios tha piesei perissotero gia ten plerome ton odoiporikon pou eikhan kopeiopos phainetai ston paratithemeno pinaka e eniskhuse ton timon tou kaphe xeperase kathe proegoumenomatias kai patu mazi epkai ti san khasame ton emphulio opos theloun na ton kharakterisoun merikoiparallela me ten aponome egkainiasteke kai e ekthese ton ergon pou philoxeneitai sten katallela diamorphomene aithousa apollo tou xenodokheiou creta maris opou tha parameinei epi ena menaarkhike maios panaigialeios pagonei epaoriston to elleniko podosphairosten terastia mesaionike plateia rynek glowny me ta entuposiaka ktismata kathomaste gia ligo se ena apo ta mpistro kaphe upseles aisthetikesbebaios e politeia ekhei ten kuria euthune meso ton elegktikon mekhanismon na antimetopisei to problema ste rizakai pos tha mporouse alloste aphou den etan kan stenki opos kai na to kanoume philoi den eimastegermanos protathletes kosmou exi phores niketes se ennea agones phetos termatise kai ephuge apo te bretania me to sakouli gemato koukiameta apo kataggelies klimakio tou tmematos phorologikes astunomeuses me te sundrome sunergeiou elegkton tou upourgeiou anaptuxes proebe prokhthes kai khthes kaieinai to megalo stoikhemauparkhei oute sto hrakleio uperesia pou oi upalleloi na men parakolouthoun ta proina ten poreia tou xrematisteriouektos kai an aphairouse apo ten parastase te skene mias gumnes gunaikas pou emphanizotan sten arkhekletheis na skholiasei ten exelixe ton gegonoton kai ten apotelesmatikoteta ton arkhon o k geroulanos apantese oti auto einai apotelesma tes sobares douleias pou ekhei ginei apo ten astunomia kai to upourgeio dikaiosunesathletike ellada etan ede mia koinonia se parakme outos e allos e mono athletike epitukhia pou aphese ergo etan e kataktese tou eurompasket touta genethlia tou ekhei semera o proedros tes olumpiakos baggeles marinakespoioi einai autoito sumbolaio lexes iouniou ekleise stis monades tou iouliou stis kai tou augoustou stis monadeskrousmata apo ton io tou neilou trite augoustou trite augoustou stadiaka auxanetai o arithmos ton anthropon pou molunontai me ton io tou dutikou neilou meta apo tsimpema kounoupion ste khora masophe loipon kratese to meden sto proto eno an etan pio tukheros mporouse na paei sta apoduteria ekhontas petukhei ena gkol aphou eikhe duo polu kales stigmes me tous nioplia kai digkozeas kanoume kai ten ellada amerikeellada einai mia khora monadikes phusikes omorphiaskai gia na men uparkhoun dikaiologies tou tupou auta den ginontai na tria skhetika paradeigmata apo ten europe opou e meiose ton skoupidion einai ontos proteraiotetame apolute epitukhia pragmatopoietheke to sabbato to tournoua junior to opoio organose o erasitekhnes kai e etaireia proagoges psukhikes ugeias epeirou stis egkatastaseis tou staurakiouautes oi megales pneumatikes morphes alla kai alles mikroterou belenekous idiaitera semantikes boethesan kai to kuriotero ethesan ta themelia gia na ekphrasoun kai oi neoteroi dianooumenoi e suggrapheis tis anesukhies mesa apo ta erga tousepomenos e agonistikoteta tes bases tha katapherei na aposeisei ton sunteretismo tes proteuousas opou katoikoedreuoun episema ola ta lompi tes khorasapla olumpiakos kai agiax einai sto idio gkroup sto champions league kai den mporoun na klerothoun gia na erthoume kai pali ste khora sasto demosio den ekhei katoikousalla emeis tora balame anthropous na phulaneten euthune anelaban oi talimpan me menuma tous sto galliko praktoreio eideseongiati mporei os gnesioi ellenes na me theloume na paradekhthoume demosia oti pesame exo sten axiologese kai kata sunepeia sten epiloge tou autokinetou mas bathia mesa mas omos gnorizoume ten aletheia kai problematizomaste an ten ekhoume pateseiden uparkhoun epises ektheseis gia ten akribe phora tou blematosgia prote pali phora kai dustukhos kai teleutaia eos semera demiourgeitai eidikos sullogos philon tes tzaz delade episemo somateio me titlo puthmike leskhe tes ellados pou exedide kai periodiko deltio me kritike ton diskon tzazekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous problemata antimetopizei e istorike ephemerida apogeumatine kai opos phemologeitai brisketai ena bema makria apo to louketoupopsephioi oi dieuthuntes upopsephioi dieuthuntes gia gumnasia lukeia kaipsemata gia ta apotelesmata ton thusion tou mnemoniousto plaisio auto o k anastasopoulos ektima oti to demosio mporei na ophelethei disme email aphou tis skanarete sto opos semeionei kharakteristika o k khiotes oso pio polles photographies mazeutoun toso pio antiprosopeutika tha einai ta almpoumpsilokobete ta phreska kremmudakia te glistrida ten piperia kai ton anethomporeite omos na egkataleipsete ten al kainta kai na summetaskhete se mia eirenike politikesumphona me plerophories o amerikanikos kolossos den prokeitai na summetaskhei sto trito diagonismo poleses ton ta enopoiemena kerde khreses pro phoron tes mailles diamorphothekan se disekhoume demiourgesei polu kale omadaston ekthesiako khoro tou pneumatikou kentrou o proedros tes demokratias tha egkainiasei ten ekthese thesauroi tes demotikes pinakothekes ioanninonto tmema istorias tou ioniou panepistemiou organonei epistemonike sunantese me thema didaskalia tes istorias sten ekpaideuse pou tha pragmatopoiethei ten trite ora mm sto amphitheatro tmematos istoriasisumphona me ton mprukner ta krate einai axia tes tukhes tous opos kai oi anthropoita problemata uperprosphoras alla kai koresmou proteinetai na antimetopisthoun sto plaisio tou neou eidikou khorotaxikou gia ton tourismo me aposurse ton gerasmenon katalumatonuposterixe oti o prothupourgos upourgopoiese olous tous omadarkhes tou esoterikou tou antartikou kai exephrase ten apopse oti prophanos kati phobatai kai tous aphoplise me khartophulakiasto metaxu sumboules dinei to institouto katanaloton epeiroueunoethekame se duo paikhnidia ek ton opoion to ena to khasame alla eikhame to tharros na to delosoumesto trekhon megethos tou to den tha mporouse na sundramei ste diasose tautokhrona tes italias kai tes ispaniasoute ta uparkhonta tous oute ten time tous ma oute kai ten zoe tous mporesan na sosounste sunekheia tha ginei moirasma prokeruxeon sten agora tes mutilenespoluthruletos enallaktikos e thematikos tourismos ekhei meinei sta khartiatha boethesoun tous iapones axiomatoukhous me tis gnoseis tous ste radiologia kai an khreiastei kai tis iaponikes enoples dunameis ston tomea tes iatrikes tes epimeleteias kai ton epikindunon ulikon dieukrinise amerikanos stratiotikosoi polites mporoun kai prepei na steiloun menuma anupakoes kai apeitharkhias menuma sugkrouses me aute ten politike uperpsephizontas to agonistiko psephodeltio tousto deutero emikhrono e ksanthe etan kalutere alla oi epithetikes prospatheies ton paikton tes stamatousan se enan kataplektiko mario gkalinobitsekei kai pera kai se atomiko epipedo nomizo oloi oi paiktes einai khresimoi kai o kathenas dinei kati sten omadame to pou tha pesei to khruso oinopneuma sto poteri gualizoun ta matia tous san n astraphtei olokhruso cartier khresime parateresesumphona kai me to athenaiko praktoreio eideseon anakoinotheke tis protes proines ores to neo kubernetiko skhema me ton kerkuraio politiko telemakho khutere na epistrephei sten kubernese ste these tou anaplerote upourgou politismousto erotema gia to ti khreiazetai e sunetairistike trapeza semeiose oti e sunetairistike trapeza eimaste emeis oi idioiresital pianou dinei e elene tsoutsou sto megaro mousike athenon apopse stisk abrantines anapherei oti mekhri semera den ekhei brethei limani gia na anakhoroun ta ploiasugkekrimena sto londino tou anaptusetai ena krupho eidullio anamesa ston agglo romantiko poiete tzon kits kai se mia te phani mprooun kore tes spitonoikokuras tou pou ta domatia tous khorize enas toikhosapo ten alle ta oikonomika dedomena tes upotheses opos tha ekhete diabasei kai tis proegoumenes emeres einai tetoia pou epitrepoun ten pragmatopoiese mias sumphonias anamesa stis duo pleures oste o paiktes na piasei limanik mandalenakes upogrammizei oti ta ptukhia pou didontai apo ta bretanika panepistemia anagnorizontai apo tosigoura odeuei pros adiexodo delose o nauarkhos maik malen milontas se amerikanous stratiotes ste bagdate anapheromenos sto thema ton makhon ste libuesta apotelesmata tou a examenou sumphona me te skhetike anakoinose tou omilou epikheireseon attikes perilambanontai anorgana esoda upsous ekatemeis tonise xekinesame ten prospatheia mas apo ta mesa tou kalokairiou monoi masapo ekei kai pera thelo e sunekheia na einai analogestis dodeka to mesemeri dinontai mathemata tangko gia protaredes pieite kaphe mpira e kante mathemaepises semera trite apergoun oi ekpaideutikoi tes protobathmias kai deuterobathmias ekpaideuses ste lesboton teleutaio khrono auto ekhei mpei met epitaseos se oles tis sunanteseis pou eginan me to epiteleio tou upourgeiou oikonomikon kai mas diabebaiosan oti tha broun tropo oste auto na teleioseito kuriotero apotelesma bebaios tha proelthei apo te drase tou diplou pelekuse mia khora lousmene sto phos opou paramenei anthropine e klimaka mporoume na kratesoume tis metaxu mas skheseis se anthropino epipedoidia omada mazi me ta tmemata upodomes ta tmemata enelikon kai arkharion antapokrinomenoi sten prosklese tou tha episkephthoun ta gepeda tenis tes agathoupoles to sabbatokuriako iounioutheoro pos o ares den ekhei probadisma isaisa oi kitrinoi den ekhoun kammia skhese me ten omada pou parousiasan ston proto guro kai tha duskoleutoun polu apo tonkairos sto metaxu phthinoporiazei kai ede arketoi therinoi etoimazontai na kleisountelika oi limenikoi ton entopisan guro stis to apogeuma okhi omos konta ste ntiaaristere oikologike sunergasia gia ten periphereia anatolikes makedonias kai thrakes einai mia apantese apo ta aristera sto mnemonio tes khreokopias anephere o alexes tsipras euriskomenos sto eklogiko kentro tou sunduasmou ste nikolaou zoideston proto proemiteliko pou arkhizei stis e ollandia tha antimetopisei ten brazilia eno sto bradino mats pou tha xekinesei stis e gkana me ten ourougouae tha diekdikesoun mia these sten tetradaotan e lorena enemerose te geitonissa pegan konta tes oloi oi katoikoimeta to lepto e ntinamo pege to paikhnidi ekei pou to ethele dinontas katokhe sten kai kleinontas tous diadromous pros ten estia testora prepei na doume pos tha bgoume apo auten ten katastase neo rantebou ton duo pleuron tha pragmatopoiethei te deutera se mia prospatheia na phtasoun se sumphoniato programma auto apotelei tmema tou skhediasmou ton disapophasistheke e auxese tou metokhikou kephalaiou ton minbenizelos kata ten enarxe tou skhetikou dialogou sto upourgeio oikonomikonsto teleutaio dekalepto oi gepedoukhoi meiosan stous treis stogia to an problepei upobibasmo megalon omadon den to nomizose genikes grammes kalo einai na koimountai toulakhiston okto ores ten emeraperitrane apodeixe to stokhastiko muthistorema tou karlos phouentes to enstikto tes ines ekdoseis kedrosbretanos pilotos tes mclaren mercedes einai o niketes tou ouggrikou gkan prikentrike ekdelose pragmatopoietheke to bradu tes deuteras ste mutilene sto demotiko theatro tes poles me omilete to biographo tou mutileniou poiete demetre nikoretzoapeuthune de kalesma enotetas kai summetokhes stous demotes gia na themeliosoun apo koinou to demo paionias se geres baseistha ginei sto pethumno e prote meta epheteiou sunantese ton nomarkhiakon epitropon kretes tou upo ten proedria tou mikhale neonakeeos kai aurio anamenetai na diarkesei to kuma kausona me ton udrarguro na problepetai oti tha anebei stous bathmous kelsiou se periokhes tes thessalias anatolikes stereas kai anatolikes peloponnesouomos eikhe teleutaia eutukhos san epikephales tes stelekhos tes parataxes ampatze tes epokhes pou phuteuotan to phoinikodasoskathe oikogeneia mia agele kurio kharakteristiko ton lukon einai o upselos bathmos koinonikes organoses pou basizetai sten austere koinonike ierarkhiato reportaz tes istoselidas fansfccom anapherei to stori me ten apodesmeuse tou riokoker apo te bila eno tonizei kharakteristika oti o mesos ekhei endiapherouses protaseis apo diaphora europaika klamp metaxu ton opoion einai phusika o thrulosoi anthropoi pou apartizoun ta psephodeltia apotelountai skhedon sto sunolo tous apo anthropous pou tha etheles na ekheis philousokhi gia tous dunatous oute tous ponerous alla gia tous pollous tous aplous autous pou pane me ton stauro sto kheri elpizontas oti oi ptokhoi to pneumati tha doun kapote to prosopo tou theoumou apantese me thrasos ti na ten kaneisstephan naskoph pou menei sto astritsi anebaine sten skepe tou katastematos aphairouse ta keramidia pou kaluptan to photagogo kai katebaine sto katastema apo opou eklebe ta khremata apo to tameiodustukhos kai to prosopiko den einai eparkes eidika tis teleutaies meres pou polloi upalleloi apousiazoun kai me adeiaan to dekhontai na to kanoumeneos khrestes eggraphesundese theriakles pappous elikias eton bretheke na katekhei dendrullio kannabes kai posoteta khasis sten kalumno kai sunelephthesto deutero emikhrono oi roumanoi piesan perissotero kai gia kapoia lepta eikhan egkatastathei sten periokhe tou kapinou o opoios omos se treis periptoseis antedrase sosta kai kratese to medenzetese epises na me apoxenothei o bouleutes apo to epaggelma tou dioti auto tha stoikhisei ston koinobouleutiko biokai tora xanazetaei te psepho tou ellenatrite augoustou to perasmeno sabbato o demarkhos lesbou k bounatsos kalese ston papado tous ekprosopous ton topikon sumboulion ton exi khorion tes geras se koine sundiabouleuseden prolabe na stegnosei kala kala to melani kai oi souedoi teresan tispempte septembrios arse tou plaphon apo khthes sta kausima allaepikephales parataxes tes elassonos antipoliteuses kostas katsikes estiase ten kritike tou se tria semeiaempeiria to poluphotographemeno nauagio me karabaki apo ton agio nikolao kai to porto bromita duo erga sunolikou proupologismouse diaphoretike periptose uparkhei o kindunos timorias tou sullogousumphona me osa uposterizei e etaireia sustatheke stis arkhes apriliou kai o idios anelabe merikes tekhnikes douleies opos na stesei tous pagkous kai to elektriko psalidiaphierono te nike stous paiktes pou ekho ston pagko kai den epaixan ap ten arkhe tes saizonepises e nomothesia pollon ethnon ta oikonomika sumpheronta kai alloi logoi den boethoun panta sten soste diakheirise tousan antilambanomai sosta to pneuma tou eklektou sunadelphou to zetoumeno mallon einai e metabase apo ena proantiprosopeutiko politiko sustema despotikes kommatokratias se ena pleros antiprosopeutiko politiko sustema khoris kommataprotagonistes e topike autodioikese to proto kai kathoristiko bema gia te dioiketike metarruthmise pou odegei se enan neo kai protagonistiko rolo ten topike autodioikese einai kata tous eidikous e meiose tou arithmou ton demontha prepei gregora na bebaiothoume oti o kindunos metadoses se olo to oikonomiko sustema kai se oles tis khores mele tes eurozones einai upo elegkho semeiosephetos ekhoume mprosta mas mia megale proklese pou einai e eisodos stous omilous tou champions leaguetha ta khasoume ki auta kai malista oristika kai ametakletaekat pou semeiotheke kata to tetarto trimeno touepinoese tou etan to apotelesma mias arges exelixes tou antipragmatismoudiagnose karkinos ston pneumonaanaphora proerkhetai apo epiphullida tou ekklesiastikou agonos episemou organou tes dikes tou parekklesiastikes organoses iouniosston antipoda peripou anthropoi sto israel ekhasan te zoe tous apo purkagia pou ekdelotheke khthes se dasos konta ste khaiphasto agonistiko kouuati se exi agones seueiothekan teruata delade gkol ana agona arithuos skhetika ikanopoietikos analogika ue alles agonistikesten perasmene deutera ta den eikhan ostoso kanena problema na ektoxeusoun mazika tetoia blemata enantion ton xesekomenon katoikon tes leukimmesdelose an sumbei se megale pole tes apoleias mporei na ginei se opoiodepote astunomiko tmemana anadeixei ten dioikese tes kai na delosei phusika summetokhe sten dethnike pleonsumbase metaxu tou demou pambotidos kai tou anadokhou upegraphe prin apo pente emeres stis apriliou kai apomenei na oristoun oi epiblepontes tou ergou apo ten tekhnike uperesia demon kai koinotetonupourgos georgias giorgos anomerites delose oti edose entole ste nomike uperesia na antimetopisei te nomike adunamia pou uperxe kai eikhe os apotelesma na akurothei apo to sumboulio tes epikrateias e skhetike upourgike apophasesemeionetai pos to mouseio tha parameinei anoikhto apo tis to proi eos tis to apogeuma me eisodo eleuthere gia oloustouto den einai philologiko mia kai o logos tou rapha mpeniteth emphanizetai parallaktikos sten tainia the minutes that shook the worldphusika den tha mporousan na apousiazoun kai ta themata pou aphoroun sten gunaikeia omorphiasunekhizetai e katephora tes liberpoul pou ekhase epeita apo khronia apo te stoouk sitisumphona me ten trapeza tes ellados to dimeno ianouariou phebrouariou oi ameses ependuseis emphanisan kathare ekroe upsous ekatkhortastike geuse me thaumasia isorropia kharakteristikongiati gia otidepote kanei kapoios panta uparkhei ena kinetrotoso gia te rigane oso kai gia to siderite den epitrepetai e ekrizose tou phutou kai e aphairese olou tou blastou apo kathe phuto prokeimenou na diasphalistei o pollaplasiasmos touakolouthos orismenoi apo tous idioktetes ton polutelon katoikion prosephugan ek neou sto ste kai zetousan ten tritanakope ton se baros tous apophaseon tes olomeleiastraumatias metaphertheke sto benizeleio nosokomeio eno o sokoi korra sunelephthe kai khthes odegetheke ston eisaggeleamonakhikos anthropos o kur mikhales suntaxioukhos thuroros kathismenos sten kouniste tou poluthrona eikhe monadikes apolauseis to phageto kai ton upnokleinei gia etos to agalma tes eleutherias epi diakosia kai pleon khronia to nauagio tou ploiou mentor dinei elpides stous arkhaiologousapo ekei ki epeita ekkremei seira apophaseon gia zetemata ta opoia suzetountai skhedon kathemerinos metaxu ton armodion tou upourgeiou esoterikon tes kai tesphetine periodos etan ligotero kale gia mas apu oti oi duo protes logo ton pollon apousion kurios sto xekinemamolis ston deutero guro khreiasteke na bgei sten pista to autokineto asphaleias epeita apo sugkrouse tou souedou rikarnt rintel me seat me ton miler pou eikhe os apotelesma ten egkataleipse tou protoutoso sto thema tes oso sta alla erga pou proanephera ta mikrosumpheronta o laikismos kai e psephotheria thaumatourgounidiaiteres pienes gnorisan khtes olaskhedon ta khoria mas alla tis megaluteres opos kathe khrono tis ezese to purgiekho panta ena makhairi mazi moukilkisiotes ebrize meso facebook kai to plerose akriba den ton khoneue ki apophasise na ton brisei kai na ton apeileseiolos o protos orophos einai diamorphomenos se eniaio kathistiko me kouzina kai ena mikroauton pou den exisonei ten pole me ton idio pou den ekhei epikentro ton eauto tou kai ton egoismo tou kata to meta apo mena to khaosme ton miralas se megale bradia gia akoma ena paikhnidi kai ton riera se kephia sten kontra me ten omada tou aderphou tou o olumpiakos etan idiaitera apotelesmatikos kai epikratese aneta tou panioniouagrotike kinetopoiese ekhei ten uposterixe ton topikon phoreonkathos kai tis upo idruse monades gia ton alkoolismo klpdelabekouras exephrase ten entone anesukhia tes elladas gia to gegonos oti e dolophonia tou aristotele gkouma metabaptizetai se atukhema otan einai gnosto oti ethnikistes albanoi katedioxan kai dolophonesan ton aristotele gkouma epeide milouse ellenikaprospherei plerophories opos einai oi upsometrikes apostaseis stis diadromes sas e ora anatoles kai duses tou eliou e emphanise tes selenes kai einai kataskeuasmeno apo polu anthektiko plastikoetsi skephtheke na askholethei sobara me ten emmetre diaskeue tou omerikou epous na to eikonographesei kai na to paradosei me agape ste nea geniaeikhane mazi tous xula lostous phtuaria tsougkranes soubles kai brizane aneleosnoritera apo tis problepomenes emeromenies prepei na oloklerothoun ta pagkretia protathlemata bolei gunaikon paidon kai korasidonidiaitero xenodokheio diakosmemeno me palia ulika apo tous idioktetes niko kai marinaproporeuontai se pompe e philarmonike me maestro ton mousiko demetre kludoniare kai agema tes ko kai akolouthei e eikona tes panagias tou kharou me ta anthismena krinakia o kathegoumenos arkhimto trithuro concept entuposiazei aisthetika tautizetai se megalo bathmo me to montelo paragoges kai khresimopoiei ena neo patoma to opoio tha apotelesei te base gia mia oloklere oikogeneia autokinetonprospathoume mesa apo ten diakheirise ton oikonomikon mas na meionoume otidepote dapane mporei na meiothei kai enteinoume tis prospatheies gia auxese ton esodon mas apo opheiles demoton pros to demonikaia to aigaleo kerdise ton erakle kai pere bathia bathmologike anasazekiou gia katokhe oplonkai apotelei pepoithese tou neou tekhnikou pos e omada tha mporesei toso suntoma na brei ten agonistike tautoteta oste na prolabei na xanampei sto kolpo tou titlouolumpiakosaoan phinokaliotes athenas theodoropoulos detses gennaios athenas koutes thessalonikessten perigraphe tou agona o tasos kollintzas stis o iakobos philipouses tha einai kai pali konta mas gia na skholiasei tous agones mazi me tous kalesmenous toueide enduses kai upodeses gia ole ten oikogeneia kai plethora elektrikon elektronikon suskeuon kai eidon oikiakou exoplismou prospherontai stis khameloteres times tes agorasepiskepse aute etan epithumia tou patera tesupenthumizetai oti o italos prothupourgos eikhe kathusteresei na dosei prasino phos ste summetokhe tes italias stis diethneis epikheireseis ste libueasphalos den ekhei sta kheria tou auta ta entupa o k kammenossunolika anodika kinethekan metokhes ptotika kai paremeinan statheresole mera ston elio gia na maurisoun kai to mono khroma pou kataphernoun einai tou kotopoulou soublasomos enas apo tous suntrophous tou odussea periergos otan autos apokoimietai apokamomenos kai esukhos giati plesiazoun ten ithake anoigei to aski kai tote xepedoun apo mesa tous oloi oi anemoi ormoun sto pelagos kai sekonoun phourtouna phobereoi armodioi erthan se epaphe me tis paraskeuastries etaireies gia antikatastase tou exoplismou pou aphora kurios monades entatikes therapeiasego troo diaphores blakeies giati ekho pakhunei epikinduna kai prepei na kano diaita kai esu geuesai diaphores likhoudies ephoson ole mera trekheis kai den ekheis problema barousprosthetoume to khumo kai zumonoume se metria zume pou na men kollaei prosthetoume an khreiastei ligo aleuri e neroprotoemphanizetai sta grammata to me te sulloge thalassines phonesalla oi ellenes aristeroi ekpaideutikoi eno ekhoun orkisthei piste ste demokratia prospathoun na metadosoun stous mathetes tous ideologia pou ten epibouleuetai kai proothei ton oloklerotismo tes diktatorias tou proletariatoumethodos ton mikrodoruphorikon alleloukhion tou purenikou kai khloroplastikou delade e sugkrise me base te seira ton baseon sto noukleiko oxu epitrepei te genetike tautopoiese ton poikilion tou ampeliou me anuparkte pithanoteta sphalmatosmilesame gia tous daskalous kai tis daskales pou uperetousan sto protupo ton khaniotake ton dieuthunte ton kapetanake ten kuria marika ten kuria kornelia te despoinida pope tis alles daskalesopos diapistosa oi aimateres makhes kai ta teratomorpha ork gia kapoious einai ena anoduno theamadustukhos semera oi dromoi einai se polla semeia epikindunoi me semantikes zemies kai apo pleuras kentrikes exousias oute phone oute akroaseauto sunebaine ontos alla den uperkhe kai e boulese na ginei nea phulake opos sunebe se allous nomousgeorgiou logiades steipe o k mpelles dinontas ten entupose oti oi allages stis ergasiakes skheseis eginan epeide tis ethelan oi ergazomenoiena apo ta threskeutika dromena etane kai to ek gunaikos pegazei ta kreitto me proexarkhousa ten koruphaia protagonistria eirene papa pou sten ermeneia tes sunodeuotan apo treis poluphonikes kai poluprosopes gunaikeies khorodiesden einai tukhaio oti e tourkia proballetai os protupo stis mousoulmanikes khores alla kai os gephura me to dutiko kosmokai malista einai to megalutero aktinologiko pou ginetai sten europe kai to deutero megalutero pagkosmios meta to amerikanikoepibole poines khoris na anapheretai poio organo ten epebale apo poious sugkrotetheke pote kai pou sunedriase kathista ten apophase aute nomika asterikte kai gia tupikous kai ousiastikous logous aparadekteto logo pere ekprosopontas to kai o strategos dioiketes tes merarkhias upostrategos k karagiannopoulos metapherontas ten these oti uparkhei kale diathese gia na epiluthei to zetema me to stratopedo belissarioude mporei na pei oti phrontizei kai para polu oste na troei ugieina e olga mpotse tes opoias to diaitologio perilambanei oles tis trophes khoris kamia idiaitere protimesekanonika ostoso dienergeitai apo te miamise to mesemeri e kuklophoria ton okhematon epi ton ethnikon odon stis treis kentrikes exodous tes poles tes thessalonikes kathos elexe o dioros apokleismos tous apo idioktetes taxidedomenou omos tou bathous tes krises einai saphes oti den tha krithei se dromo takhutetas alla se dromo emiantokhesmonon pou ola auta sumbainoun mekhri tis strophes giati apo ekei kai pano e duname einai tose pou aphenos tromazei kai apheterou sekonei paneukola ton empros trokho ston aerato epikentro prosdiorizetai sta peripou notioanatolika notia tes karpathou kai to estiako bathos se peripou khiliometrasto iatreio tes erkhetai kathemerina se epaphe me mikra paidia e idia einai metera tessaron aggeloudion opote e empneuse einai kati pou semera de stereitaiomilia me thema ellada apo te melouna ston ebro kai sten kreteapo auten ten kategoria exairountai a osoi eikhan sumplerosei mekhri teneleuse sto nesi tou nikou lurake tha epipherei exelixeis sto kuaneruthro stratopedoapo ekei kai pera roma kai latsio ekanan to kathekon tous kai exasphalisan mia these sto europa leagueta ekkhionistika mekhanemata den ephtanan mekhri ekei kai gia to logo auto ephtasan mekhri ton ioanne mathioudake pezoporoi kai koubalontas ton stous omous tous ton ebgalan apo to skotadi sto phossto semerino ton antapokrite analambanei na kanei o idios o dioiketes stenallage ton kalliergeion einai to monadiko oplo sten antimetopise arketon astheneion alla kai ekhthronsten gallia ta kai sten italia ta khroniapragmata pou prepei na gnorizoume gia na ta apolambanoume khoris tupseis apo ten eirene paskhalerese periptose pou odegethei sten trapezike agora tha ginei prosklese ekdeloses endiapherontos kai tha apophasisoun skhetika me tous orous e ektelestike epitrope kai to demotiko sumbouliokommati tou odostromatos xekollese kai e periokhe metetrape se limne eno plemmurisan kai aules spitioneikhame megalutere summetokhe sten apergia omos oi ergazomenoi ekhoun perioristei semantikasten os ano sunedriase parestesan e antiprosopeuthekan metokhoi ekprosopountesuperkhe mia usteria se olous na bgaloun lephtalukos ekhei matheisten prote periptose einai semantiko na kalupsoume oso ginetai megalutere apostase kai na kanoume oso to dunaton perissotera karteriaeditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia deutera bradu pelates telephonei sto spuros kai basiles kai zetaei trapezi gia enan gia to sabbatoeinai olon maziekleisan oi logariasuoi ue to parelthon elegan kai osoi den antapokrithekan sto kalesua tes ephorias tha upoballontan se austerous elegkhousprepei na ekhete tautoteta neou tupou me latinika stoikheia kai to kephalaio gramma mprosta apo ton arithmo na men anekei sto elleniko alphabeto giati uparkhei periptose na me ginei apodekte apo tis sunoriakes arkhesmetokhes delade tis ede uparkhousesuposterizei ostoso oti ta mathemata os periekhomeno den ton eikhan duskolepsei katholou aphou eikhan omoiotetes me auta pou eikhe parakolouthesei ston ena khrono kai kati pou pege skholeio sten albaniasto radiophoniko idruma kuprouoi kairoi ekhoun allaxei kai tomalista ole aute e prospatheia apokaluptetai me maurisma e me ladi maurismatos pou kanei pio oratous tous musna zetesoun ten anatrope opos te kharakterise o kk dionusios se delose tou tes diapistotikes praxeos pou aphora ten periousiaapokleisteke o apo to kupello pempte dekembrios thessalonikena bgazoume mia kalutere poioteta douleias exegounan nioseis ten parousia ki allon na kathontai dipla sou eno den uparkhei kaneis einai giati ta pagkakia einai aphieromena se anthropous pou perasan ateleiotes ores tes zoes tous rouphontas ten idia theaoi neoi semera einai authormetoigia ten kainouria ekpompe tou giorgou papadake tis phemes gia ta prosopa pou tha plaisiosoun ton gnosto demosiographo milese sten kamera tou star o giannes latsiosmalista pegaina sto idio semeioakoma kai oi nomimes den mporoun na elegkhthounasphalos kai den mporoun abasanista na uiothetethoundustukhos e seira ekhei mono epeisodiaoi khorodoi tou agiou demetriou kai e mantolinata edosan ton kalutero eauto tous sten teleutaia tous emphanise epi australianou edaphousmia phora ton khrono stis arkhes ianouariou e tekhnologia sunuparkhei aruonika ue ton tzogo uias kai sto las begkas praguatopoieitai e uegalutere ekthese katanalotikes tekhnologias ston kosuodiaphonoun me papandreou sumphonoun me samara kolapho gia ten kubernese kai ton prothupourgo apotelese demoskopese pou demosieutheke khthesston briskontai se anazetese enos gkarnt gia na eniskhusei ten omada gia ten sunekheia tou protathlematos kai oi anthropoi tou dikephalou ekanan protase ston ntionte kristmasse duo menes apo tora ostoso ta pragmata tha einai polu pio duskolakai auto tha to deixoun me ten summetokhe tous stis panelladikes kinetopoieseismporeite apo ton molo tes kato basilikes na metabeite me te boetheia barkaredon tes periokhes kai epeita apo mikro dromologio sto spelaio tou agiou nikolaou notias barasobas ustera apo suntomo anephoriko perpatemato problema sumphona me to demarkho einai pos oi prokeruxeis pou eginan to proegoumena khronia gia monimes theseis apo te demotike arkhe etan medenikes plen tes demotikes astunomiasemas stokhos mas einai e drastike allage ton oron tou mnemoniou delose khthes kata te diarkeia tes enemeroses ton suntakton o ekprosopos tupou tou kommatos giannes mikhelakes kai epanephere gia deutere sunekhe emera to paradeigma tes irlandiasuposterixe oti o stokhos einai ephiktos khare sta upokatastemata pou diathetei e trapeza se ole ten ellada kai ste drasteriopoiese tes se olo to phasma ton sugkhronon trapezikon proiontontha eimaste etoimoi leei e anna diamantopoulouto teleutaio diastema oi dioikountes ten kerkura briskontai se diapragmateuseis me ten gia ten metagraphe tou demetre konstantopoulou kai opos ola deikhnoun briskoun semeio epaphesnearos epithetikos ekhei aphesei polu kales entuposeis kai ston lazlo mpoloni o opoios deikhnei pos tha ton ekhei metaxu ton proton tou epilogon gia te nea periodotsatso eisegete olokleres tes antipoliteusesta duo apu auta briskontai sten upaithro stis moires kai sto arkalokhori kai ta upoloipa sten pole tou hrakleiousto semeio auto na thumethoume te sumbole tou gia ten axiopoiese pou ekame sta diaphora exokklesia tes periokhespagkosmia trapeza ekatepistrophe tou demetre samara kai e apoktese tou kenan mparkan einai ta duo teleutaia apoktemata gia ten omada tes beroias e opoia phusika den ekhei oloklerosei oles tis metagraphes tes akomeoute kai tora xekatharistekan opos semeionoun mele tes epitropes alla pleon ekhei ginei saphes kai uparkhei pleres enemerose tes k genikou kai phtanei e ora ton apophaseonsto eurompasket neon tou mpilmpao e ellada katsibeles gnorise baria etta apo te germania sten premiera tes b phases kai apopsedioikese anamenei epises thetike epidrase ste leitourgike kerdophoria tou omilou aphou kata to e ependuse ston omilosaphak suneisephere peripou ekatkata ten apokatastase tou theatrou ton philippon to egine ektetamene khrese tsimentouto problema demiourgei to pepalaiomeno udreutiko diktuo sto opoio prokalountai sukhnes blabes me apotelesma na men ginetai omala e udrodotese ton katoikon tes periokheskai apo oti xero uparkhoun tetoia atoma sten periokheautodioikese kratos oloi apontesto idio uliko apostelletai kai gia dianome se grapheia tou sto exoteriko se presbeies kai proxeneia touristika grapheia kai demosiographousepipleon ean eiste eggamos prepei na semeiosete epano ste lexe den semeionetai kh apo diazeugmeno e apo opoion brisketai se khereia e se diastaseaperioristo kostos suntheseis gia media center katalleloi gia anaparagoge eikonas kai ekhou me kostosden mporousa omos na men antapokritho sto kalesma tes sustrateusesatukhos neos metaphertheke amesa me stathmo tou sto geniko nosokomeio tes larisas opou diapistotheke o thanatos touarnetiko einai to klima sta europaika khrematisteria kathos ta gallogermanika skhedia gia megalutere sunainese ste demosionomike diakubernese tes eurozones den kataphere na peisei tis agoreski erkhetai ena skitso pou alieusa apo ten istoselida mias phileseinai to epineio tou trikeriou me to palio karnagio apo tis epokhes pou ta trikeriotika karabia metepheran ta proionta tou peliou se ola ta limania tes anatolesedosa ton agona me autaparnese me kritike dusanaloge gia te dike mou euthuneenas allos tropos einai e eniskhuseeikhame kai kamposes brokhes tis eukharistethekame kai bebaia perimenoume kai allesto kupello sten komotene epheran oi paides tes thrakes gia prote phora nikontas to antistoikho sugkrotema tes peiraia sta penalti meepanastase pou gia na eimaste dikaioipherame emeis oi idioi oi demosiographoi me ton idrota maseinai ikane alla akonizei kai tis ikanotetes tes den ephesukhazei e douleia den te phobizei psakhnei diarkos kai anazetei kainourgia pediadiaphora metaxu tes times ekdoses kai tes onomastikes axias kathe metokhes tha akhthei meta ten aphairese ton dapanon tes ekdoses sumphona me to nomo kai to katastatiko se pistose tou logariasmou apothematiko apo ekdose metokhon uper to artiotetarte e pou kerdizei pontous sten oikonomia benzines usterei omos se dunamike aisthese odegeses kai stous khorous gia tous piso epibateskai to kuriotero kathe khrono e epilegei to me ton deloseon gia leptomere elegkho audit ekei kaleitai o phorologoumenos na deixei gramme pros gramme ti deloseta statistika tou agona edeixan sto telos prospatheies gia ten omada tou gkarido eno e ontense eikhe treisto psekasma sunekhizetai aute te phora se eutheia bole kai apo mikre apostaseden sekonei kephali e gioube video oute sten edra tes tsezena kataphere na kerdisei e gioubentous paroti proegetheke me sto xekinema tou agonaoi sullephthentes einai mia upekoos boulgarias kai o pakistanos suntrophos tes odegethekan semera ston eisaggelea me tis kategories tes parabases tou nomou peri uiothesias epitropeias apodokhes anelikouauto akribos sematodotese o kharakterismos tou anthimou ek merous tou mpoutare os moutzakhintin dioti opos iskhuristeke xepheugei apo ton thesmiko tou roloomos o esoterikos kepakos tou kapheestiatorio pou anekei ste skhediastria modas nicole fahri kathos kai ta trapezia sto pezodromio einai kataplektikasumphona me to up arithmon bouleuma to opoio stelnei ton kategoroumeno sto edolio tou trimelous epheteiou kakourgematon athenas o panta kathara tes kerde pro phoron diamorphothekan sta ekapo ton io tou kai tha ten pathoume apo ton io tes grippesepi pleon einai mia mousike glossa pou eiserkhetai stis kardies kai sta sothika ton anthroponopheile omos einai dis kai oi tokoi dis me apotelesma e enose na adunatei na tous exophleseime tis energeies tous autes apaxionoun akome perissotero to thesmo tes prokalontas tautokhrona ten koine gnome kathos oi idioi kataggelloun pragmata gia ta opoia pro tetramenou etan oi idioi kataggellomenoiama einai na ginoume europe na arkhisoume apo kapouta graphika tou sunepos einai metria ta ekhetika ephe tupika se bareto bathmo eno e mousike akougetai skhedon sansten etaireia aute o omilos fourlis summetekhei me pososto meso tes thugatrikes tou sten ellada intersport athletics ekhontas tautokhrona ton dioiketiko elegkho eno to upoloipo anekei ston mekhri protinos franchiseeosoi ekhoun adeies meta tis iouliou mporoun na taktopoiesoun tous emiupaithrious alla kai opoiadepote alle poleodomike parabase me te ruthmise gia ta authairetaki ego thelo o kathenas na skephtetai me ton idio tropoto siopelo blemma tou mikrou protagoniste planatai sto mounto topio tes kathemerinotetas kai plemmurizei me sunaisthema ten othonegenese autou tou kinematos perigraphetai apo te suggraphea me genika kataphatiko pneuma alla idiaitera sten krisime prote sunantese tou iakobou me tous exoristous buzantinous ss okhi khoris enan adiorato eironiko skeptikismonomarkhiake autodioikese ekhei anakoinosei oti e stremmatike eniskhuse tha katablethei mesa sto martiosto o kepouros exoudeterose me ekplektiko tropo ten apeutheias ektelese phaoul tou spesialista rouseph eno sto o boulgaros eide nea ektelese phaoul na stamata sto dokarianuparxia diatheses ton aparaiteton poron prokeimenou tekhnokrates tou tourismou na kateuthunoun kai na sumbouleuoun to politiko prosopiko gia to pou prepei na summetekhei o organismos exoikonomontas kondulia apo askopes summetokhes kai energeiesperiphereiake suneidese den einai mono sta khartia kai sta logiana kapos san na apodido times ste mneme kapoiou eroa pou xekhastekeepises diapistotheke oti oi proslephthentes emphanizoun omoia kharakteristika opos o topos katagoges kurios nomoi larises kai rodopes ergasiake empeiria sto demosio os sumbasioukhoi e ergazomenoi se grapheia bouleuton kai genikon grammateonkatataxe ton xenodkheion se asteria kathustereiphantasou na epanasundeontan oieidikotera se oti aphora tis khoregikes sumbaseis upenthumizoume oti tropopoiethekan me ten prostheke retron bias kai diaphaneiasse kapoia stigme tes sunenteuxes o zagorakes xespase otan kai pali to thema pege sta oikonomika emeis pantos tha leme ten aletheia ston kosmo gia ta oikonomika dedomenakoruphaia kai koine mas pepoithese einai e anabathmise tou demou kilkissullepse leston taxi meta apo katadioxe sunelephthesan meta apo katadioxe duo albanoi elikias kai khronon pou eklepsan taxi tou opoiou ton odego eikhan apeilesei proegoumenos me oplo gia na katebei apo to okhemaperan omos tou kubernetikou oramatos gia miakai prosthese ta nea einai idiaitera thetika gia tis anaduomenes oikonomies kai tis anaptussomenes khores idios gia ten aphrike opou o tourismos anagnorizetai olo kai perissotero os mokhlos anaptuxes ton exagogon kai tes apaskholesesmalista e sklere pteruga ton sundikaliston proteinei kinetopoieseis endekhomenos kai pros to telos autes tes ebdomadas ean den exelikhthoun thetika oi diapragmateuseista mazepse kai pege sto nesi ap opou katagetai te naxote summetokhe tes ste genike apergia ekhei anakoinosei kai e e opoia apophasise na prokhoresei se seira kinetopoieseonsta themata tes asphaleias tou polite milontas kai os eidikos anapherei oti tha prepei na ginei pleres anadiarthrose tes demotikes astunomiasephoson to epithumoun mporoun na proetoimastoun gia entaxe se therapeutike koinoteta tou ketheaena megalo eukharisto ste dioikese ston demarkho stous sunergates kai sto prosopiko gia ten uperokhe khronia pou perasame sto marousisumphona loipon me to problepontai auxese ton eisphoron kata kai meiose sto suntaxiodotiko programma kata meta topsenete to pilaphi gia peripou lepta anakateuontas pote pote gia na men kolleseime ten enarxe tou polemou oi kretikoi ethelontes edosan to paronsto hermitage kai sto crozeshermitage o nomos orizei syrah toulakhiston kai marsanne rousanne sunolika to anoterome stokho kai skopo na xekatharisoun ta pragmata os pros to plaphon tes benzinesden einai kai liga edo pou ta leme auta pou pairnei o konstantinoskaneis ostoso de blepei phos sto tounel tes omerias tou eidika apo te stigme pou oi palaistinioi axionoun ki autoi ten apeleutherose kapoion apo tous anthropous tous opoious to israelino kratos krata stis phulakes touzan ntizarnten mikra athoa psemata lucky luke den tha mporouse na ton sunagonistei ekplessei omos me te phreskada me ten opoia upoduetai enan kholigountiano souper star tou bobou sinema sto the artist tou misel khazanabisiousbebaia an to didumo den anairesei tis paraiteseis tou tote theoreitai exairetika duskolo na brethei luse ste genike suneleuse ektos ki an prokupsei neos endiapheromenosserbos iatros ntragkan milits anadeikhtheke o kaluteros nearos aggeiokheirourgos tooi euoiones prooptikes pou uparkhoun ston klado strephoun polles thugatrikes megalon ellenikon omilon se upobole aiteseon stis armodies arkhes tou khrematisteriou prokeimenou na eisagagoun tis metokhes tous sto khaa mesa stokathe phora pou dianuo ten apostase epikaloumai ton theo mas na balei to kheri tou na teleiosei o dromos gia na teleiosei kai to marturio tou odegou apo to ladiko mekhri ta kolumpiaupoleipeto pontous tes nikes bolou kai eikhe kheiriste amuntike sumperiphora mekhri totemeta ton epanaleptiko opou e omada tou dikephalou epibletheke me ste nea philadelpheia den etan ligoi autoi pou thumethekan ton proto agona stok terezakes na askholethei me to problema tou neou kanonismou diaitesias ekhei iere upokhreose os melos tes kai na men bgainei ston tupo gia na epideixei ton eauto tou os kalos samareitestheoreitai o protos polites tes amerikanikes epeirou pou episkephteke ton elleniko khorooi skeptomenoi kai statheroi opadoi tes apaitoun komma me arkhes me orama me elpidapolu semantiko einai oti e prospherei duo khronia egguese me paralabe kai paradose ston khoro tou telikou khreste kati spaniotato ste khora mas gia tous perissoterous kataskeuastesme autous tous orous a o ekpaideutikos epitheoretismos de sundetheke me tis sunolikoteres axiologikes ektheseisaitia ta aderphia mas oi guphtoi gia tous opoious oi katoikoi ekhoun exapolusei pampolles kategoriestora uparkhei kai perissoteros khronos kai perissotera khremataeinai orismenes phores ephialtes gia mia gunaika na men mporei na perpataei diaphoretika akoma kai tis stigmes tou megalou odurmoupeges apo ton omilo pantos theoroun oti uparkhei akoma perithorio gia diapragmateuseis me ten eno kukloi tou upourgeiou oikonomias parapempoun sto orizontio skhedio pou katartizei e kubernese gia te sterixe tou kladouparallela topikes brokhes kai sporadikes kataigides tha semeiothoun kurios sta anatolika kai notia eno khionia tha pesoun sta oreinadedomena me lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese diabaste opos akribos tuponontai oi kheimoniatikes nukhtes rikhnoun to peplo tous apo to apogeuma sten proteuousa tes souediaskhomatodromos mekous peripou khlmoloi oi kineteres sunduazontai me emiautomato seiriako kibotio skheseonarketa khiliometra makria apo to hrakleio sto khorio makres tou demou zarou leitourgoun exi xulophournoi apo epikheirese pou diaterei e kuria euphrosune phanourake kai paraskeuazei paradosiako psomi kai ta paximadia beltistonto perissotero semantiko omos einai oti eiserkhomaste se mia epikindune phase stis ellenotourkikes skheseisto pathos kai ton tsampouka pou eikhan ta ebgazan se stigmes ektos paikhnidiouoi proegoumenes epta emeres pou perasan etan anadiamphisbeteta oi pleon endiapherouses apo ten katarreuse tes lehman brothers ton septembrio tou gia tous psukhraimous ependutesnai den mas boethese e tukhe alla e euthune anekei se maskata ton kleiston panepistemion pempte augoustou pempte augoustou kata ton kleiston panepistemion takhtheke o neos prutanes tou panepistemiou kretes euripides stephanou sto perithorio tes sunanteses me tous kretes omogeneisede uparkhoun oikogeneies oi opoies sten prooptike tou kleisimatos tou skholeiou delonoun oti tha phugoun apo to khorioalloste opos uposterizoun oi kinetopoieseis pou eginan to perasmeno kalokairi se lemno kai athena etan gia na apotrepsoume kai na allaxoume tous orous tou upo exelixe diagonismousta nosokomeia tou omilou ekhoun gennethei pano apo khiliades paidia pano apo to ton sunolikon genneseon sten ellada kai konta sto ton genneseon sten attike ten teleutaiato ekhei megale istoria epitukhion sto diagonismo me kataktese e theses ta proegoumena khroniato noembrio tou diethnes epitrope sten opoia summeteikhan egkritoi epistemones ap olo ton kosmo anakoinone ta apotelesmata ereunas sumphona me ten opoia e arktike zestainetai me takheis ruthmousaporrophaei ten eliake energeia kai trophodotei enan apotamieutera thermotetas makras diarkeias o opoios exasphalizei te thermanse tou ktiriou to kheimonapaidia tragoudoun khoreuoun zographizoun kataskeuazoun kai khamogelounanazetese me lexeis kleidia e me ton kodiko tou proiontosgia ten bethnike kseroume oti einai ena protathlema pou krubei polles pagidestis duo apo tis treis autes kategories axiomatikous kai oplites tis ekhoume analusei sta proegoumena mas arthrapros to paron o broules tha egkainiasei to proto kai trito tmema tou periphereiakou dromouto krupho menuma tou pantele kazakou panteles kazakos ebgaze aphrous apo to stoma skhedon omothume uperxe e antidrase ton diamorphoton tes legomenes koines gnomes sta ratsistika egklemata tou kazakousten kalogerike aphosiotheke tous treis teleutaious menes o stamates kraounakes proetoimazomenos ste thessalonike gia to ntempouto tou sto theatro kai malista sten epidauro os dikaiopolessten epithese tora e apousia tou konstantinou tha einai emphaneis alla kaneis den mporei na problepsei kati perissoterooi pontiakoi aetoi to epraxan kai se mia semantike athletike ekdelose phoresan to antigrapho tes phanelas tes istorikes omadas pontos paizontas podosphairoanalogo eggrapho estale apo to nomarkhe kai stis uperesies tes nomarkhiakes autodioikeses prokeimenou na entathoun oi elegkhoi sten agora tou nomou kai idiaitera tes poleos tou erakleiou epiballontas tis problepomenes kuroseistha ton brei otan apodekhtei poios telika uperxe o antras tes zoes tesmetaxu ton nekron einai kai o bombistes o opoios eikhe anameikhthei me tous nearous pou perimenan exo apo ten ntiskotekdienergeia tes eisaggelikes ereunas eikhe zetethei apo ton upourgo dikaiosunes me skhetike paraggelia tou pros ton eisaggelea tou pangiati mia apo tis sugkhrones entaseis pegazei apo te nea politikopoiese ton politismikon tautoteton me tropous pou amphisbetoun ten epiteukhtheisa kratike nomimopoieseauto semainei oti khreiazetai na dinei euro to mena epi pente khroniasta tele ianouariou ta kerde tes ephthanan ta ek sta tele phebrouariou ta dismolis sta eikosi exi tes khronia to e konsouelo ekhei prolabei kiolas na thapsei duo suzugouston mexikano rikardo karde nas kai ton argentino proxeno sto parisi gkomez karrigiomalista o mikhales pantoulas zetese suggnome gia ten upanakhorese aitiologontas ten me ten anagke na dothei nai luse en meso oikonomikes krises pou den epitrepei na egkataleiphthei to ergoprokhorame pros ten anaptuxe enos kratous dikaiou enos kratous ousiastika koinonikou sto opoio oloi oi polites tha mporoun na demiourgoun na ergazontai na apolambanoun iatrikes asphalises kai perithalpses na pairnoun meros sta koinaden statheke omos ekeiidiaitera osoi pairnoun pharmaka na sumbouleutoun ton iatro tous an tha prepei na ta sunekhisoun kai se poia dasologiato onoma kai oi tropoi prootheses tou einai stoikheia pou boethoun alla den kathorizoun to an tha apodeikhthei demophiles e okhioi kitrinomauroi den ekhoun problema na diapragmateutoun te metagraphe tou akoma kai me ellenikous sullogous arkei na ikanopoiethoun oikonomikata parizianakia erkhontai gia na dokimasoun kainourgia phageta na exereunesoun tis dunatotetes tou ouraniskou tous na anakalupsoun tis protimeseis tous na gnorisoun tous anthropous pou ergasthekan gia ten eukharistese tousetan mia programmatismene sunantese e opoia tha ginetai kathe exi menes opos apophasisamexekiname apo ton peiraia gia ten mukonokai o philathlos kosmos ton ioanninon perimenei pos kai pos to mats gia auto kai ekhei ginei skhediasmos gia ten parousia tou sto gepedotasos mpoulmetes epistrephei sunekhos stis tou mpouenos aires mia pole sten opoia niothei oikeia kathos eno brisketai sten akre tou kosmou moiazei me metallagmene mesogeioprokeitai gia theseis noseleuton paraiatrikou prosopikou odegon kheiriston elektronikon upologistonauto to paradeigma prepei na akolouthesoume kai ste khora mas an theloume na ekhoume ousiastika apotelesmataste sunekheia e epitrope tha exetasei to aitema tes elladas gia apaleiphe tou prostimou pou ekhei upoblethei ste khora mas gia te leitourgia tes kharadras tou kouroupetoutha summetaskhei sto diethne marathonio tes romes stis martiou kai kalei osa apo ta mele tou epithumoun na laboun meros na epikoinonesoun me ton ephoro tou sullogou sto telsto gialiskari kai ste lagkada kato apo tous theoratous platanouskupria athletria elene artumata perase me khrono pou apotelei nea pagkuprio rekor sta emitelika tonkapote khairomastan apoluta dikaiologemena me ta cocktails pou ephtiakhne o photes krikzones sto thruliko sto upogeio tes odou boukourestiouprin apo khronia xekinesa to diko mou taxidi sto khoro tes politikesapodose diamorphotheke sto semeioontas auxese kata se skhese me ten proegoumene demoprasiamia boutia stis cenotes tis limnes me phresko nero diaspartes se ole te khersoneso tou yucatanego de the na kartero k e ora me spoudazei ekeion pou mou lete eseis den prepei kai de moiazeiokhi mono ta paidia kai ta aggonia tha se peirazoun epeide den ekheis perase ste zoetest pou oloklerotheke me nikete ton proto meme to zetema na pairnei sunekhos politikes diastaseis milese o ekprosopos tupou tou leukou oikou tzei karneidustukhos gia pempte phora sta teleutaia exi khronia semeiotheke apousia skaphous tou polemikou mas nautikou alla e parousia tes mpantas tes apo ten rodo sunetelese kathoristika sten pragmatopoiese olon ton ekdeloseon tou diemeroume ten anakoinose aute e zeta e ruthmise aute na iskhusei tautokhrona kai gia tis mikroteres epikheireseis pou apaskholoun akome kai enan ergazomenotermatophulakas tou ophe tha phugei stis tou mena kai tha epistrepsei ten epomene tou agonata exairetika pota loipon ektos apo to oti solaroun oraiotata ekhoun tis kaluteres prooptikes gia ena exairetiko kokteildemotike arkhe prepei na apodeixei me kathe leptomereia oti e diadikasia etan apsoge apo ten arkhe mekhri to telosenas nearos sunelephthe sumphona me ton politiko skhematismo tes sou ki ton ethniko sundesmo gia te demokratiame ta khremata auta agorazoun biblia upologistes kai ekdidoun biblia me tis ergasies pou ekhoun pragmatopoiesei kata te diarkeia ton programmaton periballontikes ekpaideuseskentrike diathese ayurveda hellas telneos khrestes eggraphesundese ektos apo ton leutere kote gia ton opoio oi anthropoi tou digene delosan oti epistrephei ston digene problema proekupse kai me tous allous duo podosphairistes pou theoretika tha dinontan daneikoi ston euagoraeinai ena sugkhrono aeroplano me automato pilototo mono pou den mas exegei o proedros tou einai gia poio logo aisthanetai ubrizomenos apo ten apokalupse tes drases kai tou logou ton sunergaton kai summakheton touparola auta de phobataikuriakos papadopoulos kataphere sten prote tou summetokhe me ten ethnike andron na panegurisei te nike na ekhei kale apodose kai tautokhrona na skorareierides polemoi thanatoi kai katastrophes mastizan tis poleiskrate tes elladassten kariera tou o khilntemprant ekhei agonistei se stoutgkarde balenthia khophenkhaim kai sportigk lisabonasalloste e makra prosektike orimase einai aute pou kanei to parmigiano reggiano toso diaphoretikoaphou brasei kala te souronoumeos monadiko proothemeno o phereira tha khresimopoiesei ton totse eno o kante pithanotata tha parei te these tou sariegki dipla ston mpoumsongkiordanes pos ginetai kai autos o topos to nesi mas na brisketai panta ektos tou optikou pediou endiapherontos kai phrontidas tou athenokentrikou kratous einai mega musterioethnike paidon gennethentes to kai neotera tha dosei philikous agones sto plaisio tes proetoimasias tes gia to tsalentz paount tes katerines kai ten telike phase tou europaikou protathlematos ste slobeniakairoskopoi einai autoi pou kratoun sta surtaria tou grapheiou tous anektelestes ametakletes dikastikes apophaseis kai zemionoun me ton tropo auto to elleniko demosio me dekades isos kai ekatontades khiliades eurogiati omos anesukhei e prooptike tou apoplethorismou mporei na demiourgesei phaulo kuklona timesome te mneme ton palaioteron me te demosieuse ton ntokoumenton tous mia epistole pou staltheke sta peza to san na grapheke semeraeinai anthropino na zete kaneis oloen kai pio pollakala tha kanoume bebaia edo pou phtasame kai me autous pou mas ephtasan na apodekhtoume ten katastase mas kai na te sunethisoume giati me aute tha zesoume pollapolla khroniaepises tha diexakhthei kai emerida me thema gluptike sto khoro sto sunedriako kentro diaselo tou metsobou to sabbato septembriou stis to proiste suneleuse opou tha ginei o apologismos tes parataxes gia ole te drasterioteta ten opoia ekhei anaptuxei mekhri semera prokeitai na oristikopoiethei kai e eklogike diakeruxe tes agonistikes kineses demotonapo tous phoreis autous tha ginoun oi agones eno meta tha uparkhei eidike bradia gia kathe somateio bolei gia na giortasei otidepote thelei sumplerose o k markoulakes pou palaiotera etan paragontas bolei ston ophenomos kukladon ekhei megaluteran ektasin kai plethusmonsto lepto o kuriakos me kephalia meta apo phaoul tou andreadake anebase to deikte tou skor sesumphona me te cisco aute e tase oloena megaluteres epektases kai khreses tou internet auxanei tis pieseis sten upodome tou diadiktuou diethnosomada einai sta emitelika ton play off ekhei proto skorer ton marsal kati pou prosopika de thumamai alle khronia sto parelthonsto tournoua prepei na ekhoume ruthmota pneumatika dikaiomata anekoun sto kai parakhorountai se sundrometes monon gia sugkekrimene khreseuperxe kai e emprestike epithese sto autokineto tou proen uphupourgou pekhode staurou kalogianne ton properasmeno kheimonasta panepistemia den egine pote kamia katalepseargotera xekinaei tis zontanes emphaniseis kurios me xeno repertorio kai jazzeisegetes tou thematos etan o armodios antidemarkhos apostolos patestos o opoios zetese apo ten oikonomike epitrope na psephistei to thema oste na mporesei na katartisei ton proupologismo tou demousunarpastikes palies istories apo te khio san palio kalo krasi sten kuriolexia pinontai oi palies istories apo te khio tes marias phaphaliou dragona pou kuklophoroun se deutere ekdose ste seira aipos ton ekdoseon akritasepeisodio lets try that again ann einai mperdemene kai kleinei rantebou me psukhologo gia oikogeneiake therapeiakanontas ten periegese sas sto nesi tha breite pollous kolpous kai omorphes paralies eno o dromos tha sas odegesei kai sto kosmopolitiko limani tou nesiou to kionikonstantinos beta auta pou bionoume einai epiloge mas khoris na khreiazetai sustaseis o konstantinos beta tha anebei to erkhomeno sabbato ste skene tou gagarin liosionto kostoumi tes blakeias kai e kosmara tou ta mathate ta nea euro einai to kostoumi gia te geloia pankratike kinetopoiese pou organotheke ten perasmene ebdomada gia ten prostasia tou leophoreiou tou olumpiakoukai prosthetoun deikhnoun kathara oti sten periokhe mas parekhontai olokleromena phrontisteriaka mathemataantitheta autes einai e dodone to zagori o bikos kai ta souper market papageorgiouse apostase khiliometra duo ergasimon emeron kai se osous metakinethoun se pano apo khilsten idia kateuthunse kinountai kai orismena entupa opos e ellenike phloga kai e sunekheia tou apolloneio phos opos kai to thessalonikio tetraktusoso gia emas tous polites ekhoume apotukhei na xekatharisoume stous politikous mas oti apaitoume nomous pou tha mas exasphalisoun te megalutere dunate pithanoteta epibiosesste sunekheia probekame sto anoigma ton trapezikon logariasmon ton phusikon prosopon pou dialambanontai sten ereuna masgia paradeigma oi mousoulmanoi tes thrakes kapote etan ellenes gallos logios zak lakarrier graphei gia ton ellena e orthodoxia einai to spiti touamesos apo ten arkhen eirgasthen me exairetiken aphosiosin upo tas pleon epikindunous sunthekas e toson prosektike demiourgtheisa epitopios pheme tou os germanophilou uperxen thriambeutike epitukhianoi eidikoi diapistosan oti o thanatos tou aliente kataskeuasei arketa mikres purenikes suskeues oste na prosarmozontai pano se enan puraulo omos kapoioi ekhoun arkhisei na allazoun gnomean kai authaireta auta ta ktismata etan nomimopoiemena ste suneidese tou kosmou aphou exuperetousan anagkes autostegasestha mporousa sas diabebaio na emoun polu anetos prodidontas olous autous tous anthropous oi opoioi pragmatika me prosopiko kostos akolouthoun aute ten prospatheiato semeionei oti oi skhediazomenes exaireseis apo ten asphalise prepei na antimetopizontai me meletemenes proupotheseis kai sunexetase en genei stoikheion eisodematikon apesteilediaphoretika to ton phuton ston planete amesa tha exaphanisthoun opos egraphe to tes kathemerines to septembre pou mas perasepantos oi analutes episemainoun oti e anodos ton timon tou petrelaiou den apotelei apeile gia ta omologa ton opoion oi apodoseis arxisan na anebainoun apo ten arxe tou etousepikeruxan ton kantaphi zontano e nekro ena lastikho espase to seri tou loeb deutera monimos anesukho giatro adto patriko mou kai e geitonia mou sten agia paraskeue opou megalosa kai sunekhizo na menoprosphora kaluphtheke kata phores enanti pososto kalupses kata ten proegoumene
