handycam pou den mas enthousiase etan auto tou dekteten proegoumene kuriake o k babatsikles kernouse sten plateia soublakia kai mpiresthelo prota na eukharisteso ton alla kai ton proedro spuro neophutide gia ten time pou ekane semera alla kai gia ta brabeia pou mou edoseduo phores pagkosmios protathletes mpeke amesos sta pit omos e zemia stis anarteseis etan toso sobare oste den mporouse na epidiorthothei epitopoupio prosektikoi kai prothumoi etan oi mathetes tes dekaetias tou se skhese me keinous ton epomenon khronon sumphona me to philologo k kosta stephanakesunetairistes pou thelesan na kratesoun ten anonumia tous anapheroun oti e time tou probeiou galaktos phetos tha kumanthei apo eos euro ana kilooi ergazomenoi se anakoinose tous kanoun logo gia allepalleles sugkrouseis tou antidemarkhou kathariotetas me to demarkho kai ton antidemarkho oikonomikonten idia stigme kai se aisthetiko epipedo to periballon leitourgias me ta pollapla desktop ta omorpha graphika kai tis epipleon dunatotetes epi tes othones sugkatalegetai sta atou tousguro apo to kentro tou oi toikhoi ton exoterikon diorophon e triorophon spition ephtiakhnan okhuromatiko periboloepi tes uparithmna men apantoun pote se praktikes eroteseis na apantoun mono se oti kata periptose ekhoun programmatisthei kai na aoristologoun me theories kai oukhi retories pou prophanos didaskontai sta bouleutika e upourgika sumbouliaekhoume na antimetopisoume mia polu kale omada pou ede ekhei anakerukhthei protathletriaapo to programma apokleiontai protistos ta skholeia tes upaithrou oi mathetes ton opoion ekhoun megalutere anagke aphou den uparkhei prosbase oute se idiotika phrontisteriaas to kanoun autoi pou einai douleia toustsekhoph sta pio megala tou kephia kharizei aphthono gelio pou den exatmizetai molis kleisei e aulaiapolitistike drasterioteta akolouthei ten pepatemene khoris kati to kainourgio periorizomene kurios sta glentia tou kalokairiou kai tis threskeutikes teletes pou organonontai apo tous iereispragmati ta khronia pernousan ma to taxidi etan toso oneiriko kai gemato pou den ethelan na teleioseitrite augoustou epeteioi diethnes emera gia te diaterese tes stibadas tou ozontos oi stratiotikes dunameis tou impraem apokhoroun ap ten peloponnesogiati oi neoi skenothetes opos kai oloi oi neoi kallitekhnes ekhoun anagke apo ena bema apo ena thesmo apo pollous thesmous ana ten uphelio gia na mporoun na parousiazoun te douleia tous kai na epikoinonoun me to koinooi tekhnikes gia apodotike kalliergeia poikilia tou biomekhanikou triantaphullou pou kalliergeitai sten kozane einai idia me ekeine pou kalliergeitai ste boulgaria ten tourkia te rosia ten india kai ten kinata stena stis arkhes tes suggrou pethanan mazi me ten anoixe tou brit pop e plateia mabile adeiase mazi me to sintribani tes kai e piatsa tou psurre ekane to guro tou thriambou stous olumpiakous kai egkateleipse noris te nightlife koursapetrelaio katastrophe ston kolpo epereazei akoma ten to kostos tes katastrophes ston kolpo tou mexikou exakolouthei na epereazei an kai se mikrotero pleon bathmo ta apotelesmata tesse mia phase sto diplaki pou etan se exelixe ekeine ten ora o nearos amuntikos tou olumpiakou ekane mia polu omorphe prospatheia kai me soutlompa nikese ton kostantso bazontas ena polu omorpho gkol to opoio kheirokrotethekemen perimenete ton udrarguro na khtupesei kokkino gia na okhurosete to spiti sasekdose upsous disme ten adeia san tabula rasa mneme auton ton tupon kai ton kharitomeno autosarkasmo tous skhetizetai amesa ena trito kharakteristiko tous to sundromo tou piter panproegoumeno tous den ekhoun oi trakes tou stonten tukhere poulese sto lakheiopole niko papakhrestou o idioktetes praktoreiou lakheion kosmas mentesides sten ptolemaidato kuriotero omos einai oti uparkhoun akoma polla perithoria na ginoun nees gnorimies stis kateuthunseis kai sta reumata pou kharaxansunekheia tou egkheirematos aphora ton kheimerino tourismo gia ten pole kai bebaios ten mesaionike pole tes rodouk kuriakides prosthese akome oti problepetai epises na ginei anabathmise tou elikodromiou sto nautiko nosokomeio oste na antapokrinetai sta semerina dedomenadikastike apokatastase tha ginei khronia argotera todustukhos kathe mera me ten anokhe ton arkhon egkataleipontai kainourgia zoa apo asuneidetous pou talaiporoun kai tous skulous kai tous upoloipous khiotespera mazi ki ena solenario bazeline thumetheka ta niata mousumphonese telika o giorgos gennematas kai mas edose to onoma tou neou thesmou diakoinotikes sunergasias pou perieikhe kai to basiko stokho tou anaptuxiakos sundesmossumphona me plerophories pantos epeide to klima etan baru tis teleutaies emeres meta ten entone kontra pou eikhe o gerasimos bentoures me ton konstantino tsolakake sto teleutaio to gegonos tes paraiteses den prokalese ekplexephragkiadoulakes den einai gi auto milesa gia leitourgia pou einai anagke na anabathmisteiprosopika tonise o nomarkhes paulos bogiatzes para tis duskolies pou uparkhoun eos tora eimai aisiodoxos pos to ergo de tha khatheios apotelesma gia na ekdosei kapoios eisiterio tha prepei eite na kanei ten kratese elektronika eite na metabei stis uperesies tou ste thessaloniketo ste antipoliteuse etan idrutiko melos tes phileleutheres demokratikes enoseos pou eikhe stokhous ten ethnike anexartesia kai koinonike dikaiosune oste na xeperastoun ta pantote mainomena politika pathebebaia akoma den mporoume na bgaloume sumperasmata mias kai ekhoume dromo mprosta masapaggelia tou reousa kai diaugesauto sumbainei epeide meionetai to diathesimo eisodema ton katanalotonlaos bretheke kai sten moskhalampre sou epitukhia pou tima ole ten ellada kai idiaitera ten krete kai tous kretikous mas kanei olous uperephanous kai apodeiknuei oti e duname tes theleses e psukhe kai to pathos den gnorizoun empodiase auten te phase apomakrunontai me kheirodialoge ta anepithumeta ulika apophagia mpataries roukha klp peripou to ton eiserkhomenon ulikon einai akatallela gegonos pou deikhnei poso liga gnorizoume gia ton sosto tropo anakuklosessto proto emikhrono den egine kati to idiaiterosuzetethekan akoma kai metagraphika themata kati pou deikhnei oti ston ophe den ekhei stamatesei e prospatheia gia ten eniskhuse tes omadas e opoia den mporei phusika na ginei tora alla apo ton prosekhe ianouarioopos anapherei se anakoinose tou upologizei to kostos auto se euro phetos enanti euro perusiantidra sten apophase tou demotikou sumbouliou na men epektathei to diktuo ton demotikon sugkoinonion stis periokhes kallitheas kai khalika meta apo aitema ton odegon taxisugkinese kai ton duo brabeuthenton etan emphanes gia ten time pou tous egine apo anthropous pou eno briskontai toso makria kratoun tis anamneseis zontanesmprosta sten uparkhousa katastase den arkei e politike taxe na einai oligon upeuthune aphenontas ta pragmata opos einaioi dunatotetes sunergasias einai polu semantikes kai kharakteristikotere olon einai e ependutike protoboulia apo ten etaireia plastika kretesto skaphos mekous metron eplee milia tes seteias konta sto kouphonesi kai sumphona me ton kapetanio eikhan khalasei oi mekhanes tou etan ousiastika akuberneto me kinduno na buthisteigi auto pisteuo pos ki ekeinoi pou me proetrepsan na men prokhoreso to ekanan apo eilikrines endiapheronan kai e krete kai e rodos den briskontai stis protes theseis ton touristikon protimeseon ta nesia tou ioniou sugkratoun akome tous roumanous touristes pou geutekan tis omorphies tousoson aphora ton kallitekhniko diagonismo sten kategoria tes mousikes to epipedo apodeikhteke apogoeteutiko etsi dotheke mono ena khalkino metallio sten kategoria tes mousikes gia orkhestra ston dano sunthete rountolph simonsen gia to ergo tou sumphonia aroi europaioi polites me ten apatheia tous epelexan na steiloun menuma timorias pros tis kuberneseis tous gia ton tropo diakheirises tes kheiroteres oikonomikes krises ton teleutaion etongia mia akoma phora to dikasterio den mas aphese na plexoumeekprosopos ton ependuton o k eugenios kaulakones ap ten energeiake mutilenes pou epidiokei khronia tora na ependusei ste these laphtse tou demou thermes kateggeile ton periphereiarkhe oti empodizei me ten praktike tou ten ependuseoi gepedoukhoi ta eikhan khamena kanontas to ena lathos piso apo to alloan ton episkephtheite ten emera mporei na sas phanei idiaitera esukhosdiple epithese egine peri tis topike ora ora elladas meta to iphtar te stigme pou oi mousoulmanoi diakoptoun ten kathemerine nesteia sten diarkeia tou ierou mena tou ramazaniouparallela mesa sto diastema auto organothekan kai alles drasteriotetes opos enemeroseis se ekpaideutikous se strateumenous kathos kai omilies se goneis eno sundiorganose kai enemerotikes emeridesemeis e kubernese tes kai o k alogoskouphes pegame sten kai tes eipame oti eimaste apateonesidiotes pou antelephthesan to peristatiko alla kai oi idioi enemerosan telephonika to kentro tes ameses draseskapoia ap ta paidakia auta miloun sten elisabet garephalake einai oraia sto kainourgio skholeiosemne telete tes katharses tou ellenikou podosphairou odegeitai se prodiagegrammene poreia me katalexe enan odunero kai antitheto me to koino peri dikaiou aisthema sumbibasmokamia apo tis prospatheies kai tis prosphores tous den tha pane khamenesekho analabei te dieuthunse tes epikheireses edo kai duo menesperiorizoume ton arithmo ton khoregoumenon adeion oste to eidos kai o arithmos tous na antapokrinontai se pragmatikes anagkes tes oikonomiasseafarm kalei tous metokhous se ektakte genike suneleuse stis sten edra tes etairias me thema ten epanegkrise tes auxeses tou metokhikou kephalaiou me metretakuklos ergasion tes upokhorese perusi sta disoi proetoimasmenes epikheireseis ekhoun polu perissoteres pithanotetes na khrematodotethoun apo koinotika programmata eno ta ependutika skhedia pou tous egkrinontai einai polu pio prosarmosmena stis anagkes tous kai epomenos polu apotelesmatikaksekhname auto to paikhnidi kai blepoume mprostaagios demetrios phardia paralia me leuka botsala boreia tes stenes balasstoma plousio me apsoge isorropia kai tautokhrona kompsotetaki apo ten alle oti para tis polu kales kai euruthmes skenothesies auto pou pragmatika etan ellipobares etan ta keimena theoretikos delade e aphorme gi aute ten parastasegalaktobiomekhania arla einai e trite se megethos sunetairistike biomekhania galaktokomikon proionton ston kosmotetarte noembriou to oikogeneiako klima pou uparkhei sta apoduteria tou giannina anedeixe o elias kotsios os to mustiko gia ten polu kale poreia tes omadas sto protathlema tes ethnikesekho paixei me ton olumpiako sten edra tou sten elladaairetoi tha topothetethoun tis epomenes meres me sapheneia epi tou proskhediou aphou oi perissoteroi den prolaban na to kanoun os tora alla me deloseis tous exephrasan epiphulaxeis kai antirreseis sto endekhomeno na demiourgethei o megalos demos sto lekanopediooi idioi episemainoun oti ta peristatika auta ekhoun auxethei to teleutaio khrono apodeiknuontas etsi to kathoristiko rolo pou diadramatizei to diadiktuo stis skheseis ton anthroponkopelasia opos ekhoume grapsei kat epanalepse einai spor pou tairiazei ston somatotupo tou ellena o opoios ekhei kai to pleonektema na periballetai apo thalassino e limnisio neroopos kai oso mporoki opos kathe phora ta sun tes ekdromes etan perissotera kai semantikotera apo ta plen oi apolauseis apo tis talaiporiesuparkhoun loipon logoi ethnikes semasias na uposterixoun tous neous agrotesoi nun aristeroi tes kuprou emphanizontai os upermakhoi ton xenon ergaton kai kategoroun olous tous upoloipous gia ratsismopompe sunekhizetaiapo ten anakhoresin tou eisaggeleos k demden kruboume oti polu zelepsame pou den briskomastan mesa sto plethos pou parakolouthouse live tis sunaulies ostoso kharekame pou eikhame ten eukairia na paroume mia geuse apo te thetike energeia ton mousikon kai tou koinoukata ton idio einai antithete stis methodeuseis kai tha kataballei prospatheia na tis apomakruneipragmatopoiountai sto gumnasio karpenesiou ston prophete elia kseria stis apo ton sullogo neon karpenesiou me erga metaxu allon ton mpokorou kastritse blakhake rizou theodo rouk mparnie pantos meta tis episkepseis pou ekane sto ki enemerotheke gia ta erga eipe pos tha milesei apo stethous thelontas na deixei ten ikanopoiese touoi skheseis tes enoses me ton upoloipo kosmo suzetountai sto sumboulio genikon upotheseon kai exoterikon skheseonsumperasma einai ekeino pou iskhuei panta gia ten politike pote me les poteelbira ekmustereuetai ston argure oti einai eroteumene mazi tou eno e khara pathainei krise zelotupias otan ton pairnei telephono kai to sekonei e elbirak psinakes einai pragmati mia uperbatike upopsephiotetamporeite na pate kai me karabaki apo to limani tes pargasepises to europaiko sumboulio stis martiou einai krisimo gia ole ten oikonomike poreia tes enosesmesotitlos sto demosieuma sto semeio pou ginetai anaphora gia ton otsoa einai oi kalokairines sapounoperesme spoudes agglikes kai ellenikes philologias sto energetiko tou graphei apo ta tou empneusmenos apo to nesi toukai o diogmos tous apo to galliko kratos to kalokairi tou anakalese ste mneme epokhes pou theorousame oti eikhan parelthei anepistreptipoio einai to antikeimeno tes standard etairia mas phemizetai gia tenbolei se eurolitoteta oi aionioi europaike khronia pou akolouthei se kamia periptose den etan aute pou phantazontan oi duo aionioi antipaloi olumpiakos kai panathenaikos sto boleiektos apo ta ulika pou epilegoume gia na phtiaxoume ena piato o tropos pou tha mageirepsoume antikatoptrizei kai ten koultoura tou laougraphei o philos tou alexton blepo n anakateuei to katsarolaki eno e sara bon tragoudaei to broken hearted melodytelika ta pragmata eremesan otan telika diapistotheke oti e purkagia proerkhotan apo brakhukukloma kalodion se grapheio tou deuterou orophou kai den eikhe skhese me to khoro ton mekhanematon pou briskontai diplame ten pleiopsephia aute ektimatai oti apopheugetai o prutanes na einai exopanepistemiakosste sullepse enos allodapou ten ora pou metephere me phortego tesseris lathrometanastes albanous kai duo anelika me teliko proorismo ten athena prokhoresan oi astunomikes arkhes sten egoumenitsasto sunedrio tha milesoun toso kathegetes tou panepistemiou aigaiou oso kai proskeklemenoi kathegetes allon panepistemiondidaskalia tes xenes glossas sto skholeio eunoeitai an e akolouthou m ene poreia einai a grammikeidiaitere mneia na kanoume gia ten uposterixe pou mas prosepheran oi tekhnikes uperesies tes demotikes enotetas notias rodouphoreas tourismou sten epeiro trite martiosapo ton protoporo nikephoro phoka os to demetrio kallerge kai te lepse tou protou suntagmatos apo ton othona tosto khorio episkephtekame ten taberna stinos opou mas perimenan nostima edesmata kai melodike mousike apo tous organopaiktes patera kai gio idioktetes tes tabernasleptotero kai elaphrutero apo to arkhiko me photeinoteres othones kai megalutero stylus apeuthunetai se khrestes pou tous endiapherei okhi mono e leitourgikoteta kai e kainotomia ston skhediasmo tou software alla kai e emphanise touselpida kai aisiodoxia einai na aisthanthoume kai pali uperephanoi kai na sterikhthoume stis dikes mas dunameis kai se axies kai ikanes egesies alla auto dustukhos phainetai oti semera einai to zetoumenoto eggrapho den suzetetheke eno e sunantese ousiastika analotheke se genike antallage apopseonekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous saphos kai tha prepei o kosmos na plerophorethei gia to programma theseassto deutero meros mesa sto gepedo uperkhe ousiastika mia omadaas to epikheireso kai tupika tha paixo ena sustema phortoma oi duades me bila lester sriousmperi tha paixo ena paroli eggleziko me mperi kharts mplakpoul over ntortmount roma alkorkon ksanoigomai ligo giati me pairneitairiazei loipon apoluta me ten tukhe ton kinezon mellothanaton sten opoia anaphertheke e stele to proegoumeno sabbato pou tous bazoun na plerosoun te sphaira me ten opoia tha tous skotosounpantos diapseudetai apo kubernetikes peges oti o kantaphi kai e oikogeneia tou skhediazoun na egkataleipsoun te khoraden tha xekhaso oti meta apo ton athlo enos keimenou selidon me sugkhareke gia ten kinese moutetarte ioulios khanetai o stokhos tou elleimmatos apoklise disauto semainei oti oi paiktes mporoun na apolambanoun kapoia apo ta kalutera paikhnidia drases axiopoiontas tis dunatotetes toso tou epexergaste snapdragon sto oso kai tes upseles analuses othones aphes diastases intsonoi prutaneis tha kathorisoun te stase tous se ektakte sunodo ten kuriake sten athenase deloseis sto o upourgos oikonomias kai oikonomikon phransoua mparouen paradekhtheke semera oti e stasimoteta kata to deutero trimeno einai ligo apogoeteutiketo radiophono den metadidei eideseis alla dusoione e euoione mousikegiorgos zakharakes edose entole na diaskhisoume ten plagia ton aladanon o enas piso apo ton allokai to xenodokheio thalassa telautoi pou stis arkhes augoustou epitethekan ston ntousan mpagebitsexetase tes upotheses tha arkhisei stis to proipolles einai oi apokhoreseis apo to politiko kai to athletiko tmema tes teleorases eno den apokleietai kai e meiose apodokhon se osous epilexoun na parameinounduskoles ores perase o upourgos epikrateias elias mosialos khthes enemeronontas tous bouleutes tou gia tis allages pou anakoinose oti tha epipherei stensemera einai e megalutere phule tou amazoniou eireneumene me te phuse alla kai me tous guro anthropous diaterontas zontanous tous arkhaious muthous kai tis proaionies paradoseis teslogo tes kathizeses khreiasteke na apoxelothei o misos upostathmos kai na aposundethoun metaxu tous oi duo metaskhematistes oi opoioi leitourgoun se autonsunergasia skhetizetai me ten upo idruse sunetairistike trapeza thessalonikes kai eidikotera aphora sto na epiteukhthei o stokhos mekhri ten anoixe tou e trapeza na ekhei tethei se leitourgiapsephoi kai oi oikologoi prasinoi to pososto tes apokhes ephtase stogia ton milte paraskeuaide alla kai gia ten prospatheia tes milese ste sunekheia kai o demarkhos lesbou demetres bounatsosgia na apotrapoun oi prosphuges apo tis anatarakhes ste boreia aphrike na eiselthoun sten gallia e gallia ekleise ta sunora tes sto notio geitona tesautobiographia enos egetikou stelekhous tes protes genias ton eruthron taxiarkhionsemeionetai oti phetos tha prometheutoun kainourgies khemikes toualetes kai tha epanexetasoun ten kataskeue neon tou khronousten erotese an to kratos parekhei oikonomika e alla kinetra gia tetoies protoboulies anakukloses e apantese tes k neonake den xaphniazeiotan ebgalan exo to ptoma kai to akoumpesan se ena prokheiro trapezi mesa sto parapegma pou tous ligotero taragmenous kairous khresimeue gia plustario emoun pia bebaios oti o gkebara etan nekrosaurio dikhos auriodiadikasia topotheteite tis duo lames ekaterothen tou phellou kai trabate peristrephontaspolupharmakia sunethos aphora elikiomenous anthropous oi opoioi ekhoun ten tase na pairnoun polla pharmakaton rotao gia ten kinese sto magazi kai an o kosmos einai prothumos na agorasei biologika proiontaauta anekoun stis ideologikes khreseis tes istorias tis opoies o istorikos meleta alla kai tis opoies aporriptei os parapoietikessiga siga omos tha to dekhteito sumperasma opos se oloklere te khora etsi kai sten krete ta demosia erga einai stasima anapheroun se koine tous delose dinontas malista kai epexegematika stoikheiasto metaxu exakolouthei e ekkremoteta sto para ten ekklese tes nomarkhiakes eleos anakoinoste sterixe na kleisoume te diarroeden apokleietai mesa stis epomenes emeres na ginei mia epaphe me ton demetre priphte oste na phanei to kata poso uparkhoun oi prooptikes gia na mporesoun na sunergastoun oi duo pleurespernoume to kotopoulo se xulakia kai ta topothetoume se tapsitessera lepta argotera o euriskomenos ston bolo mpeos apanta se klese enos khare mallon apo ten athenanomarkhia hrakleiou eikhe prokeruxei diagonismo gia ten enoikiase ktiriouan upologisoume oti to diathesimo periekhomeno upseles eukrineias einai elakhisto eno parallela polu ligoi diathetoun ten katallele teleorase gia na to probaloun ena meso home cinema mporei na kanei gia arketa akoma khronia ikanopoietika te douleia toulupera phainomena mias akome pio luperes philosophias gia ten autodioikesesto hrakleio opou tha brethei gia liges ores mia mera prin tha egkainiasei to radiophoniko stathmo tes arkhiepiskopesme liga logia oti sunekhei tis pollaples metamorphoseis tes graphes tou lagiou einai e epharmoge tes antilepses tou oti o poietes einai enas empneusmenos anagnosteskathegetes amphisbetei eutheos ton antinori o opoios pote den thelese na thesei tis ergasies tou ste diathese tes epistemonikes koinotetasto skhedio tou k zesiade problepei oi kalliergouuenes poikilies na einai kata duo trita leukes kai oi upoloipes kokkinesupopsephioi gia to upourgeio oikonomikon pherontai na einai oi kk euaggelos benizelos kai mikhales khrusokhoidessten ekdose aplou omologiakou daneiou pou tha khrematodotesei nees exagores gia te diekdikese duo ptukhion tes neas ektes taxes protithetai na prokhoresei e dioikese tes domike kretesakoma khthes e prokhthes uperkhan sunupopsephioi sas pou aphenan polles aikhmes akoma kai prosopikesan tha mporousa ton kosmo na allaza sigoura tha aphena aneggikhte auten te bradia isos mia apo tis pio omorphes kai semantikes gia to lesbiako kalokairitrite augoustou mesa ston ianouario anamenetai na xekinesoun apo to upourgeio ugeias kai koinonikes alleleggues n anakoinonontai ta onomata ton neon dioiketon sta idrumata tes khoras pou upagontai sto upourgeiota esoda diatethekan gia ten sterixe tou sullogou to khamogelo tou paidioutouto dioti epi seiran eton anekhotan para tis protropes to kapsimo ton dason ten leelasia tou anuperaspistou pleon edaphous ten anegerse authaireton oikodomon to mpazoma ton kheimarron kai alla pollaglobaphone drasteriopoieitai stis tekhnologies internet sten kinete telephonia stis olokleromenes luseis automatismou grapheiou kai stis asurmates suskeues telephoniasoso gia to upourgeio apaskholeses sto opoio apeuthunthekan prokeimenou na exasphalisoun kapoio programma gia tous ergazomenous pou apaitountai gia na leitourgesei o xenonas de statheke dunato na epikoinonesoun me ton upourgomeiname oloi ekplektoi kai aphonoi mpros sten teleioteta sten piste apodose sten oraia emphanise sto pathos kai ten zontania ton paidionpantos oi ektimeseis ton nosokomeiakon giatron gia tis exelixeis ston khoro tes ugeias einai akros anesukhetikesmikhales petrakes meta apo skhetiko aitema pou eikhe upobalei o periphereiarkhes dutikes elladas apostolos katsipharasta perithoria ekhoun stenepsei kai phantazei adunato na prolaboun mekhri kai ton iounio na dromologethoun erga apokatastases se megalous khada opos oi treis sto neo demo prebezas o enas sto demo egoumenitsas kai arketoi alloi mikroteroi ana ten epeiroprokeitai gia ton kertuka luan tou mehmet o opoios sunelephthe sten periokhe agiou matthaiou krummenos s enan uponomo opou eikhe topothetesei posoteta klemmenon tsigaron axias ekapodeiknuei pos e ellada epitelous prokhora me takhuterous ruthmous pros te soste kateuthunseetan ekplektika pou arketos kosmos erthe sten proponese gia na mas entharruneiprotimousa tous antres pou prin te thuella aphelos pisteuan pos ste zoe tous basileuei e taxe ki e isorropiaekei edese ten tania me ta kordonia ton papoutsion tou sto lebie ton takhuteton kai ephuge me ta tria agoria to gianne to niko kai to abaptisto adelphaki tous elikias duo etonto periphereiako sumboulio tha einai aireto kai tha apoteleitai apo aireta nomarkhiaka tmemata me proedroeinai enas apo tous pio kairious dianoetes tes epokhes mas kai oi pente radiophonikes tou dialexeis pou sugkentronontai s auton ton tomo mporoun na diabastoun os keimena pou organonoun mia stase pneumatikes politikes apenanti sten epokhe masas mou pei kapoios pos eginan oi proslepseis ton dimeniton pou prosphata eginanmia mera erkhetai sto skholeio enas neos daskalos pou gemizei ton mathete me aisiodoxia kai enthousiasmopragmati andres tou tmematos dioxes narkotikon rodou prokhthes stis to bradu dienergesan elegkho sto spiti tou opou brekan na katekhei miso autoskhedio tsigariliki kannabes kai mikroposoteta kannabesparaskeue loipon semera kai eimaste sto teleutaio sabbatokuriako prin apo to dekapentaugousto otan tha arkhisei e antistrophe metreseauto einai to basiko epikheirema to opoio tha khresimopoiesoun kai oi xenodokhoi tes periokhes sten katathese ton asphalistikon metron kata tou demou brakhasiou o opoios tous epiballei ten plerome tou telous opos o nomos orizei os phoro parepidemountonas doume ti kanoun kai posoute sto thanato tous den esukhazoun oi kolasmenoi tes geskhreiazetai eidike antimetopise kai phusika okhi katastaltikephlorina sto epos tou saranta thessalonike ekddakopagida me ten kapsoula pheremones pou te sunodeuei topotheteitai ste mese tou phullomatos tes elias se skiero meros khoris na erkhetai se epaphe me ta phulla e ta kladia tou dentrousuggrapheas phusika panikoballetaioi mekhri semera ereunes toso edo oso kai sto parisi opou spoudase alla kai sten patmo opou ekhei egkatastathei deikhnoun amese sundese me ton pheromeno os arkhego tes almprosta kai piso mas nosokomeiaapo to septembrio pleon ta tmemata pou tha ekhoun anagke gia perissoteres aithouses didaskalias tha katathetoun elektronika to aitema tous kai tha mporoun na kanoun kratese elektronika se aithouses kai amphitheatra pou sumphona me to sustema tha einai eleutherak papandreou ekane tis epiloges tou kai o laos mporei na krineikai ekthetoun te khora mas diethnosgia tis theseis to marousi apekleise me nikes ton are kerdizontas ton kai sto alexandreio meeinai ki auto mia luse etsi o kathenas ekhei ten entupose oti to diko tou problema einai megalutero apo ton allonkai ten kuriake aprilioutelos exephrase ek merous tes souedikes proedrias ten elpida na ginoun sto gketemporgk bemata empros toso gia te dieurunse oso kai gia ten eno epanelabe te semasia pou ekhei e uiothetese gia prote phora mias strategikes biosimes anaptuxeskhresimopoieitai os stathmos autokineton logo askhetou theseos dioti to ruthmistiko allou to thelei energopoiemeno stathmoekkatharistiko phorologikes deloses oikonomikou etous kai osoi ekhoun eisodemata apo emporikes epikheireseis toalkes pairnei to gramma tes katerinas sto opoio tou anakoinonei tis apophaseis testora e drakhme mas kleinetai sta mouseia ginetai sullektiko antikeimenokhtupate gia deuterolepta kai adeiazete se ena poteri tou martini total summer look mia apisteute aisthese drosiastha anemene kaneis omos oi epaggelmaties pou askholountai me ton tourismo na rixoun tis times ton enoikiazomenon katalumaton kurios sta kheimerina touristika theretra pou sten epeiro einai ta zagorokhoria kai to metsobo alla kai ta tzoumerkato thetiko stoikheio tes sunedriases etan kat arkhen to gegonos oti e egkhoria agora den akolouthese se megalo bathmo tis perissoteres europaikes pou kategraphan apoleiesakolouthei mia seira apo praktika mathemata me episkepseis se spelaia oi tropoi parokhes ton proton boetheion alla kai diaphora alla themata skhetika me tous khorous autousme ta exes themata emeresias diataxes upobole kai egkrise ton oikonomikon katastaseon tes tessarakostes pemptes etairikes khreses pou elexe tenden dianoountai ephoson pleronesai na men kaneis proponese kai na men dineis togia ten idiaitere aute parastase kai tis empeiries tous milesan oi astegoimerkel kai sarkozi zetoun phreno khreous titlophorei to protoselido demosieuma tes e egkure me te megalutere kuklophoria sto germanophono khoro sueddeutsche zeitungeonda anapherei oti to neo einai to proto spor ubridiko montelo pou tha arkhisei ten emporike tou kariera kai ste khora mas se liges emeresmone politikos pou an kai den einai armodioteta tes omos endiaphertheke gia ten katastase tes pathousas etan e bouleutes dodekanesou kuria mika iatride ten opoia sugkhairo demosios gia ten euaisthesia kai to anthropino endiapheron teseuro antistoikhaekhoume na ta baloume me mia megale omada alla den tous phobomasteekprosopos tou basiles moulopoulos ekane logo gia theamatike strophe stis skheseis mas me ton arabiko kosmo pou ginetai se lathos sugkuriaka kai politika khronike stigme giati opos eipe oi exelixeis pou dromologountai einai reustesstis to apogeuma einai programmatismene e prote proponese pou os eithistai tha einai anoikhte gia tous philathlousstamatesa mprosta sta kagkela kai oi mnemes arkhisan na zontaneuoun glukakleisto to tmema attikeano patesia tou kleisto tha parameinei semera sabbato kai aurio kuriake apriliou to tmema attikeano patesia tou elektrikou logo ton ergon anakainises ste siderodromike grammeneos khrestes eggraphesundese oi lexeis koralli kai koralliogeneis uphaloi dinoun eikones apo kathares tropikes thalasses nesakiaatoles me aspres ammoudies krustallina galazia nera kai uphalous me polukhromes morphes thalassias zoesalloi lene exaitias ton sagonion tou alloi giati tha katasparaze tous antipalous toupiata tes oras pseta apo ntopia kreata alla kai polloi mezedes perilambanontai se autoden briskontai aplos se aikhmalosia opos stous zoologikous kepous axizei na semeiothei pantos pos ekhei anoixei o dialogos kai gia te khresimoteta ton zoologikon keponmeta te sobietike katarreuse apokaluphtheke gregora to khasma anamesa stis epitages mias pagkosmiopoiemenes oligarkhikes exousias kai sten idea tes exousias tou kathenaekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous ten etesia nomarkhiake suneleuse tes pragmatopoiei aurio paraskeue oktobriou e ioanninon tes neas demokratias me kuria omiletria os ekprosopo tou kommatos ten upourgo apaskholeses phane pallepetraliabapheiades ta kathara pro phoron kerde upologizontai auxemena kata peripou se skhese me tis epidoseis tes proegoumenes khresesoi giatroi anamenoun ta apotelesmata apo to paster gia na bgaloun asphale sumperasmata gia to an prokeitai gia te nea gripeekhoume porous pou mporoun na apopheroun ekatommuria ton politismo te geographike mas these kai den tous ekmetalleuomastepolu kala ta kataphernei kai ste lepse photographion oi opoies apothekeuontai se mneme eno e uparxe ensomatomenou phlas apotelei semantiko pleonektemaekprosopos tupou tes delose oti e sumphonia tes me to meso tou opoiou eginan oi dieutheteseis gia ten parakhorese elektrikou reumatos legei sto telos augoustou kai ekhoun pragmatopoiethei kapoies diabouleuseis gia sunekhise tesmeizon thema ton politikon dikasterion ta theloume e okhiepises theoro uperbole te phase tes kokkines kartas sto diko mas paikteprospatheia ekphobismou dia ton dikastikon dioxeon kai e anektikoteta ton topikon arkhon den prokeitai na ptoesoun autous pou ekhoun taxei eautous sten uperaspise ton laikon sumpherontonnomizo oti den tha ekhoume kanena problema arkei na sunelthoume gregora kai na arkhisoume na pairnoume apotelesmatase kathe periptose o khiotikos paralogismos mporese na epikratesei uposterizontas anapodeikta oti e epektase pros borra odegei to aerodromio sten kardia tes poles auxanontas etsi tous kindunous sobarou atukhematostelika o stathes kousournas egetheke kai ekeinos bretheke dipla tou analambanontas ede semantike organotike these sten parataxe stous tomeis tes dioikeses kai tes oikonomiaseinai apisteutoi oi anthropoisaphes naulologio prosito gia epibates kai okhemata gia tis me oikonomika sumpherouses grammesapousia tou metsou apotelese extra kinetro gia tous upoloipous paiktes tou triphulliou pou ston pio kathoristiko agona balthekan na apodeixoun pos aute e omada mporei kai khoris ton diamantidede khreiazetai na einai kaneis plousios gia na einai dotikosantismenarkhos stephanos kourelias etan eggamos kai pateras duo paidionargotera eite ston kurio khoro tou magaziou eite sten paralia opou uparkhoun ompreles kai xaplostres oi pelates mporoun na apolausoun ena drosistiko anapsuktikoproi proi oi ounnoi me tis ephemerides tous kai me prokeruxeis mas aneggeilan gematoi kompasmo kai uperephaneia oti katelaban kai ten teleutaia gonia tes den xero ti etan ekeino pou eniotha ma mou phainetai pos etan ena parapono mazi me dunato puretometaxu auton einai kai o demos ioannitonbalane to luko na phulaxei ta probatapos egine dekte aute e protase tou papadopoulou me anamikta sunaisthemata apo tous paroikountes ten ierousalem giati blepete einai akoma kai polu norismalista mesa sto arthro briskoume kai to exes oraio logos kai to prosopo phile kurie demarkhe etan kai pisteuoume pos exakolouthoun na einai iskhura sumbolaia times sten amaneen to metaxu kai sumphona me tis protes ektimeseis empeirognomonon oi zemies mporei kai na xepernoun to tou tes iaponias me oti auto sunepagetai gia tis asphalistikes kai antasphalistikes etairieskakos kai pali o keselkairos athena pem aug eleutherotupia sabbato iouliou onoma tou serbou mesou ntegian milobanobits erthe sto proskenio gia ton panionio kai plerophories anepheran oti e upothese brisketai se kalo dromokai to telos tes seiras se stul ezesan oloi kala kai ekanan polla paidia moiazei sunteretiko gia ton semerino anagnosteeinai duskolo na problepsei kaneis ti tha gineisten praxe oi trapezes tha analaboun ten enemerose ton epikheireseonpelaton tous gia tis dunatotetes entaxes tous sta epikheiresiaka programmataetsi e soros tes metaphertheke sto kentro ugeias purgiou opou kai diapistotheke o thanatos tesanalutika mas enemeronoun me to parakato deltio tupou lantzapapaspuro stis diapragmateuseis me ten kubernese gia ta oikonomika themata ton demosion upallelonopos exegesan sto sullogo tes pharkainas uparkhei ede dedikasmeno sto europaiko dikasterioprepei na ta apolambanei kaneis khoris kalamaki oste na pairnei te murodia tou louloudiou kathe phora pou pinei mia gouliaopos delonei e palaistiniake arkhe den skhetizetai me to kathestos tes gazas pou ousiastika telei upo diaphoretike kubernese ten eklegmene kubernese tes khamas pou amphisbeteitai apo to israel kai ton makhmout ampassunergasia ton politikon dunameon zetese e ntora mpakogianne kubernese ethnikes sunergasias khreiazetai e khora sumphona me ten proedro tes demokratikes to leo me plere suneideseten akousa se mia sunenteuxe tes pou mas eukharistouse emas tous ellenes gia to doro pou tous kaname ki ennoouse to giorgo to mpizo pou etan kai dikos tes philoskai epitrepste mou na apeuthuntho sta prosopa tes istorias kai ste dikaiosunepote omos tha dothei sto paidi e eleutheria tes autonomias kat arkhen auto ginetai stadiaka kai me te diadikasia dokimes sphalmatos kai epanorthosesoi topikoi paragontes tes anti na trabexoun kanena auti diedidan dexia ki aristera oti phtaiei to kakoupenthumizei malista ta exes uperxe periodos pou ta kommata auta eikhan askesei exousia uponoontas ten periodo pou ekhei kharakteristei bromikomarkake apo to petrokephali mesaras pou egine pro emeron sto nekrotapheio zographouathenon opou kai o taphos tou proora khamenou poieteprokeitai gia enan olokleromeno taxidiotiko odego pou embathunei sten ousia estiazei stis leptomereies apokaluptei tis agnostes omorphies tou peliouto problema pou eikhame episemanei kai se kalokairino mas arthro exakolouthei na uparkhei kai malista se megalutero bathmoto paskha an thelete na deite ena apo ta pio phantasmagorika anastasima ethima tes elladas o proorismos einai enas to leonidiopos tha ginoun oi apokratikopoieseis esoda apo disse periptose pou e balensien den balei nero sto krasi tes gia ton kolombiano meso thelei ekatos upothermia noeitai e ptose tes thermokrasias tou somatos kato apo to phusiologiko orio pou einai oi bathmoi kelsiouta alla duo problepoun oti e proeklogike periodos tha arkhisei kai episemos eite amesos meta to paskha eite amesos meta to kalokairisten omilia tou tha anapherthei se ektetamena paradeigmata ton geophusikon methodologion toutarik prota prospathei na parei me to meros tou ten mpakhar kai ste sunekheia peithei ton mperk na epistrepsei sten etairia me apotero skopo na katastrepsei ton mekhmetprosthese akome oti ta metra apodidoun kai apo ten pleura ton esodon kai apo ten pleura ton dapanonamerikanos proedros mpil klinton exephrase khthes ten ektimese oti o giougkoslabos proedros slompontan milosebits mallon plesiazei sten apodokhe ton oron tou gia ten epiluse tes giougkoslabikes krisesta paidia dinoun ton kalutero tous eauto kai eimai ikanopoiemenos apo ten agonistike sumperiphora tes omadaseno se kalutere moira alla kai pali se arnetike klimaka einai e dikaiosune e astunomia e ekklesiakai auto dioti to phusiko khamela ton monadon tes martiou kai se mono sunedriaseis o genikos deiktes apolambanei anodo kata kai to ebdomadiaio kleisimo ton monadon einai to kalutero apo ta mesa noembriou touto tragoudi me base to music control paremeine sto gia duo menes me pano apo radiophonikous stathmous se athena kai thessalonikeas sebastoume toulakhiston tis paradoseis masepi tapetos tethekan epises e khrematodotese ton pente megalon sumbaseon parakhoreses gia ten anabathmise ton ethnikon odon oi emplokes sta erga pou ekkremoun kai e ekkremoteta tes epistrophes tou phpa stis kataskeuastikes etaireiestelika e sugkletos sten sunedriase tes paraskeues apophasise na diathesei to panepistemio ola ta mesa gia ten anadiorganose tou tmematos ten auxese ton gnostikon antikeimenon kai ten proslepse kathegeton me auxemena prosontama ela nte pou o mazokhismos einai kolletikia arrostia kai mou arese kammia phora me lupetheke o apo pano kai m eleutherosegia to theama tou podosphairou ste khora mas sten ellada tautokhrona den mporoun na kalupsoun tis anagkes olon ton mathetonsten diataxe tou o eisaggeleas anapherei oti oi energeies tou k aristeide alaphouzou eginan me apoluta nomimo tropo kai tonizei oti gnoses pou krubetai sta philosophika auta erga pou diaphoretika tha etan aprositos stous polloussumphona me ten astunomia apo tis dikographies autes oi ekhoun upoblethei stis kata topous armodies eisaggelikes arkhes kai aphoroun atomanees uposkheseis karamanle gia ta khamela eisodemata te thespise katotatou oriou ethnikes suntaxes anakoinose o prothupourgos kostas karamanles milontas sto prosunedrio tes sten patraepomene sezon elpizo pos tha einai opos oi duo me ton santos pou dekhtekame liga gkolalloste to limani tes egoumenitsas mazi me auto tes patras phusika einai e monadike diexodos pros te dutike europeoti activity e spor thelete to pithanotero einai oti tha ta breite edoego den tha egkataleipso te ge ton progonon mou oute to lao pou thusiasteke gia mena delose to sabbato o mouamar kantaphikaterina stephanide prokritheke os kai e lorela manou os stis to orio etan alla epeide ta xeperasan o agonas stamatese kai e dodekada tou telikou sumplerotheke me mia altria pou emeine stato ti akougame etan atophio demosiographiko khrusaphietan prosphuges sten barkaelegkhos ta eikhe ei margiore o elegkhos apo to tes eleipeta small dishes opos e salata me kabouri kai papia harumaki einai mikres merides me zesta phageta pou leitourgoun os orektikanimet sunekhizei na prokalei te lamia e opoia niothei arketa piesmene kai den antekhei allona thumisoume edo oti ekkremei e diekdikese me alle upothese gia ektase pleon ton stremmaton pou aphora kurios dasos apo tous idious pheromenous os idioktetesdiethnes periphereiakos tou nokh xekinese te deutera proponeseis me ten omada tou nesiou mas alla oi pithanotetes na meinei s aute einai pia stoton podosphairiste tes kherkoules ton opoio thelei kai o olumpiakos gia ten epithese toueinai praktika adunaton semera na entopistei diaphora metaxu tou phorologikou paradeisou ton semaion eukairias kai tes ellenikeszemia kathistatai akome megalutere an analogistheite oti ekhoun ginei apo tous paragogous oles oi apaitoumenes mekhri semera kalliergetikes phrontides me tis antistoikhes dapanes kathoti e anoixe den prooionize tetoia exelixeoi opoies prospatheies ekhei mekhri stigmes epikheiresei e europe gia ton periorismo tes pagkosmias krises khreous den apepheran psukhologike kai politike allageego den mporousa na to riskaro tzogarontas pano ste khreokopia tes khorasekei diogkonontai omos kai pernoun diastase tromaktikete thlipse tou gia ten apoleia tou nikou anastasopoulou exephrase o proedros tes kostas karamanles o opoios exere ten prosphora kai to ergo touse sunergasia loipon me to programma interreg tha ekhoume mia kinete monada prolepses tou gunaikologikou karkinouostoso to dikasterio anamenetai na labei up opsin tou energeiesmetra ktl pou tha ekhoun dromologethei sto metaxu gia ten apokatastase tes limnes kai pros terese ton upokhreoseon testo gkore apekhei molis eikosi lepta apo to limani tou ntakar kai aneta mporei na theorethei os ena proastio tes poluboues senegalezikes proteuousaston ioulio xekina e therine kallitekhnike periodos me plethos parastaseon se exoterikous khorousapagoreumenos phakelos ephtase epitelous sta kheria ton kategoroumenon ten tetarte oste na ekhei kati na uperephaneuetai o nomikos politismos tes antitromokratikes ton desmophulakon kai ton politikon tous proistamenonparelase tha xekinesei stis mm ston kentriko dromo kai ten plateia zarousemera meta ten apotukhia tou mnemoniou kai ten antilaike agrioteta tou adikou mesoprothesmou programmatos oi polites arkhisan kai pali na kinetopoiountaiksekhoristo deigma tetoiou mantrotoikhou apotelei auto tes photographias opou duskola xekhorizei kaneis an prokeitai gia arkhaike lithodome e gia kataskeue ton duo trion teleutaion aionongia na ginete oikogeneiakos uposteriktes tes greenpeace telephoneste sto kai apheste menuma me ta stoikheia sas prokeimenou na lambanete olo to khrono enemerose skhetika me tis draseis tes organoseskharakteristiko paradeigma einai o nomos mas opou diakrinei kaneis periokhes me megalutere anaptuxe kai alles pou akome paskhizoun na phtasoun sto epipedo pou briskontan alles polla khronia prinerotese gia ten anaptuxe kai axiopoiese tou aerodromiou khiou erotese gia ten anaptuxe kai axiopoiese ton periphereiakon aerodromion kai eidikotera tou aerodromiou tes khiou katethese semera o bouleutes khiou tes kostes mousouroulestrite augoustou se seira proslepseon probainei e nomarkhia lesbou me ten diadikasia tes misthoses ergou delade me deltio parokhes uperesion ta gnosta mplokakiaanamesa sta polla khapeningk pou eikhan proetoimasei oi diorganotes etan kai o umnos tou pagkosmiou kupellou se techno ektelese eno uperkhan suntomes xekhoristes enotetes gia kathe mia apo tis phinalist tou mountialoi anthropoi apophasizan na proskunesoun ena iero meros kai epheugan apo to khorio tous gia duo e tria khronianeos autos thesmos parousiasteke khthes sto hrakleio se ekdelose pou organose o se sunergasia me ten europaike epitrope genike dieuthunse ekpaideuse kai politismosoi bouleutes semeiose mporoun na ginoun oi kaluteroi presbeutes tes khoras mas kai na sumballoun semantika stis prospatheies pou kataballontaiden mporoun kai na thelounekane anoteres spoudes ste gallia kai anapheretai me nostalgia stous daskalous toupantos kai edo pherei euthune o demos giati den ekane mia protase sugkekrimene me orama dinontas kapoies kateuthunseis pou tha eprepe na akolouthesoumetha einai e proskeklemene sten ekpompe anthropines diadromes tes aletheia pou tha metadothei te nea trite aprilioutetarte maiou anabase ste basilitsaede kathe ebdomada stelnontai perissoteres apo epistoles egkleiston tou korudallou sto grapheio tou gianne nestoros epistolesaiteseis gia ton oro tes aletheiastsi sunduazetai kai me to automato kibotiooi sunodoi tes apostoles pantos speudoun na kathesukhasoun tous paiktes kai ustera apo lige ora legei o sunagermosanalutika ta themataoi theseis tha prokerussontai sto exes me to neo nomothetiko plaisio to opoio upologizetai na epharmostei tele noembriou me arkhes dekembriouleo panta oti se kathe xesekomo e se kathe poreia pou ginetai me aitema ten allage auto pou khreiazetai sten pragmatikoteta einai aplos merikoi anthropoipuretos proetoimasias gia te nea liges meres emeinan mekhri na epistrepsoun oi mathetes kai pali sta thrania tous xekinontas alle mia skholike khroniarem gekht os kathegetesdieuthuntes kurous sta pneusta organa kaleitai na summetekhei se epitropes master class tes posias kai allon khoronoi paraineseis kai oi epitropes den petukhan na kateunasoun to tsounami diamarturiasaplos tha mporouse na einai polu kalutero video game an eikhe dothei perissotere semasia se kapoia stoikheia tou gameplay kathos kai an o titlos ekmetalleuotan me perissotere maestria tis dunatotetes ton hidef sustematon elektronikes diaskedasessten ekthese tou genikou logisteriou ginetai epises logos gia auxese esodon kai apo ton epanakathorismo tou upsous ton prostimon anegerses kai diatereses authaireton khoris omos na prosdiorizetai to akribes posostis bagies sto akroteri th apolausete paradosiakes geuseis sten kataprasine aule touoi protoklasatoi tes zantar phobethekan na exorgisoun to tromero paidi me katarripse tes epidoses toutelika apophasisteke na kleisei mekhri to mesemeri e leophoros mesogeion sto upsos tou upourgeiou ston kholargo eno tha epanelthoun noris semeraparousiazontas duo agonistika prosopa e alexandreia anadeikhtheke epeita apo ena exairetika endiapheron paikhnidi isopale me antipalo ten omada neon toueinai to mono kleisto epaggelma pou den prokeitai na anoixoun einai oi monoi misthotoi pou ta dorakia tous einai perissotera apo tous misthous tousekprosopei to sto politiko grapheio tou europaikou laikou kommatos kai elabe meros se polla proedros tou emporikou kai biomekhanikou epimeleteriou leukosias kai eidikeuetai sta themata diarthrotikon tameion kai periphereiakes politikesalloi stis kratikopoieseis ki alloi okhipaparega pros ton prothupourgo ste boule anaphorika me tis sunomilies tou sto erzeroum gia ten uphalokrepida tou aigaiou kai gia sunaphe themata den ekhei oute kommatiko oute antipoliteutiko kharakteraoi katharoi dexioi endiapherontai elaphros perissotero apo tous kentrodexiousden to ekrupse o ispanos tekhnikos pos eikhe ten agonia tou gia to thema tou belgou epithetikoupexetase protaseon gia kathestota sterixes tes agrotikes paragoges pou endiapheroun idiaitera tis mesogeiakes khores opos einai ta kathestota gia ton kapno te zakhare to elaiolado kai to bambakinioutontzon kaili minogk tina arena ka kai gigantiaia mpanta duo khiliadon melon pou parousiase megalo meros tes mousikesantithetos khilies phores pio upseles einai oi posotetes pou ereunes tou periodikou entopisan ton maio se dapeda apo kai oi opoies diokheteuontai stadiaka ston aera kai apo ekei ston anthropino organismoantistatheite einai e protrope tou pros tous ellenes meso tou kentrikou sunthematos toumas leei o upourgos anaptuxes gia ten time ton kausimon oti eimaste apo tis khores pou ekhoun tis khameloteres timesoi ekprosopoi ton ekpaideutikon proballontas kai ta kladika aitemata ta opoia ekhoun tethei apo ten kai te zetoun apo tous sunadelphous tous na paroun meros kai sten apergiake sugkentrose pou tha ginei stis to proi tes tetartes stogeorge hotz gnostos ston kosmo tou internet kai os geohot kai os o anthropos pou espase to proto iphone ergazetai pleon gia logariasmo tou facebook opos anapherei sten episeme istoselida tou ste demophile uperesiathaumatourgo tropo mera me te mera anebainei ki anebainei ki anebaineimeta ten parapano ependuse to sunoliko pososto pou katekhei e etairia mas einaialloste dikoi tes anthropoi einaito idio kala omos doulepsan kai ta mplok me koulousiou perre kaite gianakopoulou alla kai oi epitheseis toso ta diagonia karphia oso kai auta exo apo ta tria metrakata te diarkeia tes katalepses ta mele tou dikegorikou sullogou moirazane stous perastikous mia anakoinose me ten opoia tous enemeronan gia ta aitemata touseskhizes me khare ten kruphe gramme pou kharaze to phtero tou karkharia kai boutexes isa me kuparissenia opse ste laba pou xekhutheke leelatontas tis nukhterines analogies graphontas to ekho kai to eimai paramera dinontas emphase sto esuto beligradi tha prepei na apomakrunei tous parallelous serbikous thesmous apo to kossuphopedio eipe e germanida kagkelarios angkela merkel kata te diarkeia tes episkepses tes sto beligradisten ellada eimaste uperbolikoidemiourgetheke mia atmosphaira kathara ellenike kai mono oi agries phigoures ton astunomikon kai oi morphes ton albanon episemon thumizan ten albanike kratike parousiaan den einai aute etaireia tha einai e alle an den einai aute e parataxe tha einai e allekai ta emporika katastemata tha ekhoun anadouleies kai o tziros ton loipon katastematon opos ta mpar kai ta estiatoria tha semeiosei katakoruphe ptoseme auto to pneuma sas upodekhomaste kai pisteuoume oti einai mia kale arkhe gia na eiste taktikos episkeptes mias omorphes poles kai enos thaumasiou phusikou periballontoskhoris idiaitera problemata alla me megales oures kai polu ora anamones pragmatopoiountai apo khthes kai oi sunallages tou koinou me tis trapezes oi opoies ginontai oles apokleistika sto neo nomismaapo aute ten emeromenia tha metra o khronos kai e ellada prepei toulakhiston ana trimeno kai opos ekhei delosei autoboulos e kubernese ana mena na perna apo exetaseis tes epitropesto paidi mas olo kai maurizeieuropaike enose ekhei kathorisei os orio gia ten oloklerose ton diadikasion metabases to ena khronodiagramma pou e ellada anamenetai na prolabei isa isa kathos ekhei kathusteresei arketa e ulopoiese ton periplokon bematon pou prepei na ginounthese tou k tsoukala einai oti tha prepei na epelthoun beltioseis sto phoro kati pou o demos protithetai na thesei se diabouleuse me tous phoreis oste na uparxei koine protase pros to upetho gia mia nomothetike ruthmiseostoso ta plethismiaka dedomena allaxan kai telika o plethusmos tou demou einai polu mikroteros me apotelesma ta lumata na men eparkoun gia na tethei se plere leitourgia oloklere e egkatastasekairos athena pem aug eleutherotupia trite augoustou ekho mia plerophoria gia ton tade tes kuberneses tha te grapseis sunomiletes pou sunantesame se ena omorpho oreino khorio etan apolutoski auto giati to ton eisodematon den pleronei phoro einai kato apo to orio to aphorologetou kai giati uparkhei terastia phorodiaphuge ten opoia e kubernese epikheirei na pataxei me apodeixeis antikeimenika kriteria kai tekmeria diabiosesapo ten omada ton anatolikon proasteion xekhorisan oi philoxenides baboulas phournarakes kai apo ton hrodoto oi pantinobits panakas kai papadakesgenikos deiktes timon sten enarxe ton sunallagon kinetheke sugkratemena anodika eos tis monades otan semeione anodo eos kai eno kategrapse katotere time stis monadesparallela auxese te sunolike tes paragoge kataten pnoe tes graphidas sou tes poietikotates kai prototupes pou okhi mono mekhri semera se topikes ephemerides kai periodika mas kharises alla kai se entupa ki ephemerides ton athenon demosieueis kai me ten opoia mas sunarpazeis kai mas sugkineisgia tous mathetes e anastase tou khristou einai gegonos adiamphisbetetoetsi pairnoume kai ena istoriko apo to progenetiko istoriko tou paidiou kai mporoume na doume akribos pou mporei na opheiletai e emphanise autou tou phainomenouaute ten apophase epikurose pro emeron kai to anotato dikasterio tes khorassumptomatika einai e khronia pou kai oi duran duran bgazoun to liberty eleutheria ki autosundeontai sten pege ekhou me kalodio audio minijack mekous metronoi anagnostakes mpelimpasakes sumplerosan ston agona me ton buza exi kitrines kartes kai tha leipsoun apo tous duo epomenous agones ton kitrinomauron eno amphibole einai e summetokhe tou koutsake pou ekhei khtupesei sto podi kai khthes etrexe ligo monos touupopsephioi ptukhioukhoi tritobathmias ekpaideuses olon ton eidikoteton kai olon ton eidikoteton einai oi katekhontes bebaiose toulakhiston oron epimorphoses sta plaisia tou gia to ergo kainotomes methodoi didaskaliaseinai mia akhne elpida aute pou ekphrazo makari na ginei praxeoso perissotero pegaino sten tourkia toso ligotero te gnorizo leei o phatikh akin aute te phora anazetesame ton skenothete gia mia tainia pou erkhetai apo ten arkhe tes karieras toukata perissoterous phoitetes auxemenoi kata tha einai oi phoitetes pou tha upodekhtei ten nea akademaike khronia to demokriteio panepistemio thrakesomada moiazei exantlemene kai psukhologika kai somatikaparallela sunekhizontai oi ergasies beltioses kai exoraismou ton gepedikon egkatastaseon apo to demo komotenaion eno tautokhrona ikanopoietike kharakterizetai e diathese ton karton diarkeias kathos ta ex auton briskontai ede se kheria opadonthanases athanasiades kai oi sunergates tou den theloun na entuposiasoun ton kosmo en opsei eklogon pernontas to menuma oti tha kinethoun gia ten apoktese tou tade e tou deina podosphairisteano tou upokhoresan epises oi cocacola motor oil ellaktor kai eno gia tis metokhes ton kai oi apoleies diamorphothekan se kaiphulla druos kokkina idia me ten proegoumene alla se kokkino khromaseptembre ena khtupema pou tha alekos megares eutukhestere to oneiro egine pragmatikotetatopike autodioikese sten ellada apektese armodiotetesse epipedo kerdophorias ta enopoiemena kerde pro phoron khrematodotikon ependutikon apotelesmaton kai aposbeseon tou omilou diamorphothekan ste khrese se ekatotan doume oti e saltsa tou xidiou arkhizei na pezei kai ta kremmudia na karamelonoun prosthetoume ta tsaibs anakateuoume apala kai bgazontas to tegani apo te photia aphenoume na kruosoun se thermokrasia domatioumetagraphe tou anastopoulou ton dekembrio apo ton panionio boethese tous eruthroleukous na ginoun pio dunatoi ston epithetiko tomeakai an den allaxei kati me parembase tes politeias o klados tha surriknothei dramatikato istiophoro tupou katamaran sibur eikhe prosaraxei ligo exo apo te murina kai sugkekrimena ste brakhonesida diabates miso nautiko mili notia tou limaniou tes murinasto eponumo tou sten pragmatikoteta etan kapses e kaphas alla o kathegetes tou sto ellenogalliko lukeio arone tes smurnes to allaxe se staurinides epeide akribos o pateras tou onomazotan staurosna semeiosoume telos pos e pleura tou aiolikou theorei peritte ten parousia tou aiolikou mutilenes sto topiko apo te stigme pou suzeta ste base tes sugkhoneuses kai okhi se aute tes sunergasias me tous kalloniatesksekatharise ostoso pos oi phorologikes protaseis tes tis opoies aporriptoun kai oi etairoi mas tha odegousan te khora se khreokopiame proto kai semantikotero pos tha prepei e omada okhi aplos na allaxei alla na metamorphothei apo ton neo khronophortonoun xula kai ta metapheroun stous pelates me megale sukhnoteta ki auto giati tzakia kai xulosompes tha epistrateusoun oi katoikoi ton ioanninon gia to kheimonauperupourgos k mikhales khrusokhoides o opoios diaterese anaptuxe kai antagonistikoteta eno prosethese sto portfolio tou upourgeiou tou kai te nautiliatha prostheta bebaia kai te semerine empeiria me ten ennoia tes takhuteres ulopoieses ton stokhonkharakterise epises ten protase biosime alla kai elpidophora logo tou megalou ophelous apo tis sunergeies pou tha demiourgouseeseis kai oloi osoi tosa khronia san khamerpe troktika masoulagate ton plouto autes tes khoras kai leronate me ta perittomata sas ta oneira olon ton genion pou erthan kai erkhontainai epi tes arkhes eipe e k papademetriou omos katapsephise ta arthra gia te phorologiaauto deikhnoun oi protes krateseis kai milao panta gia ten periokhe tou phalerakiou gia to opoio e germania einai e kuria agorame tis anaplaseis pou tha zetethoun alla kurios tha khreiastei na ginoun to kostos tha xeperasei kata polu to disopos to kratos dinei asulia se osous to katasparaxan kai sunekhizoun na kuklophoroun aneta me tis koursares kai tis gkomenaresetan toso emphanes e theike epidrase ste morphe touoi ideologikes antiparatheseis pou xesekonoun tetoia ponemata apagoun ta biblia apo to pedio tes logotekhnias kai me kleista ta matia ta odegoun kateutheian sto pedio ton ideonk khristodoulos eprepe na ikanopoiesei kai autous pou einai ton akron kai de theloun ton pontiphikademena tha parameinoun ta ploia sta limania kathos e apophasise panelladike apergia ton pleromaton se oles tis kategories ton ploiongnorizoume te drama e opoia ekhei stis taxeis tes treis proen athletes maseikosi tria khiliometra notioanatolika tes proteuousas brisketai to kartago e palia proteuousa tes khorasdomatia diklina uperupsomena sten plateia tou khoriou kai pano apo ten tabernaegkuroi periballontologoi ekhoun tonisei epaneilemmena oti e diakheirise tes phusesstokhos kathe mathete e prosbase tou se mia skhole pou tha tou anoixei ten porta sten agora ergasias ena mellon me anoikhtoun orizontesomos an diapistothoun paratupies to upourgeio tha einai ameiliktotrokhaio me nekrous sten egnatia to nema tes zoes ennea sunanthropon mas metaxu auton kai duo paidion emelle na kopei anapantekha khthes to proi se thanatephoro trokhaio pou semeiotheke ston anatoliko kombo tes egnatias odou sten komoteneprokeitai gia ena kai monadiko paketo oikonomikon metron pou tha parousiastei sten europaike epitrope kai sto ecofin sta tele oktobriou e to polu stis arkhes dekembriou kai tha perilambanei amesa kai makroprothesma metra monima kai ektataara e kataskeue tou ek ton pragmaton sunartatai kai me ten apomakrunse tou stathmou diodionde gnorizoume pos ekhoun ta pragmata sten upoloipe ellada alla sten periptose tes lesbou theoroume pos mia tetoia apophase tha einai adikeeinai ousiastika e prote tekmeriomene katathese enos dutikou diplomate gia to phrikaleo prosopo tes apoikiokratiasapo ta ekatkathe phora pou ta paidia mazeuontai sten ethnike ta blepo na egklimatizontai olo kai perissoterophase einai duskole ostoso ta riplei deikhnoun oti oloklere e mpala den ekhei perasei te gramme kai mono ena polu mikro kommati tes ephaptetai se autesemasia gia mas ekhei e nike kai apo auten ten apopse eimai polu eukharistemenosmpainontas se ena thermokepio gia na psekaso eniotha oti autoktonoeinai krakhtes tes apousias sas kai anoikhte prosklese gia episkepterio stous diarrektesdinetai tautokhrona e dunatoteta kai tes prosthetes asphalises gia osous epithumoun auxemene prostasia kai tes proairetikes asphalises gia kindunous pou den perilambanontai stous upokhreotika asphalizomenous kindunous tou ektos tes upokhreotikes asphalisesprosthese omos me noema oti ta pragmata tha pane kala gia ton tourismo an meinoun oi diakoptes tou elektrikou reumatos anebasmenoi kai epikratesei ste khora eremiaoi agones tha arkhisoun stisten trite dioikse epharmoge tes praktikes duo metra kai duo stathmasemeionetai oti apo semera augoustou e india tha antikatastesei te germania sto sumboulio asphaleiasmia terastia gourna etan kapote apo ta khalikia pou epairnan gia na strosoun tous dromous ki arkhise na ginetai to enas oneiremenos topos pou ton baphtisa parko tes agrotissasantithetos e gia liges molis psephous diaterese ten edra tes aphou eikhe sobares apoleies dunamesmou uposkhetheke o oti ta kerde anerkhontan sto tou kephalaiou kai tha apodidontan ana tetramenotime kai doxa ston adikokhameno aderpho mas manole pou khatheke se trokhaio dustukhemaomos se kapoies periptoseis e sundrome ton geitonon apodeikhtheke apotelesmatikegia atoma diplasiazetai eukola grpetros kolettes einai polla khronia sto radiophonoakome me te leitourgia saronete oloklere te mousike sas bibliotheke eno kineiste kanete tzogkingk e odegeite khoris na khresimopoieite kherianukhta me panseleno apo ten orkhestra nukton egkhordon patras kai te photeine darraalloste e diaphora me te khalkida meiotheke ston ponto opote o stokhos einai ephiktos kathos e omada tes euboias ekhei pio duskolo programma apo tous eruthroleukousto theoreitai e khronia orosemo gia ten erakleiotike udatosphairiseoi polites anesukhoun otan akoun tis sustaseis tes europaikes enoses gia drastikes parembaseis sto asphalistiko sustema kai peristole dapanon ston tomea tes ugeiasden mas ikanopoiesan oi apanteseis tou armodiou uphupourgougiati tote tha katalabounelpizoume omos na epikratesei e psukhraimia kai na parthoun oi sostes apophaseis esto kai tora eipe o metarakesto metro auto aposkopei sten antimetopise tes phorodiaphuges pou ginetai me ten ekdose kai lepse eikonikon phorologikon stoikheion apo tis epikheireseista paidia tes periodou doulepsan sustematika mazi me tous omadarkhes tous kai katapheran kai exedosan mia polu omorphe ephemeridoulakhresimo diagnostika mporei na mas phanei ena koiliako uperekhographemakrinetai e ergatike diaphora metaxu ergodosias tou messoges kai ton ergazomenon pou zetoun epanaproslepse sten trimere sunantese sten epitheorese ergasiasta pros enoikiase stremmata tha prokerukhthoun apo tis periphereies meso internetoikonomike krise kai oi epiloges tou upourgeiou paideias einai to meigma pou phainetai pleon pos tha tinaxei ston aera te phetine skholike kai akademaike khroniame xekhname oti oi pio palioi elegan se paromoies periptoseis oti skaei e petrato triptukho tes anaptuxes kai tes proodousten tetarte these katatakhtheke o panagiotes basileiadesan omos ta apospasoume apo ton topo tous delade te selida me to mikro phormat kai ten epipede disdiastate apeikonise tous kai egkatastesoume tis phigoures ston khoro terasties kai trisdiastates ekhoume allo ena emblema tou kits te ntisneilantme liga logia e ole istoria prokhora kathos eikhame kai parembase tou pou esteile ste genike grammateia epikoinonion tis duo ekdoseis gia tis analoges kuroseistrugos tou panta uperorimou mauratherou ginetai ton augoustoapantese tes se osa delosan prokhthes oi kk philios kai elisaph einai e akolouthe oi kataggeliomaneis kai menusiomaneis ton parataxeon tes antipoliteuses apektesan kai nea eidikoteta aute touara s auto tha mporousame na prosthesoume ta problemata pou uparkhoun sto odiko diktuoeidika sten kreteta opoia einai idiaitera semantikaantistoikha to khartophulakio ton ependuseon sumperilambanomenon kai ton khreostikon titlon tou daneiakou khartophulakiou meiotheke kata sta ekexallou o proedros edeixe polu ikanopoiemenos apo ten poreia ton ergasion gia ten antikatastase ton skepastronagones dromou sto stadioto brazoume me to nero gia leptato sarkodes kentriko meros tou miskhou kaigetai arga kai sten arkhaioteta tous khresimopoiousan os dadesoi katastrophes tes katrina den didaxan tipota stismekhri ten ora pou tha kleisoun oi kalpes dinoume diarke makhe spiti to spiti psepho me psephoemporikos apokleismos pou ekhei thesei to kossuphopedio sta agatha tes serbias ekhei prokalesei elleipseis phagetou kai pharmakeutikon prometheion sto kuriarkhoumeno apo serbous tmema tou kossuphopedioueikha egkataleipsei te douleia mou den mporousa na xanasteso to grapheioarkhike maios arthra adiexoda se panseleno paraskeue maiou eikhame anapsei te megalutere photia phetossumphona me ten ekprosopo tes cathay pacific elin gouongk e apagoreuse epibletheke dioti e metaphora tou zoou me to aeroplano mporei na tou prokalesei sobara anapneustika problemataden einai kati to kainourio autokarmen zeleuei ten phrantseska parolo pou o leantro theorei oti to eidullio tous etan asemantoekprosopos tou batikanou phenteriko lomparnti delose oti para to gegonos oti enas thanatos de kharopoiei tous khristianous tous upenthumizei ten euthune pou ekhei kathenas enopion tou theou kai ton anthroponosoi perissoteroi toso kalutera oso pio khamogelastoi toso pio zeleutoioi anaskaphes ste samothrake arkhisan to apo tous gallous pou anakalupsan to periphemo agalma tes nikes kai to metepheran sto loubrokata ten periegese tous sta periptera tes dodekanesou o proedros tes omospondias dodekanesiakon somateion k giannes phragkoules tous edose anamnestika dora tes idiaiteres patridas tou tes kasoumaniokatathliptike usterike kai pantos barete e europaike politike zoe ekhei khasei te sobaroteta tes ean os sobaroteta orizetai e dunatoteta na akoloutheseis me sunepeia mia poreia me oles tis dunates parallages tes pros enan kathorismeno stokhosumphona me ton k santos aute e diadikasia tha dieukolunei kai tis omadeseikhan oneira na kataskeuasoun udatodexamenes gia na lusoun to problema tes ardeuses na demiourgesoun antagonistikes kalliergeies gia na rixoun to kostos kai na anabathmisoun ten poioteta ton proiontonto uparkhoun pleonasmata ampelourgikon proionton diethnos kai oi ampelourgoi tes kretes antimetopizoun megalo problema diatheses ton proionton tousparallela omos pisteuoume oti gia ten epiloge enos estiatoriou metrane kai polla alla pragmata pera apo auteto neo prosopiko tha kalupsei epokhikes e parodikes anagkes ton uperesion ton emmisthion upothekophulakeion athenon peiraia thessalonikes erakleiou neapoles lasithiou kai ton ktematologikon grapheion rodou kai ko lerousugkrouse phortegon ploion logo ton thuellodon anemon trite martiou duo phortega ploia pou eikhan brei kataphugio apo ten kakokairia sto agkurobolio tou ormou tes karustou sugkroustekan metaxu tous khoris na anapherthoun traumatismoista highlights kai tis paralleles ekdeloseis tes ektheses prokeitai na ginoun ta akoloutha emerides enemeroses me themata phorologika programmata tonoses mikromesaion epikheireseon tou kladou kai epharmoge ton programmatonproen prothupourgos tes kroatias ibo sananter pou egkateleipse te khora oste na apophugei ten poinike tou dioxe gia ten anameixe tou se skandalo diaphthoras sunelephthe ten paraskeue sten austriabogia proedro tes enoses ksenodokhon kai ton k pantelouka tamia tes idias enoseskhristodoulopoulos breke khoro exo apo ten periokhe ekane to sout omos o konstantopoulos apekrouse se kornerki omos epi tes ousias ta pragmata einai exairetika aplasten katokhe tous bretheke to khrematiko poso ton euro to opoio kai apodotheke ston pathontaprospheugei sto ste o demos ioanniton me tropo pou isos den perimene e periphereia antidra e demotike arkhe ioanninon sten apophase tou demetre panozakhou diamenuontas oti tha ten prosbalei enopion tou sumbouliou tes epikrateiasapeudese to olumpiakos na perimenei to sumbolaio tou brazilianou paoulo ansieta belozo pinto kai pleon strephei ten prosokhe tou ste diethne agora gia allo xeno akraiogia polla khronia anesukhousa oti oi diataxeis tes praxes prostasias ton zoon gia tis klopes katoikidion den epharmozontangigantas ton ekatoston o pio pselos paiktes pou epaixe pote sto alla kai sten europe epikheirei na epistrepsei sten energo drase epeita apo apokhe olokleron menonekpaideuse ton noseleuton einai sunekhes me ten energo summetokhe kai parakolouthese sunedrion entos kai ektos ellados kai te diorganose seminarion kai sunedrion entos toualles taxeos omos ethiko zetema einai oti e sumperiphora tou poltrugos gia tis gunaikes einai sigoura pio duskolos apu oti gia tous antressten egoumenitsa neos demarkhos exelege o giorgos katsinos me enanti tou basileiou giogiakaden ginontai diagonismoi gia tetoiou eidous prometheies giati egine apeutheias anathesekatatassetai de dipla se khores opos e benezouela to mpagklantes e aite e ougkanta ta skopia kai e bosniaapantontas exallou se skhetikes eroteseis o klanqing eipe oti e agora tes kinas aporropha kathe khrono olo kai megaluteres posotetes elaioladou orismenes ek ton opoion proerkhontai kai apo ten kretekabala drama kai boreios ebros deikhnoun periphereiake anagennese an kai e koinonike summakhia brisketai se apostase anapnoes me tis teleutaies plerophories na theloun na kerdizei to khameno edaphosidou loipon ta parapano epharmosmena ston erakle mainomenomesa sto dasos tha breite kai ten petrine ekklesia tes panagias tes souraulou ston auloguro tes mazeuontai ste giorte tes zoodokhou peges ten prote paraskeue meta to paskha oi katoikoi kai phtiakhnoun souraulia apo ta khlora kladia tes kastaniasanamesa sta krate pou ten ekhoun epikurosei einai kai e khora maspar ola auta ta duo terastia ntamaria sunekhizoun kanonika spazontas rekor parabiaseon nomonprotos kai kaluteros o mertzosgia phusika ntopia kreata ste skhara kai te soublakrise pou bathainei deikhnei ta adiexoda tes kapitalistikes diakheirises pou gia na prostateusei ta kerde ton monopolion phernei phtokheia kai exathliose gia to laoprepei na prosexoume gia to pos tha khtisoume oste na bgaloume tous podosphairistes pou tha stelekhosoun ten prote omadabriskomaste sto stenotero semeio tou nesiou kai apo kei xekinaei o dromos khlmgia akoma mia phora diapistonetai akradanta oti oi elegktikoi mekhanismoi autou tou kratous den mporoun na leitourgesounsemera pou oi antres ekhoun khasei ten apokleistikoteta sten askese kai ten antimetopise tes bias polles ntetektib se astunomika muthistoremata gunaikon suggrapheon einai eroidesmetokhika meridio agoras esoterikou to energetiko meiotheke kata phtanontas ta disskhetika o nomarkhes ksanthes k giorgos paulides delose me to ergo prosthetoume se mia megale omada ergon enos diktuou kanalion emploutismou antimetopises tes uphalmuroses sten pediada tou nomou mas mekous dekadon khiliometronkhioumor ton mikron gkangk kai tes anatro pes pou upereteitai me sunepeia apo enan maniako tou eidousdustukhos ta latomeia sta tourkobounia gemisan me ta mpaza tes attikes odou me apotelesma na katastraphei akoma ena meros sten athena opou uperkhan pholies poulionaikhme tou nomothetikou plaisiou tha einai e dunatoteta tautopoieses ton diakheiriston ton blogs etsi oste to internet na papsei na philoxenei koukoulophorous opos delose kharakteristika o upourgos dikaiosunes miltiades papaioannouamese katargese tis apophases pou psephisan oi parataxeis tou k tzanakoule kai sapka gia ten misthodosia ton proedron kai antiproedron ton organismon tou demoubio foodtheloume den theloume e phuse ekhei tous ruthmous kai tous nomous testrite augoustou tekhnes psukhagogia ekdeloseis triemero ekdeloseon ste mutilene mia seira apo ekdeloseis pragmatopoioun apo semera paraskeue eos kai ten kuriake iouniou oi rotarianoi omiloi mutilenes kai kallonesadeiodotese epiprostheton khoron den einai luse giati tetoioi khoroi den uparkhountetarte aprilios etoimo to zappeio tes neas demokratias to zappeio delade to anatheoremeno epikairopoiemeno oikonomiko programma tes neas demokratias ekhei ousiastika oloklerothei apo ton anttimoria elthe gia ton braziliano me kathusterese emeron kathos o philikos agonas me ten ollandike omada eikhe ginei stis iouliouki ego nomizo oti to semantiko m aute ten tainia einai oti prospathei n apotuposei poso epodune einai aute e diadikasia kai nomizo oti meta ap aute kaneis den xerei pos tha einaimono pou merika eidika tes poikilias capsicum fastigiatum einai toso basanistika kautera pou sou sekonoun kanteles ste glossaprotagonistiko rolo paizei e periphereia kretes sta antagonistika europaika programmata opos diephane kai apo ten prosphate episkepse ekprosopon anaptuxiakon etaireion sten andalousia tes ispaniasautes oi antirreseis ekhoun diatupothei kat epanalepse eno oi kathegetes proteinoun esto kai ten teleutaia stigme na lephthoun upopsin oi protaseis tous pou ekhoun katatethei kai ste boulegialtsin serntar upogrammise oti e kubernese tes tourkias dokimase m oles tis phasistikes methodous psemata sphages logokrisia apeilesi na spasei ten antistasetis leme mekhanorraphies epeide etsi tis antimetopisan oi ellenespou pame rotao ton kapetanio tou istioploikou thasos pou einai demeno sto limanisemera o proistamenos deuterobathmias ekpaideuses tha episkephthei to skholeio apo to opoio apomakruntheke e mathetria kai tha sunantethei me to sullogo didaskontongenia tou aute pou organose tous olumpiakous kai ten etta tou einai akome thammenesto o tsezarek breke dikhtua alla to terma tou akurotheke sosta os ophsaintauta pou epikheireite na nomimopoiesete meso tou tekhnikou programmatos kai tou proupologismou gia na apoktesoun kodiko pleromessto o loutsiano ektelese ena phaoul enas amuntikos tes epanomes prospathese na parei ten kephalia e opoia ostoso pere trokhia epikinduna pros to terma tou papadopoulou kai katelexe kornerapoluta katokhos tou thematos mas milese epi makron gia to gnosto problema pou apo khronia talaiporei tous erakleiotesoi asphalistikes krateseis kai to pagoma ton onomastikon auxeseon sunistoun epipleon apoleies tes taxes tou khoris na upologistei poso tha kopsei kai to neo misthologioypenthumizo oti apo to khiliades hrakleiotes anamenoun ten ulopoiese tou skhediou poles gia na apozemiothoun oi perissoteroi ton opoion einai misthosunteretoi kai den ekhoun ta oikonomika mesa na diekdikesoun ta khremata pou tous anekoundedomenes malista kai tes oikonomikes sugkurias theoresame oti kati tetoio etan anagkaio semeiose kharakteristika o k panagiotes koutressamara sto telos tou menakuklophorese o porphuras me aphieroma ston giorgo khrona paraskeue iouniosedo mporeite na aphesete to nero pou reei pros mia dieuthunse na sas parasurei e na khareite ena anazoogonetiko masaz sta jets pou briskontai stis akres tes pisinaseuropaike epitrope exedose thetike gnome gia to programma agrotikes anaptuxes tes kuprou gia ten periodokuklophorei edo kai kairo oti stis kampines ploiou pou ektelei dromologia apo kai pros te lesbo entopisthekan korioina bgo alla okhi kai na skotothoetsi sunethisame kai dustukhos den xesunethizoume para mono an upokhreothoume na baloume to kheri sten tsepeoi times autes omos theorountai khamelesme poia tautoteta oi ellenes perierkhontai ston sugkhrono kosmo sukhna me aute tes magkias kathos kharakterizontai ki entos ki ektos ellados apo auten te diathesegiati eikones mporoun na apodothoun os tekhnotropia se konstantinoupolites zographousto metro den antiprosopeuei nea e prosthete khrematodotese alla epitrepei ten proore katabole ton kondulion pou ede desmeutekan sto plaisio tes politikon tes gia te sunokhe ten agrotike anaptuxe kai ten alieiakata te sullepse tou brethekan sten katokhe tou duo rologia kheiros kai ena gunaikeio brakhioli ta opoia apodothekan ston idioktete tousgia ten epokhe mas mporei na einai kai kaloti khasame sten poreia mepos ekeinoi mou elegan malakies ki esu tora ta diorthoneis giati an einai etsi na sou kano mia lista me ta onomata kai tis dieuthunseis ton daskalon mou na pas ki apo ekei mia boltakai megales parees pou arazoun kato apo ta plataniaokhi mono khresimopoioume polles ores te mera ton elektroniko upologiste graphontas alla entruphoume takhtika sto diadiktuo kai antallassoume elektronika menumata me plethos philon kai gnostoneukhomai na skoraro se auto to khrono me ten phanela tou giati akoma den to ekho katorthoseiden einai bebaia e prote phora pou sumbainei auto kai opos ola deikhnoun oute e teleutaianea etaireia edreuei sto boukouresti apaskholei atoma kai to arkhiko metokhiko kephalaio tes anerkhetai se dolaria pou proerkhontai apo tous diathesimous khrematikous porous tes etaireiasgraphei keramidogatos o mantoumantadorosskhediastike upographe anekei ston piter sregier kai se kathe periptose uposterizei to neaniko kai proskharo prophil tou autokinetoukai to kako paei pio perasemera to megalutero pososto ton katoikon tes tulisou einai elikiomenoiskat arkhen kholainei e sapheneia kai e authentikoteta tou thelo ton psephophoronto megalutero kentro khionodromias tes makedonias ekhei anabateres metaxu auton tria baby lift kai pistes sunolikou mekous ano ton khlm omos phemizetai gia to sale sto terma tou tetrathesiou anabateragia tous polites semainei ten ikanoteta ekteleses mias seiras praxeon sto exoteriko opos to anoigma trapezikou logariasmou e agora metokhon me egkhorion etaireion kai e agora akinetonepises mou aresei e politike tes mpagern na ekhei diethneis germanous sto roster tesparakatatheke ton mamadon mas einai plousiame liga logia takhumetaphoreas pou metephere dema sten presbeia tes khiles stamatese mprosta sto astunomiko phulakio tou megarou maximou kai eipe sto astunomiko prosopiko asphaleias oti metephere upopto demapalaiotera te khresimopoiouse to idiolekto tes aristeras gia na diakhorisei te semasia tes apo to episemo lexilogio tes dexiasdekades entupa biblia kai periodika anaptussoun enan protognoro problematismo kai sugkrotoun ena neo kai dunamiko khoro dialogousabbato kai kuriake iouliou paneguri agias paraskeues sto bapheioproegoumenos to metallo eikhe aggixei ta dolaria to upselotero epipedo ste diarkeia tes emerasthelo na mas peite poies pisteuete oti einai oi sugkekrimenes lathos politikes pou sunetelesan se aute ten ptose poia mathemata perate ti allaxate kai ti tha allaxete khoukle thumizo oti briskomaste ston tomea koinonike politike kai ergasiata khrematisteria phrankphourtes kai parisiou upokhoresan kata kai antistoikha eno me ptose ekleise kai to khrematisterio tou londinoumporei ste khio na elthe o anthos tes poles ostoso ekei to megalutero problema tou ellenismou einai to demographiko kai e geranse tou enapomeinanton ellenonsunolika ta khremata pou problepetai pos tha kopoun mekhri to telos tou sumbolaiou tes nova aggizoun ta ekatommuriaoi episkepseis ton melon tes sto berolino apodeikhthekan telika panakribe upotheseeinai saphes oti o eisaggeleas den dikaioutai sten eleuthere diathese tes poinikes dioxesprothupourgos elege proeklogikos e allazoume e bouliazoumetha diarkesei mekhri ten paraskeue augoustou kai tha einai anoikhte apo tis to braduto koinobouleutikes ekloges tes khorasentekakhronos gios mou me to skholeio tou kai e exakhrone kore mou me to lukeio ellenidonekei geumatise me mele kai philous tou kommatos kai anapautheke gia liges oreskalampokes tha einai o basikos soutingk gkarnt touki auto prosdoka e kubernese me ta teleutaia metra koinonikes politikes pou ulopoieitha ta phane ki auta giati den ta edines se mia phtokhe stokho na ginoume koinonoi ton ameson kindunon pou diatrekhoume kathemerina stous dromous kurios apo agnoiasto plaisio tes sunanteses suzetetheke epises kai to thema tes metaphoras kai kataskeues idiaiteres anagkes tousapo pleuras paragogon to oinorama etan e prote ekdelose pou sugkentrose paragogous kato apo ten idia skepeadiaphoria tes kuberneses sumphona me ton baggele argure khoregese daneiou to opoio tha pherei kai neous orous diasphaliseispempte iouniou pempte iouniou tis rages apo te siderodromike gramme sta zakhloritika tou aigiou prospathesan na xelosoun duo roma elikias kai
