mats tha einai bradino kathos tha arkhisei stistrito proepanastatiko problema einai oti stis duo megales kai epitukhemenes epanastaseis e istoria katagraphei ekatontades alles apotukhemenesoi treis nearoi asoi aphesan tis kaluteres entuposeis ston bolph kai me eisegese tou tha proothethoun sten prote omada kai tha akolouthesoun kanonika ten kalokairine proetoimasia tes ksanthes en opsei tes neas periodoutetoies meres prin apo khronia ioulios tou e axekhaste melina merkoure briskotan sten kupro kai etoimaze ena ntokimanter gia to praxikopema kai ten tourkike eisbole pou ena khrono prin eikhe odegesei ste dikhotomese tes marturikes megalonesouapantese sto etan saphesepises episemainetai oti e apophase tou proelthe kurios apo ten oikonomike krise sten periokhe kai ten ellada kathos kai apo te strategike meioses tes ektheses tou organismou sto khreosti apantoun omos sten sugkekrimene kritike ta kubernetika stelekhe ta metra gia tis sugkhoneuseis einai doro adoron aphou den kaluptei stis sundedemenes epikheireseis meta to pou einai kai e pleiopsephiaapostrateuontai os eudokimos termatisantes te stadiodromia tous oi paulos doukiantzakes andreas stephanou euthumios skouras kai markos poulakakes o opoios uperetei sten epitheorese kretes kai nesonetsi demiourgetheke to haccp mia methodologia analuses ton kindunon kai prostasias ton kindunon pou mporoun na epereasoun ta trophimaginontai sustematikes prospatheies me mia nea antegklematike politike me ten anadiataxe ton dunameon kai ton eksugkhronismo tes astunomiassumphonesan na sunekhisoun tis epaphes tous meso ton enomenon ethnon kai na sunantethoun kai pali sten katallele stigme katelexegia to nomo lesbou prokeitai oi treis sunduasmoi oikologon etoi oikologoi prasinoiphilologos se idiotika kai demosia lukeia ste thessalonike antistasiakos kai sundikalistes pou to plerose me khronia sten anergia o atzakas graphei pukna kai psagmenaalloi agapoun autes tis skenes alloiektos ton dikaioukhon epidomatos koinonikes alleleggues allaeinai mia polumere sunergasia ostoso kai e dimeres mas atzenta perilambanei arketa stoikheiakalutera na ekhoume polu kosmo sto aerodromio kai na perimenei para na ekhoume ligo e katholou phainetai oti eipe o prothupourgos prokhtes sten ko otan egine suzetese gia tis megales oures anamones kai ten talaiporia alla kai ta parapona ton episkeptonbeltiose tes kineses ton aeroskaphon tha mporouse na meiosei tous rupous se megalo posostoeuro apo to programma demosion ependuseon gia ton odiko axona kalpakikonitsakephisias sto upsos ton ampelokepon e ste leophoi theseis kai oi khronoi ton thessalonikeon kolumbeton pou brethekan stis treis protes theseis ekhoun os exes petradake aresstamos ekthese zographikes tes kharas saitekai kataphera na mpo ste dioikese epikheireseongi auto parakalo ton semerino prothupourgo k papandreou na kanei ta adunatadunata oste na men xanasumboun paromoies periptoseis kai na katargesei ta pronomia kai tous nomous pou ekhoun phtiaxei sta metra tous oi kuberneseis mekhri semeraanaloge einai e eikona pou parousiazoun oi perissoteroi emporikoi dromoi tes larisasexo apo ten periokhe o martin ekane ena dunato sout to opoio ephuge aoutsemera eidame mono ta ostasumphona me tous eidikous e listeria einai sobare pathese pou prokaleitai apo trophes pou ekhoun molunthei me to bakterio listeria monocytogeneskareklopolemos se mousoulmaniko gamo me traumaties oi pheromenoi os protagonistes den apodeikhtheke oti etan autoi pou xekinesan to epeisodio kai athoothekan khthes apo to epheteio thrakesksekineste me te salata bazontas arkete posoteta sto piato sas gia na meiosete to aisthema tes peinas mekhri na erthei to kurios piatoantistropha opos episemainei o giorgos pantagias e orimanse tes koinonias epitrepei ten epiloge politikon pou to komma apodekhetai aplos gia na sunteresei ten kata kanona nosere epaphe tou me ten exousiaten orexe na kunegesoun to oneiro touspote arkhise e epikoinonia sas me to paidi sas kai me poio tropo to paidi e noemosune tou etan phusiologike kai mporo na po kai pano apo to kanonikookhi tipota allo an sumbei to antitheto oi peiraiotes tha brethoun mprosta se deuteres skepseisopos anephere o dieuthuntes tes paidiatrikes klinikes kathegetes stelios smpurakisapo ten perasmene trite e meth leitourgei kai dekhetai astheneisthumamai kai de tha to xekhaso pote sta prota khronia tou gumnasiou otan e neare kai glukutate philologos mas didaske ten antigone tou sophokleous to poso ekeino to uperokho eros anikate makhan me kurieuseexallou o apestalmenos tou ste libue tha suzetesei semera me tous epikephales ton antikathestotikon atupa skhedia gia mia luse sten krise kathos oi dutikes dunameis auxanoun ten piese ston kantaphi na paraitetheita bgazete apo to nero kai ta aphenete na kruosoun teleiosolumpiakos perase san siphounas apo to kharilaou kai diesure ton akhromo are me kataktontas etsi to ekto sunekhes protathlema pou isodunamei me rekor sten prote ethnike kategoriaapomakruname ekatontades egkataleimmena okhemataaute e tainia tou boulgare einai to noema tes zoesalla etsi opos einai e douleia mou ekeine einai pio eleuthere apo emenaeutukhos pou sten ellada eikhame toulakhiston ten apodokimasia tes proegoumenes kubernesesepomenos me dedomeno ten exasphalise ton pistoseon den uparkhei kanena problema kai kamia anesukhia sten oloklerose mesa sten problepomene sumbatike prothesmia oloklerou tou ergouapo anabathmologethekan logo diaphoras aa kai ba bathmologete grapta posostoparamerisma tes istorias kai ton threskeutikon semainei aphellenismos an parameristhei e istoria e endoxe ellenike istoria kai ta threskeutika pou einai mathemata ethoplastika kai phronematistika oi neoi den tha mporoun na galoukhethoun ellenoprepostoulakhiston gia enan apo tous amesa endiapheromenous to demarkho khiou pantele broule psithurizetai oti ola einai upo elegkhon kai malista kukloi pou proskeintai s auton lene oti proporeuetaisto roster tes armani uparkhoun akome paiktes opos o lin gkrir proen tou olumpiakou kai o impraim tzaamper proen tou aigaleoneos khrestes eggraphesundese dunatoteta exagoras eos pente plasuatikon eton gia te gennese paidion kai ston idiotiko touea phernei nea dedouena sta plasuatika ete pou odegoun se takhutere suntaxiodoteseki auto to ekhoun antilephthei pleon oi polites me apotelesma na niothoun akoma pio anasphaleisede apo khthes to neo tekhniko didumo se sunergasia me ten pentamele epitrope tes dioikeses arkhise ton programmatismo gia te nea periodo se oti aphora tis metagraphes kai ten proetoimasia e opoia tha arkhisei kata pasa pithanoteta arkhes augoustouupotakhtheke apo tous argeious kai egine epineio kai polemikos naustathmoseno ta okhemata kai ta plasta eggrapha kataskhethekanden noeitai to etos o demos aphantou na men ekhei katapherei na apoktesei apokheteutiko diktuodelade eos to telos septembriouphoboumenoi sto apodokimasia tou giorgou papandreou epelexan ta ergasteria anti o prothupourgos n apeuthunthei amesa sto laoiskhures dunameis ton einai monima paratetagmenes stous kentrikous dromous tes periokhes pou thumizei stratiotike zone eno to astunomiko tmema phroureitai monimanatali portman leei eimai khortophagos apo ta ennia mou alla oi logoi pou me odegesan se auten ten apophase allaxan me ta khroniasemera ste metabatike tou edra tes khiou to trimeles epheteio aigaiouedo loipon apousiazesanter pou paraitetheke sten arkhe tes ebdomadas apo ten proedria tes europaikes epitropes exaitias tou skandalou apates kai kakodiakheirises skopeuei na katebei stis euroekloges diekdikontas mia these sto eurokoinobouliogeorgios khondrogiannes proedros tou emporikou epimeleteriou kerkurasepisemainei ostoso oti ginetai khrese khemikon meson e opoia omos einai se epitrepta kai logika plaisiase sunennoeseis einai e despoina tomazane me to dieuthunte tou depethe boreiou aigaiou demo abdeliode gia ten parousiase tes gnostes phaidras tou gianne ritsouboethesan s auto ki oi koutophragkoi pou molis katalaban ti sunebaine apaitesan gia na anoixoun te strophigga ton khrematodoteseon ta erga pou kataskeuazame na einai olokleromena kai leitourgikaoi dikaioumenoi kai epithumountes na metaskhoun eis ten genike suneleuse metokhoi opheiloun na desmeusoun eite meso tou kheiriste tou logariasmou tous sto sustema aulon titloneikhe kai autos antigrapsei ena allo didaktoriko kai to upebale sto panepistemio thessalonikes opou kai anakerukhtheke didaktoran mas erthei tetoio aitema tha prospathesoume na to kanoume apodekto kai na tous boethesoume delose apo pleuras salke o manatzer tes omadas peter petersphileta labraki ton gr kommeno se phetesta kosmemata einai tou idiou tupou me ekeina tes deuteres ekdotikes periodou ste benetia ostoso entopizontai polla kena ston khoro ton protogrammatonauta einai anorima pragmata kai den promenuoun mia kale sunekheiaden tha xekhaso ta mikra nesakia semeionei e suggrapheas te gaudo ten ntia sta boreia apenanti apo to erakleio te khruse kai to kouphonesi sta notia mikroi paradeisoi te spinalogka mesa ston kolpo tou agiou nikolaouto o demarkhos panos mentzelopoulos kai to demotiko sumboulio psephizoun ten ekdose tou bibliou apo to demo aigiouphonazoun gia te meiose tes poines tou ze elias autoi pou eikhan kanei ta skandala epistemeantou ekhei sumbolaio daneismou apo ten mpenphika ston are gia allon enamise khrono alla oi thessalonikeis den ton polutheloun gi auto o paiktes suzeta me te saouthamptonton elegkho tha kanoun epitheoretes tou upourgeiou oikonomikonmekhri khthes bradu sto aitema eikhan antapokrithei e ispania kai e gallia oi opoies diathetoun duo aeroskaphe ekastetelos eukharistese ole ten omada programmatistes designers marketing klp gia ten epitukhia kai ton diaphoretikon sites tes plaisio computers plaisiobasismene ste demiourgike proba kai stous autoskhediasmous e parastase empisteuetai te phantasia tou theate kai apodidei to sklero kai truphero saixperiko paramuthi me phreskada kai khioumortmema hrakleiou sta plaisia tou eortasmou tes pagkosmias hmeras tou episkephtheke ton demo tes biannouto ethniko sumboulio radioteleorases epebale prostimo upsous euro sto radiostathmo best gia ten probole diadiktuakou kazinoume to ena podi ste rome einai o tzimpril sise aphou ola deikhnoun pos toso o paiktes oso kai o panathenaikos ta ekhoun brei sto oikonomiko me te latsio kai pleon apomenoun kapoies tupikes leptomereies gia na kleisei to sirialaporia prokalei to proto skelos tou thematos kathe phoreas opos kai e nomarkhia sto tekhniko tes programma entassei sten arkhe tes khronias e sto telos tes proegoumenes ta erga pou tha ektelesei tous epomenous meneskai ekane kai kritike sten kubernesekhoros emoiaze na se perimenei philoxenos kai omorphos khoris perittes poluteleiesta kourelia tragoudane akoma tou nikou nikolaideedo mas endiapherei to oti oi sunthekes tou antagonismou kai tes paragogikotetas eginan perissotero diaphaneis kai kakotrakhales kathos eleipsan ta amortiserethnikes statistikes uperesias tes ellados geniko logisterio tou kratous epitrope kephalaiagorasgiannes psaroudes anebeke e psukhologia masoi ekdeloseis me kentriko thema ten sumbolaiake georgia tha diarkesoun apo tis eos tis augoustou sta khania apo tis septembriou eos tis oktobriou sten athena kai entos tou noembriou sten thessalonikeektiuoun oti e sunolike epibarunse gia ta noikokuria apo te nea auxese tou euroepitokiou tha diauorphothei guro sta ekatkhreous kai okhi peousde nomizo pos phtaiei auto to gegonosidiaitere prosokhe tha dothei sten problepomene auxese ton akraion klimatikon kai kairikon phainomenon opos xerasia kausones sunthekes upo tis opoies oi purkagies ginontai pio katastrophikesepises sto trapezi epesan ta themata pou aphoroun tis upodomes se limania kai aerodromiasumphona me skhetike anakoinose e etaireia prokhorese sten polese tou pagiou exoplismou enos katastematos ste nea smurne odos palaiologou sten epikheirese souper market alimentaustera apo suzetese kat arthro se polla semantika semeia perimeno meta kai tis dikes tous diabouleuseis tis graptes protaseis tous gia ola ta arthra sta opoia ekhoume diaphoretikes proseggiseis tonise e upourgoskai sta duo grapta anakaluptoume tromaktikes omoiotetes me ten epokhe masepises den einai akome xekatharo apo pou tha antlethoun oi poroi gia ton idiote me dedomeno to gegonos oti gia ten periokhe tou demou kampokhoron den uparkhoun oikonomikoi oroi kai ta kharakteristika gia ulopoiese paromoion ergonphetine prosphora tha xeperasei te zetese se upsela epipeda e paragoge tou kaphe deutera iouniou se epipeda pou uperbainoun te zetese problepetai na auxethei phetos e pagkosmia paragoge kaphe stous ekatthese tes sugkletou diatuponetai se psephisma pou dotheke ste demosioteta khthes to apogeumase baros tou skhematisteke dikographia e opoia upeblethe ston eisaggelea eno o kategoroumenos aphetheke eleutherosdemosieuse tou phek tha semanei kai ten amese dunatoteta gia oikodomese apo dekades idioktetes me pano apo oikopedoukhous na briskontai me tis adeies sto kheriemeis milesame me ton spuro soule o opoios moirasteke mazi mas ten empeiria tou apo ten ekpompe me to dexioloi oi akhaioi omos ton agnoesan ton kairo pou o akhilleas poliorkouse te theba etukhe na brisketai ekei e khruseida kore tou ierea tou apollona khruse pou te philoxenouse e aderphe tou eetiona iphinoekai telos na men xekhname oti to podosphairo einai koinoniko phainomenooi episkepseis tou panta mas edinan khara alla nomizo kai ston idio edinan exisou ikanopoiese giati denedo o touristas ekhei te dunatoteta na perasei arketes emeres pragmatikon diakopongia ten apophuge metadoses sexoualikon nosematon kai diaphoron molunseon einai aparaitete e khrese prophulaktikon kata te diarkeia tes sexoualikes praxesopos anakoinose e dioikese tes etaireias e cosmote pragmatopoiese kathares nees sundeseis ek ton opoion ston tomea tes kartokinetes kai se pelates me sumbolaiaarkhika kai mekhri liga lepta meta tis to proi e eikona etan apogoeteutike me apotelesma na tithetai se amphibolia akome kai aute e dunatoteta gia ten pragmatopoiese poreias diamarturiaskhthes to proi arketes etan oi mataioseis pteseon eno oles anexairetos oi pteseis tes olumpiakes aeroporias antimetopisan problemata kathustereseonpantos khthes eikhame ten prote parembase apo ten eisaggelia peiraianotes mauroudes elabe gnose tes steles kathemerina pou anapherotan ste sunaulia tou sto periboli kai esteile sto demetre phrezoule to parakato menuma sas eukharisto apo kardias gia to semeioma sas sten ephemeridana te sugkharoume ki emeis kai na tes eukhethoume kale epitukhia alla kai se anoteraeuropaike enose dusprosites oi apozemioseis gia to bakterio oloena kai apomakrunetai e pithanoteta khoregeses semantikon poson stous ellenes paragogous lakhanikon apo tis ektaktes koinotikes apozemioseis sunolikou upsous ekatproponetes nikos paulou alla kai oi paiktes blepoun to epomeno paikhnidii alla khthes bradi mprosta apo ta matia tous perase o agonas me tonphusika gia ten ora ta panta paramenoun phemes opote uparkhoun akome elpides gia tous orkismenous ekhthrous tou ribbonden einai omos mono auto to problema tesbeltiose tes antagonistikotetas tou touristikousemera ta pragmata ekhoun allaxeianaptuxe sten kinaeinai akome kai e anadokhos etaireia oi skheseis me ten opoia tora pairnoun ten kanonike tous poreiakalontas megalophona to lao tous n aphesei tous omiletes na milesoun gia na ektethounkatastase aute anatrepetai sumphona me tous eidikous me te khrese antieliakon ta opoia prostateuoun apo ten uperiode aktinobolia tou eliouean anatrexete sto proto mou post mporeite na deite kai to skhetiko trend se skhese me to wii kai an auto meionetai e auxanetai se skhese me ta khristougenna kai se skhese me ton antagonismoto parko anekei sten etairia photoboltaika apokourou e opoia einai apo tis protes etairies pou leitourgesan photoboltaika parka megales iskhuos sten ellada kai apotelei to trito ergo tesbazoume to nero me te zakhare se khamele photia kai sigobrazoume gia lepta mekhri na liosei e zakhareellenike koinonia den thelei na akousei ten aletheia giati einai barete dusareste xulinemousoulmanos apo ten ksanthe sunelephthe stis ianouariou methusmenos sto burona kai metaphertheke sto topiko astunomiko tmematelos apo ta idia stoikheia tes trapezes tes ellados prokuptei oti para te semantike meiose ton epitokion oi katathetikoi logariasmoi exakolouthoun na apoteloun polo elxes gia tous ellenes mikroapotamieutesosoi ekhoume sundesei te zoe to pathos ten piste tis eutukhismenes stigmes mazi touto paregoro gia mia periphereiake pole etan oti to megalutero meros tou akroateriou etan paidia kato ton eton pragma pou eukharistese ton timomeno skenothete alla kai tous diorganotes tes timetikes autes bradiasautokratoras tou ellenikou athletismou den ekhei antipalo sten pisina kai to apodeiknuei me ton kalutero tropotetarte augoustou semantike etan e summetokhe ton ergazomenon stis duo apergiakes sugkentroseis pou pragmatopoiethekan ten trite to mesemeri sto kentro tes mutilenesexonukhistiko elegkho ste dietaxan exallou kai oi phorologikes arkhes tes ouggariasenas periphereiarkhes pou erkhetai sten krete prepei na mathei prin ap ola kai na akouei ton kosmo me ton opoio prepei na ekhei kateutheian epapheoles oi photographies etan prophanos aspromauresanaplerotes proedros tou demokratikou sunagermou aberoph neophutou delose oti e nea upobathmise apo ton fitch phernei ten kupriake oikonomia kai gia ton oiko auto pio konta megalutero eliako stathmo paragoges elektrikes energeias sten europe pou tha kataskeuastei sta epomena tria khronia sto printezi tes italias se ektase pou katelambane e petrokhemike biomekhania tes periokhesto proi tes maiou arkhise e ulopoiese tou skhediou tes epikheireseos me te ripse ton proton alexiptotiston sten periokhe xanionmaleme kai topogeuma sto pethumno kai hrakleioogkos ton poleseon anelthe se ekateukairia gia tenperase aettetos kai apo te lamia o erakles astamatetos o erakles perase mesa kai apo te lamia kai meta ten agonistike prote tou deuterou gurou exakolouthei na apolambanei te monaxia tes koruphes tes bolei stous andresmolis oi troes blepoun ton patroklo me to arma ta opla kai ten panoplia tou akhillea nomizoun oti einai o akhilleas kai ekhei xanampei ste makhe kai panikoblemenoi trepontai se phuge pros ta teikhe tes poleskharalampides kalampokes upo proupotheseis karudas kharises se auto to plaisio endiapherei kai o demos ntikoudesproponetria tes sophia mpakatsake den agkhonetai aphou gnorizei kalutera apo ton kathena ten agonistike etoimoteta tes protathletria tou triploun kai ektima oti tha einai se these na labei meros sto rantebou ton khanionsumphona me egkures plerophories tes ta prostima pou ekhoun epiballei oi upalleloi tes uperesias phthanoun peripou ta ekatsto programma kane ten ekpompe sou mporoun na summetaskhoun memonomenoi polites phoreis sullogoi skholeia panepistemia ka to periekhomeno ton ekpompon mporei na einai psukhagogiko politistiko epistemoniko e laographikota phasistika krate anikana na lusoun ta esoterika ginei kaluterosapodose tou germanikou dekaetous titlou anaphoras ekhei anelthei se meta ten upokhorese tes ependutikes zeteses tou os asphales topotheteseer k prutane pou tha perasete tis giortes tou tha mpoume sten tetradame te sundrome tou kretes diamorphotheke ekei mia nea pteruga aphieromene sten kretike uphantike me uliko pou proerkhetai apo ten sulloge uphanton tes kurias theanos metaxa episeue ekpaideutike seira apo ten adobe systems incorporated pou ekhei anaptukhthei apo eidikous tes adobekhorizoun oi dromoi tes bolidas kai tou romperto mpolano aphou ola deikhnoun pos o proponetes den tha sunekhisei te sunergasia tou me tous kitrinomaurousopos semeioname se prosphato reportaz e dunamikoteta ton paidion me tous duo neous stathmous epetrepse phetos na auxethei semantika o ten paramone tou sten athena o k kourakes eikhe te dunatoteta na sunantethei me stelekhe tes kuberneses alla kai ton prothupourgo k semite ton opoio enemerose gia to proeklogiko skeniko pou epikratei toulakhiston apo tis protaseis sunadelphon bouleuton apodeiknuontas oti auto to nomoskhedio einai e apotheose tes demokratikes leitourgias tes boulessten imbro kai ten tenedo sumphonetheke me te suntheke tes lozanes to na me phugei o ellenismos apo keieimai tria khronia ston turnabo kai eimai perephanos gia tous paiktes toumilontas ston real o proedros tou tonise pos ean den uparxei tetoiou eidous sunergasia enopsei ton demotikon eklogon einai polu pithano to na parei kai tis periphereies me ton kallikratestis ekloges tou iouniou kai noembriou tou tou tou tou kai toukata sunepeia oute oi idioi oi mousoulmanoi tes periokhes to kairo ekeino pro delse kathe periptose tonizei oti ton endiapherei na uparkhei klima sunergasias kai asphaleias kai pros aute ten kateuthunse tha ergastei kai me ten nun prutanike arkheme ten oikonomike krise to ten troika kai phusika tous politikous na protagonistoun stis karnabalikes parelaseis apotelesan pege empneuses gia ola ta satirika armata skorpontas to gelio stous khiliades theates pou parakolouthousan tis parelaseisopos eipe sten o genikos dieuthuntes tou organismou giannes staridas oi ergasies prokhoroun me gregorous ruthmous kai tis epomenes emeres anamenetai e telike prosphora norbegikes etaireias gia ta geophusika tou ergouekhoume ena pragmatiko tzoker sta kheria mas kai den prepei na to khasoume mas eipe kharakteristika ekdelonontas to sebasmo kai ten anagnorise sto giatro gia ten poioteta tes douleias touden uparkhei diathese na khresimopoiethei bia gia na luthei ena problema ton politongenika pantos den blepoume para polle teleorase aphou oloi mas ekhoume mia agapemene tous suggrapheas einai e maro bambounake eno ektos apo logotekhnia diabazoun kai polla istorika kai politika bibliato sesamelaio kai to elielaio empodizoun tis uperiodes aktinesneos khrestes eggraphesundese samouel eto deikhnei oti den ekhei metakomisei ste rosia apla gia na auxesei ten prosopike tou periousia alla kai gia na skorpisei ton tromo stous antipalous gkolkiper videosakome kai oi sugkuriakes suspeiroseis meso tes sulloges upographon upodeiknuoun oti o dialogos einai agnostos stous egkhorious uperetes tes enemeroseskai poses phores den to ekho pei na phtiaxoume ena thiaso na ekhoume ena poulman kai ena phortegaki kai na kanoume tourne sten eparkhia me enallassomeno repertorio me kales douleiesto mnemonio apeuthunetai s autous olous tous to paralambanoume omos os upotheto oloi oi alloiapo ten mia e pou trekhei kai den prolabainei eidika me tes palias tekhnologias elektrogennetries pou diatheteiepomenos sten prosdokia tou daskalou gia ton mathete emphilokhorei to stoikheio tes problepses skhetika me ten anamenomene dunatoteta epidoses tou sugkekrimenou matheteapostoles ekhoun pragmatopoiethei sten tunesia libue aigupto iordania suria kupro italiasto proto to skor etan ede sto me gkol ton lamprou kai ntanoueklekhtheke ten kuriake to neo proedreio tes dieurumenes se drama kabala ksanthe proedros tou nomarkhiakou sumbouliou e mikhaelide georgia apo ten kabala sunainese sten ekloge ton melon ton duo nomarkhiakon epitroponden exegeitai diaphoretika to gegonos oti sto semerino upobathmismeno pantos tou areiou pagou eno tha eprepe na demosieutei toteme te summetokhe ton kaluteron podosphairiston apo ton kosmo ton rompot to pagkosmio protathlema podosphairou rompot robocup mpainei sten telike tou phaseesto kai ek ton usteron leo pos e apantese tou k pargana etan pos te sunthese tes epitropes problepei o nomostrite augoustou kammia eidike merimna gia ta nesia tou aigaiou den problepei e apophase tou tes gia ten endiamese anatheorese tes koines agrotikes politikesantitheta to audi eikhe khasei phusiologika edaphos en opsei tou montelou neas genias to opoio omos lansaretai autes tis emeres kai ste khora masto zontano an kai peinasmeno den koitaxe kan to phageto ma ormese sto paidaki pou aplose to kheraki tou na khaidepsei ta koutabakia me lakhtaraenarxe malista tou erodeiou me te philarmonike tou berolinou tha metadothei teleoptika se olo ton kosmoeite braduazei eite pheggei mesa ste murobolo anoixe anoigei gia mas tous anthropous o ouranos iesous me ten eis adou kathodon nikaei to thanato kai sunanastainei mazi tou oloklero to anthropino genosbathmologia ekhei epikurothei kai auto pou egine einai egklemakai alla stelnoun sto raphi ten periboete anasugkrotese alla kai tis esokommatikes stogoeteutikos ethopoios bretheke sto mexikaniko theretro kankounamerikanoi diplomates kharakterizoun ton prothupourgo tes rosias blantimir poutin kuriarkho arseniko skulo kai ton proedro ntmitri mentbenteph distaktiko egete sumphona me te bretanike ephemerida gkarntiansunolika katharistekan aktes mekous khiliometron kai mesou platous metronplen tes antidrases ton trapezon alla kai tes diakhuses tou endiapherontos to poiotikotero stoikheio tes khthesines sunedriases etan o skhedon diplasiasmos tou tzirou enanti tes sunedriases tes deuteras kathos dapanethekan ekatprokeitai gia ten anotate skhole kalon tekhnon to panteio panepistemio kai to ionion nesonpou ta lene sunethos sunetoi geroi me logia eulabe nounekhe kai gemate sophrosunenapo ton dromo tha kateuthuntheite arkhika pros to kalentzikai den theloume ousiastika auto epesemane o antinomarkhes pou upogrammizei oti uparkheiipedion doxes lampron gia osous stelekhosoun aute ten uperesiagegonos pou kathista problematike ten anakampse kai proideazei gia phouska stis agoresentekhno elleniko kai rok semera to bradu sto play house of tea sten prokumaia me tous vour bandan epikurothei e bathmologia para tis epheseis se exelixe tote tha theorethei praxe kai diadikasia akure pou tha dinei dikaioma gia prosphuge okhi mono sto diaitetiko alla kai sta politika dikasteriatha pas pkh ston periptera kai tha sou pei pos eisai tha to paroume to khrusoapo apopseos ugeias etan kalo giati den bromousan ta ptomatamorphe energeias pou stelnei o egkephalos sto soma kai sto nouidiaitere geuse drosere kai anapantekheepikheiroun me kathe tropo na proselkusoun tous katanalotes sten agora kai na antimetopisoun ton antagonismo ton polukatastematonego den aneko se aute ten kategoria kai to plerosapolu pio apla oi apothekes ton spition mas pou einai kata upogeies exasphalizoun amesa idanikes sunthekes suntereses gia te neosustate kaba masseptembrios koine eireneutike protoboulia tzeri antams tzon emphaniseis tou sugkrotematos sten europeto onoma tou megalou didaskalou tou genous adamantiou korae tou protergate tou neollenikou diaphotismou den einai arketo gia na strepsei ste omonume kai o nikos karampelaskapodistrias kai oi epiptoseis tou tou khrestou mente ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous kapodistrias kai oi epiptoseis touston antipoda oi duo apopseissten periokhe espeusan okhemata tes purosbestikes me andres kathos kai mia omada pezoporo oi opoioi peripou treis ores argotera katapheran na thesoun telika ten photia upo elegkhoperikhuste ta me to elaiolado kai to khumo lemoniouetairia gia to eikhe parousiasei esoda disokhi den tha einai gia panta dunato na ekhei to kathe noikokurio duo megala autokinetaapo ten alle pleura oi gepedoukhoi ekmetalleuontousan ta kena pou demiourgountan ten ora pou prospathouse na anaptukhthei o thrulos kurios me ton mpriso kai prokalousan regmataekhete idea poios einai o misthos tou mekhanikou kai tou dikegoroue akoma kheirotera tou neou mekhanikou kai dikegorouperitto na sas po oti kai mesa sto karabi eikhame omorpha akousmatata pegame polu kala kai deixame pos e omada sigasiga briskei to ruthmo tessugkekrimena to senario pou theoreitai epikratestero thelei ta epta tmemata ton athenas peiraia thessalonikes kretes larisas patras kai egoumenitsas na sunenonontai se tria sten athena te thessalonike kai ten kretetou khronou stokheuoume na einai ena pragmatiko diethnes phestibal mia pou e thessalonike tha philoxenesei te sunodo koruphes ton khoron tes europesme ebrisan pou den ebgaina apo to domatiokathisame me tis sumpaiktries mou kai suzetesame ti einai auto pou theloumesten periokhe guro ap to ephaisteio epikratei pantos polu khamele oratoteta ole te semerine emerata teleutaia khronia protatheke na stegastei to panepistemio tou peiraia pou khresimopoiei gia tis anagkes tou polla ktiria tou limaniouapo tous ephoplistes ta posa pou tha zetethoun tha ekhoun os time ekkineses tis euro aphou opos tonizetai stis suzeteseis ton supporters ekeinoi einai pou prepei na dosoun to sunthema ston aplo kai merokamatiare philathlo tes omadasuparkhei kapoios skhediasmos gia te stelekhose ton uperesion pou deikhnoun adunamia na exuperetesoun ton polite akoume oti autoi pou perisseuoun kai pou phainetai oti einai polloi tha topothetethoun se prosopopageis theseisapo ton oktobrio tha doume loipon ste lurike skene tous kataxiomenous ellenes skenothetes alla kai ton diaprepe khorographo kai proen dieuthunte tou kratikou mpaletou tes operas tes biennes renato tzelatha milesoun metaxu allon oi patroklos staurou proen ekdotes tou suggraphea kai proen uphupourgos para to proedro tes kupriakes demokratias panagiotes makrodemetresomotimos kathegetes philosophikes tou panepistemiou athenon iakobos kampanelesepiskepseis stis demosies uperesies tou kilkis apo to kh anthrakide katopin o upeinai eton kai malista agonizetai ston aianta salaminas eno parallela apotelei kai sumboulo tou spurou kalogianne sten enose ethnikeskapote sta khronia tes megales phtokheias poulesa ena dakhtulidi tou pappou gia na pleroso to noiki mouskenothesia ton kimoule markoulake eikhe apopsesto o maurophoros meiose se alla sto o mserlidakes ebale telos sta oneira ton philoxenoumenon kanontas tokleinei akoma perissotero tous noes pou den eikhan outos e allos perissoteres apo mia thurides anoiktesanestale e apergia stous diabebaioseis oti den tha khasoun to merokamato osoi den eidopoiethekan ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous anestale e apergia stousan den ten kanei dekte pou semainei oti e prosphuge den einai basime to epomeno bema tou periphereiarkhe tha einai e prosphuge ston areio pago opou uparkhei kai thema keruxes tou os ekptotousunantatai sukhnotera sta agoria para sta koritsia kai e elikia diagnoses einai sunethos etonmelete tes epitropes e opoia sunergazetai os gnosto kai me to diethnes grapheio ergasias tha apotuponei te semerine katastase tou asphalistikou mas sustematos kai tha apotelei ten base tou dialogou gia tis allages pou tha prepei na ginounegraphe tote sto kentro tes athenas pou erkhetai e arkhitektonike kai o skhediasmos tou khorou thanai ennoies pou tha sematodotoun ten poluteleiame istoriarok se skoteines apokhroseis oi sisters of mercy epistrephoun me ta neotera apopse sto ktirio kentro ellenikos kosmos kai aurio kuriake sten apotheke tou mulou ste thessalonikestulianou petukhe kai deutere protia ten kuriake stakonstantinos me ten idioteta tou sumboulou gia periballontika themata sto skholeio tou thanase xesekonei tous kathegetes se apergia phernontas ton thanase se duskole these apenanti ste dieuthunse tou skholeioupou einai to boutique hotel kai tote emphanizetai se ole tou te megaloprepeiaepises aneta mporei kaneis na phantastei mia rodokokkinismene papia e mia khena sto phourno na pantreuontai me ena gluko krasi sauternes alla giati okhi kai me samos e ena elaphra sotarismeno stethos phasas me kapoio mesto sarntonena sunergastoume kai na apaitesoumeto timoni kobei polu kai kuklophorei stous mpotiliarismenous dromous me ten eukolia monokulindrou eno mporei na ektelesei me apolute akribeia otidepote akrobatiko zetesei o anabatesekdrome ton kuprion perilambanei ten aeroporike metaphora ton taxidioton apo ten kupro sten athena kai ste sunekheia sten alexandroupolegia to thema auto eikha enemerosei palaiotera ton proedro tou sundesmou ksenodokhoupallelon oti o yphupourgos metaphoron kai epikoinonion k nsalagiannes eikhe desmeuthei na pherei protase nomou ste boulesto thema ton metakhronologemenon epitagon den uperxan apophaseisotan diaskhizei me to mekhanaki tou to parisi khtupa enan geroklimakoumenes pieseis diethnos gia apokhorese tou torame drastes anthropous pou mporei na einai ta paidia gnoston mas sunethismenon anthropondemos sunergazetai me duo pistopoiemena kentra anakukloses autokineton pou analambanoun na metapheroun kai na katastrepsoun ta egkataleleimmena autokinetauparkhei organose apo piso kai emphanes antisemitiko menosston sugkhrono protathletismo tes omogenopoieses ton panton ligos lathraios bios den blapteiupourgeio kalei tous dieuthuntes ton skholikon monadon na kalesoun tous sullogous goneon kai kedemonon gia na tous enemerosoun anaphorika me ta metra prolepses pou anapherontai ste sugkekrimene egkukliokai bebaia tous thumomaste me polu megale agape kai as perasan polla khronia pou egkataleipsame ta mathetika thraniatemenes ka eutukhia lampropoulou kathos kai te demotike sumboulo aigialeias ka maria mpirmpanagoudedomena me lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese diabaste opos akribos tuponontai teleorase erkhetai me full eukrineia upsele dunamike antithese kai upseles poiotetas ekhoalla mazi tous stis proponeseis einai kai o gumnastes tou olumpiakou alex kasereski as gelane sta upourgeia me ten emathiame te semerine apophase tou upourgouergazomenoi pou apotamieuan mia zoe kai ekhasan tis douleies tous to paramenoun anergoi xodepsan ola osa eikhan sten akre kai briskontai pia antimetopoi me to phasma tes phtokheiaskhrematooikonomikos sumboulos tha analabei tis diadikasies diexagoges ton anagkaion diagonismon gia ten anadeixe ton parakhoresioukhon etairion pou tha analaboun ten kataskeue sunterese kai ekmetalleuse ton autokinetodromonoi pio tharraleoi etan se egregorse mepos kai demiourgethei epeisodiokhlorose to kitrinisma ton phullon ephoson den uparkhei kapoios apo tous parapano logous na ten ekhei prokalesei kata kanona opheiletai sten elleipse kapoiou threptikou sustatikoudeutere odegia problepei ten upokhreose proeidopoieses tou koinou prokeimenou gia programmata pou metadidontai me me kodikopoiemene morphe eleuthere lepse kai ta opoia endekhomenos na blapsoun te somatike pneumatike e ethike anaptuxe ton anelikonstokhos na briskontai pio konta stis uperesies kai stous demotesakolouthia tes agias ierousalem periekhei ektos apo ta troparia gia ten akolouthia tou esperinou kai tou orthrou enan kanona se ekho a kai to sunaxario pou prosthetei orismena nea stoikheia gia te drase tes agias ierousalemste diethne suskepse tes ton ianouario tou eipe oti e kale politike exartatai apo ten kale epistemephainetai omos oti o taxiarkhes ton ethele dipla tou kai mas ton pere liges emeres prin te giorte tou mas leei sugkinemenos o k lamprinidesproteine demopsephisma gia te nea europaike suntheke omos epeide milese mesa se autes tis duomisi ores gia duo tria epikeimena demopsephismata den mporesa na katalabo oute to baros oute to diakubeuma autou tou demopsephismatosapo mikros biosa te threskeia sas kai ta omorpha ethe ki ethima sasten suskepse diorganonei to neo kommato megalutero shopping festival tou planete diarkei mekhri tis phebrouariou sto dubaisto idio mekos kumatos kinetheke kai o bouleutes kontogiannesphoreis diakheirises tou programmatos einai e genike grammateia biomekhanias dieuthunse mikron kai mesaion epikheireseon kai o endiamesos phoreas tou epikheiresiakou programmatos antagonistikoteta kai epikheirematikoteta ephepaedrastes tes en psukhro ekteleses me kunegetike karampina einai larisaios sesemasmenos gia narkotika kai ta teleutaia khronia gnorimos stis dioktikes arkhesdeixame ena kalutero prosopo se skhese me ton erakleproupologismos tou demou lemnou anerkhetai sta ekatetsi eimaste emeis oi neoellenes photizoume anadeiknuoume auto pou ekhei axiasto diagonistiko meros ton agonon akome enas sprinter tou edeixe oti brisketai se exairetike katastaseos genike paraterese episemainoun oti oi diataxeis tou skhediou epiballontai sto phorea ulopoieses tes alla kai se organa tou kratous e ta opoia prepei na epanexetasoun tis ruthmiseis tou oste an gennethei amphibolia na sumplerotheito bradu e apostole parakolouthese to idioktetena xepoulethei kai e gia na ekho me ta misa lephta reuma kai na men mou to kobei to kathe kommatoskuloergatopaterasaristeristesphasistassundukalistes opote tou goustareios ek toutou aisthanomai ten anagke na ekphraso os proedros tes khiou tis olothermes eukhes mou kai phusika tis eukhes olou tou tes gia kale epitukhia stis exetaseis pros ola ta paidiasaphos kalutere omada e gepedoukhous kai kontra se ena adiaphoro bathmologika somateia anamenetai na parei te nike gia na xemperdeuei me ten kataktese tes deuteres thesesreporter tou alter xespa enantia sten akharistia ton demiourgon tes diaboetes diaphemises amerikanikes telekartas pou parousiazei te mukono os topo katoikoumeno apo axestous ithageneismporei na petukhei ten prokrise se baros tes makampis delosediadikasia tes kataskheses ekhei xekinesei edo kai pollous menes kai stokhos tes trapezas einai na parei piso ta khremata pou eikhe dosei os daneio ston aiolikoetsi epitugkhanetai e poioteta tou telikou proiontosekane anatrope kai malista duo phoresmonternos krinetai kai o skhediasmos tou pinaka organon me to takhumetro kai to strophometro na ekhoun topothetethei sten kolona tou timoniou kai na metakinountai mazi tes oste na paramenoun panta sto optiko pedio tou odegouekhoun bgei stous dromous kai diekdikoun apo ten kubernese na men prokhoresei sten ulopoiese ton oson skhediazei eis baros tousautos einai o logos pou tous kharise te mia apo tis duo proponeseis pou etan programmatismenes gia semeraeinai augoustos tou e peina therizei o phobos einai diakhutossten epokhe pou teleionoun oi eukoles politikes luseis to xetrupose akome miaapo ten purkagia kaekan pente stremmata apoteloumena kurios apo xera khorta kai pournariakairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia tetarte iouniou ekatontades khiliades dakrusmenoi polites kateklusan ten plateia suntagmatos khthes to braduoi metaphoreis mporoun na epilexoun tis ekdoseis me khoros phortoses apo ta eos kai ta kubika metraxalinaria kapistria lorosokka petsinoi sakoi sellopouggia sakidia opou metapherontan liga trophima pedikla kai pternisteres anapherontai sukhna sta keimena tes epokhesteleiose to gumnasio kupselestelos paromoia einai e katastase kai ston demo trikkaion trikala opou oi monades diaphoras tou protou gurou antistraphekan uper tou kh lappaektos omos apo auto to theorei kai adikemenosumphona me tis episemanseis tou kathegete e metaphora tha stoikhisei perissotera apo ekatommuria drakhmes aphou tha prepei na ten kanoun eidikoi tekhnikoi pou tha erthoun gia to skopo auto apo ten amerikeauto etan kai to skor tou protou an kai e tessera lepta prin to phinale aggixe ten isopharise otan o kouzen ekhase ena monadiko tet a tetpou to pleronoun oloi kai auto douleuei gia tous elakhistouseimai polu eukharistemene me auto pou ekhei ginei e europemia europe iskhure kai exupnepros ten porta tes exodou kateuthunetai epises kai o zan alen mpoumsongk ki an poulethei ki autos tote ta asteria tes omadas tha einai o kostas katsouranes kai o sempastian letokineitai apo ton gnosto aeroelaiopsukto me ippous eno diathetei plaisio khorodiktuoma agonistiko monompratso psalidi aktinike dagkana kai terastio diskophreno empros kai anestrammeno pirouniyperesia politikes aeroporias edose ede to prasino phos gia ten kataskeue neou loxou diadromou prosgeioses kai apogeioseskoukiadakes tonise ten apophase tes autodioiketikes periphereias na ekhei protagonistiko rolo sto themakorner tou kapetanou apo ta dexia pou ekteleitai sto proto dokari o soltani pedaei pselotera apo olous kai stelnei te mpala sta dikhtua gia na isopharisei to paikhnidi segi auto apo te thea tes anthropologias mporoume na parateresoume ton thaumasto kosmo tes philosophias tes koinoniologias tes istorias tes psukhologias tes logotekhnikes kritikes tes semeiotikes kai tes ermeneutikesgia ta lakhanika bazoume ligo ladi sten plaka kai psenoume ta diaphora lakhanika aphenontas ta manitaria gia to telosapantese khpapoutse gia ten katastase sten egoumenitsa den uphistatai anagke gia peraitero eniskhuse tes astunomikes dunames sten egoumenitsa ektima o upourgos prostasias tou polite kh papoutses apantontas se erotese tou bouleute toualloste de tha einai e prote phoraepomenos ek ton pragmaton to atoma einai upokhreomeno na meiosei tis diaprosopikes tou skheseis pros kharin tes elektronikes koinonikopoieses touedo kakos khatheke o khronos tes proeklogikes periodoueite braduazei eite pheggei an e stele etan lekkas tha ekane duo apla pragmatato politiko sustema sussomo gia prote phora brisketai makria apo ten ellenike koinonia uposterizei o talantoukhos ethopoios episemainontas pos osa ekane mekhri semera ta opheilei ola ston patera toutis epomenes emeres anamenetai na ginei sunantese me tous ekprosopous ton allon nomon tes kretesritzakes apedose ten ekpursokrotese tou oplou se atukhema apopse pou dekhtheke telika o anakrites rethumnouuparkhoun apodeixeis oti edose entole na staloun khiliades apelpismenoi aphrikanoi metanastes sto nesi gia na to buthisoun sto khaos tonisesta ektimatai oti peripou theseis tha meinoun akaluptesapo ten alle e apokhe den einai luse dioti prepei nakhoume summetokhe kai euthune sto eklogiko apotelesmato ktirio sta tirana pou einai gnosto os puramida brisketai sto epikentro tes demosias suzeteseski etsi sten epidauro tha khoume mazi mas auta ta agorakia etonepisemainoume oti se autes tis ores panelleniou penthous kai perisulloges oloi mas tha prepei na boethesoume deikhnontas psukhraimia kai upselo aisthema koinonikes euthunesdeutera augoustou mm semantika kerde katagraphei ten deutera to khrematisterio axion kuprou leukosia semantika kerde parousiazei to khrematisterio sten prote sunedria tes ebdomadasapo aurio e proetoimasia prosarmozetai ston agona me ta giannina o opoios tha diexakhthei upo to phos ton proboleonto egeitai tes neolaias lamprake kai eklegetai bouleutes tesmekhri tote tha epikheirethei sunantese kai me ten egesia tou upourgeiou agrotikes anaptuxes mepos kai katapheroun katiekhei paramakrunei e oura tou makaroniou kai ousiastika diapistonoume oti xanabriskomaste ekei pou xekinesameapo khthes to pragmatopoiei elegkhous oste na diapistosei ten uparxe e me deltion apostoles kai timologion apo ta opoia tha prokupsoun nea semantika stoikheia gia ten upothesephournos tes geitonias den einai aprosope poluethnikegi auto prepei epitelous e egesia mas na exegesei sto lao giati o semerinos ponos einai ependuse gia to auriosto sunolo tous oi apeutheias anatheseis kata ten teleutaia tetraetia sto demo ano kalama mporei kai na xeperasan tis sumphona me tis protes ektimeseis tou kosta kapsalempakagioko epiase ex epaphes kephalia o mprilakes aplose to kheri tou ste megale periokhe pentakatharo penalti to opoio arnetheke o gratsaneskhthes kata ten apokhorese ton paikton apo to proponetiko gia to poulman enas apo tous eruthroleukous to skholiasesten odo sokratous episkephtheite to paradosiako kapheneio mevlana tou ali memiktote thumamai o takes lemones eikhe zetesei apo ton sokrate kokkale ten apoktese enos amuntikou khaph pou na ekhei ta kharakteristika tou karempededomena me lepta kathusterese authairetakurie dieuthunta tsimento e sunainese diabaste opos akribos tuponontai to home cinema den apeuthunetai mono se osous mporoun na xodepsoun mia periousia gia na stesoun ena sustema sto saloni tousperimetros tous einai peripou tessera khiliometra me ametretous purgous kai promakhonesomos den to blepo se aute te phase na ginei autolaos na balei skopo na kataktesei te dike tou exousia semera o laos ekhei polu perissoterous logous na empisteuthei tis ektimeseis tou gia to pou trabaei e katastase gia te diexodo apo ten krise pou sumpherei to laoprin ten enarxe tou agona oi diaitetes kai oi paiktes ton duo omadon aphesan louloudia sto semeio opou traumatistheke dustukhos thanasima o atukhos stamates georgoudakes eno kratetheke enos leptou sige ste mneme toualle pleura kathe khartonomismatos anaparista mia gephura mias sugkekrimenes epokhes sumbolo epikoinonias metaxu ton laon tes europes kai metaxu tes europes kai tou upoloipou kosmouuposkhetai na parei akome pio sklera metra gia ton lao kai tous ergazomenous beltionontas to oikonomiko klimaduo kukles gunaikon me ligous antres parea khoreuanektos ap auto omos den enemeronontai egkaira oste na proetoimastoun kathos ekhoun oikogeneia kai den mporoun na phugoun xaphnika apo ten pole tousto klima ston sullogo einai kalo para to gegonos oti e omada bgeke apo noris ektos stokhon kai o soteres sinanes milese sten gia te sunekheiaoi proskeklemenoi kallitekhnes einai kurios neoi ellenes mousikoi pou parousiazoun tis tzaz melodies tousenas astunomikos apo ten komotene pou eikhe ole ten skhetike epikoinonia tha emphanizotan os o upopsephios agorastesedo ekhoun ena pleonektema oi ethelontes aimodoteskonopisopoulos kathos kai o proedros tou sullogou mekhanikon argous thanan pali ontos ten psakhnoume gia tous duo proanapherthentes paiktes tote allazeientheta psarema phouskoto psarema to baridi einai ekeino to alieutiko ergaleio pou tha mas epitrepsei na rixoume to doloma mas sto semeio pou theloume ekei pou to kalo psari tha to brei kai tha to katapiei amesosste diarkeia ton sunallagon o genikos deiktes timon xeperase ta epipeda ton monadon katagraphontas anotere time stis monades otan semeione anodo eos kaianakaluphtheke oxugono se doruphoro tou kronou to diastemiko skaphos kasini tes amerikanikes kai tes europaikes diastemikes uperesias anikhneuse oxugono se mikre posoteta sten araie atmosphaira tou pagomenou doruphorou rea tou kronoudemotikos sumboulos makes benetas bretheke ston kataulismo tou parkingk kai milese me tous tsigganousto mono meionektema ton mini hifi einai oi periorismenes dunatotetes diasundeses tous me periphereiakes suskeues kathos oi diathesimes thures tous einai ligesekhoume episkeptes kai melos sundedemenous tou sundesmou aporimmaton me parontes apo baterlo gia kai diorismenoustou telous epesan khtes gia ton proen metropolite attikes panteleemona mpezenite o opoios kathairetheke apo to ekklesiastiko dikasterio meta kai apo to telesigrapho tou eisaggelea tou areiou pagouakolouthei e sunenteuxepos mporoume na paraggeiloume ta cd tou ta cd ta poulaei monos tou malista ta ekhei eponomasei nomous tou solonaetan oloi neikoi ki omorpha palekariato sigouro einai oti tha parakolouthesoume ena polu dunamiko kai sugkhronos paraxena melodiko livekai pros ten kateuthunse aute katholou den apokleiei to endekhomeno strategikon summakhion me alles etaireies tou kladouleukosia bgaineis apo ten exodo tou autokinetodromou sta lumpia briskeis ena roundabout kai pas boreia pros ta lumpiaektos omos apo ten ugeionomike pistopoiese agnotetas ekhoun kai tenestiatorio tha breite kai sto national theatre to national film theatre kai to old vicperipeteia tou koinobouleutismou sten ellada aphegeitai te duskhere kai astathe poreia tou koinobouleutikou biou sten elladaoi dieuthuntes emeinan entuposiasmenoi apo ten megale proodo pou ekhei pragmatopoiesei e tourkia genika alla eidikotera ston tourismokathe phora pou auto egine e ekklesia me austeroteta antimetopise ekeinon ton opoio epelege ton dromo tes paraiteseosenas allos enoikos tou melrose einai kai e iskhure politike arthrographos ela sims katie cassidy pou eno uperxe polu phile me te sintni e philia tous katastrapheke otan e sintni apeilese na dioxei ten ella kai na katastrepsei te stadiodromia testelika o idanikos apodektes tes andrikes pornographias einai to monakhiko arseniko kai e idanike morphe sex pros ten opoia teinei einai to monakhiko sexmeta arkhisan ta gioukhamas odegoi taxi ta xeroun ola einai ena erotemaproblema nitrorupanses proerkhomeno apo tis georgikes drasteriotetes katagraphetai ste dutike akhaia me apotelesma ta upogeia udata na einai idiaitera eualota ste khemike rupanseede kleinoun oi ekkremotetes gia na piasoun douleia epitukhontes eno me suntomes diadikasies tha proslephthoun atoma sta nosokomeia tous demous kai ta skholeiato keimeno sunekhizetai me paromoio periekhomenoden einai o eliosepodakathese o giannakos ma den eikhe pos to kamei ma de tou rkhotane na parei opiso to logo tougi auto kai ekplessomai molis akoumpo tis balitses mou ste resepsion tou xenodokheiou kurimai einai mia olokainourgia mikre monada e aphorme gia touto to taxidi sto gerolimenaki oi dikoi uas pou giortazoun ten alose einai uia khouphta phanatikoi uono pou e phone tous akougetai duskolaupothetoume oti sten torine apophase tou tha epaixe rolo kai e khronia gkrinia tes elpidasti kaemos ki autos den prolabainame na tous rotesoume ti koboun kai raboun me tose aphosioseoso gia te agonistike oi protoporoi stamatesan sta okhto apenanti sto gerani eno o xepernouse epitukhos to megalo empodio tou ophi sten ierapetraan apodeikhthei oti kapoios ekhei klepsei khremata tou demou ton opoio ego me autaparnese uperetesa na tou kopsete ta kheriaanagke tous gia bathmous me kanei na riskaro stozographise ola tes ta oneira ekei sto paragoni me stakhti khroma kai den elege na sekosei to kephalaki tes les kai etan e mone upeuthune gia osa tes diegetheke o pappous pos tha sumboun ste ge ta epomena khroniadiapistosa oti den etan toso diabasmenos oso o k semitesalle noseleutria me ta idia akribos tupika prosonta ergazetai sto nosokomeio philiatonkairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia tetarte iouliou thodores blakhos einai o neos proponetes tes omadas polo tou olumpiakoutesseris meres tessera kare alla o psaretos erthe kai psarepsezone plemmuras kai zone asphaleias topothetontas kai skhetikes pinakidesgia mia akome phora to kratos apodeikhteke katotero ton peristaseonepitrope epaggelmatikou athletismou apophasise ten apobole tes olumpiakos bolou kai tes kabalas apo ta epaggelmatika protathlemata kathos ekrine oti to idioktesiako kathestos ton duo omadon paramenei upo ton entolon ton akhillea mpeoualla opos e adunamia tes skepses tou na tithaseusei ta phainomena kai tous kanones se mia eniaia kai plere ermeneutike methodo etsi kai e zoe tou ton odegese se pio eueliktes kai tautokhrona perissotero periplokes proseggiseisepiprostheta epta athletesgia na phantasteite leei na metatrapei o pharos tou pneumatos se oiko tou mamonaton phebrouario tou sto periodiko nemesis protokuklophorese mia delose upotithetai tou khenri kisingkerden einai ora gia diamakhes alla ora euthunessumphona me plerophories sto diaitete ksenake alla kai sto boetho anastasiade pou etan ston agona pharkaina kanares tha epiblethei siopere timoria ki auto giati sto paikhnidi den uperkhe parateretes diaitesiasperiodeia tou droutsa ste mese anatole periodeia ste mese anatole me antikeimeno to mesanatoliko kai tis dimereis skheseis pragmatopoiei apo tis oktobriou o upourgos exoterikon demprote antidrase etan ten ora pou anagignoskontan e epistole kai koruphotheke otan o stauros kalogiannes kai o alexandros kakhrimaneskteniatrike yperesia tes nomarkhiakes autodioikeses lasithiou epharmozei to programma ekrizoses tes broukelloses ton aigoprobaton apo tonomizo oti auto einai pou ektima kai o kosmos upogrammizei kharakteristikalogos gia biasune kai kakes epiloges tupou nilsen den suntrekheioi periodeies tou sunduasmou tha sunekhistoun tis epomenes meres toso sten pole tes kerkuras oso kai stous demous phaiakon esperion kai meliteieonsumphona me tis episemanseis tes kas aggelas karude to orario tha prepei na einai eleutherogia deipno duo atomon me proto piato kurios kai gluko khoris krasi tha plerosete peripou av des ternesopos tonise o uphupourgos k sephounakes me to skhedio demiourgeitai to plaisio tes khoregeses adeias leitourgias kai ekmetalleuses udatodromion kai kathorizontai ta apaitoumena dikaiologetika gia tis adeiodoteseisean emoun ste these ton armodion leei e idia tha ekana uperanthropes prospatheies gia na dothei mia lusekos papandreou antitheta tha prepei prota na sbesei tis photies pou kathemerina anabei kai epeita na mostrarei os o teleutaios pou bazei to litharaki tes anaptuxes se enan topo dialumeno apo khree kai daneiaeinai kharakteristiko oti apo tous peripou ktenotrophous pou ekhoun labei pistopoiese gia ten paragoge tous apo ton idiotiko organismo mono apo autous diathetoun kreas sten agorasundesmos episemainei sten anakoinose tou oti o nioplias einai mia xekhoriste idiaitere periptose kai e antimetopise pros to prosopo tou prepei na einai to idio xekhoriste kai idiaitereargentines prosdoka na petukhei e kubernese phernontas me nomo litoteta ston idiotiko tomeaetsi prepei na apoktethoun neoi oi opoioi tha plaisiosoun ten omadaepises austera epilegmene apo egkura leukomata touekrektikoteta e dioratikoteta kai e aisthese tou gkol einai adiamphisbeteta ta basika atou touidios milese sto clicklife gia to magazi kai to meraki tou to phresko psarikai touto okhi giati den gnorize to telos tou alla giati pisteue pos ligos einai akome o khronos pou tou menei gia na teleiosei to ergo tou tes agapes kai tes prosphoras to megalo ergooi ispanoi ten apolambanoun toso os proino apogeumatino alla kai after hours bromikok memet khalet plerose ten poine ton menon kai apokhorese me tous dekades philous kai sunergates tou apo to dikastiko megarokathe khrono katagraphontai kata meso oro nea krousmataporeia tou mpote thalassinou apo to erakleio eos ta diethne kosmika salonia eikhe ten eukairia na gnorisei gnostes prosopikotetes anthropous tou diethnous kallitekhnikou khorou oikonomikous paragontes kai orismenes apo tis pio omorphes gunaikesplerophories anapheroun oti o iskhuros andras tou agiax tes epeirou tha sunantethei semera me ton alenatore khoris ostoso na theoreitai bebaio oti apo to rantebou ton duo pleuron tha prokupsoun nea dedomenaepises tha proslephthoun enas klibanistes apolumantes aposteirotes enas metaphoreas asthenon enas ergates genikon kathekonton enas trapezokomos kai enas lantzieresmeta apo aute ten exelixe oi kurioi kakhrimanes kai panzakhos tha mporousan aneta na diekdikesoun protagonistiko rolo sten tainia o kalos kai o kakostime antzela stamatiadou astamatiadouathinoramagr prosokhe to arthro auto proerkhetai apo to arkheio tou athenoramatos kai oles oi plerophories tou periekhomenou tou ekhoun elegkhthei kai diastaurothei kata ten khronike periodo tes demosieuses tousto phonto tes e aphisa graphei ksepoulane tis zoes mas den tha tous aphesoumetha eimai sto theatro ebe opos eimai kai tora me tous tromerous goneis se skenothesia kai pali tou petrou philippideoposdepote prokeitai gia mia megale apoleia gia ten omada tou atsaleniou kathos o kalaphates etan enas apo tous pio statherous se apodose paiktes tes omadas kai apo ta kalutera limpero tes ethnikesapaitountai apophasistikes metarruthmiseis gia demiourgia asphalon kathemerinon sunthekon gia tous aplous polites katapolemontas tautokhrona tis egklematikes energeiesapla kai e teleutaia aute ereuna erkhetai na eniskhusei ten apopse pos oi ekastote politikes egesies tou upourgeiou ugeias menoun mono stis theoriesden prepei na perimenei oti oi alloi apo monoi tous tha prosexoun kai tha semeiosoun tis tourkikes prokleseisotan omos ta mpalakia einai polla kai o thorubos megalos tote kati mporei na gineisumparastase se sinto epithese se khetapekha te sumparastase tou sto demarkho mpizaniou ekphrazei me grapte tou delose o demarkhos anatolesmou telephonesan loipon apo to na pao na mou dosoun mia paraggeliapiese tes anagkes pou niotheis se kanei kathos megaloneis na prostheteis ki alla mazi se osa ekheis ede sussoreusei ste zoe souekdelose entassetai sten kampania enemeroses kai exoikeioses ton ellenon politon me to euro pou diorganonoun ta info point europe elladas stis periphereies tes khorassto stokhastro briskontai oi anthropines skheseis propantos oi erotikes etsi opos anthoun prosarmozontai kai phtheirontaioi duo paiktes agonistekan sto khthesino philiko me ton ergotele alla o zntenek skasni thelei na tous dei kai se proponeseis mekhri na diamorphosei ten oristike tou apophaseligo mas aggizoun ta themata pou den mas aphorounkata sunepeia theloume na eimaste meros tou epikheirematikou gignesthai edona paixoume rolo sten anaptuxe kai na boethesoume ten ntopia agora kai tous kretes epikheirematies na ulopoiesoun ta skhedia tousarkhike selida enemerose athletika nea gepedo tou o ophh ten kuriake to apogeuma sto plaisio tes agonistikes tou protathlematos ethnikesanalutika to kalentari tou sullogou gia ton epomeno khrono ianouariou dromos augenikesdipla tes axizei na deite to petrino kampanario tou kai piso tes mazi me to terastio dendro ten panoramike thea sto aigaioypobole deloseos kai katabole tou parakratethentos phorou epi ton katablethenton e akhthenton metron sto legomeno stauro tes poles dioti para to gegonos oti uparkhei apophase gia ten apagoreuse tes kineses ton okhematon aute se kathemerine base parabiazetai kataphora apo asuneidetous odegousagnoia kai e aneparkeia tes torines demotikes arkhes sto skhediasmo kai ten ulopoiese programmaton anakukloses ekhoun katastesei to demo ksanthes ourago stis analoges prospatheies ton politon tou alla kai tes periphereias anola ta paikhnidia theloun prosokhe omos gia tous stokhous pou ekhoume thesei tetoies anametreseis prepei na tis kerdizoumeden arkei na perigraphoume to prophanesanoikhte epistole me auto to thema eikhame apo ton demarkho peramatos kasse kai oute aute ephere apotelesmaperimenoume ten apopse tes topikes koinoniaseidikotera ta kerde phetos proseggisan diagonismo photographias me titlo street lifeta liontaria sunekhizoun se entonous ruthmous ten proetoimasia tous ki etsi sten semerine proponese o uperesiakos tekhnikos tes omadas paulos demetriou edose emphase kurios ste beltiose tes phusikes katastases ton podosphairiston touanalutika to programma ton agonon repheri ethnikes sphurizei ten khioubrontadou axiologemenos diaitetes tes ethnikes tha sphurixei ton agona tes premieras tes khioubrontadou me ton akharnaiko to sabbato sto gepedo tou menidioumonarkas ekhei xekinesei entuposiaka sto mexiko e inter phernei mono over epi leonarnto e ren einai se phorma oso gia ten mpilmpao deite ti kanei teleutaia kai tha sumphonesete mazi mou se kaka khalia e magiorka episesetan ena paikhnidi tessaron bathmon treis gia te nike kai enas akoma ponto gia to paikhnidi tou protou gurou tonise o ispanos tekhnikos eno anapheromenos ste rebans tou kupellou sten toumpa upogrammise einai duo diorganoseis teleios diaphoretikesomos sten praxe den prepei na theoreitai dedomene e phusike summakhia metaxu omodoxonoristikes apophaseis anamenetai na lephthoun to maio apo te diakheiristike epitropeden uparkhei kamia desmeuse alla an o kosmos antapokrithei kai sterixei tha einai ekei kai o k pappas kai o k notiasna thumaste pos tous periorismous eseis tous balate ston eauto sas kai apla oi alloi tous ulopoiounexagoge ton xenon ulon e leukanse an einai aparaitete kai genika e metatrope ton gkrizon uphasmaton sten epithumete telike tous katastase os pros te leukoteta to khroma kai ta kharakteristika pou dinoun eukolia ston metepeita kheirismoto ntermpi pleon einai istoria kai oloi mazi perimenoume te sunekheia gia na doume an ta duo trena kanoun stase kapou e tha lusoun tis diaphores tous sto deutero guro kai sun ton agona touoi oikologoi prasinoi me pososto den kataphernoun na mpoun ste boulepleon aperigrapte ekpompe tou ellenikou radiophonoupara ta stremmata ampelona e leukada einai to pio asemanto apo ta tessera nesia ton eptaneson pou einai axia anaphoras se oti ekhei skhese me to ampeli kai to krasipalia sunetheia pou de khanetai eukola kai kathe phora trekhei molis mathei pos etoimazetai nea parastaseto na paizeis agalmatos ekhoun epipleon zographistei khrusa skoularikia kathos kai perideraio pou periekhei kai to sema tou europleiopsephia ton touriston autes tes periodou einai tes kategorias winter sun ara autoi tha straphoun se alles agores ektos elladosmousike apotelei tekhnike pou se sunduasmo me orismenous polu austerous kanones diabioses boethaei sten katharse tes psukhesprokeitai gia mia apo tis pio semantikes theseis e opoia den ekhei ereunethei me ten leptomereia pou tes tairiazei theseto programma tes emeridas ekhei os exes aeria rupanse ste larisagia tis de metagraphikes kineseis ola exartontai apo to oikonomiko mpatzet mesa apo to opoio ekhei kharakhtei e poreia tes neas agonistikes periodouphoros khresiktesias kharistike bole stous agrotessto sphuri to mellon tes khoras kai tou laou drastikos periorismos tes oikonomikes kai politikes kuriarkhias tes elladas epibletheke se sunduasmo me mia katalesteuse tou koinonikou ploutou tou laou kai mia protophane ekptose tes zoes ton anthropongiati e logotekhnia opos leei ste selida den graphetai mono me ta dakhtula alla kai me ten psukhentrope gia te real madrites kharakterise ton zoze mourinio o otmar khitsphelntokhi apo phoitetes alla apo alla paidia tes elikias touperissoteroi apo anthropoi tha khasoun te douleia tous stis kathos e alusida bibliopoleion borders e deutere megalutere ste khora tha kleisei ta upokatastemata tessto proto teukhos me thema to epos tou mesa se selides parousiazetai ektenes photographiko uliko apo to albaniko metopo me spania stigmiotupa apo ten kathemerinoteta ton ellenon stratiotonkoboun ta epidomata giati theloun na kopsoun eisodematasto khthesino sumboulio tes ta mele tes enoses ekanan dekte ten paraitese tou kosta theodosaketou tourkikou genikou epiteleiou strategos xousein kibrikoglou apokleiei kategorematika to endekhomeno parenokhleses apo ten tourkike polemike aeroporia tou aeroskaphous pou metephere ton ellena upourgo sugkoinonion k taso mantelesiemens aporriphtheke kai e nea protase parapompes galazion upourgon paraitese pampouke meta ten kontra me papoutse anadromika oi perikopes ton misthon kourema stous misthous khiliadon demosion upallelon anadromika apo iouliouoso apisteuto loipon kai an phainetai uparkhoun hrakleiotes pouexi ores ueta ten enarxe tes epikheireses ue ten kodike onouasia top kill anotato stelekhos tes etaireias delose oti apo to upothalassio koitasua petrelaiou ebgaine uono laspesto elpidophoro meiotheke e anergia ton augousto tou apo to ton antistoikho mena tou graphei e kathemerine sto phullo tes paraskeues noembriousto poimnio sas na ta skholiazontas ma tora paei ki autos gureuontas eiste thrasutatosden koitoun omades den exetazoun logous aphou apopoiountai te logike os ennoia tou katestemenouenaskholese tou me to problema tes elaiopurenas prin ligo kairo alla kai me to thema tes poiotetas prosphata apodeiknuei oti arkhizei na endiapheretai genikotera gia ta megala problemata tou elaioladoualla olo to thema einai na ginei to phekeniose ten anagke na anoixei ena alinea ste nea uorkeauto dieukrinizei me egkuklio tou to ypourgeio oikonomikon prosthetontas oti oi apodeixeis autes tha phulassontai se kleisto phakelo sten ephoria kai meta apo ton elegkhoaitema tes sten den uperkhe ekeine ten periodo an auto ekhei kapoia semasiagnorizei oti tha einai para polu duskolo na stethei o neos autos demoskai pali omos tha antidrasei entona mono sten periptose pou eseis den tou ekhete aphesei kamia alle epilogeparagoge petrelaiou tes benezouelas epese kato apo ta ekatommuria dolaria eno to etan pano apo tria ekatommuria kurios exaitias ton periorismenon ependuseon kai tes elleipses eidikeumenou prosopikouepises pareggeilan akome ena mekhanema ton asbo pou psekazei mia ousia me anupophore murodiato tetarto sikouel tes seiras komodion den ekhei kanena logo uparxes akoma kai gia tous poromenous opadous tes oritzinal tainiasan telika ginei e epembase ton sto irak ten idia ora akuronontai oi opoies aisiodoxes problepseis gia ten anakampse tes pagkosmias oikonomias kai katu epektase tes touristikes agoras mesa stoostoso analutes theoroun oti meta apo duo gurous posotikes khalaroses kostous trispisteuo oti e nea politike antilepse tou mesaiou khorou pou uiothetesame proeklogika leitourgei pleon epanatrophodotika toso sten epikoinoniake mas politike oso kai ste prospatheia mas gia ananeose kai anasugkrotesena sas thumiso oti mono sto upourgeio anaptuxes pou ekho kai ten euthune energopoiesame apo ten arkhe tou khronou mekhri semera to toudemos tou mprolo palermo panta sten sikeliato eidame me to phiasko ton sullepseon apo ton makarite tsebaneos roubas pou khtizetai sten gergere anamenetai na dosei mia seira apo dunata philika to epomeno diastema mesa enanapo tis topikes arkhes ekhei lephthei merimna oste na ephodiastoun oi metanastes me nero kai eide diatrophes eno sumphona me tis protes plerophories e katastase tes ugeias tous einai kalesto pali den kanei kapoio koinopheles ergoorismenoi limenes se nesous einai toso problematikoi oste na demiourgountai apories akome kai gia te dunatoteta leitourgias tousapo oles tis anthropines epistemes e episteme tou anthropou einai e pio axia gia ton anthropo kai gia ton planete pou domei o idiosupourgos eipe emeis theloume na epistrepsoune na kanoun to kliniko ergo na kanoun to ekpaideutiko tou ergo opos nomizoune giati e douleia e dike mas sta demosia nosokomeia einai na diasphalisoume ten ugeia tou kosmake kai tipote allosten rodope uparkhoun bebaia polla peristatika opos uparkhoun kai s ole ten elladazan ektor aikhmalotize ston phako tou megales star tou sinema ten anouk eme te romi snainter ten katrin nteneb ten izampel atzani te marlen zomper te martha kelerneos khrestes eggraphesundese ophe kai atrometos emeinan sto sto enarkterio paikhnidi tou ellenikou protathlematos meta apo ena kalo mats videome ten prostheke aute o stolos tes diamorphonetai sta ploia apo at time gia ten epiloge tou khorouden dekhomai kanena sumbibasmo me to politika orthodioti diaphoretika den tha mporoume na apodosoume tis basikes leitourgikes dapanesto mnemonio problepei exoikonomese poron den mas upokhreonei me sugkekrimenes methodous eureses tousprokeitai gia tis etaireies omilos mutilenaiou sten opoia summetekhoun oi intracom aktor kai ellenike tekhnodomike kai omilos kopelouzousemera e demotike pinakotheke me erga spoudaion kallitekhnon apotuponei te gluptike te kharaktike te zographike kai ten keramikeena mats apo to opoio tha apousiasoun oi timoremenoi skoko kai makos alla kai o traumatias giakhits eno einai pithano o ispanos tekhnikos na xekourasei tous lumperopoulo kai della alla kai na prophulaxei ton ntiop pou proerkhetai apo traumatismotelos delose oti e tou ergou den ekhei akome egkrithei alla diatupose ten aisiodoxia oti ta opoia empodia tha antimetopistoun kanontas anaphora sten politike boulese pou opos eipe uparkhei apo tous semerinous kubernontes upourgoi kai aigaiouexoikeiomene me ton kosta erinkoglou apo proegoumena deipna e orieta arkhise na paraggelnei agapemena kai kainourgia piatametokhes me euros times apo eos europrotos stokhos tes epistrophes einai na leitourgesei e omada goneon etsi oste to duskolo egkheirema tes apexarteses na epiteukhthei mesa apo to idio to periballon tou alkoolikoumiamise lorida dromou ana aigaio mpophorto meteoro bema tou pelargou oi paramethorioi plethusmoi e glossa tous kai ta sunorata koinonika kai politika dedomena deikhnoun me katharo tropo oti o stauros ton politon tha semanei leukosia stis ianouariousugkekrimena to senario tous basizetai se ena elakhista gnosto muthistorema tou iouliou bern tous nauagous tou ionathanprepei na dosoume ten eukairia ston tsiole pou apedeixe meta meneista mpania ependedumena me petra toso stous toikhous oso kai to patoma einai kati to pragmatika xekhoristoti eikhate na khasete anarotethekeniketes tou agona kenuates noakh ekopse to nema selardas ugeia o megalos asthenes kai sto nomo mas ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous lardas ugeia o megalos asthenes kai sto nomo mas opos katarreei e kubernese tes parasurei ste dine tes kai to periphereiako mas sustema ugeiasthelei apo tous paragontes na aphesoun kata meros tis prosopikes philodoxies na stamatesoun oi intrigkes kai na doulepsoun oloi me gnomona ten omadaapo te o alexandros kakhrimanes den leei to nai akome alla mallon einai thema emeron na kanei episeme anakoinose gia ten kathodo toueinai time mou pou briskomai gia prote phora sten kuprota pragmata omos den eginan akribos etsikathusterese aute trophodotese kai senaria gia dustokia kai adunamia exeureses tou prosopou pou tha analambane to upourgeio ugeiasstis prothesmies pou dinontai einai adunaton na oloklerothei stoikheiodos ena ergo pou upotithetai oti prospathei na balei taxe sto khaos pou epikratei semerasumphona me ten astunomia o allodapos eikhe sunapsei arkhika aisthematiko desmo me ten anelikegia na ekhei iskhu e apophase metatropes prepei na demosieuthoun oi apophaseis sto phek kai meta na akolouthesei e alle diadikasia kai apophase isos e pio duskole gia ten taktopoiese tou prosopikou poioi tha pane pou kai ti tha ginei me tous orismenou khronoutropos pou elexe e polumetokhikoteta kai e meta apo aute epokhe edeixe xekathara oti to prasino palati eikhe khtistei se sathro edaphos me ta apotelesmata na peithoun gia tou logou to alethes kai ton pio aisiodoxo opado tes omadasethesa ton problematismo mou apo ten arkhe alla pleon etan arga na gurisei to potami pisosten itea aneta domatia kai zesto lompi diathetei to anakainismeno ek bathron nausika palaceomophulophilia gi aute te genia epapse na einai tampou na einai enokheto mats den tha einai eukolo gia kanenantreo senaria einai anoikhta opos kai oi eklogesten idia ora o ephes pilsen thelei na kanei kolpo gkroso me ton sasa bougiatitsmas aresei o podosphairistes alla khreiazetai upomone lene sten gia ten mporesa n apheso esto olokleromene te melete autou tou ergou pou thelame n allaxei ten opse tes bitrinas tes polessumbibasmos e epitukhia anoigei ta khartia tou o markopoulos thema oron einai pleon e anakoinose tes upopsephiotetas tou proedrou tou thodorou markopoulou gia to demo kabalasna khaneis kai na spatalas ton kairo sou sa na ekheis mprosta sou khilia khroniasto pani kai sto guali tou theatrou mpantminton auten te phora ten timetike tous ekhoun o giorgos zampetas kai ta apeira tragoudia tou pou agapethekan arkhika meso tou sinemadioti ean to keimeno den einai apolutos desmeutiko kai me metabletomia aple paragraphosduo monon lexeiseisakhthesomenes ek ton usteronektos plaisiou demopsephismatosmporoun na to akurosoun e na to metaballoun rizika kai kathoristikaatoma skholiazoun okhi aploikebeltiomena kerde alla kai perithorio kerdous ano ton ektimeseongia ton nenant krstits eikhame sunekheis epaphes kai otan ekeinos xekinese tis diapragmateuseis me ten katalaba pou ethela na paixopoia einai e drasterioteta sas ekei askholoumai me ta politistika dromena kai prospathoume gia to kaluterota dis euroa einai anexegeta gia ton arthrographou giati den mporei na dei tis energeies e paralepseis ton kuriarkhon elit tes khoras mazi me tis kuberneseis pou epheran to apotelesma tou upselou demosiou khreousgi auto kai e apostole tou neou ford fiesta mono eukole den mporei na kharakteristei aphou skhedon kathe kataskeuastes autokineton ekhei na antiparataxei kai mia protasearkhike eisegese tha ginei apo ton idio kai tha akolouthesoun oi eisegeseis ton upoloiponkai os edo omilosparea ton trion tou nikephorou petros philippides tou mime paulos khaikales kai tou paulou sake mpoula megalonei kata ena meloskai oso kai an ten paspalizeis me monternes pinelies den pauei na mas kanei na niothoume oti oloi anapoloume kati pou ephuge anepistreptimazi tous o tourkos tsikhan okanektote o baggeles marinakes kai o nikolas pateras etan akhoristoipros to paron pantos arneitai parembaseis etan san na apodekhontan epi khronia ten uphistamene katastasetha xanakerdisei phetos to keupritz e tha tou parei ta skeptra e oxphorde piaste these stis okhthes tou potauou uetaxu ligoteroeinai akome epitaktike e anagke na dothei entole enorkes diereuneses tes katastases apo ton ypourgo toulakhiston sto panepistemio kretes gia na termatisthei e phthora kai e spatale pou phainetai na ballei eutheos kata tou thesmou tou panepistemioumekhri omos paroun ten telike apophase tha prepei na eimaste proetoimasmenoi kai gia nees biaies anataraxeiskurios seralvo prosthese se sunduasmo me ten tekhnologia anepaphon pleromon e sugkekrimene karta phernei epanastase ston tropo me ton opoio ginontai oi pleromes prospherontas takhuteta asphaleia kai pagkosmia apodokheemeis leme pos ta adunata semeia kathe demou einai duome gkol tou karanikola sto kai tou anogiate sto o panaigialeios nikese sto gepedo tou te beroia meoi epitukhies tou katalanikou sullogou einai paromoies me ten poreia pou ekhei e betfair ta teleutaia khroniasta diethne ta perissotera kephalaia disme base ta stoikheia tes diethnous omospondias gia to diabete ekatommuria anthropon se olo ton kosmo paskhoun apo diabete ki alla ekatommuria einai se kinduno na anaptuxoun to nosemamas delonei oti se ena biblio pou ekhei ste bibliotheke tou ten istoria tes maphias oso ki an epsaxe den breke para mono ena onoma ellena egklematia anamesa se apeira onomata phusika kurios italikaas exetasoume ek neou te dutikopherte zoe mas sten akte tsamakia sten arkhe tou kalokairiou o kosmos pernaei mesa sten plaz khoris na pleronei eisiterioautokritike ekane o baggeles argures gia to arnetiko apotelesma stis periphereiakes eklogestriton ikanopoiountai oi exothen phoreis oi opoioi me megale piese e kai phortikoteta tha elega othousan te demotike arkhe sten katedaphise dioti eperasan ten gramme pou ethelan kai uperaspizanprotos sten alexandroupole maurotopos o deuteros sto didumoteikho didumoteikho o tritos sto souphli mega rema kai o tetartos sten orestiada ampelia upsomatameta skoupiste to m ena paniedo xekina kai e peripeteia maski ante tora na kheis skhinous me mastikhi apo kato tous pou den to kheis mazepsei akoma olo kai na parakalas na me brexei kai sto pareiekptose dinetai gia to diastema apo eos apriliou anexartetos emeromenias ekdoses ton eisiterionalloste gia auto ton skopo
