kai suzeteitai entona sten panepistemiake koinoteta kai okhi mono aphora ten kathusterese ston diorismo ton eklegmenon melonanaphora tou ste romaike periodo dinei aphorme gia periskepse pano sten pseudepigraphe buzantine autokratoria kai sto politismiko keno sto opoio orthotheke to elleniko ethniko kratosmia teleutaia mou anakalupse proekupse apo ton peiramatismo mou me mia alle mia kai monadike phusika suntage ten opoia edose stous taims tou londinou o upokomes posel apo to farmers clubuperkhe exormese pou mono se mia mera episkeptomastan kai europaikes proteuousesalloste demokratia kai theatro pane mazi kheraki kherakime auto to skopo eimaste edo gia na ergastoume kai na eimaste apotelesmatikoime poia istorike prosopikoteta tautizeste perissotero me tonkuklos ergasion tes etairias diamorphotheke sta ekat enanti ekatplenete taktika ta katharistika pania giati otan einai bregmena boethoun ten exaplose bakteridionto ekhoume kanei kai sto parelthon alloste gia ton katharismo ton arkhaiologikon khoron me megale epitukhiatha to xanaodegeso aphou einai ergaleio tes douleias mou skholiazeibionoume tis sunepeies tes krises kai o kosmos ekhei kourastei n akouei logia apaitei apo emas praxeis pou na einai apotelesmatikes pou tha tou dieukolunoun ten kathemerinoteta tou pou tha tou dinoun diexodous sta pases phuseos problemataena allo diasemo steki to water house to opoio diathetei polu kale skhese poiotetastimes einai malista diasema ta organika mprizolakia tou brisketai se eidulliako semeio sto potami kai kanei khrese tes udroelektrikes energeiasoi dromoi apo kato ekhoun khoma oi rizes tes aimorragoun ma epimenounparadose kai geuseis e pallesbiake enose ionias kai erakleiou attikes tha dosei xana to paron stis ekdeloseis pou diorganonei o demos ionias delade stis ionikes meres politismou kai paradosesakome ena meros tou posou tou daneiou o demos lemnou to proorizei gia sugkekrimenes parembaseis ameses proteraiotetas ston tomea tes udreuses kai tes kathariotetasde ekmathese khoron se sunduasmo me te mousike kai to tragoudi theoreito zotikes semasias sten ekpaideuse prin apo khiliades khronia sten arkhaia elladasto isogeio kuriarkhoun to krem ta xulina patomata kai ta epipla apo maoni me pinelies apo kokkino tes riojaulika akrilika xulo beloudo mikta ulikasunantese oloklerotheke se philiko klima kai ta mele tesgia ten periptose aute e uperesia tha ekhei kai ten koinopoiese tes adeias ergasias apo te nomarkhiake autodioikeseprokeitai gia ena apo ta megalutera oikonomika skandala pou sugklonisan ten kretekoboun kata to merisma tou makhairi mpeke sto merisma ton dikaioukhon tou metokhikou tameiou stratou kai auxanontai kata oi krateseis stous axiomatikous pou einai eggegrammenoi se autoeutukhia akros logike kathos to na rikhneis stoauto semainei pleres ereuna kai sto israel kai sten tourkiaakome oi kreopoles den mporoun na kanoun sapheis ektimeseis gia to pou tha kinethei e time tou obeliagrothia stomakhi to kalokairi tou episkephtheka te rouanta me tous giatrous khoris sunorato noseleutiko prosopiko summetekhei energa ste meleteteleutaios ekhei protase apo ton gia sumbolaio me tis idies axiologes apodokhes me tis perusines ostoso protima te metagraphe sten akome kai me ligotera khrematato kalokairi tha kanoun periodeia sten ellada paizontas metaxu allon to mistero mpoupho tou ntario phose periodous oikonomikes krises e katathlipse aplonei ta diktua tes se oles tis epaggelmatikes kategoriesto renault clio ta pegainei ligo kalutera apo to sto kephalaio tes aposbeses kradasmon me pleres phortio omos me pleroma ena eos duo epibates usterei elaphra apenanti stous duo antagonistes touopos kanoume me ta krasia masana metokheprote prokeruxe tha ginei meso tou kuliomenou pinaka katataxes kai aphora ten plerose theseon taktikou prosopikou oi opoies tha kenothoun kurios apo suntaxiodoteseis ergazomenon se nosokomeia kai kentra ugeiasmousika gkroupakia se peiramatiko stadio dokimazoun nees suntheseis to poto reei astamateta ki oi arkhika agnostoi tou khorou katalegoun na ginoun to epikentro tes bradiassuntaxe eideseon panos kapogiannes pempte iouliou pempte iouliou purkagia khthes ora ste these mpampes skillountias demou andritsainas krestenon ekapse strgiati an den ten deixoun tote khamenoi tha einai kai oi idioi kai o topos toustha anamenete epomenos na allaxei kati gia na prokhoresei aute e upothese danelles dunameis politikes kai koinonikes uparkhouneisegese katapsephisteke mono apo tous giorgo palle kai strate alexiouetan o protos pou egrapse se disko ton erotokrito kategrapse ton kretiko gamo kai te makhe tes kretesprin apo khronia etan e omada ton pou anekan sten parataxe karaphotia kai diamarturontan gia themata dioikeses kai diakheirises tes demotikes exousiastropopoiese aphora sten ektakte dromologese tou ploiousuntaktes gregores poulopoulos ekthese eikastikon ste demotike pinakotheke pempte iouniou pempte iouniou sunekhizetai e parousiase mias neas enotetas ergon apo te monime sulloge tes demotikes pinakothekes kalamatasgia mise peripou ora apekleisan sumbolika to teloneio kakabias oi benzinopoles tou nomou ioanninon to mesemeri tes kuriakes sta plaisia kinetopoieses kai se alla teloneiaskhediasmos mas den exartatai mono apo ena paikhnidi e apo ti tha sumbei ton septembriose analoge trokhia brisketai kai e agrotike e opoia khreiazetai peripou ekattha thelame na doume entonotere piese apo ta enomena ethne apo ten diethne koinoteta ste suria gia mia demokratike metabase prostheseoi tezkiredes outoi periekhousi tas praxeis kai ta gegonota ta diagraphomena eis to arthronto katopin energeion mou dinei kai pairnei sten taktike tou neou bouleute k phraggideto ena tou k mikhale alugizake brisketai sten kallithea sapphous tel kai to deutero oi kreton geuseis sto pagkrati philolaou kai empedokleous telk manoles belgakes delose uperephanos gia tis kretikes nautiliakes etaireies pou dekhontai epitheseis kai delose oti tha uperpsephisei k khrestos khondrakes eipe pos kati krubetai piso apo ton polemo auto kai milese gia polu sklero antagonismo sto aigaioto menuma pou epheran sten athena sumphona me ta mele tes ekei omadas epikoinonias einai to dikaioma mas sten eirenike diadeloseprokeitai gia mia binteokamera me ten opoia oi empeiroi tha arkhisoun na paragoun me anese poiotiko uliko apo tagiati oso megalutero khroniko diastema paramenoun ta trophima auta ektetheimena stis pseles thermokrasies tes kouzinas toso megaluteros einai o kindunos na pollaplasiastoun pathogonoi mikroorganismoi se epipeda pou mporoun na prokalesoun trophodeleteriaseprokeitai gia mia neuralgike these sten opoia den uperkhan polles axiopistes luseis kai pleon me ten apoktese tou zapropoulou e amuna iskhuropoieitai se megalo bathmonearos pheretai na arnetheke enopion tes anakritrias tis kategories kai na edose ten dike tou exegese gia ta kataskhethenta ulikakornarou mekhri marogiorge thessalonikes apo kurillou loukareos mekhri maurogiorge apo bikela mekhri pledo einai apotupomene ole e mizeria ole e dustukhia olos o ponos tou asemantou ellenasumphona me to programma statherotetas kai anaptuxes oi proslepseis anapleroton tha meiothoun kata den anamenetai delade na proslephthoun perissoteroi apo ekpaideutikoito sugkekrimeno montelo den apokleietai na apotelei ton proaggelo tou epomenou ranger enos montelou pou kuklophorei ste khora mas ta teleutaia khronia toso ste monokampine ekdokhe oso kai ste diplokampinekathe sullogos einai ekeinos pou khreiazetai na analabei drasemporeite mekhri kai te lexe tes psephophorias na apeuthuntheite ston demo prokeimenou na sas khoregesei pistopoietiko eggraphes sta demotologia kai na psephisete se opoiodepoteotan tha anoixei to khorotaxiko tha akousoume kai saphesteres topotheteseis plen autes tou demarkhou anatolikou zagoriou kata tou eniaiou demou gia olo to zagoriarthro koine ereunetike yperesia tha idruthei koine ereunetike yperesia pou tha perilambanei astunomiko prosopiko proerkhomeno apo to koino kratos kai ta sustatika krate pou tha anapheretai sto geniko eisaggeleabiologon orizetai e khemeiaoi parastaseis tou ergou tha xekinesoun sta mesa iouliou kai tha diarkesoun duo peripou menesekei sugkentrothekan perissoteres apo kallones prokeimenou na diekdikesoun ton titlo tes oraioteres gunaikas se olo ton kosmoden apokleietai e sugkrotese tes apostoles na perilambanei ekplexeis aphou e etta apo ten kallithea isos pherei allages eno these ste kai isos ten diekdikoun kai oi moskhogiannes dentsasperusi anakinesame to thema elthe epi topou o proistamenos tes o demarkhos arkalokhoriou ka kai perame ten apantese oti to olo thema tha xanameletetheisto katharo apotelesma tes etaireias perilambanetai to sunoliko kerdos apo ten apotimese tes etaireias hellenic seaways upsous ekateinai krima na spatalame khrono se prosopikes antiparatheseisepises programmatizei na parei meros ton augousto se diethne ekthese ste germaniaduo diadokhikes sunedriaseis pragmatopoiese to bradu tes deuteras apriliou to demotiko sumboulio kerkurasproen upourgos exoterikon eukharistese tous neodemokrates pou summeteikhan ste diadikasia kai eipe oti epikoinonese me ton k samara kai ton sunekhare gia ten ekloge tou opos kai me ton k psomiade gia ton agona touma kala o gorilas na einai latres tou fridayssten pragmatikoteta prokeitai gia skholeia paidophulakteria opou prota apophasizetai e diarkeia leitourgias tous kai meta kaluptetai to periekhomeno tous me oti prokupseinomarkhes ksanthes k giorgos paulides skhetika delose sten duskole oikonomike sugkuria kai tis meres tou paskha as protimesoume oloi mas ten topike agora tes ksanthes kai ta proionta tesme base tis sumbaseis kai me exeidikeuse gia kathe autokinetodromo to demosio tha eisprattei meso ton ergolabon apo to eos kai to tou antitimou tou diodioueidika tous khortophagous den tous antekhei me tipota tous theorei megistous upokriteserot k proedre theoreite oti o kosmos einai eparkos enemeromenos apant uparkhei o ethnikos organismos metamoskheuseon pou edreuei sto geniko kratiko tes athenaspane oi bouleutes kai adeiazoun ta kapheneiaperiodos pou etan uphupourgos etan e duskolotere giati eprepe tautokhrona na einai kai sten athena kai ste khio konta sta paidia tes kai tous khiotesgia ena zetema pou aphora apokleistika sten ethnike oikonomia kai malista ton pio neuralgiko tomea tes semera ton tourismoekei tha doume tous dikaious tou nompelista almper kami me thema ten ethike tes tromokratiasnomos mas summetekhei ste diorganose me duo omilous to mutilenes kai to lemnou pou stokheuoun ste diakrise ste semantike aute diorganoseten epikheirese suntonize o periphereiakos dioiketes k melakesto ploio tou kameroun monica dekhtheke epithese guro stis ora elladossta sumperasmata tes ereunas anagnorizetai oti einai duskolo na antistraphei suntoma e arnetike poreia ton pragmatonkoines onomastikes metokhes kai pronomioukhes onomastikes metokhes onomastikes axias euro e kathe miasemeionetai oti apo ta mekhri stigmes stoikheia prokuptei oti sta programmata tou ethnikou ktematologiou pou briskontai se exelixe upoblethekan sunolika deloseis idioktesias apoto endiapheron ton italon emporon estiazetai se mikres posotetes parthenon kai ligon extra parthenon elaioladon me polu kala organoleptika kharakteristikapoia einai e eikona pou ekhete apokomisei eseis gia te leitourgia ton uperesion einai ikanopoietike uparkhei sostos elegkhos kai suntonismos tes drases ton uperesion apo te nomarkhiake arkhe auto einai ena polu megalo zetemaakoma ki an ta crus molis pou arkhizoun na pairnoun olumpiakon agonon touustera mperdepsame ti semainei proastiakos siderodromos kai siderodromos upselon takhutetonto melos tou suntonistikou tou sto proto entos edras paikhnidi esto kai ston agio nikolao etan nikephoro gia ton korpho elountas pou nikese to minotauroto ntami tes tserkezas panta tha menei ste mneme tou laou mas san ena thusiasterio tes leuteriasnearos asos tou olumpiakou teleutaio tes kharti eno o ares xerei oti akoma mia apoleia bathmon tha ton aphesei makria apo ten pentadaousia etan allouempeiria asullepte pou gemizei ten psukhe kai stegnonei ta kheileepises staurou arnaoutake eurobouleute stis emeres mas e biosime anaptuxe tes upaithrou apotelei enan apo tous kurioterous stokhous politikes tes europaikes enosesomos e suneisphora tes kretikes antistases kintanazetese epipleon stoikheia gia to ergo kai tonise oti to thema thelei megalutere diereuneseerotese tha ethela na mou peite me aphorme ten ekdelose pou parabriskeste alla kai genikotera stis diasemotero isos phageto pou ta periekheikai gia to logo auto den tha stamatesoun monomias oi tourkikes prokleseis sto aigaio me te morphe ton parabaseon ton kanonon enaeriou kuklophorias sten periokhe athenon e ton parabiaseon tou ethnikou enaeriou xorouden etan oute tote oute phainetai kai argotera e katokhike parousia tes tourkias sto nesi to problema alla e kupriake demokratia pou askouse kai askei ta kuriarkhika tes dikaiomatasemera o k kontos tha parakhoresei sunenteuxe tupou kai tha anapherthei diexodika sto themamilontas sta ertziana apo tis phulakes naupliou opou krateitai o akhekhoume pleon ten poluteleia tou khronouuposkhese gia matia pou tha gualizoun kalemera se olous tous philous tes stelesapo edo xekinesa ten kariera mou os paiktes kai thelo na sas eukharisteso mesemeri otan kapoia stigme parousiasteke entone sunallaktike drasteriotetamia alle opse tes biopoikilotetas to biblio auto tha sas pherei se epaphe me ten paradosiake gnose gia phuta opos aute diamorphotheke sta nesia tou boreioanatolikou aigaioumpala phtanei ston bermpakophskis pou omos den pianei kala to soutapo te mekhri tora leitourgia tes bibliothekes semeionetai oti to endiapheron pou ekhoun epideixei oi mathetes tou skholeiou ta paidia ekhoun idiaitere protimese sta logotekhnika biblia muthistoremata poieseopos kai to gegonos oti edeixe pio gregoros apo oti ton perimenamekhora pou den tima tous nekrous testis teleutaies meres ekhoun zetesei stoikheia apo te demotike arkhe kai oi upopsephioi demarkhoi tsompikos kai badeboules eno o demarkhos tzapheas uposkhetheke stous katoikous na apanteseias analogistoume oti eidika auten ten periodo kathe phiale aimatos einai polutimean brethei khoros giati einai gnosto to problema pou uparkhei me te skholike stege tha dothei e dunatoteta kai me ton phlebarake na ta akouei apo ton proto atzente tou paikteparallela uposterixe oti to paradeigma pou dinoun oi bouleutes kai oi trapezites stous neous proothei ten aplestia ten anethikoteta kai tou ntaniel tsezarek tha pragmatopoiethei stis sten aithousa tupou tou kleanthes bikelidesmalista ena pleroma kalese to demarkho na men toto katharo apotelesma meta apo phorous parousiase zemies upsous ekatoi perissoteroi louphaxan ste these tous perimenontas te sunekheiaaxizei na semeiothei oti se enan ek ton upologiston uperkhan ola ta logistika stoikheia tou sundesmouoloi khorane oudeis mporei na amphiballei gia ten axia tou iakouintapkh poia einai e politike e dianoetike paragogikoteta oi apodoseis ton eurobouleutonena semantiko de meros ton eidon pou kalliergountai biologika exagetai kurios ste germania te gallia ten ollandia sto belgio stis sten australia kai te korea phernontas ste khora sunallagma ekatproanakrise gia te dialeukanse tou adikematos sunekhizetaito deuterobathmio organo tes to opoio sugkrotoun oi leontiou proedros athproen pleon paiktes tou olumpiakou eikhe zetesei o idios na upoblethei se elegkho ntopingk meta tous dialogous me ton make psomiade pou eikhan to phos tes demosiotetas kai ek tou apotelesmatos dikaiotheketitlos spoudon apoluterio lukeiou e exataxiou gumnasiou e isotimou skholeiou meses ekpaideuses tou esoterikou e exoterikoukai na antistekesai etsi oso mporeis se auto pou elege o gkaite to gerasma einai e bathmiaia apokhorese apo te demosia emphaniseekhoun mathei na sunenoountai me tis ekphraseis sta prosopa kai ta kheriaoi summetekhontes eikhan ten eukairia na episkephtoun axiotheata opos to mouseio kerinon omoiomaton brelle to nesaki tes kuraphrosunes sten limne pambotida kai na perpatesoun sta graphika dromakia tes polesma einai pragmata auta eleosetsi einai bebaio oti telika tha entakhthei se kapoio apo ta stratopeda me pithanotero ekeino tes ntoras mpakogianneauto zetame kai gia auto tha agonistoume giati einai krima mia semantike douleia pou ekhei ginei edo kai anagnorizetai diethnos na agnoeitai apo tous phoreis tes ellenikes politeias tonise o k oikonomousumphona me ton idio katastraphekan oi upaithries kalliergeies akhresteuthekan ta thermokepia kai ta elaiodentraekeine te stigme liges khiliades anthropoi sto boreio niou tzersei eidan sten kalodiake tous teleorase tous buggles sto video killed the radio star to proto binteoklip pou paikhteke stoste sugkhronike kateuthunse entassetai to theatro e mousike o khoros e logotekhnia alla kai draseis koinonikou aktibismou periballontikes parembases kai sumparagoges me to demo thessalonikes kai ta demetriatrite augoustou mia polu endiapherousa ekthese egkainiasteke prokhthes deutera to apogeuma sto khoro tes photographikes etaireias mutilenesdiaskhisame ta kampokhorapha stamatesame gia arkhaiologiko peripato stous philippous kai to baptisterio tes ludias kai molis perasame ten adriane to eidame anoteroteta tes kai ten edra kai ephtase aneta sten telike epikratese me skor se baros tou antipalou tesdidaxei einai pos e idia den epidiokei na kerdisei ton prigkipa thelei mono na zesei mia omorphe bradiaepises meso prokhorei kai e kataskeue skholeion kathos o organismos skholikon kterion ekhei demiourgesei katalogo ergon sunolikou proupologismou peripou ekatkuklike mas poreia tha ginei me base to kataphugio tou ellenikou oreibatikou sundesmou athenon kataphugio mpaphi pou einai ktismeno s enan exoste pano apo te kharadra tes khounestimetike ekdelose gia ta khronia apo to thanato toustoikheia ta opoia ekhoun kai auta to diko tous endiapheron stis euroekloges tou psephisan atoma ligoteroi se skhese me tis ethnikes ekloges touste duskole oikonomika sugkuria gia ten pleiopsephia ton ellenikon noikokurion kai etous stokhous tous kathorizei e dioikese kai o proponetespalia epipla kai antikeimena phermena apo kathe semeio tes ges euriskan te these tous se kapoia goniapoios einai o sugkhronos rolos tou organote sunedrion allazei autos o rolos aphou polles megales enoseis pleon apophasizoun esoterika gia ola ta themata ton ekdeloseon pou tha pragmatopoiesoun kai auto einai mia tase pou eniskhuetaipithanotata o philosophos gnorise ton bretano epistemona diamesou enos koinou philou arkhaiologou sto kempritz tou tsarls balntstainmisos aionas adialeiptes demiourgiassemantike nea aphixe ena mouseio me khoro gia sunaulies to casa do fado e da guitarra portuguesa sta riza tes sunoikias alfamaaurio tha pao ston giatro tha mou grapsei mia oraiotate suntage gia eremistika kai tha kano oti den gnorizo pos pareisephrese to keimeno ste steleean o paiktes arnethei ten eleuthere metagraphe tote automata to endiapheron tou anekei stis moires kai sunepos prepei na ginoun diapragmateuseis kai me ten omada toudemetres diamantides krataei psela to mpasket o nikos gkales ektoxeuse oloklero ton elleniko athletismo okhi mono ena athlemasta ekatsta sun tes omadas einai kai e kaute edra tou linto pou mporei na tous metamorphosei pros to kalutero kai tous antipalous pros to kheiroterooi aphixoanakhoreseis anelthan se enanti toubolibia apokhairetese te diorganose me molis bathmo isopalia me argentinegia na me sumbei auto tha prepei na ekhoume os pharo os odego ta menumata tes makhes tes kretes ta menumata pou stelnei o astrateutos makhetes ta menumata pou stelnoun oi agones ton kreton kai ton ellenon genikotera mesa stous aionesauto to skhedio drases kalei gia ependuseis se idiotikes epikheireseis pou tha phtasoun to poso ton ekatommurion dollarion apo ta opoia eketsi kai ton pou an kai ekhane sto megalutero diastema tou agona apo tonkholargo breke to kouragio sto telos na parei te nike sto rethumno meorismenes apo tis uperesies mas ekhoun diaphoretikes diadikasies gia ten prosbase diorthose e diagraphe ton prosopikon stoikheion ton khrestonto de deigma nerou pou proskomisame ste khanion stis gia mikrobiologike exetase bretheke apolutos kanonikopege se mia ekdelose me ten kommatike tou idiotetaomos sto teleutaio lepto e tourkia ekane mono mia epitheseto proino de gemato kaloudiabelides tha parakalousame na men khresimopoieite greeklish kathos e automate mekhane kobei tous agglikous kharakteres opos kai tis prosbletikes lexeisostoso to treno tes kuberneses papandreou ekhei epibradunei se bathmo pou eukola na bazei kaneis ena podi sto edaphos na pegainei mia bolta na skeptetai megalophonos e akoma kai na xanaanebainei sto bagonita apotelesmata tes ereunas prokeitai na parousiastoun sto diethnes sunedrio phusikes agoges pou tha pragmatopoiethei sten komotene apo tis eos tis maiouepistrophe sten europe me nike ustera apo khronia apousias gia te stoouk siti esto ki an me to euthrausto entos edras se baros tes khaintouk splitarkhise e katathese ton deloseon molis tis teleutaies meres puknose o kosmos stis tou hrakleiou gia ten katathese ton phorologikon deloseon meta ten deutere akome kai trite paratase ton prothesmionk kostopoulos einai kata metokhos tes akineta eno to to katekhei e k poluxene mpalatsinouokhi gia to kako skholeio tou oute gia ton kako mistho tou patera tousto idio mekos kumatos kai ta logia tes tekhnikes egesiasopos delose o mike morhaime tes blizzard to cataclysm tha prospherei stous paiktes ten eukairia na exereunesoun gia mia akome phora ton kosmo tou azeroth eno tha biosoun to paikhnidi m enan teleios diaphoretiko troposta egkainia pareurethe kai o gianneles o opoios eipen oti epikoinonouse telephonika me ton bambourelle agria kharamata gia themata pou aphorousan ten proodo sunekheia o mentoungianin apetukhan na skoraroun apo kontaola auta me sigouriaskephtomai oti se auton ton agona o niketes tha einai toso gumnos kai toso bromikos pou akoma kai oi aulikoi tou tha anametrethoun se statika kai dunamika agonismatakairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia paraskeue iouliou khreosto etos leitourgei xenodokheiako sugkrotema me ten eponumia sten topothesia drapanos kai etta alla kurios to ti tha ginei aurioekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous katharioteta khreiazetai to oureterio sto limani ekei pou pleurizoun ta porthmeia pros kerkura leukime kai paxousskhetike touoi boltes kheri kheri sto kampielo den bgainoun pote apo to prosopiko mas ton erotikon peripaton ana ta ellenika nesiaphobos tes ragdaias epektases tes europaikes krises khreous se italia kai ispania skiazei tous europaious egetesapo te mia oi prasinoi den eikhan kouragio na panegurisoun apo ten alle den thelesan na rixoun ki allo ladi ste photiame ta logia auta e genike grammateas periphereias epeirou demetra georgakopouloumpasta keruxe ten enarxe ton ergasion tes protes sunanteses ton etairon tou diakratikou ergou pou pragmatopoietheke sta gianninaperiphragmenos arkhaiologikos khoros periekhei ena apo ta semantikotera kai arkhaiotera megala iera tou nesiouapantontas se eroteseis tes oi epikephales tes omospondias delonan khthes proedros stathes phragkiadakes tha eimaste ikanopoiemenoi mono otan phthasei sta katastemata tes e egkuklios me ten eidike ruthmise ton ampelourgikon khreonotan arkhisa na askholoumai me ten ktenotrophia e paragoge khresimopoiouse epies methodous kai ta zoa megalonan me tropous pou den apeikhan polu apo tis phusikes tous epilogeskatanoesa kai ten prothese tes idioktetrias tou katastematosas mas epistrepsoun toulakhiston ta daneia pou peran tote gia na pistepsoume oti allaxan nootropia diaphoretika phobou tous danaous kai dora pherontes se adiexodo e agrotike anaptuxe tes epeirou euksenodokheio me stountio souites pisina saouna khamam gumnasterio kai gepedo tenisme auta katarrakose to stul tou aiona alla kai uponomeuse ta exoterika gnorismata tes aristokratias ten opoia kataphere entelei na aloseigia te khora e odos einai arketa dusbate kathos briskomaste se ena apo ta khamela semeia tes trokhias masekprosopos anephere oti sto plaisio tes suzeteses gia ten anatheorese tou suntagmatos tha antimetopistoun ola ta sunaphe themata kai prosthese oti den prokeitai prin apo aute ten suzetese e boule na askholethei me opoiodepote skhetiko themato elleimma tou emporikou isozugiou anelthe se ekeinai ora pia e dioikese kai e dieuthunse tes enoses khanion alla kai e politeia oi topikoi bouleutes o nomarkhes to ergatiko kentro oloi na analaboun tis euthunes tous gia na me brethoun ston dromo oikogeneiessten xakouste plateia tes tha breite polles tabernes gia zoumera pseta kokoretsia alla kai phtiakhtes pites duotria magazakia me paradosiaka proionta ki ena paliako kapheneio to panellenion opou phagame oraio mpaklaba me oloklera karudiaskheseis oikogeneiakes aristo klima lumena ola ta problemata apo te dioikese exupnos proponetes kai ikanos periphereiakoi paiktes photia axiologoi xenoi paiktes me philodoxies kai arketes enallaktikes luseistha anamenoume kai tha epanelthoumeden thatan pio euupolepto gia na mathoume kai to kainourio onomataki mas loulou matie gkaspar e apla mpampes kai marigo ten agapane polu kastro pou khtisteke pote kai e kataskeue tou epibletheke apo te khrese tes puritidas tou exupnou oplou tes epokhesule tou programmatos autou sumphona me anakoinose tou institoutou ekhei oloklerothei se sunergasia me ta proanapheromena idrumata kai tha ekdothei upo morphe duo didaktikon biblion pou tha einai diathesima ste diethne agora apo to erkhomeno akademaiko etoskhoris na khasei khrono metephere to basiko menuma pros olous ste na kinethoun dunamika pros to skhematismo kuberneses se kratiko epipedoetsi san semera to e ellada tetheke ousiastika upo diethne oikonomiko elegkho logo adunamias pleromon kerussontas ousiastika ptokheusediaitetes tes anametreses tha einai oi stauropoulos kouretassemeionetai pos oi ellenes tou exoterikou gia na theorethoun os upopsephioi ton tha prepei na upobaloun tis aiteseis tous to argotero eos tis iouliouola ta alla pou apophasisthekan dustukhos epiteinoun to problema mas apoteloun eukhologia kai metathetoun to olo problema khronika se khrono pou dustukhos tha katastesoun ten ellada upokheirio ton tokogluphonos to semantikotero problema tes poles axiologoun ten ten kai ten epharmoge tou skhediou gia to nomo theoroun os semantikotero problema tis te biomekhanike kai to aerodromioto problema kai to dustukhema sten periptose mas den suntrekhei tipota apo ta parapanosunekhizei na proselkuei to endiapheron xenon apo olo ton kosmo e lesbos kathe kalokairi anaphorika me to problema ton metanaston kai te leitourgia tou kentrou upodokhes tes paganesmporei na to eikhe sto piso meros tou mualou tou alla den to xestomisesto lepto o galakos ektelese to phaoul o orphanos sekotheke pselotera apo olous kai ekane tomanteuei kaneis posa khronia phulake tha mpoun autoi pou euthunontai gia ten ptose tou sinouk kanenasumphona me osa mas eipe o k ksenakes daneise prin duo menes ton dermitzake ekatommuria gia na agorasei autokinetaopos diapistoneis ki olous ekeinous tous mekhanismous koinonikou elegkhou ton mazon ton antimetopon okhi mono me ten oikonomike exathliose alla kai m ena kratos despotiko bathia diephtharmeno ki etoimo na pataxei kathe phone amphisbeteseskalokairine mas prosphora sunekhizetai kai kathos ten prote ebdomada den uperxe niketes e semerineto pragmatopoieitai e megale anadromike tou sten ethnike pinakotheke eno e idia ekthese egkainiase ton epomeno khrono ste thessalonike to kratiko mouseio sugkhrones tekhneskakos sundeoun auta ta themata pou einai anexartetaapo te deutera martiou tha xekinesei e katabole ton pronoiakon epidomaton opos anakoinose to tmema koinonikes pronoias tou demou agriniouanakoinose to phono ton paidion toustokhos mou arkhika na eukharistetho ton agona kai meta na prospatheso gia to kaluteroopos leei oi sunetairismoi ekhoun ede enemerothei kai ta entupa anamenetai na ekhoun upographei mekhri ten trite e tetartesten kategoria ton neon to khruso metallio katektese o khrestos pephanesgia phageto semeioste to phinetsato ostria pou serbirei exairetikes pites mageireuta kai plousies drosistikes salates alla kai ten aple psarotaberna poseidonasoi duskolies arkhisan otan to elleimma tou den ekleise sto alla sto logo tes upseloteres apheterias tou elleimmatos to opoio etan kata polu upselotero tou problepomenouopos anapherei sten anakoinose tes e me kubernetike euthune sunekhizetai e katastrophike epharmoge tou pou odegei se apognose ola ta laika noikokuria kai sto xepoulema ton demosion koinonikon agathonedo kai polu kairo akoume tous upeuthunous apo to nosokomeio mutilenes na delonoun oti einai ta panta etoima gia mia endekhomene pandemia tes neas gripes sto nesiksanthe kalei olous tous persinous katokhous diarkeias anexartetos kartas na ananeosoun tis kartes melous eos tistetarte phebrouarios okeanographiko tou panepsten agglike eparkhia pantos leitourgei plethos demosion panepistemion me kuros kai apekheseallos enas adunamos krikos tes eurozoneskata ten autopsia pou egine apo ten omada tes den diapistothekan ikhne e semadia traumatismou tou zoouelleniko kalokairi kai erotiko lexiko tes elladas ekdparea tou o grammateas tes periphereias giannes lekkasmutilenios epithetikos perase xana ston agonistiko khoro sten epanalepse pio eremos ekhontas thetike apodosepisteuo para polu gregora tha epharmostei den pairnoume piso aute ten politike mas gia praktikous logous den eimaste se these na ten epharmosoume aurio to proi alla tha eimaste suntoma etoimoi na kanoume praxe auto pou exaggeilame katelexe e k tsileetan e kalutere klerose pou tha mporousame na ekhoume omos auto den semainei pos autes oi omades tha einai eukolesepitelous to paradekhtekanten teleutaia khronia o agonas kata ton narkotikon parousiazei mia adraneia san na men askholeitai kaneiskai to apophasise o metropolites mas kai katephorize se takta pleon diastemata sten athena gia na mporoun oi khiliades ton orthodoxon khristianon ana ton kosmo kai tha exegeso giati to grapho auto na parakolouthoume kathe kuriake to arkhontarikiuparkhoun polu kaluteres tainies pou to axizoun kata te gnome moualekos pharmakes rotese me noema giati apo paragkes perusi kai stokho to ekapeuthunetai ston proedro arkalokhoriou makhairianake nikolao kai tou anapherei ten prothese tou germanikou phrourarkheiou erakleiou gia ten anoruxe pegadiou sto arkalokhori to takhuteroskoteinoteros planetes pou ekhei anakaluphthei os semera ektos tou eliakou sustematos anakla ligotero apo to tou photos pou pephtei pano tou auto semainei oti einai pio mauros ki apo karbouno diapistonoun ekplektoi amerikanoi astronomoime apla logia o demos ioanniton pou ekhei entono endiapheron gia to ruthmistiko den askholetheke kai eprepe na ta kanei e pou ekhei diaphoretiko rolo en meso eklogon kai me to nomarkhiako sumboulio na ekhei anabalei gia meta tis eklogespolles phores e these ton kubernetikon bouleuton otan malista einai eisegetes se nomoskhedia opou uparkhoun diaphonies akome kai sunadelphon tous me tous opoious kathontai dipla dipla sta edranata epeisodia arkhisan pente lepta prin to telos tou megalou ntermpi tou gkanezikou protathlematospsela o pekhes tou politismou stis giortes palias polessten ekdelose tha paroun meros e philarmonike tou demou dj kai to sugkrotema diese tou mpitzarakete melete tha prologisei o genikos dieuthuntes tou giannes stournaraseniskhuei ten parousiase tes sten kupro e aegean airlines kaluptontas ten ellada me dromologia gia to nesi tes aphrodites apo exi poleis kai te sundese tes kuprou me londino kai parisiapo ekei kai pera xekina kai ena eukharisto basano gia tous goneis auto tes anazeteses spitiou pou tha stegasei tous neous phoitetespolitismos me khthesine apophase tou upourgou politismou kai tourismou paulou geroulanou to etos kerukhteke os etos domenikou theotokopoulou me aphorme te sumplerose eton apo to thanato tou megalou ellena zographousto thema tha anapherthei semera se sunenteuxe tupou kai o demarkhos k aslanes pou anamenetai na exegesei giati o demos zetese te nea paratase ton exi menonapeuthunetai se ola ta uposustemata kai tis mikres kai megales omades tes koinonias ten oikogeneia to skholeio te geitonia me teliko stokho ten proagoge tes psukhikes ugeias tou neou kai tou paidiouto thema tora einai pos e khora tha antimetopisei ten kriseenas kalos daskalos tonizei opheilei kai prepei na askholeitai me tous mathetes tou entos kai ektos skholikou khoroume paraggelia ano to euro ekhete doro mia merida aloiphe tes epiloges sas e mia salata aggourontomata eno me paraggelia ano ton euro ekhete doro mia coca colaoso gia ten tainia aute kathaute poios noiazetai an einai sinema e logotekhnia tes khalkomanias os proion ekhei sigoures tis poleseis tou okhi mono gia phetos alla kai gia tis epomenes khroniesapodeiknuetai enas allos tzekil kai khaintpsukhotekhnike exetase perilambanei dokimasies gia te diapistose tes katallelotetas ton upopsephion na entakhthoun stis idiaiteres sunthekes tou stratou kai na stadiodromesoun se autonedose sumboules gia psukhraimia kai tonise oti ste demokratia den uparkhoun uparkhei arage suntage gia na ginei kapoios periphereiarkhes rotousa anthropo pou xerei kala ta pos kai ta giatisumphona me tis protes marturies oi drastes etan nearoi elikias eos eton kai milousan aptaista ellenikaekeino to semeio rotetheke an e kheironomia pros tous philathlous einai diapaidagogikou kharaktera kai tou apeuthuntheke e lexe ntrope sou opote kai apokhorese ekneurismenosepiloge eikonon kai epimeleia rizareion idruma idruma staurou niarkhou selsugkritika apotelesmata demotikon periphereiakon eklogon gia demo lesbou demo lemnou kai demo agproedros klerides dekhtheke ta diapisteuteria tou neou presbeute tes kroatias sten kupro me edra te rome ntragko kralgiebitsto skeniko stis teleutaies theseis tou bathmologikou pinaka allaxe kai mono o ethnikos meta ten etta tou ste beroia phainetai oti einai katadikasmenosantitheta me to na ginoun ola auta oi philoxenoumenoi apogoeteuthekan kai etsi elthe to deutero gkolphusexe ta dakhtula tou pere bathia anasa kai tis esteile stosten kateuthunse aute boetha aph enos e arse tou kampotaz oso kai e proselkuse aeroporikon etaireion khamelou kostous stous demophileis proorismous opos einai e krete ta dodekanesa kai ta ionia nesiakuria sumperasmata tes ektheses sumphona me ten ekthese paratereitai auxese tou arithmou ton emporeumaton pou einai upopta gia parabiase dikaiomaton pneumatikes idioktesiasopheiloume omos na kanoume ten omada na paizei opos prinakolouthoun pros ta kato to top kai to bottom sirloinste diarkeia tes khthesines suneleuses egine kai suzetese gia tis teleutaies exelixeis toso se kentriko politiko epipedo alla kai tis topikes exelixeis toso sto demo oso kai ste nomarkhia hrakleiouk panozakhos olo auto to khroniko diastema exasphalise mia protiamilame gia to gepedo tria khroniaapantese kalogianne se zarmpala ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous apantese kalogianne se zarmpala peran ton duo epimakhon thematon tou aerodromiou kai tes ionias odou o uphauxemenos kata etan kai o deiktes neon paraggelion ston kladosta theodoriana den tha ekhete polles epiloges oute sto phagetoten idia periodo o kuklos ergasion tou omilou anelthe se ekatexaponte nike gia palmasoi anademosieuseis sunekhizontai kai semera me demosieumata ste boulgaria opos tou sportkai oi treis upopsephioi einai politismenoi anthropoi xeroun pos mporoun na suzetesoun khoris na plegosoun ten parataxe khoris na plegosoun ten enotetamia armodioteta pou einai isos to upuarithmon ena problema tes khoraseinai omos parastatikotate gia na katadeixei ten askhemia kai to megethos tou egklematos tes akharistias kai na didaxei mikra paidiasto programma istoria latinikes amerikes e mathetria alike olgin e opoia katagetai apo te latinike amerike parousiase ten istoria tou topou tes kai tous megalous eroes tou opos ton simon mpolibar kai tse gkebarato egkheiridio tou teleiou mparman apo to epitimo melos ton anonumon alkoolikon antonetzabaraduo trapezes omos apophasisan na prokhoresoun se demosieuseis gnorizontas phusika oti oute autoi oi pleisteriasmoi tha ektelestounto phos tes elladas mou anoixe ta matia diaperase tous porous mou dieurune oloklere ten uparxe mou katelege sto biblio tou o milerpalaiotera uperkhan agonistika kai grapta testsaphos pio eukole apostole tha ekhei o panathenaikos o opoios tha upodekhthei sto olumpiako stadio ton ergotele kai logika tha prosthesei treis akome bathmous sto energetiko tou epibebaionontas ta prognostikakai nai men o ompama einai phabori alla na doume ti tha psephisoun oi amerikanoi ten teleutaia stigmeki auto giati opos se kathe eidos uperesion khoris te summetokhe tou polite e paragoge tes uperesias einai aploustata askopeparagei kai to diko tes theama pou merikes phores apodeiknuetai entuposiakotero apo ekeino tou agonistikou khorouakolouthos o k bouzas pareste ste giorte ton kunegon ste mousiotitsa kai to apogeuma episkephtheke diadokhika ton demon mpizaniou kai anatolespantos e epiloge autes tes arkhes kai tou telous ekhei skhese me to gegonos oti e ennoia tes odusseias san onoma einai sumbolike kai den empleketai me ten apolute diadrome tou odusseaapo ekei kai pera akougetai entona to onoma tou khare tsioka eno kapoioi den apokleioun na einai kai pali upopsephios o mekhri protinos periphereiarkhes dutikes makedonias giorgos kirkos alla kai o proen demarkhos agiou georgiou aggelos phrantzesean metatrepsei ten ellada semilontas stous demosiographous tonise oti to israel prepei na parapemphthei se dike gia egklemata polemouepi aitematos politistikou omilou kserolibadou gia sundiorganose ekdeloseonstolidia me geometrika skhemata kai maiandro diakosmetiko skhema me ises grammes pou strephontai guro apo to kentro suspeironontai se orthes gonies kai kuklikespolloi roma ste boulgaria o sunolikos arithmos ton opoion upologizetai pos uperbainei ta atoma se mia khora ekatommurion ekhoun dikaioma na laboun tetoiou eidous perithalpse alla den to khresimpoioun exaitias tes ellipous plerophoresesse elikia me eton ekhographese konserta tou tsaikophski kai tou mpetobenlanta kalummene me lepte ammo anamesa apo tis paralies tes makronesou kai nissi bay sten agia napata skholia ton perissoteron etan pros duo kateuthunseissemeionetai oti apo ten politike egesia tou upourgeiou georgiasekhei ede prokurekhthei kai e exisotike apozemiose gia toto skor anoixe sto o maragkoudakes me kontino plaseomala diexagetai e kinese ton okhematon apo tous sunoriakous stathmous tou ormeniou kai ton kepon sto nomo ebrouto embolio khoregeitai peiramatika kai se astheneis tou me diaphores morphes karkinou se prokhoremeno stadioellenas mesos eikhe agonistei kai sta paikhnidia pou eikhe dosei o thrulossto edolio omos tou kategoroumenou kathise mono o semera katsoules kathos e antistoikhe aitese gia te sugkategoroumene tou kai suzugo tou thumatos photara den eikhe ginei dektetritos orophos ta glupta tou parthenona lousmena se phusiko phos kai se apeutheias optike epaphe me ton arkhaio naokairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia tetarte augoustou se adiamphisbetete genoktonia aoplon diadeloton exelissetai autes tis krisimes ores e epembase ton tethorakismenon armaton tou mpasar asant ste marturike khama tes suriassuggrapheas pou theopoietheke apo ton sosialistiko realismo otan ta erga tou tsekhoph agnoountan epideiktika os deigmata astikou theatrou mporei na milesei sto semerino koino nomizo apolutaoikologike etaireia anakukloses ekhei proteinei na bgei to kharti apo tous mple kadous apotelei peripou to ton aporrimmaton kai na sullegetai khorista se enan epipleon kado ap opou tha pegainei kateutheian gia axiopoiese khoris dialogedelose khthes sten o giorgos soultatos metapherontas ousiastika ten apophase pou pere to na kratesei ton ogkounsoto toulakhiston mekhri to kalokairi sto martinegkore ti ginetai s aute te khorasten epharmoge parekhontai plerophories gia ola ta axiotheata sta khania ana istorikes periodous photographies kai keimena paralies mouseia taxidiotikes plerophories kai khartes anephere sta khaniotika nea o demiourgoszeta parallela ten sterixe apo tous neous tes periphereias prokeimenou mazi na diamorphosoun to mellon autou tou topouto na kerdisei me te balerengka ektos edras einai kati polu kalosten thrake metatithetai logo batopediou apo ten thessalonike o eisaggeleas phloridesti na kanoume pou ekpempame ede se sukhnoteta berte ostoso xekhorisame ton panagiote raphaelide pou tragoudese soloaute e diapistose apo mone tes tha mporouse na ermeneuthei os mia akoma ellenike monadikotetana doume bre panagiote an tha to thumountai otan einai se elikia na psephisounme ton tropo auto epitugkhanetai e ousiastike dieukolunse ton opheloumenon atomon os pros ten ensomatose tous sto energo ergasiaka anthropino dunamiko sumballontas sten anaptuxe tes oikonomias se mia koinonia ison eukairionanoixiatiko topio pou aikhmalotise o phakos tou nicholas economopouly ste lakonike sabbatokuriakou einai e karustos me to mpourtzi kai to kokkinokastro pselagia to kuklophoriako tou hrakleiou eipe pos tha prepei na uparxei amese arse tou metrou apagoreuses ton sto kentro tou hrakleiou ephoson demiourgethoun oi aparaitetes theseis parkingkto basiko problema semera einai to na katapheroun na apothekeusoun ten energeia pou paragetai apo tistous eukharisto apo ta bathe tes kardias mouan den mporoume na kratesoume anoikhta ta mouseia as stamatesoume na idruoume kainourgia e na perimenoume ap auta na sunterethoun mono apo ta eisiteriathumizoume pos sto parelthon o tsianakas se epokhes pou o idios alla kai oi sumpaiktes tou etan aplerotoi gia menes aperripse protase gnostes omadas tes ethnikes kai malista me kala lephtaoraia e diaskedase alla mekhri tis treis to proipara tis peri tou antithetou diabebaioseis ta spasmena tou proupologismou tha ta plerosoun kai pali ta koroida delade oi sunepeis phorologoumenoitrite augoustou duo neara adelphia pou mesa se mia nukhta pragmatopoiesan seira klopon sunelaban oi astunomikoiprepei na aisthanthoun oti uparkhei to ependutiko klima gia na elthouneuro enekrine to upourgeio anaptuxes sto plaisio tou programmatos germanoisemeionetai oti o giannes papadopoulos etan sten prote proponese tou thrulouepises summeteikhan sten katagraphe ton eidon tes phutikes blasteses tes rodiakes epaules kai sto katharismo tou thermokepioumeso diaphemistikes kampanias tes rodou sten istoselida tes etaireias ousiastika khrematodotouse ten pragmatopoiese pteseon tes ste rodo kai sten kose analoge stasimoteta briskontai kai oi upoloipes metagraphikes kineseis pou aphoroun tous antikatastates ton ntozier kai marsalalloi eidikoi tha milesoun kai milesan gia te skenike pragmatose tous sunergates tou papaioannou to mousiko periballon kai to kallitekhniko sugkekrimeno apotelesmato problema edo den einai mono e leia epiphaneia tes petras e tampela pou kharakteristika leei parakalo me phtunete den apotrepei entelei tous episkeptes apo ten paradosiake men enokhletike de sunetheiaaibaliotes delose semera penthei olos o ellenismos toso sten kupro alla kai opou allou uparkhoun ellenesmesos liges ores aphotou eluse to sumbolaio tou me ton ephtase sten athena kai upegrapse trietes sumbolaio me ton panathenaikomekhri tote ekho zetesei sto uparkhon prosopiko na einai polu austero kai na me daneizei polutima bibliaden ekhoume dei akome to phos sten arke tou tounel delose o oikonomologos tes invesco asset management giorgk kramerdaidalos parousiase entelos diaphoretiko prosopo kai pragmatopoiese te kheirotere phetine emphaniseapophase tou dikasteriou tha ekdothei argotera auto to menaoloi eimaste ten idia okhthe kai prospathoume na beltiosoume auta pou parekhoume tonise o k stathes kousournasmetsos to igkouana tou demophilous serial eisai to tairi mou phainetai oti ekhei ginei e sumpatheia megales meridas teletheaton ki auto apodeiknuetai apo tis poleseis igkouana sta katastemata katoikidion pou kanoun khruses douleies poulontas igkouanaara tha plerosoume sunolika perissoterous tokousta dase einai elakhistati eipe otan e ntora kai o souphlias eipan ston karamanle seko kai phuge gia na men grapsei e istoria oti epi ton emeron sou khreokopesameoti tha einai egklema oi ekloges kai oti o karamanles einai politikos megalou belenekousparuola auta pantos o tekhnikos ton protathleton den deikhnei na men einai eukharistemenos apo tous paiktes tou oute bebaia sekoneiileuke pesetato nemporio proteuousa tes khalkes diaterei ten arkhontike omorphia tou me ta graphika sokakia kai ten idiaitere arkhitektonike ton spition touetsi apla khoris na anarotethei o elithios pou ta aphese pos tha zesounta matia sou prepei na ekheis allios den uparkhei kamia soteriamethodos tsantsa gia tous ekhthrous oi anupotaktoi ithageneis tou ekouador einai apo tous elakhistous pou den ekkhristianistekan kai opou o magos tes phules diaterei ten egetike tou theseparallela e prepei na anaprosarmosei ton epikheiresiako tes skhediasmo prokeimenou na ginei protagonistes tes prasines anaptuxes axiopoiontas tis ananeosimes peges energeias kai tis nees tekhnologiesthetike etan kai e parousia tou khrestou spurou sten idia kategoria opou katetage ebdomossugkekrimene mikrokustine se upseles sugkentroseis ta epipeda tes kathorizei e egkumonei kindunous akome kai gia te demosia ugeia otan ta nera proorizontai gia udreuse eno demiourgei diatarakhes sten biopoikiloteta kai sto trophiko plegma tes limnesmia bourgia gemate me raki meli moustaleuria kai ena kretiko kentema etan mesaapo to opoio upopherame kai upopheroume adikos ego kai kapoioi sunaderphoi mou endekhomenosena mono epetukhe e kubernese me tis sobarotates paraleipseis tes na khasei pleon kathe ikhnos empistosunes kai axiopistias sto exoteriko opos mporei na diapistosei opoiosdepote suzetaei me stelekhe tes europaikes epitropes e europaikon organismonepeiros os pros ton ogko ton oikodomon brisketai sten tetarte these sto pososto meioses metaxu ton periphereion meisopalo to ntermpi sto aintkhophen pokerparagoge tou auxetheke kata sta ekattaberna aphese ten teleorase kai strapheke sten ephesiga me zetesei kaneis adeia apo opoiadepote arkhe otan prokeitai gia to sumpheron touta grapheia tes etaireias einai misthomena kai einai embadou tm ston aneto khoro opou stegazetai e etaireia diathetei xekhoristo meetingroom gia rantebou me pelatesgdusou kai boutexe khoris phobo ste zophere aletheia tou sumpantos khasou sten aperantosune tou okeanou ekei tha breis ten arkhe sto telosoi buzantinoi tautisan tous tsigganous me tous dikous tous airetikous kai miarous athigganous pou etan gnostoi gia ten enaskholese tous me te mageiaekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous ta kazania tou tsipourou peran photia se polles geitonies tou nomou masmlantits diepheuge te sullepse apo to otan kai tou apaggelthekan kategories gia ta gegonota tes sphages tes sremprenitsateleutaia enemerose sabbato iouliou tanakideto kerdos otan einai e anotere axia sten koinonia epereazei oles tis skheseis kai te drasterioteta ton anthropon o paragogos notheuei ta proiontakathe upopsephios tha labei meros se exetaseis pou tha dienergethoun ste skhole protes protimeses touto entuposiako stis kataggelies autes einai oti orismenes sunodeuontai apo eggrapha stoikheia opos apo arithmous sumbolaion arithmous pinakidon polutelon autokineton ktl pou aphesan ekplektous tous elegktesmporei na ekhei sten diathese tou ton serbo alla den tha ekhei ten sumparastase ton philathlon tou kathos o panionios arnetheke na khoregesei eisiteria sten omada tes thessalonikesto problema einai oti sukhna ston dromo ta kriteria ginontai polu epieikeektos apo tis sunethismenes elektrikes eukolies diathetei kai konsola me kentro plerophorion offroadoso gia ton dekhtheke to proto gkol sten edra tou kai mazi espase kai to seri ton nikon sto atsalenioston teleutaio malista anaphertheke kai e idia e upourgos legontas pos prokeitai gia ten kheirotere skholike khronia apo tokata t alla de nomizoume oti diaphonei kaneis pos prokeitai gia aalla kai se alles idioktesia asudosia sten oikonomike drasterioteta upherpon e kai kataphanes ratsismossumphona me kapoies marturies ena tmema tes elit ton slabophonon pomakon tes rodopes eikhe arkhisei pkh na emphanizei deigmata ethnotikes aphupnises sta tele tou ith aistis gunaikes e seira ton telikon metaxu philathletikou prebezas kai erakle ioanninon xekinaei apo ten prebeza ten kuriake stiste melete gia to mellon ton asphalistikon tes etaireion phoinika kai metrolife paralambanei entos tes ebdomados apo ton diethne oiko tillinghcast e emporike trapezaapo do mia neare oikogeneiato merokamato egine meniatiko kai to meniatiko periousiaomos para ta anamphisbeteta auta gegonota orismenoi politikoi antipaloi tou konstantinou karamanle iskhurizontan oti te luse ten upedeixe o tote amerikanos upourgos exoterikon khenri kisigkersunekhise tes anadiorganoses tes topikes autodioikeses kallikrates e opoia tha suneispherei exoikonomese toulakhiston ekatoi gepedoukhoi ekhoun to agkhos kai to megalutero kinetro bebaia alla amuntika usteroun polutha prepei na xanadoume ten istoria mas opos pragmatika prokhorese alla kai mesa apo ta endekhomena an dinotan e alle apantese tisemeionetai oti apo phetos e etaireia leitourgei kentro thalassotherapeias sto xenodokheio grecotel dafnila bay eno sto grecotel corfu imperilal demiourgethekan uperpoluteleis biles pou entathekan sto kommati famous class tes alusidasto erakleio ten epokhe ekeine exaitias tes plethusmiakes ekrexes pou akolouthese te mikrasiatike katastrophe eikhe anagke apo nea odika erga eksugkhronismo tou limaniou kai tou pananeiou nosokomeiou alla prota ap ola eikhe anagke apo nerootan eisai ethnike mporeis na deis tis omades se perissotero bathosto programma tes episkepses zemin pou anamenetai na aphikhthei edo stis to proi tes kuriakes perilambanei xenagese sto arkhaiologiko mouseio ste sunekheia xenagese sten knosomas aphenoun loipon to edaphos eleutherosunomilousan omos me allous pou den egraphan ellenika pou egraphan gallika agglika e rosika kai sunomilousan epi isois orois giati milousan ten idia glossa te glossa tes demiourgiaskatastase tes ugeias tou einai polu kake kai mou zetese na paradoso ena menuma ston maliki me to opoio ton kalei na ton ektelesei to suntomotero dunaton eipe o dikegoros mpanti arephprotaseis ton thesmikon ependuton gia ten kephalaiagora desme protaseon gia ten ellenike kephalaiagora parousiase khthes se sunenteuxe tupou o proedros tes enoses thesmikon ependuton ethe alexes pilabiosekei kaname kai te bolta mas me karabaki kai bebaia thumethekame osoi askholountai me barkes ten patrida mas te khiodiathetei pio sphikhte anartese apo to sumbatiko antistoikho tou e opoia prokuptei apo to epipleon baros ton rezerbouar phusikou aeriouse megalo mpol anameignuoume ola ta ulika kai koskinizoume apo pano to aleuriemporia anthropon me skopo ten kanoun ten praktike tous askeseperiphemos gallos sunthetes klont ntempisi egrapse to ligo prin apo ton thanato tou mia souita mpaletou me ton titlo jeox paikhnidia alla kai agones sta gallikate kataxiomenon roumanon khorographon egnosmenou kurousto duskolo meros einai to proto plasimo giati to keri prepei na einai polu zesto gia na douleutei kai kaigontai ta kheria sou puroneis leei e kkalliope rodou kai stamata kathe toso gia na murisei to keri me agalliasetelika to skaphos entopisteke kai oi epibainontes metapherthekan me elikoptero sten pteruga makhes kai apo ekei sto nosokomeio khanion opou diapistotheke oti einai kala sten ugeia tousmono oi kuprioi na dikaiountai anergiako oi koinotikoi pou den ekhoun douleia na paroun ta mpogalakia tous kai na tou dinounse megalo bathmo auto egine me ten psephise tou maastrikht kai tha ginetai giati auto apaitei to sumpheron tes ploutokratias kai ton kommaton tes kai okhi gia logous upoteleiasanodo parousiase kai e ethnike omada tes kuprou kathos apo ten these anebeke sten these me bathmousagele skulon lumainetai te gera edo kai ena mena agele adespoton skulon ekhei remaxei ta aigoprobata tes gerasprosthese oti uparkhei e boulese olon mas na proothesoume auton ton megalo thesmo tes topikes autodioikeses pou perase mesa apo ton kallikrateuparkhei e pithanoteta epises tou khronou na zetesoume ki auto den einai kalo an sunekhistoun oi perikopes na paroume ligoterous phoitetesgallia sullambanei upopta mele tou gallia astunomia sunelabe exi upopta mele tou epikerugmenou kourdikou ergatikou kommatos ten trite diastema e rosia eikhe ton proto logosemera to mesemeri me aphorme kai ten stase ergasias e dioikese tes suzetaei to thema me phoreis ton goneon kai ton matheton eno stis to apogeuma kalei se euruteres summetokhes suskepse phoreon sto ergatiko kentroarkhiste me to periphemo leipsiotiko turi malako e muzethraprokeitai gia mia summetokhike prospatheia katapolemeses tes akribeias ston khoro osoi etan konta se parathura eidan mia lampsegripe aute xekinese apo mia khora pou den phemizetai gia tis ugieines diatrophikes sunetheies opos kai gia ten atomike ugieine tes pleiopsephias ton katoikon tes delade to mexikoeinai epikinduno na men antilambaneste tis thusies tou ellenikou laou kai na ton prosbalete banausaathooi oi tesseris kategoroumenoi gia te dolophonia tes ephes phatourou ekhoun sumphonesei krupha prokeimenou na kanoun mia bromodouleia kai na skepasoun mia skandalode upotheseoristike sumphonia metaxu ton duo pleuron de phainetai na ekhei epiteukhthei ostoso e sunantese phetos ekhoume kai to champions league opote einai mia khronia semantike kai duskoleaute einai e sobaroteta kai e upeuthunoteta tou protou polite autou tou topoueprepe na phtasei egkairos sto akribo spiti pou molis eikhe anakainisei ki o elegktes apo ten politeia tou ekleise me austeroteta kathorismene ora kai mera pou tha pegaine oste an ola etane sosta tha mporouse me asphaleia na to paradosei ston idiokteteedo loipon arkhizei na mplekei e istoria kathos o sundesmos demon khrematodoteitai ap to upgia na apolausete ta nostima edesmata tes maures thalassas sustenontai ta estiatoria regata tha kerdisoume alla kai ti tha khasoumeoi piperies polethekan stis drkhaute akribos e epharmoge ekleise ta khronia poreias sten agora khthes mia poreia pou emperiekhei ouk oliga semeiastathmous sten exelixe tes psephiakes mousikes se auto pou einai semerakatalogos me khioumor thamones statheroi khoros analogos tes onomasias tou magaziou gia ten istoria to r prostetheke ste lexe katergo gia na men einai tosooi promakhones briskontan se tria epipedaautes tis adikies tha kanoume oti mporoume na tis diorthosoume alla prepei gregora na bgoume apo te strougka kai te mizeriamporei na eunoesei ten anaptuxe parallelon energeion tou georgikou khorou opos o agrotourismosgia perissoteres plerophories oi endiapheromenoi prepei na apeuthunontai sta demosia sta opoia upebalan ten aitese summetokhes tous stis exetaseisaneko sten epokhe tou diaphotismouagapemenos sas sunthetes oi klasikoi othomanoi sunthetes idiaitera o sebki mpee kai o ntente ephenteto omereio asphuktia logo tou phortou ekdeloseonemeina me anoikto to stoma akougontas kapoion pou xerei apo mesa apexo ki anakatota ola osa tektainontai sto nosokomeio tes khiou ta teleutaia khronia kai pou ekhoun skhese okhi me ten iatrike noseleia alla me alles parametroustetarte augoustou demosia ekklese na sterikhthoun oi tour operators kai oi aeroporikes etaireies pou phernoun touristes ste lesbo apeuthunei o proedros ton touristikon praktoron akhilleas sougioltzespos na uparxei axiopistia otan o proen upourgos mas elege oti eikhe exasphalistei e sumphonia me ten troika kai telika den eikhe ginei tipota pheretai na eipe o odusseas konstantinopoulosti mporei na bgalei kaneis apo mia toso koinotope istoria polla kai tipotaaristere pleura khresimopoieitai se katastaseis ektaktes anagkes e an prepei na parei kamia anasa kata te diarkeia tou paikhnidiou o ntaniel albesantistoikha o ophelimos khoros sten piso seira kathismaton den dikaiologei tis auxemenes exoterikes diastaseis tou amaxomatos kathos to periorismeno platos den eunoei te philoxenia tritou atomoukairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia trite iouliou nees apoluseis sten pegasos ekdotike sunekhizontai oi apoluseis ston omilo pegasos ekdotike idioktesias mpompoladioti einai terastia upokrisia na koptontai kapoioi gia ten anergia ton neon kai ten idia stigme na me theloun na antimetopisoun mia apo tis basikes aities tes to xeperasmeno kai aneparkes panepistemiako sustemabebaios mou apantese pao sto episkepteriooi parapano anapheromenes ependuseis tha eniskhusoun peraitero te dunamikoteta exupereteses paraggelion tes etaireias pou pragmatopoiei perissoteres apo timologeseis ana emera kata tis periodous aikhmeskaneis den amphisbetei oti mporeis na gineis o kaluteros dikegoros tes australias alla na xereis oti protathletes mporeis na gineis mono tora pou eisai mikroskathorizetai time apothematopoieses parembase meiomene kata se skhese me ten elakhiste time paragogoutrite augoustou me kentriko thema problemata sumperiphoras ton matheton sto skholiko plaisio mia biomatike proseggise tous tha pragmatopoiethei aurio paraskeue to proi stis emerida sto periphereiako epimorphotiko kentro mutilenesapophase ekrine oti akoma kai an o daneioleptes upegrapse sumbase daneiou me trapeza pou perilambanei oro o opoios na epitrepei ton anatokismo ton tokon apo ten emera kathustereses ana trimeno o oros autos einai akurosemeis gia paradeigma agorasame agria manitaria apoxeramena apo enan ntopio kalliergete ki ena polu endiapheron me mousike kapoiou mousoulmanou mousikou apo ten komoteneanapanteta erotemata gia te kharaxe tes ionias mesa apo to demo mpizaniou ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous anapanteta erotemata gia te kharaxe tes ionias mesa apo to demo mpizaniou stisden leo oti o pheisa etan khthes toure sta kala tou leo omos oti eblepes ena khaph pou despoze ston khoro pou se ekane na pisteueis oti e mpala thelei den thelei tha perasei apo ta podia toupou allou sto theatriko ergo tou arka ekhthroi ex aimatos pou xekinese tis parastaseis tou apo to theatro tou neou kosmou periodeuse se thessalonike kai patra alla apo tis apriliou mekhri kai tis maiou tha parousiastei kai sto mpantmintonta deka petaflops einai to epomeno megalo stoikhema tes biomekhanias ton uperupologiston kai oi kataskeuastes kanoun agona dromou gia to poios tha katapherei protos na parousiasei ena tetoio sustemamia tetoia sumperiphora apotelei sunethismeno phainomeno tou kathestotos kantaphi anapherei stous setimesek merous tou sundesmou ginetai prospatheia na anoixei diaulos epikoinonias me ten trapeza millennium pou einai o basikos khrematodotes tes ostoso mekhri semera e prospatheia aute den ekhei thetika apotelesmataalonso pheretai na pere apo monos tou protoboulia na kathusteresei eskemmena ton team mate tou me skopo na tou apospasei ten pole positionapo to eos semera einai diethnes krites khorou me pistopoiese apo to world dance council pagkosmio organismo khorouzugiste ton poure ton kudonion e metreste ton me ena phlitzani kai balte ton sten katsarola me ise posoteta zakharesmorphe kai orizontes enos megalou demiourgoukai bebaia oloi mas stenakhoriomaste otan blepoume mia photia se opoiodepote meros ki an einaiekeino pou mporo na sas po gia ten ora einai oti ertha gia na doulepso sklera mazi me tous paiktes mou gia na phtiaxoume mia iskhure omada e opoia tha mporei na kerdizei kathe antipaloplerophories sta grapheia ton tis ergasimes ores kai emeresteleutaia diakheirise apo ton k dru par oles tis philotimes prospatheies anabathmise tou rolou tou upourgeiou demiourgia tou ethnikou sumbouliou biologikes georgias den kataphere epi tes ousias na allaxei ten katastasezeta parembase ton epitheoreton periballontos khthes o nomarkhes me eggrapho tou pros tous epitheoretes periballontos zetese ten amese apostole elegkton prokeimenou na kanoun ekteneis elegkhous gia te leitourgia ton monadon steste skhetike delose proebe o k khrusostomides meta to peras tes sunedrias tou ethnikou sumbouliouta nera tou malonite phouskosan logo tes ragdaias brokhes kai ton neron pou katebainan apo ta guro bouna kai tous lophous me apotelesma na plemmurisei to khorio pou apeiletheke apo bebaio pnigmoexallou ta psukhiatrika nosemata ekhoun kapoia aitia palaiotera ta pharmaka ta opoia khresimopoiountan gia tetoies patheseis etan elakhistaetsi apo ton parapano ogko pou katagrapheke sto peripou ta disan exakolouthesoun na einai apenanti mas toso tuphloi oso etan eos semera toso to kallitero gia masta eisiteria pou ekhoun apomeinei tha ginoun ki auta kapnos kai to phaleriko stadio tha einai gemato apo akre se akrealle mia bradia me ellenike entekhne kai rok mousike organonei to hott spott sten prokumaiate sumbase upegrapsan oi demetres kai konstantinos spanos ek merous tes tropho kai oi raphael mouses kai konstantinos makhairas apo ten pleura testora pou einai polla ta kala semeia pephtei megalutero baros kai se esas kat arkhas na xekathariso oti ta kalutera mou semeia ektos nesiou einai ena aurio kai ena methauriomano kai abramopoulo kharakterizontas tis periptoseis tous me sugkrisimespos sou phaneke konstantine eisai adiorthotosasthenes seismike donese megethous bathmon sten klimaka rikhter semeiotheke ste lemeso khoris na proklethoun opoiesdepote zemies e na semeiothoun traumatismoioi megales auxeseis metokhikou kephalaiou kurios sto khoro ton eisegmenon etaireion ekhoun aporrophesei semantika kephalaia apo ten agoraeinai e prote phora pou summetekho sten klasike diadrome kai okhi mono kataphera na paro te nike alla kai na petukho rekor klasikou marathoniouten kuriake e aponome ton brabeion gia tous mathetikous agones telete aponomes ton brabeion ton mathetikon kallitekhnikon agonon zographikes kai theatrou periphereias kretes tha ginei ten kuriake apriliou stis to proi ste demotike aithousa androgeotheoreite oti aute e katastase deikhnei oti paue kala nouizete oti uporouue na sunekhisouue etsi ta etoiua kapoia stigue teleionoun oi upokhreoseis ouos den stauatounatomika e sullogika kapoioi den theoroun oti mia militaristike ekdelose einai aparaitetos o kaluteros tropos giortasmou ton megalon stigmon tou ethnousmeteorologike omada leitourgese gia arketo diastema me stokho na apoktesei tis apaitoumenes empeiries sten prognose tou kairouprokeitai gia te megalutere pleiopsephia pou sugkrotetheke gia na sterixei nomo plaisio gia ta apo te metapoliteuse kai metakai perimenoun na tous kalesoume na mas sosoungia tis epomenes kineseis tous oi idioktetes taxi anamenetai na laboun nees apophaseisgia na pate ekei protimeste to telepherik me tis aioroumenes kampines kathos etsi tha apolausete mia exairetike eikona tes polessebasmos tou demosiou khorou autou pou den mas anekei prepei na ginei deutere phuse kai okhi exairese opos einai se allous pio proegmenous apo ten apopse politismousoso gia to khoris na prokhoresei se peretero leptomereies arkesteke na pei oti kai gi auto oi diadikasies briskontai se plere exelixekatalabaineis oti to biblio tha poreuthei me ton idio tropo os to makrino telos tou aradiazontas epeisodia tes paidikes elikias idomena apo ten idia pantote optike gonia kai sto idio epipedo dieisduses tou blemmatospososto tes etaireias ksulemporike enosis demetropoulos polukhronopoulos pou drasteriopoieitai me to diakritiko titlo apektese e ksulemporia edraionontas te these tes sten egkhoria agorakhoros plerouse tis proupotheseis eno logo tou oti briskotan se upobathmismene periokhe e axia tou etan khameleto sunethes einai oti oi dunatotetes ton epikheireseon gia pleromes sten torine sugkuria einai mikroteres gi auto kai oi ruthmiseis kai loipes dieukolunseis ek merous ton trapezongia to kastro tes grambousas anastelose tou ekhei anatethei se ergolabo kai oi ergasies prokhoroun kanonikaton agona diorganonei o istioploikos omilos khanion kai tha summetaskhoun se auton kai polla kretika skapheepikoinonia me tis proegmenes dutikes khores eikhe ginei eukoloterekleisto paramenei to psephiako mouseio georgios iakobides apo khthes deutera eos kai ten kuriake septembriou logo ergasion suntereses kai anabathmises exoplismoualatopiperonete to esoteriko apo tis melitzanes kai moirazete to meigmakoubenta ginotan gia tis methodous suntereses ton trophimon pou kateikhan oi buzantinoieite braduazei eite pheggei ap te stis me polle agapean kai genikos akako zoo e arakhne opos ola ta psukhroaima e osa den diathetoun sustema egkephalikonotiaio stous oneirikous sumbolismous paristanoun enan agnosto psukhiko kosmoorophos meta ten katarreuse tou to xanaktistekeskouphia tous krataei apo tous progonous tous tis arkhaies khelones pou zousan se ele polu prin o anthropos dei to phos tou eliouagonas ksantheares oristeke na diexakhthei sabbatokatanome stous demous tou nomou ekhei os exes omogeneis sto demo prebezas sto demo zerou kai sto demo pargaski enas gia tis sunallages kurios to phpaphtasame sto gepedo guro stis kai ekei mas perimene o upeuthunos tes ollandikes omadasaise zarakol epikoure kathegetria politikes sten ouasigkton kai sto panepistemio lee den prosdoka to menuma tes agkuras na allaxei te gnome tou asant alla opos kai na khei einai ophelimo gia ekhoun auxethei se sugkrise me persi kata aggizontas ta upselotera epipeda tou eipegrammateia ka tis antiparatheseis auton dikegoroi kata ergazomenon ste genoi iaponikes arkhes iskhurizontai oti einai polu noris gia na milane gia makroprothesma metra kathos pros to paron proegeitai e psuxe ton exi antidrasteron tou ergostasiousto pragmatika gigantio auto ergo parousiazontai oi apodemetikes sunainese kai na sunekhistei o dialogos gia tis duskoles metarruthmiseiseggrapho tes ephoreias proistorikon kai klasikon arkhaioteton kai g ta apaitoumena tekmeria kuriotetas geskatzies edose mprostine mpalia ston mlantenobits pou proothetheke metopika kai apo konta petukhe tobasei autou ton iounio tou sunelephthesan ste thessalonike kai ektopisthekan ste naxo duo egetes tes phenterasion sunainese diabaste opos akribos tuponontai sta oraiotera mpar tou kosmou e thea einai tosoeinai prostateumene apo tous boreious anemous eno konta tes brisketai kai o kolpiskos mononautes me ammo kai botsalonostimeuei exisou tis probegkianes elies e ton pikantiko polto tous tapenade pou sunodeuei ta aperitiph ton gallon tou notou eno kai to pantakhou paron katsikisio turi entuposiazei to blemma tha apozemiotheite kai poso sten periptose pou kapoia trapeza baresei kanoni kai ekhete ekei tis katatheseis sas ti ginetai sten periptose pou eiste daneiolepteseinai to khroma tes zoes mou kai khairomai polu kathos ste nea mou omada ta panta einai katakokkinaikanopoiese ste seteia alla dusareskeia stis alles poleis tou nomou lasithiou meta ten anakoinose tes apophases tou sumbouliou toumas pou den tha ekhei skhese me ekeinon toualloste ta menou ton delivery briskontai se apostase boles apo ten agapemene mas these ston kanapepanmiou minoikeasteras krithinakes ntanalakes kelantonakes parateretes kounalakessto metaxu o banterson upegrapse khthes trietes epaggelmatiko sumbolaiopoios tha ethele na odegesei ten parataxe mas se mia etta ephoson o laos den ton thelei ennoeite an o laos den ton thelei kai phanei oti einai telika epiloge tou sarres akribosphainetai omos kathara e prothese tou psephophorou gia to komma kai gia ton upopsephioautokinetobiomekhania toyota anakoinose semera oti anakalei sunolika ubridika autokineta ston kosmo kurios to teleutaio montelo prius logo problematos sto sustema pedesespoios eipe oti ta blockbusters den einai gia khortase uparkhoun dekades tainies pou den osphrantheke egkaira to koino oi opoies marazosan eispraktika alla brekan eterokhronismena kalt anagnorisekataigida etan en opseipio sugkekrimena sumphona me ten problepse tes ethnikes meteorologikes uperesias ten paraskeue ste dutike ellada tha semeiothoun brokhes kai kataigides kurios stis thalassies kai parathalassies periokhesmikre anodo katagraphoun skhedon ola ta europaika khrematisteria me to geniko deikte timon tou khrematisteriou athenon na kleinei sto eno kata te diarkeia tes semerines sunedriases eikhe xeperasei kai tomalista to demosieuma anephere kharakteristika kostas papanikolaou xekhorizei apo tous pou ekhoun prooptike na mpoun automata sta ntraphttelos oi kk semites kai pherkhophstat erotethekan gia tis exelixeis stis europaikes aerometaphoresstous katoikous tou oklant aresei to protoporiako ntusimo stis phebrouariou e khora giortazei te sumphonia waitangi tou pou upographeke metaxu ithagenon kai apoikonbebaioseimaste mia mikre khora sten periphereia tes europes sten opoia epibionoun polla stoikheia enos plousiou parelthontos makrunou kai prosphatou eno apo ten alle pleura eisballoun me ragdaio ruthmo stoikheia tou sugkhronou politismou kai tes tekhnologiaspempte iouliou pempte iouliou mera xekourases e semerine gia tous omeristes pou summetekhoun stis ergasies tes omerikes akademiasadieukriniste epileximoteta ton neon ependutikon skhedionopos tonise o k giannakopoulos apo ten epomene khronia tha xekinesei apo ten krete pilotiko programma gia ten proothese tes diatrophesopos oloi oi khitapo te mia oi parees sten kapheteria pou kanoun aneleeto chitchat ki apo ten alle o nikos monos tou se mia rastonede tha epiballo se kanenan to pos tha me dei e tha me kharakteriseitha etan loipon kalo an ki alles alusides soupermarket alla kai eurostes epikheireseis leitourgousan pros ten idia kateuthunse gia na kaluphthoun geographika oi megaluteres toulakhiston poleis tes khorasgia ton idio kai to ergo tou milese o kathegetes philosophias tou panteiou panepistemiou kai poietes demetres lamprelles o opoios ektos allon ton kharakterise os ena poludiastato talento pou axizei na timethei kai sto nesi touluse den einai oute oi epop pou kata koine omologia den apedosan oute ta elakhista apo ta anamenomena o stratos epitelousetairia akolouthei sunteretiko management den ekhei trapeziko daneismo kai den einai ektetheimene se pithanes lexiprothesmes apaiteseisdeutere phora pou to phreatio sten odo katsare plemmurise to dromotipote ousiodes den kineitaipurgos noikiazetai olokleros gia kapoia weekends alla mporeite na ton episkephtheite kathemerina ektos sabbatou apo tiskanithares upeste ena bathu skhisimo metaphertheke espeusmena sto nosokomeio kai pleon theoreitai apithano na ekhei epoulothei e plege tou tis epomenes ebdomadesme te diadikasia tes psephophorias eklekhthekan gia diete theteia kai ta mele tes oikonomikes epitropes tou demou beroias kai tes epitropes poiotetas zoesgiati auto pou metraei panta einai e sunekheia massto idio erotema pososto pisteuei pos kai e nea demokratia den akouei ta problemata tou kosmou eno to pisteuei oti to megalutero meionektema tes neas demokratias einai to parelthon tesme kardia asso gia ten omada tou pasarelapros to paron arketa megala pistotika idrumata tou exoterikou pherontai etoima na sumphonesoun ste diakratese ton ellenikon omologonme to pou patas to podi sou sten paralia tes triopetras sto noto tou rethumnou kai to brekheis sta skoura mple nera tou libukou pelagous den ginetai na men piaseis ston aera aute ten apisteute energeia pou ekheibaloto einai o dekatos dioiketes tes sto kossuphopediooi legomenes diarthrotikes metarruthmiseis ekhoun os skopo na allaxoun arden to ergasiako topioprokeitai apla gia logistiko lathos e uparkhei pragmatika tamiako elleimma ola xekinesan prin merikous menes otan kai oloklerotheke e mekhanorganose tou mutilenesmekhri telos tou mena sta nea tou grapheiatapazides demetres tou panteleparomoio sema edose kai o stokhastikos talantotes o opoios se epipeda konta sto apetukhe na diaspasei anodika ton kineto tou meso orooi anthropoi pantos tou pagkhiakou de khanoun to kouragio tous sumphona me ton kosta pantelara pou semeionei ekhoume agones akome uparkhei perithorio gia beltiosesten atzenta tes sunanteses den perilambanetai episema to thema tou euroomologou an kai toso e angela merkel oso kai oi sumbouloi tes den ekhoun aporripsei entelos ten ideapou pegan ekeines oi lampres parastaseis pou sugkinousan kai anatrikhiazan to koino e to ekanan na klapsoun apo ta gelia kai na niosoun oti ontos parakolouthesan arkhaio drama e komodiasta bgainoun oi ergazomenoi kai steepiseme dikaiologia tes sunekhizomenes tautises mias astunomikes uperesias tou limenikou oromekhri tora ekhoume deixei stathere parousia s olous tous agones douleuontas kurios me dikous mas athletesastunomia gia te dieukolunse tes kuklophorias ekleise te mia lorida pros xersoneso ki na sunekhisoume te baria kleronomia proegoumenon epitukhemenon diethnon diorganoseon pou philoxenese e ellada okhi mono sto khoro tes pales alla se kathe athlemaanaphora tou k bogiatze peri kommatikes peitharkhias basizetai se plerophories pou ekhoun phtasei sten proskeimene sto kubernon komma pleiopsephia tes oti endekhetai na me summetaskhoun sto sunedrio nomarkhes pou proskeintai stoduo philologon me ta akoloutha prosonta empeiries skhetika me ten ekpaideuse ton ellenopaidon exoterikou ekai ton palinnostounton kathos kai glossologikes gnoseisapo to periekhomeno tes epikoinonias diakrinetai anaphora se apagoreumenes ousies kai e agonia na men tous piasoun oi elegkhoitautoteta tes meteras tou karpou tou erota tes me ton arnolnt sbartsenegker apokaluphtheke einai e milntrent idiotike teleorase aporriptei opoiadepote xene glossa peran tes agglikes theorontas oti ena diaphoretiko akousma tha apomakrunei to meso theateoi epokhes pou dianuoume einai penikhres se dikasteria sto aerodromio ligo meta ta mesanukhta tes kuriakes peripou philathloi tou perimenan ston kombo tes egnatias odou sten pedine ten apostole tes omadas pou gurize apo te libadeiapetsalnikos bouleutes kastorias philippos petsalnikos etan o omiletes tes kentrikes proeklogikes omilias tes emathias to bradu tes tetartes sten plateia demarkheiou ste beroiaaute e plegegia ton omorpho topo mas tes katastases pou epikratei ston agkata ton astunomiko elegkho proekupse oti o eikhe parapoiesei ton arithmo plaisiou tou ikhe autokinetou pou odegouse kathos epises oti e adeia kuklophorias pou kateikhe kai epedeixe stous astunomikous einai klemmene kai parapoiemenean arkhiseis na proetoimazeis auto pou ekheis na peis th akoustei xero san na mila enas politikosprepei na xesekothoume oloi stous dromous gia na me mas troei pia ta sothika o molusmenos aerasparallela epesemane oti ta epimeleteria tes khoras zetoun na einai pragmatika o sumboulos kai o axiopistos sunomiletes tes kubernesestrite augoustou tis ennea ephtasan oi summetokhes sto ergasiako protathlema podosphairou pou diorganonei o athletikos organismos tou demou mutilenessto prosopo tou agapemenou tes e ethopoios aphorousan kurios to triptukho methe takhuteta epikindunes parabaseis kai se baros ton parabaton odegon oi opoioi etan arketoi epiballontan ta antistoikha prostimateos periphereiarkhes den pareleipse
