katapheramemou arese akome na pherno sto mualo mou diaphores lexeis kai n anakalupto to khroma kai te murodia tousopos apokalupse epises o k mertzanos o demos pallenes zetese auxese prosopikou kata atoma sten pallene sto geraka kai sten anthousa opou anamenetai na leitourgesei paidikos stathmoseditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia duo entelos diaphoretikes metaxu tous istories xebolepsan ton stiben spilmpergk apo ta giapika grapheia tes dreamworks phernontas ton kai pali ste skenothetike kareklaakome prepei na dieukrinistei oti e apophase aute tes olomeleias tou areiou pagou den askholetheke me to zetema tes monimopoieses ton sumbasioukhon pou ergastekan meta to kai kata sunepeia den kaluptontai apo ten apophase aute tes olomeleiasta stoikheia pou sugkentrose e kubernese deikhnoun oti polla ependutika skhedia gia ta opoia ekdelotheke endiapheron e kai khronia prin ekhoun pleon akurotheiupobrukhia sunedriase upourgikou sumbouliou gennese stis siderodromikes grammesoi elaioparagogoi poloun to ladi tous gia na kalupsoun tis ektaktes anagkes tes elaiosulloges kai perimenoun ten eulogemene ora na paroun ten epidoteseopos ektimatai e idruse tetoion etairion tha sumbalei sten antimetopise ton dusleitourgion sten exasphalise mias statheres sunekhous diaphemistikes proboles ste thespise poron kai ste megistopoiese tes apodoses ton diathesimon kephalaionsten sunekheia meleta enallaktikous tropous antimetopises tou problematos tou epilegei auton pou tou tairiazei kalutera kai arkhizei na axiologei ten epiloge touto ergo tou aspha alexandroupoles apoteleitai apo enan uperaktio stathmo paralabes kai aeriopoieses ugropoiemenou phusikou aeriouakome ena entagmeno ergo sto demoprateitai me ekptose pou xeperna to gegonos pou apotuponei ten tragike katastase tes anergias e opoia ekhei demiourgethei sto khoro tes kataskeueselaba meros se arketes makhes parataxeos me tous nazides kai se polles epikindunes apostoles kai kanonisa arketous germanarades traumatistheka de sto stethos aristero emithorakio pano ap ten kardia apo tuphlo trauma blematossumphona me tous uparkhontes skhediasmous panta kata ton k xourdake tha demiourgethoun guro stis nees theseis ergasiaspleon o dromos ekhei stenepsei kai thelei prosokhe uparkhoun se orismena semeia petres apo katolistheseisoi theates pou tha parakolouthesoun oi mathetes pou tha summetaskhoun sta eidika programmata euaisthetopoiesesme elaphria traumata sto podi noseleuetai kai o sunodegos tou trainouauto bebaia den endiapherei tous etairous mas pou skholiazoun oti prepei na plerosoume tis epiloges mas ennoontas olous mas kai okhi monon osous eikhan ten duname ton apophaseon kai ton kheirismonoloi oi sundesmoi autoi tha ekhoun amese skhese me ton sundesmo philon ophe erakleiou pou tha egeitai katelexe o k dramountanes eno proteine kai egine apodekto na ginei epaphe me trapezes kai xenodokheiakes monades na paroun eisiteria diarkeiasopos oloi gnorizete to omadiko auto athlema demiourgei sostes prosopikotetes kai kharakteres sumphona me ta athletika ideode tes phules maseinai apopse tou gamespin pos katanta perissotero kourastiko ap oso tha eprepe te mia stigme na upokhreonetai kaneis se tekhnikes stealth kai mono te deutere na lunei puzzles kai mono kai ten trite naelega loipon oti prepei na analuthei kai na meletethei polu sobara to phainomeno tes pagkosmiopoieses apo to pagkosmio kinemaakarpes einai oi mekhri tora ereunes skhetika me ten diarrexe pou egine sten galaktobiomekhania dodone sten periokhe eleousas ioanninon me leia eurokai sta duo auta muthistoremata tou o ellis ekhei dosei titlous daneismenous apo to ergo tou elvis costelloapo atukhia den erthan oi titloi noriterask geroulanos epitithetai kai ston me aphorme ta teleutaia gegonota legontas oti stelekhe tou sugkekrimenou kommatos sumballoun ston propelakismo stelekhon allon politikon kommaton kai auto einai katakriteopoio einai to idaniko periballon gia ten anaptuxe tou idaniko periballon gia ten anaptuxe tou einai to udatino limnes potamia dexamenes pisines sustemata udreuses megalon kteriakon monadon thermes iamatikes pegesprin apo khroniato sabbato e suntrophia tes ornithologikes etaireias sas perimenei ston ethniko kepo na phtiaxete pholies gia ta khelidoniadokimaste arni spesial me saltsa kai mpekre meze me khoirino kai kotopouloneos khrestes eggraphesundese kathe allo para xekhasmeno ekhei to thema tes pauses tou apo ten proedria tes peitharkhikes epitropes o tsampikos kampastanassta plaisia tes proanakrises tha exetastoun oi nun kai oi proen prutanikes arkhes kathegetes kai phoitetes tou tmematosme to sugkrotema tes apo ten roumania se monterna blakhika tragoudiase autes tis periptoseis oi pelates mporoun na prometheutoun apo ten agora aples analogikes suskeues tis opoies na sundesoun apeutheias sten telephonike prizalogos einai aplos oti eno ekhei periekhomeno ekhei poiese milaei gia ta perissotera apo ta themata pou mas aphorounkhronos omos einai polutimos kai oi episkepseis diadekhontai e mia ten allekatartistheke sumphonia metaxu tes marfin popular bank kai tes holdings public co ltd gia ten polese kai metabibase apo ten trapezaoso pio mikros xekinesei kapoios na trephetai sosta toso pio eukola tha akolouthesei ste zoe tou ena ugie tropo diatrophesprothupourgos epestrepse sten agkale tou morpheaidiaitere baruteta dinei e etaireia ton teleutaio kairo kai sten anaptuxe ton katastematon tes toso sten attike oso kai sten eparxia meso tou franchisingena irod teleutaiou tupou mporei na khoresei mekhri kai tragoudia isa delade me khondrikasoste plerophorese e boetheia gia ton ekdemokratismo kai ten anaptuxe ton triton khoron kathos kai e terese ton sumphonion epaneisdokhes etan tha themata sta opoia anaphertheke eidika o ellenas upourgos kata ten parembase tou sten diaskepseto zetema tes makedonikes meionotetas kai idiaitera e dike melon tou kommatos tes ouranio toxo upobathmizetai apo tamoleskes pantos ekhei katagraphei ede me psila grammata sto perithorio tes istorias kai kaneis pote xana den tha askholethei mazi toustis euergetikes epiptoseis pou tha epipherei sto periballon alla kai sto isozugio petrelaioeidon tes khoras e epektase ton egkatastaseon tes petrola anaphertheke o uphupourgos anaptuxes khrestos theodorouto mnemonio e mone luse monodromos gia na sothei e khora apo ten ptokheuse kai te khreokopia kai ta sklera metra epibeblemenametokhon opos diamorphotheke meta ten oloklerose tes diadikasias auxeses ten iskhuropoiese tou esoterikou elegkhou ston apophasise to dioiketiko sumboulio tou organismou kata te diarkeia tes sunedriases tou dioiketikou sumbouliouepipleon tha prepei na semeiothei sumphona me kataggelies anthropistikon organoseon oti oi kratoumenoi metanastes epibibastekan sto ploiario me kheiropedes khoris malista na enemerothoun gia to pou kai gia poio logo metapherontaiena koritsaki pou molis eikhe phtasei sto nesi apo ten australia episkephteke to nosokomeio me polla sumptomata pou emoiazan me auta tes neas gripesitaliko demosieuma anapherei pos o sokrates papastathopolos tha polethei apo te milan ste tzenoalamp a la bucovina arni ala bucovina me dentrolibano kai skordo sto phourno kai mamaliga mpouti arniou peripou kila megales skathena tha etan e eukole luse giati to otan apophasisa na phtiaxo to diko mou katastema oi athenaioi etan pio enemeromenoisemeio ekkineses tou problematismou apotelesan orismenes basikes paradokhespuknoseis istorikes koinonikopolitikes empeiriasto semantiko phusika einai pos akoma kai meta ten polese e media strom einai dipla sasse kamia periptose ta khremata pou opheiloume den einai tosaestiatorio kategorias etanoi troikanoi theoroun oti e anaptuxe tha erthei mesa apo tis elastikes morphes apaskholeses oi opoies sunepagontai megalo psalidisma stis amoibes ston idiotiko tomeaoi mikros oikismos ekhei treis sunoikies tes agias sophias ta mparmpagianaiika kai ta argitaiikagia to programma agrotikes anaptuxes kai ktenotrophous episkepse kontou proaneggeile o nomarkhes ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous gia to programma agrotikes anaptuxes kai ktenotrophousepheuriskei krupha skholeia megistes laures gia na krupsei to oti etan ena kai to auto me to dunaste kai ton kataktete prokeimenou na epibioseidiaploke einai pleon gegonos n gastronomia katakta ten kosmetologia kai den xereis pia an aute ten krema prepei na ten aleipseis sto kormi eplaz kato agios petrosoi apozemioseis apo to prasino skoulekiprasino phos gia auxese mk kata disto basiko gnorisma tou kharaktera sas einai proselose ston stokhoantistoikha oi anagnorismenes opheiles tou aggizoun ta ekatparatithetai autousios o apologismos tou ergou tous apo ton proistameno tous antistratego ton balter simanasugkekrimena o barbarigos exephrase ten antirrese tou gia tis sugkhoneuseis ton demosion organismon eno aphese tautokhrona sobares aikhmes kata tes kubernesespisteuo oti mekhri to telos tou tha ekhei anebeitha perasete apo ta paralimnia khoria kruoneri kerasia morphobouni mesenikolas lampero moukha mpelokomite neokhori kai pezoula kai tha thaumasete topia monadikes omorphiasgia na akolouthesoume to duskolo dromo tes demiourgias pou tha ophelesei olous tous polites kai sigoura tha kanei ta paidia mas na broun noema kai asphales mellon ste zoe tous sten epeiroagones tes telikes phases tou panelleniou protathlematos khantmpol sten kategoria ton paidon pou tha ginoun to epomeno diastema sten athena tha sphurixei e mutilenia diaitetes elene kapeleme te summetokhe ton parapano kai tou k kolintza triphona kathegete panepistemiou athenonta khremata proothountai apeutheias ston logariasmo tou tameiou aroges ton puroplekton periokhon ton opoio sunestese to upourgeio oikonomias kai oikonomikon gia ten eniskhuse ton puropathon kai ten apokatastase ton ulikon zemionparallela e enekrine ten ekdose metatrepsimon omologiakon daneion mekhri tou sunolikou posou tonmono oi aphlatoxines brethekan sto metriko gala se epikinduna upsela epipeda se orismenes tropikes khoresan oi upopsies autes den ekhoun base e mone luse einai e amese nomothetike parembase tes politeias gia ten arse autou tou adiexodou kai ten aproskopte ektelese ton koinonikon programmaton tonparola auta ola kata ten apopse mas ta zetemata arkhizoun na prokuptoun apo te stigme pou egine gnosto stous anthropous tes deuaks oti proekupse blabesemera polu perissotero apo pote einai apolutos anagkaio na egethei tes prospatheias anakampses o idiotikos tomeasta kalutera soutzoukakia kempap tes polesepises semeioste oti to kineziko gouan auxetheke elaphra tis teleutaies epikheirese twist pou ede anakoinotheke sten prosphate sunedriase tes fed stokheuontas se makroprothesmes apodoseisos endeixe enokhes o k lamprou khresimopoiese akoma kai o gegonos oti den eikhe upobalei menuse o enas ston allo gia tis proanakritikes apologiesliges ores meta ten psephise tes epimakhes tropologias me tis drakonteies poines gia tous autokinetistes pou demiourgesan klima poloses oi psukhraimes phones kai apo tis duo pleures edosan akome mia eukairia ston dialogosten paragoge proionton me katokhuromene ten onomasia proeleusesoi ekpaideuomenoi tou kentrou einai paradeigma pros mimese oson aphora ten apsoge sumperiphora tous se xenodokheia kai loipous khorous sunestiaseonden odegoun se luseis kai dunamitizoun to dialogo kai te sunainese pou e koinonia mas kai to ethnos mas ekhei anagke gia na prokhoresei kai na apantesei dunamika sto neo aiona kai tis prokleseis toumarinarete to kreas sto ladi pou etoimasate prosthetontas khumo lemonioumetagrapheke sten mpeneton trebizo to epaixe kai sto tes athenas apenanti ston eno to pere me ten ethnike kroatias to arguro metallio stous allous khoregous se diaphora semeia tes phanelas kai tou sorts ton podosphairistonparakharaxe e alle alloiose ton anagnoristikon ton khrestonmelon me skopo ten paraplanese os pros ten proeleuse tou periekhomenou pou metadidetai meso ton uperesion touenan topo sunanteses kai sunergasias me tous loipous enstolous sunadelphous tes periokhes kathos kai me tous agapetous topikous mas arkhontesperiodeia sunekhizetai sta thumiana khorio plesion khiouna xerete oti uparkhoun anthropoi pou einai tetraplegikoi kai ekhoun mia entuposiake drasterioteta kai mia aperigrapte thelese kai orexe gia zoemekhris otou e rosida anaktesei ta ploute tes kai anakalupsei to ustato ergo tou eroa tes mia egkataleleimmene pista aerodromiou tou pagkosmiou polemou ten opoia o oultimo metetrepse se pista agononmaxilari skhediasmeno se skhema gunaikasmekhri tis maioualekos ksenos einai gnostoteros os o sunthetes tes antistasesstathero paramenei to endiapheron tou odontiatrou mikhale klontza o opoios epithumei na summetekhei sto psephodeltioprin liga khronia eniskhuthekan oi gephures tes pantanassas kai tou palaiokastrou perusi eniskhutheke o skeletos tou ktiriou tousto biktoria akousa laika me mplouz diathese apo ten ntiba kaite ntalekai malista epeita apo toses prospatheies na apoktesoume diatrophike eparkeiana semeiothei akome pos dienergeitai ereuna peri sumbaseon gia amuntikes prometheies upotheseis kakodiakheirises sta ellenika touristika akineta kai stonten kategorematike aute delose ekane o idios o k konstantinos stephanes amesos meta to telos tes sunanteses diarkeias miamises oras pou eikhe me ton prothupourgo k konstantino semite sto megaro maximouta euro ten emera pou tous dinetai san khartziliki den phtaneiexo apo ten periokhe o gkereiro epikheirese ena dunato sout alla e mpala perase elakhista aoutna semeiothei pos den oristeke emeromenia gia te sunedriase tou nomarkhiakou sumbouliou tou kati pou opos tonisteke tha ginei apo ta kentrika tou kommatosopoia den ten phorage kai ten eblepe kathegetes etroge apobole ten alle meraalloste auto kai e politike agoge pros time tes to uposterixeethnikistes kai philokourdoi uposteriktes sugkrouontai sten istanmpoul to paron periekhomeno anatetheke gia tous setimescom digits do not matchme base ton programmatismo pou egine e summetokhe mas apo do kai sto exes perilambanei ten ekthese sten outrekhte e opoia xekinese kai tha oloklerothei stis tou mena eno ligo polu to idio diastema tha pragmatopoiethoun kai alles treis ektheseisenthronise tou neou metropoltou zak ntemi me tous anouk eme mark miselmikres diadromes megales sugkineseis oi diadromes tou einai pollessten ebdomadiaia tekhnike tes analuse e emporiki bank episemainei oti einai e trite phora se diastema okto sunedriaseon pou o proseggise ten periokhe ton monadonalla tmemata tha epimeinoun sten poliorkia tes kokkines zones alla khoris protoboulies megales prokleses pros tis dunameis katastoles globalise resistance cobas klpennia kalaistheta kai pentakathara stountio perikuklomena apo ta kataprasina peribolia tou libadiou kai mia anasa apo ten omonume paraliaten euthune ten analambano ego elege o gkekos kai atzenta tes dioikeses tou gia to neo etostziallas kharakterise auto pou epikheireitai philodoxo skhedio omos okhi sumbole tes leophorou eirenes kai tes odou mpizaniou sto khoro pou allote etan o stathmos tou uperastikou stegazetai to upokatastema tes sunetairistikes trapezas sten prebezasten sunedriase tou organoueikhame lastikho sten proegoumene alla xekinesame me duo rezerbesupseles poiotetas kai megales axiopistias metaphrastikon sustematon kai suskeuon ekhoukarabia sumphona me marturies duo agnostoi andres pithanotata allodapoi espasan to tzami tou kosmematopoleiou mpekan mesa kai ton purobolesan khoris distagmo treis phorespsukhraima antimetopizei ten apographe o demarkhos arkhanon stprote diakladose sto bilnious lietoubosmpountoutsnost bilermpangkablin oi niketes tha paixoun metaxu tous kai tha anametrethoun akolouthos me ton nikete ton allon duo zeugarion gia mia these stous omilousepistemonike katartise to ethos kai e kathoristike prosphora tou k balenake sten exoterike politike tes khoras einai adiamphisbetetato proto emikhrono etan diaphoretiko apo to deutero kai den thelo na psaxo gia dikaiologiesean loipon uparxoun stoikheia ta opoia sunegoroun sten demiourgia ton duo auton edron ekho ten entupose oti to problema tha to xanabroume mprosta masten ole upothese parakolouthei stena o galazios bouleutes giannes pittas o opoios pheretai na ekhei enemerosei te nea egesia tou upourgeiou ugeiastrite augoustou trophike allergia os oros anapheretai sten antidrase tou anosopoietikou sustematos stis trophessten uperaspise tou sunakhtheke kai o dikegorikos sullogos komotenes pou ekprosopetheke apo ton proedro tou erakle khatzenestorosepipleon oi sterees morphes sumpleromaton diatrophes epibarunoun te leitourgia tou peptikou sustematos en antithesei pros ten ugre posime morphe pou einai eulepte eupepte kai me takheia aporrophesesezon ton rialiti mageirikes ego san teletheates kai logo tou oti ekho psukhose me te geuse pernao ten kalutere teleoptike mou sezon gia prote phora kathelomene ston kanapepio theluke sulloge tou kalokairiou me phloral motiba pou thumizoun anthismeno aggliko kepoergo pnoes gia ton koinoniko kai poleodomiko isto tes poles ton ioanninon pou stokho ekhei ten asphale kinese ton pezon kai ton okhematon eikhe kharakterisei to ergo e k genikosdiabaste opos akribos tuponontai to khorio tes panagitsas brisketai ste notia plagia tou orous khelona kai se upsos metronden eimaste e mpartselona gia na mpainoume sto gepedo kai na katharizoume gia plaka ta paikhnidia omos an paizoume panta etsi tha ta katapheroume kaluteraprokeitai gia mia sugkhutike epiloge pou apeuthunetai kurios sto europaiko diapragmateutiko trapezinoritera e khilari klinton exephrase ten anesukhia tes gia ten eleutheria tou tupou sten tourkiatha deixei an tha dikaiothootan teleiosa to lukeio logo upseles bathmologias eikha perasei sta topographos mekhanikosexoukai gnostoi agnostoi phorophugades kuklophoroun me uperpolutele autokineta diathetoun kinete kai akinete periousia diaboun plousioparokha delonoun omos eisodemata oso o teleutaios ergateskhrusa einai ethopoios kai me megale peira sto radiophoniko theatroste diastaurose stadiou kai pesmazoglou enas neoellenas me diploma tessaron menon me idiokteto agnoese to kokkino sto phanari kai epese me apisteute takhuteta sten porta tou sunodegouexuperetese ton sumpheronton ton ergazomenonta pragmata den einai gia kanenan eunoika kai eidika gia tous mpasketmpolistespro trion eton o oropos emeine khoris neroexelixe tes touristikes kineses kai sto nesi tou ippokrate krinetai arketa ikanopoietike kathos e phetine touristike periodos apo pleuras arithmou episkepton ekhei kalupsei ta kena ton teleutaion etoneimaste etoimoi na eniskhusoume ten omada me oti zetesei o proponetes delose khthes sten o k kazanakessugkekrimene protoboulia agkaliasteke me therme toso apo ta mele ton duo sundesmonki ustera pali katalegeis legontas uparkhei logos pou to kanoungia to logo auto kai epeide uparkhoun polu kales phones ste khorodia proteiname sto demarkho mutilenes na mas anathesei kapoio maestroena akome live me entekhne ellenike mousike organonei ten pempte to mayfair sten prokumaiasto erkhetai kathe mera aphou kanei ta psonia tes kai prin gurisei spitiomos kai apo ten pleura tou o idioktetes psestarias k giorgos samaritakes tonizei oti sta kreata pou khresimopoiountai sto erakleio den uparkhei kanena problemaapoblepei ste biosimoteta ten ellenikoteta kai ten apaskholese tes aktoploias anephere kharakteristika o anaplerotes upourgosoi idiotikopoieseis kratikon epikheireseon se sunduasmo me ton exorthologismo sunolika ton pleres epharmoge nomou alogoskouphe tha apotelesoun ton deutero pulona auxeses esodon kai meioses dapanonna phtiaxoume epitelous auto to politistiko kentro epanelegkhontas ta skhedia tou kai ten khrese tou oson aphora ta eikastika prosarmozontas ta sto semeraprepei omos kai oi trapezes na demiourgesoun reustotetadiaitetes tou agona tha einai oi kk stamatesgeorgiouden ethele kai polu na prokupsei to souzantipote den mas enonei kalutera apo ten koine kallitekhnike sugkineseexartatai apo emas an e khora tha ekhei mellon opos tha ethele e nea geniapio sugkekrimena aute e nomismatike monada apallagmene phoron einai peripou euroapoleies kategrapse to asemi apoleies eos semeiosan ta amerikanika sumbolaia gia to asemi ten trite phthanontas sta dolkaterina boggole petukhe epidose metra kai ekatosta e anastasia kelesidou erixe stamalista aphou kaneis graphtei uporei na anazetesei poioi alloi khresiuopoioun ten epharuoge philoi tou e okhi kai na erthei se epaphe uazi tous paraterontas ti ekanan ue tis dikes tous photographiesteleutaios barlames epanerkhetai sto agapemeno thema tou suggraphea pos denontai muthoplasia aphegese kai istoriaan ekhoun oloi semainei oti den ekhei kanenas sugkekrimenes euthunes gia sugkekrimenes praxeisaxia anaphoras apo to mats tou tel abib e phase tes entones logomakhias tou tekhnikou ton tourkon ataman me to megalo asteri tes omadas igkor rakosebits skhedon lepta prin to telos tou mats pou eikhe os sunepeia o tourkos na men xanakhresimopoiesei to serboden mporei na apokleisei kaneis olous tous allousexaphanise tes karen silkgount mia apo tis kaluteres tainies tou kholigount guro apo tous kindunous pou krubei e purenike energeia gia eirenike khresegia ten prothumia ton bouleuton mas na diexelthoun enos tetoiou semantikou kaiomos den xeroun oti ekhei ginei lathos stis exetaseisprepei oloi ten kuriake na ton boethesoun etsi oste na men upobibasteikuklos ergasion tes phetos tha xeperasei ta disk boulgarakes sugkalese ektakte suskepse gia ten trite prokeimenou na antimetopisthei e katastase eno apagoreuteke e kinese ton okhematon sto dromo perimetrika tes limnes apo ton demo kissamoubasei ton arithmon metroou pou uparkhoun sten e pio palia omada apo tis pou tha paroun meros ston kretiko omilo tou periphereiakou einai o erodotos kai akolouthoun e me tonta sumperasmata apo ta philika odegoun tous eruthroleukous sten anazetese anastaltikou mesou marko pantelits kheirokrotetheke apo olous akome kai apo tous opadous tes kherenphenemeromenia ekkineses pleromes tou merismatos oristheke e iouliouoi astunomikoi douleuoume tis kuriakes tis episemes argies douleuoume te nukhta de tha dekhthoume na sunekhisoume na douleuoume khoris na pleronomaste delose o k alexioumesa su ena khrono katapherame kai lusame to problema kai auto einai kata te gnome mou mia polu semantike epitukhiaprotos talaiporeitai apo ena periknemiaio oidema eno o deuteros apo thlase ston astragalootan trome trophes me polla lipe alati zakhare kai thermides diegeirontai kai prokalountai allages sta kentra epibrabeuses tou egkephalouspelaiographies kai protogona antikeimena apo te nea gouinea apokaluptoun ten apekhese pou eikhan stous sourealistes e stous ekprosopous tou germanikou expresionismoutheoroume te proteinomene anadiarthrose os anesukhetike antallage epeide sumphona me tis demosies deloseis apo tous europaious ithunontes einai pithano na odegesei se apoleies gia tous emporikous pistotesantones repanes enas authentikos ergates tou laikou tragoudiou opos thelei kai o idios na ton apokaloun sunekhizei na upographei me te monadike phone tou ena programma pou xesekonei ton kosmo sten pistaden einai tukhaio loipon pou oi italoi epanerkhontai gia ten pithanoteta metagraphes tou nearouk mikhales petrakes dieuthuntes tou institoutou mas episemainei oti oi times den einai khameles eno paraterountai kai megales exarseis se sunduasmo me tis meteorologikes sunthekessumphonia anamenetai na oloklerothei mekhri tis arkhes tou deuterou trimenoudioti tote allios tha etan ta pragmata an sunainousan kai semera erkhontai na thumethoun tous khamelomisthous ten idia ora pou ekhoun daimonopoiesei tous ergazomenous sto demosio kai ekhoun metatrapei se kunegous kephalonmono pou kai s auten ten periptose den arkei mono to skhedio alla kai e gennaia khrematodotese tes apaitountai peripou ekgia na doume ti ekhoume ste gallia kai te ligue arkhika eikha sto mualo mou treis asous ste megale kategoria sent etien lil alla telika tha krateso mono te deuterethessalonike na tonizei prokhthes radiophonika stis phulakes koimountai anthropoi sto patomaeinai to kentro anaphoras giati zei dipla sto bosporo o bosporos os topothesia einai mageutike opote demiourgei ta prota oneira tou kai diapistonei kapoia stigme oti prepei na akolouthesei ta semadia pou tou parousiazontai mprosta toukitrinopteros thunnus albacares kai o makrupteros thunnus alalunga katatassontai sta skhedon apeiloumenaprepei omos na diateresoume tous khamelous tonous kai na douleuoume me semnotetakai ten epomene tha paei ste doxologia kai tha parastei kai sten parelasekata te sunantese pou eikhan me ton proedro tes boules tou epedosan psephisma me ta aitemata tousoi euroekloges ekhoun idiaitere semasia gia ten ellada giati ta duo megala kommata ekhoun skhetisei to apotelesma me tis ethnikes eklogespano apo pteseis ekhoun akurothei ten teleutaia ebdomada me apotelesma na proklethei terastio khaos sta europaika aerodromiato pio eukolo sten ellada einai na kopseis ena dentro monologeiapo ten pule konta ste boreioanatolike akropole mpainoume sto kastrosumphona me plerophories apo te larisa sunelephthe enas upekoos bretanias pou kateikhe enan sklero disko me deka arkheia pornographikou ulikouoi ependutes prepei na skephtoun se makroprothesmo orizonta kai na upologisoun tis thetikes prooptikes eisodou tes khoras mas sten alla kai tis dunatotetes ton ellenikon epikheireseonston agona ton metron opou summeteikhan dromeis e maria mikhalopoulou etan prote sta koritsia me epidose eno o alexandros piperes etan protos sta agoria me epidosemonodromos e nike tou sunenteuxe tou argure sto ethnos ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous monodromos e nike touede me epistoles diamarturias philologoi zetoun apo ten na dothei mia suntome dieukrinise stous diorthotes oste na ginoun dektoi kai oi duo tupoi tonizontas kharakteristika oti mia ablepsia den prepei na steresei polutima moria apo tous mathetesal kainta den gennetheke sto pakistan eipe kai ste sunekheia edeixe prosos apotelesma ekhoume ten anaxiopistia tou politikou mas sustematos kai ten aporripse tou apo tous politesstis rizes de tes elias adeiazei to tasaki toukatastase aute odegese tous upallelous ton sten apophase na prokhoresoun sten enemerose ton politon gia to problema alla kai sten pragmatopoise apergiakon kinetopoieseongiati sunethos kathe phora pou mas episkeptetai e troika olo kai kapoies deloseis ekhoume gia luseis pou tha prepei na dothoun apo ten kubernese eis oti aphora ten exophlese ton khreonan kathe khorio ekhei orismenous energous polites ethelontes ston tomea tou prasinou tote mporoun na ginoun thaumatasemera den uparkhoun polites niketes kai ettemenoi uparkhoun politikes pou ettethekan kai prepei na anatrapounekhtisan skholeia nosokomeia gerokomeia orphanotropheia ka oi apogonoi tous zoun sten eleuthere ellada kai ploutisan kataklebontas tensunaulia tha dothei te deutera stis sto amphitheatro tes ioniou akademiasden gnorizo na uparkhei sten ellada analogo istoriko proegoumeno apo ton pagkosmio polemo kai meta te exairesei tes khountaspiel diekdikei ekatston idio agona etrexe kai o giannes papamikhael tou o opoios termatiseden niothete na periorizeste enas kallitekhnes se ena nesi den mporei para na einai kai ligo egklobismenos kai auto einai kati pou tha prepei na to katalabei kai o kosmosaskholeito me to sundikalismo kai malista etan upopsephios demotikos sumboulos stis proegoumenes ekloges sto burona me to sunduasmo tes aristeres politikes parembases tou staurou tzortzioteparallela tha prospathesoun na paroun rebans gia ten adike etta tou protou gurou sto bardinogianneiopera apo tis euthunes tes politeias omos prepei kai emeis na allaxoume polles apopseis gia ta pharmakatelos toso o demos mpizaniou oso kai o demos anatoles tha protassoun stis apophaseis tous os proto enallaktiko senario te diaterese tous os anexartetes ontotetes gia logous istorikousisos ligo parakato isos sto exoterikoden nomizo oti uparkhei opoiosdepote pou mporei na apodekhthei kati tetoio tonise kharakteristika o k pantoulasase pou sto estiatorio tou xenona mageireuoun kalutera ki ap te mamaoi martures pou ekhoun protathei na klethoun na katathesoun einai o proistamenos dieuthunses stoikhematos tou eliopoulos o proedros tes panakhaikes alk niketiades xekatharise oti e politeia tha merimnesei oste na ektamieuthoun ta peripou khilstis kuroseis enantion tes giougkoslabias emplekontai phoreisee pou skhetizontai me tis armodiotetes tou staurakakemeta tis askeseis taktikes oi paiktes tou ergotele epaixan diterma me ton empeiro tekhniko na dokimazei arketa skhemataetsi einai san na leei ston anagnoste kleinontas tou to matiisos se kapoious sumpherei na to metapheroun auto kai den ennoo ten k kolona pou agapaei tous anthropous autoussemera omos mas erkhetai kai o paouel kai sten athena kai te thessalonike etoimazontai na ton upodekhtoun me sugkentroseis kai diadeloseis kai kala tha tou kanounprepei na sunetisteite amesa allios na dialusoume ta protathlemataeniskhuse tes prospatheias gia beltiose tes poiotetas se ola ta epipeda tes touristikes drasteriotetas einai e trite desmeuse pou tha ulopoiethei an ginei praxe to triptukho poioteta poioteta poiotetamekkos apanta sto aitema gkalep epaphe mas me to kratos den mporei na ginetai para sten episeme glossa tou kratousmporeite na suntaxiodotetheite os triteknos me te sumplerose tou etous tes elikias sasmagnetoskopemene metadose tou podosphairikou agona gia ten agglike premier ligk lintsmantsester giounaitentse politiko epipedo e gallia uposterizei ten ellada opos epibebaionetai apo deloseis tes neas kubernetikes ekprosopou upourgou proupologismou baleri pekres se ekpompe tou teleoptikou stathmouoi dioiketes ton nosokomeion se polles periptoseis emphanizontai na ekhoun agnoia gia tis spatales eite giati e katakhorise ton stoikheion ginotan apo tis uperesies eite giati ola moiazoun nomotupatrite augoustou mazike summetokhe stis duo apergiakes sugkentroseis duo megales isodunames apergiakes sugkentroseis me peripou atoma e kathe mia pragmatopoiethekan ten tetarte to proi ste mutilenedieisduse ton euruzonikon ten parousiazei apo to telos metaxu ton kratonmelon tou stoikheia opos epises ston tomea tes ereunas kai tes tekhnologikes anaptuxeseinai loipon phusiko na eudokimoun philies metaxu ton melon tes orkhestrasagonistika den uparkhoun problemata kathos o k giangianin ekhei olous tous paiktes ste diathese touto ergo pou einai to megalutero sten kerkura ta teleutaia khronia ekhei exairetike semasia kathos tha lusei to epi dekaeties udreutiko problema tou nomouaute e politike aporretou iskhuei gia ola ta proionta uperesies kai istotopous pou parekhei e google incmporei para te megale istoria tou ampeliou to amuntaio molis ta teleutaia khronia na anaduetai dunamika sto oiniko stereoma tes elladas omos e eurutere periokhe apotelei stokho gastronomikon exormeseon ap ole ten epikrateiaeimai enthousiasmenos pou tha prosphero ole te duname tes psukhes mou s aute ten upotheseto sunolo tou ellenikou ependedumenou kephalaiou anerkhetai sta ekanamorphose tou thesmikou plaisiou gia te diexagoge demopsephismaton einai mia apo tis protoboulies pou th analabei o neos upourgos esoterikon kh kastanidesprokeitai gia mia kinese strategikes semasias e opoia entassetai sto plaisio anadiarthroses kai epektases ton drasterioteton pou xekinese o megalos biomekhanikos omilos ten teleutaia dietiaaspida empistosunes sto empsukho dunamiko tou panathenaikou sekose o zesoualdo phereirataliateles me lakhanika kai krema apo phountouki prothermainoume ton phourno stouseidika gia tous pou en pollois einaitha akolouthesei to sabbato iouniou o stolismos ton alogon kai e anakhorese ton kabalaredon paneguriston ana parees apo ten agia paraskeue gia ten topothesia tauros opou brisketai kai to xokklesi tou agiou kharalampouseidikes agoges sto erakleiou prelorentzou khrusoula tou demetriounea melete gia tis parembaseis pou khreiazontai na ginoun sten kentrike odo tes periokhes einai agnosto se ti stadio brisketai aphou e periphereia leei oti akoma ten perimenei eno o demos uposterizei pos ten ekhei steilei pros egkrise edo kai kairooi idies plerophories anapheroun oti se dike pou pragmatopoietheke e suzugos tou k papakonstantinou dikaiotheke kai exakolouthei na katekhei to en logo posostomia dimoiria ton pou emphanisteke arkhika sten odo nikes kai ste sunekheia sten karageorge serbias dekhteke ten epithese sugkentromenon me petres kai mpoukaliato nomisma auto ekhei ena basiko elattoma apo ten arkhe kai auto einai oti den uposterizetai apo mia politike enose e ena koino tameioskhetika me tis deloseis tes k gerakoude peri antipoliteuses o k katsaros epesemane oti an sten periphereia kapoioi ennooun oti diekdikontas ta dikaia tou nomou kanoume antipoliteuse tote nai kanoume antipoliteuseantitheta o kunodontas sokare ligo ten omogeneiakai se kathe periptose dikhos na lambanetai upopse e athletike koinonike kai oikonomike diastase tes upotheses dikhos na sunektimethei o diethnes diasurmos dikhos na lambanetai prosbalei kai me nomika mesa ten peraitero apokratikopoiese tes epikaloumene to gegonos oti e politeia ekhei anagnorisei pos e periousia tou asphalistikou phorea ton ergazomenon einai ensomatomene sten periousia teskhronia tora ekhoume aute ten aporia alla apantese den ekhoume pareiapo ten alle o keraunos pou epises eikhe repo apektese sugkatoiko sten koruphe ten lemnou pou emeine ste leuke isopalia sto gepedo tes me ton aeto plakasopote ekeino pou menei einai o idiotikos phoreasperipou anthropoi kai asiatikoi elephantes ekhoun khasei te zoe tous apo to ste boreioanatolike india exaitias tou akerukhtou polemou pou ekhei xespasei anamesa tousto parapano apospasma einai apo to prologiko kephalaio tou bibliou tou protoproi sustaseis milousan gia enan tekhnite podosphairiste aristo kheiriste tes mpalas kai ikano mprosta apo ten antipale estiaekdeloseis ste mneme nikephorou nanere paraskeue augoustou paraskeue augoustou me duo ekdeloseis aphieromenes ste mneme tou nikephorou proponetes oloi eimaste etoimoizaros anoixe to skor sto me ton papadake pou ekmetalleutheke ten asthene apokrouse tou armoutake sto sout tou alexake kai me neo sout apo konta ekane tosten arkhe to suzetesame osto prospheretai me ekptose apo eos kai eurokata ten tetarte sunedriase tes ebdomadas e ellenike khrematisteriake agora kinetheke statheropoietikapsukhopiestikoi paragontes pou sunebalan s aute ten praxe anapherontai oi exosuzugikes skheseis tes suzugou e epithetike sumperiphora tes e apomonose apo ton koinoniko periguro e esostrepheia tou kai to aisthema ntropes pou eniothepsete agkinara me augotarakho elaiolado kai banilia apo ton seph kosta tsigka to aroma tes banilias einai apo ta pio methustika kai plousiaalla kai to pano meros apo ta phulla apo tis lemonies tou kepou mou eikhe aspres grammes pou moiazane me phidakiaanalutika ta tmemata pou tha leitourgesoun me tis ores kai tous topous diexagoges ton proponeseon mm sto mini gepedo erodotoudominikane omada ergazetai upo ten prostasia ton bolibianon kuanokranonprokrise tes stis tesseris koruphaies omades tou planete asphalos kai einai epibrabeusimo paroti den kataphere na apokleisei te megale brazilia kai na prokrithei ston telikome allothi ten upotimese odegoun sten exathliose to ton ellenon pisteuei e apogeumatineten idia stigme axiopoieitai o ethelontismos kai to programma apagoreuetai e polese proionton kapnou se khorous parokhes uperesion diadiktuou kathos kai to kapnisma stous khorous autouskalokairiatika omos apheste to patinouar ston purgo tou aiphel kai prokhoreste pros ta kato oneireuomai ena on the road apo te napole ste massalia mia epikheireseskoupa apo to mpoem sto souper sik kai pisoto kathemerino programma tes k dramountane einai arketa duskoloepisemainetai pos to o arithmos ton apaskholoumenon meiotheke kata peripou atoma kurios logo suntaxiodoteseon me apotelesma semera na ergazontai sten eisegmene peripou atoma enanti prin apo ena khronosemera prin metakinethei o brakhos tha phername mekhaniko geologo tha sigoureuomastan pou uparkhei nero kai epeita tha kaname mia geotrese se dekades e kai ekatontades metra tha buthizame upobrukhia moter sto udatino apothemaoi logoi pou epikaleitai gia te me sunainese tou einai abasimoi kai apoteloun proskhemata kai sophismatato mustiko ton ntopion apokaluphteke pleon khare sten eukole prosbase pou prospherei e egnatia odosupothese omos den ekhei kleisei oristikateleutaia phora etan eis baros tes ethnikes omadas polo gunaikon tes elladas meoi kato khor epimenoun gia ten plere sunergasia tes serbias me to dikasterio tes khages serbia ollandos upourgos exoterikon ouri rozenthal epanelabe se sunenteuxe tou ten tetarte maiou pros ten emeresia tou beligradioetsi demiourgei me aristotekhniko tropo mia mikre koinonia monakhikon anthropon pou ekhoun oloi skoteines pleures o kathenas apo tous opoious mpleketai me ton allon okhi gia na spasei te monaxia pou einai diakhute sto muthistorema alla gia na ten eniskhuseipleronoume phthenotero eisiterio ston os epibates alla ton pleronoume panakriba os phorologoumenoi politessto podosphairo alloste ta panta mporoun na sumbounto apodeiknuei alloste kai e topike epikratese ton neodemokraton upopsephion nomarkhon kata ton proto guroeinai mia bradia aphate lousmene sto pheggarophoseniskhuse tou phoroeispraktikou mekhanismou einai epeigousaauxese aute opheiletai kurios ste beltioseton tokon apo titlous statheres apodoseskai phantasteite pos uperkhe kai nekre zone ekei aphou se aute ten exedra thura antistoikhousan ta eisiteria pou episemos parelabe o ares sunolika eikhe opadouseroteseis griphoi kai paikhnidia tha exapsoun te phantasia oson brethoun semera stis arkhanes eno parallela tha tous dothei e eukairia na gnorisoun ten paradosiake komopolese oti aphora ten apokatastase tou diktuou tes psaropetras e opoia semeioteon einai toso ligo to nero pou akome kai diktuo na uperkhe nero de tha epherne tora sten pole anamenetai o ergolabos na apokatastesei te zemia mesa se eikosi ergasimes meresruthmos anaptuxes tes kupriakes oikonomias kata to deutero trimeno tou upologizetai se se sugkrise me to antistoikho trimeno tou sumphona me ten prokatarktike ektimese tes statistikes uperesiasnarkotike ousia kataskhetheke eno se baros tou askethekan poinikes dioxeis se bathmo kakourgematossto linto apla oi diaitetes den mas adikounepises to basiko montelo diathetei sklero disko pou mporei na phtasei omos sta sto akribotero montelo tes seirasomos tha prepei na xeroun oti tha prospathesoume na exaleipsoume ta paikhnidia ton manatzer kai genika oson theloun na bgaloun kerdos apo tetoies upotheseisto oti den einai e sponde alla to baroulko to brekan kala diabasmenoi sto mathema ton gkourme mathematikonkur demetros den etan san tous allous etan romantikos kalliergemenos anthropos khronia polla ieropsaltes sto khorio kai polla khronia sten agia kuriaketous allous den mporo na tous empisteutopara tis antirreseis tes olgas o pateras tes zetaei apo ton stephano na ginei koumparos tousden termatise ston teliko e omadagia mena isos eperease kai to gegonos oti os dodekanesios ego breka stenous desmous me tous katoikous tes poles autesta city guides tou time out wwwgia ton idiotiko tomea upogrammise oti ton piezei uperogka e kubernese kai auto den einai epiloge pou epebale e troika alla ten apophasise toopos anamenotan na sumbei e katastase tou teleutaiou metagraphikou apoktematos ton peiraioton epanektimetheke te deutera kai ta nea etan kalaeinai ena exeidikeumeno biblio alla opoiosdepote endiapheretai idiaitera tha mporei na to breitis dokimazoume kai prosthetoume an khreiazetai alati kai piperi katharizoume te skelida tou skordou ten koboume apo kato kai me to kommeno meros triboume kala olo to esoteriko enos pelinou kata protimesin pirexena omos prepei na phtiakhtei sigouragkran gkiniol mats egine sto opou o olumpiakos stis kathustereseis tou agona kerdise ton hrakle kai diateretheke sten koruphe tou bathmologikou pinakachapel uperxe panta protoporos panta mprosta apo ten epokhe tou an zouse semera pethane to tha etan sigoura enas leaderston kosmo tou uparkhei agonia gi aute te sunantese kathos an prokhoresei to deal kalupse enos merous tes auxeses tou metokhikou kephalaiou tora me eisroe ekateinai omos sigouro oti aute e duskole anephora tha mas paei se mia nea poreiakapoioi alloi omos phainetai alla diakeruttoun kai diaphoretika prattounphetos pantos sigoure tha einai e apousia tou bouleute k tolka o opoios tha dinei te makhe tou ste boule me ten psepho empistosunes pou zetese o prothupourgos k papandreouta aderphia mas apo to beligradi phonazan sta ellenika eisai sto mualo kati magikoto phlouri tes protokhroniatikes pitas pou ekopse khthes o semites den epeseos sunethos stoilao ante kai gia ta paliotera khronia ston proedro alla se ena demosiographo ton baggele giakoume pou breke ekei sten akre ena kommati paraitemeno kai to peregegonos bebaia einai oti polles phores ste diarkeia ton teleutaion dekaetion o demos rodou epikheirese na antimetopisei to kuklophoriako problema khoris omos apotelesmaupo auto to kathestos den einai na aporei kaneis pos o thesauros tes akinetes periousias tou demosiou paramenei anaxiopoietosekdothekan timologia gia dapanes demosion skheseon eide kulikeiou nera kaphedes klp opos anapheretai stis anakoinoseis sunolikes axias eurota kathara pro phoron kerde tes etaireias anelthan kata tous protous exi menes tou trexontos etous se disparousiase upselo puretoste diorganose ginontai exairetika paikhnidia ki etsi kanenas den einai se these na gnorizei poia omada tha katalabei ten prote these kai opos ola deikhnoun auto tha to gnorizoume ten teleutaia merasten arkadia epikheiroun purosbestes me okhemata atoma pezoporo tmema aeroplana kai ena elikopteroapo ton philippo den agonisteke proleptika o kogiasotan to katalaban prospathesan na epitakhunoun alla etan argaeimai ekplektos omos an okhi thumomenos gia to gegonos oti apo kairou eis kairon emphanizontai arthra pou diadidoun sto koino kai stis agores oti e ellada arkhizei takha na mpainei se katastase khreokopiasto sugkrotema tou giozits den bretheke se kale emera kai o isemerinos pere te nike khoris na duskoleutei idiaitera kathos eikhe ten agonistike uperokhe kai tis perissoteres eukairies gia na phtasei sto thetiko apotelesmaden mporei na sunekhizetai epi makron aute e katastasemazi tou tha prepei na antimetopisoun ena neo ekhthro ton parallax o opoios apeilei na katastrepsei ten isorropia dunameon sto sumpanbebaios oi elegkhoi den tha ginoun mono stous sugkekrimenous dromous kathos tetoiou eidous problemata uparkhoun se polles periokhesto maio tou exelege melos tou ethnikou sumbouliou tou sto sunedriona maste loipon kai stis paramones tes agias markellas tes megaluteres khiakes panegureos tou kalokairiou gia mia akome khronianomos e axiologese ton ekpaideutikon esoterike axiologese tou ekpaideutikou sustematos apotelei apo khthes apophase tes boules katopin onomastikes psephophorias pou diexekhthe sten olomeleia tou somatosapo tote mas ekhoun proteinei khiliades idees kai polla megalepebola skhedia sta opoia omos den ependusamearage tha einai oi idioi oikologoi tote to kai logo tes sugkurias den katapheran na ekmetalleuthoun ten eukairia ten apolesan to idio erasitekhnika oso ten eikhan kerdiseiantipaloi mas einai oi kakoi ergodotes kai oi opoioi kai kanoun apoluseismaimoudismos oti xeno einai kai oraioto teleutaio kommati tes diadromes mesa ste zougkla katephorizei pros ta ereipia ton incas huinay huayna oreskai pali o skhediasmos upothese ton dioikeseon ton nosokomeion kai xana oi giatroi tha apophasisoun sumphona me ta kala kai ta sumpherontato mono pou prepei na kanete einai na to sundesete sto okhema sas kai na gemisete ten tampleta sas eno odegeite e akoma kai sto kampingk e sten paralia opou oi prizes spanizounupokhreotike apomakrunse ton katoikon pou menoun se periokhes me khamelo upsometromen xekhnate to proino geuma pou einai oti pio semantiko gia to xekinema tes neas merasetan sugkentromenoi ede ekei prosphuges ap ola ta nesia tou aigaiougia prote phora stous duo autous nomous e anegerse ton xenodokheion epikhoregeitai me pososto kai e opoia mporei na ginei e kai otan prokeitai gia mikres epikheireseissto demotiko pneumatiko kentro bares tha analaboun kathekonta gia okto menes enas ekpaideutes theatrikou paikhnidiou enas ekpaideutes mousikes kai enas ekpaideutes politistikon drasteriotetonoi aggeloi ston paradeiso miloun ellenika ekdkai me ton proedro tou konstantopoulo kubernetikos ekprosopos khrprasine anaptuxe gia ta giannena semainei demosia erga kai demosies upodomes pou tha eunooun tis metaphores kai tis metakineseisanaphorika me to kostos zoes upologizetai oti ta meniaia exoda enos phoitete ste gallia kumainontai apo eos drakhmesgiati na xeroume na katalabainoume kalutera sten tuphla mas amorphotoi opote na men xeroume pou patame pou pegainoumekitrine karta ston elton gia kathustereseta anasuromena osta den esan topothetemena se kibotia alla ekeinto khuden upedaphios egkataleimmena prophanos apo tous oikeious kai suggeneis ton nekron apo pentekontaetias kai pleondeiktes upseles kephalaiopoieses semeiose apoleies se pososto eno o deiktes tes mesaias kephalaiopoieses upokhorese se pososto kai o deiktes tes mikres kephalaiopoieses semeiose ptosegia tous pio klassikous ton geuseon uparkhoun mageireuta phageta kathe mera diaphoretikakairos athena pem aug gourmet kuriake noembriou men ten pieite mono mageirepstepraktika auto semainei pos prostheke lemoniou e gkreip phrout sten kathemerine diatrophe sas den prokeitai na sas adunatiseidiaphoretika oi agrotes tha parameinoume ermaia tes kuberneseskhtupontas mia palia nostalgike khorde to paikhnidi diaterei ola ta basika kharakteristika tou eidous prospherontas aphthono kai akhalinoto xuloopos anaphertheke e metrese ton apotelesmaton tes protoboulias tha pragmatopoiethei sto telos tou khronou eno exetazetai endekhomene epektase tes se oles tis poleis tes khorasdiabaste opos akribos tuponontai me autokineto mporeite na phtasete sto mesologgi kai sto aitoliko meso tes gephuras riou antirrioudustukhos o ekhei apomakrunthei polu apo ten deutere theseauten te phora pithanos de tha diamarturethei o lamprinides alla men ekhete uisthologikon perikopon tes sunekhous auxeses ton euueson phoron kai tes politikes ton trapezon pou eno ekhoun labei peri ta disto episkeptontai kurios bretanoi episkeptesstis ekdoseis rack sto apaitetiko epaggelma tes mageirikes tekhnessten ounix kazan tha sunekhisei ten kariera tou o proen phorgouornt tou are maik ouilkinson eno o proen koouts ton kitrinon gkornton khermpert anelabe ten almpa berolinouomada me bathos peitharkhia kai axiologous paiktes diethete phetos o ergoteles kathos kai mia epitrope me empeirous paragontes oi opoioi sunekhos etan dipla sten omada gia kathe problemaepitrope poiotetas zoes tha prepei na sunedriazei na blepei tis kataggelies pou ginontai kai na pairnei apophaseiseno e serbia kai to geitoniko maurobounio ekhoun ekplerosei tis perissoteres apo tis sugkritikes metreseis epidoseon eipe o mparo e pgdm tis ekhei ekplerosei olespisteuoume oti mia politike luse einai dunatesuskepse tha ginei stis to proi sto khoro tes epitheoreses ergasias me te summetokhe stelekhon tes uperesias melon tes dioikeses tou ergatikou kentrou kathos kai ton dioikeseon tes tes omospondias emporon kretes kai tou sundesmou ksenodokhonto trito stephani epistrephei ste skene to polusuzetemeno trito stephani epistrephei ste skeneekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous etta tes neas demokratias den mporei na krupsei alles duo parametrous ton eklogon apokhe espase rekor apousiazei gia epaggelmatikous logous ste diathese tou kathos elexe kai e poine pou eikhan oi mikhos mparkhampasperiokhe ton sapon theoreitai mia apo tis pio upobathmismenes periokhes tes europeseinai os ean to koinoniko zetema kai to aitema gia koinonike dikaiosune kai alleleggue na ekhoun pleon diagraphei apo ten emeresia diataxeaitese gia adeia upebale kai to ten teleutaia stigme gi auto kai den duskolo to akatorthotokhalarosame sto trito set kai to plerosame alla brekame to ruthmo mas ste sunekheiame ten ekdose mias neas metokhes ana mias palaias sten time ton euro ana metokhepolitike omos me sosialistiko periekhomeno semainei oti prospatho na anatrepso auto to suskhetismo prospatho na elegxo ta noumera kai protasso tis anthropines zoes enanti ton kerdonamesos stokhos pleon einai na oloklerothoun oi tropopoieseis pou zetethekan sten melete apokatastases kai na prokhoresei os pros to ena skelos e parembase eno tha menei se ekkremoteta e allage khresesden brethekan kai semeiotheke tzak potneimar einai to asteri tes selesao alla den pauei na einai ena paidi pou proerkhetai apo mia kourastike sezon me te santos kai akouei tis seirenes tes tselsi kai tes real na ekhoun enokhletika sta aphtia touostoso oi giatroi proeidopoioun oti den prepei oute gia deuterolepta na xegelastoume kai na koitaxoume ton elio katamata giati kinduneuoume na pathoume anepanorthotes blabes sta matiamia koinonia se skhetike aphasia pou pairnei mprosta mono apo tis photies ton paidion tes pou diamarturontai gia ena mellon dikhos elpida opos to dekembremonadon epipeda pou an ta proseggisei e agora mporei na dosoun mia anodike antidrase me antistaseis stis kai monadeskai eipane leei kharitologontas po po na mas blepan oi germanoi os tis ti kanoume ti tha legane gia mas pos tha pame ste douleia mas kai tis leo entaxei topes esu kai mou to leskomision uposterizei ten upopsephioteta tou kossobou na katastei melos tes europaikes trapezas anasugkroteses kai anaptuxesola ta epimerous programmata tha ulopoiesoun oi demotikes epikheireseis kai oi anaptuxiakes etairies tes autodioikeses protou bathmou eno oi proslepseis gia ta programmata koinonikon uperesion tha ginoun meso tou eno gia ta upoloipa meso touoi gepedoukhoi mpekan polu dunata sto paikhnidi kai eutukhesan na proegethoun molis sto lepto tes anametresesna omos pou plethos neon agglophonon sugkrotematon emphanizontai kai auto pithanotata einai to mono eidos ellenikou tragoudiou pou antheiden aisthanomaste apologoumenoi den aisthanomaste strimogmenoi den eimaste apaisiodoxoisugkekrimena ten tetarte o ares tha antimetopisei te beroia sto kleanthes bikelides eno to sabbato tha upodekhthei ten kerkura kai pali sto gepedo tou se mia prospatheia na bgoun oso dunaton pio axiopista sumperasmatamia poreia pou edeixe oti e trapeza einai orime kai antagonistike gia na antimetopisei tis prokleseis tes neas pragmatikotetas opos anephere kharakteristika o k lempidakesapeuthunomai s esas pou gia na anoixete ta phtera sas kai na anaptuxete te demiourgikoteta sas anagkastekate n anazetesete allou topo katoikiasromanide khoris kamia enemerose gia tis telikes sas protheseis e opoia ousiastika anakalese ta osa prophorika kat arkhen suzetethekan sumphonethekan kai uiothetethekan kai apo allous phoreisan egkrithei tha prokhoresoume sten kataskeue tou an kai to kostos anamenetai na xeperasei ta disakome apophasisteke e sustase epitropes protase tes meizonos antipoliteuses apo eidikous prokeimenou se sugkekrimeno khroniko diastema na ginei katagraphe ton epikindunon semeion tou odikou diktuou kai na katatethoun protaseis stis armodies uperesiesautes ekhoun na kanoun me pteseis parakoloutheseon alla kai elegkhou me ten anartese diaphemiseon ston ourano akoma kai me pteseis gia te metaphora tes nuphes sten ekklesiaopos delose o upourgos oikonomikon giorgos papakonstantinou tha sustathei kai mia epitrope misthon me te summetokhe kai te sunergasia ton koinonikon etairon kai kurios tes gia te diamorphose tou eniaiou misthologiou tou demosiou tomeapoies bullock jolie aniston diaz roberts oles phagane te skone tes ermiones pou to kinematographiko souxe tou harry potter phainetai oti tes bgeke se kalo kai sten tsepe tesoi suzeteseis briskontai ede se exelixe se tekhniko epipedo toniseoloklerotheke e auxese tou metokhikou kephalaiou tes seafarm meso tes opoias e etairia antlese sunolika kathos eikhan pesei polla leuka psephodeltiaora ton protathletons ekpompe me phaseis gkol reportaz kai sunenteuxeis ton protagoniston apo to protathlema podosphairou ethnikes kategoriastopouzes einai khronon epithetikos kai proerkhetai apo ten kozane eno o sauaropoulos einai khronon auuuntikos kai agonisteke ston aeto skudraskathe skholeio ekhei dikaioma na summetaskhei me mia omada mathetontrion se kathe athlemastis stis to apogeuma tha episkephtei to demo akroteriou kai ste sunekheia stis to apogeuma to demo phreprosbase ginetai apo ton asphaltostromeno dromo pou odegei apo ten arakhoba sto khionodromikoliges ebdomades prin apo te sunantese sto semiramis eginan duo semantikes sunanteseis sto exoterikona kanei elegkhous e epitheorese ergasias kai to se ola ta katastemata estiases tes poles kai na timorethoun amesa osoi den asphalizoun kai den pleronoun kanonika tous upallelous tousta anapheromena prosopa ligotero kai e empedomene apopse kai pepoithese peri tes uparxes tes logo ton allepallelon diaitetikon kakourgematon kai agonistikon alloioseon perissotero tekmeriomenon kai epaletheuoun ten paraskeniake drase teseroglou exantletheke e upomone ntaouner arnetike stase tes ellenokupriakes pleuras ekhei exantlesei ten upomone tou eidikou sumboulou tou gg ton gia to kupriako alexanter ntaouner uposterixe o tourkokuprios egetes nterbis eroglousten attike uparkhoun ugrotopoi ek ton opoion mono oi duo prostateuontai nomika natura o skhinias kai e brauronaanti omos auta na aporriptontai os aporroia mias periorismenes antilepses ton idiaiteroteton mas prepei na ginoun kinetro autoexetases kai apallages apo tis ethnikes mas neuroseisprothesmia upoboles tes deloses summetokhes einai to argotero eos augoustouphetos ekleisan ton septembrio exenta khronia meta to misetes antipalouprepei na to praxoume dioti se polu mikro khroniko diastema tha brethoume na kolumpame sto bourko tou khoris sosibiokoboume gia to serbirisma ta rola sta bazoume sto piato ligo apo to tha anakoinothei semera to apogeuma tha brisketai kai o pirigia tou opoiou to deltio einai etoimo eno mekhri ten teleutaia stigme tha perimenoun ston ophe gia ton anastasiade an kai einai polu duskolo aithousa tha moiazei san to diaphemistiko spot sten teleorasese telephonike epikoinonia pou eikhame mazi tou mas eipe eimai polu kharoumenos gia to neo stathmo tes karieras mou kai elpizo oti ston panaigialeio tha mporeso na deixo akoma perissotero to talento moukai phusika na men to parakanoopoia parousia mas tha einai timetike pou na parei kai na sekoseieidikotera ta mikta kerde tou omilou kai sto khoro tes dutikes mesogeiouekdelose einai anoikte sto koinoto antitheto oi anthropoi autoi mas eipe erthan na uposterixoun ten anadiorganose tes trapezas kai kaneis den tous uposkhetheke oti tha meinountora brisketai se koma einai ekei kai tautokhrona allou kai guro tou ola moiazoun pragmatika me enan pseutiko tropoto phulladio auto malista anartetheke sten istoselida tou enos skholeiou khtupese e antiparathese sto koinoboulio otan e suzetese metaphertheke sta epeisodia sto suntagmaetsi e khthesine proponese eikhe oristei gia tisoi prosphates allages pou ekane e epereasan kai to protathlema tes lemnou me te diorganotria arkhe na diakhorizei tis omades se duo omilous ton epta omadonphiloxenoi anthropoi panemorphes paralies polu prasino to opoio malista kaluptei skhedon te mise ektase tou alla kai to monasteri tou panormite apoteloun idanike aphorme gia taxidista polu gluka piata giati na men pate ena bema parapera kai na men pieite ena samos grand cru e ena moskhoto lemnou kai ta duo kala pagomena malista ean to gluko piato einai kai to teleutaio mporeite na sunekhisete me to idio krasi kai sto glukooi photies pou demiourgethekan etan orates apo exenta miliakamia alle semaia den epitrepetai na anartatai se kratika ktiria tou kathe sustatikou kratous e se demosia periousiaena apo ta gnostotera muthistoremata tou einai time ton kinlokhapo ten alle pleura e tekhnete noemosune ton antipalon stratioton den einai akribos koruphaia odegontas tous teleutaious eite se anoetes kineseis eite pros to telos tou senariakou tmematos serikhnoume to zomo lakhanikon kai aphenoume na brasei se metria photia mekhri na phtasei sto misoeinai gnosto kai me ten onomasia tourkogephuro aphou edo egine mia megale makhe tou oplarkhegou theodorou ziaka me tous tourkouskrinontas isos apo to pio nearo tes elikias tou anti tou santses e kai apo to gegonos oti o kampore paizei se pio megale omada apo ton santses pou agonizetai ste balensiennebas o megalos potamos pou diatrekhei ten pole den ekhei pagosei kai kapoioi tolmeroi epikheiroun akome mini krouazieres kai skepazontai me tis koubertes pou tous prospherei o kapetaniosoi koinonies leophoreion entagmenon se upoballoun delose phorologias eisodematos entupo sto onoma tous kai me te delose aute sunupoballoun kai to entupoto peristatiko semeiotheke prokhthes stis to apogeuma otan e atukhe eikhe metabei ekei mazi me mia phile tes prokeimenou na pragmatopoiesoun pezoporia sten aprokremne aute periokhekoruphaies empeiries ste geneteira ton trends pole pou den koimatai pote to europaiko nesi anatolika ton enomenon politeion e nea uorke paramenei geneteira stil kai taseonoi armodies arkhes tha prepei na laboun ta metra tous kai e astunomia na auxesei tis pezes peripolies tes idios tora enopsei ton eorton ton khristougennon pou e kinese tha einai auxemene sten agoramalista estiase ton politiko stokho ton eklogon stous sunteretikous demous stous opoious tha prepei na phusexei neos aerasotan kleinei mia sumphonia prepei na khaireteseis enan enan tous pareuriskomenous apo ten alle pleura kai na pieis me ton kathena xekhorista monorouphi ena poto pou moiazei me te dike mas rakeoi grammes tou trenou eikhan kopei kai me ta podia pernoun apenanti kai mpainoun se allo trenoupo meriko elegkho oi purkagies pempte augoustou pempte augoustou upo meriko elegkho ekhoun tethei ola ta purina metopa pou xespasan ten tetarte stis periokhes palaiokhori kato mesogge agkrinetai aparadekte e demiourgia mias tetoias khreses ktiriou se enan toso zotiko khoro tes poles khoris ten ek ton proteron ekponese meletes kuklophoriakon epiptoseonauto to kleidoma kai malista se anatimemene time dieukolunei ten meiose ton epitokion apo ten trapeza tes elladastha eimaste arogoi tha eimaste mazi sas eipe kharakteristika gia te diasose auton ton mnemeion anapheromenos sten epistrophe ton marmaron tou parthenonagia lepta sto paikhnidi keraunos kai ena sten adiaphore etta ste salamina gia ten teleutaia agonistiketo idio iskhuei kai gia ten oikogeneia tsirkaden einai pleon kommati tes omadas alla den sugkinei kanenan e apokhorese touos apotelesma to ephthase ta ekatto podosphairo pege khronia pisoton kalosorizoume kai pali ste megale oikogeneia tou kai eukhomaste e epistrophe tou na sunduastei me megales epitukhiessto islam eite theologika eite laographika o alexandros theoreitai prophetike morphe eleo theou basilias philosophos makhetes uper pisteos stratelates me skopo ten exaplose tou islam ston kosmoallaxe tous kanones tou paikhnidiou exartontas tis pleromes tes apo ten ikanoteta tes oikonomias tes kai sugkekrimena apo te metabole tou tes kai apo te summetokhe tou plethusmou tes sten agora ergasiasaxiopiste kai iskhure periphereia pou katokhuronei o kallikrates kai pou tha ulopoiesei o sunduasmos kentrike makedonia metopo anaptuxes demiourgei tis proupotheseis gia na lusoume tetoiou eidous zetematalagkarnt phemizetai gia tis diapragmateutikes tes ikanotetes kai to diethnes prophil tes meta ton proedro sarkozi einai e deutere pio anagnorisime gallida politikos sto exoterikoektos apo tous neonumphous ton rolo tou aphegete analambanoun makrinoi e kontinoi suggeneis alla kai makrinoi sunergates pou anarotiountai giati proskalestekanakurotheke to ton krateseon gia ton aprilio eipemekhri stigmes ekhoun apokhoresei peripou tourkoi stratiotes apo ten oreine periokhe eno alles monades tou tourkiku stratou sunekhizoun tis ekkatharistikes tous epikheireseistha etan kako kai zemiogono kai gia mas kai gia ta paidia masse oti aphora ston arithmo ton edron opos kai tis psephous pou elaban oi sunduasmoi analutika ston pinaka phainetai pos den uperxan idiaiteres ekplexeis kai ta apotelesmata etan ta anamenomenasunolika delade sten periokhe epikheirousan purosbestes me okhemata atoma pezoporo kai okhemata kathos aeroskaphe kai elikopteraeinai sobaro to endekhomeno na anatethei e epimorphose se idiotes aphou den ekdelotheke endiapheron apo ta skholeiasemantike auxese sunolikon esodon ta sunolika esoda gia to a trimeno semeiosan auxese kai anelthan se ekatauxese ekatalexandros ekhei tromere adunamia sten metera tou ekhei pathos me tis gregores mekhanes kai me tis omorphes gunaikesopos epises oti o diadromos tou erakleiou kai tes thessalonikes einai entagmena sto os eniaio ergoiasonas lupetheke polu gia ton patera tou kai e aphosiomene tou medeia gia mia akome phora thelese na tou sumparastatheikai diarregnuei ta imatia tou oti einai enas paiktes pou tha kollesei kai sto sustema tou balberdetria gkol petukhe o meza kai ena o loutsiano me penaltisto idio plaisio exetazetai to endekhomeno na demiourgethoun megales ek ton opoion oi sten athena kai ste thessalonike pou tha stelekhothoun apo enan eidiko klado elegktonto einai apophasismeno na apotautistei apo mia eikona pou saphos adikei te diakhronike prosphora tou ston topotha prepei na petukhoumeidrutheke to apo ton osio louka kai tha entuposiasteite apo ta psephidota kai tis toikhographies ton naon kurios autes tes agias barbaraskai kapoioi anarotiountai giati o nomarkhes agnoese to demarkho pou mporei na ekhei anagke na ta khresimopoiesei gia alles proteraiotetes pou ekhei baleieinai gnoste e istoria anamesa stis duo omadeskai nai men gkriniaxan ligo sten arkhe otan omos ephtase tou epiphulaxan enthousiode upodokhekhreiazetai sullogike drase kat arkhen sto plaisio tes kai ste sunekheia ste diethne skene gia na mpoun phrena ste leitourgia ton agoron kai epeita apo dekaeties neophileleutheres asudosias e politike kai e koinonia na epanelthoun sto proskenioten oikogeneia tou san logotekhniko kausimoduo traumatistekan eno akome duo ergates exakolouthoun na agnoountaikai me ti tha mas bombardisoun apo telopsias pou tha barethoume na blepoume ta spot tou tha periekhoun stigmiotupa apo deloseis tou kosta karamanle prin apo tis proegoumenes ekloges tis opoies den terese os prothupourgosapostole tou apotelountan apo athletes kai athletries oi opoioi sugkrotesan sunolika pleromataapo ten alle uparkhei to antepikheirema oti me auton ton tropo xethoriazei e diaphoretikoteta tou kharaktera metaxu etaireion kai montelonmalista anepheran kai seira rematon opou ektelestekan ta erga opos auges leibadion sokhou poludendriou koimeterion askou numphopetras analepses euaggelismoumilesame mazi tes gia politike kai okhi monooi exelixeis einai kataigistikes gia ekeinento iphone sunekhizei na proegeitai me megale diaphora pano apo epharmoges alla sto idio khroniko semeio tes poreias tous to android ta paei kaluteraautous tous anthropous basizomaste os amesous phusikous sunergates gia na katastesoume epitelous ten komotene mia kalutere anthropine sugkhrone poleomos ta khremata auta den mporoun na xekinesoun n aporrophountaioi bretanoi kai e egkataleipoun ton mpantouba na antimetopisei mono tou te lailapa pou prokaleseotan to timomeno prosopo etan kapoios strategos epinoouse mpol me glukismata topothetemena pano se ena stratiotiko tropaio to opoio antikathistouse me mia lura otan eprokeito gia kallitekhne e me aiguptiaka skhedia gia enan epistemonaepipleon to eellgate london mporei na stathei aneta os singleplayer paikhnidi eno uposterizei kai multiplayer modeopos anapherei se skhetike anakoinose e trapeza kategrapse semantike eniskhuse kerdophorias apo tis ergasies sto exoteriko kata eno ten idia stigme anakoinose meiose leitourgikon dapanon kata sto trimeno kai sto examenoeite braduazei eite pheggei kai apergia kai sugkentrose stis oktobriou khoris ekplexeis pragmatopoietheke te deutera to apogeuma e genike suneleuse tes omospondias epaggelmation biotekhnon kai emporon sto epimeleterioti sas kanei na sekoneste to proi elpida pos e kainourgia mera tha einai kalutere apo te khthesineto mats me ten roumania einai kombiko kai me ten duname tes edras perimenoume to axiologo assaki na peraseistokheuoun sta paidia tes palaistines ste sunekhise tou laou mas upogrammise kharakteristika o proedros tes palaistiniakes paroikias tes thessalonikes assoki sentki o opoios anarotetheke pos to israel ekhei pagkosmia asuliapar ola auta e tsaslabska kuriarkhese ste gunaikeia gumnastike apospontas tessera khrusa kai duo argura metallia eno kata ten paramone tes sto olumpiako xorio episemopoiese me gamo ton desmo tes me ton sumpatriote tes giozeph ontlozileinai o monadikos demarkhos sten ellada pou petukhe tetoio rekorkhoros einai prosbasimos gia olous tous epibates kai episkeptes tou aerodromiou kai paramenei anoiktos kathemerina kai kathole te diarkeia touetsi to poimnio den kataphere na dei to pragmatiko tou sumpheron apotaxameno to ladiko kai to rouspheti kai gemise me koumasia politika te boule ton ellenon me ta gnosta tragika apotelesmatagiannes ekhei mia diaphoretike nootropia kai de thelei na ginetai kourastikosarnetheka entona ki ekeinos mou eipe oti auto einai meros tes douleias moutha proegethei stis sunantese ton thematikon omadonoi perissoteres teleoraseis einai outos e allos ephodiasmenes me tetoia thura eno akoma kai gia ta palaiotera montela pou ekhoun mono uparkhei eidikos antaptoras se polu khamele timeto programma auto ekhei organothei apo ten europaike enose kai tha summetekhoun alla stelekhe apo tis khores tes enosesoi etairies pou drasteriopoiountai se autous tous tomeis ekhoun kathara exostrephe prosanatolismo me poleseis se ole ten ellada kai diethnos kai sumbaloun kathoristika sten auxese tou tou nomou kai sten eniskhuse tes oikonomikes drasteriotetasbouleute tes aggelo uposkhethekan oti tha dosoun auxeseis stous misthous ton demosion upallelonskhetike anakoinose tes ekhei os exes anakoinonei te luse tes sunergasias tes me ton kamil tsontophalski ton opoio eukharistei gia ten prosphora tou sten omada mas kai tou eukhetai kathe epitukhia ste sunekheia tes karieras touse opoiadepote periptose parekhoume prosbase kai diorthose stoikheion parekhoume auten ten uperesia khoris kostos ektos tes periptoses pou apaiteitai dusanaloge prospatheiaexallou e bibliotheke den einai mono mia demosia uperesia alla ena politistiko idrumates periphereias sten opoia tha proothethei to olo themazapheiropoulos periphereiakos attikes kalogeropoulos demotikos sumboulos aigaleo kotronias demarkhos lamias kai papandreou periphereiakos sumboulos stereas elladasopos semeiose o oukranos presbes auxemeno einai ta teleutaia khronia to endiapheron oukranon na episkephtoun ten kreteden prepei na ta plenoume pote ephoson tha ta apothekeusoume sto psugeio para mono ligo prin katanalothounse nomotupe ereuna pou dienergetheke sten oikia tou bretheke posoteta akatergastes kannabes barous grammarion kai deka narkotika khapiato eparkhiako dikasterio tou osiek katadikase ton gkoran khatzits to se okto khronia katheirxe gia upokinese egklematon dolophonion katastrophes katholikon naon kai purpolese katoikion me serbon sto teni tooi katastematarkhes antimetopizoun ta teleutaia khronia semantika problemata eno den einai liga ta katastemata kai oi epikheireseis sto nesi pou ekhoun balei louketoakolouthei kai pali bema me bema ta mustika tes douleias tou kai telika blepei mprosta tou enan khruso akhino e ena ostrako e ena phullo apo ampeli kai aisthanetai oti ekhei petukhei kati semantikomini diakopes gia tous moises ourtado kai iban markano sto nesi tes elladasarkhise na sugkentronetai meta to me te demiourgia perissoteron magazion entos tes zones diaskedases pou ekhei oristei apo to demoapo plerophories pou ekhoume den mporei na entakhthei to ekteloumeno ergo sto opos skhediazontan paliotera epeide oi meletes tou eikhan ta gnosta problemataauta paremeinan etsi gia polu kairotou eukhomai na petukhei ton stokho tes o asteras giati tou axizeidelade mono ena ekatommurio psukhes peripou kalountai na odegesoun te khora sten exodo apo ten oikonomike upodoulose tou kephalaiouean sto endiameso ton sullaboun khoris khartia mporei na apelatheiprospathesa na sekotho xanaglistresa sta nera pou uperkhan sto patoma kai aphou ekana ena uperokho slalom pou tha to zeleuan polloi ekei sten arakhoba katorthosa na piasto apo ten karekla kai na sterixo to ponemeno mou kormiostoso to thema den to anoixan biastika oi demosiographoi alla o to an uparkhoun kapoies oikonomikes diaphores me ten o k doliotes apantese khareka gia to semeio sugklises pou uparkhei gia kai erasitekhnepara to gegonos oti ligoteroi ellenes ekanan diakopes kai oi xenoi touristes pou proselthan ste khora mas etan pio periorismenoi apo to anamenomeno oi kataggelies pou eginan ste sugkekrimene yperesia anelthan stisdapane kai gia ta duo programmata tha kaluphthei apo ton proupologismo touse autous tous dromous apagoreuetai austera e stase kai e stathmeuse kai ta paranoma stathmeumena autokineta tha apomakrunontai me gerano tes trokhaiasme ten epistrophe tou sten ellada e enaskholese tou toso sten ethnike pinakotheke oso kai ste skhole kalon tekhnon aporrophesan megalo meros tes drasteriotetas toukhreiazontai peripou menes gia na mporesei na oloklerothei sosta to theamaupeuthune gia to ergo tes anasteloses alla kai gia te diamorphose tou khorou etan e arkhitekton anna apostolou eno sumboulos sta statika themata etan o politikos mekhanikos kostas zampasproedros kai to tou erasitekhne ophe aisthanontai ten upokhreose na eukharistesoun ton proedro tou omilou peiraios k sala kai ton periphereiako dieuthunte k dandare gia ten apodokhe tou aitematos tou erasitekhne ophe na ananeothei e sunergasiata oikonomika ekhoun parei ton katephoro to mellon ton perissoteron krinetai abebaio alla skephteite sumponia sarkasmo aganaktese kai tosa allame ten topothetese tes aute diatereitai e paradose pou thelei ten europe na egeitai tou kai tis na egountai tes pagkosmias trapezasto de elleniko alphabeto aurio pempte augoustou stis to bradu sten plateia sapphous tes mutilenes o thiasos helixto kitrino upobrukhio paroti bretheke na khanei apo ten khetaphe anetrepse to skor kai elpizei akome sten kataktese tes thesesos ek toutou einai exairetika semantike e prostasia tou dermatos mas apo ton elio idiaitera ta teleutaia khronia pou ekleipei e phusike prostasia apo te zone tou ozontoseukhomai omos e prodosia apenanti sten patrida mas na ekhei ena termato megalutero khorio tou nesiou einai e agia marina sta stena sokakia tes opoias sigoura tha perpatesete gia na deite ta neoklasika spitia kai tis ekklesies tes agias marinas kai tou staurou tou khristouparthekan metra e tha einai arga ekhei problepsei kaneis tis sunthekes pou tha demiourgethoun sto pame na kerdisoume to kupello photes mplanes milese sten kamera tou gavrosasphaleia kai e aisthese elegkhou pano sta pragmata pou prospherei e routina gia kapoious einai themita stoikheia eidika otan uparkhoun se mia oikogeneia kai paidiato walkmanr diathetei pente diaphoretikes clear audio technologieskamia asulia se autous pou kategorountai gia diaphthora phonazan parallela oi diadelotes pou eikhan sugkentrothei sten pole taphilekh e opoia brisketai peripou khiliometra notia tes proteuousas katadikazontas kai autoi to koinoboulio tes ntropesgia logous iatrikes deontologias o markakes parekhorese ten proedria ston arkhaiotero tote ophthalmiatro tes poles pou telika parousiazetai stis teletes kai sta praktika eno sten ousia den gnorize oute ten emera enarxes tou sunedriouparamenei bebaia to thema tou ekhou alla kai auto lunetai eite me ten antistoikhe ependuse kai exoda eite me ten uparkhousa upodome nai ta ekheia tes lampatessas tsouzei okrisimo einai to epomeno paikhnidi opos kai ola ta epomena delose o neos proponetes tes omadas giannes stathopouloseinai gnosto edo kai polla khronia oti e sugkekrimene kategoria amoibaion apotelouse gia tis trapezes mia morphe atupes prothesmiakes katatheseskai de
