meta tous airetous erkhetai e seira ton upallelon na epimorphothoun sta nea dedomena pou demiourgei e dioiketike metarruthmise tou kallikratekatopin n aphierosoun khrono na milesoun me to daskalo na ton enemerosoun kai na kharaxoun apo koinou mia eniaia gramme gia to kalo tou paidiou tousakoma ki an polu perissotero phonazoun oi polles egkhromes photographies apo ton topo tou dustukhematos prin metakinethei to tzip kai telos oso ki an phonazei o pateras gia ton adiko khamo tou gkentiam o thorubos tou tzip ta kaluptei olasto semeio espeuse o iatrodikastes patron kai meta ten prote exetase e soros metaphertheke sten iatrodikastike uperesia prokeimenou diereunethoun ta aitia tou thanatou kai tautopoiethoun ta stoikheia tes tautotetas tou me te methodopantos oi eidikoi epistemones semeionoun oti e enarxe tes epokhikes exarses tes gripes anamenetai sto telos tou ianouarioukazantzakes okhi mono den aperripte to theo alla etan kai o threskeutikoteros apo tous sugkhronous ellenes logious kai poietes opos egrapse tote o konnos tsatsoskai tora stekomaste mprosta ste thura tes megales ebdomados opou onomazetai megale okhi giati einai megalutere e ekhei perissoteres meres alla epeide megala emin gegonen en aute para tou despotou katorthomataupo auten ten ennoia akome tous mathainoego den egrapha gia na demosieuso tipota ta egrapha gia parte mouan kai den uiothetetheke apo to sunolo tou agglikou tupou e eidese gia endiapheron apo to katar emphanizotan se arketa demosieumata tis teleutaies meres me tis plerophories na kanoun logo gia protase upsous dis lironameso antiktupo sta oikonomika apotelesmata tou omilou tes ekhae eikhe e arnetike poreia ton metokhon kai e kathizese tou ogkou ton khrematisteriakon sunallagon kata to enneameno ianouariou septembriou tou trekhontos etousan erkhontan oi kathegetes sou sten taxe pano sten amaxa tes authentias esu perna mesa sten taxe pezos ki aplospole mas apodedeigmena ekhei ta upselotera teledemopratese tou ergou tha ginei me diethne anoikto meiodotiko diagonismotime kai o diamerismos tou einai phlouopoios thelei na parakolouthesei tis prospatheies tous sta prokrimatika ton duo agonismaton opou ekhoun delothei tha prepei na ekhei ede xupneseibebaios edo kano mia parenthese uparkhei ena zetema to zetema oti tha prepei na epiluthei e diaphora gia ten onomasia me te me ta skopiameiose disekatommuria euro parousiase to elleimma sto emporiko isozugio tes kuprou tous protous ennea menes tou se sugkrise me ten antistoikhe periodo tou sumphona me prokatarktikes ektimeseis tes statistikes uperesiaskl se agonesauta einai istoriamalista e polonike istoselida futbolnewspl anapherei pos aute e exelixe anoigei ton dromo ston antelino bieirinia pou tha etan o idanikos antikatastates tou brazilianou mesoukai einai phusiologiko meta apo to treximo toson proeklogikon ebdomadonopos episemainetai se skhetike anakoinose ta kerde tou eikhan khresimopoiethei ex oloklerou gia ten diagraphe apaiteseon sumphona me ton nomo gia ta panotokia me sunepeia te me dianome merismatoskhthesinos agonas kritheke me ena terma pou semeiotheke sto me sout exo apo ten periokhe me tous khaniotes na demiourgoun eukairies me tous papadake kai tsitlakide gia na skoraroun omos na menoun gia deutero sunekhomeno paikhnidi stotelike apophase tou ektelestikou grapheiou tha lephthei mekhri ten tritemeso ton olokleromenon luseon pou prospherei e space hellas kaluptei oles tis sunistoses pou exasphalizoun ten apotelesmatike epopteuse khoron kai agathon parekhontas to aparaiteto plegma asphaleias se epikheireseis kai organismous sten ellenike agoraekeinoi pou latreuoun te botka mou zetesan ketel one gia ten katharoteta tes eno ekho balei kai ena johnnie walker gold label sto psugeio gia ekplexeto agorastiko endiapheron epektatheke se olo to phasma ton titlon me apotelesma oi times tous na semeiosoun mikre anodogia na doulepsoume perissotero gia ligotera tha prepei na apodekhthoume oti uperetoume kati pou mas uperbainei kati pou apaitei apo emas thusies eidikotera de otan polu prosphata amphisbetetheke toso biaia e prostage tou kratous kai tou kephalaiouetoimoteta ton meson tes pathepsenoume se prothermasmeno phourno stous gia leptaemeis den einai sigouro gia poso tha tous antexoume akomamia goulia phtanei gia na se steilei se mia katastase pou paizei metaxu anatolitikou anthokepou ten ora tou deilinou sto kheimoniatiko aera kai mias thermes nukhta edonon sten aisthesiake sebilleto erakleio ekhase apo ton protoporo peiraiko prodotheke apo ten epithese tou to erakleio kai ekhase ektos edras me apo ton protoporo peiraikoopos anapheretai sten ekthese tou e ellada tha mporouse na ekhei to idio epipedo demosion uperesion dapanontas mono to auton pou diathetei semera meso tou kratikou proupologismoukhthes to apogeuma oi kuanoleukoi peran ten apophase kai allaxan kata mia ora ten megale eirenike poreia poupaneutukhes ustera apo meres diapragmateuseon ki enokhletikes demosiotetas o koinobouleutikos diktatoras tou perou mporei na apolausei pleon ta sugkhareteria tes diethnous koinotetas gia te sthenare tou stase kai to aisio telos me tous nekrousmesa sto sabbatokuriako e ugeia tou parousiase stathere beltiose kai malista bgeke apo te meth kai noseleuetai pleon se thalamo tes monadas auxemenes phrontidasupobathmizei ten ispania e moodys se apo upobathmise ten pistoleptike ikanoteta tes ispanias e moodys thetontas ten parallela se arnetike prooptikeenaskholese me ta koina einai erotas kai zoe to ena tetarto tes zoes tou ekhei perasei se suskepseis kai sunedriaseis o demotikos sumboulosepikephales tes parataxes demotike allage manoles papakhatzakesproballontai epises kai apospasmata apo to epeisodio ta kamakia tes seiras tes toukai oi stokhoi autoi den epitugkhanontai automataena tetoio dusodes skandalo einai kai auto ton palaion klerodotematon ioanninonede briskontai sto stadio tes ulopoieses diktua optikon inon ta opoia sundeoun tis megales poleis tes elladas kai uposkhontai te demiourgia enos gregorou kormou diktuouispanos tekhnikos tes omadas tou peiraia apophasise na tous dosei kai ekei ten eukairia na prospathesoun na diekdikesoun mia these sto eruthroleuko roster tes epomenes periodoukhreiazontai bouleutes kai e nea demokratia s auten te boule eikhe bouleutesarkhes genomenes apo to mats tes kuriakes tha einai mia eukairia gia na aneboume mia bathmidakai mporei na to parei giati opos ekhei deixei ton panathenaiko ton ekheieimaste omos antithetoi sten ekpoiese tou upo to kratos pieses tou mnemoniouprepei na stamatesounepitukhia tes eugenias kote na exasphalisei sunenteuxe apo ton proedro tou neosustatou sundesmou klerikon khioupragma den mporei na amphisbetesei kaneis sto demarkho tes neas alikarnassou gianne paterakeprothupourgos anaphertheke ep oligon ste sunodo koruphes tes gandes tonizontas oti suzetethekan oi diethneis exelixeis meta ten krise kai apophasisteke omophona na lephthoun ola ta metra gia na men klimakothei e kriseapo tous allous palaistes mas pou meteikhan stous agones tou pagkosmiou protathlematos o nearos spuridakes ioannes kataktese ten these sta kila eno oi upoloipoi den plasaristekanto khronodiagramma ulopoieses tou ergou ekhei oristhei stous menesepitelous eukharista nea gia ton elia zouro pou enemerotheke pos e magnetike tou nik kalathe ston astragalo etan kathareenan kentriko amuntiko kai ena phor pou leipoun aute te stigme apo ten omada kai ginontai energeies na apoktethoun apo tous kitrinous eno sumphona me oles tis endeixeis tha prokhoresoun kai se apodesmeuseis sumbolaionpou einai to kratos pou einai oi armodies uperesies anagkastekame na katathetoume prosopikes menuseisdiapistotheke oti peripou deka geotreseis ekhoun topothetethei entos tes idioktesias tes se epaphe kai parallela me ten aktogramme apo opou antlountai kathemerina tonoi petrelaioeidon kai parokheteuontai sto diulisterioapantontas se erotese gia ten aponome euthunon se periptose sunekhises tou adiexodou stis sunomilies o proedros klerides eipe pos einai prooro na prodiagrapsoume to ti tha kanei oparallela tha ginei prospatheia oste na meiothei to pososto anergias apo to pou einai semera sto gia ten prosekhe dekaetiasto limani tou agiokampou kindunepse pros stigme odegos autokinetou otan ena kuma espase to parmpriz tou ikh anagkazontas ton na to egkataleipsei entromossugkekrimena ta kerde tes thugatrikes tou omilou alpha pisteos sta tele iouniou xeperasan ta disgia na me ginoume kosobo phusikaparathetoume ta sumperasmata tou suggraphea opos katatithentai ston epilogo to oti to khorio mas xekhorize kai to katetassan oloi sta xekhorista khoria tou nesiou mas den etan tukhaiotheloume na bgaloume lephtata gkol ton niketon petukhan oi andreadakes kh kalogerakes petras eno gia ton polu kalo patoukha eikhe meiosei me phaoul o meliaras sto leptometa apo phobere kathete mpalia tou gkarsia sten plate tes amunas tes o ibits bgainei tet a tet me ton sakha alla plasarei apelpistika aout apo dexiaekptose mazi me ta pota gia ta mele tou athenorama club gia parees mekhri atoma soure plastera korudallos mezedes kai kreata tes oras agkaze me elleniko funprokeitai gia ten prote sunantese ton kkhristophia upodekhtheke o tous demosiographous kai tous meta apo liga lepta aphikhthe o kai oi sumbouloi touto proto metro pou anamenetai na suzetethei ste boule einai armodiotetas tou upourgeiou paideias kai aphora sto diorismo imamedon sta meionotika skholeia gia te didaskalia tou islamto usterographo autes tes exolothreuses graphteke sta tele tou meta to telos tou iranoirakinou polemou me thumata xana tous motzakhentin pou sto metaxu eikhan diapraxei to thanasimo lathos na summakhesoun me ton ekhthro tou ekhthrou tous ton santam khouseinakribes ora pragmatopoieses tes emeridas kai o topos diexagoges tes tha anakoinothoun mesa stis epomenes emereseukharisto pou kopsate auta pou egrapsa kai den ta anakoinosateoi ekato semerines enories tes bionoun panta ton apoekho oson sunebesan ste diarkeia ton eikosi aionon tou xristianismou sten krete kai me aisthema euthunes enanti tes makraiones politismikes kleronomias tous atenizoun ten trite meta xriston khilieteridaproime enarxe tes ephebeias sta agoria phainetai oti ekhei perissoteres thetikes para arnetikes epiptoseisme aisthema koinonikes euthunes prokhoresame sten apophase aute anephere o proedros tou phsp koubares prosthetontas omos oti tha parakolouthesoume kai te diadikasia tes apodoses ton khrematon auton sta pharmakeiato proto meros aphora sto programma didaskalias ton mathematon opos kai sta alla skholeia to deutero ste sitise kai anapause ton matheton kai to trito ste demiourgike apaskholese kai sten proetoimasia ton mathematon gia ten epomene meraten epispeuse ton ergasion gia ten kataskeue tou neou ston atherinolakko zeta me erotese tou apo ton ypourgo anaptuxes k euaggelo benizelo o bouleutes hrakleiou k giannes kourakesidios episemainei oti ta trapezokathismata tha anaptussontai metaxu phusikon orion kathos tha briskontai anamesa stis kolones tes stoas kai ton parterionopou kai na strepseis to blemma antikrizeis enan topo kataphuto apo makrobies kastanies karudies kai gerodemenes belanidies pou katakluzoun tis omales plagies eno ligo pselotera xekinoun ta elata kai oi oxies pou skhematizoun adiaperasta dasese mikre apostase apo to mouresi brisketai e peripheme ntamoukharesemera apodeiknuetai pos eprokeito mono gia uposkheseissumphona me aute to kratos paramenei o megaluteros opheiletes tou demosiou aphou dekades einai oi demosies uperesies pou khrostoun epi seira eton ekatontades ekatommuria euro sto me apotelesma ten oikonomike katarreuse tou tameiougia tous palaistinious to thema einai krisimoalla s aute ten katastase brisketai o topos edo kai khronia kai oi prosopikotetes me eidiko baros etan anagkaies apo kairo gia na anakopsoun ten katephora sto kupriako kai sten oikonomia alla agnoethekan kai perithoriopoiethekanektima oti e krise tha mporouse na eikhe epiluthei otan etan akome sta sparganaepimorphotika seminaria kai emerides gia tous kathegetes pou epharmozoun ton sta skholeia toussten teleutaia periptose e xenagese mporei na ginei kai apo ton sunodeuonta tous mathetes kai spoudastes ekpaideutikoki epano pou eikhan ten entupose oti to aitema tous ikanopoietheke emathan oti e khrematodotese pou tha dothei apo ten kubernese einai ekatkenan mesare ekhei proupologismo ekat euro kai ara den theoreitai megalo ergosugkrouontai loipon to palio me to neoto erotema bebaia ste semerine sugkuria einai kata poso e oikonomike krise tha mporouse na auxesei to meridio ton sugkekrimenon agoron enanti tou pio paradosiakou kladou tes oikodomes pou ekhei upostei aute ten periodo kathizeseomos oloena kai perissoteroi ependutes den theloun na analaboun ton kinduno kai na daneisoun to elleniko demosio gia deka khronia para te megale apodosenai oi xenoi einai upeuthunoi gia ten auxese tes egklematikotetas ste khora masneoteta einai e katexokhen periodos epilogon zoesproedros tes etaireias kostantinos anastasiou eutukhismenos dekhotan ta sugkhareteria ton proskeklemenonprosopikos istotopos tes ellenoamerikanidas ebatzelain gkouletasekhei taxidepsei se perissoteres apo khores kai stis epeirouskhthes gia paradeigma okhema anephodiasmou eikhe parkarei dexia prin to phanari sto khoro pou einai outos e allos kateilemmenos sunekhos apo mekhanakiaeinai idanika epises gia ten katapolemese tou kruomatos kai tes gripesekatse gia ligo stulomene sten porta kai aphese to nou tes ste leelasia tou makrinou tes khthesgia ta petsomata khresimopoio e xulo karudias e maonisten kateuthunse aute oi prospatheies ekhoun apodosei sumphona kai me ta sumperasmata tes prosphates sunedriases tou suntonistikou organoukerkura paneleusiniakos kurkos epeirou mpalaourastsantoulas athanasiou thesprotias tsagkrasoules athenasphasismos kai ekpaideusekharilaos trikoupes eno eikhe idiaitere epidose apo mikres elikias sta mathematika diakrinotan kai sta klasikaoi saroseis edeixan oti pkh se kteria pou anegerthekan me khronike apostase ekatontadon eton oi skales eikhan khtistei stis idies akribos theseislamia etoimazetai na pei ten aletheia ston kenan oti autos einai o pateras tou paidiou tesostoso to terastio auto ergo einai proion tes agapes kai tou athorubou mokhthou enos mono anthropou einai ena mega mnemeio ethnikes prosphoraspolitikos katephereto polu kata ton agglon threskeutikos de kata ton dutikonoson aphora tis exagoges argou e saoudike arabia katalambanei kai pali ten prote these tes katataxes ekatanakoinose tou ares tonizei ta exes to marmoures anakoinonei te luse tes sunergasias koine sunainesei me ton athlete nikolao roumeliotediethnes oikos axiologeses anakoinose parallela oti diaterese te makroprothesme axiologese tes bank sekkaramanles pege kai sto epimeleterio tou lasithiou opou oi phoreis tou nomou milesan gia anaptuxiako elleimma kai anapherthekan sten krise pou perna o tourismosapo tous arithmous autous guro sto aphora periptoseis allodapon kai to upoloipo problematikes omades tou plethusmou anelikous kai uperelikousto thema einai na men uparxoun oute apokleismoi alla oute kai diadikasies pou den odegoun se apotelesmaproedros tou demetres tsobolas meta ten exaggelia tes ruthmises te kharakterise proeklogike kai upokritike kai okhi ousiastikesto o mperisbili ekmetalleuteke ten adraneia tes amunas kai me sout ekane to eno o idios paiktes sto meiose akoma perissotero me kontine probole kai edose xana sto mats ton kharaktera tou ntermpikai aute te phora etan aniketoopos ki an ekhoun omos ta pragmata ki an akoma ginoun pleromes ta khremata pou tha dothoun an katablethoun telika tha einai elakhistaeidika gia ten mousoulmanike meionoteta prepei na lephthoun ta exes metra ekloge ton mouphtedon apo ten meionoteta aphou aphairethoun apo autous oi dikastikes armodiotetes sto plaisio tou khorismou kratous ekklesiasprepei na dosoun orko times kai na paixoun to mpasket tes zoes tousstous parapano sunedrous summeteikhe kai o aeimnestos doukas kalogerou to pleon pithanon einai na prostethei kai to onoma tou proedrou tes strate kuratzeoson aphora sto mutilenaio oi deiktes apotimeses einai phores gia to kai phores gia tokai ego tote paraitetheka ephoson mas theorousan sunergous sten pagkosmia tromokratiaalla semera sto xaphniko tes petaxan ena kuria mou kai paei to oneiroanergia einai o ephialtes tis kathe kuberneses kai e aphorme e aitia gia ton kathena na skephtetai na kanei praxeis egklematikespoinikes ktlsta dutika skhematizontai oi ormoi kalogrias peukou agiou nikolaou kai tristomouston topo brisketai kai o periphereiarkhes amth ares giannakidessto metaxu o tzegkiz einai sto ergasteri tou moumtazbrethekan epises leuko psephodeltio akura eno psephisan parondedomenou oti e australia einai omospondiako kratos kathe politeia ekhei to diko tes kubernete o opoios einai kai o anotatos arkhontas testo skhedio arkhizei me ten phrase en onomati tes agias triadosto kako einai oti uparkhei koino ste larisa kai zetaei to diaphoretiko uparkhei koino ellenikes rok mousikes kai to blepoume stis emphaniseis mas e antapokrise einai polu megalesumphona me tis teleutaies problepseis o plethorismos paramenei upo elegkho to kai totsairides meta ten aporripse tou aitematos tou prosephuge sto dioiketiko epheteio peiraia zetontas ten akurose tou praktikou tou anotatou sumbouliou metatheseon tes ellenikes astunomiasotan omos gurizei apo ten pleura tes omorphes gelaei kai khairetaiola ta kommata tes antipoliteuses sumperilambanomenes kai tes zetesan na iskhusoun oi ruthmiseis amesos molis sumphonethoun kai okhi me ten episeme enarxe tes eklogikes periodou stis martiouta kathara pro phoron kerde tes hellas can ektimatai oti tha kleisoun sta epipeda ton disoipolemos anakoinoseon kai oi suzeteseis peri diaitesias tha kopasoun toulakhiston gia ena sabbatokuriakodelose tou metropolite ioanninon exaitias tes epapeiloumenes epembases ton dunameon katastoles ston khoro tou khutasto semeioma anephere oti tha epibibazotan sto krete me proorismo to erakleio kai sta misa tes diadromes tha epephte ste thalassapisteuo loipon oti den tha paixei to sabbato opote den ton phobamai os antipaloaltes tou upsous tou olumpiakou tha xekinesei te sezon stis iouniou apo sto diethnes mitingk tou gallikou borra to opoio apotelei kriterio prokrises gia ten omada ton trikolor pou tha katebei sto mprouno tzaouli iouniouan de sumbei auto proton to diakoptei te summetokhe tou ste diasose tes elladas kai ginetai arnetiko se opoiadepote alle khora khreiastei boetheiatetarte augoustou stis biomekhanies tou plomariou ten periokhe tou plomariou episkephthekan ekpaideutikoi tes protobathmias apo ole te lesbokai auto phainetai apo ten apodokhe tous kai ektos sunoron lene oi bullets pou etoimazoun europaike periodeia se mia apo tis kaluteres phaseis tousme threnous kai klamata ta blepoun ola auta oi dikoi tou apo ta teikheeukhomai to pneuma pou epikratese kata tis koines koinobouleutikes sunedriaseis gia ten katartise tou skhediou drases na sunekhisei na uparkhei kai sten ulopoiese toupobilas mikolaitis letonos ekhei kanei phetos alma stasugkekrimena e eisagoge tou euro os phusiko khrema mporei na othesei ton plethorismo gia ligo os to e kai upselotera eno ste sunekheia tha uparxei apoklimakoseten teleutaia demoskopese pou egine gia mia akoma phora arkhisame kai gleiphoume ekei pou phtunamekioukes proedros tes omospondias idiokteton mekhanematon ergon elladasmolis arkhisoun na muountai mele tes arkhousas taxes to kratos kai oi mekhanismoi asphaleias arkhizoun na anesukhounousiastika delade epikheireitai e pleres katargese ton panelladikon exetaseon gia osous phoitoun phetos sten lukeiouedo blepoume na xephutronoun teleutaia arketoi neoi xenones pto neo dioiketiko sumboulio gia ten periodo pou proekupse apo tis arkhairesies testo parmpriz khare sten eidike tou epexergasia prospherei megiste prostasia apo ton elio eno se sunduasmo me tis leptes prosthies kolones prospherei exairetika epipeda oratotetasidanike epiloge gia parees pou den zetoun poluteleiesto sunolo ton dendron meta tis proteinomenes ruthmiseis einaiepitrepei ten prosbase se dedomena opos kai te metaphora programmaton kai arkheioneuelpistoume na pame to idio psela opos kathe alle khroniaeinai gegonos oti oi agorapolesies akineton meiothekan peripou kata to eno kai e nea khronia den xekinaei me tous kaluterous oionoussten periokhe aspropurgou omos kai eno e pompe ton autokineton eikhe stamatesei sto phanari duo agnostoi pou epebainan se autokineto tous plesiasan kai arkhisan na puroboloun kata ton astunomikon eno tous aphairesan ta oplademosieuoume semera merika apo ta menumata sas aisiodoxontas oti aute e gramme epikoinonias tha meinei anoikhteste sugkekrimene aute endekhomene tropopoiese gia to n lasithiou opos einai gnosto se sas sumphonoun kai e nomarkhiake autodioikese kai o sundesmos ksenodokhon lasithiou alla kai to sunolo skhedon ton emplekomenon phoreon tou nomouekei tha brethei antimetope me mia alle ekplexe tes diorganoses ten senegaleethnike einai pano apo prosopaeurope meso enos skhematos pou epitrepei stis etairies ten epektase tous sten europaike kai diethne agoraepibibasteite sto treno tou phragkiskou ioseph kai apolauste to eortastiko deipno me atmosphairike mousike mekhri ta xemeromatati kinduneuei na pathei enas lathrometanastes ste kheirotere periptose na sullephthei kai na apelatheikai o noon ennoesato se adiexodo e agrotike anaptuxe tes epeirou euapologismos tou einai nikes isopalies kai etteseimai omos aisiodoxos oti o protathletes tes kategoria tha petukhei sten apostole tou ki etsi tha ophelethoume ki emeissenarxe tou programmatos tha ginei stis arkhes septembriou apo ten periphereia anatolikes makedonias kai os ta tele oktobriou tha ekhei epektathei se oles tis periphereies tes khorasena atomo e daskalon agoges logou gia to parma thessalonikessto plaisio ton kinetopoieseon tous oi ergazomenoi pragmatopoiesan poreia se kentrikous dromous tes poleskai tora pou brethekame sten epomene emera eimaste sten anamonekai par olo pou sunethos oles autes oi uperesies prospherontai me mia kai mono suskeue ostoso panta o kathe kataskeuastes dinei perissotero baros se sugkekrimena kharakteristikaomos e kalutere stigme ton proton lepton aneke stous gepedoukhous me ten kephalia tou basientones einai oi antidraseis kai teskubernese ekhei diple euthune gia to gegonos oti mporei na soreutoun mesa apo tetoia demosieumata nea problemata kai kindunoi gia te khorakategoria arthrou ekpaideutika nea paideias phetine khronia e pio duskole ap ton pagkosmio polemooso aphora ston olumpiako ekhoun kanei tosa kai tosa phetos me apokoruphoma ta ubristika sunthemata kata tou thrulou apo auto kai ton demetriade sto aerodromio kata ten epistrophe tes klapsas apo te thessalonike prin to mats ton duo omadon sto naoekprosopos rethumnou rasoules ioannes psephoito poso khoregeses einai apo mekhri euroendumatologika geloiographemata to kakogousto sto ntusimo sundetheke me ten akrite khrese tolmeron neanikon endumaton apo atairiakhtes elikies kai souloupiademokratia uponomeuteke upoklopes kheiragogese dikaiosunes zarntinieres panelleniesna sigourepsoume aute ten prooptiketo delade anthropoi ekhoun anoia peripou tosa na tous blepoume ste nomarkhia na trekhounekrexe bombas me pente nekrous sto aphganistan pente amakhoi ekhasan te zoe tous kai alloi tesseris traumatistekan se ekrexe pou semeiotheke to proi ste notia eparkhia khelmantsunelephthe te deutera to bradu ste sumbole ton odon anapauseos kai khrusomallousas ste mutilene apo astunomikous tes omadas dikukles astunomeuses enas sten katokhe tou opoiou bretheke mikroposoteta khasismataioponoun oi epikoinoniologoi kai oi epiteleis tes pou anazetoun ena ergo prokeimenou na to egkainiasei o aperkhomenos prothupourgossta aphegemata tou o epikedeios e kakia mas to doro tou genitsarou sunantoume analoga epeisodia kai phormoules pou uparkhoun kai ste politistike mas paradose alla kai ste kretike logotekhniagia ton ekpaideutiko o mesos meniaios misthos tou tha meiothei kata eurona plerosoun ti plesiasa enan talaiporo kai ton rotesa ti etan ta tele pases phuseosoi periokhes autes einai me krousmata e anatolike attike kai ta upoloipa krousmata stis periokhes thessalonikes karditsas larisas trikalon serron emathias boiotias kai pellasden einai katholou tukhaio oti ten idia emera pou katatetheke e prosphuge o epimeleteriakos omilos anaptuxes ellenikon nesion epanephere to thema tes katargeses ton krateseon uper triton pou barunoun ta aktoploika eisiteriaoi isorropies phainetai na ekhoun anatrapeikatargese phoroapallagon kai aphorologetou oriou gia osous ekhoun lexiprothesmes opheiles e ekhoun diapraxei adikemata tes phorologikes nomothesiasstephanides ste khthesine eureia suskepse sto dioiketerio purgou gia ten antipurike periodo ste dutentheta psela anamesa sto limani tou peiraia kai ste salamina e mikroskopike psuttaleia philoxenei tis megaluteres sumphona me ektimeseis egkatastaseis biologikou katharismou tes europesargotera arkhisa na douleuo me ta kena opou demiourgontas mia sunthese to kurios skhema prokuptei apo to keno kai de phainetai me ten prote matiakatapherame kai xeperasame tis diaphores pou mas khorizansumphona me tis skhetikes diataxeis o upourgos oikonomikon analambanei na demiourgesei ton neo kharte ton oikonomikon uperesion ana ten epikrateia kathos tha katargei e tha anastellei te leitourgia tmematon e grapheion elegkhou analoga me ton ogko sunallagonsto o grimpilas ektelese phaoul apo aristera stelnontas te mpala sto orizontio dokari eno o idios paiktes sto epiase ten kephalia apo konta meta apo sentra tou buthoulka alla e mpala katelexe aoutki auto giati den theloume na xanazesoume ta idia opos kai toteaphou ta doune auta oi upeuthunoi tote den tha uparkhei kanena problema me to parkarisma ton autokineton ston khoroekhoume stokhous kai einai oloi semantikoikata ten gnomen tou grapheiou asphaleias den pisteuei eis ten epanastasinkubernese omos kathos kai ta pherephona tes den to katanoei autometh tou nosokomeiou ekhei paradose stis metamoskheuseis kai oi iatroi kataballoun kathe prospatheia gi autoto poimnio sas aisthanetai ethnika uperephano otan salpizete gia ten patridato tomb raider and the guardian of light ekhei teleios diaphoretiko stul paikhnidiou kharakterizetai men apo aploikoterous mekhanismous alla prospherei aphthone drase kai diaskedase stis peripou ores pou diarkeinisaphi telika me te sullogistike tes kai tis bromikes methodous mias poluethnikes me pollous porous ste diathese tes se baros tou antagonismouligo meta ten arkhe tou deuterou otan arkhise na kourazetai kai o maestros impagasa epese kai e apodose tes omadasanoikhte ste diarkeia tes nukhtas paremeine kai e prosbase ton okhematon sto sunoriako stathmo tes exokhes sto nomo tes dramasapoktese tou louka maurokephalide emoiaze me tabani gia te spartak omos sten agia petroupole ekhoun thesei megalepebolous stokhousoi perissoteroi kratoumenoi paraggelloun kaphe kai santouits apo ton periptera pou erkhetai sta krateteria pleronontas me dika tous khremataesokleiomene prokeruxe ten euthune gia ten apostole tou paketoubomba stis phulakes korudallouto proto meros oloklerotheke me liges phaseis kai ten na isorropei ten katokhe tes mpalas kai na khanei duo eukairies me kouzan kai ntampiza me antistoikhes kephaliesostoso aporriphtheke to aitema na epitrapei sto tameio na khrematodotei ta uperkhreomena krate gia epanagores omologon apo te deuterogene agorasten krete brisketai apo khthes o proen proedros ton tzortz mpous o opoios epibainontas ste thalamego alexandros me ten sunodeia tou ephthase stis to proi sto limani tou agiou nikolaouapo tis timolepsies prokuptei epises oti sumphona me sugkrise ton timon tou upourgeiou to kalathi sto telos tou kostize euro kai to khreiazotan dapanes euroerthe omos e ora oi periorismoi autoi na xeperastoun kathos e sunvision parousiase prosphata to sunview to opoio ektos apo media player einai tautokhrona kai enas mikroskopikos proboleasgenikos deiktes timon stis upokhorei stis monades semeionontas ptose se posostokai mporei stis duo proegoumenes kontres ton duo sullogon to zetoumeno na etan to triponto omos semera e proklese tha einai diaphoretike kathos o niketes tha diekdikesei ten koupa eno o khamenos tha dei ton teliko apo ten exedraauxemene emporeusimoteta parousiasanoi metokhes ton etairion meereunes tou goodman kai crorlin edeixan pos sta agoria parousiazetai krupsorkhia se pososto kai steiroteta se megalo bathmokai oti opoiadepote allelodesmeuse anamesa se athena kai agkura gia oikonomike ekmetalleuse tou aigaiou an den ekhoun luthei ta problemata kuriarkhias tha einai khoris periekhomenoalla den phtanei to diko tous philotimoi ti kanei diarkos o sto pethumno mpas kai katalabe oti ekei eklegei edra to stis epomenes ekloges te phora oi bombes epesan polu kontaplenoume to psari kai to stegnonoumebazelakia mou gia ekei eiste kai apheste tis metamesonukties magkies sas kata meros colpo grosso apo ton proedro tou thrulouapophasizei na kratesei te melek mazi tes ste phulakeapo ten proanakrise proekupse pos ta khremata auta proerkhontan apo diarrexeis kai mikroklopes sunolika okhto katastematon tes beroias oi opoies semeiothekan ta xemeromata tes tetartes kai tes pemptestote xekinese te khronia me ton aioliko kai prolabe na skorarei tria gkol prin e omada tes mutilenes apokhoresei apo to protathlema tes ethnikestelos maiou anamenetai na ekdothei e oikodomike adeia gia ten anegerse tou kentrou logistics tes thugatrikes tes etairias rota logisticsta gurismata tou philm xekinesan sto los antzeles eno orismenes skenes tha guristoun kai sten konstantinoupoleagonassten iberike khersoneso khrouatistheke apo to sobaro atukheua pou eikhe o auerikanos ken mploksto shakedown otan ekhase ton elegkho tou ford fiesta khtupontas dunata se ena anakhouasemera elakhiste paragoge kretikes mpananas diatithetai ektos kretesupertophodotoumenos benzinokineteras ensomatonei ten tekhnologia twinscroll uperplerose ana zeugos kulindron exaleiphontas to lag kai me ten parousia tes tourmpinas exasphalizei iskhu ippon stis sal entuposiake rope kgoi anexartetoi tou bouza apobalontes ten idioteta tou protou gurou eklinan kata to pleiston pros ton omognomo rogkote ki aphesan ton bletsa ektos numphonostopike autodioikese mporei na akolouthesei te dike tes poreia anexarteta apo to pos kineitai e kentrike exousia kallikrates einai to mellon tes topikes autodioikeses kai eklegoume autous pou pisteuoun s aute te megale metarruthmisegia ton kolombiano apo khthes ekhoume grapsei oti oi peiraiotes ekhoun katathesei ten nea protase tousanaphertheke de sto protupo tes oikogeneias tou agiou gregoriou tou palama tonizontas pos e metropole tes beroias thelese na ten probalei os photeino paradeigma stous semerinous kairous pou opos oloi oi thesmoi e oikogeneia brisketai se krisime kampezetoun anthropine pole desmeuseis apo tous topikous arkhontes epidiokoun oi emporoi ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous zetoun anthropine polekoinon onomastikon metokhon meta psephou pou diaireitai to sunoliko kephalaio tes etaireiaspoliteia semera kolas tha baze phreno se toute ten purine kolaseprosexte to delade to kentro tou upourgeiou oikonomikon einai kateleimeno tis idies emeres pou o prothupourgos agonizetai sta perata tes oikoumenes uper ton demosion oikonomikonkai ap oti mathame apo ton organismo tourismou tes poles anemera tes protokhronias apo tis to mesemeri eos tis to apogeuma e pole khoreuei stous ruthmous mias megales parelases gia ten upodokhe tou neou khronoukampse einai polu mikre se skhese me tis metaboles pou semeiothekan se alles europaikes khores kurios sten ispania ten irlandia ten ispania kai te bretaniaoikonomike krise diokhnei tous albanous ap ten epeiro anabrasmos sten paideia me anoikhta ola ta kauta thematapetrakes apotelei prosopike epiloge tou manole patemtze kathos eikhan sunergastei kai ston gioukhtata boskotopia sta opoia pernoun ta kalokairia tous kai e trophe tous to kheimona diaphoropoioun ten poioteta tou kreatos touseinai prophanes oti e logike tou enos uperudrokephalou demou apotelei apodeixe elleipses stoikheiodous gnoses gia ten periokhe kai ara anikanoteta epharmoges ton arkhon skhediasmoutis anadeiknuoun me kompso khioumor talento eurematikoteta kai aisthese anatropes alla tautokhrona omos kai me aparamille tekhnike akribeia phinetsa leptoteta kai sebasmo ste khoreutike tekhnepkh sto germaniko theretro ntamp ste baltike demiourgethekan akapnes plaz peripoloumenes apo eidiko astunomiko somaomada me te megalutere diarkeia tha parei to protathlemaauto anephere anakoinose tou upourgeiou oikonomikon katopin elegkhon diastauroseon pou dienergeseapo ten erkhomene pempteetan enomeno me te steria omos khoristeke stous seismous touperipeteiodes uposkhetai e kinese politon pos tha einai e emera tou sabbatou gia tous mutilenious pou tha kanoun te bolta tous e tha bgoun gia psonia se olo to mekos tou dromou tes agorasola auta ten idia ora pou apotelei agogo ombrion kai apobleton gia oloklere ten pole me orata ta apotelesmatasto metaxu me idiaitero endiapheron anamenetai e episkepse tes k mendone sten polekhemike tromokratia einai eukheres sten epharmogeme te meiose ton leitourgikon dapanon sta upourgeia tha exoikonomethei tou e dis euro eno apo tis sugkhoneuseis kai katargeseis tou e dis eurostase anamones apo moodys gia ten oristikopoiese tou skhedioumalista anapherei pos an telikos ginei dekte e eisegese ekhoume plere anatrope tes nomologias kai ekphrazei ten antithese teslogos gia ton roumpen palathouelos o opoios ta teleutaia khronia agonizetai sto protathlema tesantitheta e anagennese beltiotheke toso apo te gramme ton alla kai kato apo te raketa kai me koruphaio ton pouzoukake gurise to paikhnidi stis arkhes tes tetartes periodoudionuses berbeles skholiazei mesa apo te stele touto gnorizei omos e trokhaia pou ten paraskeue to mesemeri dia organon tes pou stekontan sto telos tou dromou egraphe opoio aprosekto odego ton dieskhize anapodaapo ten parousa ereuna prokuptei oti oi ektimeseis ton noikokurion gia ten poreia tes oikonomikes tous katastases alla kai oi prosdokies tous ekhoun eiselthei meta to se kathodike trokhiaenas idiaitera khrestikos odegos poles theoreitai exantlemenosproen omospondiakos tekhnikos tes germanias briskontan se suzeteseis to teleutaio diastema me ten omospondia ton ara e aiphnidiastike apoluse tou mprantlei den etan telika toso aiphnidiastikegoneis parakhoroun ta autokineta tous sta anelika paidia tous e tous agorazoun motopodelata gia na dieukolunoun tis metakineseis toustheoreitai eukolotere luse apo to gkremisma polukatoikion kai sumphona me plerophories tha sunodeuetai apo kinetra gia to anoigma ton isogeion kai te diakhuse ton koinokhreston khoron mesa sta ktiriaetan kai paramenei to sumbolo tes kretikes omorphias kai ekphrasesprote episeme sunedriase tou neou dioiketikou sumbouliou tou os anonumou pleon etaireias egine khthes to proi paronton toso tou neou proedrou kmanole karakonstantake oso kai tou dieuthunontos sumboulou kgiorgou alexakeeinai e kalutere giati ekhei kubernetike empeiria ekhei eureia gnose ton thematon mia prosopike gennaiodoria pera apo otidepote mporeite na phantasteite kai os ek toutou einai e kalutere gia na antimetopisei ton sarkozi prosthesesto metaxu e taktike episkepse tes troikas tha pragmatopoiethei stis arkhes maiou opote oi ekprosopoi tes tou kai tes tha axiologesoun tis epidoseis tes khoras gia te khoregese tes epomenes doses upsous disen logo paratase ton sumbaseon proupothetei aparaiteta oti oi skhetikoi diagonismoi tha ekhoun prokerukhthei mekhri tis augoustou apo tous demousoutos e allos einai akome polu nopes oi phrikiastikes eikones apo diaphora ana ten epikrateia kataphugia sta opoia ta zoa katadikazontai se enan argo kai basanistiko thanatoprokeitai gia istoriko gegonos to opoio photizei ena ntokoumento touugie lampera kai eukolokhtenista mallia kathe mera me ten euergetike drase tes mastikhastote e astunomia zetese na milesei me ten metera tou pou stekotan dipla tou kai e opoia delose oti to agori ten apeilouse diarkos pos tha ten kataggeileieiste omos skleres apenanti stous andres nai mono aute ten emerapar ola auta sunekhizoun na apospoun meridio agoras apo ta katastemata stis alles emporikes piatsesoson aphora to thema me tous treis paiktes pou briskontai ektos planon tou gianne samara marinakes paulopoulos alexoudes apophase tha lephthei ste semerine sunedriase tou tes paeophearkhaio romaiko limani anakalupsan bretanoi arkhaiologoi plai sto romaiko okhuro caerleon sten oualia to opoio apotelei to deutero gnosto romaiko limani tes bretanias kai to monadiko ektos londinouaphorme gia auta pou proaneggeile o anotatos dikastikos leitourgos statheke dikastike dienexe tou demosiou me idiote ekpaideute thalassion spor o opoios eikhe misthosei tmema tes paralias tou kommenou tou demou phaiakon tes kerkurasostoso tria lepta argotera esumphona me tous skhediasmous tou upourgeiou pou den aphoroun ton eurutero demosio tomea to misthologiko kostos sto demosio tha meiothei sta diskharis tou kuriou ton episkiazeioi protes endeixeis oti perase amesa kai eperease drastika to sunthema tes kuanoleukes genikes epistrateuses einai iskhurotatessto trapezi ekprosopooi mikromesaioi emporoi kai ergazomenoi sta katastemata anesukhoun pos oi neoi topikoi arkhontes me tis armodiotetes pou ekhoun tha mporoun na parembainoun stis agoresto gala pezei stous gia duo ores khorizetai se temakhia kai topotheteitai se kophinakia pou tou dinoun kai ten anagluphe uphe toumekhri semera e epitrope den elabe kamia apantese sto grapto aitema tes tes ianouariou gia na episkephthei ten kuprokai oi martures pou katethesan anepheran oti me kamia dikastike apophase den apokathistatai kamia time eno o konatmosphaira apaitouse pio entones photoskiaseis tou olou tragikou agona pros te gnose ten epikoinonia kai ten katharseparadaki upsous ekatste skene despoze to emblema tou tourkikou komounistikou kommatos kai to kentriko sunthema etan grammeno sten tourkike eirene kai philia alleleggue stous ergates tou kosmousuauto to krisimo semeio elthe telika e apergia tes aprilioumilontas stous financial times o danos genikos grammateas tou anters phogk rasmousen tonise giores gumnastekan kanonika lambanontas meros se oles tis askeseis pou perielambane to programmaeginan sustaseis pros ton armodio antidemarkho pou protou ustera apo sunennoese tou genikou grammatea tes kosta georgalide me ten genike grammatea tou upourgeiou politismou kai tourismou k lina mendone kai phoreas ulopoieses tou ergou oristeke o demos kerkurasden anakateuoume xana giati tha tholosei mia e alle ekdokhe kai moiraia sto elleniko theoroun oti kati upokruptei e protase kai ten aporriptounme enoplo somatophulaka kai me ena elektroniko brakhioli ston astragalo tou o stroskan mekhri to gephuri tes plakas kathos diaskhizei to omorphotero kommati tou pharaggiou kai mporei na ginei olo ton khronome anakoinose pou exedose semera kalei olous tous ergazomenous na summetaskhoun mazika se aute kai na apokrousoun tis skleres neophileleutheres politikes tes troikastelika oi gepedoukhoi to mono pou katapheran etan na meiosoun sto me ton agapetoautoi pou ethelan tous kolonelous kanei e apple me olo auto to reustomporei e totenam na ettetheke me to baru sten madrite me antipalo ten real ston proto agona gia tous proemitelikous tou champions league o gkareth mpeil omos den khanei ten aisiodoxia tou kai elpizeieimai polu kharoumenos pou sumphonesa me tentimes apodothekan apo to lokho stratiotikes mousikes tou kai dimoiria apoteloumene apo mousoulmanous oplitesmen pegainete se mere pou den armozoun sten elikia sas kai ste these agapate kai sebesthe tous kathegetas saskairos athena pem aug epta kuriake apriliou kato apo ton istoriko palaio tholo tou planetariou sto idruma eugenidou tha pragmatopoiethei mia megale anadromike ekthese tou zographou glupte kai kharakte kosta andreousumphona me ton tamia tes enoses o ti eipe to eipe okhi gia ton tsampiko kampastana prosopika alla gia ton proedro tes peitharkhikes epitropesosoi den to parakolouthesate deite to sten teleoraseesparganothe opos ola ta brephe kai etopothetethe eis ten phatnen ton zoon eis endeixin tes akras tapeinoseos autouekhoume poikilies me koukoutsi me pseutokoukoutso kai khoris koukoutsiprokeitai kurios gia katatheseis pou olo ton proegoumeno khrono eikhan anazetesei asphales kataphugio logo tes abebaiotetas pou epikratouse gia ten epomene emera tes ellenikes oikonomiaskharipoterika mustika kai okhi mono nesia kai potamia kuriarkhesan ston khoro ton poleseonetan mia epistrophe stis rizes kathos ekeino ton kairo eikhe kuklophoresei e ithageneia kai o strates o thalassinospolemarkhakes den tha xekhasei pote ten prote tou episeme emphanise me ethnike neon den ta kataphere na xeperasei to empodio tes oukranias omos gia to manole polemarkhake o agonas sto kiebo tha meinei gia panta kharagmenos ste mneme toutheteia tou sten agiographia anti na ton strepsei s enan steiro buzantinotropo klasikismo ton ephere se sunomilia me ton paphlasmo tou uperrealismouetsi o skorer tes ethnikes ispanias ston teliko tou pagkosmiou kupellou den tha brisketai aurio sten apostole tes mpartsa sto santiagko mpernampeou eno o gkouarntiola delose pos den ekhei apophasisei akoma gia ton antikatastate touto agharta jazz centrum onomasteke etsi apo to almpoum tou miles davis zelezna praha einai kale epiloge me kathemerina enallassomena live modern jazz jazz blues fusion funk jazzemeis edo stobilampakho triboume akome kai tha meinoume stis suzeteseis gia ten marinamone philotheou apekhei duomisi ores apo tis karues kai brisketai se mia apo tis omorphoteres topothesies tou agiou orous sten plagia tou bounou phtereto apophasise auto xaphnika etsi oste tou khronou e kategoria na ekhei omades se kathe omilooson aphora sten kathemerine tous zoe enas stous duo ellenes delonei dusarestemenos pososto pou apotelei to tetarto kheirotero sten meta te boulgaria ten portogalia kai te roumaniaoi kuanoleukoi eikhan sten megalutere diarkeia tes anametreses ten protoboulia ton kineseon kai tis eukairiesidios o podosphairistes amesos meta ten oloklerose tes sumphonias delose sten episeme istoselida tes eimai kharoumenos pou epistrepho ston panathenaiko meta apo polla khroniaen to metaxu semera to proi o k kamines mazi me ton periphereiarkhe attikes k gianne sgouro pragmatopoiese episkepse stous kentrikous dromous tes athenas kai kurios sten plateia theatrouduo kai ena okhi sto demo hrakleiou duo nai kai ena peripou eisepraxe o demarkhos kostas aslanes apo ton prothupourgo kosta semite sta tria basika aitemata pou ethese gia ten pole tou hrakleioume auta pou ekho diabasei an paixoun esto kai sto ton pragmatikon tous dunatoteton tha phugoun me to diplo apo ten edra tes ist sterlingk kleinoume me to copa libertadoresekhei kuklophoresei toepises kata ten katametrese bretheke na katekhoun ligotera zoa apo ekeina pou eikhan delosei sten armodia uperesiabebaia to erotema se mia tetoia periptose kathodou tou karelle stis demotikes ekloges einai pos th antexoun oi suntaktes tou demotikou reportaz ton proeklogiko agonasta labara tou demou orphea ekkenothekan sunolika katoikies spitia ste mandra didumoteikhou eno apo ten kuriake katoikoi tou porou tou demou pheron ekhoun apokhoresei apo tis oikies tous gia proleptikous logoussten politike ten oikonomia ten tekhne kai sten tekhnologia prosopa e epiteugmata mporoun polu pio eukola na axiologethoun kai na xekhorisounalla o kamil den steketai to idio tukheros serntar leei ston ali oti te binteokaseta ten ekrube khronia o tzegkizoi emmeses ekpompes einai ekpompes rupon kata te diadikasia kataskeues tes monadas anazeteses kai metaphoras ton pegon energeiastha dothei eukairia exagogon e diametakomises elektrikes energeias pros ten tourkiata termata gia tous akriteseinai prokletiko einai aparadekto autom otan tha sunantesete ten kato tithorea semantiko emporiko kentro tes periokhes pou einai gnoste kai me ta onomata kalubia e kephisokhori apo ton omonumo potamopou e apokalouse epanidruse tou kratous mesa apo tis metarruthmiseis pou tha ekaneanephere akome oti to upourgeio etoimazei ena paketo politikes epharmoges gia te nautilia ena new deal kladiko sumbolaio opos eipe kharakteristika pou tha perilambanei olous tous kladous kai tous paragontes tes nautiliasme to proskhema ton ereunetikon skopon diaphora kinezika ergasteria paraskeuazoun kai exagoun ste duse polla skeuasmata kai idiaitera iskhura anabolikasmigei ten paradose tes khoras tes me tis neanikes modes tragouda ekphrastika khoreuei aisthesiaka kai boetha ton kosmo pou kakopernamarkes elabe psephous o eisaggeleas protodikon athenon span kati tetoio den ginei einai upokhreomenoi na epistrepsoun kai na proponethoun upo tis odegies tou stephan ntemol me ton opoio oi skheseis tous theorountai idiaitera tetamenessuzetes gia ta skoupidia sto demotiko sumboulio ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous suzetes gia ta skoupidia sto demotiko sumbouliokairos athena tet aug eleutherotupia sabbato augoustou aphou o antones samaras metraei tis emphaniseis tou sto zappeio zappeio mporei na metraei kai tis omilies tou ste dethotan leme to okhi apokoimetheke sten agkalia tou nai einai na apokathistoume to kuros tes amphiboliaskai serbo epipedou aute te stigme pou na mporei na paixei sten euroligka den briskeis eukolatha exuperetesei tis anagkes metakineses upselou epipedou episkepton apo to aerodromio eltelos o kubernetikos ekprosopos anephere oti e ellada ekphrazei ten entone dusphoria tes pros kathe kateuthunse gia ton tropo me ton opoion edrasan oi italikes astunomikes arkheseinai auto praxe polemou kurioi anarotethekan se epomene anartese tous oi khakerto klima stis agores tes europes katagraphetai thetiko septembrios megales ekroes sta amoibaia kephalaia pempte noembriou sta disspoudase philologia arkhaiologia kai einai katokhos metaptukhiakou diplomatos eidikeuses sten ekpaideutike politike tou panepistemiou patronkathariste kai kopste ta lakhanika se polu leptes lorides me to makhairi e me te boetheia enos mantolinouisos to khronia pou etan para polu kale gia olo to bordeauxoi philoxenouuenoi eikhan kai ena dokari eno ekhasan para polles eukairies na phtasoun to skor se dustheoreta upseten episemanse aute kanei e panellenia nautike omospondia me aphorme anaphora pou ekane o upourgos thalassion upotheseon neson kai alieias giannes diamantides ste boule apantontas se erotese tou bouleute tou thodore dritsa gia tis ton nautikontrisdiastatos khartes kai ta trisdiastata kteria kai mnemeia kanoun ten ploegese pio realistikekai katelexe me te phrase pote pia tetoia tragodiaean uparkhoun opheiles kai poies einai autes tha krithei apo ton ellenike dikaiosune kai monophileta psariou me pikantike saltsa kommatia phileto megalou psariou grsto o polustratos anoixe to skor me ton giannakopouloto mousiko ergo tou sake papademetriou kharakteristeke apo ten prospatheia tou sunthetei na perasei melodika stoikheia me mia morphe ellenikotetas kai malista apo te dutike ellada dosmena mesa apo to atmosphairiko ekhokhroma ton mantolinonto proto einai oti dianuei to deutero stadio tes proetoimasias tou eno to deutero oti o antipalos einai etoimos gia ten enarxe ton episemon upokhreoseon toumpekan opos lene kai to ezesa kai ego apo konta auto sten logike demiourgias kai uposterixes opadikou tupou sta gi auto kai tous eskizan sunekhossto proaulio tes ekklesias oi karudies skhematizoun tous karpous toussugkekrimena o k ntolios diepseuse oti epikeitai anabole e akurose tes apographes legontas oti oi proetoimasies exelissontai kanonika kai sumphona me ton programmatismo tes ellenikes statistikes arkhessumphona me ton entetalmeno periphereiako sumboulo sabba bareltze prokeitai gia semantika erga gia to nesi pou tha prepei na diekdikesoume kai na uparxei amese khrematodotese ton meletonoi polites xeroun pia oti e tou karamanle einai kheirotere kai apo aute tou metsotake tougia ten istoria to khrematisterio tes athenas bouliaxe khthes kato apo tis monades phthanontas sta khamelotera epipeda apo ton ianouario tou eno se kloio pieseon brethekan kai ta europaika khrematisteriaisos omos kai pano ap ola na einai o endomukhos phobos tou telousloukas ekhei talento einai asos pou mporei na skorarei me pollous tropous exupnos kai omadikosksekatharizetai pantos oti oi poleseis den tha aphoroun gelepse apophases gia ten ensomatose ston proupologismo tou epimeleteriou dodekanesou tou proiontos tes reustopoieses ton entokon titlon tou ellenikou demosiouto enteka moiazei san ebdomadiaia lista paratereseon einai omos telika mia apo tis pio eustokhes autobiokritikes pou mporei kaneis na diabasei semera sta ellenikaoi ellenarades bebaia den mporousan para na antistathoun ston eidekhthe ratsismo ton aggloaustralon kokkinokolous tous elege e parea mouna sou po kati o tsakires etan ekei sto opus ton eida me mia den tou milesa apo makria ton eidagia na doume toraden to ekho metanioseibebaia to ean tha steiloun sten athena kapoion na phutepsei anaptuxe kai na mazepsei elio e na skotosei ten agelada einai ena erotemaares speliotopoulos ste lesbo zetema oron theoreitai e oristikopoiese tes episkepses tou are speliotopoulou ste lesbo prokeimenou na milesei se anoikte sugkentrose gia te sterixe tes upopsephiotetas tes ntoras mpakogiannemen anesukheite ola tha pane kalakuria alexandra uposterizei oti orismenes phtokhes oikogeneies ston kataulismo duskoleuontai na ta bgaloun perathumamai eikhame ten ekthese tou zetoun ek ton usteron oi idioktetes na kopoun ta dentra aphou apo ten arkhe xeroun oti uparkhoun sto oikopedo tousto apotelesma ena entuposiako proionphantasteite ti tha ginei tora an telika peistoun oloi oi eidikoi oti aneurethe khameno aristourgema tou mikhael aggelouante meta na me ginei ki olasantonia mathioulake prote sten iatrike skhole panepordes demosiographon ekhoun egkatastathei exo apo to spiti tou kai ton bombardizoun me eroteseis guro apo ten katastase sto kosoboto mono pou thumamai etan to phk na mou leei oti enas sunadelphos mou zetese e apaitese na mpei to onoma tou se ena apo ta upo demosieuse arthra masste sunekheia tha ginetai epitopios elegkhos apo klimakio tes poleodomias prokeimenou na diapistothei oti ta stoikheia ta opoia ekhoun katatethei sten uperesia einai sostaan peraseis me kokkino pleroneis prostimo mono eurona grapsete ena arthro kai na to steilete ste montki oso ta apotelesmata ton epiptoseon auton oxunontai ki aggizoun ton kathena mas toso perissotero auxanontai oiteleutaia uoda epitheseon sundeetai ue deuophile gegonota opos einai e kuklophoria neon kineuatographik on tainionmetaxu auton kai e aphentia mousumphona me to amerikaniko upourgeio exoterikon diplomates elaban tote entole na enemerosoun gia tis amerikanikes anesukhies to anotero dunato epipedo sten kinakaute ebdomada xekina en meso thuellas antidraseon apo ta sundikata toussunekhizetai to adiexodo sten krise tou phusikou aeriou to adiexodo sten krise tou phusikou aeriou sunekhizetai para tis prospatheies pou katebale khthes stis bruxelles e prokeimenou na gephurosei mprantso einai o titlos tes meletes pou demosieuoun sto periodiko antiquity ereunetes tou panepistemiou tou kouinslantostoso osoi epikheiroun na zetesoun exegeseis apo te eisprattoun aoristologies kai merikes phores epithetikotetana semeiothei oti ekhei proegethei epistole tou sullogou xenodokhon demou zakunthion ston antiperiphereiarkhe pou tou zeta na merimnesei amesa gia ten apokatastase tes these tous sto trapezi e ten khora proeleusesmporei eukola na antexei kai na pollaplasiastei se khameles thermokrasies mekhrieimaste kaluteroi kai to deikhnoume se ole ten khroniaste megale katephora tes katekhake sto upsos tes elioupoles sunelabe o phakos mas enan sumpolite mas pou odegouse kai tautokhrona diabaze ena prophanos endiapheron kai semantiko eggraphomia nike anazeta o ophe pou ekhei politesekhei ollandike upekooteta kai te sezon pou oloklerotheke agonizotan sten ouggrike phenentsbaros summetokhes kai gkolta erga poikilon diastaseon apo akruliko se kamba e se kharti ensomatonoun te monotupia kai to kollaz sten prospatheia tes exereuneses olon ton dunatoteton pou prospherontai sten anaptuxe tou zographikou periekhomenouomos agapetoi kata t alla topikoi arkhontes e aletheia gia ten opoia kopteste den prepei na legetai mise giati tote einai kheirotere apo psemaparousia tou tha aphora sten prostasia zotikon khoron kai tha einai topothetemeno epano se erpeistries oste na kineitai akome kai sta pio dusprosita edapheetan thauma tou kurioumeta to telos ton teleton to proi tes kuriakes o arkhiepiskopos kai oi loipoi ierarkhes ekprosopoi ton orthodoxon patriarkheion kairikes sunthekes etan polu kales me liakada kai polu epio anemo kai etsi den emoun se these na axiologeso to skaphos os pros te sumperiphora tou ston kumatismo alla mporesa na bgalo asphale tes ellenikes kai tes gallikes kuberneses to kalokairi tou skephteka pos ta perissotera antistoikha psephismata menoun sto kalathi ton akhrestonalloi eikhan parei mazi kai ta paidia tousden ethele kai polu o k pretenteres gia na parasurthei ki autos legontas anekdota kata tou giorgou papandreouopos tha ekhei ede diapistosei kai o idios omos prokeimenou na katalexoun ekei opou o nomos orizei sumphonese to soma kai o nomarkhes kai elephthe omophone apophase gia apostole eggraphou sto opoio tha tonizetai e iskhus tou antikeimenou tes skholes os pros ten metekpaideuse ton astunomikonmeta te manolidou tha epesemaina pos ki ego tha katarreusoempodizoun ton io na kollesei sto anapneustiko epithelio tou pneumonaalla to pos sumbibazetai me tis demokratikes pergamenes kai euaisthesies tou k tsobola e sumporeuse me tous nostalgous ton aprilianon sten arkhe o sunomiletes mas epikheirei na mas mperdepseiidrutheke to kai ekprosopeitai apo ten athena passiouupokhreotheka na ten egkataleipso epeide ekei den etan dunaton na zeso mia kanonike zoeierousalem sunergasia metaxu kuprou kai israel ston tomea tes energeias ekhei thermanei akoma perissotero tis skheseis ton duo khoron oi opoies skhediazoun ta epomena tous bematanauarkhos aporriptei tis duo protaseis tou nomarkhe kai dekhetai na dosei prothesmia os tis meta to mesemeri gia n aposurthei o tourkikos stratos sto esoteriko tou nesiou na polemesei gia ten time ton oplonagapete alhtheia isos ede na ekhete diapistosei to akolouthosten parousa phase diatelei os upeuthunos suntonismou tou kallitekhnikou merous tou phestibal pou semainei oti se megalo bathmo euthunetai kai gia tis epiloge ton kallitekhnikon skhematon pou summetekhoun se autopempte augoustou sta ephtasan ta krousmata tou iou tou dutikou neilou sta anerkhontai ta epibebaiomena krousmata loimoxes apo ton io tou dutikou neilou ste khora mas o opoios metadidetai meso degmatos molusmenon kounoupionse glossa aple kai katanoete apo ton meso anagnoste me mia spania aphegematike ikanoteta kai monadike glaphuroteta o kostas detsikas akolouthei bema pros bema kai apo konta te zoe kai ten prosphora tou protagoniste tes epanastases touepiskepse tou upopsephiou bouleute emathias elia photiade sta sphageia tes beroias episkepse sta sphageia tes beroias pragmatopoiese o bouleutes tou emathias elias photiades ten trite septembriou mesa sta plaisia tes proeklogikes tou drasteriotetaskataktethekan kata kairousdolophonos pheretai na ton ekhei rotesei posous anthropous skotose eno einai tragiko oti theorei eauton sotera enos eidous soterana sas thumisoume pos tous protagonistikous rolous kratoun o thodores atherides kai e maria kabogiannemia paraxene pragmateia gia te phuse tes komodias me enallages dramatikes kai komikes diatheses mesa se mia paradoxe atmosphairaeinai diadikastiko pleon to themase auto to epipedo o k demarkhos kai oi eklektoi epaggelmaties demotikoi sumbouloi tes parataxes tou amphisbetountai pia kathemerina sto mualo kai ten kardia ton demotonos apotelesma e sunolike metokhike summetokhe ton melon tou dioiketikou sumbouliou tes trapezas anerkhotan se pososto apo kai e sunolike metokhike summetokhe ton melon tes ektelestikes epitropes tou omilou se pososto apoermeneuei o basiles basilakesoi geotreseis tote stamatesan xaphnika khoris na dothoun exegeseis apo ten xene etairia otan eikhan phthasei se bathos metronkapoios pou bretheke sten sugkekrimene akte gia na psarepsei erixe ten petonia e opoia diathetei polla agkistria kai dolomata aute prophanos skalose sta kladia tou dentrou kai epeide den mporouse na ten katebasei ten aphese ekei eipe o k simoskai prophanos mia tetoia exelixe allazei akoma kai ton tropo pou ekhei ginei to proskhedio tou metagraphikou programmatismou gia ten epomene sezonuphese sunekhizetai se olous tous tomeis tes oikonomikes drasteriotetastha proedreusei ten trite gia na timesei ten psepho auton pou ton anedeixan proedro elegan apo ten plateia alexandras prosthetontas me noema otan xanagine protase momphes ephagan ta moutra touskurioteres apo autes einai e amese diakope ton uperpteseon pano apo katoikemena ellenika nesiasto terma tes odou tsamparle sto phrourio akribos pano sta thalassia teikhe gia ta opoia ginetai tose phasaria teleutaia arkhaiologos kanei anaskaphe sto diko tes oikopedo gia na kanei proektase sto spiti teseinai apotelesma mias makrokhrones prospatheias to apostagma kopon sto opoio ekhoun aphierosei pathos polle agape kai merakimilese o giorgos karantinos pou eipe me pnigei ena paraponose periptose katadikastikes apophases e ellada uphistatai upsele oikonomike epibarunse e opoia kathorizetai apo to eno parallela opheiloume na laboume ola ta aparaiteta metra opos auta perigraphontai sten aitiologemene gnomealla logia opos pane oi sunomilies den pane pouthenato pososto ton emporikon epikheireseon pou epideinosan ten pistoleptike tous ikanoteta einai enanti tou ton etaireion pou ten auxesansigoura to mellon einai para polu duskolompelebones exephrase parapona gia te diaitesia kai tonise ophe einai megale omada kai den axizei autes tes antimetopiseski etsi opos oi sugkuries to epheran dedomenou oti ten proegoumene tes pitas einai tsiknopempte tha phame paraphrazontas kai petukhemene diaphemise ton emeron ton kourampie kapaki meta to tsiknismaekeine ten ora o stephen ouiliam tzon sonters khronon pegaine me to autokineto tou apo to spiti tou pou brisketai sten kephisia ste bretanike presbeia sto kolonakialloste e theteia tou ston edeixe oti prota ton endiapherei e amuna kai meta me ena gkol epairne tis nikes gi auto kai kataphere na bgalei ton sto champions leagueispania ellada deloseis gionas kazlaouskas omospondiakos proponetes ethnikes elladas den mporo na xero ti tha gineito proion diatithetai se suskeuasies ton me duo emeromenies elakhistes diateresimotetasme dema o ste thesprotia ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous me dema oeikhe proegethei sentra tou kaznaphere kai kephaliapasa tou saitioteoi ekdromeis katenthousiasmenoi kai gematoi apo oraies taxidiotikes entuposeis epestrepsan arga to bradu ste base tous kai ananeosan to rantebou tous gia ten epomene periegetike exormeseeph eikhe mono ten euthune tes phulaxes tou phortiouopos kharakteristika episemane metaxu allon sten omilia tou o logos egeton opos o eleutherios benizelos einai panta kai idios semera epikairoseinai gegonos oti gia tis parakatathekes den ekhoun gnose ta grapheia ulikon ton demosion nosokomeion tes khoras dioti den diathetoun sustema diakheirises apothematon logisticsthesmos ton metexetasteon mploumpergkta kathara apotelesmata tou omilou meta ta dikaiomata meiopsephias kai tous phorous parousiasan zemia upsous ta ek enanti kerdon ekkalaphates nikos mikhael libanou khios telkano ta matia ta straba otan xepephto sta phtena me proseukhes kai me brisies xekhnao to aurio kai to khthesto tmema tou pagotou einai ermetika kleisto den ekhei parathura kai eisagoume aera upo piese pou ektopizei ton uparkhonta oste na men uparkhei e dunatoteta kanoume megales allages giati oi proupotheseis pou tithentai einai austereskai to apedeixan kai ste sunekheia kathos kai e koubenta pou akolouthese etan se eremous kai epious tonousola auta ta khronia oi enoikoi menoun sta diamerismata tous kai einai eutukhema pou den ekhei ginei kapoios iskhuros seismosse ena aioliko parko auto prepei na to laboume oposdepote upopse mas epeide prokalei to eggenes phainomeno tes skiases ton anemogennetrionsta emerologia tes regilles e maiou einai semeiomene se kokkino kuklotrite augoustou suzeta to programma tou ektenes suzetese gia to programma tou kai ten eklogike tou diakeruxe en opsei ton euroeklogon egine te deutera to bradu se aithousa xenodokheiou ste mutileneallage ton kairikon sunthekon ten perasmene ebdomada edose te dunatoteta na xanarkhisei kai malista me entatikous ruthmous o alonismos tes phetines sodeias ruziou se serres kai thessalonikesto triemero programma tes giortes perilambanontai laikes bradies entekhnerok sunaulia paradosiaka khoreutika skhemata mekhri kai paidiko partigumnastike rantebou sten kalamata tetarte martiou athletries apo khores dinoun rantebou apo apriliouden to ekanan omostelos e episemanse tou oti dromoi uparkhoun den ekhoume paideia gia na khresimopoioume tous dromous mallon den prokalese kamia entupose giati ekhoume sunethisei na mas to episemainoundieuthunon te suzetese proedros tou periphereiakou sumbouliou k demeroudes de tha eprepe na balei auto ton kurio ste these tou kurie proedre prokeitai gia oligoria pou de dikaiologeitai apo te makra peira sas se autodioiketikous thesmousekhei os exes demarkhos k philellenike omada tha agonistei ston purgo eno oi agones tou deuterou omilou tha ginoun sten amaliada me tous telikous omospondiakos proponetes exere oti ta pragmata tha etan duskola etsi ki allios gia ten ellenike omada sten telike phasesemeionetai pos gia te dieukolunse tous aute to zeugari ton allodapon elabe to poso ton euro apo tous allodapous pou eprokeito na taxidepsouneite braduazei eite pheggei mikros mikros pantrepsou e mikros kalogerepsou elege mia paroimia kai prophanos gia na menprosopika to sisu to theoro peritto apo ten alle omos pos na rixei kaneis megala baridia sto casting as poume apoauto to phusiko periballon to eagles palace leitourgei edo kai trianta peripou khronia khoris pote na khasei kati apo ten klase pou to ekane demophiles se pollous vipsean paremeinan sten ellada den tha mporousan na ta paragoun m autes tis timesistoriodiphes theates mporei na buthistei sten exereunese ton sumbolon pou kosmoun ten exairetikes tekhnes polukhrome kosmophoro me blastous kai anthe e opoia peritrekhei olo ton taphotetarte augoustou titanomakhia tou loui leterie peripeteia protagonistoun sam gouorthingkton liam nison reiph phains tzema arterton alexa ntabalos ores proboles paraskeue sabbato kai kuriake stis aithego aphesa ste genike grammateia ereunas kai tekhnologias ena programmatismo gia mekhri to telos tou me ton tote upourgo k khatzidakito mega proballei xana apopse stis mm to ntokimanter ksadelphos zaka pou parousiazetai e zoe sten aite prin apo ton katastrophiko seismoamesos emphulio polemo pou katatalaiporese to soudan epi treis dekaeties diairontas ton arabophono islamiko borra apo ton kathara aphrikaniko khristianoanimistiko notoupegrapse ste san khouan kai apo ekei bretheke xaphnika stous timpergoulbs pou ton epeisan oti ton ethelan perissotero apo tous klipers e to maiamita telika apotelesmata kai sumperasmata apo tous elegkhous tha ginoun gnosta tele oktobriou
