upparkhei boulese gnoston epikheirematikon kuklon sugkentroses tes metokhes tes thessalikes me skopo ten apoktese tes etairias kai te metexelixe tes se ependutiko ergaleioanakoinose telos ten analepse protoboulias pros aute ten kateuthunse kai opos eipe tha zetesei apo ten kubernese ten entaxe ton phragmaton sto trito koinotiko plaisio sterixesdemos orphanou me edra te nea peramo apoteloumenos apo tous demous a eleutheron b orphanou kai g piereon oi opoioi katargountaithesmos ekhei os kurio stokho tou ten energopoiese kai te summetokhe ton neon kai neanidon tou apodemou ellenismou se athletikous agonas kai politistikous diagonismousaxizei na semeiothei oti e limenike epitrope ekhei na sunedriasei apo tis dekembriouthura tes thebas apodeiknuei emprakta oti oi einai magkes pantou kai oti boethoun tous sunanthropous tousaute e taktike omos einai xeperasmene kathos dokimastheke otan oi polemoi ginontan me ephippous kai apodeikhtheke pos oi strategoi eikhan perissoteres apoleiesna doume delade to keimeno me tis pauseis kai tis anases tou alla kai na emphanistei o khoros pou persi eikhe bgei entelosapantese tou ntenktas perilambaneiekdose tes skhetikes prokeruxes ekhei kollesei ta teleutaia skhedon duo khronia kathos to perimene skhetike apantese apo to upourgeio esoterikonkairos athena tet aug etiketes epitrope antagonismou stigmes tou teleutaiou augoustou apolithomata pou apodeiknuoun pos uperkhe zoe ste ge prin ten emphanise tou oxugonou entopisan epistemones sten australiapaidi tes demosiographias o katsadiotes ten egkateleipse gregora gia na askholethei me to meraki tou ten tekhnesigoura merikoi apo autous einai skartoi kai anaideis alla tetoious briskei kaneis se ola ta epaggelmataauxese kai antistoikha parousiasan o kuklos ergasion kai ta pro phoron kerde tes alpha astika akineta kata to proto exameno toubebaios otan lemeden tolmousan bebaia kai na ta apomakrunoun giati tote tha kinduneuan apo tous idious tous sugkentromenousmallon opos deikhnoun ta pragmata o epikephales tes meizonos antipoliteuses dekhteke to apotelesma kai tha prokhoresei sta thesmothetemena kathekonta auta tes meizonos antipoliteusesste sunekheia bazoume ta khabara sto nero gia mia meraepises uperpoluteleis dream villas diathetei kai to grecotel kos imperial thalasso sten ko eno to grecotel cape sounio etoimazei te megalutere bila tes europessopha metremenos logos tou metadidei ta noemata me ton pio ameso tropoden etan poiotiko alla eikhe polles phaseis mprosta apo tis duo estiessugkrise ton anapheromenon sto phulladio gia to pagoma ton daneiakon anagkon me osa eipe gia to idio thema o k papandreou ste thessalonikeomada tou gianne petrake proerkhomene apo isopalia entos me ton kai etta ektos apo ten xespase khthes ston astera se baros tou opoiou epibletheke me skor sto bardinogianneioalla na to xekathariso den uparkhei kamia thesmike skhese metaxu upourgeiou exoterikon ellenikes kuberneses kai tou k rontouse kathe periptose desmeuse giaopos eipe e oraioteta kai e gnesioteta ton kretikon proionton einai gnosta diethnos kai auto pou khreiazetai einai na eispraxoume tis uperaxies tous pegainontas emeis stous katanalotesdiathetei sklero disko khoretikotetas kai einai sumbato me diaphora phormat binteo divkh kai ekhou kai photographiasmpregkobits eipe epises oti mekhri prosphata ebriske te giourobizion os bareto gegonosetsi oi idees autes katektesan tous sunteretikous kuklous tes ekklesias masaphairei to tatouaz tes merilin to tatouaz tes merilin monroe pou eikhe sto kheri tes aphairei e megkan phox kathos theorei oti mporei na ten periballei me arnetike energeiati ginetai re paidia uparkhoun khrostoumena erotese aute ekhei tethei opos ekhei erthei apo dekades telephonemata pou eginan sten omada massten prospatheia tou na xephugei apo ton asphuktiko astunomiko kloio o zakharioudakes egkateleipse to autokineto tou kai etrexe na kruphtei sta kalamia tou potamouokhi toso me ton belgo oso me ton germano o opoios paremeine perissotero sto edaphossta khamelotera endosunedriaka epipeda ekleise ten trite o genikos deiktes tou kha stis monades katagraphontas apoleiesto opoio opos diabasate khtes tha pianei prin erthei ste khio kai suro teno mukonoaxizei na semeiothei oti to e ephoreia buzantinon arkhaioteton eikhe suntaxei melete gia ten opoia omos apaiteitai epikairopoiese oste to ergo auto na einai orimo pros entaxeto poso pou prokuptei pollaplasiazetai medelade mia epikheirese e opoia kata te leitourgia tes emperiekhei upselo kinduno emphanises ergatikon atukhematon me egkaumata merimnese oikonomika gia te demiourgia eidikes monadas egkaumaton sto ethniko sustema ugeiasariel impagasa gennetheke stis oktobriou sto mpouenos aires kai agonisteke gia prote phora epaggelmatika to me te lanous omada pou emeine gia tessera khroniaellenike kubernese parakolouthei stena ta tektainomena ste geitona kai paragontes tes upogrammizoun te meiomene drasterioteta tes tourkikes aeroporias sto aigaio meta to erzeroumtekhnikos sumphonese me ten protathletria ispanias kai tha einai katoikos tou kamp nou mekhri to kalokairi touto petama ton zoon tou allou einai me ten ennoia aute antistoikho me ten prosbole tes ethikes ton thelukon suggenon tousta euro thetei ten timestokho gia te metokhe tes ekhae e euroxx se ekthese tes me sustase equalweightexallou kai argotera to loutro tou magiakobski se auten te skenike logike upakoueimorgkan o opoios eikhe apoluthei to meta te demosieuse plaston photographion me bretanous stratiotes pou upotithetai oti basanizan irakinous aikhmalotous diapseudei oti o idios e oi sunergates tou epididontan se upoklopessumphona me tis problepseis tes phinlandikes meteorologikes uperesias to nephos tes ephaisteiakes tephras tha phtasei ste notia phinlandia ten tetarteparatase ton pleisteriasmon eos tis dekembriou problepei ruthmise pou perilambanetai sta metra epharmoges tou mesoprothesmouapo to ergostasio diarreei radienergeia meta tis zemies pou upeste apo to seismo kai to tsounami pou eikhan os apotelesma na skotothoun polites eno pano apo exakolouthoun na agnoountaisto autophoro o mourounas gia tous solenes rolo diamesolabete metaxu deuakh kai arkhaiologikes uperesias pheretai na analambanei o antieisaggeleas prokeimenou na arthei to adiexodo metaxu ton duo uperesion gia to ergo kataskeues diktuou sto mersinidiapo te mia ekeinoi pou dinoun emphase sto design theloun ta mikrotera kai omorphotera kineta kai apo ten alle autoi pou endiapherontai gia oso to dunaton perissoteres leitourgies adiaphorontas gia to megethos tes suskeuesbriskomoun ektos elegkhou sunekhisa na ton purobolo kathos eikhe tholosei to mualo mou kai den mporousa na sugkratetho akome kai para to oti etan nekrosauta kapote etan mikra psaradika khoriaaphora ten aphegese tou purza pros ten oikogeneia dragoume molis ephtase sten athena ta khristougenna touebert den eklekhteke prothupourgosgi auto kai e allage pleuses einai semera perissotero apo endedeigmene to opoio de kommatiko kostos den prepei aparaitetos na ermeneuetai se aute ten periptose arnetikae opoia ekhei ta apokleistika dikaiomata khreses apo tona katargethei to stis ktenotrophikes epikheireseisden tha ta lusei pote an khasei ten empistosune tes sto dikaiopara to gegonos oti e telike diatupose perilambanei arketes diexodous gia tis ethnikes kuberneseis kai den diasphalizei apolutos ta dikaiomata ton glossikon meionoteton uperxan telika duo khores pou arnethekan ten upographe tous e ellada kai e tourkiaxthes bradu egine telika sto spiti tou proedrou tes to periboeto geuma karamanleabramopouloualla kai e lindsay den pege piso otan eide se video to ten paris na gelaei me ton kleronomo tou maurou khrusou brandon davis kai na skholiazoun ten apokruphe periokhe testelos o aiolos pamphilon tha labei meros me duo pleromata kai sugkekrimena sto skiph paidon me to raphael karakostante kai ste dikopo paidon opou einai to phabori gia metallio me tous alexandro kouphake kai mikhale zerbase ekatommuria khronia sumphona me tis ektimeseis ton eidikon e krete tha exaphanistei kai mia nea khora tha anaduthei sta notia tou nesiouto proto thema ekane kai mallon duogiannes samaras prin akoma phugei e apostole apo to erakleio eikhe tonisei oti e omada pou tha einai atolme pou tha deixei phobo kai tha paixei pathetika einai aute pou den tha agonizetai tou khronou sten ethnike kategoriaoi ellenotourkikes skheseis prepei na omalopoiethoun kai oi duo laoi na zesoun eirenika apokleismenes tes epiboles apopseon apo te mia pleura sten alle toniseta melissia anaptussontai mona tous se upsometro metron kai oi plesiesteres kalliergeies einai biokalliergeiesto merokamato anerkhontai oi antistrophos analoges pros te pragmatikoteta apaiteseis ton oikonomikon metanaston pou zoun ste periokhe masellada diathetei axiologa periousiaka stoikheia kai kurios e apophase tes kuberneses na ta dosei se idiotes tha ekhei semantika ophele os pros tis ependuseis ten anaptuxe kai to khreos kathos tha meiothei e epibarunse apo tokousarkhe egine kai stelnoume se olous elpidophoro menuma oti stous duskolous kairous pou erkhontai tha protostatesoume gia ten oloklerose ton stokhon olon maspos mporoume na paroume dioxine oi dioxines uparkhoun sto periballon taxideuoun sten atmosphaira sto nero sto edaphos kai duskola dialuontaiapodose tou khartophulakiou tes etairias apo ten arkhe tou etous anerkhetai stosto metaxu mia plerophoria e opoia elege oti bretheke khrematokibotio pou eikhe kharagmeno to onoma tou demou ioanniton prokalese anastatose sto kentriko demarkheioelia os karpos axeperasto kai diakhroniko prosphagi kai to ladi tes themeliodes eidos diatrophes einai parallela kai teletourgiko uliko apo tis arkhaies spondes mekhri to eukhelaio to baptisma to khrisma tes khristianikes latreiassto idio porisma o k rakintzes anapherei oti meso ton sullogikon sumbaseon parakratountan paranoma eisphores apo tous upallelous tonoi times pou tha pairnete den tha einai alethinesepipleon purkagia ekdelotheke noritera kai sten periokhe lagkada ste thessalonike opou tis epigeies dunameis sundramoun apo aeros kai duo aeroskaphe gia ten takhutere antimetopise tesas elpisoume oti toulakhiston osoi diabasoun to arthro auto tha diaphotistoun kai tha arkhisoun na to khresimopoioun oso to dunatotero kai pio orthaostoso akoma kai brakhuprothesma prepei na dei ton tropo apokteses tou ptukhiou ton apophoiton ton opos kai ton tropo prosbases statora giati ta epipla auton ton uperesion moirazontai edo ki ekei kai den ekpoiountai kai giati oi upalleloi menoun sta spitia tous pairnontas omos to mistho tous mekhri pou na doun pou tha tous steiloun einai ponemene istoriame ta nea timologia tha pleronei peripou euro delade euro epipleon auxeseeinai kharakteristiko oti se kathe katoiko antistoikhoun duo autokineta me apotelesma e pole kathemerina na apeileitai me kuklophoriako emphragmaoi enaskholoumenoi me ta nesiotika problemata phoreis den einai eparkos enemeromenoi gia tis eukairies pou tous prospheroun oi politikes tes kai e axiopoiese programmaton kai poron pnikos panagiotopoulos me te seira tou se epistole tou sten graphei ta exes ekplektos plerophoretheka oti kuklophorei to onoma mou anamesa se alla pou antistrateuontai to neo nomoskhedio gia ten kinematographiasunodeuomenos apo ton bouleute demetre tsoumane kai ton proedro tes k giorgo koutsoglou o bouleutes tes enemerotheke apo ton k mpaile gia themata pou aphoroun ten periokhe dinontas idiaitere emphase ston ambrakiko kolpoten epexergasia tou laographematos anelabe o kathegetes laographias sto panepistemio thessalias kai philos tou arakhtheiou theatrou baggeles audikosotan eikha milesei me ten protagonistria ephe logginou mou eikhe pei oti sukhnazate epi menes sto mpournazi gia na mpei sto rolokinese aute pou den apokleietai na oloklerothei episema stis prosekheis emeres entassetai sto diakerugmeno plaisio strategikes tou omilou gia ten eisodo sto khoro pou diethnos apokaleitai exupna ktiriakanonika alla lita o prothupourgos ste deth parousia tou prothupourgou giorgou papandreou kai tes kuberneses sta egkainia tes diethnous ektheses thessalonikes tha einai ousiastike kai lite diabebaionoun kubernetikes pegesstis drasteriotetes tes sumperilambanetai epises to tmema pou askholeitai me ten parokhe olokleromenon exeidikeumenon luseon gia broadcast montaz animation kathos kai to tmema diatheses logismikou programaepilektike kai e epiadiathetei elkustiko design kai upsele poioteta kataskeues kai apotelei mia axiopiste protase gia sundese tou upologiste tou oikiakou ekhosustematos e ton paikhnidomekhanon kai apodose ekhou surround akome kai apo aples stereophonikes peges ekhouta parapano stoikheia aposunthetoun ton mutho tou sklera ergazomenou europaiou kai touena spoudaio alla ligotero gnosto mnemeio e stoa tou eumenous prokeitai na anastelotheimeta apo diethne diagonismo pou prokeruxe e anadeikhtheke o anadokhos tou ergou to opoio oloklerotheke tokritikos logotekhnias mariza ntekastro apotima tis taseis sto paidiko biblio gia te khronia pou perase kai o giannes papadatos parousiazei es teleutaies ekdoseis sten agora tou paidikou bibliouapospasma tes ephemeridas eleutheros logos tes tetartes ianouariouellada diekdikei meridio apo ta disperipato ekane kai e latsio tou tzimpril sise kontra sten rampotniski me ton gallo epithetiko na briskei duo phores dikhtuaaute e ekphrase ekhei meinei kharagmene sto mualo olon ton ellenon meta ten teleutaia epitukhemene prospatheia tou purrou dema stous olumpiakous agones tes atlantas to e opoia epephere to khruso metallio gia to kamari tes kheimarrasanakoinotheke oti e kupriake demokratia ekhei katastei sumballomeno meros tes sumbases tes gia ten prostasia kai ten proothese tes polumorphias tes politistikes ekphrasesto diethnes kai topiko oikonomiko periballon apaitei sunekhe egregorse oste e etairia na prosarmozei egkaira te strategike tes se tukhon metabolesepeide polloi tha speusoun na bgoun kai na poun to kai ten skhese mou me to thelo na dieukrineso oti den ten ekkhoro se kanenasto epipedo auto uperxe agorastike parembase kurios sto khoro ton trapezon me apotelesma o deiktes me ten parodo tes sunedriases na anaktesei ena semantiko meros apo tis megales arkhikes apoleies toumia apo tis pio ripsokindunes kai entuposiakes athletikes diorganoseis tou kosmou eikhan ten tukhe na apolausoun khiliades atoma olon ton elikion pou brethekan khthes ste limne tes bouliagmenesallo ena kharakteristiko paradeigma pou deikhnei oti sto khoro tes ugeias uparkhei sobarotato problema semeiotheke sto khatzekosta se emera ephemeriassarantopoulos me anodo radio athenai po me anodo inteal me anodo argamese epharmoge tou nomou gia osa magazia ekpempoun ntesimpel meta ten proaneggeile o demarkhos broulesuparkhoun bebaios kai polloi perissoteroi logoi pou upagoreuontai apo ton kathe ena khoristasten ellada pantos den ekhei erthei akoma to sugkekrimeno eidos giogkame ena khairetismo de tha khasei kaneisanaballetai logo kakokairias e aphixe tourkikou klimakiou apo ten adrianoupoledikasterio dietaxe te mastigose pente arabon pou sunelephthesan na odegoun methusmenoiautes perilambanoun kallitekhnika dromena kai parembaseis stous dromous tou kilkis ekdeloseis sta mpar tes poles seminaria ergasteria diemerides kai kallitekhnikes ektheseisblepete kamia diaphora me ekouador e argentine sas leo okhigia pente exi menes ta ulika auta menoun sto khoraphi eno kata kairous potizontai aerizontai kai anakateuontaiauto anapherei e se deltio tupou sto opoio sunekhizontas tonizei ypenthumizoume oti ede apo ton ioulio eikhan egkrithei oi khemikotekhnikes meletes kai eikhan katatethei sto upourgeio anaptuxes gia na dothei e skhetike egkrisekai ueteoros o anthropos uesa s auton ton kosuo to uikro to uega anazeta uia dikaiose kai uia nikeexegontas se allo semeio tes idias sunenteuxes ten antithese tou sto skhedio kallikrates o demarkhos mutilenes anephere oti para tis prospatheies pou eginan pote o k ragkouses den dekhtheke na sunantethei me ten tou nomou lesbouanoigoun oi phakeloi gia ksenia kai upogeio parkingk ekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous anoigoun oi phakeloi gia ksenia kai upogeio parkingk epitropes sugkrotei e demotike arkhe aposte barkelone tha pane kales omadesekhei de barunousa semasia gia to elleniko anagnostiko koino kathos apodomei ta eola stereotupa tes neoellenikes koinonias enanti tes arkhaioellenikes kai katadeiknuei ten apostase anamesa ste sugkhrone kai ten arkhaioellenike antilepse gia te phusenea dioikese tha skhematistei meta apo duo ebdomades kai endekhetai na uparkhoun kai nea melephantastike anaparastase tes arkhaias athenas ergo tou karl phrintrikh sinkel doxastiko tou klasikou ideodous opos to proslambanei kai to ekphrazei o europaikos romantismos ton arkhon tou aiepilegoume epises tis analogika mikroteres se baros suskeuasies pou periekhoun te megalutere dunate posoteta proiontosmeta te lexe tou agona oi duo ouades uazi ue tous diaitetes sunephagan giortazontas etsi to telos tes agonistikes periodoueinai polu oraiaden einai katholou tukhaio to gegonos pos se kapoia paidia den aresei to skholeiouperxe mia anaptuxiake istorike exelixe pou semera edose se ereunetika kai se diagnostika ergasteria nea diagnostika ergaleia polutima ki euprosdektaapo edo eukola tha breite ten under der linen ton dromo kato apo tis philures o opoios einai o oraioteros tes polesto stegastiko einai ena apo ta semantikotera problemata gia tous tsigganous tithetai omos me diaphoretikous orous se diaphoretikes omadesexartese apo tous goneis kai e anagke gia anexartesia sugkrouontai ste diatropheta khiliometra anebainoun khoris na to katalabeis kai mono o aeras kanei enokhletike ten parousia tou pano apo ta khlmbebaia gia ten apobole mou e mpala bgeke xekathara ston omo mouepimeleia ton keimenon kai tou epoptikou ulikou pragmatopoietheke apo ton proedro tou sullogou kai ten k sbolake th plethos kosmou parabretheke sten katameste aithousa ekdeloseon tou epimeleteriou kilkisgia to tmema mas proteuousa these sto olokleromeno auto sustema siderodromikon sundeseon katekhei e kataskeue tes siderodromikes egnatias delkordelakias omos to khei eipe leei pos thelei polu noris an ginetai ten prote agonistike kiolas to metaxu mas ntermpiliges ores argotera akolouthese e ephodos sto mikro diamerisma tes odou orpheos sto kholargostases tes diethnous koinotetas oi upourgoi amunas ton kai tes bretanias rompert gkeits kai laiam phox kharakterisan themite ten epiloge os stokhou ton grapheion tou kantaphi se koine sunenteuxe tupoumepos ephtase e ora na upsosoume te phone mas ka na brontophonaxoume ena okhi se kapoio apo ta ethnika mas e esoterika mas themata pou mas talanizounta kerde meta phoron emphanisan meiose tes taxeos tou kai diamorphothekan se ekatpalia elegan ti na kano sto khorioenteinete ten prospatheia sassten egoumenitsa kurio kharakteristiko tou kairou to epomeno triemero tha einai e brokheden egine dekte e paraitese kakhrimane ten paraitese tou apo to tes giannina ethese kai episema ste diathese tou k khristobasile o nomarkhes ioanninon alekos kakhrimanes kathos theorei oti o kuklos tou ekleiseparaskeue ianouariou diepseuse ta peri diagraphes tou prostimou upsous disarkhika to erakleio adiketheke kai den diathetei megales peges me katharo nerosten periokhe tou agiou demetriou apo opou pernouse o dromos pou enone te mutilene me ton polikhnito kai brisketai kai to omonumo parekklesi leitourgoun apo ton properasmeno aiona duo kapheneia paliotera to semeio stases ton taxidiotonentoutois e epikurose tes sumbases exartatai apo ten uiothetese orismenou arithmou nomothetikon idiaitera tropopoieseon me stokho ten enarmonise tes ellenikes nomothesias me tis aporreouses apo te sumbase desmeuseisbouleutes pragmatopoiese episkepse sto ergostasio tes ellenikes biomekhanias zootrophon opou sunomilese me te dioikese kai tous ergazomenous gia ta problemata pou antimetopizounmetaxu allon zetoun ten katargese tou demotikou phorou meiose tou phpa kai paratase tou orariou mousikesdiabaste opos akribos tuponontai gia paidia pou ekhoun mpei sten proephebike elikia ena polu kalo doro pou mporei na tous anoixei neous orizontes einai mia kompakt photographike opos e canonopos kai na khoun ta pragmata pantos e ektase emeine athikte kai ta dentra ste these tousto piperi einai anarrikhetiko san te banilia e opoia gia na kanei sporo prepei na gonimopoiethei me to anthropino kherise mia pole pou kunega tis anases me to ntoupheki khiliades phuta gia ten agora kai te phuteuse ton opoion sigoura dothekan arketa khremata na egkataleipontai sten tukhe tous me epideiktike adiaphoriasumphona me ereuna tes etaireias nielsen oi stous teletheates gnorizoun ten uparxe tes uperesias kai toulakhiston to ekhei anatrexei se auten anazetontas plerophories oi misoi ex auton enemeronontai skhedon kathemerina apo tis selides touopos egine gnosto o eisaggeleas epises epikaleitai tis marturies kai allon upallelon tou demou oi opoioi perigraphoun mia sunantese pou egine parousia tou k lemousia meta ten apokalupse tes upotheses tou elleimmatosse kanena kheirourgeio den einai eleuthere e prosbase stis kheirourgikes aithouses stous sunodous ton asthenon me apotelesma polles phores idios to apogeuma autoi na phthanoun mekhri tous diadromous ton aithousonmartina gia na ekdikethei ton antra tes gia to xulo pou troei paraplanei tous duo uperetes bebaionontas tous pos dethen o sgkanarelos einai spoudaios giatros alla den to paradekhetai para mono an ton spasoun sto xulosumphona me ton idio katarkhen oi eklogikoi katalogoi etan notheumenoi eno opos mou kateggeilan mele tes dekhontan telephonemata apo sugkekrimena grapheiaegkaire aute apokalupse kai parembase tou aphegete apo ena stadio metathanatio e apo ena stadio komatodous katastases demiourgei ston anagnoste ena sunaisthema aganakteses epeide ena neo atomo den mporese na diaphugei apo te stenokephalia ton megalonmeridio apo ten pita tou elektronikou bibliou diekdikei kai e gnoste alusida bibliopoleion barnes noble e opoia ekhei lansarei te suskeue nook katekhontas pleon to tes amerikanikes agorasmeta ton ektheseon tou o pinakas diatheses ton katharon kerdon opos protatheke apo to tes etairias kai oristheke to kata metokhe merisma sto poso emeromenia apokopes tou dikaiomatos gia to merisma oristheke eantitheta o skouteles pou kategorountan gia amese sunergeia sten anthropoktonia arnetheke tis kategories pou tou apodidontai kathos opos iskhuristeke eikhe zetesei apo ton sugkategoroumeno tou na men skotosoun ten kopelato septembrio tou oi treis astronautes tou skaphous pragmatopoiesan ton proto kineziko diastemiko peripatose mia ebdomada peripou to neo dioiketiko sumboulio tha sunedriasei prokeimenou na sunelthei se somaomos to apisteuto egine kubernon komma pleiopsephia tes boules ephuge mesa apo te boule gia na apophugei diereunese skandalouk agorastos anakoinose te sustase grapheiou periphereiarkhe se oles tis geographikes enotetes stous semerinous nomouskathe bema proodou pou kanoume apenanti stis sunepeies tes oikonomikes krises tha ekhei antikrisma sto epipedo diabioses olon mas kai prota apo ola ton asthenesteron oikonomika sumpoliton mastreis genies adistakton eraston prospathoun na xetulixoun to koubari ton khartinon psukhon toussto epeirou sto uparkhoun ekpantos kapoies ekklesies ton timesan apoopou oi sikeloi tha kanoun ten episeme parousiase tes kainourgias omadas upo ton bintsentso montela sto koino tousti tha ginei kurioi meta tauta tha broume ten akre e tha kanoume oloi ta koroida mekhri na skotothei o protos anthropos giati e strabe paramoneuei ana pasa stigmeena upourgeio me ta demosia erga kai tis metaphores kai ena upourgeio me to periballon ton oikismo kai te xorotaxiasten mia einai monades mprosta o philios kai o arguresto emporiko kentro me tesseris megales plateies pou enonontan me anetous metaxu tous dromous kai sugkentromena guro tous metropolitiko nao trapeza ellados xenodokheia zakharoplasteia to eroo kai to agalma tou athanasiou diakou etan skhediasmeno rodion kai kretikon epaletheuteke gia mia akome phoraeroida anazeta aute ten agape akoma kai se perasmenes skheseis opou suneidetopoiei oti e zoe einai mprosta kai okhi upobastazomene apo graphoun apomnemoneumata kai istorikous pou einai etoimoi na suroun enan tsamikoepises eklekhtheke trimeles grammateia gia to parartema tes lemnousten pragmatikoteta den einai isidora ntankan to onoma einai eukole e sugkomide biomekhanopoiemene kalliergeiasugkrotetheke se soma to neo ds tou sundesmou emeresion periphereiakon ephemeridonrikhnoume ta khorta ten ntomata ta piperia kai ten kautere gia pente adikemata gia pente adikemata edioketo o stugeros paidoktonos me eisaggelike entole apo to proegoumeno epeisodio pou eikhe demiourgesei ten emera ton euroeklogonadikethekame kurioi kai malista katadikastekame sunekhiste loipon na orizete diaitetes me ton idio tropoto khioni kaluptei ta panta sto pertouliautes oi liges lexeis sumpuknonoun ten arrekta me biblio demene zoe tou sumpatriote mas andrea ganiareto diko tous brontero paron dinoun apo to ta mele tou athletikou sullogou kophon kretes pou drasteriopoiountai se arketa athlematapraktika auto semainei ligotero sukhnes episkepseis stous pelates analoga me ten kategoria tous khoris na ginei antilepto kai na ekhei epiptoseis stis poleseispara tis entuposiakes bitrines kai tis megales epigraphes ton prosphoron ligoi einai ekeinoi pou pernoun ten eisodo ton katastematonparaskeue oi apophoitoi tou idiotikou ekpriou deutera oi apophoitoi tes theoretikes kateuthunses tou eniaiou lukeiou erakleiouden mpeka ste diadikasia na plerophoretho ta upoloipa mele tes dioikesespoulese enanti adrou timematos ston organismo ergatikes katoikias ektaseis peripou stremmatonligous menes meta kai aphou alloiothekan toso oi protaseis oso kai ta praktika metra pou proteine e epitrope e apophase tritse anatrapeketote oi einai mesa sta deka aristourgemata apo sustaseos tekhnespragmati ta teleutaia khronia den ekhei katagraphei tetoio politistiko kai paradosiako gegonos se tetoia megale ektase kai me summetokhe sugkrotematon apo tis epeirousopos etan ta koskina oi gkazontenekedes bedoures koubades kai diaphora alla skeuetha mporouse na uposterikhthei oti e sunedriase diexekhthe upo ten anokhe ton en dunamei poleton oi opoioi meta ta prota lepta den epedeixan idiaitera epithetikes diatheseissigoura oi epomenes meres theorountai krisimes kai kathoristikes gia to an tha ekhei mellon o keraunosegkuklios tou upourgou milaei gia katanome khoron okhi katanome khronouomos uparkhei mia basike diaphora metaxu mas ekei kubernese kai axiomatike antipoliteuse sumphonoun se aute ten anagkastike poreiaauxemene kata etan e kerdophoria tes china construction bank sto proto exameno khare sten auxemene zetese gia pistotika proiontaoi birtouozoi tes pragas me ton bruno leonardo gelber pianodokimazoume mepos khreiazetai ki allo alati kai piperieinai eikona apatelegennetheke stis bruxelles to kai megalose ste phlorinagiati einai gnoste e piste mou sten phileleuthere politike kai stis arkhes kai tis idees tou phileleutherismouna anapheroume telos oti ten perasmene tetarte o sundesmos philathlon kerkura episkephtheke mazi me te dioikese tous proponetes kai orismenous podosphairistes tou erasitekhne kerkura to kainourgio nosokomeio sto kontokaliopos grapsame kai khthes e tha parei apo ten ena arketa sebasto poso kathos e omospondia protithetai na moirasei kai ta dis pou tha mpoun sto tameio tes apo to khorego tes ethnikes stis enoseis gia gepedikes egkatastaseisan den se xepastrepsoun me ta pontikia tous apokleietai na glitoseis otan xestomisoun tis atakes tous ikanes na prokalesoun anepanorthotes blabes sta egkephalika sou kuttaraduo authaireta sta dase tes paionias paraskeue septembrios ekaton ebdomenta pente authaireta uparkhoun sta dase tis dasikes kai tis anadasotees ektaseis tes kentrikes makedonias sumphona me tis episemes katagraphesmia mageutike bradia me te khorodia khlomou kai te norbegike khorodia na ermeneuoun sta ellenika tragoudia tou khatzedake tou thodorake kai allon mousourgonsigoura akome den eimaste sto agonistiko semeio pou tha ethela aphou to kalokairi khtisame mia nea omadaetsi kai to anamenetai na mas bombardisoun me dekades nea montela apo ta opoia ekhoun ede ginei gnosta kai parousiazontai semera apo tis selides tou autoneasto deutero emikhrono e larisa mpeke dunatapente emeres ekhoun pleon mprosta tous gia na enteinoun ten proetoimasia tous kai na parousiastounsto sentra tou zorupide ston polukhronide pou prolabainei ten exodo tou abraau plasarei kai e upala katalegei kornerotan omos ton plesiasame kai ton rotesame mas eipe oti episema den uparkhei tipota pros to paronden einai pantos e prote phora pou e zeta ekthese empeirognomonon gia ten axiopoiese tou kastelliouezel leei sten melikha oti den einai o omer alla sugkhronos tes dinei krupha to dakhtulidi tes parallela me mia anadrome sto parelthon blepoume ten proegoumene zoe ton boethon tou ezel tou kamil tes sempnem kai tou tephokhthesine anodike antidrase ton diethnon khrematisterion den etan ikane na odegesei se anakampse kai te sophokleous e opoia ekleise me nea ptose phlertarontas me to epipedo ton monadonme mia tetoia prooptike oi deloseis tous gia tous ubristes tha mas kanoun uperephanous aute e dieuthunse elektronikou takhudromeiou prostateuetai apo kakoboule khreseole diadikasia ginetai me peitho kai stokho na men aisthanthei e meionoteta oti tha alothei e tautoteta tes leei stenden prokeitai na kanei kinese gia tora o abramopoulosaisiodoxia aute sterizetai sta stoikheia pou anakoiothekan ten deutera stis gia ten katanalotike dapane e opoia auxetheke ton ioulio me ton upselotero ruthmo ton pente teleutaion menonste sunekheia eno e sugkentrose teleione kai arkhize e apokhorese emphanistekan omades ton pou egklobisan tous sugkentromenous sten pleiopsephia tous mathetesautoi loipon pou semera aphrizoun me ton pasignosto kharakterismo boulgaroi xeroun polu kala ti ginetai kathe kuriake sta gepedasten tasmania uparkhei kai to megalutero tropiko dasos tes australias to tarkin eno akoma kai sten koilada styx oi eukaluptoigigantes sunuparkhoun armonika me phutika eide tropikon dasonektos tou oti prokeitai gia to makrobiotero ugeionomiko idruma tou topou apo to deutero miso tou aiona ekei epharmostekan protoporiakes therapeies gia te lepra apo tis protes sta balkaniatha mporouse as poume o teontosits aphou ethele toso polu na meinei ston olumpiako na perimene mia klese apo ten dioikesearthro gonike phrontida kai to dikaioma tou paidiou na men apokhorizetai tous goneis tou ektos an auto ekhei krithei asumbibasto me to sumpheron tou upokhreoseis tou kratousmolis brethei stablos gia na metapherei ta zoa tou tha adeiasei to oikema pou ta diaterouse kai empodize te sunekhise ton ergasion gia to ergo tou phragmatos kores gephuridiaitetes tha einai oi kk papantos kai papadopoulos tzitzira maragkake apostolakeeutukhos pou o erotas den apotelei adikemaaute ten anagke dieide pro eton o aeimnestos nikos giannadakes o protergates tou ekdotikou thaumatos pou ekhei epitelesei e bikelaia demotike bibliotheke hrakleioubouleutes pou tha ekphrasei gnome me sumphone me ekeine tou arkhegou diagraphetai parautaprophasisteite oti na naidunasteia ton topor apoteleitai apo ton ampram ton gio tou rolan kai ton eggono tou nikolaneos khrestes eggraphesundese sten koruphe ton protimeseon ton anagnoston toso tes ellenikes ekdoses tou periodikou conde nast traveler oso kai tou amerikanikou periodikou travel and leisure bretheke phetos to nesi tes santorinesbebaia oi upalleloi ton grapheion ekanan o ti mporousan gia na demiourgesoun mia taxe sto olo khaos kai na omalopoiesoun ten katastase ostoso os phusiko epakoloutho den eleipse o ekneurismos kai oi lektikoi diaplektismoi metaxu ton atomon pou perimenantelos stis epharmoges plerophorikes kai telepikoinonion sten ugeia tha parousiastoun protupes epharmoges oi opoies anaptukhthekan me base pragmatikes anagkes stous khorous ton nosokomeion se sunergasia me tous upeuthunous giatrousarkei na tous breis mposikous kai na oi khomateres na oi egkatastaseis gia ta tsimenta kai ta ugraeria akome kai oi keraies ton stathmon kai tes kinetes telephonias kapou apo pano briskontaito prosdoka epises ten eispraxe ekatommurion euro opheilon tou demosiou apo to upourgeio oikonomikonekhei ginei olokleros patagos gia osa sunebesan sto sugkekrimeno paikhnidi alla gi akoma mia phora oi opadoi tou presbe phrontisan na kanoun rezili ten khora maskubernese epithumei e kalupse na ginei ana mia monada mesa sto kai sto mia protase pou opos phainetai blepei kat arkhen thetika todosame kai dinoume makhe gia te soteria tes khorasmporeite na ton prosdiorisete nai to prosdiorizo sta adiathetes katoikies sto nomo attikes kai se ole ten ellada mazi me ten attikede tha mporousa na leipso apo aute ten krisime makhe gia to aurio tou topou maskleinontas thelo na po oti ta thalassia thelastika alieutekan me entono ruthmo kai stis arkhes tou aiona e diethnes koinoteta paraterese kai se sunduasmo ton proanapherthenton paragontonemmeson apeilon mia semantike meiose stous plethusmous tousparallela e sumphonia tha problepei ten axiopoiese kai kapoion uphistamenon geotreseon oi opoies tha mporoun na kalupsoun se semantiko bathmo tis auxemenes anagkes udrodoteses pou uparkhoun eidika tora to kalokairi logo kai tes touristikes kinesesta mele tou sumbouliou pou enekrinan tis protaseis episemanan epises ten anagke autes na ginoun apodektes apo to armodio upourgeio kai pros touto tha uparxoun sunanteseis kai epaphes tou periphereiarkhe kai tou thematikou antiperiphereiarkhe sten athenaeinai adunaton oi antagonistes mas na apekhoun molis khiliometra apo to kentro kai emeis na eimaste se apostase khiliometron dikaiologese te these tes o antkai pou odeuei arage e diethnes skene tes modas me dedomene ten oikonomike krise koitazontas ten istoria tes modas apo tis arkhes tou aiona mekhri semera katalabaineis oti den einai dunato na uparkhoun sunekheia polu dunates ekphraseisstous agones uperxe kai sunenose dunameon ton topikon sullogon me nearous athletes na demiourgoun triades me polu kephitoso o k lianeres oso kai o k elaphros ektimoun oti oi trapezes tha periorisoun oso mporoun tis leitourgikes dapanes tousisos prokeitai gia panellenio rekorotan ta bgazete bolta exoplisteite me ena mikro pharasi kai sakoules oste na mazeuete tis akatharsies touskalo einai na kerdizeis polla alla an kunegate me to zori stoikhemata me apodoseis spania tha kerdizeteap auton gennetheke o oiagrosna gemisei to gepedo etsi oste oi paiktes tou ethnikou mas sugkrotematos na aisthanontai pragmati san sto spiti tous kai na paroun te nikeprokrisetha prepei pantos na semeiothei oti oi tekhnikoi edrasan takhutata thetontas se leitourgia tis monades pou ekhoun to sustema black start einai oi monades pou ekhoun te dunatoteta leitourgias apo medenike taseerotetheis gia to neo eklogiko nomo o ragkouses apantese oti to upourgiko sumboulio den ekhei labei akome tis telikes apophaseis touse autes tis aneu proegoumenou methodeuseis kai prokleseis einai monodromos e sustrateuse olon ton ergazomenon tes epikheireses gia na dosoume analoges agonistikes apanteseisoi khumoi diakrinontai se phreskous e biomekhanopoiemenousdieuthuntes ereunas tou gallikou ethnikou kentrou epistemonikon ereunon mikael lebi anapheretai ste philoxenia ton italon politikon phugadon sto parisimeta ten apophase aute tou dikasteriou e ellada upebale te sunoptike ekthese sten epitrope ton martio touten opoia den parousiasame mono giati einai e rozita sokou alla kai giati einai exairetike mageirissapara to kalo xekinema kai to probadisma me sto den uperxe e analoge sunekheiabasilikos erotas se teleoptike metaphora skhedon ena mena meta ton paramuthenio gamo tous mia teletainia pou tha existorei te skhese tou prigkipa programma tes etairias einai upsous disprotase tou diktuou antitheta apodiorganonei tous sobinistes kathos eunoei te kheiraphetese tes meionotetas kai ara ten epharmoge tes suntagmatikes arkhes gia mpela tous ekhoun brei oi idioktetes ton energoboron pou zoun sto londinosto mellon blepoumeeidikotera e enarkteria panegurike sunedria tha ginei to bradu tes tetartes noembriou kai e katalekteria panegurike sunedria gia ten exagoge ton sumperasmaton tou sunedriou to proi tes kuriakes noembriou sten iera mone odegetriasexo apo to karnabaliko ergasteri ouk oliges omades etoimazontai gia te megale parelase kai okhi monose epi sunolou eklogikon tmematon elabaneimai paiktes tes rozenmporgk aute te stigme kai den mporo na mileso gia ton panathenaiko e gia alles omadesapoklise apo ta protupa pou ekhei orisei e koinonia episurei tautokhrona kai koinoniko elegkhopar ol auta o k papoutsoglou pege ste bretania opou eidikeutheke sten okeanologia kai sten ydrobiologia kai ste sunekheia ekane to didaktoriko tou sten ikhthuologia sto panepistemio patronta aiolika megabat etan ta perissotera metaxu ton prasinon megabat pou entakhthekan ton maio sto sustema sumphona me ta teleutaia stoikheia tou gia ton mena maiokhestekaue ue to suupathio alla den antekho allo na ue prokaloun an tha dekhthoun e okhiola auta upo ten proupothese oti den tha ekdelothei kapoio aprosdoketo arnetiko gegonos sto exoteriko e kapoia stoikheia pou na deikhnoun epibradunse sto ruthmo anaptuxes tes pagkosmias oikonomiasanalutika to programma ton agonon pou arkhizoun stiste diorganose tha timesei e akademia tou odto gramma tou nomou elpizoume na epharmostei kai toraaneu proegoumenou o paragontismos sten diakheirise prosdokion kai to emporio elpidassto upsos tou toso o ntale pou petukhe to deutero gkol tou panserraikou oso kai o ntaniel phernantes o opoios katebase rola otan pieze e ksantheertha suzetesame kai eida oti aphorouse auto to pragmai katalabate pantos apo to telephonema ti sunebei okhi den katalaba dioti den to perimenaallazei o kosmos m ena magiko rabdi sto sumpan tou khari poter ola ginontai oute omos oi okto ekdotes pou aperripsan to biblio mporousan na dianoethoun oti klotsousan tetoia tukhediptukho gia paidia khrononkata ta alla tha leitourgei kai anagnosterio kai tha parekhetai dorean sundese sto internet stous elektronikous upologistes tou sullogou alla kai ston phoreto upologiste tou episkepteto leei etan e khronia pou egine e katataxe ton krasion tou bordeauxetsi den ekbiomekhanisteke pote e ellada aphou exegagan ta khremata tou skhediou marsal sten elbetiase erotese an pisteuei oti uparkhei pithanoteta gia luse prin apo tis euroekloges o k ntaouner eipe oti den tha ethele na thesei khronodiagrammataapla eidopoieste tous kai tha sas paralaboun autoi apo to stathmok papadopoulos eipe oti den mporoume na paragnorizoume tis pragmatikotetes oi opoies ekhoun empedothei diethnos epilegontas ton apomonotismoto mono kalo gi autous oti apodeiknuontai poluthesites kai sumphona me to mathe tekhne ki astene ki an peinaseis piastene den tha ekhoun problema ston epaggelmatiko prosanatolismo kai tha kanoun karierasemera stis e nea kubernese tha orkistei sto proedriko megaro enopion tou karolou papouliastoma kalodomemeno me aisthetes kales poiotetas tannines kai kapos tonismene oxuteta se ena sunolo pou thelei khronooi euthunes ton sumbibasmenon egesion se kai pou anekoun sten autonome parembase einai terastiesiesous khristos einai o monadikos soteras tou kosmoudike sas pleura ekhei diatuposei kat epanalepse enstaseis gia pleures autou tou skhediouse auto to dromo duo kateuthunseis phainetai na kuriarkhounmantsester giounaitent ekmetalleuomene te renta tes ten anikanoteta tes arsenal kai te khthesine etta tes siti proelaunei pros ten kataktese tou protathlematos agglias sten istoria tesdelose tou mariou karogian meta apo te khthesine sunantese tou me ton proedro khristophia sten opoia anephere oti e suzetese tous tha sunekhisteiekatontades philathloi tou tha sumparastathoun sten omada tous ste rebanstetarte ioulios na men dothei ithageneia stous albanotsamedesprin apo merikes ebdomades to deuterobathmio dikasterio epheteio dodekanesou apallaxe olous tous emplekomenous apo tis kategories athoonontas tous elleipsei prostheton stoikheiongeorgiou omadiko paikhnidi gia ten anazetese tou drakou tes rodou se sunergasia me to sustema proskopon ialusou musteriodes periplanese sten mesaionike taphro to bradumen upotakhthoume sto lathos na protakhthei enas geographikos prosdiorismos pkh e boreia dioti takhista tha katastei ena diaphanes perituligma pou tha emperiekhei ethnos makedononagkalia me ton titlo e ntortmount video mia anasa apo ten kataktese tou titlou ste bundesliga brisketai e ntortmount meta te semerine tes nike me epi tes phraimpourgkuperxe emera pou metresa poulmangia ligo ginetai phelini alla den einai pheliniego den eimai mataiodoxosaneta domatia ta misa me thea sto limanioi polites tes lemnou tha proboun se energeies akraies kai me pou tha kanoun tous ithunontes na askholethoun epitelous me to problema masten ikanopoiese tou exephrase epises kai o genikos grammateas tes koinotetas kostas markospote den khorothetetheke ekei o khuta alla akome kai os skepse sunantese soreia antidraseon kai eneplakesan kai megaloskhemones politikoi kai alloi paragontes gia na prostatepsoun te dodone apo ta skoupidiase ena tetoio khionodromiko kentro den tha mporouse na leipei ena snowboard park pista gia kheirophrena me snowmobiles kai phusika to nukhterino ski kathe sabbatomia kai mono phrase apo ten omilia tou prothupourgou ste sunedriase tou upourgikou sumbouliou na sosoume ten oikonomia mas apo te khreokopia arkei gia na antilephthoun oloi to poso dramatike einai e katastasepapardeles me araka kai rikota suntages food styling phot andreas eustathiou grexelixe aute eperease kai tous ellenikous titlous ste diarkeia mias emeras opou genikotera oi poletes etan perissoteroi apo tous agorastesoi gepedoukhoi diathetoun mia polu kale omada eno to idio mporoume na poume kai gia tous oraniebgeno ekane piso me apotelesma auto to pou sunepagetai kai tis analoges oikonomikes upokhreoseis na aioreitai na peripheretai kai telika na leitourgei os phantasma pou stoikheionei ta oikonomika teston idio rolo epaize kai e galatousa ena leuko khaliki tes paralias me rodine apokhrose pou prostateue te galoukhia otan to kratousane pano tous oi thelazousesk karatzapheres zetese apo tous psephophorous na suntaxiodotesoun tous kkaramanle kai gpapandreou oi politikes ton opoion odegesan te khora se adiexodade tha mporousa na meino ametokhe s auten ten prospatheia giauto tha sterixo me oles mou tis dunameis te nea aute parataxebrekan tragiko thanato se trokhaiooi duo demosiographoi mazi me ton aphgano odego tous kai ena diermenea apekhthesan sten eparkhia kapisa stis dekembriou eno ergazontan gia ena reportaz gia to galliko teleoptiko diktuo france odegos ligo argotera aphetheke eleutherosphotia ekdelotheke se dusbato semeio kai to ergo tes katasbeses etan arketa duskolosumphona me plerophories oi peiraiotes briskontai to teleutaio diemero se epaphes me tous ekprosopous pente podosphairiston pou agonizontai sto sampionaepises tonisteke e anagke na leitourgesei ousiastika e skhetike diadikasia tes demosias diabouleuses e opoia me upaitioteta tou upourgeiou ekhei odegethei se telmasten anakoinose anapherei ta exes ekphrazoume ten orge kai ten aganaktese mas gi auto pou sunebei se baros tou kourdou egete kai tou kourdikou laouakoma kai sta plei oph deixame poia einai e kalutere omada tou protathlematosmono phanphares kai alla logia na agapiomaste e kai eniote na rikhnoume molotoph kai dakrugonaoi epistemones den katapheran na krupsoun ten ekplexe tous gia to megethos tes katastrophes pou prokalesan oi agnostoi drastesto klima epideinosan kai ta amerikanika oikonomika stoikheia me tis aiteseis anergias na auxanontai tis poleseis katoikion na meionontai kai ton epikheirematiko deikte philly fed na apogoeteuei se megalo bathmokai autes tis emeres kuklophorei sten agora o diadokhos tou to harmonyeuro gia ten trietia pou eikhe medenika eisodemata kai euro gia te dietia pou eikhe apoktesei eisodemataiskhuristeke sugkekrimena oti gnostos epikheirematias o opoios eikhe diaprepsei sto exoteriko tes gnorise ton ede ekliponta dikegoro pou pheretai na eikhe emploke sto kukloma me ta demosia ktematasugklonistekame apo auto to gegonos okhi toso apo ta zemies oso apo ten apoleia anthropinon zoon kai ton traumatismo pollon sumpatrioton masatmosphairikes melodies me galliko italiko kai aggliko stikho ton phore khan mpasle tosti tsilea katalani maskani respigki kai tsantonai apoteloun to programma tou resital tes phemismenes italidas protagonistrias tes operasalla emeis mathame oti e kentrike enose epimeleterion diaphonei me ten apophase ton armodion upourgeion kai zeta anabole ton eklogon oste na me sumpesoun me ten periodo tou paskhasabbato oktobrios an kai ekhoun perasei khroniaauto eikhe os apotelesma o kapnos na meinei ektetheimenos kai na odegethoume se metepeita diapragmateuse apo apodunamomene theseisos aute na einai kai e thetike pleura tes krises e mone aisiodoxe paragraphos sto dusoiono keimeno ton kairon masmerikoi eurokrates pane pio makria proteinoun ten anaklese tes euthunes tes diakheirises ton idion ton demosion oikonomikon tes apo kathe kubernese pou den sebetai to sumphono statherotetasgunaika kai to moro metapherthekan amesos sto nosokomeio gia na exetastoun apo giatrous kai na tous paraskhethei iatrike boetheiaekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous orkistekan oi tes boules stis to proi tes tetartes pragmatopoietheke sten olomeleia tou koinobouliou e telete orkomosias ton bouleuton pou anadeikhthekan apo tis ekloges tes oktobrioutou edosa to manteli mou gia na skoupisei ta dakrua tou kai ekeinos prosexe to monogramma mouopos anapheretai ste skhetike anakoinose e sumbase aphora peripou ergazomenous pou themelionoun dikaioma ameses lepses suntaxes sumphona kai me te dunatoteta anagnorises khronou pou parekhei prosphate nomothetike ruthmisegiati prepei na sunekhizetai apo te stigme pou dromologethekan kapoia pragmata kai en pase periptosei opos phainetai to nero mpeke sto aulakiakome katapherame na pheroume sto idio trapezi tous idious tous megalometokhous ton kedeikhne oti ekhei prooptike na ginei kalos paiktestosa khronia ephaga tetoia laspe oso den ephage kanenas allos sten elladaproponetes tou olumpiakou milese kai gia ton paragonta edra kai gia to poso mporei na epereasei ten apodose ton duo omadonepises katedeixe to poso probleuatike einai e logike tes khreses peirauatozoon pou ekhei olethries sunepeies okhi uono gia ta ue anthropina zoa alla kai ton idio ton anthropome koine tous epistole oi bouleutes tou kinematos sto hrakleio zetoun na men parthei kamia apophase ekei pou uparkhoun perissoteroi tou enos upopsephiou apo ten parataxe oste na men dikhastoun oi topikes koinoniestelos gia opoiadepote plerophoria oi paragogoi tha prepei na apeuthunontai sta grapheia tes enoses alkaiou mutilene e sto telephonoto ekhei pei o solomos einai pasignostoidou kai autos o periousios laos sou oi apogonoi tou abraam pou prin apo merika khronia surotan sten apanthrope genoktonia sta nazistika stratopeda tora suntassetai me ta aimobora gerakia ton polemokapelonkhoris dikastikous upallelous gia ena ta dikasteria prebezas eno se apergia ekhei kalesei apo semera e topike grammateia prebezas tou tous ergazomenous idiotikou kai demosiou tomeakanoume focus stis kaluteres paskhalines protaseis ste nesiotike ellada kai sas dinoume update tips gia akome megalutere apolauseanoiktes oi portes tou upourgeiou omos oi apaiteseis prepei na einai sugkekrimenes sumphona me ten upourgophobomaste oti oi esoterikes apsimakhies tha odegesoun se olike e se merike adranopoiese tes epitropesauto prepei na ginetai apo kapoio melos tes oikogeneiaseikonographike paradose e opoia diemorphothe sten anatole diedothe kai epekratese takheos kai sten dusesigoura se liges meres e aisthese tou tamplo tha einai diaphoretike kai ola tha ekhoun sunethisei te nea eikona toutrite augoustou biutiful tou alekhantro gkonzales inaritou koinoniko drama protagonistoun khabier mpardem marisel abarez khana mpousaimp ores proboles tetarte stis aithto problema einai to aparadekta khamelo epipedo ton daskalon e adiaphoria tous gia te douleia tous kai e periphronese matheton kai goneon gia to skholeioerthe e ora tou kai tou giorgou papandreou gia auto men oligoresete men distasete men meinete apatheista idia mallon anamenoun kai ten alle megaloprepe parataxiapo tote pou gennetheke apotelouse to pio semantiko sustatiko se aute ten ideaparastase epikheirei ena taxidi mnemes ston tragiko mutho ton atreidon arkhizontas apo te thusia tes iphigeneias kai ten ptose tes troias gia na katalexei ston kunegemeno apo tis erinues oreste kai ten kataphuge tou stous theous apollona kai athenaanakoinose tes gia tis purkagies trite augoustos anakoinose gia tis purkagies sten kerkura exedose eanapherei oti oi plerophories pos oi emplekomenoi einai upopsephioi bouleutes kai stelekhe tou einai mia exegese giati kaneis den thelei na sustathei tora exetastike gia to megalutero diakommatiko skandalo stis prometheies ugeiaseuro mazi me to skhetiko eggrapho tes genikes dieuthunses phorologikon elegkhon tou upourgeiou oikonomikon me to opoio krinontai emprothesmes oi asketheises prosphuges tes sugkekrimenes epikheiresespm demotiko skholeio melikes oraean ikanopoietho erkhomai leei o entota erga auta apoteloun meros tou skhediou drases gia ten periballontike anabathmise tou ergostasiou bolou pou antapokrinetai se meizona autousden to kaname omossto ploio o konprokeitai gia phrastikes photobolides tou k gkontagenika epikratei ena mpakhalo me ton prothupourgo na menei anapophasistos apenanti stis eisegeseis pou dekhetai gia prote phora oi ideal grafico inteal solutions kai pansystemskhanna kai oi adelphes tes tou gounti alenepises megalo einai to erotematiko gi autous pou tha apokhoresoun ama te epistrophe tes omadas apo te slobeniaidios katalogizei sobares euthunes ste demotike arkhe gia monopleure askese exousias kai adunamia sunergasias me tis parataxeis tes antipoliteusesgenikotera katadikazei ton ergazomeno sten ellada apoteloun ta pio bolika ulika ergasias tes astunomias se plere antithese me tis alles europaikes khoreseinai ena protoporiako eikastiko gegonos gia te lemno exairetika semantiko kathos oi katoikoi tou nesiou mas den eikhan te dunatoteta na doun xana mia tetoia ekthesesumphona panta me plerophories pou episema den ekhoun epibebaiothei enas arithmos ano ton pente atomon bretheke thetikos se auta kai ena pou uiothetesame kai phrontizamese oti aphora ten kubernese tora oti aphora ten kubernese tou tora ta pragmata einai katharaallo ena kharakteristiko tou einai e panoramike elektrika anoigomene gualine orophe pou tha prospheretai proairetikaoi ogkoi poleseon kai e leitourgike kerdophoria sunekhizoun na epereazontai apo ten pagkosmia oikonomike upheseektos ki an me te phrase gia ten apokatastase tes aletheias ennooun oi suntaktes tes anakoinoses oti tha poun poios edose ten entole gia ten epithese kata ton diadelotonste sunekheia sto klima ton agion emeron phrontizei na mas bazei kathe khrono o kuklos epistemonon tes khristianikes enoses me ten despoinida arsinoe pappaoi kalesmenoi tou e pneumatike aphrokrema tes uorkes anamesa tous o li strasmpergk o liouis e stela antler kai bebaia o philos tou rontere kai tou krita elias kazanden te gnorizoume akome stis leptomereies tes alla to perigramma tes einai peripou gnostoena mathema pou prepei na to apostethisoume oloi an theloume na legomaste anthropoiemeis den tha kanoume oti ekane to to proegoumeno diastema pou ekbiaze me eklogeskatagraphei me te dike tes optike ikanoteta eikones tes laikes mas paradoses pou o khronos epikouroumenos kai apo ton ekmonternismo teinei na aphaniseisten oloklerose tes kataskeues boethese seuantika e etaireia evonikopos kai oi anthropoi etsi kai polla apo ta skulia mas gkrizarounsuupleronouue ue alati piperi kai te daphnepros to paron perimenoume ten anagnorise ton eidon pou sullexameta phagame oloi mazi tou khrestou giannara an kai demosieutheke stis oktobriou pisteuoume oti einai epikaire oso pote e parakato epiphullida tou khrestou giannara sten kathemerineetsi bios kai ergo tou emplekontai sto muthistorema kai sunthetoun mia endiapherousa niothoun pragmatika sto petsi tous tis apophaseis tes troikasten epharmoge parekhontai plerophories gia ola ta axiotheata sta khania ana istorikes periodous photographies kai keimena paralies mouseia na tonisoume mesa apo to teleutaio einai pos e semasia tou nerou perase sto mutho kai sunduasteke me ten idea tou athanatou neroukai nai men mporei to erotema na emeine anapanteto pantos gelase to kheilaki olonepises uporei na kharakteristei nesi tes tekhnes giati e phuse proikise ten teno ue aphthono aspro kai prasino uaruaro skhistolitho kai granite ulika pou sta kheria ton teniakon peran to euroomada apo te georgia persi termatise ste deutere these ki etsi kerdise to eisiterio gia ten exodo tes sta prokrimatika tou thesmoutonise me idiaitere emphase oti stis proteraiotetes tou einai to suntomotero dunato se sunergasia me tous sullogous tou nomou alla kai me tous allous phoreis na demiourgesei ena plegma sterixes ton atomon me anaperiatelika me entole eisaggelea o nearos odegetheke stis phulakes korudallou mekhri na oristei dikasimosaskhema etan ta nea kai gia ton orphanoudake pou apo te theba pere metathese gia ten ko kati pou semainei oti den mporei na erkhetai sukhna sto hrakleiomia esukhe ammoudia molis metra apo te limnothalassa tes bouliagmenes limne eraiou kai me oraia thea ston korinthiako kolpoarkhizei protos o mainas ten psukhanaluseto upsos tou trekhontos epitokiou kineses einai ki an aphairethei to logo tes summetokhes sto thesmo tes suneggueses diamorphonetai stoapantontas o prothupourgos anephere oti dikos tou stokhos einai e peraitero dieurunse ton skheseon metaxu ton duo khoron kai tes ellenorosikes sunergasiasoson aphora ten idia te suskepse aute eikhe kai ta photoparaleipomena tesstis treis diastaseis den einai opos apodeiknuetai toso aplo aphou oi paiktes prepei na einai skhedon apoluta suntonismenoi stis kineseis tous apo ten miasumphona me ton dieuthunonta sumboulo tes kataskeuastrias neas odou k del rio uparkhei megalo problema me te metaphora ton diktuon koines opheleias kurios me tis kolones tes thema gia to opoio ekhoun katablethei ede eurotis teleutaies meres to theluko upakouontas stous nomous tes phuses mazepse diaphorous arsenikous guro tes gia anaparagogeta prota diaphemistika spot me tous kharous ta drepania kai tous taphous e stase tes ekklesias kai e amekhania pou prokalese te dekaetia tou e lexe prophulaktiko sto kathemerino lexilogiooi sosialistikes tou idees ton odegesan sten porta exodou tou kempritz opou eikhe katapherei na ginei lektoras oikonomikon spoudonoles oi politikes omades phouskonoun ton arithmo ton melon toussumphona me ton kathegete parker pirson eidiko sten epokhe tou khalkou oi moumies pithanotata sunarmologethekan apo mele ton idion oikogeneion oi demiourgoi tous pithanos ethelan na timesoun kai na kratesoun mazi tous tous progonous tousto stoikheua apo ten prote stigue einai an tha katapherei e kubernese na dosei nea othese sten oikonouiaexegese loipon pos kata te gnome tou se ena toso antagonistiko periballon e monadike luse gia na katastei biosime e einai na uparxoun idiotika kriteria ston tropo tes leitourgias tessumphona me ta stoikheia tou genikou logisteriou to to khreos kentrikes kuberneses etan disto kratos mas prosekhei polu de thelei na mas kourasei mas leei kathiste sta spitia sasme tosous phusikous porous elio aera geothermia einai ntrope e exartese apo to petrelaio ton kerdoskopon kai ton to bareliskutale tes thumeses kai tes gnoses prepei na dotheisten epidike upothese to dikasterio dietaxe te dienergeia test alla o pheromenos os pateras arnetheke duo phores na parousiastei sten pragmatognomona moriake biologo gia aimolepsia epikaloumenos aorista prosopikous logousaphou se kathe periptose autoi tha menuontanparallela kai prokeimenou na epitakhunei te reustoteta se elbetiko phragko diemenuse oti tha pragmatopoiesei sunallagmatika swapkath ole te diarkeia ton kinetopoieseon programmatizetai ekstrateia enemeroses ton politon kai ton topikon phoreon apo tis topikes arkhes gia ta oikonomika problemata alla kai ta aitemata tes topikes autodioikesespithanos oi anonumoi libellographoi na aisthanontai amekhania giati to antimperialistikoantipolemiko kinema proaspizetai tous amakhous kai to anaphaireto dikaioma tou aphganikou laou gia ethnike anexartesia demokratia kai kuriarkhia ston topo tousanalogo loipon nomoskhedio eikhe psephistei kai tote alla den epharmosteke epeide oi diadikasies pou proeblepe krithekan grapheiokratikeseno ostoso apo te mia einai epibletike kai aristokratike apo ten alle einai mia pole pou kineitai se teleios allous ruthmous kai aute einai e goeteia tesmonadike isos exegese einai oti se diaphoretike periptose o tha etan aplesiastos aphou mekhri perusi ten anoixe e time tou etan sta ekatommuriagia suzetese kai lepse apophaseon epi ton katotero thematon tes emeresias diataxeos egkrise tes diatheses dianomes kerdon kai kataboles merismatos kai parokhe pros to dioiketiko sumboulio ton anagkaion exousiodoteseonegkrise dienergeias anoikhtou diagonismou gia parokhe kathariotetas stis uperesies tes erakleiou kai sugkrotese epitropes aposphragises kai katakurose apotelesmatos demoprasias misthoses akinetou gia te stegase tou nepiagogeiou agias marinas gaziouanaloga empodia sunantese kai o ios anazetontas ten kaseta me ten prophetike ekpompeeidikotera o k giannakides exephrase te boulese gia eniskhuse ton epaphon kai tes sunergasias stous tomeis ton ependuseon tou tourismou kai ton metaphoron axiopoiontas tis upodomes pou uparkhoun sten periphereia masmandragoras mazi me ton sturaka ton pharmakeutikon styrax officinalis ekhresimopoieito eureos kata ton mesaiona stis khores tes europes toson apo tous iatrous kai tous pharmakologous oson kai apo tous alkhemistes tous magous tous agurtes klpprokeitai gia ellenikes etairies apo te dutike makedonia pou tha summeteikhan sten ekthese upo te skepe tes diethnous ektheses thessalonikes deth oi ekprosopoi ton opoion xestesan ta periptera tous kai anakhoresan apo te smurnemen xekhname oti sten pistoia tipota den ekaneepistrophe omos sto epeisodio kai ektos ton oson grapsame emeis idou allo ena semeioma ap ton panta koinoniko drasterio kai euaistheto pantelara proen demarkho xiouden stamata edo to egkomio sto logo tou karamanlediakosmese gia akoma ton apophugei tou eipe oti tha tou telephonesei sto kineto touautous pou agonizontan gia ten phanelaauto pou den mporei na antimetopisei ten katastase einai to kratos kai e kubernese e opoia kathemerina apotugkhanei se ola ta testta duo peripou ekatommuria euro ton koinotikon alla kurios ethnikon poron pou diatethekan sunolika gia to ergo exakolouthoun na einai anekmetalleutata phulla tou lakhanou perasmena gia elakhisto khrono apo to brasto gala phtanoun sto trapezi me to zoero kharma ophthalmon prasino khroma touskosma me eisodo ten odo ikkou kai exodo ten odo arkhpoios tha elegxei to diadiktuo kai tis propagandistikes tou ektropes me ten periokhe mas apo tous pases phuseos meionotikous sullogous me tous amphiboles nomimotetas skopous kai drasteriotetesmias kai ta matia olon mas semera tha einai strammena sten amerike na xeroume kati parapano gia na men eimaste mperdemenoiden mporeis me mia stigmiaia analuse na deis te genikotere katastase tes ugeias enos anthropouto proto emikhrono den diekdikei daphnes poiotetas eno e dunate brokhe pou epephte kath ole ten diarkeia tou agona duskolepse arketa tis prospatheies ton podosphairistonk philios anaphertheke analutikotera sta duo themata pou zetesan oi parataxeis na suzetethoun ektaktos sto demotiko sumboulioekhoume episkeptes sundedemenous den einai koroidia na pleroneis kati to opoio den to epithumeis e kati pou outos e allos den to lambaneisistorike pleon kai textbook nemeakatalepse ton sunoron dierkese mise oraoi kitrinomauroi pou ekhoun parameinei aettetoi tis teleutaies agonistikes tha prospathesoun na ekmetalleutoun ton paragonta edra kai na phthasoun se mia akoma epitukhia pou tha tous dosei to dikaioma na blepoun me megale aisiodoxia to mellonkai ola auta upo tis pieseis tes boulgarikes pleuras gia anatheorese tes sumphonias gia ta nera tou potamouuper tes apeleutheroses neou phasmatos takhtheke o richard feasey dieuthuntes demosias politikes tou vodafone grouptha kanoume epises oti einai dunato gia na prospheroume te boetheia mas suzetame me to ethniko metabatiko sumboulio to politiko organo ton exegermenon para to gegonos oti den elegkhei akome ten periokhepos einai dunaton me toses tis petreskatoikeitai apo ntopious kai pontiousopos katalabainete loipon den tha mporousa n arnetho otan mou proteinan na kano aute ten gkest star emphanise kai malista sto kanali sto opoio ekho doulepsei ki ekho kanei epitukhiesauto proeidopoioun oi epistemones parekhontas tis iskhuroteres os semera apodeixeis skhetika me to oti to ergasiako stres auxanei ton kinduno kardiopatheion aposuntonizontas ta esoterika sustemata tou organismoukairos athena tet aug ugeia kai episteme sabbato iouliou tou andrastes odegetheke sten uperesia mas kai kata te diarkeia tes proanakrises omologese oti bradines ores tesepithumia ton anthropon tes omadas etan na eniskhuthei me paiktes pou katagontai apo ten eurutere periokhe tes messaras kati pou kateste dunatooi paiktes ekhoun eidopoiethei apo ten dioikese oti mekhri aurio tha ekhoun semeiothei exelixeiseutukhos omos ten prolaban sten arkhe kai ekeino pou metrese etan oti den eikhame peraitero epektase tesbriskomaste se kalo dromo alla khreiazetai etoimoteta kai prospatheia se ola ta epipeda mekhri to telos gia na petukhoume ton stokho masakolouthei to bankouber kai sten trite these katatassetai e nea uorkeki etsi tha xanarthei piso san peripeteiodes skia phernontas ton aera mias nostalgias pou trephei te phantasia oson ton agapesan ki oson upologisan ste stathere axia tes apoleiasopos ekhei apodeikhthei polles phores sto parelthon oi katanalotes apoteloume ten koinonike omada me te megalutere exousiaekei akribos ethela na paopisteuoume oti erthe e ora e telos na gurisei selidadiaisthanetai oti to bretaniko goetro katapontizetai oti phthanei sto telos tes e iskhus ton dutikon sten apo anatoleara ara ephodiasteite ta eisiteria diarkeias kai zeste anepanaleptes stigmesmprokolo phasolakia kounoupidi arakas brazontai a l anglaise se brasto alatismeno nero kai ste sunekheia ta rikhnoun se kruo nero gia na stamatesei amesos o brasmos tousmelina pou uegalose khoris uetera einai truphere ki athoa ki oneireuetai ten alethine agapeston panathenaiko exantlese ten austeroteta tes e peitharkhike epitrope tes souper ligkasskhedon staipsila tha perasei exaitias tes kautes epikairotetas mia polu semantike sunantese pou ginetai sta xaniaenas odegos omos molis eide tous astunomikous na plesiazoun egkateleipse ten motosikleta tou kai epibibasteke sten deutere me skopo na diaphugei mazi ton allonsten pleionoteta tous tautizontanki esteilan ena menuma s olous emas pou me ten prote duskolia ta paratame gkriniazoume to bazoume katodeiktes upseles kephalaiopoieses semeiose ptose se pososto eno o deiktes tes mesaias kephalaiopoieses upokhorese se pososto kai o deiktes tes mikres kephalaiopoieses semeiose ptoseperephanos gia ten omada tou delose o omospondiakos tekhnikos tes ethnikes korasidon giorgos belissarakos meta te nike me epi tes rosias kai ten katalepse tes pemptes theses sto europaiko protathlema tou kaliarito ekhei orama gia ena kalutero mellon gia te khora kai gia ten epiteuxe tou stokhou uparkhoun kai sugkekrimenes protaseis pou sterizontai sten prasine anaptuxeton demosiographo soto paidake upeuthuno ton athletikon tes prin bgei ste suntaxe brabeuse e dioikese tes gia ten prosphora tou kai sta mikra spor ste diarkeia tou therinou protathlematos proagonistikon kategorion pou egine sto lintoauta ta paidia pou einai mele se skhemata san tous rotting christ den prokeite na ginoun pote plousioi e diasemoi apo ten mousikegia na ta xekhasoume ola ste sunekheia bebaios kai na prokhoresoume ten epomene khronia se mia apo ta idiaetsi iskhuei kai gia allous paiktes protes grammes opos o torosides o opoios apo oti phainetai exakolouthei na brisketai sto epikentro senarionena ephialtiko senario san apo tainia tromou planietai s oloklero ton planete eno e ennoia tes pagkosmiopoieses apokta tora tromaktikes diastaseisprokeitai gia klinike ergasteriake exetase kata ten opoia me te khrese eidikou mekhanematos katagraphontai oi kumatomorphes pou paragontai ston anthropino egkephalo os apantese se sugkekrimena exoterika erethismatato semantikotero omos einai oti enopoieitai to arkhaio lukeio kai e palaistra tou gumnasiou me to peristulio pou semera briskontai apenanti kai khoristales kai oloi oi nomoi mas ekhoun dothei ex ouranou san deka entoles kai den mporei kaneis na tous allaxeikai den einai mono o gkomez alla kai orismenoi alloi podosphairistesertha apo ten roumania prota sten thessalonike kai meta ephthasa sten rodopeeinai khtismene se upsometro m me panoramike thea sto ioniometarruthmise tes koines alieutikes politikes apotelei thema tes emeresias diataxes dedomenou oti oi kanones pou iskhuoun upo to semerino kathestos ekpneoun sto telos tou etouspresbes tes armenias diamarturetheke kai sten egesia tou upenthumizontas kai tis amuntikes sumphonies diakratese ton metokhon tes folli follie sustenei se analuse tes e warburg anaprosarmozontas ten proegoumene ektimese tes gia agoraphetine latsio prophanos den moiazei me kamia alle kai proballei os mia exairetika dunate antipalos gia ton areten kedemonia tes kores tes ekhei analabei e giagia tesekei omos pou e elleipse sobarotetas ekhei khtupesei kokkino einai sten elassona antipoliteuseauto iskhue kai sten periptose tou algerinou mesoepithetikou pou eikhe men sumbolaio os to kalokairi tou plen omos to en logo idiotiko sumphonetiko tou edine to dikaioma na apokhoresei amesatrite iouliou kathe khrono to teleutaio sabbatokuriako tou iouliou giortazontai ste skoulekaria tes artas geneteira tou giorgou karaiskake ta karaiskakeiaxatzebretas me psephous perissoterous enanti kai tha etan ligoteroi an den uperkhan oi psephoi athltikon suntakton tou hrakleioumia megale aletheia einai oti osoi peran to khrisma ten teleutaia sten kuriolexia stigme koubaloun mazi tous polla meionektemata aphou den to katalaban kai oi idioi kala kala pou leei o logosta teleutaia khronia ostoso proserkhontai gia boetheia atoma olo kai pio mikres elikias akome kai kato ton etoneditors choice nea taseis apopseis skholia den uparkhoun askhemes gunaikes mono dustukhismenes gunaikes e gunaikes pou plettoun ekhoun pei oi adelphes maria kai rosy caritaperan auton erotematiko uparkhei gia dekaanekei sto kethea kentro therapeias exartemenon atomon kai apeuthunetai se khrestes narkotikon ousion ano ton eton kai stis oikogeneies toustis opoies epitukhies ton allon panta den tis blepoume me kalo mati kai sunekheia psakhnoume na broume ti krubetai apo pisoton perasmeno dekembrio ekdotheke se cd meta apo polles ores sto stountio kai bebaia ten enorkhestrose prosarmoge tou kupourgoukai to erotema einai pos mporei enas upourgos e akoma enas prothupourgos na antilambanetai ta problemata ton politon an oudepote ta biose o idios phtanei pia kai me ta ekatommuria pou tseponoun kharistika ektos apo tis pakhules argomisthies tousauto to semeio den ekhoume alles plerophories gia to ti apeginan autoi meta ten anakhorese apo to parisise oti aphora tis posotetes ton narkotikon paradekhteke oti tis eikhe agorasei apo ena albano sten athena kai oti tis esteile me dema sto onoma tou patera tou oste na men kinesei upopsiesksaphnika o pasparakes ebgale ena makhairi kai to karphose gregora
